eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the demand for engineers with diverse expertise is rapidly increasing. Collaborating with global organisations can provide valuable opportunities for professional growth and knowledge exchange.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, obwetaavu bwa bayinginiya abalina obukugu obw'enjawulo bweyongera mangu. Okukwatagana n'ebitongole by'ensi yonna kusobola okuwa abantu omukisa okukulaakulana mu by'ekikugu n'okugabana amagezi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni ma kubbe tye, miti pa engineers matye ki ngec ma pat pat tye ka mede oyot-oyot tutwal. Winye ki dul mapat-pat me wilobo twero weko dano dongo dok gi nywako ngec.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, ejai eipud loka engineers luejaasi keda acoa naepol noi. Aiswamanara keda iriongeta luka akwap kere ijaikini oni arerengesio nuepolok nuka apolo keda aimor acoa.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia 'bani yi ecizu yi ma eselea, e'yo 'bani lezu inginiya onita be ndundu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu uru. Ti ecita amuti wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi pie ri eco drileba orodriru 'diyi fe zota azini ondua awazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, ekyetengo kya ba ingyiniya abaine obukugu butari bumwe na bumwe nikyeyongyera. Okukwatanisa n'ebitongore by'ensi yoona nikibaasa kureetaho emigisha y'omugasho y'okutunguuka n'okugabana obwengye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges facing their industry, a group of leading engineers gathered to discuss potential solutions. They aimed to bring together experts from various disciplines to share insights and foster collaboration.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa okwali mu mulimu gwabwe, ekibinja kya bayinginiya abakulu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. Baagenderera okugatta abakugu okuva mu misomo egy'enjawulo okugabana amagezi n'okutumbula enkolagana.
ach_prompt: Pien guniang peko ma dul enoni tye ka kato ki iye, dul pa engineers ma oywek gugure me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Gubedo ki miti me ribo ludiro ma aa ki I tenge mapat-pat me nywako tam gi ki dongo winye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas ikampunin kec, apotu ijinias luapolok kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Alosikinet kec arai aimorikikin ipirioitin luka atutubena nuegelegela kanu aimor acoa ka aitopoloria aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru okalamvu yini dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma e'yosi, ongulumu inginiya okporu 'diyi tra yi yi e'yo otuza ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria. Asisile eyini ri lezu 'ba nita be e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ejizu tualu eyi ma egata awazu tualu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu amakorero gaabo garikurabamu, guruupu ya ba ingyiniya abakuru, bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha buremeezi oburikubaasa kukorwaho. Bakaba baine ekigyendererwa ky'okureeta hamwe abakugu kuruga omu myoga etari emwe, okubagana ebiteekateeko n'okureetaho okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Many educational institutions struggle to provide adequate resources for hands-on learning experiences. As a result, students often miss out on essential practical skills in science education.
lug_prompt: Amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi galwana okuwa ebikozesebwa ebimala mu kuyiga okw'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi batera okusubwa obukugu obw'omugaso mu kusoma kwa ssaayansi.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan mapol tye ki peko me nongo jami ma mite me pwonyo lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan ipol kare gi keng nongo diro ma pigi tego I kwan me cayan.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu etiono noi aijaikin iboro lu itwasamao kanu aisisia. Kanuka ngun, mam esisiak edumunenete acoa na epol ajokis kotoma aisisia naka esayanis.
lgg_prompt: Pari onita ni karakara eyi dri ci afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu e'yo onita eyini aa'zu eyi ma dria 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi eyi tutuni ondua orodriru onita sayansi niri ma alea 'diyi avi.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero maingi g'eby'obwegyese nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga eby'okukoresa ebirikumara omu kwega. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi nibabura emyoga y'omugasho omu kwega kwa sayansi.

eng_prompt: The construction of the Karuma dam has attracted a diverse workforce from around the world. As a result, many skilled professionals have relocated to the site to contribute to the project.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba ebbibiro ly'e Karuma kusikiriza abakozi ab'enjawulo okuva mu nsi yonna. N'ekyavaamu, abakugu bangi basengukidde mu kifo okuwaayo ku pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Gedo pa dam me Karuma okelo lutic mapol ma aa ki I but lobo mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro mapol gukobo I kabedo ne me miyo cente pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Adukio naka edam loko Karuma eyangaunit eswamak luegelegela kotoma akwap kere. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipirioitin luipu koloto aiboisit ngin kanu aigang epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Damu Karuma niri ma sita eji 'ba karakara eyi engazu wudrikuru ma woko ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara onita be 'diyi mu angu 'da ma alea robia fezu otita 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka daamu ya Karuma kureesire abakozi baingi kuruga omunsi yoona. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu baingi batwire omwanya gw'okukoreramu purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: As society continues to evolve and face new challenges, the role of skilled professionals becomes increasingly important. Among these professionals, engineers play a pivotal role in driving innovation and developing solutions.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu beeyongera okukulaakulana n'okusanga okusoomoozebwa okupya, omulimu gw'abakugu gweyongera okuba omukulu. Mu bakugu bano, bayinginiya bakola omulimu omukulu mu kuleeta obuyiiya n'okukola eby'okugonjoola ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye kamede ki dongo ki nongo peko manyen, tic pa ludiro ma ludiro doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. I kin ludiro magi, engineers timo tic mapire tek tutwal me kelo diro manyen ki yubu yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itunga aijulanakin keda ainingosia nuitetiak, epolor noi aswam naka ipirioitin lu emisiaritos. Kotoma ipirioitin lu, iswamaete ijinias aswam naepol noi kanu aitolomun acoasinei nuitetiak ka aitolomun iwaitin lu itemokinet akiro.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini mu drile e'yo eyi ojazu azini e'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi esuzu risi, azi 'ba onita be angiri 'diyiniri ni eca curu'do orodriru. Ba onita be angiri 'diyi ma eselea, inginiya yi azi okporu nga e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma ti ojizu azini e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugumizamu nibahinduka kandi nibatunga oburemeezi, omurimo gw'abakugu nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Omu bakugu aba, ba ingyiniya nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureetaho okujumbura n'okutunguura eby'okukora.

eng_prompt: Due to the increasing demand for skilled professionals in the industry, regulatory bodies have implemented strict guidelines. As a result, the number of engineers under registration is limited.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu obweyongera obw'abakugu mu mulimu guno, ebitongole ebivunaanyizibwa ku by'okwerinda biteekeddewo ebiragiro ebikakali. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gwa bayinginiya abawandiisiddwa mutono.
ach_prompt: Pi miti madit tutwal matye pi lutic ma ludiro I tenge enoni, dul mapat-pat makemme ki doro tic mapat-pat oketo cik matek tutwal itic. Macalo adwogi ne, wel engineers ma ki coyo gi nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipud loepol noi loka ipirioitin lu emisiaritos kotoma aswam kangin, etolomutu atukona nuitupitono nuitupitono. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko ijinias luiwadikauna.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba onduaru okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti e'yo ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi o'ba azita okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba inginiya ru osi'ba 'diyi ma kalafe were.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'abakugu omu by'obushubuzi obweyongyeire, ebitongore ebirikutegyeka eby'obushubuzi bitaireho ebiragiro by'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gwa ba ingyiniya abahandiikirwe ni mukye.

eng_prompt: The engineering field has long been dominated by men, leading to a significant gender imbalance. Despite efforts to encourage more women to pursue STEM careers, the numbers remain low.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe kya yinginiya kimaze ebbanga nga kifugibwa basajja, ekiviiriddeko obutali bwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu. Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube w'okukubiriza abakyala bangi okwenyigira mu mirimu gya STEM, omuwendo gukyali wansi.
ach_prompt: Tic me bedo engineer obedo tic pa coo pi kare malac tutwal ma oweko mon ki coo pe gubedo marom. Kadi bed ni tute tye me cuku cwiny mon mapol me cako kwan me STEM, welgi pud tye piny.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka eijiniaring erai apak naepol noi na ikiliok aipuga, ido ngin eyangauni amamus airiamara kiding ikiliok keda angor. Karaida iswamao agogongu kanu aisinyikokit angor aswam aswamisinei nuka STEM, edisiak noi inaabai.
lgg_prompt: Angu inginiya eyini ri ma alea 'ba agupi ru 'diyi ebi agupi eyi ma okpo 'du sa'wa ezu, e'yo fepi e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi pie ri ma esele cozu ku. Okpo 'bani 'ba okpo fezu oku eyi ma ava engazu e'yo STEM ni 'diyi ma alea ra ti, kalafe eyi ma omgbo ni nga po'di ele.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'obuyinginiya gutwire nigwebemberwa abashaija, ekirikureetaho obutakwatanisa omu bashaija n'abakazi. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okuhiga abakazi baingi kwejumba omumirimo ya STEM, omuhendo gukiri ahansi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving business landscape, organizations must adapt to new challenges and opportunities. To address these needs, the institute focuses on improving technology and advancing project management.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya bizinensi eya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, ebitongole birina okutuukana n'okusoomoozebwa n'emikisa emipya. Okukola ku byetaago bino, ettendekero litadde essira ku kutumbula tekinologiya n'okutumbula enzirukanya ya pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma biacara tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, dul mapat-pat omyero guye peko ki gum manyen matye. Me tyeko miti magi, gang kwan eni oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ilo rwom me tet manyen ki ilo malo rwom me doro tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ebiasara loka lolo, ekot iriongeta acamanar keda atiokisio nuitetiak keda arerengesio nuitetiak. Kanu aitemokin ipudesia lu, isingarenit erionget aitojokar etatai loakwana ka aitopolor eyaitene lo ipurojektin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujari ni curu'do oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, le amuti eyi ma aa e'yo ewaru azini drileba o'diru 'diyi pie. Lezu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, pari onita ni 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo tekenologiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini otuta otita eyi ma driceza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obushubuzi ebirikugyenda omu maisho, ebitongore bishemereire kukoragana n'oburemeezi n'emigisha misya. Okukora ahabyetaago ebi, eitendekyero nirita omutima aha kutunguura tekinorogye n'okutunguura eby'okureeberera purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to encourage innovation and creativity, the school organized a competition showcasing student projects. The judges were impressed by the level of talent displayed throughout the event.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukubiriza obuyiiya n'obuyiiya, essomero lyategese empaka z'okwolesa pulojekiti z'abayizi. Abalamuzi baakwatibwako olw'omutindo gw'ebitone ebyayolesebwa mu mukolo gwonna.
ach_prompt: I tute me cuku cwiny lutino kwan me bedo ki ngec manyen, gang kwan ne oyubu pyem ma nyutu yub ma lutino tye kwede. Lungol kop gubedo ki yom cwiny I kom rwom me talanta ma obedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak, abu esomero itemok abolobol naka aitodiar ipurojektin lu esisiak. Apotu ikatubok isiyalamikisi noi kanu atalanta na itodiaritai kotoma opucit kangol.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, sukulu 'da otu abala eyi otita sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi e'dazu. Ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ndra ayikosi feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okujumbura,eishomero rikatebekanisa empaka z'okworeka purogyekiti z'abeegi. Abashazi b'empaka bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'omutindo gw'ebitone ebyorekirwe aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for skilled labor in various industries, policymakers recognized the need for a more focused approach to vocational training. As a result, initiatives were launched to improve educational opportunities for students seeking hands-on experience in technical fields.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'abakozi abakugu mu makolero ag'enjawulo, abakola amateeka baalaba obwetaavu bw'okussa essira ku kutendekebwa kw'ebyemikono. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka zaatandikibwawo okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma eri abayizi abanoonya obumanyirivu mu by'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic ma ludiro I tenge me tic mapat-pat, luyub cik guniang ni omyero ki ket cwinygi I kom pwonye me tic cing. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako yub me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino ma tye ka yenyo diro me tic cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos kotoma okampuni luegelegela, apotu itunga luitolomete ikisila kojenutu eipuda lo aitodolikin aitutuoro na acoasinei. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitegearai aswamisinei nuepedorete aitojokar asioman naka esisiak lu ekotosi adumun amisiarit kotoma aiboisio nuka etatai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba onduaru 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea risi, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu asi 'bazu onita afa edele drisi 'diyiniri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi onita ma omgbo otuzu sukulu anzi e'yo afa edele drisi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ndapi 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi abakugu omu makorero agatari gamwe na gamwe, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okutereeza omuringo gw'okutendeka eby'emikono. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka zikatandikwa kutunguura emigisha y'okwegyesa abeegi abarikwenda kukoresa emikono yaabo omu mirimo y'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing work environment, it is crucial for organizations to prioritize employee development. To achieve long-term success, the leaders should focus on fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'omulimu eya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitongole okukulembeza enkulaakulana y'abakozi. Okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu, abakulembeze bateekeddwa okussa essira ku kukuza obuwangwa bw'okuyiga n'okukulaakulana obutasalako.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tic tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal ni dul mapat-pat omyero guket dongo pa lutic gi obed gin ma pire tek. Pi nongo loc pi kare malac, lutela omyero guket cwiny gi i kom pwonyo dano me mede anyim ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka aswam, epolok noi kanu iriongeta aisingarenit aitopoloun eswamak. Kanu aitodolikin akerianut na apak naepol, ekot engarenok aitopolor einono lo aisisia ka apol.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza ewu andruri ma alea ojata mbeleru ri ma alea, eri orodriru amuti eyini azi'ba eyi ma ezota 'bazu okporu. Aa'zu drile suzaru ewu ezu ma alea, le drice'ba eyi ma 'ba asi e'yo onita ni azini zota ni ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'emirimo biriyo nibihinduka munonga, niky'omugasho ebitongore kwebembeza entunguuka y'abakozi. Okutunga obusinguzi obwire buraingwa, abebembezi bashemereire kuta amaani omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa by'okwega n'okukura.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for skilled labor, the Ugandan government has prioritized the development of educational programs. As part of this initiative, various districts have begun implementing technical and vocational training opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'abakozi abalina obukugu obweyongera, gavumenti ya Uganda ekulembezza enkulaakulana ya pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ez'enjawulo zitandise okussa mu nkola emikisa gy'okutendekebwa mu by'emikono.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic ma ludiro, gamente me Uganda oketo cwinygi tutwalle I dongo yub me kwan. Macalo but yub man, districts mapol gucako miyo pwonye me tic cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos, abu apugan nako Uganda isingarenit aitopol ainapeta nuka asioman. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ageutu idisitriktan luipu aitegear aituutoorio na acoasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba ondua be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete Uganda niri 'ba e'yo otita onita ni 'diyi ma ezota okporu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti ndundu eyi e'do imbata afa edele drisi azini afa edele drisi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ye 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi abakugu kweyongyeire,gavumenti ya Uganda eteire omutima aha nteekateeka y'eby'obwegyese. Omu nteekateeka egi, disiturikiti ezitarikushushana zitandikire kutandikaho emyoga y'eby'emikono n'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that certain social practices can significantly impact public health outcomes. One such practice, polygamy, has been linked to various health risks within communities.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti enkola ezimu zisobola okukosa ennyo ebyobulamu by'abantu. Ekimu ku bikolwa ng'ebyo, okuwasa abakazi abangi, kikwataganye n'obulabe bw'ebyobulamu obw'enjawulo mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni jami mogo ma dano timo twero kelo adwogi marac i kom yotkom pa lwak. Tim acel ma kit meno, bedo ki mon mapol, kubbe ki peko me yot kom I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe icie iponesio luka itunga epedorete aitolitol angaleu naka itunga. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio kangun, angor nuipu, ejai arucokina keda atiokisio nu angaleu kotunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo azi 'bani 'ye o'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi eco e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi oja ra. Yeta 'dile 'diyi ma azi, oku eyi 'duzu karakara ri, e'bi ovu ecizaru e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi pie ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu ebikorwa ebimwe nibibaasa kukora kihango aha magara g'abantu. Ekikorwa kimwe nk'ekyo, okushwera abakazi baingi, kikwataniise n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In today's society, young people often engage in casual relationships and explore their sexuality more freely than previous generations. This behavior can lead to increased risks associated with sexually transmitted infections.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, abavubuka batera okwenyigira mu mukwano n'okunoonyereza ku kwegatta kwabwe mu ddembe okusinga emirembe egyayita. Enneeyisa eno esobola okwongera ku bulabe obukwatagana n'endwadde z'ekikaba.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo pa dano me kareni, bulu ipol kare gimaro bedo ki lurem matino-tino dok gi kwedo lok kom butu imit gi labongo lageng mapol ka iporo ki yalwak macon. Tim man twero medo gum me nongo two ma aa ki i butu imit.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, etapit atumunak ajaut keda eidicane loatitai kosodete aingic aelo kec kopone kaloajokan adepar lukolo. Epedori iponesio lu ayangaun atiokisio nuipu nu ikamanara keda adekasinei nu aelo.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba oderu 'diyi tutuni eyi 'ba e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma alea dika eyi e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma ale andri pirini aga 'ba ewu drio 'diyi ra. Adriza 'di eco fe e'yo azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, eminyeeto neekira kwejumba omubikwatiraine n'okuteerana n'okushwijuma ebikwatiraine n'okuteerana n'obugabe kukira abantu aba ira. Enkora egi neebaasa kwongyera akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire oburikuruga omu kuteerana.

eng_prompt: Many young people feel invincible and underestimate the risks associated with sexual activity. As a result, they often make impulsive decisions regarding their sexual health.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi bawulira nga tebasobola kuwangulwa era banyooma akabi akali mu kwegatta. N'ekivuddemu, batera okusalawo mu bwangu ku bikwata ku bulamu bwabwe obw'okwegatta.
ach_prompt: Bulu mapol giwinyo ni pe kitwero loyogi dok gi cayo rac pa tim me butu imit. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gimoko tamgi atura I kom yotkom gi me butu imit.
teo_prompt: Eomitos atumunak luipu ebe mam epedorio aitelekaar kesi ido mam ejenete atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma aelo. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos angaleukec naka aelo.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara eyi ega kini 'ba econi eyi nde ku dika eyi e'da e'yo onzi eyi ecipi ali o'baza be 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni peta eyi 'du e'yo eyi ma rua alata e'yo ali o'baza niri ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eminyeeto emingi neehurira etarikubaasa kusingurwa kandi etarikufayo aha kabi akarikuruga omu by'okuteerana. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kusharaho ahonaaho ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo ag'okuteerana.

eng_prompt: Health officials are growing increasingly concerned about the rising trend in disease transmission among young people. Recent reports indicate a troubling spike in cases within this demographic.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'omuze gw'okusaasaana kw'endwadde mu bavubuka ogweyongera. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa obulwadde buno gweyongedde nnyo.

ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ka nongo two corona tye ka medde tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Tutwalle lutic me yot kom gitye ka neno kit ma jami tye kwede I West Nile, kama wel dano tye ka medde ameda.

lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo azo korona niri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra. Drice'ba alata ni 'diyi tutuni e'yo angu westnile niri ma alea ri ma pamvu one, kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tutu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okukira munonga, abakuru omu by'amagara bariyo nibareebuuza embeera omuri West Nile, ahu omuhendo gw'abantu gubire nigweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the community has been actively seeking sustainable solutions to combat climate change. As a result, local initiatives have emerged to promote clean energy development.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, abantu babadde banoonya engeri z'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka z'ebitundu zivuddeyo okutumbula enkulaakulana y'amasannyalaze amayonjo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak gubedo ka yenyo yoo me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapat-pat me dongo mac ma pe balo kabedo wa okati.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu igangakino kanu aitikitik aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe. Kanuka ngun, etolomun aswamisio nuka atutubet kanu aitopolor apol naka akim na elaete.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi ebi geri ndundu eyini ecozu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be 'diyi nda sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ndundu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi efu e'yo angu ezoma okpo alatararu 'diyiniri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka z'ebyaro zitandikire kutunguura eby'amashanyarazi ebirikwera.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing trend among individuals seeking alternative sources of revenue. Many have turned to the energy sector, exploring innovative products that promise both sustainability and profitability.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo omuze ogweyongera mu bantu okunoonya ensibuko endala ez'ensimbi. Bangi baddukidde mu kitongole ky'amasannyalaze, okunoonyereza ku bintu ebiyiiya ebisuubiza obuwangaazi n'amagoba.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me nongo cente. Dano mapol dong gudok I tenge me mac, kun giyenyo jami manyen matye ki gen me dongo lobo ki nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai epone loepol noi loka itunga aimo iponesio ice luka adumun ikapun. Apotu luipu olototo toma orionget loka akim, aimo iboro luitetiak lu isumunenete aijar keda ameda.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi ndazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba karakara eyi oja eyi okalamvu aci ni 'diyi ma alea, eyini afa ndundu o'diru 'diyi ondazu eyini ani ecozu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ra azini orodri esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kuronda oburyo obundi bw'okutunga entaasya. Baingi bahindukire omu kitongore ky'eby'amashanyarazi, barikucondooza aha bintu ebirikutangaaza ebirikubaasa kugumaho n'okureeta amagoba.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, communities have sought innovative ways to improve their cooking methods. As a result, many individuals have turned to the craft of stove-making to enhance their culinary experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu babaddenga banoonya engeri z'okulongoosaamu mu ngeri gye bafumbamu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi basazeewo okukola sitoovu okwongera ku bumanyirivu bwabwe mu kufumba.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, lwak gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me tedo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gucako yubu keno me medo rwom me tedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, amoete itunga iponesio luitetiak luka aitojokar iponesiokec luka aipo. Kanuka ngun, alomasi itunga luipu aswam asigirin kanu aitojokar iponesiokec luka aipo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi nda geri o'diru eyini nyaka a'dizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi oja eyi sita sigiri edezu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu eyi ma nyaka a'diza ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in respiratory illnesses, health officials implemented a series of preventive measures. As a result of these efforts, the district has reduced the level of respiratory cases.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'obulwadde bw'okussa gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baateekawo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okuziyiza. Olw'okufuba kuno, disitulikiti ekendeezezza omuwendo gw'abalwadde b'okussa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ma mako yweyo, lutic me yot kom gukati ki yoo mapol me gengo ne. Macalo adwogi me tute magi, dictrikodwoko piny rwom pa dano matye ki peko me yweyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin adekasinei nu eyengane, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu iwaitin lu itikitikere. Kanuka aswamisio nu, edisiar edisitrikt adekasinei nu eyengane.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba geri ndundu eyi e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi ma alea. Okpo 'diyi ma e'yosi, distrikiti esi kalafe 'ba ava 'yapi 'diyi ma kalafe ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara z'okwisya zigumire nizeyongyera, ab'ebyamagara bakataho emiringo mingi y'okuzibira. Ahabw'amaani aga, disiturikiti ekakyendeeza omuhendo gw'abarwaire b'emiringo y'okwitsya.

eng_prompt: In response to rising gas prices and environmental concerns, many individuals began seeking alternative transportation methods. As a result, people reduced fuel expenditure.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'amafuta okulinnya n'okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi, abantu bangi baatandika okunoonya engeri endala ez'entambula. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bakendeezezza ku nsaasaanya ku mafuta.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa wel moo ki lworo I kom cwec ma orumuwa, dano mapol gucako yenyo yoo mukene me wot. Macalo adwogi ne, dano odwoko piny wel cente ma gitiyo kwede me wilo moo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka ekwam keda aiyalongongo na akwap, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aimo iponesio ice luka alosit. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga itidisiasi etiai loka ikapun luitosomaete kesi kanu akinyet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje odu ni tuzu tualu e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie, 'ba karakara eyi e'do geri acizu 'diyi nda. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi esi robia eyini ayu odu ma dria ri ma omgbo ra.

eng_prompt: As the demand for sustainable energy sources grew, many households began seeking alternatives to traditional methods of lighting. This shift in energy consumption led to innovative solutions that reduced reliance on fossil fuels.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze ag'olubeerera bweyongera, amaka mangi gaatandika okunoonya engeri endala ez'okukolamu amataala. Enkyukakyuka eno mu nkozesa y'amasannyalaze yaleetawo enkola ez'obuyiiya ezaakendeeza ku kwesigama ku mafuta g'ebintu eby'edda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma miti me mac omedde, gangi mapol gucako yenyo yoo mukene me mac mapat ki macon. Alokaloka man I kom tic ki mac okelo yub manyen ma odwoko piny rwom me tic ki mac ma aa ki I te ngom.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo akim, apotu ikalia luipu kogeutu aimo iponesio ice luka aica. Aijulanakineta kotoma aitosom akim abu koyangau iwaitin luitetiak lu itidisiarete aitosom iboro lu akinyet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu geri aci ayupi sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, aku karakara eyi e'do geri aci ayuza a'di ni 'diyi ma azi eyi nda. Ojata aci ayuza ma alia 'diri fe geri o'diru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu aci ayuza ma dria ra 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to reliable electricity remains a significant challenge. As a result, families often struggle to find affordable alternatives for sustainable energy solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amasannyalaze agesigika kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, amaka gatera okulwana okufuna engeri endala ez'ebbeeyi ey'ebbeeyi y'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, nongo mac ma pe rweny obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi ipol kare gi nongo peko me nongo yoo me tic ki mac ma welgi yot.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, eringa adumun akim naka epiei erai ationis naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etionikinitos ikalia noi adumun iwaitin lu epedorio aitwasam akim.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, aci esuzu kililiru ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, familia eyi sa'wa driasi a'di 'di geri 'bani ecozu aci esuzu aje kokoru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, okutunga amashanyarazi agatarikugwera. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka nigatera kurwana kuronda oburyo bw'okukoresa amashanyarazi agarikubaasika.

eng_prompt: Acquiring property in space has become a topic of interest for many investors. However, the costs associated with purchasing land or resources in the solar system are astronomical.
lug_prompt: Okufuna eby'obugagga mu bwengula kifuuse omulamwa ogw'obwagazi eri bamusigansimbi bangi. Newankubadde, ebisale ebikwatagana n'okugula ettaka oba ebintu mu masannyalaze g'enjuba biri waggulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma keto lim I biyacara tye ki miti me nongo jami I kabedo mapat-pat manonge I dan polo. Kadi bed kumeno, wel cente ma mite me wilo ngom onyo jami me tic ki mac ma aa ki iceng tye lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun iboro kotoma akwap erai akirot naeminasi itunga luipu. Konye, etiai loepol noi loka agwel alupok keda iboro luka esola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi jezu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri eca curu'do e'yo azi 'ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi lepi saaru ni i. Kani si, aje e'yo nyaku jezu kani afa solar ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma aje angiri.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, scientists discovered that the behavior of certain species on Earth can have unexpected consequences beyond our planet. This revelation has led to new theories about the interconnectedness of life and the cosmos.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, bannassaayansi baakizuula nti enneeyisa y'ebika ebimu ku nsi esobola okuba n'ebivaamu ebitasuubirwa okusukka ensi yaffe. Okuzuula kuno kuleetedde endowooza empya ku kukwatagana kw'obulamu n'obwengula.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, lucayan gu niang ni tim pa kwai lee mukene I wi lobo twero kelo adwogi ma pe byek tye I kom lobo wa. Yubu man okelo tam manyen I kom kubbe matye ikin kwo ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, apotu itunga luka sayanis kodumutu ebe iponesio luka iponesio ice luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka iponesio luka i Ajenunet na ayangau aomisio nuitetiak nuikamunitos arucokina naka aijar keda akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, 'ba sayansini 'diyi esu kini adriza afa nyaku dria 'diyi ma azi 'diyi ni 'diyi eco ovu e'yo onzi 'bani ega ku 'diyi be angu ama vile 'diyi ma drilea ra. E'yo 'di eji egata o'diru yi ma eselea e'yo idri ni yi ecizu yi ma eselea azini angu yi ma eselea 'diyi pie ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Despite the innovative features and strong marketing efforts, the launch of the product fell short of expectations. Key decision-makers failed to engage with the sales team, leading to a disconnect in strategy and execution.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo obuyiiya n'obumalirivu bw'okutunda, okutongoza ekintu tekwakolebwa nga bwe kyali kisuubirwa. Abakola okusalawo abakulu baalemererwa okukwatagana ne ttiimu y'okutunda, ekyaviiriddeko obutakkaanya mu nteekateeka n'okutuukiriza.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kiyubu jami manyen ki keto tek me cato jami ne, cato jami ne pe otimme kit ma byek tye kwede. Luyub tam ma pigi tego pe gubedo ka lok ki joo ma cato jami gi, man okelo apoka-poka ikit me tic ki kit me timo tic.

lgg_prompt: Afa edele o'diru 'diyi ma talasi azini okpo e'yo cuu ndaza ni 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo afa edeza 'di ni e'dozu ri awini e'yo 'bani egale 'diyi 'ye ku. Ba e'yo 'du'ba okporu 'diyi awini e'yo nze amuti afa oziza ni 'diyi pie ku, e'yo 'di fe e'yo otuta ni azini e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma esele cozu ra.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing interest in renewable energy, many residents found the cost of solar systems to be prohibitive. As a result, alternative financing options were explored, but they still fell short of encouraging widespread adoption.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo obwetaavu obweyongera mu masannyalaze, abatuuze bangi baasanze ebbeeyi y'amasannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba nga ya waggulu nnyo. N'ekyavaamu, enkola endala ez'ensimbi zaanoonyezebwa, naye era zaalemererwa okukubiriza abantu bangi okuzikozesa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed miti me tic ki mac ma aa ki iceng tye kamede, lutedero mapol gunongo ni wel mac ma aa ki iceng tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo mukene me nongo cente kiyenyo, ento pud pe gucuko cwiny dano mapol me cako tic kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai eipud loepol noi loka aitwasam akim naka esola, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ebe epol etiai loka aitwasam esola. Kanuka ngun, aponi kongicunai iponesio ice luka ikapun, konye mam apotu kopedosi aisinyikokit itunga luipu aitwasam ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini ava tuzu okpo aci ni 'diyi ma dria ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi esu aje aci solar ni 'diyiniri angiri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nda geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi, te eyi awini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ayuzu ri ma omgbo otu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhimbo omu by'amashanyarazi, abatuuragye baingi bakashanga emihendo y'amashanyarazi ga soora eri ahaiguru munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo endiijo y'okushashurira esente ekashwijumwa, kwonka ekaba etarikubaasa kuhwera abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are struggling to make ends meet due to rising living costs. As a result, discretionary spending on leisure and entertainment has significantly decreased.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya. N'ekyavaamu, ensaasaanya ku by'okwesanyusaamu ekendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi pi wel cente matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, wel cente ma kitiyo kwede me nongo yweyo ki galo wang ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aijar naarai eyatakinos itiaisinei luka aijar. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto ikapun lu itwasamao kanu ailel keda aitelelio.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo esu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi. E'yo 'disi, robia 'bani ayu e'yo ayiko fezani 'diyi ma dria ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu,enshohoza y'abantu aha by'okweshemeza n'okushemererwa ekyendeire munonga.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the Arua municipality as rival political factions prepared for the highly contested by-election. As the day of voting approached, concerns grew over potential clashes between supporters.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu munisipaali ya Arua ng'ebiwayi by'ebyobufuzi ebivuganya byetegekera okulonda okw'omuddiring'anwa okuvuganyizibwako ennyo. Olunaku lw'okulonda bwe lwasembera, okweraliikirira kweyongera olw'obukuubagano obuyinza okubaawo wakati w'abawagizi.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I municipality me Arua I kare ma dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi gubedo ka yubbe pi yer manyen matye ki pyem matek tutwal. I kare ma nino me bolo kwir cok, lworo omedde I kom lweny matye I kin lucwak.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio ko munisipaliti loka Arua naarai apotu ipatei lueboloboloete itemonokinos kanuka aseo naepol abolobol. Neyapiete apaaran naka aicak abootin, apotu aiyalongongo kiyatakin kanuka ingungeta kiding egangitok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu uru munisipaliti Arua niri ma alea amuti politiki ni a'di 'dipi 'diyi ni otuta 'yezu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alia. O'du voti 'bezuri ni ecaria, asi otiza tu e'yo aco coza ecopi 'yepi 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bweyongyeire omu munisiparite ya Arua nk'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebirikuhayahayana byeteekateekire akaruuru k'okugarukamu akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani. Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ryahikire, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'obutabanguko ahagati y'abashagiki.

eng_prompt: In light of recent disturbances and reports of suspicious activity, the village council convened to discuss safety measures. After much deliberation, they decided that immediate action was necessary to protect the residents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butabanguko obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'amawulire agakwata ku bikolwa ebiteeberezebwa, akakiiko k'ekyalo kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukuumamu obulamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo nti kyali kyetaagisa okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okukuuma abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kuku-kuku ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki adwoki me tic mapat-pat ma byek tye I komgi, lutela me caro gubedo tye me nywako lok I kom kit me gwoko kuc. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot me gwoko lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu napac keda iripotan luka aswamisio nu eomitai ebe ejai, apotu ikansilan lu ocaalo iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ayuara. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi koseutu ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet kanu ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini o'duko e'yo 'yeta 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma dria, kanisulu calo ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai ra kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko oburiho obwahati hamwe n'amakuru agarikukwata aha mirimo etarikwetegyerezibwa,akakiiko k'ekyaro kakwatanisa kuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, bakasharamu ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho, okurinda abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Laughter has a unique way of bringing people together and lifting their spirits. Whether through movies, stand-up shows, or humorous anecdotes, the joy of humor is universally cherished.
lug_prompt: Enseko erina engeri ey'enjawulo ey'okukwataganya abantu n'okubazzaamu amaanyi. Ka kibe nga kuyita mu firimu, stand-up shows, oba ebisesa, essanyu ly'okusesa liri mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Nyero tye ki yoo maber tutwal me ribo dano kacel ki ilo cwiny gi malo. Kadi bed I cinema, yub me cung, onyo lok angeya ma yomo cwiny, yomcwiny me yomo cwiny dano weng tye ki pwoc madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi akwena keda epone loitegelikina loka aimorikikin itunga keda aikeun aijar kec. Arai kotoma obidio, aitodianareta, arai bo aitelelio, itunga kere eminasi aiyalama naka aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: O'duza ma geri wura ndu ni 'ba eyi ejizu tualu dika eyi ma ava engazu. Ka tro trayi senema eyi ma alea, e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma alea, kani ku e'yo ayiko fepi 'diyi ma alea, ayiko e'yo ayiko fepi 'diyi ma alea ri eri 'ba dria eyini ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Enseko ziine omuringo gw'omutaano gw'okugarukanisa abantu n'okubagaruramu amaani. Yaaba kurabira omu firimu, emikoro y'okushemererwa, nainga ebirikushemeza, okushemererwa kw'okushemererwa nikusiimwa omu nsi yoona.

eng_prompt: As the lights dimmed and the crowd settled in, the atmosphere buzzed with anticipation for the night's lineup. One by one, the comedians took the stage, ready to share their unique perspectives and humor.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitaala bikendeera era nga n'abantu batudde mu bifo byabwe, embeera yabadde ejjudde okweraliikirira olw'okusimba ennyiriri z'ekiro. Omu ku omu, ba comedians baalinnya ku siteegi, nga beetegefu okugabana endowooza zaabwe ez'enjawulo n'okusesa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac obedo ka rweny dok dano mapol gubedo I kabedogi, dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom yub me dyewor ne. Ngat acel acel, lutim goga gu aa malo I wi abam, ma oyubbe me nywako tamgi ki jami ma yomo cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Neautar akimian aibiror kosodete itunga aiboikin, apotu itunga kojaasi keda aiyalama naepol noi kanuka itunga luebwoete kware. Adiopet adiopet, apotu itunga luka ayoere kolomutu ositesen, ekapakina aimor aomisiokec keda aisiyalamikec.
lgg_prompt: Aci eyini emvizu azini o'bi eyini rizu 'bori ma vutia, angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra asi 'baza be e'yo 'ba eyini 'ye inisi 'diyi ma dria. Ba avita 'yepi 'diyi ma alu alu tu pari avita ni 'diyi ma dria, yi ngonde e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi awazu azini ayiko fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitaara ku byabeire nibikyerereera, abantu baingi batandika kutegyereza ekiro ekyo. Omwe ahari omwe, abazaani bakaza aha siteegi, beteekateekire kugabana ebiteekateeko byabo eby'omutaano hamwe n'okushekyerera.

eng_prompt: The theater was packed with eager audience members, all excited to enjoy the evening's performance. The actors took the stage, ready to deliver their lines with humor and wit.
lug_prompt: Ekifo kyabadde kijjudde abantu abaali baagala ennyo okulaba omuzannyo ogwabaddewo akawungeezi. Bannakatemba baalinnya ku siteegi nga beetegefu okwogera ebigambo byabwe n'obusaasizi n'obugezigezi.
ach_prompt: Ot myel opong ki dano ma cwinygi obedo yom me neno tuko me otyeno. Lutuk goga gu aa malo I wi abam, ma oyubbe me miyo lokgi ki yomcwiny ki ryeko.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kilelebunos kotoma aiboisit naeyait ainom abolia naka ebong. Apotu aboliak koloto ositesen, ekapakina aitodiar akiro kec keda aiyalama keda acoa.
lgg_prompt: Pari avita ni 'da ga tre 'ba emu'ba avasi 'diyi pie ayiko esuzu avita ondresi ri si. Ba avita 'yepi 'diyi tu pari avita niri ma dria ngonde e'yo yini nze 'diyi nzezu ayiko si azini onduasi.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'okureeberamu gukaba gujwire abantu abaabaire nibenda kureeba omuzaano gw'omwebazyo. Abazaani bakahika aha siteegi, beteekateekire kugamba ebigambo byabo n'okushemererwa n'obwengye.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance guest experiences and attract more visitors, the hotel management held a meeting to discuss new entertainment options. They recognized the growing popularity of live performances and wanted to incorporate more engaging activities into their offerings.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'abagenyi n'okusikiriza abagenyi abalala, abaddukanya wooteeri baatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku by'okusanyusa ebipya. Baazuula obuganzi bw'okuyimba obutereevu obweyongera era baagala okuteekamu ebintu ebirala ebisikiriza mu kuyimba kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwo pa wele ki kelo wele mapol, ludito me otel gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me galo wang manyen. Gu niang ni dano mapol tye ka nongo miti I kom tuko ma tye katuku dok bene gubedo ki miti me medo jami ma kelo yomcwiny I yub meggi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar aiboisio nuka ipejok ka aisukunyun ipejok luipu, apotu eyaitene loka iooterin kitolototo airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin luitetiak luka aitelelio. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipone loepolor noi loka ayoere kosodete aitolomun aswamisinei nuipu noi toma aswamisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu omu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika omu eyi ma omgbo otuzu, driceza hoteli 'da niri 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo avita ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu edriru ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ra dika eyi le ndra e'yo ndundu ndundu eyi 'ye eyi ma eselea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'okushemererwa kw'abagyenyi n'okureeta abagyenyi baingi, abarikukurira hoteeri bakakora orukiiko okuhanuura aha by'okushemererwa ebisya. Bakareeba oburungi bw'ebyeshongoro ebirikugyenda omu maisho kandi bakaba nibenda kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: The room was filled with anticipation as the audience gathered for the much-anticipated presentation. Laughter and chatter filled the air, creating an electric atmosphere as the lights dimmed.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge kyajjula okweraliikirira ng'abawuliriza bakungaana olw'okwanjula okwabadde kusuubirwa ennyo. Enseko n'okunyumya byajjula empewo, ekyaleetawo embeera y'amasannyalaze ng'amataala gakendeera.
ach_prompt: Ot ne opong ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma lwak gugure pi nyuto jami ma obedo kakuru tutwal. Nyero ki lok opong I yamo, ma oweko mac obedo ka rweny.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kilelebunos aiboisit ngin kanu aitodiaret naewomitai ebe ebeit ajaikin. Apotu akwena keda einer kilelebunos kokwam, ido apotu akimian kibiroros.
lgg_prompt: Jo ale aliza nderi ga tre asi 'baza si 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ni trazu yi ma eselea e'yo eceza 'bani ega 'bori ma e'yosi. Ayiko azini e'yo nzeza ga angu ma alia tre, e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye kiijwire amatsiko ahabwokuba abantu bakateeranira hamwe okureeba omworeko ogwabaire niguteekateekwaho munonga. Okushekyerera hamwe n'okuteera akaruuru bikareetaho amashanyarazi ahabwokuba amashanyarazi gakacwekyerera.

eng_prompt: The lively music filled the air as friends gathered around the bar, laughter echoing throughout the room. As the night progressed, the atmosphere became more festive, encouraging everyone to let loose and celebrate.
lug_prompt: Omuziki ogw'essanyu gwajjula empewo ng'emikwano gikungaanidde mu bbaala, enseko nga ziwuuma mu kisenge kyonna. Ekiro bwe kyagenda mu maaso, embeera yeeyongera okujaguza, okukubiriza buli omu okusumulula n'okujaguza.
ach_prompt: Wer me yomcwiny opong ki yamo I kare ma lurem gugure I bar, nyero obedo ka winyo I ot ne weng. I kare ma dyewor ne woto anyim, kabedo ne odoko me kwee, kun cuku cwiny dano weng me weko jami weng dok me kwero.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikososinei kilelebunos kokwam kwape ipaper lu atukokinos obaa, ido apotu akwenyar kotoma agola kere. Neautar akware alosit, abu ejautene koraun lo epucit, isinyikokit itunga kere aibwo kosodete ainumunum.
lgg_prompt: Ongo ndrizaru 'diyi ga oli ma alia ekile agyipika yi oku yi pari ewa mvuzuri ma kalasi kuru, o'dukokoru 'diyi e'da jo ale aliza ma aliasi dria. Ondre ni muzu drile, e'yo omu ni 'diyi eca ayiko ru, 'ba dria eka eyini eyi ma ti pezu ayiko zu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyeshongoro ebirikuhuumuriza bikaruga omu mwoga nk'oku banywani barikwetorana omu baara, okushekyerera kurikugaruka omu kishengye kyona. Obu ekiro kyabaire nikigyenda omu maisho, embeera ekaba neeyongyera kuba ey'okujaguza, ekirikuhiga buri omwe kurekyera aho kujaguza.

eng_prompt: In a somber announcement today, the speaker addressed the nation with heavy hearts. The news of the passing of a beloved member has left a profound impact on the entire assembly.
lug_prompt: Mu kulangirira okw'ennaku olwaleero, sipiika yayogeddeko eri eggwanga n'emitima emizito. Amawulire g'okufa kw'omukiise omwagalwa gaalese enzikiriziganya ey'amaanyi ku lukiiko lwonna.
ach_prompt: I lok angeya ma ocwer tutwal tin, lalok madit oloko ki lobo man ki cwer cwiny madit tutwal. Lok angea me to pa lamemba ma lamar oweko adwogi marac tutwal I kom dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma alimoret naerono ilolo, abu eraban kiner keda akwap keda aiyalongong naepol noi. Akiro nuikamunitos atwanare naka emeeba loajokan ajalakisi aomisio nuepolok noi kotoma airiamunet kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi e'yo ewaru ni ma alia andru, anzenzea ei nze e'yo kari yi be asi nzizaru. E'yo 'bani 'ba azi leletu ni ma drata ma dria ri ku e'yo azi okporu ni ongulumu 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kurangirira kw'obusaasi eriizooba, sipiika agambiire eihanga n'obusaasi bwingi. Amahurire g'okufa kw'omwebembezi w'eihanga orikukundwa, gakakora kihango aha rukiiko rwona.

eng_prompt: After a long and distinguished career in public service, the veteran politician had become a beloved figure in his constituency. His contributions to the community were celebrated during his final years in office.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera ekiwanvu era eky'ettutumu mu buweereza bwa gavumenti, munnabyabufuzi ono omukadde yali afuuse omuntu omwagalwa mu kitundu kye. Ebintu bye yakolera abantu byajaguzibwa mu myaka gye egyasembayo mu woofiisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi kare malac I tenge me tic pa gamente, lacungu iwi bye macon-ni dong odoko dano ma dano maro adada I kabedo mege. Kikwero tic ma en otimo pi lwak I kare ma en tye I dog tic me agiki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aswam naepol noi kotoma aijanakin apugan, araun lokapolitikis loemojongit noi kotoma atutubeteke. Aponi inumunumunai aswamisioke mama ejaasi itunga kotoma okaruke loka awasia kotoma oyapesi.
lgg_prompt: Azi erini nga sawa ezu azini onyiru azi ngazu o'bi yi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, agu politikini a'daru 'da eca 'ba 'bani lele tu angu erini opi nyazu 'diyi ma alea ni'I. Ba inzi e'yo erini 'yele ongulumu eyini 'diyi eli asizu erini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara obwire buraingwa omu buheereza bwa gavumenti, ow'eby'obutegyeki owabaire ari omukugu omu by'obutegyeki, akahinduka omuntu orikukundwa abantu b'omu kicweka kye. Ebikorwa bye omu bantu, bikajaguzibwa omu myaka ye y'ahamuheru omu ofiisi.

eng_prompt: Despite his busy schedule, he had promised to attend the wedding of his close friend. However, an unexpected political crisis arose just hours before the event.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'alina eby'okukola bingi, yali asuubizza okugenda ku mbaga ya mukwano gwe ow'oku lusegere. Newankubadde, obuzibu bw'ebyobufuzi obutasubirwa bwabalukawo ng'ebulayo essaawa ntono omukolo gutandike.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo ki jami mapol me atima, en okwonge me bedo tye I nyom pa lareme macok. Kadi bed kumeno, peko me cungu iwi bye ma pe byek tye I komgi ocakke cawa manok ma peya yub eni otime.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aswamisioke, esumunit ngesi ajaikin toma opeta loka apaperoke. Konye, abu ationis naka epolitikis kolom isawan idis eringa epucit ngol.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu azi be tre ti, so ndra oyo muzu eri ma agyi ma oku biza ma alia ra. Kani si, e'yo ewaru politiki ni 'bani ega kokoru efu de nga po'di sa'wa were 'dini de nga po'di omu 'da ecani ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine bingi by'okukora, akaraganisa kuza aha kugaitwa kwa munywani we. Kwonka, oburemeezi bw'eby'obutegyeki bukareetwaho eshaaha nkye omukoro gutakahikire.

eng_prompt: In a recent session, the government officials gathered to discuss pressing issues facing their constituents. They recognized the urgent need for innovative solutions to improve the lives of citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu lutuula olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakungu ba gavumenti baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu abantu baabwe ze boolekaganye nazo. Baakitegedde nti waliwo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ebintu ebipya okutumbula obulamu bwa bannansi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutic pa gamente gugure me lok I kom peko mapigi tego ma lubol kwir gi tye iye. Gu niang ni miti tye pi yub manyen me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nu ejaas itunga luka atutubenakec. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka aitolomunun iwaitin lu itojokarere aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma alia, azi'ba gameteni 'diyi tra yi tualu agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'ba angu yini opi nyazani 'diyi ni dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu kari anzi eyi ma edri otuzu ri ma orodri mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abakuru omu gavumenti baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa abantu baabo abu barikujwekyera. Bakareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunga oburyo bw'okutunguura amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's assurances of upholding democratic principles, many citizens feel disillusioned with the political landscape. Numerous reports indicate a growing trend of violations against fundamental rights and freedoms enshrined in the nation's founding document.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti ekakasa okunywerera ku nkola ya demokulasiya, bannansi bangi baggwaamu essuubi olw'embeera y'ebyobufuzi. Alipoota nnyingi ziraga okweyongera kw'okutyoboola eddembe n'eddembe ebikulu ebiri mu kiwandiiko ky'eggwanga ekyatandikibwawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente ocikke me gwoko cik ma doro tela pa lwak, pol pa dano cwinygi pe yom ki lok me cung iwibye matye katimme kombedi. Adwogi tic mapol nyutu ni kitye ka nywaro twero ki bedo agonya ma tye I waraga me cako lobo man.
teo_prompt: Karaida isinyikokinit apugan aigang ikisila luka aseo, mam itunga luipu epodokinitos nuka epolitikis. Ipu iripotan lu itodunitos ebe iyata abilibilio naka apedorosio keda ailajara naka itunga kotoma apapula naka atukot naka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro asi'baza fezu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi asi'baza be e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria. O'duko karakara eyi ece kini e'yo 'bani drilemgbo azini driwala kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ezazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhame bwa gavumenti ngu neeza kurinda obusingye, abatuuragye baingi bakahwamu amaani ahabw'embeera y'eby'obutegyeki eriho. Ripoota nyingi nizooreka okweyongyera kw'okutoroboza obugabe n'obugabe oburikworekwa omu kihandiiko ekirikutandikaho eihanga.

eng_prompt: Despite significant efforts to improve healthcare access and quality, many challenges remain in the country's medical infrastructure. Limited resources and inadequate funding have hindered the development of effective health services for the population.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'amaanyi okutumbula obujjanjabi n'omutindo, okusoomoozebwa kungi kukyaliwo mu by'obujjanjabi mu ggwanga. Ebikozesebwa ebitono n'obutaba na nsimbi zimala biremesezza enkulaakulana y'obujjanjabi obulungi eri abantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitye katimo jami mapol me ilo malo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom, peko mapol pud tye. Rwom me tic ki lim ma nok ogengo yub me miyo kony me yot kom maber bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar adoketait na amukian, eringa ejaas atiokisio nuipu kotoma akwapuwok. Ikidioko iboro keda ikapun lumam edolitos aitolomun amukian najokan nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo arojo ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, e'yo ewaru karakara eyi nga po'di e'yo arojo ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma alea ci. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe were azini robia ma ako oga e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani maingi g'okutunguura omutindo gw'eby'amagara, hariho oburemeezi bwingi omu by'amagara g'eihanga. Eby'obugaiga bikye hamwe n'obutaheebwa esente nibiremesa abantu kutunga obuheereza burungi omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing supply chain disruptions and budget cuts, many healthcare facilities are struggling to maintain adequate inventories. As a result, the hospitals lack drugs to treat people.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obugenda mu maaso mu kugaba n'okukendeeza ku mbalirira, amalwaliro mangi galwana okukuuma ebikozesebwa ebimala. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro tegalina ddagala kujjanjaba bantu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma tye ka time ikit me cato jami ki byek me lim, odi yadi mapol tye ka yele me bedo ki jami ma oromo. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi peke ki yadi me tic i kom dano.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibiror naka iboro keda aitidisiario naka ebajet, eutasi adekisia nuipu ainingosit aidar iboro luedolitos. Kanuka ngun, emamiatatar adekisia keda ikee lu imukete itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi awazu ri ma alea risi azini bajeti ma omgbo esizu risi, pari arojo ni karakara eyi dri ci afa arojo ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyivu aro eyi aro fezu 'ba eyini yo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho n'okukyendeeza aha mbaririra, amarwariro maingi nigarwana kurinda ebintu ebirikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro tigaine mibazi y'okuragurira abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's increasingly polarized society, it's essential to find common ground and foster collaboration. Unity can lead to more effective solutions for the challenges we face as a community.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino abeeyongedde okweyawulayawulamu, kya mugaso okufuna ensonga z'okukkiriziganyaako n'okutumbula enkolagana. Obumu busobola okuviirako okugonjoola obulungi okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo ng'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kare-ni ma opoke-opoke tutwal, pire tek tutwal me nongo yoo me winye ki dongo winye ikin dano. Ribe twero kelo yoo maber me tyeko peko ma wanongo macalo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naka lolo naepol atiakatiaka, ejokuna noi adumun acamanara ka aitopolor aiswamanara. Aimorikikina epedori ayangaun aitemokin atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni kwape itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea esele coza tupi tutu ri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi esuzu tualu azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu. Ti ecita eco fe 'bani e'yo ewaru amani esu ongulumu ru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba abarikweyongyera kwebaganisamu, n'eky'omugasho okusherura enshonga z'okwikirizamu n'okureetaho okukwatanisa. Okukwatanisa nikubaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza oburemeezi obu turikushanga nk'abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of adversity, it becomes crucial for communities to come together. Unity fosters strength and resilience, enabling us to overcome challenges more effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, kifuuka kikulu nnyo eri ebitundu okwegatta. Obumu butumbula amaanyi n'obuvumu, ne butuyamba okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi lwak me ribbe. Ribe weko wabedo ki kero ki tekcwiny ma weko waloyo peko.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, erai ibore yenepol noi itunga aimorikikin. Aimorikikina ijaikini oni agogongu, ingarakini oni aipikor atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri eca orodriru ongulumu eyini emuzu tualu. Ti ecita ni okpo fe, dika eri fe amani e'yo ewaru 'diyi agazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru abantu kukorera hamwe. Okukwatanisa nikureetaho amaani n'okugumisiriza, ekirikutuhwera kusingura oburemeezi kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly divided by political ideologies, it's essential to recognize that our personal relationships and values often transcend party lines. Embracing differing opinions can foster understanding and unity, even amidst disagreement.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okwawukana olw'endowooza z'ebyobufuzi, kya mugaso okutegeera nti enkolagana yaffe ey'obuntu n'empisa zitera okusukkuluma ku nnyiriri z'ebibiina. Okukkiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo kusobola okutumbula okutegeera n'obumu ne wakati mu butakkaanya.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka kelo apoka-poka mapol tutwal, pire tek tutwal me niang ni watwa ki jami ma pigi tego I kinwa ipol kare kato dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat. Jolo tam mapat pat twero weko winye ki ribe bedo tye kadi bed ni winye peke.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka noi kanu aomisio nuka politikis, ejokuna noi ajenun ebe ejai eidicanewok keda ajokis naepol noi adepar ipatei. Aingarakin aomisio nuegelegela epedori aitopolor acamanara keda aimorikikina, araida ejaas keda amamut acamanar.

eng_prompt: After months of construction and community planning, the long-awaited project finally came to fruition. Local officials gathered to celebrate the completion of the facility that promises to enhance educational opportunities for residents.

eng_prompt: Many refugees face significant obstacles in their new environments, including limited resources and access to land. However, some have found ways to adapt and contribute to local economies through farming.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu bifo byabwe ebipya, omuli ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'okufuna ettaka. Newankubadde, abamu bafunye engeri z'okukyusakyusa n'okuyambako mu by'enfuna by'ebitundu nga bayita mu kulima.
