eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced families, the government implemented various initiatives to support refugees. One of these initiatives focused on providing educational opportunities for young girls to help them gain valuable skills for their future.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera, gavumenti yakola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu. Emu ku nteekateeka zino zaali ku kuwa abawala abato emikisa gy'okusoma okubayamba okufuna obukugu obw'omuwendo mu biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lugangi ma orwenyo gangi gi, gamente oketo yub mapol me konyo luring ayela. Acel I kin yub magi obedo me miyo gum me kwan ki anyira matino wek gunong diro ma pigi tego pi anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loka ikalia lu ekerete, abu apugan itolomu iponesio luegelegela kanu aigang ikerai. Adiopet koboro kalu apodokinit aijaikin apesur asioman kanu aingarakin kes adumun acoa naejok kanu oingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, gamete 'ye e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu emunyale eyini. Otita azi alu 'diyi 'ba asi drileba fezu ezoanzi nyiri eyini onita fezu eyidri eyini ani ecozu ondua orodriru eyivile ewu drialeri ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'amaka agarikweyongyera, gavumenti ekataho emiringo mingi y'okuhwera empungi. Kimwe ahabintu ebi kikaba nikigyenderera okureeba ngu abaishiki abato batunga emyoga y'omugasho omubiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of displaced communities, the government has announced a new initiative aimed at supporting refugees. This program focuses on empowering individuals through education and resources to help them rebuild their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'abantu ababundabunda ebyeyongera, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu. Pulogulaamu eno essira eritadde ku kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu buyinza okuyita mu kusoma n'ebikozesebwa okubayamba okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa luring ayela, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me konyo luring ayela. Yub man keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo kero pa dano kun gitiyo ki pwony ki jami ma konyo gi me yubu kwo gi odoco.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ekerete aiboisio kec, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotosi aigang ikerai. Isingarenit ainapeta ngun aitigogong itunga kotoma asioman keda iboro lu ingarakinete kesi aisiteteun aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'dini lezu atita fezu emunyale eyidri. Otita 'di 'ba asi 'bazu okpo fezu 'ba yi dri geri onita nisi azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi si yi ma aza kozu yi ma edri sizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera empungi, ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu ababingirwe omu myanya yaabo. Puroguraamu egi neeta omutima aha kutunguura abantu kurabira omu bwegyese n'ebintu ebirikubaasa kubahwera kugaruka kwombeka amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and growing concerns among participants, the organizers held an emergency meeting to assess the situation. After careful consideration, they decided to prioritize safety and well-being.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera mu beetabamu, abategesi baatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okwekenneenya embeera. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, baasalawo okukulembeza obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lworo matye kamede ikin joo ma obedo tye, luyub obedo ki kacoke me atura me neno ngo matye katime. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me keto gwoko kuc ki ber bedo obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongongo naepol noi kanejaas itunga, apotu luitemonokinak kitolototo airiamunet naka atipet kanu airereor ejautene. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu kesi koseutu aisingarenit ayuwara keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini asi otiza tupi 'ba fi'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba otu'ba 'diyi 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo nde ma ale andrizu. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai e'yo ageitema ni azini aa'ta muke ri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira okweyongyeire omu bajwekyerwa, abatebekanisa bakakora orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kushwijuma embeera. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, bakasharamu kwebembeza eby'okwerinda n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In many communities, young girls often take on entrepreneurial roles to support their families. They learn traditional recipes and skills from their mothers and grandmothers, turning them into small businesses.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, abawala abato batera okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'obusuubuzi okulabirira amaka gaabwe. Bayiga enkola z'obuwangwa n'obukugu okuva ku bannyinaabwe ne bajjajjaabwe, ne bafuuka bizinensi entonotono.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, anyira matino ipol kare gi cako timo biacara me konyo gangi gi. Gipwonyo yoo me tedo tekwaro ki diro ki bot megigi ki megigi, ma oweko gudoko biacara matino-tino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, etapit apesur aitolot aswamisinei nuka agwelanar kanu aigang ikalia kec. Isisiaete kesi iwaitin lu inonosio keda acoasinei kama ejaasi luatotokec keda tatakec, ido ijaikitos kesi araun ibiasaran ludidik.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, ezoanzi nyiri eyi tutuni tujari 'ye eyini ani familia eyivile 'diyi atizu. Eyi geri a'di ni 'diyi oni azini ondua eyi oni engazu eyi ma ayia eyi vu tualu eyi ma dii eyi vu eyini ani eyi ojazu tujari were 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, abaishiki bato nibakira kutandika kukora emirimo y'okureeberera amaka gaabo. Nibeega emiringo y'obuhangwa hamwe n'emyoga kuruga ahari ba maama baabo na ba nyinenkuru baabo, eki nikibahindura abashuubuzi bakye.

eng_prompt: As part of their career development, the students sought opportunities to gain practical experience in the hospitality industry. They applied to various programs that would allow them to work in real-world hotel environments.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitundu ky'okukulaakulanya emirimu gyabwe, abayizi banoonya emikisa okufuna obumanyirivu mu mulimu gw'okusembeza abagenyi. Baasaba pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ezandibasobozesezza okukola mu bifo bya wooteeri ebya ddala.
ach_prompt: Macalo but dongo tic gi, lutino kwan guyenyo gum me nongo ngec i kom tic me gwoko wele. Gucwalo waraga me penyo pi yub mapat-pat ma obi weko gitiyo I kabedo me otel mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma aitopolorio naka aswamukec, apotu esisiak kongicata arerengesio nuka adumun amisiarit kotoma aswam naka aijaun itunga. Apotu kesi ilipata ainapeta nuepedorete aingarakin kes aswam kotoma aiboisio nuka iooterin.
lgg_prompt: Yi vile e'yo onitani 'diyi ma azi ru, sukulu anzi 'da eyi nda drileba eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu okalamvu omu eyini ri ma alea ra 'diyi esuzu. Eyi si waraga otita ndundu eyini ani ecozu eyini azi ngazu angu hoteli eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Nk'ekicweka ky'entunguuka yaabo omu mirimo yaabo, abeegi bakasherura emigisha y'okutunga obukugu omu mirimo y'okutangirira abagyenyi. Bakashaba puroguraamu nyingi ezaababaasiise kukorera omu hoteeri ez'amazima.

eng_prompt: In their community, many families struggle to make ends meet, and the girls have taken it upon themselves to help. They work hard to earn an income, ensuring that their younger siblings have the opportunity to pursue their education.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyabwe, amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo, era abawala beetisse okuyambako. Bakola nnyo okufuna ensimbi, okukakasa nti bato baabwe bafuna omukisa okugenda mu masomero gaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo gi, gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi dok anyira guyee me konyo lutino anyira gi. Gitiyo matek me nongo cente ma weko lutino gi nongo gum me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekec, eutasi ikalia luipu aijar, ido apotu apesur kiswamata ngun kanu aingarakin. Iswamaete kesi kagogongu kanu adumun ikapun, aanyun ebe idwe kec ludidika ejaas keda arereng naka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea, familia karakara eyi dri ci afa esuzu, dika ezoanzi eyi 'du e'yo eyi ma ngulupi si azakoma fezu. Eyi azi nga avasi robia esuzu eyini ani nezu ra kini eyi ma adripika oderu 'diyi ma drileba onita esuzu ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyabo, amaka maingi nigarwana kureberera ebyetaago byago, kandi abaishiki bejumbire kuhwera. Nibakora n'amaani kutunga esente, okureeba ngu bato baabo batunga omugisha gw'okwegyera.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a bustling market, she often watched her mother prepare delicious snacks for customers. It was there that she discovered her love for food and the joy of sharing it with others.
lug_prompt: Ng'akulira mu katale akalimu abantu abangi, yatera okulaba maama we ng'ateekerateekera bakasitoma eby'okulya ebiwooma. Awo we yazuulira okwagala kwe eri emmere n'essanyu ly'okugabana n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en odongo I cuk ma dano dwong iye, en maro neno mine ka yubo cam mamit pi luwil. Kunu aye kama en onongo iye marre pi cam ki yomcwiny me nywako ne ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Apolor ngesi kosokoni loepol itunga, etapit ngesi asesen totoke aitemonokin inyamat luibusakinit agwelak ainyam. Ngina ngesi abu kodum amina ke naka inyamat keda aiyalama naka aimor keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Erini zozu cu 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea, eri ndre i ma andri ni nyaka nyaza ndrizaru 'diyi a'di 'ba aje'ba eyini. Angu 'da ma alea eri esu i ma leta nyaka ma dria azini ayiko erini eri awazu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Akakurira omu katare akarimu abantu baingi, akaba akira kureeba nyina arikuteekyera abaguzi eby'okurya birungi. Okwo nikwo yaajumbwire rukundo ye aha by'okurya hamwe n'okushemererwa kw'okubigabana n'abandi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive economy, it is essential for young individuals to develop practical skills that will prepare them for future success. Encouraging entrepreneurial mindsets from an early age can help foster a sense of responsibility and initiative.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino eby'okuvuganya, kyetaagisa nnyo abavubuka okukulaakulanya obukugu obujja okubategeka okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Okukubiriza endowooza y'okutandikawo emirimu okuva mu myaka emito kiyamba okukulaakulanya obuvunaanyizibwa n'obuvumu.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me biacara me kare-ni, pire tek tutwal pi bulu me dongo diro ma obi yubu gi pi cobo miti gi i kare me anyim. Cuku cwiny lutino me cako timo biacara ma nongo pud gitino twero weko gi bedo ki miti me timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol abolobol, ejokuna noi atumunak adumun acoa naepedori aitemonokin kes kanu akerianut koingaren. Aisinyikokit itunga ageun edisiak agwelanar epedori aingarakin aitopoloun apedor ka aswam iboro luingaranakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu ewu andruri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba oderu 'diyini ondua azi ngazu 'diyi ezozu eyini ani eyi otuzu drile suza esuzu ewu drialeri ma alea. E'yo 'ba eyini ava fezu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi 'yezu e'dozu mva ru 'diyi ma alea ri eco fe eyini aa'zu 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, nikikuru munonga abantu bato kugira emyoga erikubaasa kubatebeekanisiza obusinguzi omu biro by'omumaisho. Okureetaho enteekateeka y'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi okuruga omu myaka emito nikibaasa kuhwera omu kureetaho obujunanizibwa n'enteekateeka.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and demand for education, local authorities have decided to enhance the community's infrastructure. As part of this initiative, primary schools are being introduced in the area.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ebyenjigiriza, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amasomero ga pulayimale gatandikibwawo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano kacel ki miti me kwan, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me jami ma konyo lwak. Macalo but yub man, kitye ka yabo gangi kwan me primary i kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka asioman, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aitojokar aiboisio nuka atutubet. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eutai aitegear isomeroi luka epuraimare katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma kalafe tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu onita ma alea ri pie, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo afa ndundu eyi edezu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba sukulu piraimari ni 'diyi e'do angu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire hamwe n'obwetago bw'eby'obwegyese, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bashaziremu kutunguura ebyombeko by'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, amashomero ga puraimare gariyo nigateebwaho omukyanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges faced by women during their menstrual cycles, a community initiative was launched to provide essential training. This program aimed to empower women by teaching them practical skills for personal hygiene management.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa abakyala kwe basanga mu nsonga z'ekikyala, enteekateeka y'ekitundu yatandikibwawo okuwa okutendekebwa okw'omugaso. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula abakyala nga babayigiriza obukodyo obw'omugaso obw'okukuuma obuyonjo bw'omubiri.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma mon nongo ikare me two dwee, kicako yub ikin lwak me miyo pwony mapigi tego. Yub man obedo ki miti me tyelo kor mon kun pwonyo gi ki diro me gwoko lengo me komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas angor kotoma aparasia nu elap, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuka itunga aijaikin aitutuoro. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitigogong angor kowai lo aisisianakin kes iwaitin lu aidar aila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru oku eyini esu sa'wa eyini imbazu risi 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do otuta ongulumu eyini 'diyi imbata orodriru 'diyi fezu. Otita 'di 'ba asi okpo fezu oku eyini geri eyini imbata fezu geri eyini ecozu eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abakazi barikutunga omubwire bw'okugyenda omubiro by'obushwere, abantu batandikireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abakazi. Puroguraamu egi ekaba egyendereire kutunguura abakazi obwo erikwegyesa emyoga y'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the need for skill development in the community, the member of parliament sought ways to provide valuable resources. After consulting with local organizations, she decided to take action by organizing a training program.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'okukulaakulanya obukugu mu kitundu, omubaka wa paalamenti yanoonya engeri y'okuwaayo ebintu eby'omugaso. Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku bitongole by'omu kitundu, yasalawo okubaako ky'akolawo ng'ateekateeka enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa.
ach_prompt: I nge niang miti me dongo diro me tic I kin lwak, lamemba me parliament oyenyo yoo me miyo jami ma pigi tego. Ingee lok ki dul mapat-pat me tedero, en omoko tamme me yubu yub me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loka aitopoloun acoa kotoma atutubet, abu emeeba loka airabet komoi iwaitin lu ijanakino iboro lu epol ajokis. Akaulo naka aingitun iriongeta luka atutubet, abu ngesi koseu aitemokin ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani lezu ondua ezozu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma e'yo egazu risi, memba koloseni ni 'da nda geri eyini ecozu afa orodriru 'diyi fezu 'diyi. Erini e'yo nzezu amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo 'yezu geri otita imbatani 'diyi otuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'okutunguura emyoga omu bantu, omukiiki omwishengyero akasherura oburyo bw'okugaba ebintu by'omugasho. Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bitongore by'omubyaro, akasharamu kukoraho obwo arikutebekanisa puroguraamu y'okutendeka.

eng_prompt: In many communities, access to basic hygiene products remains a significant challenge. As a result, young girls often face difficulties during their menstrual cycles.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna ebintu ebikozesebwa mu buyonjo kikyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, abawala abato batera okufuna obuzibu nga bali mu nsonga z'ekikyala.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, nongo jami ma mite pi gwoko lengo pud obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, anyira matino ipol kare ginongo peko ikare me two dwe gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, eringa adumun iboro lu aila erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etapit apesur adumunun atiokisio kapakio nu elap.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, afa alata ni 'diyi esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, ezoanzi nyiri eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu sa'wa eyini imba esuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okutunga ebintu by'okwesiimura kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abaishiki bato nibatunga oburemeezi omu nshonga zaabo z'ekiro.

eng_prompt: Empowering women in the workplace is essential for fostering diversity and innovation. One effective way to achieve this is by ensuring they have access to leadership training opportunities.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula abakyala ku mirimu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enjawulo n'obuyiiya. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukakasa nti bafuna emikisa gy'okutendekebwa mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Miyo kero ki mon ikabedo me tic pire tek tutwal pi kelo aloka-loka ki diro manyen. Yo acel maber me cobo man obedo neno ni gunongo gum me nongo pwony me tela.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong angor kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam ejok kanu aitopoloria aiboisio nuegelegela ka aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi awanyun ebe edumunenete kesi aitutuoro na engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza oku eyini pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu azini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri lezu nezu ra kini eyi esu imbata driceza niri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera abakazi amaani omu myanya y'emirimo, n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okujumbura. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okureeba ngu batunga okutendekwa kw'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Many women are seeking ways to support their families financially. One viable option that has gained popularity is turning their baking skills into a source of income.
lug_prompt: Abakyala bangi banoonya engeri y'okuyambamu amaka gaabwe mu by'ensimbi. Ekimu ku biyinza okukolebwa ekimanyiddwa ennyo kwe kufuula obukodyo bwabwe obw'okufumba emigaati ensibuko y'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Mon mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me konyo gangi gi ki cente. Yo acel maber ma oywek tutwal en aye me loko diro gi me tedo mugati odok yoo me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Emoete angor nuipu iwaitin lu igangakinete ikalia kec. Epone ediope loepedoriata itunga aijulakin aijen kec naka aipo emugati araun epone loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Oku karakara eyi geri nda atita fezu familia eyivile 'diyini geri robia nirisi. E'yo azi 'bani eco 'ye ra 'bani esu 'ba karakara eyi ma eselea ri eri geri eyini ecozu mukati a'dizu 'diyi ojazu geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi baingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okureeberera amaka gaabo omu by'esente. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukorwa ogurikumanywa munonga n'okuhindura emyoga yaabo y'okuteeka emigaati nk'oburugo bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In many developing countries, access to affordable menstrual hygiene products remains a significant challenge for women and girls. To address this issue, an international organization is implementing innovative solutions to empower local communities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi ezikyakula, okufuna ebintu by'obuyonjo mu nsonga z'ekikyala ku bbeeyi entono kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi eri abakyala n'abawala. Okukola ku nsonga eno, ekitongole ky'ensi yonna kikozesa enkola ez'obuyiiya okutumbula ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol ma gudongo, nongo jami ma weko mon bedo leng ikare me two dwee pud obedo peko madit tutwal bot mon ki anyira. Me tyeko peko man, dul ma aa ki woko tye katic ki diro manyen me tyelo kor lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuepolok, adumun iboro lu eyuara lu elap eringa erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas angor keda apesur. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ejai erionget loka akwapin ace aitolomun iwaitin lu iteteunet kanu aitigogong itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kari zopi zopi zopi 'diyi ma alia, afa alatani e'yo ezoanzi eyini eyi ma eselea 'diyi esuzu aje kokoru ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru tu oku eyini azini ezoanzi eyini. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti azi wudrikurusi ndulu ni geri o'diru 'diyi 'ba o'bi angu ma alia 'diyi dri okpo fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi agarikutunguuka, okutunga ebintu by'okweboneza omubwire bw'ekiro kikiri ekizibu aha bakazi n'abaishiki. Okukora aha nshonga egi, ekitongore ky'amahanga goona kiriyo nikikora emiringo y'okutunguura abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, discussions around equality and rights have gained significant momentum. One important aspect of these conversations is the concept of gender justice.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bwenkanya n'eddembe kweyongedde nnyo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu mboozi zino ye ndowooza y'obwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, nywako lok I kom bedo marom ki twero pa dano omede tutwal. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I kare me nywako lok man obedo lok me neno ni mon ki coo gitye marom.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol noi ineresinei nuikamunitos eirianu keda apedorosio nuka itunga. Adiopebore naepol noi kotoma oineresinei lu ngesi aomisioit naka asipokina naka ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alia, e'yo nzeza e'yo trotroru azini driwala ma dria 'diyi isu okpo angiri. E'yo azi orodriru e'yo nzeza 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo 'bani 'ba agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie 'diyi ma esele cozu trotro ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okuhanuura aha buringaaniza n'obugabe bw'abantu kweyongyeire. Ekintu kimwe ky'omugasho omu kugaaniira oku, n'ekiteekateeko ky'oburinganiza omu maka.

eng_prompt: Empowering women through education and skill development creates a ripple effect in communities. As these women gain knowledge and expertise, they become mentors and leaders, sharing their insights with others.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula abakyala okuyita mu kusoma n'okukulaakulanya obukugu kireetawo enkyukakyuka mu bitundu. Abakazi bano bwe bafuna amagezi n'obukugu, bafuuka ababuulirizi n'abakulembeze, nga bagabana amagezi gaabwe n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Miyo kero ki mon kun gitiyo ki pwony ki diro kelo alokaloka I kabedo gi. Ka mon magi tye ka nongo ngec ki diro, gi doko lupwonye ki lutela, gi nywako tam gi ki joo mukene.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong angor kowai lo asioman ka aitopoloun acoa eyangauni aitojokaar kotoma atutubena. Kwape edumununete angor nu acoa keda acoa, eraunete kesi lu isisianakinete ka engarenok, aimor aomisiokec keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza oku eyini geri onita ni azini ondua eyi ma ezota nirisi ri ni e'yo eyi 'ye ongulumu eyi ma alea saaru. Oku 'diyi ni onita azini ondua esuria, eyi eca 'ba imbata fepi azini drice'ba eyi ru eyini eyi ma egata eyi awazu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura abakazi kurabira omu kwega n'okutunguura emyoga, nikireetaho entunguuka omu bantu. Abakazi aba ku barikutunga obwengye n'obukugu, nibahinduka abahabuzi n'abebembezi, barikugabana ebiteekateeko byabo n'abandi.

eng_prompt: Crafting unique accessories has become a popular trend among DIY enthusiasts. One creative option that stands out is the use of beads in fashion design.
lug_prompt: Okukola ebintu eby'enjawulo kifuuse kya bulijjo mu baagalana ba diy. Engeri emu ey'obuyiiya ey'enjawulo kwe kukozesa obusa mu kukola emisono gy'engoye.
ach_prompt: Yubu jami mapat-pat mapat-pat dong odoko gin ma oywek tutwal I kin joo ma maro timo jami gi kengi. Yo acel maber loyo weng en aye me yubu bongi ma kilwongo ni beads.
teo_prompt: Aswam iboro luitegelikina erai ibore yenetapit noi kanejaas itunga luiswamaete ngun. Adiopet aseunet naejok noi ngesi aitwasam iboro luidosoikini akonye kotoma aitemonokin igoen luibusiak.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayule wura ndusi 'diyi ma edeza eca curu'do e'yo azi 'ba afa edele drisi 'diyi le'baa 'diyi ma eselea ni'I. Geri azi 'bani ecozu e'dazu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri eri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ayuzu bongo eyi edezu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okukora ebintu by'omutaano, kihindukire omuringo ogurikumanywa munonga omu bantu abarikukunda kukora ebintu. Omuringo gumwe ogw'obuhangwa ogurikwetegyerezibwa, n'okukoresa amahembe omu kukora emisono.

eng_prompt: As the training session came to a close, the leader reflected on the valuable contributions made by the participants. With a warm smile, she addressed the group, acknowledging their dedication and enthusiasm throughout the program.
lug_prompt: Ng'okutendekebwa kugenda ku nkomerero, omukulembeze yafumiitiriza ku bintu eby'omuwendo ebyakolebwa abeetabye mu kutendekebwa. N'akamwenyumwenyu ak'omunda, yayogeddeko eri ekibinja, ng'asiima okwewaayo kwabwe n'obunyiikivu mu pulogulaamu yonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma pwonye ne cok tum, latela ne otamo I kom jami mabeco ma joo ma obedo tye I pwonye ne gutimo. Ki bwunyo me yom cwiny, en oloko ki lwak kun pwoyo ticgi ki mit komgi I kare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana angetakinor aituutoorio, abu engarenon koomoom nuikamunitos agangat naepol noi najaikina ngul luapotu kojaikinos. Keda aimurimuria, abu ngesi iner nejaas egurupu, aisiyalamikit ainakina kec keda aiyalamakec kotoma ainapeta ngun kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo embatani 'da ni i deria, drice'ba 'da ega e'yo orodriru 'ba amuti nde ma alea 'diyini fe 'diyi ma dria. Eri nze e'yo ongulumu 'da eyi ma tia cinya si erini eyi ma ava fezu azini ava fezu otita 'da ma alea risi dria.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'okutendeka ku gwahikire aha muheru, omwebembezi akateekateeka aha bintu by'omugasho ebyakozirwe abeejumbiremu. N'akamwenyo k'amaani, akagambira guruupu, arikusiima okwehayo kwabo n'omujinya gwabo omu puroguraamu yoona.

eng_prompt: Our construction project is progressing well, but we are running low on supplies. To keep everything on schedule, we need money to secure more building materials.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti yaffe ey'okuzimba egenda mu maaso bulungi naye ebikozesebwa bigenda bikendeera. Okukuuma buli kimu mu budde, twetaaga ssente okufuna ebizimbisibwa ebirala.
ach_prompt: Yub wa me gedo tye ka wot anyim maber, ento jami tic tye ka rweny. Me gwoko jami weng I kare ma kiketo, omyero wabed ki cente me nongo jami gedo mukene.
teo_prompt: Euta epurojekt wok loka aiduk aswam ejok, konye eutai aikisar iboro. Kanu aidar iboro kere kotoma apak, ikoto oni ikapun kanu adumun iboro luipu lu edukere.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile otita afa sizu ri ni mu drile kililiru, te afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni i deria. Afa dria ma ta mbazu sawa dria si, le ama ma esu robia afa jo sizu 'diyi esuzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti yaitu y'okwombeka eriyo neegyenda omu maisho kurungi, kwonka ebintu by'okukoresa biriyo nibihwaho. Okukora buri kimwe omu bwire, nitwetenga esente z'okutunga eby'okwombekyesa ebindi.

eng_prompt: Engaging in hands-on activities can foster creativity and build essential skills. One such activity that has proven beneficial is crafting, which offers numerous advantages for personal development.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'emikono kisobola okutumbula obuyiiya n'okuzimba obukugu obwetaagisa. Omulimu ogumu ogukakasiddwa okuba ogw'omuganyulo kwe kukola ebintu eby'emikono, ekiwa emiganyulo mingi mu nkulaakulana y'omuntu.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye I tic ma dano timo twero weko dano bedo ki ngec manyen ki diro me tic mapat-pat ma pigi tego. Tic acel ma okelo adwogi maber tutwal obedo tic cing, ma kelo adwogi mabeco mapol tutwal I dongo kwo pa ngat moni.
teo_prompt: Aswam aswamisinei nu itunga epedori aitopolor acoa ka aitolomun acoasinei nu epol ajokis. Adiopet aswamisio kwape kangin na itodunit ebe ejokuna ngesi aswam naka akan, na ijaikini itunga ajokis naepol noi kanu apolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru dika eyi ma onita ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo azi alu 'dile orodriru e'dapi ra ri afa edeza edele drisi 'diyi, orodri fepi 'ba eyini zozu 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu mirimo y'emikono nikibaasa kureetaho okujumbura n'okwombeka emyoga y'omugasho. Omurimo gumwe ogurikworeka ngu n'ogw'omugasho n'okukora eby'emikono, ogurikwongyera aha ntunguuka y'omuntu.

eng_prompt: As I explored various ways to enhance my financial stability, I decided to take on a project that focused on developing practical skills. This initiative not only sparked my interest in fashion but also opened up new opportunities for me.
lug_prompt: Nga nnoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula embeera yange ey'ebyensimbi, nasalawo okutwala pulojekiti eyali essira eritadde ku kukulaakulanya obukugu obw'omugaso. Enteekateeka eno teyakoma ku kundeetera kwagala misono naye era yanzigulirawo emikisa emipya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo rwom me lim ma abedo kwede, amoko tamma me timo tic ma keto cwiny I kom dongo diro me tic cing. Yub man pe okelo miti na I kom ruk keken ento bene oyabo gum mapol bota.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic iwaitin luegelegela kanu aitojokar eong ikapun, abu eong aseun aswam epurojekt loepodokinit aitopol aitutuoro. Mam aswamisioit ngin abu koinak eong eipud loka aitwasam igoen luibusiak, konye abu koinak eong arerengesio nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mani geri ndundu e'yo mani ecozu ma vile e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma ale andriria, asi e'yo 'du otita azi 'yezu asi 'bazu ondua azi ngazu 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. E'yo 'di feni lu ma dri ava e'yo suta ni 'diyi ma dria ku te eri fe ma dri dri drileba o'diru 'diyi ma ti.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire ninsherura oburyo bwingi bw'okwongyera aha ntatsya yangye, nkacwamu kukora purogyekiti erikukwata aha kutunguura emyoga y'emikono. Ekigyendererwa eki tikirareesire rukundo yangye omu by'emisono kyonka, beitu kikaniguraho emigisha misya.

eng_prompt: Investing in women's empowerment is crucial for fostering equality and driving societal progress. Therefore, it is essential to allocate resources specifically aimed at supporting their initiatives and needs.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu kutumbula abakyala kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula omwenkanonkano n'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okugaba ebyetaago nga bigendereddwamu okuwagira enteekateeka zaabwe n'ebyetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub me ilo malo rwom pa mon pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me ber bedo ki dongo lobo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me poko jami ma mite pi konyo yub ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma aitigogongio naka angor erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite eirianu ka aitopolor apol naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aijaikin iboro lu ekotoi aigangite aswamisinei kec keda ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu okpo feza oku eyini ri ma alea ri eri orodriru trotro ri ma omgbo otuzu azini ongulumu eyi ma zota ma omgbo otuzu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi atizu azini afa eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu kutunguura abakazi n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura oburinganiza n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza abantu ebintu ebirikugyenderera okubashagika n'ebibarikwetenga.

eng_prompt: As the excitement for the new season built up, fans eagerly anticipated the kickoff of the national football league. However, unforeseen circumstances loomed on the horizon, threatening to disrupt the festivities.
lug_prompt: Ng'essanyu eri sizoni empya lyeyongera, abawagizi baali beesunga okutandika kwa liigi y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere. Newankubadde, embeera ezitasuubirwa zaabaddewo, nga zitya okutaataaganya ebikujjuko.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yom-cwiny omedde pi kare me pyem tuku manyen, lucwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me neno acaki pa pyem tuku odilo me lobo. Kadi bed kumeno, jami ma pe byek tye I komgi obedo tye, ma obedo ki byek me balo kwer ne.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalama naka abolia naka emopira, apotu egangitok ogogongoto ageunet naka abolia naka emopira loka akwap. Konye, apotu iboro lumam ewanyunitai opotu kitukurianete aitolitol ainumunum.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko sa'wa avita ni o'diru ri ni ecaria, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi te avita mupira tuza ni kari 'di ma alea ri e'dozu avasi. Kani si, e'yo azi 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi e'da yi ma dria, e'yo azi ecopi omu 'da ezapi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa ahabw'omuzaano gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere omutsya kukyeyongyera, abahagizi bakategyereza kutandika kw'empaka z'omupiira gw'ebigyere ez'eihanga. Kwonka, ebintu ebitarikuteekateekwaho bikabaho, ebyabaire nibitinisa kutabangura emikoro.

eng_prompt: After a thorough search and evaluation of several candidates, the Uganda football federation has made a significant decision regarding the future of the national team. In a bid to improve performance and achieve better results, they have finalized the appointment of a new coach.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwekenneenya abeesimbyewo abawerako, ekibiina ekifuga omupiira gw'ebigere mu Uganda kikoze okusalawo okw'omugaso ku bikwata ku biseera bya ttiimu y'eggwanga eby'omu maaso. Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo n'okutuuka ku bivuddemu ebirungi, bamalirizza okulonda omutendesi omupya.
ach_prompt: I ngee yenyo ki ngiyo kit ma lutuku mapol tye kwede, dul me Uganda football federation omoko tam ma pire tek tutwal I kom anyim pa tim me lobo. I miti gi me medo rwom me tuko ki nongo adwogi maber, gutyeko cimo lapwony tuku manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ka airereonor abwaak luipu, abu erionget loka abolia naka emopira koUganda kiswamau aseunet naepol noi naikamunit ngaren naka etimu loka akwap. Kanu aitojokar eswamae ka aitodolikin eswamae loajokan, adaun kesi aseun etuutooron loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza azini 'ba karakara lepi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti mupira tuza ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri 'du e'yo azi okporu ni ewu drialeri ni amuti kari niri ma dria. E'yo lezu 'yeta ma omgbo otuzu azini agata muke 'diyi esuzu, eyi asi 'bo 'ba imbapi mupira ni o'diru ni opezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusherura n'okushwijuma abeesimbireho abaingi, ekibiina ky'omupiira gw'ebigyere ekya Uganda kikozire encwamu y'amaani aha bikwatiraine n'ebiro bya tiimu y'eihanga eby'omumaisho. Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura emikorere n'okutunga ebyarugiremu birungi, baherize kutoorana omutendeki omusya.

eng_prompt: The coaching staff conducted a thorough review of player conduct and performance over the past season. As a result, certain individuals faced consequences for their behavior off the field.
lug_prompt: Abatendesi baakola okwekenneenya okw'amaanyi ku nneeyisa y'abazannyi n'enkola yaabwe mu sizoni ewedde. N'ekyavaamu, abantu abamu baafuna ebizibu olw'enneeyisa yaabwe mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye gutimo kwed matut I kom kit lutuku ki kit ma gutimo kwede I kare me tuku ma okato. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mukene gunongo adwogi marac pi timgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka ekooc owanyutu iponesio luka aboliak keda eswamae loka aboliak apakio nu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, apotu icetunga odumutu atiokisio kanu iponesiokec kokinga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba emba'ba ni 'diyi andri adriza 'ba avitani 'diyiniri azini agata yini ayi ti agapi 'bori ma ale andri kililiru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi esu e'yo yi 'yepi pari avitaniri ma aliarisi amveleru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatendeki bakashwijuma emicwe y'abazaani n'emikorere yaabo omu siizoni ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abamwe bakabonabona ahabw'emitwarize yaabo omu kishayi.

eng_prompt: After a string of disappointing losses, tensions have risen among the fanbase. Many had high hopes for the season, but those expectations have quickly turned into frustration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufiirwa emirundi egiwerako, obunkenke bweyongedde mu bawagizi. Bangi baabadde n'essuubi ddene mu sizoni eno, naye ebisuubirwa ebyo byakyuka mangu ne bifuuka okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: Ingee loyo tuku mapol, telle omede ikin lucwak tuku. Dano mapol gubedo ki gen madit tutwal I kare me tuku eni, ento gen meno olokke odoko cwer cwiny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aibiror naepol noi, apolor aiyalongong kanejaas amaak. Ejaasi itunga luipu keda amuno naepol noi kanuka abolobol naka ekaru kalo, konye apotu aomisio ngun kijulakinos atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'dezu 'bori ma vutia, asi otiza tu 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ma asi'baza ayi ti 'di ma alea ri ndra angiri, te asi'baza 'dayi oja eyi asi'baza ru mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusingwa emirundi mingi, obunkenke bweyongyeire omu bahagizi. Baingi bakaba baine amatsiko maingi omu siizoni egi, kwonka amatsiko ago gakahinduka amabi.

eng_prompt: Uganda has a rich history of producing talented footballers who have gained recognition both locally and internationally. Many of these players have seized opportunities to showcase their skills on larger stages.
lug_prompt: Uganda erina ebyafaayo bingi mu kufulumya abazannyi b'omupiira abalina ebitone abamanyiddwa mu ggwanga n'ensi yonna. Bangi ku bazannyi bano bakozesezza emikisa okulaga obukugu bwabwe ku siteegi ennene.
ach_prompt: Uganda tye ki tekwaro me nyayo lutuku ma ludiro ma gunongo yweka I lobo kany ki I lobo mawoko. Pol pa lutuku magi gutiyo ki kare man me nyuto diro gi I rwom ma lamal.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda akiro nukolo nuka aitolomun aboliak luka emopira luejenara noi kotoma akwapin nukokinga keda akwapin nukokinga. Ekamutu aboliak luipu arerengesio kanu aitodiar acoasineikec kotoma oisawe loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma adi lonyi be 'ba avita mupira tuza avipi talanta be 'diyi ofuzu eyini ani e'dazu kari 'di ma alea tualu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie. Anzi mupira avipi 'diyi ma karakara eyi 'du drileba eyini eyi ma ondua e'dazu pari amboru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eine ebyafaayo bingi by'okureeta abazaani b'omupiira abaine etaraanta abatungire okumanywa omwihanga hamwe n'aheeru y'eihanga. Abazaani abaingi bakwasire omugisha gw'okworeka emyoga yaabo aha siteegi empango.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance the quality of the national league and attract international events, the federation must prioritize infrastructure development. This includes ensuring that facilities meet the necessary criteria for global competitions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula omutindo gwa liigi y'eggwanga n'okusikiriza emizannyo egy'ensi yonna, federo erina okukulembeza enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe. Kino kizingiramu okukakasa nti ebifo bituukana n'emitendera egyetaagisa okuvuganya mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me pyem tuku odilo me lobo kacel ki kelo pyem tuku mapat-pat manonge I lobo mawoko, dul me federation omyero oket yub me gedo odok gin ma pire tek. Man kwako neno ni jami mapat-pat ma mite me pyem I pyem mapat-pat manonge I wilobo lung ocobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aikeun adoketait naka aboliasio nuka akwap keda ayangaun aboliasio nuka akwapin nukokinga, ekot atukot ngin aisingarenit aitopol iboro. Imoriaritos nu awanyun ebe itodolikinete aiboisio nuka abolobol kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Amuti mupira avizu kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu dika lezu avita kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ejizu, le amuti mupira avipi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma 'ba okpo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. Di ma azi lezu nezu ra kini angu 'da eyi e'yo 'bani lele abala kari eyi ma eselea 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutunguura omutindo gwa riigi y'eihanga n'okureetaho emikoro y'amahanga goona, ekibiina kishemereire kwebembeza ebyombeko. Eki nikitwariramu okureeba ngu ebyombeko nibihikiiriza ebirikwetengwa omu mpaka z'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: The passion for football in Uganda has been steadily growing, capturing the hearts of many fans across the nation. In this vibrant landscape, the influence of sports journalists becomes crucial in shaping the narrative and excitement surrounding the game.
lug_prompt: Okwagala omupiira gw'ebigere mu Uganda kubadde kweyongera buli lukya, okuwangula emitima gy'abawagizi bangi okwetooloola eggwanga. Mu mbeera eno, obuyinza bwa bannamawulire b'ebyemizannyo bufuuka bukulu mu kukola ennyinyonnyola n'okusanyuka okwetoolodde omuzannyo.
ach_prompt: Mar pi tuku odilo I lobo Uganda tye ka dongo dok tye ka mako cwiny lucwak mapol I but lobo man mapat-pat. I kare man ma jami tye ka time maber tutwal, lucoo lok angeya me tuku gibedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yubu lok ki yomcwiny ma orumu tuku.
teo_prompt: Amina naka abolia naka emopira ko Uganda eyatakin noi, ido ingalaunit itauon luka amaak luipu kakwap. Kotoma ojautene lo loejok noi, epol ajokis naka arotak iyemuto luka aboliasio kanu aitolomun akiro nuikamunitos abolia.
lgg_prompt: Leta mupira tuza ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea ri e'bi zo drile, erini 'ba atita fepi karakara kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma asi 'duzu. Angu 'di ma alea, 'ba osisia osipi avita eyi ma dria 'diyi ma okpo eca okporu e'yo avita eyi ma dria 'diyi ma edeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Rukundo y'omupiira gw'ebigyere omu Uganda eyeyongyeire, ekatwara emitima y'abahagizi baingi okwetoroora eihanga. Omu bwire obu obw'omutaano, abanyamakuru b'eby'emizaano nibakora kihango omukutereeza emboozi hamwe n'okushemererwa okwetorwaire emizaano.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and preparation, our players were eager to showcase their skills on an international stage. The excitement in the air was palpable as we set our sights on the prestigious tournament.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okwetegekera, abazannyi baffe baali beesunga okulaga obukugu bwabwe ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna. Essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika nga bwe tutunuulira empaka ez'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki yubbe matek tutwal, lutuku wa gubedo ki miti me nyuto diro gi I pyem me wilobo. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma watye ka neno pyem tuku ma pire tek tutwal ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitutuonoro ka aitemonokin, ekotosi aboliak wok aitodiar acoasineikec kotoma akwapin nukokinga. Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma okwam nautar sio asesen abolobol naka angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini otuta ma vutia, ama vile 'ba avitani 'diyi avasi yi ma ondua e'dazu avita kari eselia 'diyi ma alia. Ayiko oli alia ri ndra e'dazaru amani ama ma mile 'bazu abala inzile inzi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okweteekateekyera munonga, abazaani baitu bakaba baine ekihika ky'okworeka emyoga yaabo aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona. Okushemererwa okwabaire kuri omu mwanya kukaba nikureebeka nk'okureeba empaka z'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the popularity of various sports has surged, but none have captured the hearts of fans quite like football. With millions of passionate supporters and a rich history, it has become a cultural phenomenon.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuganzi bw'emizannyo egy'enjawulo bweyongedde, naye tewali n'emu ewangudde emitima gy'abawagizi nga omupiira gw'ebigere. Olw'obukadde n'obukadde bw'abawagizi abanyiikivu n'ebyafaayo eby'obugagga, kifuuse kya buwangwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yweka pa tuku mapat-pat omede, ento pe tye tuku mo ma omako cwiny lucwak calo tuku odilo. Ki milyon pa lucwak ma cwinygi mit tutwal ki lok macon ma beco tutwal, man dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi aboliasio nuipu, konye emamei idiobore yenepedori aitelekaar itunga kwape emopira. Keda imilionin luka egangitok keda akiro nukolo, araun ibore yenitegelikina noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani avita ndundu eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo tu ra, te avita azi ngapi 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma asi 'dupi avita mupira tuza le 'dini yo. Ba atita fepi avasi 'diyi ma milioni eyi pie tualu e'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi pie, eca curu'do e'yo a'bini 'diyi ru.

eng_prompt: The sports community in Uganda is mourning a significant loss. Recently, the country has been reflecting on the contributions of its influential figures in football journalism.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'ebyemizannyo mu Uganda bakungubaga olw'okufiirwa okw'amaanyi. Gye buvuddeko, eggwanga libadde lifumiitiriza ku mirimu gy'abantu baayo ab'amaanyi mu by'amawulire g'omupiira gw'ebigere.
ach_prompt: Lugwe odilo me lobo Uganda gitye ka kumo pi can madit tutwal ma gurwenyo. Cocoki, lobo man obedo ka tam I kom tic pa dano ma oywek tutwal I lok kom lok angeya me tuku odilo.
teo_prompt: Itunga lu aboliasio ko Uganda eutasi aimony kanu atwaniar naepol noi. Apakio nu, euta akwap aomoom nuikamunitos aswam naka itunga luejenara noi kotoma airot iyemuto luka emopira.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu avita eyini kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi emvo avi e'yo azi okporu ni si. O'du 'diyi ma alea, kari 'di e'bi e'yo ega e'yo 'ba okporu 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'ba osisiani mupira tuza ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eby'emizaano omu Uganda biriyo nibikungubaga ahabw'okufeerwa kw'amaani. Obwahati, eihanga ritwire niriteekateeka aha bintu ebi abantu baayo ab'amaani bakozire omu by'amahurire g'omupiira gw'ebigyere.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the team entered the final match with high hopes. The atmosphere was electric as fans filled the stands, eagerly anticipating a victory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, ttiimu yayingira omuzannyo ogw'akamalirizo n'essuubi ddene. Embeera yabadde ya maanyi ng'abawagizi bajjuza emidaala nga beesunga obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, dul tuku odonyo I tuko me agiki ki gen madit tutwal. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gupongo bar tuku kun gitye ki miti madit me nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu etimu kolot toma abolia naka awasia keda amuno naepol noi. Arai ejautene lo epol noi naarai apotu egangitok kilelebunos aiboisio nuipu itunga lu eomitos ebe epedorete kesi aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, amuti mupira avipi 'da fi abala asizuri ma alea asi 'baza be angiri. Angu nderi ndra aci ru 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ni pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea tre asi driasi asi 'baza be e'yo ndezuri ma dria.

eng_prompt: As the season came to a close, fans eagerly anticipated the annual awards ceremony. Excitement filled the air as the federation of football prepared to recognize outstanding talent on the field.
lug_prompt: Sizoni bwe yali enaatera okuggwaako, abawagizi baali beesunga nnyo omukolo gw'okugaba awaadi ogutegekebwa buli mwaka. Essanyu lyajjula empewo ng'ekibiina ekifuga omupiira gw'ebigere kyetegekera okusiima ebitone eby'enjawulo mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kare me pyem odoko cok, lucwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me kuro yub me miyo mic ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dul ma doro lok kom tuku odilo oyubbe me miyo pwoc ki dano ma gitye ki diro me tuku.
teo_prompt: Neyapiata aboliasio angetakin, apotu egangitok kowanyutu epucit loka aijaario naka ainanakineta. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam naarai akapakina atukot naka abolia naka emopira aisiyalamikin itunga luejaasi keda atalanta.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni i deria, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi te avasi omu dria dria dria feza ni eli vusi ri ni. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea saaru amuti mupira tuza ni omvele federation of football ni otuta 'yeria feta Munguni fe 'ba mupira avipi 'diyi dri ri inzizu.

eng_prompt: As the season progresses, the dynamics of fan engagement become increasingly evident. Many long-established teams boast a loyal and passionate following that new entrants struggle to match.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni egenda mu maaso, enkola y'okwenyigiramu kw'abawagizi yeeyongera okweyoleka. Ttiimu nnyingi ezibaddewo okumala ebbanga eddene zeewaanira ku bagoberezi abanyiikivu ate abapya bazibuwalirwa okukwatagana.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me pyem tuku tye ka mede anyim, rwom me bedo tye pa lucwak odoko nen tutwal. Dul tuku mapol ma dong gutiyo pi kare malac gitye ki lucwakgi ma lugen dok gimaro gi tutwal ento joo manyen matye ka donyo I dul tuku gi nongo tek tutwal me rwate kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi apak na abolia, ejenuna noi epone loepedoriata amaak ajaut keda egangitok. Itimun luipu lu iswamaete apak naepol ejaasi keda egangitok lu emunokina ido luitetiak kes etiono airiamun.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni muzu drile, e'yo 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma esele cozu 'diyi eca e'dazaru drile. Amuti avita avipi sa'wa ezu 'bo 'diyi ma azi yi 'ba asi'baza be azini asi'baza be 'diyi pie te 'ba o'diru fi'ba 'diyi dri ci yi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: Achieving greatness in the world of sports requires more than just passion; it demands a unique combination of skills and dedication. Many aspiring athletes dream of making it big, but only a few understand the true commitment it takes.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku bukulu mu nsi y'ebyemizannyo kyetaagisa ekisingawo ku kwagala kwokka; kyetaagisa obukugu obw'enjawulo n'obumalirivu. Abazannyi b'emizannyo bangi baluubirira okufuuka abanene, naye batono abategeera obumalirivu obwa nnamaddala obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Nongo dit I lobo me tuku mito jami mapol makato mar keken; mito diro ki keto cwiny. Lungwec mapol matye ki miti tye ki lek me doko dano madongo, ento jo manok keken aye gingeyo keto cwiny me ada ma mite.
teo_prompt: Adumunun adoketait naepol noi kotoma akwap naka aboliasio ekoto iboro luipu adepar amina naepol noi; ekot itunga ajaut keda acoa naepol noi keda ainakina. Akerak luipu lu ekotosi akerit ekotosi araun luapolok, konye ikidioko lu ejenete ainakina na ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onyiru isuzu wudrikuru avitaniri ma aliari le aga ava lu ri ra, eri le ondua azini asi feza wura ndu ni. Ba karakara lepi ongu onzu'ba 'diyi orobi 'yezu ecazu 'ba angiri ru, te 'ba were yi ni e'yo asi 'bazu e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi va.

eng_prompt: After a challenging previous season, the team gathered for a meeting to discuss their goals and aspirations. With renewed determination, the coach addressed the players, outlining a bold vision for their future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusoomoozebwa mu sizoni ewedde, ttiimu yakungaanidde mu lukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biruubirirwa byabwe n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe. N'obumalirivu obuzzeemu, omutendesi yayogeddeko eri abazannyi, ng'alaga okwolesebwa okw'obuvumu eri ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem tuku matek tutwal I kare ma okato, dul tuku ne gugure pi kacokke me nywako lok I kom miti gi ki miti gi. Ki tek cwiny manyen, lapwony tuku oloko ki lutuku kun nyuto neno maber pi anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainapeta nuetioko, apotu etimu kimorikikinos airiamun kanu aitemitem alosikinetekec keda apeleikinata kec. Keda aomisioit naitetet, abu etuutooron kiner keda aboliak, itodunit aomisioit naka oingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti agapi 'bori ma vutia e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi mitingi 'yezu agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini lele 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Asi 'baza be o'diru si, imbapi avitaniri nze e'yo 'ba avitani 'diyi be, erini e'yo asi 'baza be ewu yini drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'oburemeezi omu siizoni ehwaire, tiimu ekakorana omu rukiiko kuhanuura aha bigyendererwa n'ebigyendererwa byayo. N'amaani mingi, omutendeki akagamba n'abazaani, arikubareetera enteekateeka nungi y'ebiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Despite our best efforts and rigorous training, the season has not started in our favor. We entered the tournament with high hopes, but the results have been disappointing.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga tukoze kyonna ekisoboka n'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi, sizoni tennatandika bulungi. Twayingira empaka n'essuubi ddene naye ebyavaamu tebituukiridde.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watye ka tute matek dok watye ka pwonye matek tutwal, kare me pyem pe ocake maber tutwal. Wadonyo I pyem tuku ne ki gen madit tutwal, ento adwogi ne pe obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat sio kagogong noi keda aituutoonor, mam abolobol ngin egeunit ejok. Apotu sio alomasi abolobol ngin keda amuno naepol noi, konye mam akiro nuelomunitos iswamauna ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ama ni tro ama ma okpo fezu tualu embata okporu be ra ti avita 'di e'doni amani muke ku. Ama fi abala 'da ma alea asi'baza be angiri, te e'yo agata ni 'diyi eza ama ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwaitu n'okutendekwa kwaitu, sizooni tekatandikire kurungi. Tukahika omu mpaka twine amatsiko maingi, kwonka ebirugiremu tibirikureebeka gye.

eng_prompt: Despite the strict company policies regarding vehicle usage, he often found ways to bend the rules. One day, he decided to take advantage of the privileges that came with his position.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kampuni erina amateeka amakakali agakwata ku nkozesa y'emmotoka, yateranga okufuna engeri z'okukyusakyusa mu mateeka. Olunaku lumu yasalawo okweyambisa enkizo ezajja n'ekifo kye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul ne oketo cik matek tutwal I kom kit me tic ki mutoka, en onongo yoo me turo cik. Nino mo acel, en omoko tamme me tic ki gum ma obedo kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai ainapeta nuka ekampuni nuikamunitos aitwasam amotokan, abu ngesi kodum iponesio luka aibil ikisila. Adiope paaran, abu ngesi koseu aitosom arerengusio nuka adoketaitike.

eng_prompt: After months of financial irregularities and suspicious transactions, authorities began investigating the company's accounts. As the evidence mounted against him, he realized he needed to escape the impending scrutiny.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutali bwenkanya mu by'ensimbi n'okutunda ebintu ebiteeberezebwa, ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza ku akawunta za kampuni. Obujulizi bweyongera ku ye, yakizuula nti yeetaaga okuwona okwekebejjebwa okujja.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tim maraco me lim ki cato jami ma byek tye I komgi, lutela gucako kwedo kor tic ki lim pa dul ne. I kare ma caden omedde I kome, en oniang ni myero en obwot ki I kare me kwed matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luejaasi keda abilibilio naka ikapun keda abilibilio naka ikapun, apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic akaunts nuka ekampuni. Neautar ajenanut aiyatakin mama ejai ngesi, abu ngesi koany ebe ibusakinit ngesi aisac aingic naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea onzi 'diyi tualu e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku 'diyi pie, drice'ba eyi e'do amuti 'da ma okporo eyi ma eti onda. E'yo ecepi kini eri eza e'yo ra, eri esu ra kini le i ma apa e'yo 'bani eri ma ale andrizu 'diyi vurisi ra.

eng_prompt: I have some concerns about my safety and the potential for emergencies. I'm trying to understand the circumstances under which law enforcement can legally access my property without a warrant.
lug_prompt: Nnina okweraliikirira ku bikwata ku bulamu bwange n'ebigwa bitalaze ebiyinza okubaawo. Ngezaako okutegeera embeera abakuumaddembe mwe bayinza okuyingira mu maka gange mu mateeka nga tebalina kiwandiiko kibawa lukusa.
ach_prompt: Atye ki lworo mo I kom gwokke mega ki peko ma twero poto atura. Atye katemo me niang ngo ma twero weko abili donyo I jami mega labongo waraga ma moko ni omyero gubed tye.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi eong keda aiyalongong nuikamunitos ayuwaraka keda atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun. Atamenenei eong amisiikin ejautene loepedoriata ipolisin alomar oreka komam ajaut keda awaranta.
lgg_prompt: Ma ovu asi otiza be e'yo ma ma ta mbaza ma dria azini e'yo ewaru ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria. Ma o'bi e'yo 'bani 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ecozu fizu ma vile lonyi azita palaa waraga azita palaa ri kokoru 'diyi vazu ri ma dria.

lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'obulunzi obuwangaazi n'okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere, gavumenti y'ebitundu yatandikawo enteekateeka ey'okuyamba abalimi n'abalunzi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ofiisi ye yali evunaanyizibwa ku kugaba ensigo z'ebinyeebwa eri ebibinja mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor pur ki gwoko cam, gamente me tedero ocako yub me konyo lupur. Macalo but yub man, opic mege obedo ki tic me poko kodi pa anyogi bot dul mapat-pat matye I kabedo enuni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor akoru na ejok ka aitojokar inyamat, abu apugan naka atutubet kitegea ainapeta nuka aigang akoriok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eyapiesi ke nes ikamunitos nu aikor ikinyom mama ejaasi igurupun luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ori ezozaniri ma omgbo otuzu azini nyaka ma omgbo otuzu, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi atizu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eri vile ofisi ri ma azi ndra ori legua ru 'diyi awazu ongulumu ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekataho enteekateeka y'okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ofiisi ye ekaba eine obujunanizibwa bw'okugabira guruupu eziri omu byaro embibo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial records, the committee raised concerns about the transparency of the transactions. In response, the group leaders claim to have made payments in the cashier's office.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, akakiiko kaalaga okweraliikirira ku bwerufu bw'emirimu. Mu kwanukula, abakulembeze b'ebibiina bagamba nti baasasula ssente mu woofiisi y'omuwanika.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim, dul enoni onyuto lworo I kom ada pa jami ma otimme. I gamo ne, lutela me gurup ne guwaco ni guculu cente I gang tic pa lagam lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun, apotu ekomiti itodutu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aica naka ikapun. Kanu abongokin, apotu engarenok luka egurupu kotemasi ebe etacitos kesi ikapun koyapiesi loka ekasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da 'da asi otiza e'yo 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu e'yo ada be ri ma dria. Omvitaniria, drice'ba amuti 'da ni 'diyi 'yo kini eyi ofe robia 'ba robia trapiri vile ofisi'a.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente,akakiiko kakoreka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'emirimo egyo. Omu kugarukamu, abebembezi b'ebibiina nibagira ngu bakashashurira omu ofiisi ya kashiya.

eng_prompt: As the busy afternoon rush continued, the cashier glanced around nervously before making a sudden decision. In a moment of desperation, they grabbed the cash from the register and slipped out the back door.
lug_prompt: Ng'emirimu gy'akawungeezi gigenda mu maaso, omuwanika yatunula butunuzi nga yeeraliikirivu nga tannaba kusalawo mu bwangu. Mu kaseera k'okuggwaamu essuubi, baakwata ssente enkalu okuva mu kasasiro ne beekweka ne bafuluma mu mulyango ogw'emabega.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano mapol gubedo ka ngwec I dyeceng, lagwok lim obedo ki lworo tutwal ma peya omoko tamme atura. I kare ma cwinygi otur, gukwanyo cente ki I buk me coyo lim ci gukato woko ki I dogola me ngec.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokina aswam naepol noi atibong, abu agwelanaran kogeu airereor eringa iswama aseunet naka atipet. Apotu kesi kotuboto ikapun kotoma aiboisit naka aiwadika ikapun kosodete alosit okek loka kau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ngazu etu alasi ri ni mu drile, 'ba robia trapi ri ndre angu kuru asi otiza si de nga po'di 'duni e'yo azi mbeleru ni ku. E'yo ewaru ma alia, yi 'du sende engazu buku siza ma aliarisi azini yi onzu amve jotile ngukua ri ma aliarisi amve.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'omwebazyo ku burikugyenda omu maisho, owabaire naashashura akatandika kureeba hare atarikumanya eky'okukora ahonaaho. Omu bwire bw'okwerarikirira, bakaihayo esente zaabo kuruga omu kabokisi reeru baaruga omu rwigi rw'enyima.

eng_prompt: After several months of delays, the beehive suppliers grew increasingly frustrated with the lack of communication from the beekeeping company. They decided to voice their concerns during the meeting with the management team.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egiwerako nga balwawo, abatunzi b'ebinuulo by'enjuki beeyongera okunyiiga olw'obutaba na mpuliziganya okuva mu kkampuni y'okulunda enjuki. Baasazeewo okwogera ebibaluma mu lukiiko n'abaddukanya emirimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwoyo tic pi dwe mapol, cwiny lucat kic pe obedo yom pi lok ma aa ki bot dul ma gwoko kic. Gumoko tam gi me tito peko gi ikare me kacokke ki ludito tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyap, apotu agwelanarak awo itakadikisi naarai amamete einer kama ejai ekampuni loka aipit awo. Apotu kesi itetemoto aiyalongongokec kotoma airiamunet keda eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: Mba karakara eyini sa'wa ezazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba anyu eyi ma tambapi 'diyi eca candi ru e'yo nzeza ni engazu amuti anyu ta mbapi 'da vu risi. Eyi ai e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa drifuza ni 'ba driceza ni 'diyi pie risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okukyerererwa, abarikuguza ebishengye by'enjoki bakahwamu amaani ahabw'eibura ry'empurizagana kuruga omu kitongore ky'enjoki. Bakasharamu kugamba ebibarikuteekateekaho omu rukiiko na tiimu y'abebembezi.

eng_prompt: After weeks of negotiations and building trust, he finally presented a compelling case for why cash payments would streamline their operations. The group leaders were hesitant at first, but his confidence and detailed plan began to sway their opinions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa okumala wiiki eziwera n'okuzimba obwesige, yasembayo okulaga ensonga lwaki okusasula ssente enkalu kyandireetedde emirimu gyabwe okutambula obulungi. Abakulembeze b'ekibinja baabadde babuusabuusa mu kusooka, naye obwesige bwe n'enteekateeka ye yatandika okukyusa endowooza zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me winye ki bedo ki gen, lacen en onyuto tyen lok maber tutwal I kom kit ma cul me cente obi weko tic gi bedo yot. Lutela me gurup ne gubedo ki lworo I acakkine, ento tek cwiny mege kacel ki yub mege matut ocako kelo alokaloka I tamgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ipegeta keda aitogogong amunokina, abu ngesi kitodu aomisioit naepedoriata kesi aitac ikapun. Apotu engarenok luka egurupu kongeroto, konye apotu aiyuunike keda ainapeta ke kogeutu aijulakin aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo otuzu azini asi'baza sizu 'bori ma vutia, eri fe asizu e'yo okporu e'yo 'bani robia ofezu ri ma dria e'yo eyini azi ngazu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Drice'ba amuti 'da ni 'diyi ndra asi otiza be okorisi, te asi'baza erini azini otita erini 'diyi e'do yi ma egata oja.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuteesa n'okwikiririzamu, akahendera yaayoreka enshonga y'amaani ahabw'enki okushashura esente z'okushashura kikabaire nikiija kukyendeeza emirimo yaabo. Abebembezi b'ebibiina bakaba nibatiina omu kubanza, kwonka obwesigye bwe hamwe n'enteekateeka ye etendekirwe, bikatandika kuhindura ebiteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the promises made by the agricultural organization, many communities found themselves in a dire situation. As the planting season approached, villagers grew increasingly anxious about the lack of resources.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko ebisuubizo ebyakolebwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi, ebitundu bingi byesanga mu mbeera embi. Ekiseera ky'okusimba bwe kyasembera, abantu b'oku kyalo beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'ebbula ly'ebintu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul ma loyo lok kom pur ocikke me timo jami mapol, kabedo mapol onongo gitye I peko matek tutwal. Ikare me pito kodi ka oo cok, lutedero gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom nok pa jami.
teo_prompt: Karaida isumunit erionget loka akoru aisumuneta, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ejautene loaronon. Neyapiete apak naka aira, apotu itunga lu ocaalo iyalongongosi kanu amamus na iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti agirikica niri ni owizu ra ti, ongulumu karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. Sa'wa ori sazaniri ni ecaria, 'ba calua 'diyi eca asi otiza be e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuraganisa okwakozirwe ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abantu baingi bakeeshangira bari omu mbeera mbi. Obwire bw'okubyara ku bwahikire, abantu b'omubyaro beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous inquiries and follow-ups, the payment for the recent bee supply orders remains unaccounted for. Suppliers are growing increasingly frustrated as they await the funds that were promised weeks ago.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okubuuliriza kungi n'okugoberera, okusasulwa kw'ebyamaguzi by'enjuki gyebuvuddeko n'okutuusa kati tekumanyiddwa. Abasuubuzi beeyongera okunyiiga nga bwe balindirira ensimbi ezaasuubizibwa wiiki eziyise.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kipenyo dok ki lubu kor tic mapol, cente ma kiculu pi jami ma kicwalo cokcok-ki pud pe ki nyutu. Lucat jami tye ka medde ki bedo ki cwer cwiny ikare ma gitye kakuru lim ma kicikke me minigi cabit ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aingiseta keda atupakineta, mam etacio ikapun lu itwasamatere awo. Eutasi agwelanarak aiyalongong noi kotoma aidar ikapun luesumunitai isabitin luatuboros.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza azini vuti obiza karakara 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba ofeni nga robia 'bani ofe anyu eyi ma tambazu o'diru 'diyi ma dria ku. Ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi ma asi ezaza ni tu uru eyini robia 'bani owizu eyi ma dria wiki agapi 'bo 'diyi te ria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okubuuzibwa n'okukuratirwa kwingi, okushashurwa kw'omuhendo gw'enjoki oguherize kubaho tikurikwetegyerezibwa. Abarikuguza ebintu, beeyongyeire kuhwa amaani, barinzire esente ezabaraganisiibwe esande enyimaho.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the financial records, the management decided it was time to transition responsibilities. They called a meeting to discuss the handover process and ensure a smooth transfer of duties.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo nti kye kiseera okukyusa obuvunaanyizibwa. Baayita olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukyusaamu obuyinza n'okulaba ng'okukyusa emirimu kugenda bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim maber tutwal, ludito tic gumoko ni kare dong oromo me loko tic pa lutic mukene. Gulwongo kacoke me nywako tam i kom lok me kobo tic ki neno ni tic owoto maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka ikapun, abu eyaitene koseu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin aswam. Apotu kesi onyarautu airiamunet kanu aitemitem epone loka aikopar aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bani azi 'diyi ojazu 'bo. Eyi omve mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani azi ojazu ri ma dria eyini ani azi ojazu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebihandiiko by'esente, abarikukurira ekitongore bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okuhindura obujunanizibwa. Baketa orukiiko kuhanuura aha nshonga y'okuhindura emirimo n'okureeba ngu habaho okuhindura kurungi emirimo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of preparation and countless late nights, the team gathered in the conference room, anxiously awaiting the final details. It was finally time for the project lead to share the results of their hard work.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okwetegeka okumala wiiki eziwera n'ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, ttiimu yakungaana mu kisenge ky'olukiiko, nga balindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebisingawo ebisembayo. Ekiseera kyatuuka abakulembeze ba pulojekiti okugabana ebivudde mu kufuba kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yubbe ki dyewor mapol tutwal, dul pa lutic gucokke I ot me kacoke, ki miti matek me kuro lok matut me agiki. Kare dong oromo pi lutela me project me nywako adwoki me tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin keda kware naepol noi, apotu etimu kimorikikinos toma agola naka airiamun, aidar akiro nuka awasia. Arai kwana apak naka engarenok luka epurojekt aimor akiro nuka aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu azini ini karakara eyi ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi pari okuza ni 'diyi ma alea, eyini te e'yo asizu 'diyi tezu asi driasi. Sa'wa ca asizu drice'ba otita 'da ni 'diyini agata azi okporu eyini nga 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okweteekateekyera hamwe n'ekiro kyingi, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe omu kishengye ky'orukiiko, barinzire ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Kikaba kyahikire obwire bw'abebembezi ba purogyekiti okubagana ebirugire omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies are committed to maintaining justice and protecting vulnerable individuals. They actively pursue those who take advantage of others for personal gain.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byewaddeyo okukuuma obwenkanya n'okukuuma abantu abateesobola. Balondoola abo abeeyambisa abalala okwefunira ebyabwe ku bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik tye ki miti me gwoko dano ma goro. Gilubo kor jo ma tiyo ki gum pa luwotgi me nongo magoba gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu ikisila ekapakina aidar etube loajokan ka ayuarite itunga lu ican. Etapit kesi aimo ngul lu itwasamaete luce kanu aimedaun bon.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi owi eyi e'yo liza kililiru ri ma tambazu azini 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu. Eyi 'ba e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria eyini ani orodri esuzu eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro byehaireyo kureeberera oburingaaniza n'okurinda abantu abatarikwebaasa. Nibakuratiira abo abarikukoresa abandi, kugira ngu babaase kwegasira.

eng_prompt: After discovering discrepancies in the financial reports, the management decided to take action. They gathered evidence and concluded that further investigation was necessary.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuzuula obutakwatagana mu lipoota z'ebyensimbi, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baakungaanya obujulizi era ne bamaliriza nti okunoonyereza okulala kwali kwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo lok mapat-pat I adwoki me kwed me lim, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu jogo caden dok gumoko ni kwed mukene mite.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ajenun ationis kotoma oripoti luka ikapun, apotu eyaitene kiswamaunos. Apotu kesi otukutu ajenanut kosodete aitodun ebe ibusakinit aingic akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko siza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma esele cozu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi tra afa e'dapi kini e'yo eti ondaza drile ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba obutaikirizana omu ripoota z'esente, abarikukurira ekitongore bakacwamu kukoraho. Bakarundaana obujurizi kandi bahendera ngu okucondooza okundi kukaba nikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: After hours of scouring the dense forest for any signs of the missing hiker, they began to lose hope. Despite following every lead and checking every possible location, they found nothing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'essaawa eziwera nga banoonya akabonero k'omutambuze eyabula, baatandika okuggwaamu essuubi. Wadde nga baagoberera buli kimu era ne bakebera mu buli kifo ekisoboka, tewali kye baazuula.
ach_prompt: Inge cawa mapol me yenyo lanyut mo keken I bunga ne, gucako rwenyo gen. Kadi bed ni gu lubu kor jami weng dok gukwedo kabedo weng ma twere, pe gunongo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isawan luipu luka aingic amagoron kanu aanyunet naka etunganan loabu kowolio, apotu kesi kogeutu atwaniar amuno. Karaida etupitos kesi akiro kere kosodete aanyanar aiboisio kere, mam apotu kodumutu idiobore.
lgg_prompt: Sawa karakara eyi ma vutia jere 'da ma alea 'bani 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ndazu, eyi e'do asi'baza avi ra. Yi tro e'yo dria ma vuti obizu azini pari dria ecopi ra 'diyi ma ale andrizu ra ti, eyi awini e'yo azi esu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'eshaaha z'okurambura omu kibira kuronda akamanyiso k'omutembeyi owabuzire, bakatandika kubura amatsiko. Oihireho okukuratira buri kimwe n'okukyebera buri mwanya ogurikubaasika, tihaine eki bashangire.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, the authorities gathered enough evidence to bring serious charges against him. The financial discrepancies in his department raised suspicions that could not be ignored.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okumuvunaana emisango egy'amaanyi. Enjawukana mu by'ensimbi mu kitongole kye zaaleetawo okwekengera okutali kwa kubuusa maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela guyubu caden ma oromo me kelo adot i kome. Apoka-poka me lim I tenge ne okelo byek ma pe ki twero cayo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol, apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aitepesen ngesi. Atiakatiaka naka ikapun kotoma odipatimentike abu koyangau abuonokin na mam apedorio apalunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra afa ecetaru 'diyi e'yo onzi 'yezu eri ma dria. E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria enyati erini ma alia 'diyi eji e'yo 'bani ecozu adizu ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakarundaana obujurizi oburikumara kumujunaana. Obutaikirizana omu by'empiiha omu kitongore kye, kikareetaho okubanganisa okutarikubaasa kwehuzya.

eng_prompt: Following numerous reports from concerned citizens, authorities decided to take action. As a result, the police have opened a general enquiry file to investigate the allegations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'amawulire mangi okuva mu bannansi abakwatibwako, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. N'ekyavaamu, poliisi egguddewo fayiro okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok mapol ma aa ki bot lwak, lutela gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, abili oyabo fail me kwedo adot ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na iripootan luipu kanejaas itunga lu epodokitos, apotu apedorosio koseutu aswam. Kanuka ngun, apuko ipolisin aiwadikaeta nuka aingic akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara enga'ba kari anzi asi 'baza be 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi zi kokobi e'yo eti ondazu e'yo 'da eyi ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'amahurire maingi kuruga omu bantu abarikufayo, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kukora. N'ekyarugiremu, poriisi egwireho fayiro y'okubuuririza aha bigambibwa.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the unfolding scandal, the reporters were eager to get a statement from the elusive figure at the center of the controversy. They dialed his contacts one after another, hoping to catch him before the story broke.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu buvuyo obwali bugenda mu maaso, bannamawulire baali beesunga okufuna sitatimenti okuva eri omuntu atamanyiddwa mu makkati g'obukuubagano. Baakuba layini ze emu ku emu nga basuubira okumukwata ng'emboozi tennatuuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko ne tye ka time, lucoo lok angea ne gubedo ki miti matek me nongo lok ma aa ki bot ngat ma pe ngene tutwal I dyere me laro lok enoni. Gugoyo cim I nama mege acel-acel, ki gen me make mapwod lok ne pe otyeko katti.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka abilibilio naka ikapun, ekotosi arotak iyemuto adumun akirot naka itunganan yenimam ejenasi. Apotu kesi inomata inabaike ediopet adiopet, aomit ebe epedorete kesi aikamun ngesi eringa akiro ngun ejenuna.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'da ma talasi, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi le ndra e'yo nzeza engazu 'ba 'bani nile ku e'yo nde ma alea ri vu. Eyi omve eri ma namba eyi alu alu asi 'baza be eyini ani ecozu eri bizu de nga po'di e'yo nde efuni ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'ebihagaro ebyabaireho, abanyamakuru bakaba baine ekihika ky'okutunga sitetimenti kuruga aha muntu otarikwetegyerezibwa owabaire ari ahagati y'obutaikirizana. Bakateera esimu zaabo omwe ahari omwe, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kumukwata ekitakahikire.

eng_prompt: Introducing financial literacy to children at an early age can set the foundation for responsible money management in the future. One effective tool for this is a piggybank, which encourages kids to save their allowance and understand the value of money.
lug_prompt: Okuyigiriza abaana ku by'ensimbi ku myaka emito kisobola okuteekawo omusingi gw'okukozesa obulungi ssente mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Ekimu ku bintu ebikola obulungi mu kino ye piggy bank, ekubiriza abaana okutereka ensimbi zaabwe n'okutegeera omugaso gwa ssente.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo lutino i kom kit me tic ki cente ma pwod gitino twero yubu guti me tic ki cente maber i kare me anyim. Gin acel ma konyo tutwal me timo man obedo piggy bank, ma cuku cwiny lutino me gwoko cente gi wek guniang ber pa cente.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakin idwe nuka ikapun eringa edisiak epedori aitolomun epone loka aitwasam ikapun ejok koingaren. Adiopebon lo iswamai ejok kanu ngun ngesi aingadis naka ikapun, lo isinyikokit idwe aimono ikapunukec kosodete amisikin ajokis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria anzi nyiri yi dri eli werea 'diyi ma alia ri ni nga e'dozu e'yo robia ayuza kililiru ri ma dria ewu drialeri ma alia ra. Afa azi orodriru e'yo 'di 'yezu ri angu robia ta mbazuri'i, eri anzi nyiri eyini ava fe robia eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma tambazu azini orodri robia niri vazu.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa abaana eby'esente bakiri bato, nikibaasa kutaho omusingye gw'okukoresa gye esente omu biro by'omumaisho. Ekintu kimwe ekirikukora kurungi omuri eki n'ekitongore ky'okureeberera esente, ekirikuhiga abaana kubiika esente zaabo n'okumanya omugasho gwa sente.

eng_prompt: As part of their financial literacy program, the students learned essential skills for managing their money. The curriculum emphasized the importance of understanding personal finance from an early age.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitundu ku pulogulaamu yaabwe ey'okusoma ku by'ensimbi, abayizi baayiga obukugu obwetaagisa mu kuddukanya ssente zaabwe. Ebigobererwa mu kusoma byassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutegeera eby'ensimbi okuva ku myaka emito.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub gi me pwonyo lutino ki lok kom lim, lutino gu pwonyo diro ma pigi tego me tic ki cente gi. Pwony ne oketo cwiny I kom ber pa niang kit me tic ki lim I kare me tino.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta kec nuka aisisia nuka ikapun, apotu esisiak kisisiautu iwaitin lu itwasamaere ikapun kec. Apotu aisisiaeta kitogogongoto ajokis naka amisiikin nuka ikapun ageun edisiak.
lgg_prompt: Otita eyini sukulu lazu e'yo robia niri ma dria ri ma azi ru, sukulu anzi eyi oni ondua orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ayuza ma aza kozu. E'yo onitani 'diyi 'ba asi orodri onita e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria e'dozu eli werea ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'okwegyesa abeegi eby'esente, abeegi bakeega emyoga y'okukoresa gye esente zaabo. Ebirikwegyesibwa bikashoboorora omugasho gw'okwetegyereza esente z'omuntu bukiri muto.

eng_prompt: In her financial literacy workshop, she emphasized the importance of managing personal finances effectively. To help women gain financial independence, she suggested practical steps they could take.
lug_prompt: Mu musomo gwe ogw'okusoma ku by'ensimbi, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuddukanya obulungi eby'ensimbi. Okusobola okuyamba abakyala okweyimirizaawo mu by'ensimbi, yawa amagezi ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me pwonyo dano kit me tic ki lim, en owaco ni pire tek me tic ki lim maber. Me konyo mon me nongo cente ma mite pigi, en omiyo tam i kom jami ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunike naka aisisia nuka ikapun, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aidar ikapun ke ejok. Kanu aingarakin angor adumun apedor, abu ngesi kicorak iboro luibusakinit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Eri vile otita imbatani onitani e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria ri ma alia, eri 'ba asi orodri e'yo robiani 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri ma dria. Oku eyi ma aza kozu eyi ma ngulupi esuzu geri robia esuzu 'diyisi, eyi fe egata e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria.
