eng_prompt: In many rural communities, traditional banking options are limited, leading residents to seek alternative methods for managing their finances. As a result, they often rely on simple yet effective solutions for saving money.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, enkola za bbanka eza bulijjo ntono, ekireetera abatuuze okunoonya enkola endala ez'okuddukanya ensimbi zaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesigama ku ngeri ennyangu naye nga nnungi ey'okutereka ssente.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, yoo me tic ki beng macon nok tutwal, ma oweko lutedero ocako yenyo yoo mukene me tic ki limgi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gijenge I kom yoo ma yot dok tiyo maber me gwoko cente.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, ikidioko iponesio luka aingadisia nuka ikapun luapolok, eyangauni itunga aimo iponesio ice luka aidar ikapun kec. Kanuka ngun, itwasamaete kesi iwaitin lu epataka konye lu iswamaete ejok kanu aimono ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, geri 'bani robia ta mbazu 'diyi ma azi eyi were, e'yoni fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini geri azi eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ayuza ma aza kozu 'diyi ndazu. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni asi 'ba geri ewakokoru te azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma dria robia ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, oburyo bw'okukoresa banka obw'obuhangwa tiburikwetengwa, ekirikureetera abatuuragye kuronda oburyo obundi bw'okureeberera esente zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwesiga oburyo bukye kandi burungi bw'okubiika sente.

eng_prompt: Many individuals worry about the risks associated with storing cash at home, such as theft or loss. As a result, they often seek more secure alternatives for managing their finances.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beeraliikirivu ku kabi akali mu kutereka ensimbi awaka, gamba ng'okubbibwa oba okufiirwa. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya engeri endala ennungi ey'okuddukanyaamu ensimbi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki lworo I kom peko ma bino pi gwoko cente I gang, macalo kwo onyo rwenyo ne. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare giyenyo yoo mukene maber me tic ki cente gi.
teo_prompt: Iyalongongosi itunga luipu nuikamunitos atiokisio nu ejaas keda aidar ikapun ore, kwape na akoko arai atwaniar. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aimo iponesio luajokak luka aidar ikapun kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo ewaru robia ta mbazu akua 'diyi ma dria ekile ogu kani ku aviza le 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni geri kililiru ndeni eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ayuzu 'diyi nda.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi niberarikirira akabi akarikuruga omu kubiika esente omuka, nk'okwibwa nainga okuzifeerwa. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera esente zaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to attract more clients, financial institutions are constantly adjusting their lending policies. As a result, many customers are seeking out the best deals available.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okusikiriza bakasitoma bangi, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi bikyusakyusa buli kaseera enkola yaabyo ey'okuwola ssente. N'ekivuddemu, bakasitoma bangi banoonya ddiiru ezisingayo obulungi eziriwo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me nongo luwil mapol, gangi tic me lim tye ka loko cik gi me miyo lim den. Macalo adwogi ne, luwil mapol tye ka yenyo cente maber loyo weng matye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitelekaar agwelak luipu, eutasi iriongeta luka ikapun aijulakin ainapeta kec nuka aijaun ilonin. Kanuka ngun, eutasi agwelak luipu aimo iboro luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu aje'ba eyi ejizu dika, angu robia ta mbazu 'diyi eyi ma azita mari fezu 'diyi oja sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, aje'ba karakara eyi afa ozizaru muke ndeni 'diyi nda.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeta ba kasitoma baingi, ebitongore by'esente nibigyenda nibihindura omu biragiro by'okugaba za rooni. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasitoma baingi nibaronda eby'okuguza ebirikukirayo oburungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges they faced, it was crucial for the women to come together and support one another. Recognizing the strength in solidarity, she emphasized the importance of collaboration and mutual respect.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kwe baasanga gye buvuddeko, kyali kikulu nnyo abakyala okwegatta n'okuwagiragana. Ng'alaga amaanyi agali mu kukwatagana, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukolagana n'okussa ekitiibwa mu buli omu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma gunongo cokcok-ki, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki mon me ribbe kacel me konyo luwotgi. I nge niang tek pa ribe, en owaco ber pa winye ki woro ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi pac, ajokuna noi angor aimorikikin kosodete aigangakin yenice. Kanu ajenun agogong naka aimorikikina, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikina keda ayongite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyini esu eturisi 'diyisi, eri ndra orodriru oku eyini emuzu tualu azini eyi atizu eyi ma eselea. Erini okpo ti ecita ma alia ri ma e'yo egazu risi, eri 'ba asi orodri ti ecita ni azini inzita 'ba dria ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obubatungire, kikaba kiri eky'omugasho abakazi kukwatanisa kandi bakahagana. Ahabw'okumanya amaani g'okukwatanisa, akasisinkana omugasho gw'okukwatanisa hamwe n'okuheerezana ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: In a small town known for its culinary delights, many residents have turned their passions into profitable ventures. Among them, a talented group of women has found success in the art of cake baking.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono akamanyidwa olw'emmere yaako ennungi, abatuuze bangi bafudde ebintu bye baagala okuba bizineesi ezivaamu amagoba. Mu bo, ekibinja ky'abakyala abalina ebitone bafunye obuwanguzi mu kukola keeki.
ach_prompt: I taun matidi ma oywek pi tedo cam mabeco, lutedero mapol guloko miti gi odoko biacara ma kelo magoba. I kingi, gurup pa mon ma gitye ki diro gunongo cobo miti gi me tedo mugati.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi lo ejenara noi kanu aipo inyamat, apotu itunga luipu kijulakisi iboro lueminasi kesi araun ibiasaran lu iswamaete ikapun luipu. Kokidingikec, egurupu lo angor luejaasi keda atalanta adumutu akerianut kotoma ainom ekeek.

nyn_prompt: Omukibuga kikye ekirikumanywa ahabw'eby'okurya byakyo, abatuuragye baingi bahindwire ebi barikukunda omu bizinesi ezirikubareetera amagoba. Omuri bo, guruupu y'abakazi abaine etaraanta, etungire obusinguzi omu kukora keeki.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, beauty standards play a significant role in daily life, influencing many women to invest in their appearance. As a result, the cosmetics market has seen substantial growth, reflecting the importance placed on personal grooming and style.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, omutindo gw'obwannalulungi gukola kinene mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, ekireetera abakyala bangi okusiga ensimbi mu ndabika yaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, akatale k'eby'okwewunda kalabye okukulaakulana okw'amaanyi, ekiraga obukulu obuteekebwa ku kwekolako kw'omuntu ne sitayiro.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, rwom me lengo konyo tutwal I kwo me nino ducu, weko mon mapol keto cente I kom kit ma ginen kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, cuk me jami me cwec ma leng dong odongo tutwal, ma nyutu ber pa yub me cwec ma leng ki kit ma kiyubu kwede.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi adoketait naka aibuses keda ajokis naepol noi kotoma aijar naka nginiparan, ido isinyikokit angor nuipu aipikakin ikapunukec toma aputo kec. Kanuka ngun, apolor noi esokoni loka iboro luisikere, itodunit epone loipikakinitai aitwasam iponesio luibusiak keda luibusiak.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, wura onyiru 'diyi azi okporu nga edri o'du driasi ri ma alea, e'yo fepi oku karakara eyini robia 'bazu eyi ma angu e'dazuri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, cuu afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra, e'dapi e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu 'ba eyi ma rua ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, omutindo gw'oburungi nigukora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara g'abantu, ekirikureetera abakazi baingi kuta esente omu kureebeka kwabo. N'ekyarugiremu, akatare k'eby'okwesiiga kareebire entunguuka y'amaani, ekirikworeka obukuru oburikuheebwa okweboneza n'omuringo gw'okwesiiga.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities have seen a resurgence in agricultural practices due to increasing demand for locally sourced produce. As a result, farmers are finding new opportunities to maximize their yields and income.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo bangi beeyongedde okulima n'okulunda olw'obwetaavu bw'ebirime ebikolebwa mu byalo. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bafuna emikisa emipya okwongera ku makungula gaabwe n'enyingiza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol me caro dong gudoko lupur pien miti me cato cam ma aa ki icaro tye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur tye ka nongo gum manyen me medo kac ki cente gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi akoru na ocaaloi naarai eyatakinos iboro lu akoru. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akoriok adumun arerengesio nuitetiak kanu aiyatakin esakec keda edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndre e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra e'yo 'bani afa ofule angu 'da ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma dria ri si. E'yo 'disi, ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi drileba oꞌdiru yi esu afa yini ofule ꞌdiyi ma omgbo otuzu azini yi ma lonyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyaro bingi byongyeiremu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ahabw'obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebirikuruga omu byaro. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi nibatunga emigisha misya y'okwongyera amasharuura n'entaasya yaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite significant advancements in technology and banking, many communities remain underserved. This is particularly evident in rural areas, where traditional financial institutions are often inaccessible to women.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya ne mu by'ensimbi, ebitundu bingi tebituukiddwako bulungi. Kino kyeyolekera nnyo mu byalo, ng'ebitongole by'ebyensimbi eby'edda tebitera kutuukirirwa bakyala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tet manyen tye I tenge me tet ki beng, pol pa lwak pud pe gunongo kony ma mite. Man nen tutwalle I caro, kama gang tic me lim macon pol kare mon pe twero nongo ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka etatai loakwana keda aingadisia nuka ikapun, mam itunga luipu ejaasi keda ejanakine loejok. Ecai na noi kocaaloi, ne mam angor epedorete adolokin iriongeta luka ikapun.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of the community, local leaders gathered to discuss potential solutions. After much deliberation, they decided that the church could play a vital role in providing medical services.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo nti ekkanisa esobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kuwa obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak I lok me yot kom, lutela me tedero gugure me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Ingee tam matut, gumoko ni kanica twero timo tic mapire tek me miyo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian kotoma atutubet, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi koseutu ebe epedori ekanisa aingarakin kotoma aijanakin amukian.

E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo kini kanisa eco azi okporu nga azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea ra.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, various religious institutions play a significant role in the community, each with its own influence and resources. Notably, the distribution of land among these churches reveals interesting disparities.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, ebitongole by'eddiini eby'enjawulo bikola omulimu munene mu kitundu, nga buli kimu kirina obuyinza bwakyo n'ebikozesebwa byakyo. Okusingira ddala, okugabana ettaka mu makanisa gano kulaga enjawulo ezinyuma.

teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi iriongeta lu ediini keda aswam naepol noi kotoma atutubet, kangin idiini keda apedorosiokec keda iborokec. Kacut, aikor alupok kiding ikanisan lu itodunit atiakatiaka.

lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra asizu afa ecetaru 'diyi e'yo 'yezu. Ongulumu eyi ovu osuta si eyini onizu kini 'ba tujari 'yepi 'ba inzile inzi 'diyi ma azi fi e'yo onzi 'da ma alea.

eng_prompt: The Catholic Church has long been involved in various community development initiatives. One of its latest endeavors is the establishment of a financial institution aimed at supporting its mission and serving the faithful.
lug_prompt: Eklezia Katolika emaze ebbanga ddene nga yeenyigira mu nteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ebitundu eby'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bisembyeyo okukola kwe kutandikawo ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi ekigenderera okuwagira omulimu gwakyo n'okuweereza abakkiriza.
ach_prompt: Kanica me katoli dong orii I yub mapat-pat me dongo lobo I kabedo mapat-pat. Acel me kin miti ne manyen en aye me cako dul me lim ma tye ki miti me konyo yub meggi me tic pi luyee.
teo_prompt: Ajai ekanisa loka atulik apak naepol noi toma aswamisinei nu itopoloere itunga. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio nuitetiak ngesi aitolomun erionget loka ikapun kanu aigang aswamuke keda aijanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa Katuluka niri ebi aa e'yo angu ezoma ni ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea sa'wa ezu. E'yo erini 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma azi eri amuti robiani 'bani lezu atita fezu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini azi ngazu 'ba aita be 'diyi dri ri e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekanisa y'abakaturiki etwire neejumba omu mirimo y'entunguka y'abantu. Kimwe ahabintu ebirikukyerererwa kukorwa, n'okutandikaho ekitongore ky'esente ekirikugyenderera okuhwera abaikiriza.

eng_prompt: In an effort to preserve cultural heritage and promote tourism, local officials announced plans for the restoration of significant historical sites. As part of this initiative, the government contributed money during the renovation of the Uganda martyrs' shrine.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma eby'obuwangwa n'okutumbula ebyobulambuzi, abakungu b'ebyalo baalangirira enteekateeka z'okuzzaawo ebifo eby'ebyafaayo ebikulu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti yawaayo ssente mu kuddaabiriza ekiggwa ky'abajulizi ba Uganda.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko tekwaro ki ilo malo rwom me limo piny, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me roco kabedo macon ma pigi tego. Macalo but yub man, gamente omiyo cente ikare me roco abila pa lucaden remo me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aidar inonosio keda aitopolor elatok, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi aitemonokineta nuka ainyakun aiboisio nuapolok nuka akiro nukolosek. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu apugan ijaik ikapun kanu aitemonokino aiboisit naka aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo suruni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi otita eyi e'dozu angu ewu driori ma alea 'diyi ogozu o'diru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete fe robia sawa 'bani pari 'bani 'ba o'dile a'ita yini si 'diyi ma ta mbazu o'diru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi, abakuru b'ebyaro bakarangirira enteekateeka y'okugaruraho emyanya y'eby'obuhangwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti ekahayo esente omu kuhunduuza ekigombe ky'abajurizi ba Uganda.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing need for skilled labor in the community, local leaders gathered to discuss potential solutions. After much deliberation, they decided that establishing a vocational school would be the best way to support the youth and boost the local economy.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'abakozi abalina obukugu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gucokke me nywako tam i kom kit ma tic omyero owot kwede pien ni miti me nongo lutic ma ludiro tye ka mede i kabedo gi. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi ni cako gang kwan me tic cing obedo yoo maber loyo me konyo bulu ki ilo malo rwom me lim me tedero.

eng_prompt: In a significant move to reshape the judiciary, the president announced a series of appointments aimed at reinforcing the rule of law. Among these changes, the most notable was the selection of a new chief justice.

eng_prompt: In recent years, numerous scandals have emerged highlighting unethical practices within the legal profession. As a result, public trust in the justice system has been severely undermined.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societal structures have often favored those with wealth and power, creating an imbalance in justice. This disparity becomes particularly evident in legal proceedings, where resources can heavily influence outcomes.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi fe drileba 'ba lonyi be azini okpo be 'diyi dri, e'yo e'yo liza kililiru ri ma esele cozu ku. Esele coza 'diri e'da tutuni e'yo liza azitaniri ma alia, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ni e'yo efupi 'diyi ojazu okporu.

teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, iswamaete einono noi kanu aidar ainapakina keda aitemokin ingungeta. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc engarenok luka atutubena aimorikikin ingungeta.

eng_prompt: Regular monitoring of a premature baby's health is crucial for their development. Pediatricians recommend frequent check-ups to ensure they are meeting growth milestones and to address any potential health concerns.

ach_prompt: Bedo ka ngiyo yotkom pa lutino ma kare gi pe oromo pire tek tutwal pi dongo gi. Ludaktari ma tiyo i kom lutino giwaco ni dano omyero gubed ka pime kare ki kare me neno ni lutino tye ka dongo maber dok bene me cobo peko mo keken ma twero bedo tye i kom lutino.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar duc angaleu naka imukerun lumam edolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apolo kec. Icorakitos imurok lu idwe ainwakio duc kanu awanyun ebe eutasi kesi aitodolikin adoketait na apol ka aitemokin atiokisio nu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Odekua osipi de nga po'di eri ma o'du ecani ku ri ma rua ala ma pamvu onezu ri eri orodriru eri ma zota ni. Dakitari anzi nyiri eyini 'diyi fe imbata eyi ma rua o'bizu sa'wa driasi eyini ani eyi ma zota ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okukyebera amagara g'omwana orikuzaarwa atakahikire n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kwe. Abashaho b'abaana nibahaburwa kuguma nibakyeberwa okureeba ngu bahika aha bigyendererwa by'okukura n'okukora aha buremeezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: As the colder months approach, it's crucial to be vigilant about your baby's health. Premature infants are particularly vulnerable to infections, making flu season a critical time for extra precautions.
lug_prompt: Emyezi gy'obunyogovu bwe gigenda gisembera, kikulu nnyo okubeera obulindaala ku bulamu bw'omwana wo. Abaana abazaalibwa nga tebanneetuuka bakwatibwa mangu obulwadde, ekireetera ekiseera kya ssenyiga okubeera ekiseera ekikulu eky'okwegendereza ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ka dwe me ngic tye ka bino, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki wang matek I kom yotkom pa latinni. Lutino ma kinywalo ma kare gi pe oromo nongo two, man weko kare me two aburu obedo kare ma pire tek tutwal me gwoke.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosete ilapio lu elilim, ejokuna noi aidar angaleu naka ikoku kon. Idwe lu mam edolitos edumununete adekasinei, ijaikini apak naka eimidi apak naepol noi naka aidar iboro.
lgg_prompt: Imba ambizaru 'diyi ni ecaria, eri orodriru aa'zu mile be mi vile odekuari ma rua ala ma dria. Anzi nyiri osipi de nga po'di eyi ma o'du ecani ku 'diyi azo esu ewakokoru, e'yo 'di fe sa'wa flu niri ni aa'zu sa'wa okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi ma tambazu ra ri'I.

eng_prompt: Many women experience the emotional and physical toll of pregnancy loss, often feeling isolated in their grief. It's crucial that we provide support and resources to those navigating this difficult journey.

teo_prompt: Angor nuipu etereikina keda ariebo na aomisio keda akuan naka aibiror apotu, epupete kesi bon kotoma apipilokec. Erai ibore yenepol noi ainakin oni agangat keda iboro lu itwasamaete ngul luejaasi toma orot lo loetiono noi.

eng_prompt: Due to the potential complications that can arise during childbirth, healthcare professionals emphasize the importance of a safe delivery environment. Access to medical support and emergency care is crucial for both the mother and the baby during this critical time.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu ebiyinza okuva mu kuzaala, abakugu mu byobulamu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'embeera y'okuzaala ennungi. Okufuna obuyambi bw'eddwaliro n'obujjanjabi obw'amangu kikulu nnyo eri maama n'omwana mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma twero bedo tye ikare me nywal, ludiro me yot kom giwaco ni ber me bedo ki kabedo maber me nywal. Nongo kony me yot kom ki kony ma mitte pi dako ki latin pire tek tutwal I kare man me peko.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru osiza ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi asi 'ba orodri angu osiza kililiru ri ma dria. Aro esuzu azini azakoma mbeleru ri eri orodriru ayia eyini tualu odekua eyini sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obulumi obw'amaanyi mu kifuba n'okulemererwa okussa, nnasalawo okunoonya obujjanjabi. Omusawo yakebera mangu embeera yange era n'ansaba nsigaleyo nneetegerezebwe.

eng_prompt: In our community meeting last week, we discussed the urgent need for a place of worship that can accommodate everyone. To make this vision a reality, we are organizing a fundraising campaign.

nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga kyaitu esande ehweire, tukahanuura aha kyetengo ky'amaani eky'omwanya gw'okuramizamu ogurikubaasa kutwariramu buri omwe. Okuhikiiriza ekirooto eki, turiyo nitutebekanisa ehururu y'okushorooza esente.

eng_prompt: I noticed you have a strong passion for music and community. Have you ever considered taking on a leadership role in a worship setting?
lug_prompt: Nkirabye nti oyagala nnyo ennyimba n'abantu b'omu kitundu.

eng_prompt: During his sermon, the Bishop emphasized the importance of generosity and community support. He reminded the congregation that their contributions help strengthen the church and its mission.

lug_prompt: Nnakirabye nti olina ebintu bingi ebinyuma ebiragiddwa.

eng_prompt: As we discuss our plans for the upcoming charity event, it's important to consider our contributions. What amount do you think would make a meaningful impact?

eng_prompt: In times of need, our communities rely on the kindness of others. Remember that even small acts of kindness can make a significant difference in someone's life.

eng_prompt: Our team has been working hard to organize an event. I wanted to remind everyone that we have fundraising next Sunday.

eng_prompt: We've been discussing the urgent need to repair the church roof, and it's clear that we need a solid plan in place. What ideas do you have for raising the necessary funds?
lug_prompt: Tubadde twogera ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuddaabiriza akasolya k'ekkanisa, era kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga enteekateeka ennungi.

eng_prompt: The community gathered to discuss plans for the historic building. Excitement filled the air as they announced the upcoming changes.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka z'ekizimbe eky'ebyafaayo. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga nga balangirira enkyukakyuka ezigenda okubaawo.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu otita jo ewu driori ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ayiko fu oli ma alia yini e'yo ojata emupi 'diyi ecezurisi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeerana kuhanuura aha nteekateeka y'ekyombeko ky'ebyafaayo. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okurangirira empindahinduka ezirikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, individuals dedicate their lives to spreading their beliefs and helping others. This often leads to the question: who is a missionary?

ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, dano gitiyo ki kwogi me tyelo kor niye gi ki konyo luwotgi.

eng_prompt: Recent feedback from staff has highlighted several concerns regarding their current work environment. To foster a more productive and motivated workforce, addressing these issues is essential.
lug_prompt: Ebyayogerwa abakozi gyebuvuddeko biraga okweraliikirira kungi ku mbeera y'emirimu gyebaddemu. Okutumbula abakozi abakola obulungi era abakubirizibwa, okukola ku nsonga zino kya mugaso.

nyn_prompt: Ebyarugiremu kuruga omu bakozi nibyoreka okwerarikirira okurikukwata aha mirimo yaabo. Okureetaho abakozi abarikukora kurungi, okukora aha nshonga ezi n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: I heard there was a lot of competition this time around. I'm curious to see who will be recognized for their hard work.

eng_prompt: As economic disparities continue to widen, many are questioning the effectiveness of current policies. Addressing this issue requires a thoughtful examination of our societal structures and values.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutafaanagana mu by'enfuna bweyongera okugaziwa, bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'enkola eziriwo. Okukola ku nsonga eno kyetaagisa okwekenneenya obulungi enkola n'empisa zaffe mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma apoka-poka me lim tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom tic pa cik matye kombedi. Cobo peko man mito ni myero kong watam matut I kom kit ma jami tye kwede I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor atiakatiaka naka ikapun, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka ainapeta nu ejaas. Kanu aitemokin ationis na ekot oni airereonor ejok iponesio keda iponesio luka itunga wok.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue in our society, undermining trust and accountability. As we seek solutions, it's crucial to explore effective strategies for combating this deep-rooted problem.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse kizibu ekibunye buli wamu mu kitundu kyaffe, ekityoboola obwesige n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Nga bwe tunoonya eby'okugonjoola, kikulu nnyo okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ey'okulwanyisaamu ekizibu kino ekirimu emirandira.

teo_prompt: Erai amidicio naka apiyai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubetekosi, ido itolitoli amunokina keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kwape iuta sio aimo aitemokineta, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin lu itikitikere ationis na.

lug_prompt: Embeera bwe yeeyongera okukyuka, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okusigala nga tumanyi. Okusobola okusalawo obulungi, twetaaga alipoota enzijuvu ku kawuka ka kolona.

eng_prompt: I wanted to check in with you about your progress on the assignments. Have you submitted the course work?

eng_prompt: In response to the recent expansion of our operations, the management has identified several key roles that need to be filled. To ensure we maintain our productivity and meet our goals, we are actively seeking qualified candidates.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okugaziwa kw'emirimu gyaffe gyebuvuddeko, abaddukanya emirimu bazudde emirimu emikulu egiwerako egyetaaga okujjuzibwa. Okusobola okukakasa nti tukuuma omutindo gwaffe n'okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe, tunoonya abayizi abalina ebisaanyizo.

eng_prompt: As I flipped through the pages of the local newspapers, I noticed a variety of job listings. I wondered about the types of positions that were currently available in the community.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnasoma empapula z'amawulire ez'omu kitundu, nnalaba ebiwandiiko by'emirimu eby'enjawulo. Nze nneebuuza ku bika by'emirimu ebiriwo mu kitundu.

lug_prompt: Okujingirira musango gwa maanyi era guyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi mu mateeka. Abantu bangi tebamanyi bibonerezo ebikwatagana n'omusango guno.

eng_prompt: In times of economic uncertainty, many communities rely on their local businesses for stability and growth. It raises the question of how financial institutions can play a role in fostering this vital sector.

eng_prompt: As the population of the area continues to grow, the demands on local schools are increasing. To effectively support the expanding student body, educational leaders are recognizing the necessity for additional personnel.

eng_prompt: In the early 1970s, Uganda underwent significant political turmoil and upheaval. Amidst this chaos, a military coup brought a controversial leader to power.

teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ikar luka elukumit ediope, abu Uganda kodum amumu naepol noi kotoma akiro nuka politikis. Kokiding naka amumu kangin, abu aipuga apugan naka ajore koyangau engarenon loetiono noi apugan.

nyn_prompt: Omu ntandikwa y'emyaka ya 1970, Uganda ekatunga akaimukiriro omu by'obutegyeki. Omu bwimukiriro obu, okwihaho obutegyeki bw'amahe kikareeta omwebembezi w'omutaano omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In the tumultuous political landscape of Uganda during the 1970s, various factions vied for control amid widespread instability. The military's role became increasingly significant as leaders struggled to maintain authority, setting the stage for a dramatic shift in power.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eyalimu akavuyo mu Uganda mu myaka gya 1970, ebiwayi eby'enjawulo byavuganya ku buyinza wakati mu butabanguko obwaliwo. Omulimu gw'amagye gweyongera okuba ogw'omugaso ng'abakulembeze balwana okukuuma obuyinza, ne bateekawo omutendera gw'enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu buyinza.

Azi asikari eyini ri eca curu'do orodriru drice'ba eyini a'di 'dizu opi nyaza ma ta mbazu, e'yo ojata okporu ni 'diyi 'bazu opi nyaza ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwimukiriro bw'eby'obutegyeki bwa Uganda omu myaka ya 1970, ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe bikarwanira obutegyeki ahagati y'obutabanguko obwabaire buriho. Omurimo gw'amahe gukeeyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho ahabw'abebembezi kurwana kurinda obushoborozi, ekyareteireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi.

ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki kuc, ber bedo pa lumony obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me neno ni gubedo ma komgi yot dok guyubbe, kony me yot kom ki miyo botgi I odi yadi pa lumony.

lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni azini asianzu ni 'diyisi, aa'ta muke 'ba azi ngapi asikaria 'diyiniri eri e'yo okporu ni i. Yi ma rua ala ndrezu azini yi ma ngonde, 'ba azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fe arojo asikari eyini 'diyi ma alea.

nyn_prompt: Amarwariro g'amahe n'ag'abazirwanireho, nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obw'omutaano. Zikozirwe kuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'eby'amagara eby'omutaano eby'abaserukare n'abazirwanireho.

eng_prompt: In order to bring a project to life, various resources must be allocated effectively. One of the most critical resources needed for any construction project is financial investment.

eng_prompt: In the quiet moments of reflection, we often find ourselves haunted by the echoes of those we've lost. Their laughter, stories, and presence linger in our minds, shaping our thoughts and emotions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera akasirifu ak'okufumiitiriza, tutera okwesanga nga tutulugunyizibwa eddoboozi ly'abo be tufiiriddwa. Enseko zaabwe, emboozi, n'okubeerawo kwabwe bisigala mu birowoozo byaffe, nga bifuula ebirowoozo byaffe n'enneewulira zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lwodo lok ma ling, pol kare wa nongo wawinyo dwon pa jo ma wa orwenyo. Nyero gi, ododo gi, ki bedo tye gi bedo I adam wa, ki yubu tam wa ki kit ma wawinyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuililingi nu aomoom, etapit oni aomoom nuikamunitos ngul lu atwakiasi oni. Akwenarakec, akiro, keda ajautekec esalakinete kotoma aomisiowok, itolomete aomisiowok keda aomisiowok.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are curious about the career paths of military personnel. One common question that arises is related to the age at which soldiers typically transition out of active duty.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, staying connected with family and friends has never been more important. Fortunately, technology offers us convenient ways to bridge the distance.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, okusigala ng'okwatagana n'ab'enganda n'emikwano tekibanga kya mugaso nnyo nga bwe kiri kati. Ekirungi tekinologiya atuwa engeri ennyangu ey'okukendeeza ku bbanga.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, aa'ta e'yo nzezu familia azini agyipika yi be ri ma orodri ovuni nga 'dini ku. Drilebaru, tekenologia ni ama dri geri kililiru 'diyi fe e'yo 'di ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare is a critical factor in improving community well-being. Increasing the number of health centres can significantly enhance the quality and availability of medical services.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi kintu kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula embeera z'abantu mu kitundu. Okwongera ku muwendo gw'amalwaliro kiyinza okutumbula ennyo omutindo n'okubeerawo kw'obujjanjabi.

lgg_prompt: Afa azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri eri e'yo okporu ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri otuzu. Arojo eyi ma kalafe otuzuri eco azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi n'ekintu kikuru omu kutunguura entuura y'abantu. Okwongyera omuhendo gw'amarwariro, nikibaasa kwongyera aha mutindo n'obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: As the community's population continues to grow, there has been increasing demand for more comprehensive medical services. Local officials are exploring options to enhance the existing health centre's capabilities.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu kitundu gweyongera okukula, wabaddewo obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obujjuvu. Abakungu b'ebyalo banoonyereza ku ngeri y'okwongera ku busobozi bw'eddwaliro eririwo.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, the well-being of military personnel is often overlooked. However, their physical and mental health is crucial for maintaining operational effectiveness.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, embeera y'abajaasi etera okubuusibwa amaaso. Newankubadde, obulamu bwabwe obw'omubiri n'obw'omutwe bwa mugaso mu kukuuma enkola ennungi.

eng_prompt: Everyone is entitled to their own perspective, and diversity of thought can lead to richer discussions. Embracing differing viewpoints can foster understanding and growth.
lug_prompt: Buli omu alina eddembe okuba n'endowooza ye, era endowooza ez'enjawulo zisobola okuleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okulungi. Okukkiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo kisobola okutumbula okutegeera n'okukulaakulana.

eng_prompt: The structure of the Ugandan government includes various ministries, each responsible for specific areas of governance. Among these, the ministry of defence is crucial for maintaining national security and overseeing military operations.
lug_prompt: Entegeka ya gavumenti ya Uganda erimu minisitule ez'enjawulo, nga buli emu evunaanyizibwa ku bitundu by'obukulembeze eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, minisitule y'ebyokwerinda ya mugaso mu kukuuma ebyokwerinda by'eggwanga n'okulondoola ebikwekweto by'amagye.

teo_prompt: Aduketait naka apugan nako Uganda imoriarit iminisitan luegelegela, kangin idiope ikamunitos aiboisio nuegelegela nuka apugan. Kotoma ngul, erai erionget loka ayuwara ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ayuwara naka akwap keda aimaniman aswamisio nuka ajore.
lgg_prompt: Otita gamete Uganda niri ma alea ri ma alea okalamvu ndundu eyi ci, eyi ma dria azi eyi ma dria. Yi ma eselea, okalamvu ageitema niri eri orodriru ageitema kari niri ma tambazu azini e'yo marani ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora ya Gavumenti ya Uganda erimu minisiture nyingi, buri minisiture neejunanizibwa aha nshonga zaayo. Omuri ebi, minisiture y'ebyokwerinda n'eyomugasho munonga omu kurinda ebyokwerinda n'okureeberera emirimo y'amahe.

eng_prompt: Military officers often require specialized equipment and supplies to perform their duties effectively. Understanding the role of army shops in providing these resources can shed light on their importance.
lug_prompt: Abasirikale b'amagye batera okwetaaga ebyuma eby'enjawulo n'ebikozesebwa okusobola okukola emirimu gyabwe obulungi. Okutegeera omulimu gw'amaduuka g'amagye mu kuwa ebintu bino kisobola okutangaaza ku bukulu bwaabyo.

teo_prompt: Ekotosi duc isirikaalei iswamasia luitegelikina kanu aitodolikin aswam kec ejok. Ajenun aswam naka idukai luka ajore kotoma aijanakin iboro lu epedori aitodun ajokis na iboro lu.

nyn_prompt: Ba ofiisa b'amahe buriijo nibetenga ebikwato n'ebintu by'omutaano kukora emirimo yaabo kurungi. Okwetegyereza omurimo gw'amaduuka g'amahe omu kugaba ebintu ebi nikibaasa kworeka omugasho gwabyo.

eng_prompt: Establishing a clear financial framework is essential for effective project management. By outlining expected expenses and revenues, the team can make informed decisions moving forward.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo enkola y'ebyensimbi etegeerekeka bulungi kya mugaso mu nzirukanya ya pulojekiti ennungi. Nga balaga ensaasaanya esuubirwa n'enyingiza, ttiimu esobola okukola okusalawo okulungi okugenda mu maaso.

lgg_prompt: Geri robia esuzu kililiru ri ma e'dota eri orodriru otita eyi ma aza kozu kililiru. Afa ayuzaru azini robia esule 'diyi ma e'yo eceza si, amuti 'da eco e'yo 'du kililiru muzu drile ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutaho engyenderwaho y'eby'empiiha n'eky'omugasho omu kureeberera purogyekiti kurungi. Kubarikworeka enshohoza n'entatsya erikuteekateekwaho, tiimu neebaasa kusharamu kurungi omu kugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As I was researching international organizations, I came across the European Union and its significance in global politics. I'm curious to know more about its member nations.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nnoonyereza ku bitongole by'ensi yonna, nnasanga omukago gwa Bulaaya n'obukulu bwagwo mu byobufuzi by'ensi yonna. Njagala okumanya ebisingawo ku mawanga agagirimu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka kwedo dul mapat-pat manonge I wilobo lung, anongo dul me European Union ki ber pa dul enoni I lok me cungu iwi-bye me wilobo. Atye ki miti madit me ngeyo jami mapol I kom lobe matye I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic nuka iriongeta luka akwapin ace, abu eong adum Atukot Naka imusugun keda ajokis naka epolitikis loka akwap kere. Akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos akwapin nuka imeebanakec.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo vuti ondazu amuti wudrikurusi 'diyi ma dria, ma esu amuti European Union ni azini orodri erini politiki wudrikurusiri ma aliari ra. Ale saaru e'yo nizu kari memba erini 'diyi ma dria drile.

eng_prompt: In any organization, clear and effective communication is essential for success. To ensure this, a dedicated role is often established to oversee all communication efforts.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, empuliziganya ennambulukufu era ennungi ya mugaso eri obuwanguzi. Okukakasa kino, akakiiko ak'enjawulo kateekebwawo okulondoola ebyempuliziganya byonna.

lgg_prompt: Amuti ciria, e'yo nzeza kililiru azini kililiru ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba 'ba azi ngapi e'yo nzeza ma dria ri ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona,okugamba kurungi n'okw'omugasho n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Okureeba ngu eki nikigyenda omu maisho, omurimo gw'okureeberera ebyempurizagana niguteebwaho.

eng_prompt: Many communities in Uganda face significant challenges, including poverty, health crises, and lack of access to education. As a result, various international organizations have stepped in to provide support and resources.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi mu Uganda byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi omuli obwavu, ebizibu by'ebyobulamu, n'obutafuna buyigirize. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ensi yonna eby'enjawulo biyingiddewo okuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol I lobo Uganda gitye ka nongo peko madongo, ma I kingi obedo can, peko me yot kom, ki peko me nongo kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, dule ma aa ki ilobo mawoko mapol gudonyo me miyo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu ko Uganda ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok, aimoriarit ibakor, atiokisio nuka angaleu keda amamus na adumunun asioman. Kanuka ngun, alomutu iriongeta luegelegela luka akwapin ace kanu aijaikin agangat keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu, alio, e'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi pie, azini geri onita esuzu 'diyi ma ako pie. E'yo 'disi, amuti kari eselia 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi fi atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi omu Uganda nibihikwaho oburemeezi bw'amaani, otwariiremu obworo, oburemeezi omu by'amagara, hamwe n'obutabaasa kwega. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe eby'ensi yoona, bitaireho obuhwezi n'ebintu.

eng_prompt: Local civil society organizations play a crucial role in fostering community engagement and addressing social issues. By empowering citizens and promoting collaboration, they contribute to a more resilient and informed society.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'obwannakyewa eby'omu kitundu bikola omulimu munene mu kutumbula okukwatagana kw'abantu n'okukola ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu. Mu kuwa bannansi amaanyi n'okutumbula enkolagana, bayambako mu kuteekawo embeera ennungi mu bantu.

teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka elose, igurupun luegelegela emorete irotin. Kotoma ogurupun lu, iswamaete ipikipikin aswam na itegelikina kotoma orot loepol noi.

eng_prompt: In times of disagreement, finding common ground becomes essential for fostering collaboration. By addressing issues constructively, we can strengthen our bonds and promote a sense of togetherness.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutakkaanya, okunoonya ensonga z'okkiriziganyaako kifuuka kikulu mu kutumbula enkolagana. Bwe tugonjoola ensonga mu ngeri ezimba, tusobola okunyweza enkolagana yaffe n'okutumbula obumu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me telle, nongo yoo me winye obedo gin ma pire tek me dongo winye. Ka watye ka tyeko lok i yo maber, watwero jingo wat i kinwa ki medo rwom me ribe.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka amamus acamanar, aimo akiro nu iputosi kesi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aiswamanara. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio ejok, ipedori oni aitogogong eidicanewok ka aitopolor aimorikikina.

eng_prompt: Effective governance requires a commitment to transparency and accountability. Ensuring the prudent management of public resources is essential for fostering trust and promoting sustainable development.
lug_prompt: Enfuga ennungi yeetaaga obwerufu n'embalirira. Okukakasa enzirukanya ennungi ey'eby'obugagga bya gavumenti kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige n'enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Tela maber mito ni dano gubed ki ada ki kor tic gi. Neno ni jami pa lwak kitiyo kwedgi maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo gen ki dongo lobo ma rii.
teo_prompt: Epugae loajokan ekot aitodolikin nuka abeit ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Aanyun ebe itwasamao iboro luka apugan ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite amuno keda apol.

nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okworeka amazima n'embaririra. Okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga bya gavumenti nibikozesibwa kurungi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho obwesigye n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: As motorcycle ownership continues to rise, so does the concern over theft and security. Many riders are seeking effective strategies to protect their valuable vehicles from potential thieves.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwannannyini bwa ppikipiki bweyongera okulinnya, n'okweraliikirira ku bubbi n'ebyokwerinda bweyongera. Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi banoonya engeri ennungi ez'okukuumamu emmotoka zaabwe ez'omuwendo okuva ku babbi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma bedo ki piki piki tye kamede kwede, lworo me kwo ki gwoko kuc bene tye kamede. Ludwo mutoka mapol tye ka yenyo yoo maber me gwoko mutokagi ki bot lukwo.

eng_prompt: In many countries, local governance plays a crucial role in community development and administration. One key position within this structure is that of the sub-county chief, who oversees various local functions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, gavumenti z'ebitundu zikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu nkulaakulana n'enzirukanya y'ebitundu. Ekifo ekimu ekikulu mu kitongole kino ky'eky'omukulu w'eggombolola, alabirira emirimu gy'ebitundu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, tela me tedero timo tic mapire tek tutwal I dongo lobo ki tela pa lwak. Kabedo acel ma pire tek tutwal I dul enoni obedo pa ladit me sub-county, ma doro tic mapat-pat me tedero.

eng_prompt: Every new year, people reflect on their lives and set goals for self-improvement. These commitments often lead to positive changes and personal growth.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka omupya, abantu bafumiitiriza ku bulamu bwabwe ne bateekawo ebiruubirirwa eby'okwetuusaako. Obweyamo buno butera okuleeta enkyukakyuka ennungi n'okukulaakulana kw'omuntu.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the participation of citizens in the electoral process is crucial for ensuring representation. Understanding who qualifies to participate in elections is fundamental to grasping the concept of voter rights.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiro ekijjudde okusalawo mu bukambwe n'okusalawo obubi, yatuula yekka mu kisenge kye, ng'azannya ebyaliwo mu birowoozo bye. Enseko n'omuziki okuva ku kabaga byawulikika ng'ebijjukizo eby'ewala, nga bibuutikiddwa obuzito bw'okusalawo kwe.

eng_prompt: Businesses and organizations often operate on a specific timeline for budgeting and reporting purposes. Understanding the structure of a financial year is essential for effective financial planning and analysis.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi n'ebitongole bitera okukola mu budde obutuufu okusobola okukola embalirira n'okukola alipoota. Okutegeera enkula y'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi kya mugaso mu kuteekateeka n'okwekenneenya obulungi ebyensimbi.

teo_prompt: Ibiasaran keda iriongeta duc iswamaete kotoma apak naebeit kanu aitodun ebajet keda aitodun eripoota. Amisiikin epone loka ekaru loka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemonokin ka aingic ikapun ejok.

eng_prompt: The rising incidents of aggression and conflict among young people are alarming and demand immediate attention. It is crucial for our communities to address the root causes of this troubling trend.

teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio naka amumu keda ingungeta kanejaas atumunak erai ibore yenepol noi ido ekot aitemokin katipet. Erai ibore yenepol noi aiboisio wok aitemokin nu eyangaunitos ationis na.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, students eagerly anticipate the moment they can celebrate their achievements. The culmination of their academic journey is marked by a significant milestone.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, abayizi beesunga olunaku lwe banaajaguza ebituukiddwaako. Okutuuka ku ntikko y'olugendo lwabwe olw'ebyensoma kwa nkizo ya maanyi.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abeegi nibategyereza obwire obu barikuza kujaguza ebikozirwe. Okuhika aha muheru gw'orugyendo rwabo rw'eby'obwegyese n'ekintu ky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: In a world where empathy and understanding are essential for coexistence, the impact of harmful actions cannot be overlooked. It is crucial to recognize the ethical implications of our choices and their consequences on others.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga okusaasira n'okutegeeragana bikulu mu kubeera awamu, ebiva mu bikolwa eby'obulabe tebisobola kubuusibwa maaso. Kikulu nnyo okumanya ebiva mu kusalawo kwe tukola n'ebivaamu eri abalala.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma cwiny me kica ki niang pire tek tutwal pi kwo kacel, adwoki pa tim maraco pe kitwero cayo ne. Pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki me tam ma wamoko ki adwogi ne I kom jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na epolok noi aitim keda amisiikin kanu aijar nepepe, mam epedorio apalunit atiokisio nuka aswamisio nuarokok. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun nuepedorete aseunetekosi aswam keda nuepedorete kesi aswam mama ejaasi luce.

eng_prompt: As educated individuals, university graduates possess the knowledge and skills necessary to drive positive change in their communities. Their unique perspectives can help address pressing social and environmental issues.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu abasomye, abatikkirwa mu yunivasite balina amagezi n'obukugu obwetaagisa okutambuza enkyukakyuka ennungi mu bitundu byabwe. Endowooza zaabwe ez'enjawulo zisobola okuyamba okukola ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu n'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Macalo dano ma gukwano, lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwan me yunibaciti gitye ki ngec ki diro ma mite me kelo aloka loka maber I kabedo gi. Tam gi ma pat pat twero konyo me cobo peko me kwo pa dano ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape itunga lu esiomitos, esisiak lu alomunitos kounibasite ejaas keda acoa na ekotoi kanu aitodolikin aijulanakineta kotoma atutubenakec. Iponesio kec luitegelikina ingarakinete aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga keda ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba onita be 'diyi ru, 'ba onita univasiti niri depi 'diyi vu ondua azini ondua 'bani lele ojata kililiru ejizu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ci. Egata yini wura ndusi 'diyi eco azakoma fe e'yo ewaru o'bi yi ma eselea azini angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma aza ko ra.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with diverse perspectives and backgrounds, it's essential to embrace our differences. By fostering understanding and compassion, we can build stronger connections within our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde endowooza n'ensibuko ez'enjawulo, kikulu nnyo okukkiriza enjawulo zaffe. Bwe tukuza okutegeera n'obusaasizi, tusobola okuzimba enkolagana ey'amaanyi mu bitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki tam ki tekwaro ma padi padi, pire tek tutwal me jolo apoka poka wa. Ka wacuku cwiny dano me niang ki kica, watwero dongo wat ikin dano ma ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aomisio nuegelegela, epolok noi acamun atiakatiakawok. Kowai lo aitopolor acamanara keda aitim, ipedori oni aiduk eidicane loegogong kotoma atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ndundu eyi ma egata eyi pie, eri orodriru amani ama ma esele cozu. E'yo vata azini asi ndriza ma omgbo otuza si, ama eco ti ecita okporu 'diyi si ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire emiteekateekyere etarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho kwikiriza entaaniso zaitu. Twayoreka okwetegyerezana n'embabazi, nitubaasa kwombeka enkoragana y'amaani omu byanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, having the right credentials is essential for career advancement. Many employers prioritize candidates who have demonstrated their expertise through formal training and academic achievements.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, okubeera n'ebiwandiiko ebituufu kya mugaso mu kukulaakulana mu mirimu. Abakozesa bangi bakulembeza abeesimbyewo abalaze obukugu bwabwe okuyita mu kutendekebwa mu butongole n'ebituukiddwaako mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I kom tic, bedo ki waraga ma oporre pire tek tutwal I dongo tic. Wegi tic mapol gi maro lutino kwan ma gunyuto ni gitye ki ngec matut i kom ticgi kun gitiyo ki pwonye gi ki jami ma gutimo i gang kwan gi.

eng_prompt: The job market in Uganda has become increasingly competitive, with a growing number of graduates entering the workforce each year. Despite their qualifications, many young professionals are struggling to find suitable employment opportunities.
lug_prompt: Akatale k'emirimu mu Uganda keeyongedde okuvuganya, n'omuwendo gw'abayizi abattikirwa ogweyongera okuyingira mu mirimu buli mwaka. Wadde nga balina ebisaanyizo, abavubuka abakugu bangi balwana okufuna emirimu egisaanira.
ach_prompt: Cuk me tic I lobo Uganda tye ka doko tek tutwal, ki wel lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwangi me univaciti matye kadonyo I tic mwaka ki mwaka tye ka mede. Kadi bed ni gitye ki kwan ma oromo, bulu mapol gitye ka nongo peko me nongo tic ma oporre pigi.
teo_prompt: Apol noi abolobol naka aswamisinei ko Uganda, ido iyata enaaba loka itunga lu angetakinak asioman toma aswam kangolikaru. Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apapulai, eutasi ipirioitin luipu adumun aswamisinei nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Aje azi ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra, kalafe 'ba onita univasiti niri depi 'bo 'diyini fizu azi ngazu ri ma omgbo ni tu eli alu alu vusi. Yi ma onita ma talasi, 'ba ode karakara eyi dri ci drileba azi esuzu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obutare bw'emirimo omu Uganda bweyongyeire kuba obw'akabi, abantu abamazire emishomo yaabo nibaza omu mirimo buri mwaka. Oihireho emishomo yaabo, eminyeeto baingi abakugu, nibarwana kuronda emirimo mirungi.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure quality and standards in education, various governing bodies oversee the operations of universities and colleges. One such authority is responsible for setting guidelines and monitoring compliance among these institutions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa omutindo n'omutindo mu byenjigiriza, ebitongole ebifuga eby'enjawulo birondoola emirimu gya zi ssettendekero n'amatendekero. Ekimu ku bitongole ng'ebyo kivunaanyizibwa ku kuteekawo ebiragiro n'okulondoola okugobererwa mu bitongole bino.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni rwom me kwan tye maber, dul mapat-pat ma doro tic pa gangi kwan me rwom ma malo gi doro tic pa gangi kwan me rwom ma malo. Dul acel matye ki twero enoni aye tye ki twero me keto cik ki neno ni dul mapat-pat tye ka lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun adoketait na asioman na abeit, ipu atukona nu eyait aswam naka iunibasitin keda ikoosin. Atukot adiope kwape kangin nes ikamunitos nu aitolomun ikisila ka aanyanar aitup ikisila kotoma iriongeta lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ma omgbo otuzu, amuti driceza ni ndundu 'diyi azi univasiti eyini 'diyi ma pamvu one. Amuti alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi azita eyi sizu azini e'yo vuti obiza ma pamvu onezu amuti 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya omutindo n'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese, ebitongore ebirikutegyeka nibireeberera emirimo ya Yunivasite n'amatendekyero agaheiguru. Ekitongore kimwe nk'ekyo kiine obujunanizibwa bw'okutaho ebiragiro n'okureebuuza okubikuratirwa omu bitongore ebi.

eng_prompt: Completing your undergraduate studies opens up various opportunities for further education. Many students choose to deepen their knowledge and specialize in their field by enrolling in a graduate program.
lug_prompt: Okumaliriza emisomo gyo egya diguli eyookubiri kikuggulirawo emikisa egy'enjawulo egy'okweyongerayo mu kusoma. Abayizi bangi basalawo okwongera okumanya n'okukuguka mu mulimu gwabwe nga beewandiisa mu pulogulaamu z'amatendekero aga waggulu.
ach_prompt: Tyeko kwan ni me yunibwaciti yabo yoo mapol me mede ki kwan. Lutino kwan mapol gimoko tam gi me medo ngec gi ki kwan me rwom ma lamal kun gicito ka kwano kwan me digiri.
teo_prompt: Angetakin asioman kon naka eunibasiti epukori arerengesio nuipu nuka aiyatakin asioman. Esisiak luipu eseunete aiyatakin acoa kec kosodete aitutuonor aswamukec kopone lo alomar toma ainapeta nuka angetakin asioman.
lgg_prompt: Onita mini univasiti niri dezu ri ni drileba karakara eyi ma ti zi onita drile ri ma alea. Sukulu anzi karakara eyi pe onita eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika eyi ma onita eyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu eyini fizu onita univasiti niri ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Okumaririza emishomo yaawe eya diguri y'okubanza, nikikwiguraho emigisha mingi y'okweyongyera kwega. Abeegi abaingi nibasharamu kwongyera aha kumanya kwabo n'okwega omu myoga yaabo, barikwehandikisa omu puroguraamu y'okujwara diguri y'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: As we strive to improve our society, it's essential to focus on the foundational elements that drive progress. One of the most critical areas we need to address is the education system.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tufuba okulongoosa ekitundu kyaffe, kikulu nnyo okussa essira ku bintu ebikulu ebireeta enkulaakulana. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo bye twetaaga okukolako y'enkola y'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yele me yubu kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom jami ma kelo dongo lobo. Kabedo acel ma pire tek tutwal ma omyero walok iye en aye yub me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aswam kagogong kanu aitojokar itunga wok, ejokuna noi apodokinit iboro luepedorete ayangaun apol. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok nuibusakinit oni aitemokin ngesi nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Amani dri ciria ongulumu amavileri otuzu, eri orodriru asi 'bazu e'yo okporu angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu amani le 'ye 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo onita ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikugyezaho kutunguura ebyanga byaitu, n'eky'omugasho okuta amaani aha musingye ogurikureeta entunguuka. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebi tushemereire kukoraho n'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Your academic performance is a crucial factor in the admissions process. It's important to understand that your grades and test scores will be closely evaluated.
lug_prompt: Enkola yo mu by'ensoma nsonga nkulu nnyo mu kuyingiza abayizi. Kikulu okukitegeera nti obubonero bwo n'obubonero bw'ebigezo bijja kwekenneenyezebwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma itimo kwede peny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kare me gamo lutino. Pire tek tutwal me niang ni kibineno rwom me kwan ni ki adwoki me peny.
teo_prompt: Aswam kon kotoma asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma ainwakio. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin ebe eponio airereor iguredin ka ainwakio kon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mini agazu sukulu'a ri eri e'yo okporu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu sukulu'a ri ma alea. Eri orodriru vazu kini 'ba nga geri mini agazu azini obeta eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukora kwawe omu mashomero n'ekintu kikuru munonga omu kukora emirimo y'okwikiriza abaana. N'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu obubonero bwawe hamwe n'obubonero bw'ebigyezo nibiija kushwijumwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, businesses and individuals face increasing pressure to stand out on a global scale. As markets become more saturated, the question arises: how can one effectively enhance their competitiveness internationally?
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, bizinensi n'abantu ssekinnoomu boolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa okweyongera okwawukana ku nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni matye ki kubbe ikin dano, biacara ki dano acel acel tye ka nongo lyeto me bedo pat ki lobo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda arucokina, ejaasi ibiasaran keda itunga keda agogongu naepol noi naka aijen kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, tujari azini 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi dri fu e'yo 'bani lezu yi ma esele cozu wudrikurusiri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, eby'obushubuzi hamwe n'abantu buntu nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okweyendeza aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: Many students face uncertainty when it comes to selecting a career path. Effective career guidance can provide the support and information they need to make informed decisions.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi basanga obutali bukakafu bwe kituuka ku kulonda eby'okusomerera. Okulambika obulungi eby'emirimu kusobola okuwa obuyambi n'obubaka bwe beetaaga okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo peko me yero gin ma gimito timo ikare me kwangi. Miyo tira maber i kom ngo ma omyero gutim twero minigi kony ki ngec ma gimito me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esisiak luipu keda amamus aijen kanu aseun aswam. Aicoreta nuajokak nuikamunitos aswam epedorete aijaikin kesi agangat ka akiro nu ekotos kesi kanu aiswamaun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ega kokoru eyi esu e'yo eyini muzu sukulu'a ri pezu ri ma dria. Imbata kililiru e'yo onitani 'diyi ma dria ri eco atita azini o'dukoti eyini le 'diyi fe eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyi pezu kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi tibarikumanya gye ebi barikuza kwega omu mashomero gaabo. Okuhaburwa kurungi aha mirimo yaabo, nikibaasa kubaheereza obuhwezi n'amakuru agu barikwetenga, kugira ngu bacwemu gye.

eng_prompt: As the market continues to expand and evolve, many companies are seeking innovative solutions to meet growing demands. This shift has led to a surge in potential ventures and collaborations.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale kagenda mu maaso okugaziwa n'okukulaakulana, amakampuni mangi ganoonya eby'obuyiiya okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo okweyongerayongera mu bizineesi n'enkolagana.
ach_prompt: Ka cuk tye kamede ki dongo ki dongo, dul mapat-pat tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me cobo miti matye kamede. Alokaloka man okelo mede pa tic mapat-pat matye ka time.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit esokoni aiyatakin ka aijulakin, eutasi ikampunin luipu aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aitodolikin eipuda. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun aiyatakinio naka aswamisinei keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Cu ni mu drile tuzu azini zoria, amuti karakara eyi geri o'diru 'diyi nda e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ojata 'di fe ongmbo tujari 'yezu azini ti icita 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obutare ku burikugumizamu nibweyongyera, kampuni nyingi nizironda oburyo bw'okuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebirikuguma nibikura. Empindahinduka egi ereesire okweyongyera kw'obushubuzi n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Many people around the world adhere to various religious beliefs and practices. Among these, Muslims follow their Islamic teaching.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna banywerera ku nzikiriza n'enkola z'amadiini ez'enjawulo. Mu bano, Abasiraamu bagoberera enjigiriza yaabwe ey'Obusiraamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol I wilobo lung lubu dini mapatpat. I kin magi, cilam lubu pwony gi me cilam.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu kotoma akwap kere etupitos aiyuunikec keda iponesiokec luka idiinin luegelegela. Kotoma ngul, etupitos isiramun aisisianakineta kec nuka isiramun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi e'yo aitanisi azini 'yeta dini ni ndundu 'diyi ma vuti obi. Diyi ma eselea, isilamu eyi imbata eyini isilamu eyini 'diyi ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu nsi yoona, nibakuratira ediini zitarikushushana. Omuri ebi, abasiraamu nibakuratira engyesa yaabo ey'obusiraamu.

eng_prompt: In situations of civil unrest or large protests, law enforcement agencies often need to control crowds effectively. One of the methods they employ to disperse large gatherings is the use of teargas.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera z'obutabanguko mu bantu oba okwekalakaasa okunene, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byetaaga okufuga obulungi abantu. Engeri emu gye bakozesa okugumbulula enkungaana ennene kwe kukozesa omukka ogubalagala.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny onyo jemo madit tutwal, dul ma gwoko cik myero ogwok lwak maber. Yo acel ma gitiyo kwede me tyeko gure pa dano mapol obedo tic ki yamo ma nyamo wang dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka amumu arai bo aidiya naepol, ekot duc atukona nu ikisila aitikitik itunga ejok. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu itwasamaete kesi aisiarakin itunga luipu ngesi aitwasam ekwam lo itomonyi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alia kani ku e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alia, le 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma obi o'bi eyi kililiru. Geri azi alu eyini ayu okuta ongulumuru 'diyi erezu ri oli tiyagasi niri ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko omu bantu nainga okwesharinga kw'abantu baingi, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bishemereire kurinda gye abantu. Omuringo gumwe ogu barikukoresa okujanjaaza enteerane n'okukoresa omwika ogurikuriza emiziga.

eng_prompt: In discussions about law enforcement tactics, the use of force often comes under scrutiny. Many people question the appropriateness of extreme measures in situations involving civilians.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukodyo bw'okukwasisa amateeka, enkozesa y'amaanyi etera okwekebejjebwa. Abantu bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo mu mbeera ezirimu abantu ba bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom diro me keto cik itic, kitiyo ki teko I kare mapol. Dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ber pa timo jami mapat-pat I kare ma dano ata-ni tye I ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos iponesio lu ikisila, etapit duc airereonor aitosom agogongu. Mam itunga luipu ejenete ebe ibusakinit aitwasam iboro luitegelikina kotoma ojautene loimoriarit itunga lukatutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza geri 'ba azita ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, 'ba e'yo okpo ayuzu ri ma ale andri. Ba karakara eyi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi 'duzu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura ebikwatiriine n'okukuratira ebiragiro, okukoresa amaani nikukyeberwa. Abantu baingi nibabangaanisa oburingaaniza bw'okukoresa emiringo y'amaani omu mbeera ezirikutwariramu abantu ba buriijo.

eng_prompt: In many cultures around the world, places of worship serve as important community centers. One such place is a mosque, which holds significant meaning for its followers.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi okwetooloola ensi, amasinzizo gakola nga ebifo ebikulu mu kitundu. Ekimu ku bifo ng'ebyo ye muzikiti, ogulina amakulu amangi eri abagoberezi baago.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol I wilobo lung, odi lega gitiyo macalo kabedo mapigi tego I kin lwak. Kabedo acel ma kit meno obedo ot lega pa cilam, ma obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal bot luyee ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu kotoma akwap kere, iswamaete aiboisio nu ilipere kwape aiboisio nu epol ajokis. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio kangun erai emusikit, loejaasi keda ajokis naepol noi mama ejaasi iketunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma alea, pari inzizu 'diyi azi nga angu o'bi eyini okporu 'diyi ru. Pari alu 'dile 'diyi maskiti ru, ovupi orodriru 'ba eri ma vuti o'bi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi okwetorora ensi yoona, emyanya y'okuramizamu neekora nk'emyanya y'omugasho omu bantu. Emwe aha myanya egyo n'omuzigiti, ogurikwetengwa munonga abakurasi baago.

eng_prompt: In the line of duty, first responders face numerous risks while carrying out their missions. The nature of their work often exposes them to dangerous situations that can lead to physical harm.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'emirimu, abasooka okudduukirira bafuna obuzibu bungi nga bakola emirimu gyabwe. Engeri y'emirimu gyabwe etera okubatuusa mu mbeera ez'obulabe eziyinza okuviirako obuvune mu mubiri.
ach_prompt: I kare me tic, joo ma gimiyo kony me acel nongo peko mapol ikare me timo tic gi. Kit tic gi ipol kare terogi I peko ma twero kelo awano I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam, etereikina lu engarakinete sek keda atiokisio nuipu kapak kana aitodolikin aswamukec. Aswam kec einakinit kesi ajaut toma ojautene lo erono lo eyangauni aimusungeta.
lgg_prompt: Azi ma alea, 'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kopi 'diyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini azi eyini 'diyi 'yeria. Azi yini 'diyi ma wura ni eyi 'ba e'yo onzi eyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu eyi ma rua nya'biliko ejipi ra 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu mirimo, abarikubanza kugarukamu nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi baaba nibakora emirimo yaabo. Omuringo gw'emirimo yaabo nigubareetera kuza omu mbeera z'akabi ezirikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu mibiri yaabo.

eng_prompt: Engaging in violent confrontations can have severe consequences. It's important to recognize the potential risks associated with physical altercations.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bukuubagano obw'effujjo kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi. Kikulu okumanya akabi akayinza okuva mu kuyombagana.
ach_prompt: Donyo I tim gero twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma twero bedo tye ikare me lweny.
teo_prompt: Alomar toma akiro nuka amumu epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun atiokisio nuepedorete alomun kotoma ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco e'yo onzi eji ra. Eri orodriru e'yo onzi ecopi ecapi ngiringiri rua ma eselea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu butabanguko, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebintu bibi munonga. N'eky'omugasho kumanya akabi akarikubaasa kureetwa entongane.

eng_prompt: In many Muslim communities, spiritual guidance is often sought from respected figures. Among these figures, sheikhs play a crucial role in interpreting religious texts and leading prayers.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'abasiraamu bingi, okulambikibwa mu by'omwoyo kunoonyezebwa mu bantu ab'ekitiibwa. Mu bantu bano, bamaseeka bakola omulimu munene mu kutaputa ebyawandiikibwa by'eddiini n'okukulembera okusaba.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol pa cilam, dano mapol giyenyo kony me cwiny ki bot joo ma oywek. I kin dano magi, lutela dini timo tic mapire tek tutwal I gonyo coc me dini ki doro lega.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu nuka isiramun, etapit duc aimo aingarenikinio kama ejaasi itunga luejenara. Kotoma itunga lu, iswamaete sheiks aswam naepol noi kotoma aitetem akiro nuka ediini keda aingarenikin ailipasinei.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu isilamu eyini karakara 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi tutuni imbata esu engazu 'ba inzile inzi 'diyi vu. Ba 'diyi ma eselea, Sheikh eyi azi okporu nga e'yo dini ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini izita eyi ma driceza ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga by'abasiraamu bingi, okuhaburwa omu by'omwoyo nikukorwa abantu abarikuheebwa ekitiinisa. Omu bantu aba, ba sheikh nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kushoborora ebyahandiikirwe by'ediini n'okwebembera okushaba.

eng_prompt: In the midst of our busy lives, it's essential to carve out moments for reflection and connection. Setting aside dedicated time for prayer allows us to focus on our spiritual needs and deepen our relationship with the divine.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bulamu bwaffe obw'okukola ennyo, kya mugaso okufuna akadde okufumiitiriza n'okukwatagana. Okuteekawo obudde obw'okusaba kituyamba okussa essira ku byetaago byaffe eby'omwoyo n'okunyweza enkolagana yaffe ne Katonda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ki jami mapol me atima, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki kare me tam ki kubbe. Bedo ki cawa me lega weko waketo cwiny wa I kom jami ma wamito I yo me cwiny ki dongo watwa ki Lubanga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar wok naejaasi keda aswamisinei nuipu, ejokuna noi adumun apak naka aomoom keda arucokina. Aipikakin apak naka ailip ingarakini oni apodokinit ipudesia wok luka Edeke ka aitogogong eidicane wok keda Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Idri amavile 'diyi ma talasi, eri orodriru sawa 'duzu e'yo egazu azini yi ecizu. Sa'wa 'bazu kalaa Mungu ziza ma dria ri ni fe amani asi 'bazu afa amani le 'diyi ma dria azini ama ma eselea Mungu be ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara gaitu ag'emirimo mingi, ni kikuru kutunga obwire bw'okuteekateeka n'okukwatanisa. Okutaho obwire bw'okushaba nikituhwera kuta omutima ahabyetengo byaitu eby'omwoyo n'okwongyera omukago gwaitu na Ruhanga.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and disorder, individuals often feel threatened and vulnerable. As tensions rise, the potential for conflict increases significantly.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'obutabanguko, abantu batera okuwulira nga batiisibwatiisibwa n'obunafu. Obunkenke bwe bweyongera, emikisa gy'obukuubagano gyeyongera nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki kuku kuku, dano ipol kare giwinyo ni gitye ki lworo. Ka telle tye kamedde, gum me lweny bene mede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus acamanara, epupete itunga lukatutubet ekuriaka ido komamei agogongu. Arai iyata ingungeta, epolor apedor naka ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi sawa driasi yi etumu ori feza azini e'yo ewaru ma alia. Erita ako ka tu uru, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'obutabanguko, abantu buriijo nibahurira batiinisiibwe n'okuba abatarikwebaasa. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera, oburemeezi bw'entaro nibweyongyera munonga.

eng_prompt: In a world where order often teeters on the edge of disruption, the role of law enforcement can sometimes blur the lines between control and disorder. As tensions rise in the streets, one must wonder: can police sparkle chaos?
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obutebenkevu gye butera okutaataaganyizibwa, omulimu gw'abakuumaddembe ebiseera ebimu gusobola okufuukuula enjawulo wakati w'okufuga n'obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma rwom me kwo ipol kare pe ber, tic pa abili ikare mukene twero balo apoka-poka matye ikin bedo ki twero ki lweny.

eng_prompt: It's important to reflect on our choices and understand the motivations behind them. Embracing our decisions can lead to personal growth and a deeper understanding of ourselves.

eng_prompt: As we gather to discuss our strategic goals for the upcoming year, it's essential to align our efforts with a clear purpose. Understanding our core values will help us define our direction moving forward.

ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki peko mapol tutwal ki tam mapat-pat, cik ma doro ticwa tye ki tic madit tutwal I yubu kabedo wa. Niang tyen lok me gin maber ki marac konyo wa me bedo ki wat maber ki luwotwa kacel ki tic ma watye kwede I kom luwotwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda atiokisio nuegelegela keda aomisio nuegelegela, ainapeta nuengarenikinitos aswamisiowok iswamaete nuepolok noi kotoma aitolomun itunga wok. Amisikin nuka abeit keda akiro nuarokok ingarakinete oni aitodolikin eidicanekosi keda aswamisio wok mama ejaasi luce.

E'yo kililiru azini onzi 'diyi vazu ri ni ama aza ko e'yo ama eselea 'diyi ma dria tualu azi amani 'ye 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Understanding the dynamics of society requires a closer look at the various organizations that shape our daily lives. These institutions, often taken for granted, play a crucial part in maintaining order and providing essential services.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera entambula y'ekitundu kyetaagisa okutunula ennyo mu bitongole eby'enjawulo ebikola obulamu bwaffe obwa buli lunaku. Ebitongole bino, ebitera okutwalibwa nga ebya bulijjo, bikola omulimu omukulu mu kukuuma emirembe n'okuwa obuweereza obwetaagisa.

nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza entunguuka y'abantu nikyetengyesa okwetegyereza gye ebitongore ebitarikushushana ebirikukora aha magara gaitu aga buriizooba. Ebitongore ebi, ebirikukira kutwarwa nk'ebitari by'omugasho, nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obusingye n'okuheereza obuheereza.

eng_prompt: As a leading institution in higher learning, the University is committed to fostering academic excellence. Its mission includes offering a wide range of educational programs to meet the diverse needs of its students.
lug_prompt: Nga ettendekero erikulembedde mu matendekero aga waggulu, Yunivasite yeewaddeyo okutumbula obulungi mu byensoma. Ekigendererwa kyayo kizingiramu okuwa pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza ez'enjawulo okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abayizi baayo eby'enjawulo.

nyn_prompt: Nk'eitendekyero ry'eby'obwegyese ery'ahaiguru, Yunivasite eyehaireyo kutunguura eby'obwegyese. Ekigyendererwa kyayo nikitwariramu okuhayo puroguraamu z'eby'obwegyese ezitarikushushana, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abeegi baayo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in the number of young people pursuing higher education. This trend reflects a growing recognition of the importance of advanced qualifications in today's job market.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abavubuka abagenda mu matendekero aga waggulu. Enkola eno eraga nti abantu beeyongedde okutegeera obukulu bw'obuyigirize obwa waggulu mu nsi ya leero omuli emirimu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel bulu matye ka kwano I rwom ma malo omede tutwal. Man nyutu ni dano mapol dong gingeyo ber pa kwan me rwom ma malo I kare-ni.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kalafe 'ba ode eyini muzu onita uruleruri ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di ece kini 'ba eyi ega orodri onita uruleru 'diyiniri ma dria sa'wa 'disi.

eng_prompt: As high school graduation approaches, many students begin to contemplate their future educational paths. They often wonder about the various subjects and majors available to them in higher education.
lug_prompt: Ng'amattikira ga siniya geesembera, abayizi bangi batandika okulowooza ku misomo gyabwe egy'omu maaso. Batera okwebuuza amasomo n'emirimu egy'enjawulo gye basobola okusoma mu matendekero aga waggulu.
ach_prompt: Ka tyeko kwan me cinia cok, lutino mapol gicako tam I kom ngo ma gubi kwano I kare me anyim. Pol kare gipenye I kom subjects ki majors ma gitye kwede I gang kwan me rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ainapeta nuka angetakin esomero, egeunete esisiak luipu aomoom nu ebeit kesi aswam koingaren. Etapit kesi aomoom nuikamunitos aisisiaeta nuegelegela nu ejaas kesi kotoma asioman na okwap.

eng_prompt: The University actively engages in outreach programs and collaborates with local organizations. This commitment has fostered a strong bond between the institution and the surrounding community.
lug_prompt: Yunivasite yeenyigira nnyo mu nteekateeka z'okubunyisa amawulire n'okukolagana n'ebitongole by'omu kitundu. Okwewaayo kuno kuleeseewo enkolagana ey'amaanyi wakati w'ettendekero n'ebitundu ebiriraanyeewo.

teo_prompt: Iswamai eUnibasiti kagogong kotoma airiamun keda iriongeta luka atutubet. Aswam na ayangau eidicane loegogong kiding erionget keda itunga lu idunyasi.
lgg_prompt: Univasiti 'da ni azi nga okporu otita imbatani 'diyi ma alea dika eri azi nga amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. E'yo 'di eji ti ecita okporu pari onita ni 'da ma eselea ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Yunivasite eyejumbire munonga omu puroguraamu z'okuhutuura abantu n'okukwatanisa n'ebitongore by'omubyaro. Okwehayo oku kutungire enkoragana y'amaani ahagati y'eitendekyero hamwe n'abantu abarikwetorwaire.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, the community often turns to its leaders for guidance. Their wisdom and experience make them the ideal mediators in resolving disputes.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, abantu baddukira mu bakulembeze baabwe okufuna obulagirizi. Amagezi gaabwe n'obumanyirivu bibaleetera okuba abatabaganya abalungi mu kugonjoola enkaayana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, lwak pol kare gidok bot lutela gi pi kony. Ryeko gi ki ngec gi weko gibedo lutela mabeco me cobo peko matye ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka ingungeta, elosenenete itunga nejaas engarenok kec kanu aicoreta. Acoa kec keda amisiarakec einakinitos kesi araut lu epedorete aitemokin ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi, ongulumu eyi sa'wa driasi eyi oja eyi ma drice'ba eyi vu imbata esuzu. Ondua yini tualu nita yini be 'diyi fe yini ovuzu 'ba eselea kililiru 'diyi ru e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko, abantu nibaza aha beebembezi baabo kutunga obuhabuzi. Obwengye bwabo hamwe n'obumanyi bwabo nibabareetera kuba abarikukirayo oburungi omu kugonjoora entongane.

eng_prompt: In a recent meeting with the community, the villagers expressed their desire for better educational resources and opportunities. Recognizing the importance of collaboration, the village leader vowed to strengthen ties with local institutions.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'abantu b'omu kitundu, abantu b'omu kyalo baalaga okwagala kwabwe okufuna ebyetaago by'okusoma n'emikisa emirungi. Ng'ategeera obukulu bw'okukolagana, omukulembeze w'ekyalo yeeyama okunyweza enkolagana n'ebitongole by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki ki lwak, lutedero gunyutu miti gi me nongo jami ki gum me kwan ma beco. I nge niang ber pa winye, latela me caro ocike me jingo wat ki dule me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac keda itunga luka atutubet, apotu itunga luka ecalo itodutu eipudakec loka adumun iboro ka arerengesio nuajokak nuka asioman. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aiswamanara, abu engarenon lo ecaalo kisumun aitogogong eidicane keda iriongeta luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Dri fuza ongulumu eyi pie o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba calo 'da ma alea 'diyi ece ava eyini afa onita ni muke ndeni 'diyi esuzu tualu drileba eyini 'diyi pie. Erini e'yo orodri ti icita niri ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba calo ni 'da so oyo e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie.
