lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'amalwaliro ag'omulembe eri abasirikale b'amagye, abakungu ba gavumenti balangiridde okusiga ensimbi mu byobulamu by'amagye. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula omutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa abajaasi n'ab'omu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me nongo odi yadi ma rwom gi malo pi lumony, lutic pa gamente guwaco ni kibi keto lim madit tutwal I yub me yot kom pa lumony. Yub man tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kony ma kimiyo ki lumony ki lugangigi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka adekisia nuapolok nuka ajore, alimosi eswamak luka apugan ebe eponio aipikakin ikapun luipu toma amukian naka ajore. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar adoketait na amukian na ijaikitai isirikaalei keda ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi azi e'yo lezu lezu 'ba marani ni 'diyi ma esu arojo wura onyiru si 'diyi ma dria, 'ba lonyi vuti aleza angiri 'diyi 'ba arojo marani ni 'diyi ma alia. Asisile 'di lezu azakoma fele asikari eyini 'diyi ma eselea familia eyivile 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'amahe kutunga amarwariro ag'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, abakuru omu gavumenti barangirire okuta esente nyingi omu marwariro gaago. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okwongyera aha mutindo gw'obujanjabi oburikuherezibwa abaserukare hamwe n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: When discussing the quality of care and patient outcomes, it's important to focus on the services provided rather than the reputation of the institution. Ultimately, what matters most is the well-being of the patients and their experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi n'ebyava mu balwadde, kikulu okussa essira ku mpeereza eweebwa okusinga erinnya ly'ekitongole. Mu nkomerero, ekisinga obukulu bwe bulungi bw'abalwadde n'ebyo bye bayitamu.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka lok I kom rwom me kony ki adwoki pa lutwo, pire tek me keto cwiny I kom kony ma kimiyo me kaka nying ot yat. I agiki ne, gin ma pire tek tutwal obedo ber bedo pa lutwo ki jami ma guwok ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemitem adoketait na amukian keda eswamae lo adekak, ibusakinit apodokinit aijanakino na ijaikitai itia ekiror lo adekis. Kawasia, ibore yenepol noi ngesi aijar naka adekak keda akeswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara gbazu geri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri ma dria, eri orodriru asi 'bazu azakoma fele 'diyi ma dria aga pari arojo ni 'diyi ma ru si ri ma dria. Asizu, e'yo orodriru ndeni ri eri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma aa'ta muke ri azini e'yo eyini esu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nituhanuura aha mutindo gw'obujanjabi hamwe n'ebirikuruga omu kurwara kw'omurwaire, nikikuru kuta amaani aha buheereza oburikuheebwa okukira eiziina ry'eitendekyero. Ekikuru munonga n'amagara marungi g'abarwaire hamwe n'ebi barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: In a small town with limited resources, residents often struggle to find military supplies. As a result, the region has only one existing army shop.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono akalina ebyetaago ebitono, abatuuze batera okulwana okufuna ebyetaago by'amagye. N'ekyavaamu, ekitundu kirina edduuka ly'amagye limu lyokka.
ach_prompt: I taun matidi matye ki jami me tic ma nok, lutedero pol kare gi nongo peko me nongo jami ma mite pi mony. Macalo adwogi ne, but piny eni tye ki dukan pa mony acel keken.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi lo ikidioko iboro, etiono noi itunga adumun iboro lu ajore. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi aiboisit keda eiduka ediope bon loka ajore.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea afa ayuzaru 'diyi be werea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi dri ci afa ayuzaru asikari eyini 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi angu 'di ma alea dukani asikari eyini ri lu alu.
nyn_prompt: Omu tawuni nkye erimu eby'obugaiga bikye, abatuuragye nibarwana kuronda eby'okukoresa omu mahe. N'ekyarugiremu,ekyanga kiine eduuka y'amahe emwe.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial projections and current expenses, it became clear that our resources are limited. Despite the growing demand for our products, we face significant budget constraints.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya okuteebereza kw'ebyensimbi n'ensaasaanya eriwo kati, kyafuuka kyeyoleka bulungi nti eby'obugagga byaffe bitono. Wadde ng'obwetaavu bw'ebintu byaffe bweyongera, twolekaganye n'obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu mbalirira.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor byek me lim ki cente ma kitiyo kwede kombedi, onen atyer kamaleng ni lim ma watye kwede nok. Kadi bed ni miti me jami megwa tye ka medde, pud watye ki peko me lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aomisio nuka ikapun keda aitosom ikapun, apotu kojenutu ebe ikidioko iboro lu ijanakino oni. Karaida iyata eipuda lo iboro wok, itereikina oni keda ationis na ebajet.
lgg_prompt: Bani otita robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia tualu robia ayuza sawa 'disi 'diyi pie, eca e'da kililiru kini ama vu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe were. E'yo 'bani afa ama vile 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, ama dri fu e'yo ewaru bajeti ni 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enteebereza y'esente hamwe n'enshohoza eriho hati, kikarebeka butunu ngu eby'obugaiga byaitu tibirikumara. Oihireho okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'ebintu byaitu, twine eibura ry'esente.

eng_prompt: After several years of collaboration and support, the initiative aimed at providing resources and opportunities for refugees faced significant challenges. As a result, the partnership with international investors to help refugees has ended.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'okukolagana n'okuwagirwa, enteekateeka egenderera okuwa abanoonyiboobubudamu ebyetaago n'emikisa yasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, enkolagana ne bamusigansimbi okuva mu nsi endala okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu yakoma.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me winye ki kony, yub man ma obedo ki miti me miyo jami ki gum ki luring ayella onongo peko mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, winye ki lutim biacara me lobo mawoko me konyo luring ayela ogik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aiswamanara keda agangat, alosikinet naka aijaikin ikerai iboro keda arerengesio apotu kodumutu atiokisio nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, abu aiswamanara keda agwelanarak luka akwapin ace kanu aingarakin ikerai kongetakin.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia ti ecita azini atita fezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu azini drileba fezu emunyale eyidri ri esu e'yo ewaru eyi. E'yo 'disi, ti ecita 'ba lonyi vuti alezani engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie azakoma fezu emunyale eyini ri oko bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukwatanisa n'obuhwezi, ekigyendererwa ky'okuheereza empungi eby'okukoresa n'emigisha kikashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, okukwatanisa n'abashubuzi kuruga omu mahanga agandi okuhwera empungi kuhwaireho.

eng_prompt: The company held a press conference to share important updates. Following the event, details began to circulate among the media.
lug_prompt: Kampuni yabadde n'olukiiko lwa bannamawulire okugabana ebipya ebikulu. Oluvannyuma lw'omukolo, ebisingawo byatandika okusaasaana mu mawulire.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo ki kacoke pa luco lok angeya me nywako lok mapigi tego. Ingee yub eni, lok matut ocako kobo I kin lucoo lok angea.
teo_prompt: Abu ekampuni iriamunos keda lu iyemuto kanu aimor akiro nuitetiak. Akaulo naka epucit kangol, apotu akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun kogeutu aiwe kotoma oyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da 'ye e'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo orodriru 'diyi awazu. Yeta 'da ma vutia, e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi e'do eyi ere geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni ekakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru okubagana ebikuru. Bwanyima y'omukoro, ebirikukiraho bikatandika kujanjaara omu banyamakuru.

eng_prompt: Through various outreach programs and support services, the organization aimed to address the needs of local residents. As a result of their efforts, the community benefited from this organization.
lug_prompt: Okuyita mu nteekateeka ez'enjawulo n'obuyambi, ekitongole kyagenderera okukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze b'omu kitundu. Olw'okufuba kwabwe, ekitundu kyaganyulwa mu kitongole kino.
ach_prompt: Dul eni obedo ki miti me cobo miti pa lutedero kun gitiyo ki yub mapat-pat me konyo lutedero. Macalo adwogi me tute gi, lwak gunongo ber pa dul man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuegelegela nuka airiamun keda agangat, abu atukot ngin kopodokinit aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubet. Kanuka aswam kec, apotu itunga imedautu kanejai atukot kana.
lgg_prompt: Geri e'yo o'dukoti edrizu azini atita fezu 'diyi vusi, amuti 'da le ndra e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma aza ko. Okpo yini 'diyisi, ongulumu 'da esu orodri engazu amuti 'di vu.
nyn_prompt: Kurabira omu nteekateeka z'okuhutuura abantu hamwe n'obuheereza bw'obuhwezi, ekitongore kikagyezaho kukora aha byetaago by'abantu b'omubyaro. Ahabw'amaani gaabo, abantu bakagasirwa omu kitongore eki.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced families, various non-profit organizations have mobilized to provide essential support. Their initiatives focus on ensuring that children in refugee camps receive the necessary resources for healthy development.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'amaka agasengulwa ogweyongera, ebitongole eby'enjawulo ebitali bya magoba byegasse wamu okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa. Enteekateeka zaabwe ziteekeddwa ku kukakasa nti abaana mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu bafuna ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa okukulaakulana obulungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lugangi ma orwenyo gangi gi, dul mapat-pat ma pe jenge I kom biacara guribbe me miyo kony ma mite pi kwo gi. Yub meggi tye me neno ni lutino ma gitye ikabedo pa luring ayela gunongo jami ma mite pi dongo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka ikalia luekeriaka, iriamunos iriongeta lumam iswamaete ikapun kanu aijaikin agangat. Iswamaete kesi ngun kanu awanyun ebe idwe lu okabin edumununete iboro lu ipudasi kesi kanu apol najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti ndundu orodri kokoru 'diyi tra eyi atita fezu. Yeta yini 'diyi asi 'baza 'ba ndrezu kini anzi nyiri kembe emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi afa eyini lele zozu muke 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'amaka ogweyongyeire, ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe ebitarikukora amagoba, bikoreire hamwe kuhayo obuhwezi bw'omugasho. Enteekateeka zaabo nizigyenderera okureeba ngu abaana b'omu kampu z'empungi batunga eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa okutunguuka kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many local organizations have stepped up to support the integration of refugees into their new environments. As a result, these communities have seen various positive impacts from their efforts.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'omu kitundu bingi bivuddeyo okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu okwegatta mu bitundu byabwe ebipya. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bino birabye ebirungi bingi okuva mu kaweefube waabwe.
ach_prompt: Dul mapat-pat me tedero mapol gukati me konyo luring ayela me donyo I kabedo gi manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo magi gunongo adwogi mabeco mapol ki I tute gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu iriongeta luka atutubet igangakisi ikerai aimorikikin toma aiboisio kec nuitetiak. Kanuka ngun, awanyutu itunga lu iponesio luajokak lu aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti angu 'da ma alea karakara 'diyi efu atita fezu emunyale eyini aa'zu angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu 'diyi esu orodri ndundu eyi engazu okpo eyini 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'omubyaro bingi birugireyo okuhwera empungi kuza omu myanya yaabo misya. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu aba bareebire ebirungi bingi kuruga omu nteekateeka zaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing water scarcity in the area, a comprehensive survey was conducted to identify suitable locations for water extraction. As a result, twenty boreholes were constructed in the region.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbula ly'amazzi eryeyongera mu kitundu, okunoonyereza okw'amaanyi kwakolebwa okuzuula ebifo ebirungi eby'okuggyamu amazzi. N'ekyavaamu, nnayikondo amakumi abiri zaazimbibwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me nok pa pii matye kamede i kabedo eni, kikwedo piny tutwal me niang kama pii twero aa ki ie. Macalo adwogi ne, ki yubu tangi pyeraryo I but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ekadakada loka akipi kotoma aiboisit kangin, aponi itolosai aingic naepol noi kanu ajenun aiboisio nuepedorete aitolom akipi. Kanuka ngun, aponi odukoi agilon akaisarei katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ako angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, 'ba 'ye e'yo eti ondaza angiri angu onyiru 'bani ecozu yi nzezu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba si bowaholu kali iri angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi omu kyanga, hakakorwa okucondooza kwingi kumanya emyanya mirungi y'okwiha amaizi. Ekyarugiremu, za naikondo makumi abiri, zikombekwa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the dire conditions faced by displaced populations, a group of volunteers mobilized to address urgent health needs. Their efforts focused on implementing essential hygiene practices and infrastructure upgrades.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya embeera embi abantu ababundabunda gye basanga, ekibinja ky'abakozi ab'obwannakyewa baakungaana okukola ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu eby'amangu. Amaanyi gaabwe gaali ku kussaawo empisa z'obuyonjo ez'omugaso n'okutumbula ebizimbe.
ach_prompt: I nge niang kit kwo marac tutwal ma dano ma orweny ki I kabedogi tye ka kato ki iye, gurup pa dano ma gudyere guyube me miyo kony me yot kom ma mitte pi oyot-oyot tutwal. Tute gi obedo tutwalle me keto yub me gwoko lengo I tic ki medo rwom me gedo.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ejautene loaronon loetereikina keda itunga luekeriaka, apotu egurupu loka itunga luka aiyeyea kiswamata kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu. Apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu aitodolikin nuka aila ka aitojokar aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ni esuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, ongulumu 'ba owi'ba 'diyi tra eyi e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Yi ma okpo 'ba asi e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'bazu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, guruupu y'abarikwehayo kukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara. Amaani gaabo gakaba gari aha kuta omunkora emiringo y'obuyonjo n'okutunguura ebyombeko.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a clean environment is essential for public health. Effective hygiene practices play a crucial role in reducing the spread of infections.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obutonde obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'abantu. Enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo ekola kinene nnyo mu kukendeeza okusaasaana kw'endwadde.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo me kabedo ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal pi yot kom pa lwak. Gwoko lengo konyo totwal me gengo nya pa two.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aiboisio nu elaete ejok kanu angaleu na itunga. Iponesio luajokak luka aila iswamaete ejok kanu aitidisiar awea naka adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma tambazu alaru ri eri orodriru o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni. Yeta alata ni kililiru 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo azo eyi ma ereta ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Enkora nungi y'eby'obuyonjo neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling to make ends meet, they were beginning to lose hope. Just when they thought things couldn't get any worse, a surprise windfall arrived.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga balwana okweyimirizaawo, baali batandise okuggwaamu essuubi. Mu kaseera ke baalowoozamu nti ebintu tebisobola kweyongera kuba bibi, ekintu ekyewuunyisa kyajja.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi, gubedo ka rwenyo gen. I kare ma gubedo ka tamo ni jami pe twero doko rac tutwal, lim me awura obino.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu etiono aijar, apotu kesi kogeutu atwaniar amuno. Kotoma apak naewomitotor kesi ebe mam iboro epedorete ajokunar, apotu iboro luitegelikina kopotu.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini dri cizu yi ma ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, yi e'do asi'baza avi ra. Sawa yini egazu kini e'yo econi eca onzi ndeni ku ri ma alia, e'yo azi onyiru ni eca ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana okureeberera amagara gaabo, bakaba batandikire kubura amatsiko. Obu baabaire nibateekateeka ngu ebintu tibirikubaasa kweyongyera kuba bibi, haizireho obuhwezi bw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to clean drinking water is a significant challenge. To address this issue, residents have developed innovative methods to harvest rainwater.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo ag'okunywa kusoomooza kwa maanyi. Okusobola okugonjoola ekizibu kino, abatuuze bazuddewo engeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okukung'aanya amazzi g'enkuba.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, nongo pii maleng me amata obedo peko madit tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, lutedero guyubu yoo manyen me coko pii kot.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, adumunun akipi nu elaete erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomutu itunga iponesio luitetiak luka aituk akipi nuka edou.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, yi mvuza alaru ri esuzu ri eri e'yo azi ewaru ni i. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do geri ndundu eyini ecozu yi ozoo ni 'diyi trazu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa n'oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okukora aha nshonga egi, abatuuragye batandikireho emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okurundaana amaizi g'enjura.

eng_prompt: In many communities, safety concerns for women and girls have led to the establishment of guidelines aimed at reducing the risk of violence. As a result, local organizations often emphasize the importance of companionship when traveling in public spaces.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okweraliikirira eby'okwerinda eri abakyala n'abawala kiviiriddeko okuteekawo ebiragiro ebigendereddwamu okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'obutabanguko. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ebitundu bikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okubeera n'emikwano ng'otambula mu bifo ebyolukale.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lworo pi ber bedo pa mon ki anyira oweko kiketo cik ma tye ki miti me dwoko piny peko me tim gero. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me tedero ipol kare gi keto cwinygi I kom ber pa bedo ki lurem ikare me wot I kabedo ma lwak tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, aiyalongongo naka ayuwara naka angor keda apesur eyangaunit aitolomun ikisila lu ekotosi aitidisiar amumu. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos iriongeta luka atutubet ajokis naka ajaut keda ipaupa kapak kana alosit kotoma aiboisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, asi otiza e'yo agei tema ni oku eyini azini ezoanzi eyini ri fe 'bani azita eyi sizu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tutuni okpo fe orodri 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea eyini aciria angu o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okwerarikirira eby'okwerinda kw'abakazi n'abaishiki kireesireho okutaho ebiragiro ebirikugyenderera okukyendeeza akabi k'okunyangarazibwa. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'omubyaro nibikiriza omugasho gw'okukwatanisa waaba nootambura omu myanya y'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: As conflicts and crises continue to displace millions around the world, the urgent need for safe havens becomes increasingly apparent. It is essential that these individuals find stability and support in their new environments.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukuubagano n'obutabanguko bweyongera okusengula obukadde mu nsi yonna, obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebifo eby'obukuumi bweyongera okweyoleka. Kya mugaso nnyo abantu bano okufuna obutebenkevu n'obuwagizi mu bitundu byabwe ebipya.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lweny ki peko tye kamede ki kobo dano mapol tutwal I wilobo, miti me nongo kabedo maber tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal. Pire tek tutwal pi dano magi me nongo kuc ki kony I kabedo gi manyen.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ingungeta keda atiokisio airujasia itunga luipu kotoma akwap kere, apolor noi eipud loka aiboisio nu eyuara. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga lu adumun ainapakina keda agangat kotoma aiboisio kec nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ewaru ni 'diyi ni mu drile 'ba milioni karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ofuzu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi, le 'ba ma esu angu tambaza ni mbeleru ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, yasembayo okusalawo okukola ku bye yeeyama. Nga mumalirivu, yeeyama okutuukiriza ekisuubizo kye yali akoze.
