teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, abu ngesi kodum aitodolikin aisumunetake. Keda aomisioit naepol noi, abu ngesi kisumun aitodolikin aisumunetake.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asizu e'yo 'yezu e'yo erini owizu 'diyi ma dria. Asi 'baza be, so oyo e'yo erini owizu 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, ahamuheru akasharamu kukora aha biraganiso bye. N'amaani, akaraganisa kuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise.

eng_prompt: In any corporate environment, maintaining a safe and secure atmosphere is crucial for the well-being of employees and the protection of company assets. To achieve this, a dedicated team of security personnel is employed to oversee safety protocols and monitor the premises.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okukuuma embeera ey'obukuumi n'obutebenkevu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu bw'abakozi n'obukuumi bw'ebintu bya kampuni. Okutuukiriza kino, ekibinja ky'abakuumaddembe abeewaddeyo bakozesebwa okulondoola enkola z'ebyokwerinda n'okulondoola ekifo.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, gwoko kuc ki ber bedo obedo gin ma pire tek pi kwo pa lutic ki gwoko jami pa dul ne. Me cobo man, kimiyo tic ki dul pa lugwok ber bedo me doro cik me gwoko ber bedo ki bedo ki wang mabit I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni kere, aidar aiboisit na eyuara nes ejok kanu aijar naka eswamak keda ayuwara naka iboro luka ekampuni. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ejai etimu loka itunga luka ayuwara kanu aimaniman ainapeta nuka ayuwara ka aanyanar aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, angu ageitema ni ma tambazu ri eri orodriru azi'ba eyi ma edri ni azini afa amuti ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi 'ba angu 'da ma pamvu onezu azini angu 'da ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okurinda obusingye n'oburinzi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'abakozi n'eby'obugaiga bya kampuni. Okuhikiiriza eki, tiimu y'ab'eby'okwerinda eyekundiire, ekakorerwa okureeberera enkora y'eby'okwerinda n'okureebuuza emyanya.

eng_prompt: As the graduates gathered in their caps and gowns, anticipation filled the air. The audience settled into their seats, eager to hear the words of wisdom from the esteemed minister.
lug_prompt: Abaatikiddwa bwe baakuŋŋaanye nga bambadde enkoofiira n'engoye zaabwe, okusuubira kwajjula empewo. Abantu baatuula mu bifo byabwe nga baagala nnyo okuwulira ebigambo eby'amagezi okuva eri minisita ow'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwangi gucokke kacel ma guruko otokgi ki gomigi, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Lwak gubedo I kabedogi, ma cwinygi obedo yom me winyo lok me ryeko ki bot minista.
teo_prompt: Neautatar angetakinak asioman aimorikikin keda igoenakec keda ekootikec, apotu itunga luipu kopuputu aiyalama noi. Apotu itunga kiboikinos aiboisio kec, ekotosi aipup akiro nuka acoa kanejai eminista.
lgg_prompt: Ba onita univasiti niri depi 'bo 'diyi ni eyi tra eyi ma kofia azini gomesi eyi ma alea, asi 'baza ga angu 'da ma alea dria. Ba emu'ba 'diyi ri yi vile kiti alia ava be e'yo onduaru 'diyi erizu engazu minisita inzile inzi ri vu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abamazire emishomo yaabo, baketebeekanisa munonga. Abantu bakashutama omu ntebe zaabo, baine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebigambo by'obwengye kuruga owa minisita.

eng_prompt: It is crucial for society to recognize the pervasive issue of gender-based violence. We must stand united in advocating for the rights and safety of all individuals, particularly women.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo eri ekitundu okutegeera ekizibu ekibunye buli wamu eky'obutabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula. Tulina okuyimirira nga tuli bumu mu kulwanirira eddembe n'obukuumi bw'abantu bonna naddala abakyala.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lwak me niang peko me tim gero ikin mon ki coo matye kawot anyim. Omyero wacung kacelo I lweny pi twero ki ber bedo pa dano weng tutwalle mon.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga aijen ationis naka amumu na okalia. Ekot oni aimorikikina kanu aigang apedorosio keda ayuwara naka itunga, kacut angor.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru ongulumu eyini e'yo ngiringiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu. Le ama ma tu pa tualu a'di 'dizu drilemgbo azini ageitema 'ba dria ma dria tuni oku yi dri.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho munonga abantu kumanya oburemeezi bw'okunyangaraza abantu kurugirira ahakikura kyabo. Tushemereire kukorera hamwe kurwanirira obugabe n'oburinzi bw'abantu, okukira munonga abakazi.

eng_prompt: Despite his initial enthusiasm for academics, he quickly became distracted by the social scene on campus. As he fell deeper into the wrong crowd, his focus on his studies began to wane.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga mu kusooka yali ayagala nnyo eby'ensoma, yakwatibwako nnyo olw'embeera y'abantu ku ssettendekero. Bwe yeeyongera okugwa mu mikwano emibi, ebirowoozo bye ku misomo gye byatandika okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni I acakkine en onongo maro kwan tutwal, jami me gang kwan oketo tamme I kom jami mukene. Ka en omede ki donyo I kin lurem maracu, keto cwinye I kwan ne ocako doko goro.
teo_prompt: Karaida amina ngesi asioman, apotu itunga luko osomero kisibwoutu ngesi. Neautar ngesi aibiror keda itunga luarokok, abu apodokinit ke kotoma asiomanike kogeu aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu ava be onita ma dria okorisi ra ti, e'yo o'bi yini aa'zu pari onita ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eza eri mbeleru. Erini e'dezu ongulumu onzi 'diyi ma alia drile, asi feza erini onita ma dria ri e'do esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushemererwa kwe okw'okubanza omu by'obwegyese, akaruga ahonaaho yaata omutima aha bintu ebyabaireho aha itendekyero erikuru. Ku yaagumire naaza omu bantu ababi, okuta omutima aha mishomo ye kukatandika kukyendeera.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and differences, it's essential to foster a sense of unity and compassion. Embracing our shared humanity can lead to a more harmonious existence.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebisoomooza n'enjawukana, kya mugaso okukulaakulanya obumu n'okusaasira. Okukkiriza obuntu bwaffe obw'awamu kisobola okuleetawo okubeerawo okw'emirembe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki peko ki apoka-poka, pire tek tutwal me kelo ribe ki kica. Jolo kwo wa macalo dano acel twero weko wabedo ki kuc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio keda atiokisio, ejokuna aitopolor aimorikikina keda aitim. Aingarakin oni kwape itunga epedori ayangaun aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo ewaru azini esele coza be tre ri ma alea, eri orodriru ti ecita azini asi ndriza ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo amani aa'zu 'ba eyi pie ri ai'zu ri eco fe aa'ta amani aa'zu tualu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'obutakwatanisa, niky'omugasho kureetaho okukwatanisa n'embabazi. Okwakiira obuhangwa bwaitu oburikushushana, nikibaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote diversity and inclusivity, the University has implemented policies that welcome international students. This commitment to global education fosters a rich cultural exchange on campus.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enjawulo n'okuyingiza abantu bonna, Yunivasite etadde mu nkola amateeka agayaniriza abayizi abava ebweru w'eggwanga. Okwewaayo kuno eri ebyenjigiriza by'ensi yonna kutumbula okuwanyisiganya kw'ebyobuwangwa ku ssettendekero.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor bedo pat pat, gang kwan me yunibaciti oketo cik ma jolo lutino kwan ma aa ki lobo mawoko. Keto cwiny eni I kom kwan ma aa ki ilobo mapat-pat weko winye me tekwaro bedo tye I gang kwan pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloria aiboisio nuegelegela, etolomu eUnibasiti ainapeta nu ijaunitos esisiak luka akwapin ace. Alosikinet naka asioman naka akwap kere itopolori aineranara naka einono kotoma osomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ndundu eyi otuzu, University 'ba azita eyini sukulu anzi enga'ba kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ai'zu. Asi 'baza 'di onita wudrikurusi ndulu ri ma dria ri ni e'yo suruni 'diyi awazu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entuura y'abantu, Yunivasite eteire omu nkora ebiragiro ebirikwakiira abeegi kuruga omu mahanga g'aheeru. Okwehayo ahaby'obwegyese bw'ensi yoona, nikureetaho empurizagana y'eby'obuhangwa omu matendekyero.

eng_prompt: In the recent academic assessment, the results revealed a noticeable disparity in the performance levels of students. Specifically, the data indicated that male students outperformed their female counterparts.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya kw'ebyenjigiriza okwakakolebwa, ebyava mu kunoonyereza byalaga enjawulo mu nkola y'emirimu gy'abayizi. Okusingira ddala, ebiwandiiko byalaga nti abayizi abalenzi baakola bulungi okusinga abakazi.
ach_prompt: I kwed me kwan ma okato cokcok-ki, adwogi ne onyuto apoka-poka matye I rwom me timo peny pa lutino. Ki lok ada, lok ne onyuto ni lutino awobe gutimo maber loyo lutino anyira gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic naka asioman napac, apotu akiro kitodutu atiaketait naepol noi kotoma eswamae loka esisiak. Kacut, apotu akiro itodutu ebe eswamata esisiak lu ikiliok adepar lu apesur.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza sukulu lazu o'diru ri ma alea, e'yo efupi 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza ni sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma alea ri ra. E'yo nde ece kini sukulu anzi agupi ru 'diyi aga eyi ma agupi ezoanzi ru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma eby'obwegyese okwabaireho obwahati, ebyarugiremu nibyoreka entaaniso y'amaani omu kukora kw'abeegi. Okukira munonga, ebihandiiko nibyoreka ngu abeegi abasheija bakakora kurungi kukira abakazi.

eng_prompt: Growing up, we often faced challenges that tested our determination and resilience. In those moments, our father was always there to support and motivate us.
lug_prompt: Bwe twali tukula, twatera okwolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okwagezesa obumalirivu bwaffe n'obuvumu. Mu biseera ebyo, taata waffe yaliwo okutulabirira n'okutuzzaamu amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka dongo, pol kare wanongo peko ma temo tek cwiny wa. I kare meno, babawa obedo tye me cuko cwiny wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apolo, apotu sio adumutu atiokisio nu inwakunitos apodokinitwok keda atitingikinitwok. Apakio kangun, ajai papakosi noi aigang keda aisinyikokinit sio.
lgg_prompt: Engazu zozuria, ama fu dri e'yo ewaru ama asi 'baza azini okpo fepi 'diyi be. Sa'wa 'da eyi ma alea, ama ati ndra sa'wa driasi ama atita fezu azini ava fezu.
nyn_prompt: Obu twabaire tukura, tukaba tutunga oburemeezi obwabaire nibutugumira. Omu bwire obwo, taata akaba ariho kutuhwera n'okutugaruramu amaani.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of STEM education, the professor has been actively promoting the benefits of pursuing careers in science. His passion for the subject has inspired many young minds to consider their future in this field.
lug_prompt: Ng'ategeera obukulu bw'okusoma kwa STEM, pulofeesa abadde atumbula emigaso gy'okugoberera emirimu mu bya ssaayansi. Okwagala kwe eri essomo lino kukubirizza abavubuka bangi okulowooza ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso mu mulimu guno.
ach_prompt: I nge niang ber pa kwan me STEM, lapwony enoni obedo ka tyelo kor ber pa kwan me cayan. Mar ma en tye kwede pi lok eni okonyo lutino mapol me tam I kom anyimgi I tic man.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka asioman naka STEM, euta epurofesa aitopolor ajokis naka aswam aswam naka esayanis. Amina ke naka akirot ngin isinyikokit atumunak luipu aomoom nuikamunitos oingaren kec kotoma aswam kana.
lgg_prompt: Erini orodri onita STEM niri ma e'yo egazu risi, professor 'da ebi orodri 'bani fizu onita sayansini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo otu okporu. Leta erini e'yo 'di ma dria ri fe ava 'ba ode karakara eyini eyi ma egata ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'obwegyese bwa STEM, purofeesa atwire namanyisa abantu emigasho y'okutunga emirimo omu sayansi. Rukundo ei aine aha nshonga egyo, ehwereire eminyeeto mingi kuteekateeka aha biro byabo by'omumaisho omu murimo ogu.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing job market, the ability to think outside the box has become increasingly valuable. As businesses face new challenges and competition, innovative problem-solving is essential for success.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akakyuka amangu, obusobozi bw'okulowooza ebweru w'ekibokisi bweyongedde okuba obw'omugaso. Nga bizinensi zisanga okusoomoozebwa okupya n'okuvuganya, okuyiiya okugonjoola ebizibu kya mugaso eri obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tic tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki kero me tam I yoo mapat-pat dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. I kare ma biacara tye ka nongo peko ki pyem manyen, diro manyen me tyeko peko obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka aswamisinei, epol ajokis noi apedorit aomoom kopone kaloejok. Kwape etereikina ebiasara keda ainingosia nuitetiak keda abolobol, epolok noi aitemokin atiokisio kanu akerianut.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo egazu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria ri eca curu'do orodriru. Tujura yini dri fuzu e'yo ewaru azini baka seza be o'diru 'diyisi, e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu geri o'diru 'diyisi ri eri orodriru drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'emirimo biriyo nibihinduka munonga, okubaasa kuteekateeka ebitarikushushana nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Obu bizinesi zirikushanga oburemeezi obutsya n'okuhayahayana, okutereeza oburemeezi n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi.

eng_prompt: Establishing a conducive learning environment is essential for student success. To achieve this, careful consideration must be given to the location and design of the school.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo embeera ennungi ey'okusomeramu kya mugaso eri obuwanguzi bw'abayizi. Okutuukiriza kino, okufaayo kulina okuteekebwa ku kifo n'enkula y'essomero.
ach_prompt: Keto kabedo maber me kwan pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me cobo miti gi. Me cobo man, omyero ki tam matut I kom kama gang kwan eni tye iye ki kit ma kiyubu kwede.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun aiboisio nu isisiaere ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu esisiak akerianar. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ibusakinit airereonor ejok aiboisit keda epone loitemokinet esomero.
lgg_prompt: Angu onita ni muke ri ma e'dota eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini agata esuzu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le 'ba ma ega e'yo angu sukulu 'da ni aa'zu ri ma dria azini geri sukulu 'da ni sizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'abeegi. Okuhikiiriza eki, omwanya hamwe n'entebekanisa y'eishomero, bishemereire kuteekateekwaho n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that various factors can influence student outcomes in the classroom. One area of concern is the impact of teacher attendance on student learning and engagement.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti waliwo ebintu bingi ebiviirako abayizi okukola obulungi mu kibiina. Ekintu ekimu ekyeraliikiriza bwe buzibu bw'okusoma kw'abasomesa n'okwenyigira kw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni jami mapol twero weko lutino timo peny maber. Gin acel ma kelo lworo en aye adwoki me bedo tye pa lupwonye i gang kwan pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe ipu iboro luepedorete aitodolikin eswamae lo esisiak kotoma atukot. Adiopebon na epodokinitai ngesi epone loepedoriata isisianakinak ajaut osomero keda aisisianakin esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo ndundu eyi eco sukulu anzi eyi ma agata kilasia ri oja ra. E'yo azi alu asi otiza fepi ri eri e'yo imba'ba eyini muzu sukulu'a ri ni sukulu anzi eyi ma onita ma dria azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu hariho ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kureetera abeegi kukora gye omu kibiina. Ekintu kimwe ekirikwerarikiriza n'oburemeezi oburikuruga omu kwega kw'abegyesa aha kwega kw'abeegi.

eng_prompt: As enrollment numbers continue to rise and program offerings expand, the financial demands on the institution have increased significantly. Without additional resources, the quality of education and student services may be compromised.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abayizi gweyongera okulinnya ne pulogulaamu zeeyongera, obwetaavu bw'ensimbi ku ttendekero bweyongedde nnyo. Awatali bikozesebwa ebirala, omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'obuweereza bw'abayizi guyinza okukosebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel lutino kwan tye ka medde ki mede ki yub mapat-pat matye, miti me lim I gangi kwan ne bene tye ka medde tutwal. Labongo kony mukene, rwom me kwan ki kony pa lutino kwan twero doko goro.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka esisiak kosodete aiyatakin ainapeta, apolor noi eipuda loka ikapun kosomero. Arai emamei iboro lu iyatakitai, eponio aibiror adoketait na asioman keda aijanakin na esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba sukulu'a 'diyi ni tuzu drile azini otita onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, e'yo robia ni pari onita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu ra. Afa ayuzaru dika 'diyi kokoru, onita ma wura azini azakoma fele sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi eco ovu ewaru ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku omuhendo gw'abeegi gurikugumizamu nigweyongyera n'enteekateeka z'okwega kweyongyera, ebyetengo by'esente aha itendekyero byeyongyeire munonga. Hatariho eby'obugaiga ebyongyeirweho, omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese hamwe n'obuheereza bw'abeegi nibiija kugwa.

eng_prompt: As the academic year comes to a close, the anticipation builds for the upcoming graduation ceremony. Students and faculty alike are preparing to celebrate the achievements of the class.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'ebyensoma gunaatera okuggwaako, okweraliikirira kweyongedde ku mukolo gw'amattikira ogujja. Abayizi n'abasomesa beetegekera okujaguza ebituukiddwaako ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma mwaka me kwan tye ka tum, dano tye ki miti madit tutwal pi yub me kwero tyeko kwan matye kabino ni. Lutino kwan kacel ki lupwonye gitye ka yubbe me kwero jami ma lutino gukato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru loka asioman angetakin, epol noi aiyalama kanuka epucit loka alomun kosomero. Esisiak keda esisiak kes ekapanakinete ainumunum aitodolinikineta nuka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Eli onitaniri ni i deria, asi 'baza ma omgbo ni tu omu oku suzani emupi ri ni. Sukulu anzi eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie eyi otu eyi ayiko zu e'yo agapi kilasi eyi ma alea 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gurikuza kuhwa, okushemererwa nikweyongyera aha mukoro gw'okujaguza. Abeegi n'abeegyesa nibeteekateekyera kujaguza ebi ekibiina kyabo kyakozire.

eng_prompt: A prestigious event is set to take place this weekend, celebrating the achievements of women in leadership. Among the distinguished attendees, the first lady of Uganda will be the guest of honour.
lug_prompt: Omukolo ogw'ekitiibwa gugenda kubeerawo wiikendi eno, okujaguza ebituukiddwaako abakyala mu bukulembeze. Mu bakulembeze abajja, omukyala wa pulezidenti wa Uganda y'ajja okuba omugenyi omukulu.
ach_prompt: Yub madit obi bedo tye I tum pa cabit man me kwero jami ma mon otimo I tela. I kin joo ma gubedo tye, dako pa ladit lobo aye obi bedo welo madit.
teo_prompt: Ebeit aitolot epucit loajokan noi kosabiti kalo, ainumunum aitodolinikineta nuka angor kotoma eingarenone. Kotoma opucit lo angosibib, aberu napolon akwap ngesi ebuni araun epejonon lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Omu azi okporu ni nga pari 'du sabiti 'disi, oku eyini e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi inzizu. Ba inzile inzi emu'ba 'diyi ma eselea, oku purezidenti ru ri ni mu adri omu inzile inzi ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'ekitiinisa nigwija kubaho wiikendi egi, okujaguza ebirikubaasa kukorwa abakazi omu bwebembezi. Omu bantu b'ekitiinisa, omukazi w'omwebembezi w'eihanga naija kuba omugyenyi mukuru.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the day has finally arrived for the students to celebrate their achievements. Families and friends have gathered to witness this momentous occasion.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, olunaku luwedde okutuuka abayizi okujaguza ebituukiddwaako. Ab'enganda n'emikwano bakungaanidde okulaba omukolo guno omukulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, nino dong oo pi lutino kwan me kwero jami ma gutimo. Lugang ki lurem gugure me neno yub man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, adolu kwana aparan na esisiak ainumunum aitodolikineta kec. Apotu ikalia keda ipapero kotukokinos kanu awanyun epucit lo loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi anzuru ma vutia, o'du 'di asizu ca sukulu anzi eyini ayiko zu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Familia eyi tualu agyipika eyi pie eyi tra eyi emuzu omu inzile inzi 'di ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, eizooba ryahikire abeegi kujaguza ebikozirwe. Abanyabuzaare n'abanywani beeteeriine okureeba omukoro gw'omutaano ogu.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the auditorium is filled with excitement and anticipation as families gather to celebrate a significant milestone. Among the graduates, a special group of eight female students stands out, ready to embark on their next adventures.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kisenge ejjudde essanyu n'okusuubira ng'amaka gakungaana okujaguza olunaku olukulu. Mu batikkirwa, ekibinja eky'enjawulo eky'abayizi abawala munaana kyeyoleka, nga beetegefu okutandika emirimu gyabwe egiddako.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I ot lega ne I kare ma gangi mapol gugure me kwero nino ma pire tek tutwal. I kin lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwangi, gurup pa lutino anyira aboro ma gitye atera me cako ticgi mukene.
teo_prompt: Ileleba ejautene loka itunga luejaasi toma aiboisit naka airiamun keda aiyalama naarai atukonokin ikalia kanu ainumunum apakio nuapolok. Kotoma angetakinak asioman, egurupu loitegelikina loka esisiak nungor ikanyauni kes ekapakina ageun aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Angu jo ale aliza ma aliari ga ayiko si tualu asi 'baza be familia yini okuzu okuzu e'yo azi orodriruni inzizu. Sukulu anzi onita univasiti niri depi 'bo 'diyi ma eselea, sukulu anzi ezoanzi aro 'diyi ma eselea, ngonde e'dozu e'yo yini drile 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu kishengye eijwire okushemererwa n'okutegyereza obu amaka garikuteeranira hamwe okujaguza omukoro gw'amaani. Omu beegi abamazire emishomo yaabo, guruupu y'omutaano ey'abeegi abakazi munaana, beeteekateekire kutandika emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the students have successfully completed their coursework. Their commitment to excellence has paid off in a remarkable way.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, abayizi bamalirizza bulungi emisomo gyabwe. Obumalirivu bwabwe mu kukola obulungi busasuddwa mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, lutino kwan gutyeko kwan gi maber tutwal. Keto cwiny gi me timo jami maber okelo adwogi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, adautu esisiak angetakin aswamukec. Alosikinetekec mama ejaasi aswamisio nuajokak ejaasi keda ameda naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, sukulu anzi 'da eyi de kosi eyivile 'diyi drile suzaru. Eyi ma ava e'yo muke 'diyi 'yezu ri esu orodri eyi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abeegi bamazire kurungi emishomo yaabo. Okwehayo kwabo kukora kurungi, kurugiremu ebirungi bingi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, educational programs have increasingly focused on empowering female students. As a result, many have demonstrated remarkable dedication and talent in their academic pursuits.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza zeeyongedde okussa essira ku kutumbula abayizi abawala. N'ekivuddemu, bangi balaze obumalirivu n'ebitone mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me kwan oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyelo kor lutino anyira. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gunyutu miti ki diro me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, isingarenitos ainapeta nuka asioman aitigogong esisiak nungor. Kanuka ngun, itodunitos itunga luipu ainakina keda atalanta kotoma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, otita onita ni 'diyi 'ba asi okpo sukulu anzi ezoanzi ru 'diyi ma okpo engazu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'da ava feza azini feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi e'yo eyini 'ye sukulu'a 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, puroguraamu z'eby'obwegyese zigumire nizigyenderera okutunguura abeegi abaishiki. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi boorekire obweziriki n'etaranta omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: To succeed in his endeavors, he must develop a more analytical mindset. Embracing new strategies will enable him to tackle challenges effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mirimu gye, alina okukulaakulanya endowooza ey'obwegendereza. Okukozesa obukodyo obupya kijja kumuyamba okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti ne, omyero en obed ki tam me niang matut. Cako tic ki diro manyen bikonye me lweny i kom peko mapat-pat I yoo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu akerianar kotoma aswamisioke, ibusakinit ngesi aitolomun aomisio nuajokak. Aitodolikin iwaitin luitetiak ingarakini ngesi aitemokin atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu drile suzaru e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma alea, le ma esu egata kililiru ni. E'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri ni nga eri ma aza ko e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kusingura omu mirimo ye, ashemereire kugira ebiteekateeko birungi. Okukoresa oburyo obusya nikiija kumuhwera kurwanisa oburemeezi kurungi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing economy, it is essential for graduates to embrace innovation and entrepreneurship. By fostering a mindset of creativity and initiative, they can contribute to a more dynamic workforce.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo abayizi abamaze diguli okwaniriza obuyiiya n'obusuubuzi. Nga batumbula endowooza y'obuyiiya n'obuvumu, basobola okuyambako mu kukola abakozi abanyiikivu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lim tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwangi me cako timo biacara. Ka gi pwonyo dano me bedo ki tam manyen, ci gi twero weko lutic gi tiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ikapun, ejokuna noi angetakinak esomero aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak ka agwelanar. Kowai lo aitopolor aomisio nuka acoa ka aitolomunun iboro, epedorete kesi aitolomun eswamak luepedorete aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba onita univasiti niri depi 'bo 'diyi ni e'yo o'diru 'diyi 'duzu tualu tujari 'yezu. Geri 'bani 'ba eyi ma omi otuzu e'yo ndundu eyi edezu ri si, eyi eco fe azi'ba eyini aa'zu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikuhinduka juba, n'eky'omugasho abamazire emishomo yaabo okwetwa okujumbura n'okutandikaho emirimo y'obushubuzi. Kubarikutunguura emiteekateekyere y'okujumbura n'okutandikaho emirimo, nibabaasa kureetaho abakozi barungi.

eng_prompt: In response to growing student interest and industry demands, the university has been evaluating its curriculum. As a result, they have introduced new courses this year.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obwagazi bw'abayizi n'obwetaavu bw'amakolero, yunivasite ebadde yeekenneenya ensoma yaayo. N'ekyavaamu, batongozza amasomo amapya omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: Pi miti pa lutino kwan matye kamede ki miti pa lucat wil, gang kwan me yunibaciti tye ka ngiyo kit me pwonyo lutino kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, gukelo kwan manyen I mwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka esisiak keda eipud loka ikampunin, euta eunibasite airereor aisisiaeta ke. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu kesi ikoosin luitetiak okaru lo.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako sukulu anzi eyini tupi tu 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo okalamvu eyini le 'diyi pie, univasiti 'da e'bi otita imbatani eyini 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do kosi o'diru 'diyi eli 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abeegi kweyongyera hamwe n'ebyetaago by'amakorero, Yunivasite etwire neetegyereza enteekateeka yaayo y'okwegyesa. N'ekyarugiremu, batandikireho koosi nsya omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for diverse educational opportunities, the administration has been evaluating the current curriculum. As a result, the university will introduce more new courses in the future.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'emikisa gy'okusoma egy'enjawulo, abakulembeze babadde beekenneenya ensoma eriwo. N'ekinaavaamu, yunivasite ejja kutongoza amasomo amalala amapya mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kwan mapat-pat, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ka ngiyo yub me kwan matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, gang kwan me yunibaciti obi kelo kwan manyen I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman naepol noi, euta eyaitene airereor ainapeta nuka aisisia. Kanuka ngun, ebuni eunibasite aitolomun ikoosin luitetiak koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu drileba onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, driceza e'yo onita ni curu'do 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, university ni mu kosi o'di eyi e'do ewu drialeri ma alea dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'emigisha y'eby'obwegyese etarikushushana, abarikukurira eby'obwegyese batandikire kushwijuma enteekateeka y'eby'obwegyese eriho obwahati. N'ekyarugiremu, Yunivasite neija kutandikaho koosi nsya omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: A well-informed population is essential for the functioning of a democratic society. By equipping individuals with knowledge and critical thinking skills, education fosters responsible citizenship and social cohesion.
lug_prompt: Abantu abamanyiddwa obulungi ba mugaso mu nkola ya demokulasiya. Mu kuwa abantu amagezi n'obukodyo bw'okulowooza obulungi, ebyenjigiriza bitumbula obutuuze obw'obuvunaanyizibwa n'okukwatagana mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Dano ma tye ki ngec maber pire tek tutwal pi tela pa lwak. I yoo me miyo ngec ki diro me tam maber bot dano, kwan weko gibedo anywali matye ki twero ki ribbe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Itunga luejenete ejok eraas lu epolok noi kanu aswam naka aseo naka itunga. Kowai lo aijaikin itunga acoa ka acoa na aomoom ejok, isisianakinete itunga aswam ejok ka aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma nita kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ni azi ngazu. Afa feza 'ba yi dri ondua azini ondua e'yo egazu kililiru 'diyisi, onita ni 'ba eyi ma aa'ta onyiru azini aa'ta tualu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu kumanya gye n'eky'omugasho omu kukora kwa demokurasiya. Okurabira omu kuheereza abantu obwengye n'emyoga y'okuteekateeka kurungi, obwegyese nibutunguura emicwe mirungi n'okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Achieving academic success is crucial for students aspiring to further their education. Many high schoolers focus on their studies to enhance their chances of acceptance into prestigious institutions.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma kya mugaso nnyo eri abayizi abaagala okwongera ku buyigirize bwabwe. Abayizi ba siniya bangi essira baliteeka ku kusoma kwabwe okwongera ku mikisa gyabwe egy'okuyingizibwa mu matendekero ag'ettutumu.
ach_prompt: Cobo miti me kwan pire tek tutwal ki lutino ma gimito mede ki kwan gi. Lutino kwan me cinia mapol giketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom kwangi wek gumed gumgi me donyo I gangi kwan ma oywek.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin akerianut kotoma asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas esisiak lu ekotosi aiyatakin asioman kec. Esisiak luipu luka esinia epodokitos asioman kec kanu aiyatakin arerengusio kec nuka alomar osomeroi luejenara.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza onita ma alia ri eri orodriru sukulu anzi lepi onita drile 'diyi dri. Sukulu anzi sinia 'diyi ma pari yi asi 'ba onita yiniri ma dria eyini ani ecozu fizu pari onita ni okporu 'diyi ma alea ra beni.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obusinguzi omu mishomo n'eky'omugasho aha beegi abarikwenda kweyongyera aha mishomo yaabo. Abeegi baingi ba siniya nibata omutima aha mishomo yaabo kwenda kwongyera emigisha yaabo y'okwikirizibwa omu matendekyero ag'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: When provided with engaging activities and positive reinforcement, young learners often show a remarkable enthusiasm for their tasks. This intrinsic drive encourages them to put forth their best effort in various challenges.
lug_prompt: Abayizi abato bwe baweebwa emirimu egisikiriza n'okuzzibwamu amaanyi, balaga obunyiikivu obw'ekitalo mu mirimu gyabwe. Ekyo kibakubiriza okukola ekisingayo obulungi nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kumu.
ach_prompt: Ka kimiyo tic ma yomo cwiny ki cuku cwiny maber, lutino lutino ipol kare ginyuto miti madit tutwal pi tic gi. Miti eni cuku cwiny gi me keto tekogi weng I peko ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Karai ijaikino aswamisinei nu iswamaete ka aitogogongio, itodunitos idwe lu isisiaete eipud loka aswam aswamisinei kec. Isinyikokitos kesi aswam kagogong kotoma atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka sukulu anzi nyiri eyini 'yeta ndrizaru 'diyi fe azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otu, eyi sa'wa driasi ava e'da e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ni eyi eka okpo eyini 'diyi 'bazu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abato ku barikuheebwa emirimo erikushemeza n'okugarurwamu amaani, nibakunda munonga emirimo yaabo. Ekigyendererwa eki nikibahiga kutaho amaani gaabo omu buremeezi butari bumwe na bumwe.

eng_prompt: Many students enter university with a specific major in mind, but as they navigate their new environment, they often discover different interests. This exploration can lead to a shift in academic focus early in their college experience.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bayingira yunivasite n'ekikulu ekimu mu birowoozo, naye nga bwebatambula mu kitundu kyabwe ekipya, batera okuzuula ebyetaago eby'enjawulo. Okunoonyereza kuno kuyinza okuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu kussa essira ku by'ensoma nga bukyali mu bumanyirivu bwabwe mu ttendekero.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol donyo I gang kwan me rwom ma malo ki miti me timo gin mo, ento kace gitye ka wot I kabedo gi manyen, pol kare ginongo miti mapat-pat. Kwed man twero kelo aloka-loka I kom ngo ma lutino omyero guket cwinygi I iye I kare ma pud gitye I gang kwan me rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu elomanarete ounibasite keda epone ediope loka aisisia, konye kapak kana ajenun aiboisio kec nuitetiak, edumunenete kesi iboro luegelegela. Epedori aingic ngin ayangaun aijulanakineta kotoma asioman kapakio nuka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi fi univasiti'a e'yo azi eyini lele 'diyi ma dria, te eyini angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea ria, eyi tutuni e'yo ndundu eyi esu. E'yo eti ondaza 'diri eco fe 'bani asi 'bazu onita ma dria drioru e'yo eyini oni univasiti'a 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibataha omu yunivasite n'ekigyendererwa ky'okwega, kwonka ku barikugyenda omu maisho, nibatunga ebirikubashemeza ebitarikushushana. Okucondooza oku nikubaasa kureetaho empindahinduka omu by'obwegyese baaba bakiri aha itendekyero erikuru.

eng_prompt: With their limited budgets and busy schedules, University students often seek convenient dining options. As a result, eateries near campuses thrive on the steady influx of hungry students.
lug_prompt: Olw'embalirira yaabwe entono n'emirimu emingi, abayizi ba ssetendekero batera okunoonya ebyokulya ebirungi. N'ekivuddemu, eby'okulya okumpi ne kampusi bikulaakulana ku kuyingira kw'abayizi abalumwa enjala.
ach_prompt: Ki byek me lim gi matidi ki tic mapol tutwal, lutino kwan me Univaciti ipol kare gi yenyo yoo me camo cam maber. Macalo adwogi ne, kacato cam matye cok ki gang kwan pa lutino kwan tye ka dongo pien lutino kwan mapol tye ka kec.
teo_prompt: Keda ebajetikec loedit keda aswam naepol, etapit esisiak luka eunibasite aimo inyamat luepedorete kesi. Kanuka ngun, etopoloete iooterin lu idunyasi keda isomeroi kanu esisiak luejaasi keda etenge.
lgg_prompt: Yi vile bajeti weresi azini sa'wa yini ovuzu azi be tre 'diyisi, sukulu anzi univasiti ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri nyaka nyazu kililiru 'diyi nda. E'yo 'disi, angu nyaka nyazu pari onita ni 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi zo tu sukulu anzi abiriru 'diyi ma omgbo si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embaririra yaabo nkye hamwe n'obwire bwingi, abeegi ba Yunivasite nibaronda eby'okurya ebirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'okurya haihi n'amatendekyero, nibyeyongyera ahabw'okwija kw'abeegi abarikurwara enjara.

eng_prompt: In a thrilling match that showcased both teams' determination, Uganda faced off against South Sudan in the African qualification game. Fans were eager to see if Uganda could secure a crucial victory to advance in the tournament.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogw'essanyu ogwalaze obumalirivu bwa ttiimu zombi, Uganda yattunka ne South Sudan mu mpaka za Afirika ez'okusunsulamu. Abawagizi baali beesunga okulaba oba Uganda esobola okufuna obuwanguzi obw'amaanyi okusobola okugenda mu mpaka.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma oyomo cwiny ma onyuto miti pa team aryo weng, Uganda orwatte ki South Sudan I pyem tuku me Africa. Lucwak tuku gubedo ki miti me neno kace Uganda twero nongo loc ma pire tek me cito I pyem tuku ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naetapit noi na itodunit apodokinit naka itimun ngun iarei kere, abu Uganda kiteleka keda South Sudan kotoma abolia naka aboliasio nuka Africa. Akapakina egangitok aanyun arai epedori Uganda aitelekaar kanu alosit toma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ndrizaru amuti iri 'diyi ma asi 'baza e'dapi 'diyi ma alea, Uganda fu dri kari South Sudan niri be avita African qualification niri ma alea. Ba atita fepi 'diyi le ndra ndre kani kari Uganda niri eco agata okporu ni esu muzu abala 'da ma alea ra ya ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano gw'okushemererwa ogurikworeka amaani ga tiimu zombi, Uganda ekateera Sudan y'amashuuma omu muzaano gw'okusunsulamu abazaani kuruga omu mahanga ga Afirika. Abahagizi bakaba baine ekihika ky'okureeba yaaba Uganda neebaasa kutunga obusinguzi bw'amaani kwenda kugyenda omu mpaka.

eng_prompt: As a key player in the squad, Dennis has consistently demonstrated exceptional skills and leadership on the field. His experience and dedication have earned him the role of both goalkeeper and captain of the national football team.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzannyi omukulu mu ttiimu, Dennis bulijjo alaze obukugu obw'enjawulo n'obukulembeze ku kisaawe. Obumanyirivu bwe n'obumalirivu bimufunidde ekifo ky'omukwasi wa ggoolo ne kapiteeni wa ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere.
ach_prompt: Macalo latuku ma pire tek I dul tuku eni, Dennis onyuto diro ki tela maber tutwal I bar tuku. Ngecce ki tic matek ma en tye kwede oweko en odoko lamak golo ki lador dul tuku odilo me lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape abolian loepol noi kotoma otimu, etodunit Dennis acoa na itegelikina keda eingarenone loejok noi. Amisiarit ke keda aswam ke einakinit ngesi aswam kwape ekaman egolo keda ekaputein loka etimu loka emopira loka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba avitani okporu amuti avitaniri ma aliariru, Dennis e'bi sawa driasi e'da ondua azini driceza onyiru 'diyi pari avitaniri ma alia. Ondua erini tualu asi feza be fe erini ovuzu 'ba golo bipiriru azini kaputaini amuti kari ni mupira tuzaniri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omuzaani mukuru omu tiimu, Dennis atwire naayoreka emyoga n'obwebembezi bw'omutaano omu kishayi. Obumanyi bwe hamwe n'okwehayo kwe bimuhereize omurimo gw'okukwata gooro hamwe na kapiteeni wa tiimu y'eihanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigyere.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the players were eager to showcase their skills on the field. The entire community rallied behind them, hoping for a chance to bring home the trophy.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, abazannyi baali beetegefu okulaga obukugu bwabwe mu kisaawe. Abantu bonna mu kitundu baakungaanidde emabega waabwe nga basuubira okufuna akakisa okuzza awaka ekikopo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kom lutuku, lutuku ne gubedo ki miti me nyuto diro gi I bar tuko. Lwak ducu gugure I nge gi, ki gen me nongo gum me dwoko kikobo gang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, ekotosi aboliak aitodun acoa kec kosawe. Apotu itunga kere kimorikikinos kau kec, aomitos arereng naka ayangaun eikopo ore.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, anzi mupira avipi 'diyi ma ava ndra eyi ma ondua e'dazu pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea. Ongulumu 'da eyi tra eyi ma vutia asi 'baza be drileba esuzu eyi ma kopo ejizu akua.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abazaani bakaba baine ekihika ky'okworeka emyoga yaabo omu kishayi. Abantu boona baketeerana enyima yaabo, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kutunga omugisha gw'okureeta ekikopo omuka.

eng_prompt: In the national football league, teams compete fiercely throughout the season to secure their standings. The scoring system plays a crucial role in determining which teams advance to the playoffs.
lug_prompt: Mu liigi y'eggwanga ey'omupiira, ttiimu zivuganya nnyo sizoni yonna okusobola okukuuma ebifo byazo. Enkola y'okuteeba obubonero ekola omulimu munene mu kusalawo ttiimu ki ezigenda mu mpaka za 'playoffs'.
ach_prompt: I pyem tuku odilo me lobo, team tuku gi pyem matek tutwal I kare me tuku weng me gwoko rwom gi. Yub me nongo makci konyo tutwal I moko team mene ma obudonyo I pyem tuku odilo me agiki.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naka emopira loka akwap, eboloboloete itimun noi kotoma apak kere kanu aidar adoketaitikec. Epone loka ainom apointan erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma ajenun itimun luebeit alosit toma abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka
lgg_prompt: Amuti avita ni kari 'di ma alea omvele national football league ru 'diyi abala 'ye okporu sa'wa driasi eyini ani eyi ma pari ta mbazu. Geri 'bani golo eyi esuzu ri ni azi okporu 'ye amuti ngo eyi muzu avita avita ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu riigi y'eihanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigyere, za tiimu nizihayahayana munonga omu siizoni yoona kwenda kurinda emyanya yaazo. Enkora y'okuteera obubonero neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya tiimu ezirikugyenda omu mpaka za 'playoffs'.

eng_prompt: In a thrilling match that kept fans on the edge of their seats, both teams fought hard for dominance. With the score tied late in the game, the tension in the stadium was palpable as the players pushed for a decisive moment.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogw'essanyu ogwakuumira abawagizi ku mabbali g'entebe zaabwe, ttiimu zombi zaalwana nnyo okufuga. Olw'obubonero obwenkanankana ku nkomerero y'omuzannyo, obunkenke mu kisaawe bwalabika nga abazannyi banyigiriza akaseera ak'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma oyomo cwiny tutwal ma oweko lucwak gubedo iwi komgi, team aryo weng gulwenyo matek tutwal me loyo. Ki golo marom I agiki me tuku, lworo obedo tye I bar tuku pien lutuku gubedo ka tute matek me nongo kare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naetapit noi najalakinit egangitok aiboisio kec, apotu itimun kere ojioto noi kanu aipuga. Keda aimorikikina naka igolon kotoma abolia kangin, apotu itunga luka aboliasio kojenutu aiyalongong naarai apotu aboliak kopedosi adumun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ndrizaru 'ba atita fe'baa 'diyi 'bapi yi vile kiti dria, amuti iri 'diyi 'di a'di okporu okpo esuzu. E'yo mupira avizu 'diyi ma esele cozu tualuri be, asi omiza pari avita avizu 'da ma alea ri e'da 'ba avita avipi 'diyi ni okpo 'bazu sa'wa 'bani mupira avizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano ogwabaire nigushemeza abahagizi, tiimu zombi zikarwana munonga kwebembera. Ahabw'okugira ngu goora ekaba eri emwe aha muheru gw'omuzaano, obunkenke omu kishayi bukaba nibureebeka, abazaani barikugyenderera obwire bw'okusharamu.

eng_prompt: The excitement is building as teams prepare for the upcoming African cup qualification matches. Fans are eagerly anticipating the showdown between Uganda and Rwanda, which promises to be a thrilling encounter.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyeyongera nga ttiimu zeetegekera emipiira egijja egy'okusunsulamu abalizannya ekikopo kya Afirika. Abawagizi beesunga nnyo omupiira wakati wa Uganda ne Rwanda ogusuubiza okuba ogw'essanyu.
ach_prompt: Yomcwiny tye ka mede ikare ma team mapat-pat tye ka yubbe pi pyem tuku odilo me tuku odilo me lobo Afrika matye kabino ni. Lucwak tuku gitye ki miti madit tutwal me neno tuku matye I kin Uganda ki Rwanda, ma ocikke me bedo tuku ma yomo cwiny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejai aiyalama naepol noi kotoma aitemonokin etimu kanuka aboliasio nuka eikopo loka Africa. Ekapakina egangitok abolia kiding Uganda keda Rwanda, naewomit ebe eraun airiamunet naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko ni tu amuti avita ni 'diyi otuta 'yeria abala emupi 'diyi avizu kopo Africani 'diyi ma alia. Ba atita fepi 'diyi avasi a'bala kari Uganda niri ma eselea kari Rwanda niri be ri te.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa kuriyo nikweyongyera obu tiimu ziri kwetebeekanisiza emizaano y'okusunsulamu abazaani kuzaana ekikopo kya Afirika. Abahagizi beine ekihika ky'okureeba omuzaano oguri ahagati ya Uganda na Rwanda, ogurikworeka ngu niguza kuba ogw'okushemeza.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing concerns about student safety and health regulations, the government held an emergency meeting to discuss the future of school sports. After careful consideration, the minister made a crucial decision regarding the upcoming events.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku mateeka agakwata ku bulamu n'obukuumi bw'abayizi, gavumenti yatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okuteesa ku biseera eby'omumaaso eby'emizannyo gy'essomero. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, minisita yakola okusalawo okw'amaanyi ku bikwata ku bintu ebyali bigenda okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo matye I kom cik me gwoko kwo ki yot kom pa lutino kwan, gamente obedo ki kacoke me atura me nywako lok I kom anyim pa tuku me gangi kwan. Ingee tam matut, minista omoko tam mapire tek tutwal I kom jami matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naikamunit ayuwara keda angaleu naka esisiak, abu apugan kitolomu airiamunet naka atipet kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aboliasio nuka isomeroi koingaren. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu eminista kiswama aseunet naepol noi naikamunit nu ebeit atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza mupi drile e'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma tambaza azini alata ma dria 'diyisi, gamete 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo onzezu ewu drialeri ma alea e'yo avita eyini sukulu'a 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, minisita 'da 'du peta okporu e'yo emupi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho aha biragiro by'okwerinda n'eby'amagara g'abeegi, gavumenti ekakora orukiiko rw'amaani kuhanuura aha biro by'omumaisho eby'emizaano y'amashomero. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, minisita akakora encwamu y'amaani aha bikwatiraine n'ebintu ebyabaire nibiza kubaho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the popularity of football in Uganda has surged, leading to a greater emphasis on nurturing young players. As a result, various organizations have established programs aimed at honing the skills of aspiring athletes.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuganzi bw'omupiira mu Uganda bweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okussa essira ku kukuza abazannyi abato. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bitaddewo pulogulaamu ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obukugu bw'abazannyi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yweka pa tuku odilo I lobo Uganda omede tutwal, ma oweko kimedo tek me pwonyo lutuku matino. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat guyubu yub me pwonyo lutuko matye ki miti me donyo I pyem ngwec.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin ajenara naka abolia naka emopira ko Uganda, eyangaunit apodokinit aitopoloun aboliak ludidika. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu iriongeta luegelegela ainapeta nuka aitutuonor acoa naka akerak lu ekotosi akerit.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani mupira tuzari avizu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri tu ra, dika eri fe 'bani asi 'bazu 'ba ode mupira avipi 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'disi, amuti ndundu eyi e'do otita eyi lezu 'ba lepi ongu onzu'ba 'diyi ma ondua otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, omuhendo gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere omu Uganda gweyongyeire, ekirikureetera abantu kuta amaani omu kutendeka abazaani bato. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bingi bitandikireho puroguraamu ezirikugyenderera okutunguura emyoga y'abazaani.

eng_prompt: Injuries are a common risk in contact sports, often leading to significant consequences for athletes. When a player is not at their physical best, it can impact the entire team's dynamics and strategy.
lug_prompt: Obuvune bubeera mu katyabaga mu mizannyo egikwatagana, ekitera okuvaako ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri bannabyamizannyo. Omuzannyi bw'atabeera bulungi mu mubiri, kisobola okukosa enkola ya ttiimu yonna n'obukodyo bwayo.
ach_prompt: Awano obedo peko madit tutwal I pyem tuku mapat-pat, ma pol kare kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom lungwec. Ka latuku pe tye I rwom me komgi maber, man twero balo kit ma dul tuku weng tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi amusungut keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma aboliasio nuegelegela, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi akerak. Arai mam abolian iswamai ejok, epedori ngin aitolitol epone loiswamai etimu.
lgg_prompt: Nya'biliko eyi e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi sa'wa driasi avita eyi ma alea, dika eyi e'yo onzi eyi eji 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi dri. Ba avitani ka adri yi ma rua onyiru ku, eri eco amuti 'da ma geri avita ni 'diyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Obuhuta n'oburemeezi bw'amaani omu mizaano erikukwata aha bantu, ekirikukira kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha bazaani b'emizaano. Omuzaani ku arikuba ataine mubiri murungi, nikibaasa kurabanisamu amaani n'obukodyo bwa tiimu yoona.

eng_prompt: In the high-stakes world of professional sports, athletes constantly push their bodies to the limit. However, the risk of serious injury looms over every game, threatening their dreams and livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyemizannyo eby'ekikugu, bannabyamizannyo buli kaseera banyigiriza emibiri gyabwe okutuuka ku nkomerero. Newankubadde, obulabe bw'obuvune obw'amaanyi buli mu buli muzannyo, nga bukosa ebirooto byabwe n'okweyimirizaawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem tuku madongo tutwal, lungwec ipol kare gibito komgi tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, gum me nongo awano mapol tye I ngee tuku weng, ma balo lekgi ki kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi naka aboliasio nuka ipirioitin, etapit akerak duc aitobwot akuanakec kitoni adoketait naepol noi. Konye, ejai ationis na amusungut naepol noi kotoma aboliasio kere, aimusung airujasiakec keda aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma alia, 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi sawa driasi yi ma rua ombe kpere okpo alia. Kani si, e'yo nya'biliko onzi ni 'diyi ma e'yo ni emu avita dria eyi ma alea, e'yo eyi ma orobi azini geri eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi ezazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'emizaano y'abakugu, abairuki nibasindika emibiri yaabo kuhika aha muheru. Kwonka, akabi k'obuhuta bw'amaani, nikabaho omu mizaano yoona, ekirikuteganisa ebirooto byabo hamwe n'entatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, strict measures have been implemented to ensure the safety of players and staff. As a result, all sporting events will be held without an audience.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, ebiragiro ebikakali biteekeddwawo okukakasa obukuumi bw'abazannyi n'abakozi. N'ekyavaamu, emizannyo gyonna gijja kubaawo awatali balabi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, kiketo yoo matek tutwal me gwoko lutuku ki lutic. Macalo adwogi ne, tuku weng bibedo labongo lunen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, aponi ibwaikinai ikisila lu ededeng kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara aboliak keda eswamak. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitolot aboliasio kere komamete itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba avita avipi 'diyi azini azi'ba eyi ma agei tema kililiru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga e'yo dria avita ni 'diyi 'ye 'ba emu'ba 'diyi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, hatirweho enkora y'amaani okurinda abazaani n'abakozi. N'ekyarugiremu, emizaano yoona neija kubaho hatariho abareebi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the team's activities, officials uncovered evidence of unethical practices. The integrity of the sport was called into question, leading to severe consequences for those involved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku bikolwa bya ttiimu, abakungu baazuula obujulizi ku bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa. Obwesimbu bw'omuzannyo bwabuusibwabuusibwa, ekiviiriddeko ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abo abeenyigiddemu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom tic pa dul enoni, lutic gunongo lanyut me tim maraco. Kibedo ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo pa tuku ne, man okelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom joo ma obedo I iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos aswamisio nuka etimu, apotu eswamak kodumutu aitogogongoret naka aswamisio nuarokok. Aponi kitepesenai ajokis naka abolia ngin, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok nejaas ngul lu ajaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'bani 'ye amuti 'da ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba eyi esu e'yo ecopi e'dapi kini eyi 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi. E'yo avita 'da ma adriza kililiru ri 'ba zita ma alea, e'yo 'da fe 'ba avita 'da ma alea 'diyi dri e'yo onzi eyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga emirimo ya tiimu, abakuru bakareeba obuhame oburikworeka ngu tibarikukuratira emicwe mirungi. Omuringo murungi gw'omuzaano gukaba gutarikwetegyerezibwa, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi by'amaani ahari abo abaabaire bejumbiremu.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous selection process that evaluated numerous candidates, the finalists for the prestigious journalism award were announced. The anticipation in the room was palpable as everyone awaited the council's decision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsulwamu okw'amaanyi okwekenneenya abesimbyewo abangi, abasembayo okuwangula awaadi y'amawulire ey'ekitiibwa baalangirirwa. Obweraliikirivu mu kisenge bwali bweeyoleka nga buli omu alindirira okusalawo kw'olukiiko.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me yer matek tutwal ma obedo ka ngiyo nying dano mapol, kimiyo ngec bot jo ma onongo gumito nongo mic me kwano lok angeya. Gen obedo tye ikin lwak ikare ma dano weng obedo kakuru tam pa kancil.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainapeta nuka aseo naepol noi, aponi kolimorai ngul lueboloboloete kanuka ainakinet naka airot iyemuto. Apotu itunga luka atukot kojaikinos keda aiyalongong najaar itunga kere aidar aseunet naka ekansulo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba karakara eyi opezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'ba pa so'baa asizu dria dria 'ba osisia ni okporu 'diyiniri ma alea 'diyi azi. Asi 'baza jo ale aliza ma alia ri ndra e'dazaru 'ba dria ni e'yo council ni 'dule ri te ria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukuratira omuringo gw'amaani ogw'okutoorana abantu abaabaire beesimbireho, ab'ahamuheru b'ekirabo ky'amahurire eky'ekitiinisa bakarangirirwa. Okutekateka omu kishengye kukarebeka buri omwe arikutegyereza okusharamu kw'akakiiko.

eng_prompt: Many universities emphasize the importance of physical fitness and teamwork among their students. As a result, they organize various athletic competitions each year.
lug_prompt: Zi ssettendekero nnyingi zissa essira ku bukulu bw'okuba n'omubiri omulungi n'okukolera awamu mu bayizi baazo. N'ekivuddemu, bategeka empaka z'emizannyo ez'enjawulo buli mwaka.
ach_prompt: Univaciti mapol gicuku cwiny lutino kwan me bedo ma komgi yot ki tic kacel. Macalo adwogi ne, giyubu pyem ngwec mapat-pat mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Iunibasitin luipu isinyikokitos esisiak aswam nepepe. Kanuka ngun, itemonokinete kesi abolobol naka akerit kangolikaru.
lgg_prompt: Univasiti karakara eyi okpo fe e'yo rua ma tambaza ni azini azi ngazu tualu sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, yi abala ongu onzuzani 'diyi otu eli vusi.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero ga Yunivasite maingi nigashagika omugasho gw'okugira amagara marungi n'okukorera hamwe omu beegi baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatebekanisa empaka z'okwiruka ezitarikushushana buri mwaka.

eng_prompt: Many local football clubs struggle to provide adequate facilities for their players and fans. As a result, the quality of the game is often compromised.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu z'omupiira ez'omu kitundu nnyingi zirwana okuwa abazannyi baazo n'abawagizi ebintu ebimala. N'ekivuddemu, omutindo gw'omuzannyo gutera okukosebwa.
ach_prompt: Team me tuku odilo mapol gitye ki peko me miyo jami ma mite pi lutuku gi ki lucwakgi. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me tuku ipol kare bedo piny.
teo_prompt: Ikilabun luipu luka emopira luka atutubet etionikinit aijaikin aboliak kec keda egangitok aiboisio nuedolitos. Kanuka ngun, etapit adoketait naka abolia aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Amuti avita mupira tuzani angu 'da ma alea karakara 'diyi dri ci afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'ba avita avipi eyivile 'diyini azini 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, avita ma wura ni sawa driasi eca ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Kiraabu nyingi z'omupiira gw'ebigyere nizirwana kureberera abazaani baazo n'abahagizi baazo. N'ekyarugiremu, omutindo gw'omuzaano nigukyendeera.

eng_prompt: As the current season came to a close, teams began evaluating their performances and identifying gaps in their rosters. With the transfer window approaching, clubs were eager to make strategic moves to bolster their squads.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni eno egenda okuggwaako, ttiimu zaatandika okwekenneenya omutindo gwazo n'okuzuula ebituli mu lukalala lwazo. Nga akatale k'abazannyi kasembera, ttiimu zaali zeesunga okukola enteekateeka ey'okunyweza ttiimu zaago.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kare me tuku eni cok tum, tim ocako ngiyo kit ma gutimo kwede ki bene niang kama peko tye iye. I kare ma kare me kobo lutuku tye cok, dul tuku mapat-pat onongo tye ki miti me timo jami mapat-pat me jingo dul tuku gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aboliasio nuka apakio nu, apotu itimun kogeutu airereor eswamae kec ka ajenun aiboisio nuejaasi toma aiwadikaeta kec. Neyapiete apak naka aijulakin aboliak, ekotosi ikilabun aswam nuepedorete kesi aitogogong itimunukec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa avita ni curu'do ri ni i deria, amuti avita ni 'diyi e'do eyi ma agata ma ale andri dika eyi e'do e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esu. Sawa 'bani 'ba eyi ojazu amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ma alea ri ni ecazu ogogo risi, amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ndra avasi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu eyi ma amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ma okpo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Sizoni eriho obwahati ku yaahikire aha muheru, tiimu zikatandika kushwijuma emikorere yaazo n'okureeba oburemeezi oburi omu rukarara rwazo. Obwire bw'okuhindura abazaani ku bwabaire buri haihi kuhika, za kiraabu zikaba ziine ekihika ky'okwongyera amaani omu tiimu zaabo.

eng_prompt: In many communities, church leaders are often seen as pillars of support and guidance. Their roles typically foster respect and trust, making them unlikely targets for criminal activity.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi abakulembeze b'ekkanisa batwalibwa ng'empagi ez'obuyambi n'okulungamya. Emirimu gyabwe gitera okuleetawo ekitiibwa n'obwesige, ekibaleetera okuba abateesebwako ebikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lutela me kanica ipol kare kineno gi macalo guti me kony ki tira. Tic gi ipol kare kelo woro ki gen, ma weko gibedo dano ma lutim bal pe twero keto cwinygi I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, esesenete duc engarenok lu ekanisa kwape atutubena nuigangitos ka aicoreta. Aswamisinei kec eyangaunenete ayongit ka amunokina, ijaikini kesi mam epedorete aimusung itunga luepedorete aswam nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ndre ekile 'ba atita fepi azini imbata fepi 'diyi ru. Azi yini 'diyi tuni inzita azini asi'baza eji, fe yini ovuzu 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, abeebembezi b'ekanisa nibareebwa nk'enkingi y'obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza. Emirimo yaabo neetuma abantu babaheereza ekitiinisa n'obwesigwa, ekirikubareetera kutakwatwa enkozi z'ebibi.

eng_prompt: Concerned about the rising crime rates and recent incidents in the neighborhood, the bishop called for a meeting with local authorities. During the discussion, he emphasized the need for increased security to ensure the safety of the community.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera mu kitundu, omulabirizi yayita olukungaana n'abakulira ebyalo. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo, yakkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okwongera ku by'okwerinda okukakasa obukuumi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo madit tutwal I kom rwom me timo bal matye kamede I kabedo enoni, laneno olwongo kacoke ki lutela me tedero. Ikare me nywako lok, en owaco ni omyero kimed rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka abilibilio naka ikisila keda abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma aiboisit, abu ebisop kolimok airiamun keda apedorosio nuka atutubet. Kotoma opeget, abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka aiyatakin ayuwara kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo azita onyoza ma ongmbo tupi tupi azini e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma dria risi, bisopi omve mitingi drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Sawa agbatara nirisi, eri 'ba asi e'yo lezu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma ageyi tezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu byaro, bishopu akeeta orukiiko n'ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. Omu kuhanuura, akongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda kugira ngu abantu bagume baine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In a world where information is readily available, many individuals seek guidance from those they trust. Unfortunately, not all of these guides have the best intentions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli amawulire amangi, abantu bangi banoonya okulambikibwa okuva mu abo be beesiga. Eky'ennaku, abalambika bano bonna tebalina bigendererwa birungi.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani o'duko esuzu mbeleru ri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi imbata nda engazu 'ba eyini a'i 'diyi vu. Drile onziru, 'ba dria drice'ba 'diyi ma egata ovuni onyiru ku.

eng_prompt: In our diverse society, various faiths and beliefs coexist, each contributing to the cultural fabric of the nation. As a result, the influence of spirituality is evident in many communities.

ach_prompt: I kabedo wa mapat-pat, dini ki niyee mapat-pat bedo tye, acel-acel kelo tekwaro me lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me woro lubanga nen I kabedo mapol.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, allegations of misconduct surfaced within the congregation. As a result, some church leaders were sent to court.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, okulumiriza kw'enneeyisa embi kwabalukawo mu kibiina. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa abamu baasindikibwa mu kkooti.

lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, ttiimu teyasobodde kukungaana mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe okwali kutegekeddwa. N'ekyavaamu, olukungaana lwasazibwamu.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing concerns about the weather, the team felt it was crucial to discuss the upcoming project deadlines. They believed that face-to-face communication was essential for addressing the challenges ahead.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okweraliikirira kungi ku mbeera y'obudde, ttiimu yawulira nga kikulu nnyo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnaku z'omwezi za pulojekiti ezijja. Baalowooza nti empuliziganya eya maaso ku maaso yali ya mugaso nnyo mu kugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lworo tye kamede pi peko me piny, dul ne otamo ni pire tek tutwal me nywako lok I kom nino me agiki pa yub matye kabino ni. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni lok wang ki wang pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata aiyalongongo kanu ekuse loka ikwamin, apotu itimun kowomitos ebe ejokuna aitemitem apakio nu ebeit aitodolikin epurojekt. Iyuunitos kesi ebe epolok noi einer oreet oreet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuejaas ngaren.

eng_prompt: The team was eagerly preparing for the discussion, but an unexpected notification popped up on everyone's screens. Confusion spread as the message indicated that the meeting had been cancelled at the last minute.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yabadde yeetegekera okukubaganya ebirowoozo, naye obubaka obwabadde tebusuubirwa bwajja ku sikulini za buli omu. Okutabulwa kwabuna ng'obubaka bulaga nti olukungaana lwasazibwamu mu kaseera akasembayo.

lug_prompt: Okukolera awamu kwabwe n'obumalirivu byalabikira mu sizoni yonna. Buli lwe baazannyanga, beeyongeranga okuba ab'amaanyi n'obwesige mu busobozi bwabwe.

teo_prompt: Apotu kesi iswamata nepepe kotoma apak kere. Kangin abolia, apotu kesi kiyatakinos ka amunokina apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini tualuri azini asi 'baza yiniri e'da sa'wa driasi. Avita alu alu vusi, yi eca okporu azini asi'baza be yi ma okpo ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukorera hamwe kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo bikarebeka omu siizoni yoona. Buri muzaano, bakongyera amaani n'obwesigye omu bushoboorozi bwabo.

lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baatudde olukiiko olw'amangu. Baasazeewo nti enkola endala zeetaagibwa okukakasa obulungi bw'ekibiina kyabwe.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances and a scheduling conflict, the board members were informed that a decision needed to be made. After careful consideration, the chairman cancelled the meeting.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to address the problem, we are still facing significant challenges. As a result, the issue has not been resolved yet.

lug_prompt: Ekisenge kya kkooti kyajjula okweraliikirira nga bannamateeka bawaayo ensonga zaabwe ezisembayo. Buli omu yalindirira n'obweraliikirivu omulamuzi okuwa ensala ye.

eng_prompt: After a long and heated discussion, the mediator suggested that both parties take a step back and reflect on their differences. In order to move forward, it was clear that they needed to find common ground.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okuwanvu era okw'amaanyi, omutabaganya yawadde amagezi nti enjuyi zombi zikomewo zifumiitirize ku butakkaanya bwazo. Okusobola okugenda mu maaso, kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti beetaaga okufuna ensonga gye bakkiriziganyaako.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok matye pi kare malac tutwal, lacungu pi laro lok owaco ni dul aryo weng omyero gudok cen dok gutam I kom apoka-poka matye I kingi. Me medde anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero gunong yoo me winye.

eng_prompt: As the choir director raised her baton, she emphasized the importance of blending their voices. With a nod of encouragement, she reminded them that unity in sound was key to their performance.
lug_prompt: Omukulembeze wa kwaya bwe yasitula omuggo gwe, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okutabula amaloboozi gaabwe. N'okunyeenya omutwe ng'abazzaamu amaanyi, yabajjukiza nti obumu mu maloboozi kye kisumuluzo ky'enkola yaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ladit wi luwer ot lega otingo tyene malo, en owaco ni ber tutwal me ribo dwan dano weng. Ki dwon me cuko cwiny, en opoyo wigi ni ribe I dwon obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I timo ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu engarenon loka ekwaya kiting akeje, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikin iporotoikec. Keda aisinyikokinit, abu ngesi isiitik kes ebe aimorikikina naka ikososinei nes elacet loka eswamae kec.
lgg_prompt: Dricere koya niri ni i ma baka 'baria, eri 'ba asi orodri 'bani o'duko eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo ava feza ma dria, eri ega yi ra kini ti ecita o'duko ma alia ri eri fungua 'yeta yiniri ni.

eng_prompt: After several rounds of negotiations, both parties remained entrenched in their positions. Despite attempts at mediation, they could not find common ground.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enteeseganya ez'emirundi egiwerako, enjuyi zombi zaasigala mu bifo byazo. Wadde nga baagezaako okutabaganya, tebaasobola kufuna kye bakkiriziganyaako.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteesa emirundi mingi, enjuyi zombi zikaguma omu nteekateeka zaabo. Oihireho okuteeraho kutabaganisa, tibarabaasize kutunga endagano.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple emails being sent out to the team, he had been away on vacation and missed all the updates. As a result, he was completely unaware of the changes to the schedule.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde emails eziwerako zaasindikibwa eri tiimu, yabadde wala mu luwummula n'asubwa ebipya byonna. N'ekyavaamu, yali tamanyi ku nkyukakyuka ezaali mu nteekateeka.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise over the quaint village, the townspeople gathered in anticipation for the special occasion. They had been preparing for weeks, eager to welcome their esteemed guest.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo ku kyalo, abantu b'omu kibuga baakuŋŋaana nga beetegekera omukolo ogw'enjawulo. Baali bamaze wiiki nnamba nga beetegekera, nga beesunga okwaniriza omugenyi waabwe ow'ekitiibwa.
