lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria e'doria calo 'da ma dria, 'ba tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi eyini e'yo ndundu 'da esuzu drile. Eyi ebi eyi otu sabiti eyi ma alea, eyini ava be eyi ma omu inzile inzi ri ai'zu.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kuruga omu kyaro, abantu b'omururembo baketeeranira hamwe barikutegyereza omukoro gw'omutaano. Bakaba batwire nibeteekateekyera kumara esande nyingi, barikwetenga munonga okutangirira omugyenyi waabo.

eng_prompt: In any community, the role of spiritual leaders is crucial for fostering trust and guidance. Therefore, it is essential that these individuals embody qualities that reflect their commitment to their faith and congregation.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, omulimu gw'abakulembeze b'eby'omwoyo gwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige n'obulagirizi. N'olw'ekyo, kyetaagisa nnyo abantu bano okuba n'engeri eziraga nti beewaddeyo eri enzikiriza yaabwe n'ekkanisa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, tic pa lutela dini pire tek tutwal me kelo gen ki tira. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni dano magi gubed ki kit mabeco ma nyutu keto cwiny gi i kom niyee gi ki kacokke gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, epol noi aswam naka engarenok luka edini kanu aitopolorite amuno keda aicoreta. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi itunga lu ajaut keda iponesio lu itodunitos ainakina kec mama ejaasi aiyuunikec keda ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, azi drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyiniri orodriru asi'baza ma omgbo otuzu azini imbata fezu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba 'diyi ma ovu wura yini yi owizu yi ma a'ita ma dria tualu kanisa be 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro byona, omurimo gw'abebembezi b'eby'omwoyo n'ogw'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obwesigye n'obwebembezi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abantu aba kugira emitwarize erikworeka okwehayo kwabo ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo n'ekibiina kyabo.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy trial filled with testimonies and evidence, the jury deliberated for hours before reaching a decision. The accusations against him had sparked widespread controversy and debate in the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okuwozesebwa okuwanvu okujjudde obujulizi n'obukakafu, abalamuzi bateesa okumala essaawa eziwera nga tebannatuuka ku kusalawo. Ebigambibwa ku ye byaleetawo okusika omuguwa n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok pi kare malac ma opong ki caden, lungol kop ne gubedo ka tam pi cawa malac mapwod pe gumoko tamgi. Koko ma ki keto I kome okelo tele ki laro lok I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aitepesenio keda ajenanut, apotu ikatubok itetemoto kanu isawan luipu eringa edolokina toma aomisioitikec. Apotu aitoroneta nuikamunitos ngesi koyangautu epeget keda epeget loepol noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza ma vutia sawa ezu 'bani e'yo ecezu azini afa ecetaru 'diyi pie, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ega e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa ezu de nga po'di eyi awini e'yo 'du ku. E'yo 'bani to eri ma dria 'diyi fe agbatara azini agbatara ongulumu eyi ma eselea karakara.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira orubanja rw'obwiire buraingwa orwabaire rwijwire obujurizi n'obujurizi, abaramuzi bakahurizana kumara eshaaha nyingi batakahikire aha kusharamu. Ebyabaire nibimuhakanisa bikareetaho obutaikirizana n'okuhanuura omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the robbery unfold in front of him, he quickly took note of the suspects' descriptions. Feeling a sense of duty, he decided to take action and inform the authorities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba obubbi nga bugenda mu maaso ge, yayanguwa okuwandiika ebikwata ku bateeberezebwa. Olw'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe, yasalawo okubaako ky'akolawo n'ategeeza ab'obuyinza.
ach_prompt: Inge neno kit ma yak otimme kwede I wange, en oketo cwinye I kom lok pa ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome. Pien en onongo ni ticce tye me atima, en omoko tamme me timo gin mo me niango lutela.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun ebe ejai akoko koingaren ke, abu ngesi koany atipet akiro nuikamunitos luitepesenitai. Aomit ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam ngun, abu ngesi koseu aikwenyar apedorosio.
lgg_prompt: Erini ogu 'da ndrezu i ma drilea 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi mbeleru. E'yo erini lezu azi ngazuri ma e'yosi, eri asi 'du e'yo 'yezu azini lu e'yo 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba obushuma burikugyenda omu maisho, akarahuka yaamanya ebirikushoboororwa abarikuteekateekwaho. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba naamanya ngu n'omurimo gwe, akasharamu kugira eki yaakora kumanyisa ab'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the townspeople gathered in the square, their faces filled with anticipation. Today marked the arrival of a new leader for their community, and everyone was eager to extend their warm greetings.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abantu b'omu kibuga baakuŋŋaanira mu kibangirizi nga beesunga nnyo. Leero lwe lunaku lw'okutuukayo kw'omukulembeze omuggya mu kitundu kyabwe, era buli omu yali yeesunga okulamusa abalala.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, dano me boma gucokke I dye bar, wang gi opong ki miti. Tin obedo nino me oo pa latela manyen pi kabedo gi, dok dano weng obedo ki miti me moto gi.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga luka eibuga kotukokinos aiboisit naepol noi. Lolo aponi kitodiarai adolunet naka engarenon loitetet lo atutubet kec, ido itunga kere ekotosi aijaun aiyalamakec.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba tawuni'a 'diyi tra yi pari ma alia, yi ma andretia 'diyi ga asi 'baza si. Andru o'du 'bani drice'ba o'diru ni ecazu ongulumu eyivileri ma alea ri i, dika 'ba dria eyi ndra avaru eyi ma imbata fezu eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, abantu b'omururembo baketeeranira omu kibangirizi, amaisho gaabo gaijwire amatsiko. Erizooba n'eizooba ry'okuhika kw'omwebembezi omusya omu kyanga kyabo, kandi buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okubaramutsya.

eng_prompt: As the congregation gathered, a sense of unity filled the air, and hearts were prepared for a powerful encounter. The music began to swell, inviting everyone to lift their voices in adoration.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa bwe yakungaana, obumu bwajjula empewo, era emitima gyategekebwa okusisinkana okw'amaanyi. Omuziki gwatandika okuzimba, nga guyita buli omu okusitula amaloboozi ge mu kusinza.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gucokke, ribe obedo tye dok cwinygi obedo atera pi kacokke madit tutwal. Wer ne ocako dange matek tutwal, lwongo dano weng me ilo dwan gi malo me woro.
teo_prompt: Neautar ikuristayon atukonokin, apotu aimorikikina kilelebunos, ido apotu itunga itemonokinos kanuka airiamunet naepol noi. Apotu ikososinei kogeutu aijul eporoto, kolimokinete nginitunganan aikeun iporotoi ke.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba kanisa 'diyi ni eyi trazu tualu, ti ecita eyi ga angu 'da ma alea tre, dika eyi otu eyi ma asi eyi mitingi okporu 'da ni. Ongo 'da e'do tu, omve 'ba dria eyi ma o'duko engazu inzita ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe, haabaho okukwatanisa, kandi emitima yaabo ekatebeekanisibwa orukiiko rw'amaani. Ebyeshongoro bikatandika kweyongyera munonga, buri omwe arikushaba kwimusya eiraka rye omu kuramya.

eng_prompt: After a hard-fought battle on the field, the final whistle blew, signaling their victory. Cheers erupted from the stands as the team realized they had secured the championship title.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana okw'amaanyi mu kisaawe, enfuufu eyasembayo yafuuwa, ekiraga obuwanguzi bwabwe. Okukuba enduulu kwabalukawo nga ttiimu etegeera nti yawangudde ekikopo kya bannantammegwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny matek tutwal I bar, whistle me agiki owinye, ma onyuto locgi. Dano gubedo ka wer ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma tim ne oniang ni guloyo pyem tuku odilo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ejie loetiono noi koisawe, apotu itunga kibiroros kanu aitodun ebe apotu kesi itelekaasi. Apotu aiyalama kogeutu kotoma oicolong nawanyunia etimu ebe edumutu kesi apapula naka etelekarak.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'diza okporu pari avitaniri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, o'duko asizuri si, ecezu kini yi aga ra. Ayiko fu engazu pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia amuti mupira avizu 'da ni e'yo egazu kini eyi nde abala avita ni 'diyi 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orutaro rw'amaani omu kishayi, efurembe y'ahamuheru ekareetaho obuhanguzi. Akesharingo kakaruga omu barikwemerera tiimu ku yaamanyire ngu ekaba etungire ekikopo ky'empaka z'omupiira gw'ebigyere.

eng_prompt: Despite their best efforts and a strong start, the team struggled to maintain their momentum throughout the game. In the final minutes, a critical mistake cost them the victory.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakola kyonna ekisoboka n'okutandika obulungi, ttiimu yalwana okukuuma omutindo gwayo mu luzannya lwonna. Mu ddakiika ezisembayo, ensobi ey'amaanyi yabafiiriza obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek dok gucako maber tutwal, team odilo ne gubedo ki peko me gwoko kero gi I kare me tuko weng. I dakika me agiki, bal madit tutwal oweko pe guloyo tuko.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogong kosodete ageun ejok, apotu itimun kongicata aidar eipone lo itolosete kesi kotoma abolia kere. Kotoma idakikan lu awasia, abu aibucare koinak kesi aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo dria ma talasi azini e'deta okporuri ma talasi, amuti avitani 'diyi dri ci yi ma okpo 'bazu avita ma alia dria. Dakika asizu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi azi okporu ni fe yini agazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwabo n'okutandika kwabo kurungi, tiimu ekarwana kurinda amaani gaayo omu muzaano gwona. Omu dakiika z'ahamuheru, enshobi y'amaani ekabafeerwa obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and teamwork, the players were eager to showcase their skills. The atmosphere was electric as the final match approached, with everyone hoping for a victory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okukolera awamu, abazannyi baali beetegefu okulaga obukugu bwabwe. Embeera yabadde ya maanyi nga omuzannyo ogusembayo gunaatera okutuuka, nga buli omu asuubira obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I ngee dwe mapol me pwonye ki tic matek, lutuku ne gubedo ki miti me nyuto diro gi. Kwo obedo maber tutwal I kare ma pyem tuku me agiki tye cok, dano weng obedo ki gen me nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aituutoonor keda aswam nepepe, ekotosi aboliak aitodun acoasineikec. Arai ejautene loepol noi neyapiete abolia naka awasia, ido itunga kere amuno aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini azi ngazu tualu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba avitani 'diyi avasi yi ma ondua e'dazu. Angu nderi ndra aci ru abala asizu ri ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba dria asi 'baza be agata ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okukorera hamwe, abazaani bakaba baine ekihika ky'okworeka emyoga yaabo. Embeera ekaba eri ey'omutaano ahabwokuba omuzaano gw'ahamuheru gukaba guri haihi, buri omwe aine amatsiko g'obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: Their teamwork and dedication were evident throughout the season. With each game, they grew stronger and more confident in their abilities.
lug_prompt: Okukolera awamu kwabwe n'obumalirivu byalabikira mu sizoni yonna. Buli lwe baazannyanga, beeyongeranga okuba ab'amaanyi n'obwesige mu busobozi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ticgi kacel ki keto cwinygi I kom tic onen I kare me tuku weng. I ngee tuku weng, gudoko tek dok gubedo ki tek cwiny I kom kero gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu kesi iswamata nepepe kotoma apak kere. Kangin abolia, apotu kesi kiyatakinos ka amunokina apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini tualuri azini asi 'baza yiniri e'da sa'wa driasi. Avita alu alu vusi, yi eca okporu azini asi'baza be yi ma okpo ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukorera hamwe kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo bikarebeka omu siizoni yoona. Buri muzaano, bakongyera amaani n'obwesigye omu bushoboorozi bwabo.

eng_prompt: After a series of disappointing losses and missed opportunities, the players gathered in the locker room, their faces reflecting frustration and disappointment. They had worked hard all season, but the results just weren't in their favor.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufiirwa emirundi mingi n'okufiirwa emikisa, abazannyi baakuŋŋaanira mu kisenge mwe bakyusibwamu, nga ffeesi zaabwe ziraga obwennyamivu n'obwennyamivu. Baali bakoze nnyo sizoni yonna naye ebyavaamu tebyali birungi.
ach_prompt: Inge poto pa lutuku mapol ma okelo turcwiny ki rwenyo gum, lutuku gucokke I ot loko bongo, wang gi onyuto cwer cwiny ki turcwiny. Gutiyo matek I kare me pyem tuku weng, ento adwogi ne pe obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aibiror noi keda aibiror naka arerengesio, apotu aboliak kotukokinos toma agola naka aijulakin igoenekec. Apotu kesi iswamata kagogong noi apak kere, konye mam akiro ngun apotu opotu kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eyi ndezu 'bori ma vutia azini drileba eyi avizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba avita avipi 'diyi tra eyi pari avita eyi ojazu 'diyi ma alea, eyi ma andretia e'da candi azini candi nyaza. Eyi ndra azi nga avasi ayi ti 'da ma alea ndulu, te e'yo efupi 'diyi ovuni eyidri muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusingwa emirundi mingi, abazaani baketeeranira omu kishengye ky'okuhinduramu, amaisho gaabo garikworeka okuhwa amaani n'okuhwa amaani. Bakakora n'amaani obwire bwona, kwonka ebirugiremu bikaba bitarikubashemeza.

eng_prompt: Their teamwork and dedication have consistently propelled them to victory. With each game, their confidence and skill only seem to grow stronger.
lug_prompt: Okukolera awamu n'obumalirivu bibasobozesezza okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Buli lwe bazannyira omuzannyo, beeyongera okwekkiririzaamu n'okuba n'obukugu.
ach_prompt: Tic gi kacel ki keto cwiny gi ikare weng okonyogi me nongo loc. Ki tuku acel-acel, tek cwiny gi ki diro gi nen calo mede.
teo_prompt: Aswam kec nepepe keda ainakina kec eyangaunit kesi aitelekaar. Kangoli abolia, esubit bala eyatakinos amuno kec keda acoasineikec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini tualuri azini asi feza yini fe yi dri agazu sawa driasi. Avita alu alu vusi, yi ma asi'baza azini ondua yi ma dria ri ni lu tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Okukorera hamwe kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo bibahwereire kusingura. Buri muzaano, obwesigye n'emyoga yaabo nibyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: In order to improve their teamwork and skills, the team has been discussing their current training schedule. They all agree that consistent practice is essential for their success in upcoming games.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula emirimu gyabwe egy'awamu n'obukugu, ttiimu ebadde eteesa ku nteekateeka y'okutendekebwa kwabwe eriwo. Bonna bakkiriziganya nti okwegezaamu buli kaseera kwa mugaso eri obuwanguzi bwabwe mu mizannyo egijja.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me tic kacel ki diro gi, dul tuku eni gubedo ka nywako lok I kom yub me pwonye gi matye kombedi. Gin weng guye ni pwonye kare ki kare pire tek tutwal pi locgi I pyem tuku matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar aswam kec kwape etimu keda acoasineikec, euta etimu aitemitem ainapeta kec nuka aituutoorio. Apotu kesi kere kocamanaros ebe ejokuna aitetemonor kanu akerianut kec kotoma aboliasio nu ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini tualu ondua yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti nde ri e'bi e'yo onze otita yini embatani sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria. Yi a'i dria kini 'yeta sawa driasi ri eri orodriru yini drile suza avita emupi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutunguura emirimo yaabo hamwe n'emyoga yaabo, tiimu ebaire neegaaniira aha nteekateeka yaabo y'okutendekwa. Boona nibaikiriza ngu okukoresa munonga emizaano n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bwabo omu mizaano erikwija.

eng_prompt: After a long search and numerous interviews, the athletic department finally made a decision. The team was eager for a fresh start and a new direction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya ennyo n'okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo bingi, ekitongole ky'ebyemizannyo kyaddaaki kyasalawo. Ttiimu yali yeesunga okutandika obuggya n'obulagirizi obupya.
ach_prompt: Ingee yenyo pi kare malac ki lok ki dano mapol, dul ma loyo lok kom pyem ngwec dong gumoko tamgi. Dul tuku ne obedo ki miti me cako tic manyen ki yoo manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic noi keda aingisingisio nuipu, abu edipatiment loka akerak kiswamau aseunet. Akoto etimu ageunet naitetet keda aingarenikinio naitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndaza ezu azini ozita karakara eyi ma vutia, enyati avita ni 'diyi asizu e'yo 'du ra. Amuti 'da le ndra e'dota o'diru ni azini driceza o'diru ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuronda kumara obwire buraingwa n'okubuuza abantu baingi,ekitongore ky'eby'emizaano kikahendera kyacwamu. Tiimu ekaba eine ekihika ky'okutandika busya n'obwebembezi obusya.

eng_prompt: As the meeting began, the manager introduced the latest additions to the team. Everyone gathered around, eager to meet the newcomers and learn about their backgrounds.
lug_prompt: Olukiiko bwe lwatandika, maneja yayanjula abazannyi abapya mu ttiimu. Buli omu yakungaanye, nga yeesunga okusisinkana abapya n'okuyiga ku byafaayo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kacoke ocake, ladit tic onyuto lutic manyen. Dano weng gugure, ma cwinygi obedo yom me rwate ki jo manyen ki pwonyo lok kom kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neageunia airiamunet ngin, abu eyaiton itodiar luitetiak lu apotu kiswamaunos otimu. Apotu itunga kere kotukokinos, ekotosi airiamun keda luitetiak kosodete aisisia nuikamunitos akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ni e'doria, 'ba ocepirini 'ba o'diru 'diyi e'da amuti nde ma alia. Ba dria tra yi ma ageia, ava be dri fuzu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi be azini e'yo onizu geri yini engazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko ku rwatandikire, manegya akareeta abasya omu tiimu. Buri omwe akakungaana, aine ekihika ky'okubugana abasya n'okwega ebirikukwata ahamyoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: The final whistle blew, and the tension in the stadium was palpable. Fans from both sides held their breath, eagerly awaiting the official announcement.
lug_prompt: Ffirimbi eyasembayo yafuuwa, era obunkenke mu kisaawe bwalabika. Abawagizi okuva ku njuyi zombi baasibye omukka, nga balindirira n'obwagazi okulangirira okutongole.
ach_prompt: Ki goyo whistle me agiki, lworo obedo tye I bar tuku madit tutwal. Lucwak tuku I tenge aryo weng gugwoko yweyo gi, kun gitye ka kuro lok angeya.
teo_prompt: Aponi koyangaunai epur loka awasia, ido aponi kojenunai aiyalongong kotoma oisawe. Apotu egangitok luka atutubena ngun kere kongetakisi ekwam, aidarit noi alimoret.
lgg_prompt: Ba ofu firindi asizuri, dika asi otiza pari avita niri ma alia ri e'da ra. Ba atita fepi engazu kala iri 'diyi ma alia 'diyi o'bi yi ma ava ci, te asi driasi e'yo azita palaa ri te.
nyn_prompt: Fiyuuni y'ahamuheru ekateerwa, obunkenke omu kishayi bukarebeka. Abahagizi kuruga omu mbaju zombi, bakaguma baine ekihika ky'okurinda ekirango ky'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After weeks of scouting and evaluating talent, the team has finally made a decision. The coaching staff is excited to announce a significant addition to our roster.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga basikawutu n'okukebera ebitone, ttiimu emalirizza okusalawo. Abatendesi basanyufu okulangirira omuyimbi omulala ow'omugaso mu ttiimu yaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yenyo ki pimo talanta, dul tuku ne dong gumoko tamgi. Lupwonye tye ki yom cwiny me cwalo ngec manyen I dul tuku megwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic keda airereonor atalantan, adaun etimu aitolomun aseunet. Eyalamasi eswamak lu etuutoorok alimor itunganan yenitegelikina kotoma aboliak wok.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia 'bani talanta eyi onezu azini eyi ma pamvu onezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da asizu e'yo 'du 'bo. Azi'ba emba'ba 'diyi ayikosi azi'ba azi orodriru 'diyi azizu ama vile amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okusherura n'okushwijuma etaraanta, tiimu eherize kusharamu. Abatendeki bashemereirwe kurangirira omuntu w'omugasho omu kitongore kyaitu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for education in the region, the government announced a significant investment in infrastructure. This initiative aimed to improve access to quality learning environments for all children.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebyenjigiriza obweyongera mu kitundu, gavumenti yalangiridde okussa ssente nnyingi mu bikozesebwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula embeera y'okusomeramu ey'omutindo eri abaana bonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kwan I but lobo eni, gamente ocwalo lok angeya me keto lim I tic mapat-pat. Yub man obedo me medo rwom me kwan pa lutino weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman kotoma aiboisit kangin, abu apugan kolimo ebe ebuni ngesi aipikakin ikapun luipu toma adukena. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai kanu aitojokar adumunun na isomeroi lu ejokuka kanuka idwe kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu onita ma omgbo tupi angu 'di ma alea ri ma aza kozu, gamete azi lonyi vuti aleza angiri 'diyi ma ta mbazu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu anzi nyiri dria eyini geri onita ni muke 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'eby'obwegyese omu kyanga,gavumenti ekarangirira okuta esente nyingi omu by'okwombeka. Enteekateeka egi ekaba negyenderera okureeba ngu abaana boona batunga emyanya mirungi y'okwegyeramu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the previous year's financial performance, the team gathered to discuss their goals for the upcoming fiscal year. With a clear vision in mind, they prepared to outline their financial strategy.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkola y'ebyensimbi ey'omwaka oguwedde, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biruubirirwa byayo eby'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Nga balina ekiruubirirwa ekitegeerekeka obulungi mu birowoozo, beetegese okulaga enteekateeka yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic me lim otime kwede I mwaka ma okato, dul ne gugure me nywako lok I kom miti gi pi mwaka me lim matye kabino ni. Ki neno maber I wigi, guyube me nyutu yoo gi me tic ki lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor eswamae loka ikapun kokaru lo atubor, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem alosikinetekec nuka ekaru loka ikapun lo ebunit. Keda aomisioit na ecai, apotu kesi itemonokinos aitodun iwaitin kec luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo robia ni eli ajerisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini le 'ye eli robiani emupi ri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Asisile kililiru be, eyi otu eyi ma otita robia esuzu 'diyi e'dazu.

eng_prompt: Delegates from across the country gathered in the bustling city center. Excitement filled the air as attendees prepared to share their insights and experiences.
lug_prompt: Ababaka okuva mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibuga wakati ekirimu abantu abangi. Essanyu lyajjula empewo ng'abaabaddewo beetegekera okugabana amagezi gaabwe n'ebyo bye bayitamu.
ach_prompt: Luwang lwak ma aa ki I but lobo man mapat-pat gugure I dye boma madit ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma joo ma gubedo tye guyube me nywako tam gi ki jami ma gutimo I kwogi.
teo_prompt: Apotu abwoikinitok luka akwapuwok kotukokinos kiding na esite. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos ne akapakina itunga aimor aomisiokec keda akirokec.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba engazu kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi tra eyi aku ambu city niri ma alea. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea 'ba emu'ba 'diyi eyini eyi otuzu e'yo eyini ega 'diyi awazu tualu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In the face of rising food prices and economic instability, individuals are seeking alternative means of sustenance. As traditional jobs become scarce, a growing number of people are turning to agriculture to secure their livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'emmere okulinnya n'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, abantu banoonya engeri endala ez'okweyimirizaawo. Ng'emirimu egy'ennono gifuuka emitono, omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera okudda mu bulimi okusobola okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel cam tye ka medde ki can lim, dano tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me kwo. I kare ma tic macon tye ka doko tek, wel dano mapol tye ka cako pur me gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo iyatakinor etiai loka inyamat keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma ikapun, eutasi itunga aimo iponesio ice luka aijar. Kwape ikidioko aswamisinei nukolo, iyata enaba lo itunga toma akoru kanu aidar aijarakec.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing number of tourists visiting the city, the local tourism board decided to expand their services. To enhance the visitor experience, they recognized the need for additional staff.

E'yo omu eyini emuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma si azi'ba azi eyi dika.

eng_prompt: As the population in the area continues to grow, the demand for educational facilities has increased significantly. Local officials have announced plans to address this need.

eng_prompt: Before the attendees gathered in the conference room, the organizers prepared the financial documents for review. As the meeting commenced, everyone anticipated the discussion on the upcoming fiscal plans.

lug_prompt: Essanyu eryetoolodde omukolo libadde lyeyongera okumala wiiki eziwera, nga abeetabye baagala nnyo okuwulira okuva mu boogezi abakulu. Olunaku bwe lwasembera, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti obwagazi mu lukungaana bwali ku ntikko.

lgg_prompt: Ayiko omu 'da ma alea ri e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma ava be e'yo erizu engazu 'ba e'yo nzepi okporu 'diyi vu. O'du 'da ni ecazu ogogoru, eri eca e'dazaru kini ava okuza 'da ma dria ri ma omgbo angiri ndeni.

lgg_prompt: Amu aje mitingi 'da ma alea ra te awini 'ba dria ma ru eyi esu kuye. Andretia o'diru 'diyi ndra tre, azini ma econi yi ma pamvu 'du dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba ndi omu rukiiko nyomwebazyo, kwonka tindatungire amaziina ga buri omwe. Hakaba hariho amaisho masya maingi, kandi nkaba ntarikubaasa kugakuratiira goona.

lug_prompt: Wadde nga baali banyiikivu era nga beenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kibiina, ebyava mu bigezo ebyakaggwa tebyali birungi. Ensonga nnyingi zaaviirako obutategeera byawandiikibwa.

lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obw'amangu obw'obuyonjo, abakungu b'ekitundu baategeka pulojekiti okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ekitundu, baakizuula nti kaabuyonjo empya ya mugaso nnyo eri abatuuze.

eng_prompt: Excessive alcohol consumption can lead to serious health issues and impaired judgment. For the sake of well-being, it's important to consider healthier lifestyle choices.
lug_prompt: Okunywa omwenge ekisukkiridde kiyinza okuvaako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu bulamu n'okusalawo obubi. Ku lw'obulungi bw'abantu, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri z'obulamu ennungi.

teo_prompt: Aimat ajon naepol epedori ayangaun adekasinei nuarokok keda aomisio nuarokok. Kanu ajokis naka aijar, ejokuna aomoom nuikamunitos aijar najokan.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the campus, excitement filled the air with the sound of laughter and chatter. After a long summer break, the students gathered in the auditorium, eager to reconnect with friends and teachers.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka ku ttendekero, abantu baali baseka era nga banyumya. Oluvannyuma lw'oluwummula oluwanvu olw'omusana, abayizi baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge, nga beesunga okuddamu okukwatagana ne mikwano gyabwe n'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I gang kwan ne, yomcwiny opong I yamo ki dwon me nyero ki lok. Ingee yweyo pi kare malac tutwal, lutino gucokke I ot lega, ki miti me lok ki luremgi ki lupwonye gi.

lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria angu onita ni 'da ma dria, ayiko ga angu 'da ma alea o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko si azini o'duko o'duko si. Lifu lifu sa'wa ezu 'bori ma vutia, sukulu anzi eyi tra eyi pari imbatani 'diyi ma alea eyini ava be e'yo nzezu eyi ma agyipi eyi pie tualu imba'ba eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku guraabe nigweyongyera omu itendekyero ry'eby'obwegyese, okushemererwa kukaija omu mwanya n'eiraka ry'okusheka hamwe n'okugamba. Bwanyima y'akahuumuro k'obwire buraingwa, abeegi baketeeranira omu kishengye, baine ekihika ky'okugaruka kukorengana na banywani baabo hamwe n'abegyesa.

eng_prompt: Inclusive development is essential for creating equitable communities. It is crucial to ensure that all individuals, regardless of their abilities, have access to the resources and opportunities they need to thrive.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana erimu abantu bonna ya mugaso mu kutondawo ebitundu eby'obwenkanya. Kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti abantu bonna, awatali kufaayo ku busobozi bwabwe, bafuna ebyetaago n'emikisa gye beetaaga okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma dano weng tye iye pire tek tutwal pi kelo ber bedo ikin lwak. Pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng, labongo paro pi kero gi, gunongo jami ki gum ma gimito me dongo.
teo_prompt: Apol na imoriarit itunga kere ejok kanu aitolomun aiboisio nu ejokuka. Erai ibore yenepol noi awanyun ebe itunga kere, araida epedoritos, edumununete iboro keda arerengesio nu ekotos kesi kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'ba dria ma eselea ri eri orodriru ongulumu eyini aa'zu trotro 'diyi e'dozu. Eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi ma okpo ka tro aa e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea ra, eyi esu afa eyini le 'diyi tualu drileba eyini le 'diyi pie ra.

ach_prompt: Lucwak tuku gubedo ki miti matek tutwal me kuro whistle me agiki I kare ma lworo I bar tuku oo I rwom mamalo tutwal. I kare ma tim aryo weng gitye ka tuko matek tutwal, adwogi ne onongo pe tye atir.

lug_prompt: Ng'omuzannyo guwedde era nga wakyasigaddeyo eddakiika ntono ku ssaawa, ddiifiri yasonga ku kifo oluvannyuma lw'ekikyamu mu kasenge. Obunkenke mu kisaawe bwalabika ng'omuzannyi yeetegekera ekikonde ekikulu.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga batendekebwa n'okwetegekera ennyo, ttiimu yagenda mu kisaawe n'obumalirivu. Embeera yabadde ya maanyi ng'abantu babakuba enduulu, ekyayongera amaanyi mu kwagala kwabwe okuwangula.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitelekaarit naepol noi kapak naka abolia, abu etimu kodum apointan nuedolitos kanu aitub. Apotu aswam kec kagogong kosodi aitac, ido abu koyangau kesi toma apak kana naepol noi.

eng_prompt: The tension in the stadium was palpable as the two teams battled fiercely for control of the ball. Suddenly, a loud gasp erupted from the crowd when a collision occurred on the field.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke mu kisaawe bwalabika nga ttiimu ebbiri zilwana nnyo okufuga omupiira. Amangu ago, eddoboozi ery'omwanguka lyava mu bantu bwe waabaddewo okutomeragana mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I bar tuku ne I kare ma tim aryo ne gubedo ka lweny matek tutwal me loyo odilo. Cutcut, woo ma dwong oa ki bot lwak I kare ma peko me gudu otimme I bar tuku.
teo_prompt: Aponi kojenunai aiyalongong kotoma oisawe naarai apotu itimun iarei ojioto noi kanu aitelekaar emopira. Apotu iporotoi luapolok kopotu kanejaas itunga kapak naka aibiror kotoma aiboisit.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and practice, the coach finally announced the starting lineup for the upcoming match. Among the talented players, one stood out for his exceptional skills and goal-scoring ability.

ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki pwonye matek tutwal, lapwony tuku I agiki ne owaco nying lutuku ma gibicako tuko I pyem tuku matye kabino ni. I kin lutuku ma gitye ki talanta, ngat acel onen pi diro ki kero ne me moto golo.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okwegyezamu munonga, omutendeki ahamuheru akarangirira abazaani b'omupiira ogurikwija. Omu bazaani abaine etaraanta, omwe akarebeka ahabw'emyoga ye ey'omutaano hamwe n'okubaasa kwe okuteeba goora.

eng_prompt: As responsible adults, we hold the key to shaping the future of our society. It is our duty to ensure that the next generation is equipped with the knowledge and skills they need to thrive.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu abakulu ab'obuvunaanyizibwa, tulina ekisumuluzo ky'okutondawo ebiseera by'ekitundu kyaffe eby'omu maaso. Mulimu gwaffe okulaba nti omulembe oguddako guweebwa amagezi n'obukugu bye gwetaaga okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Macalo ludito ma tic gi tek, watye ki lagony me yubu anyim pa kabedo wa. Obedo tic wa me neno ni yalwak manyen tye ki ngec ki diro ma mite me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape itunga luapolok luepedorete aswam ejok, ijaasi oni keda apedor naka aitolomun ingaren naka itunga wok. Erai aswam wok awanyun ebe ejaasi ateker naetupakini keda acoa na ekotos kesi kanu apol.

eng_prompt: As the new school year approached, families gathered their resources to ensure their children could receive a quality education. With rising costs and various programs available, many parents prioritized their children's schooling.

eng_prompt: As society evolves, the qualifications for leadership roles are increasingly scrutinized. Many believe that experience and maturity are essential traits for effective leaders, leading to discussions about appropriate age thresholds.

ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye matek tutwal ki yub matek tutwal, jo ma ki coyo gi I tic I kare me agiki ne guwinyo ni gitye atera pi peko matye anyim. Ki ngec ma gunongo ki winye matye ikin gi, gucokke pi timo peny me agiki.

lug_prompt: Ekibuga kya Kampala kibadde kifuna okweyongera mu buzzi bw'emisango gyebuvuddeko. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti eyongedde omuwendo gw'abakuumaddembe ku nguudo.

eng_prompt: Despite the importance of the election, many citizens chose to stay home. The atmosphere was filled with apathy and disillusionment about the candidates.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obukulu bw'okulonda, bannansi bangi baasalawo okusigala awaka. Embeera yali ejjudde obutafaayo n'okuggwaamu essuubi ku beesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yer ne pire tek tutwal, anywali mapol oyero me bedo gang. Cwiny dano opong ki cwer cwiny ki cwer cwiny I kom lucungu.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajokunar aseo, apotu itunga luipu koseutu aiboi ore. Apotu itunga kilelebunos keda amamus aiyalongong ka amamut aiyalama kanuka abwoak.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ma orodri ni tro ovuzu ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi pe aa'zu akua. Angu nderi ga e'yo asi kokoru azini asi nyoza si 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obukuru bw'akaruuru, abatuuragye baingi bakasharamu kuguma omuka. Embeera ekaba eijwire okwetomboita n'okwerarikirira ahabw'abeesimbireho.

eng_prompt: After months of unresolved disputes and broken agreements, tensions reached a boiling point during the meeting. Frustrated by the chairman's refusal to address the issues, he vowed to take legal action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutakkaanya obutamalibwawo n'endagaano ezamenyebwa, obunkenke bwatuuka ku ntikko mu lukungaana. Olw'okunyiiga olw'okuba ssentebe yagaana okukola ku nsonga, yeeyama okutwala ensonga mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me telle ma pe ki tyeko ki winye ma otur, telle ne oo I rwom ma lamal tutwal I kare me kacokke. Pi cwer cwiny I kom won kom me kwero cobo peko ne, en okwonge me cito I kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ingungeta lumam itemokitai keda acamanara namam itemokitai, apotu ingungeta kodolokisi adoketait naepol noi kotoma airiamunet kangin. Aponi itakadikisi ngesi naarai abu lokapolon eicolong konger aitemokin akiro ngun, abu ngesi kisumun alosit toma okisila.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo erita ako ni azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo erita ako ni 'diyi ca angu dria sawa mitingi 'da nirisi. E'yo 'Bili ei ni gazu e'yo nde 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma e'yosi, so oyo e'yo 'duzu azita palaa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'obutaikirizana obutarikushobororwa hamwe n'endagaano ezitahikire, obunkenke bwahika aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru omu rukiiko. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabwa mukuru w'entebe okwanga kukora aha nshonga, akaraganisa kutwara omushango omu kooti.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose during the annual meeting, accusations of misconduct began to circulate among the board members. Whispers of corruption filled the air, leading to a shocking revelation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu lukiiko lw'omwaka, okulumiriza kw'enneeyisa embi kwatandika okutambula mu bammemba b'olukiiko olufuzi. Okuwuubaala kw'obuli bw'enguzi kwajjula empewo, ekyaviirako okubikkulwa okw'entiisa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, adot me tim maraco ocake I kin lumemba me dul enoni. Dano gubedo ka loko lok me camcana ma oweko gin mo otimme ma oyomo cwiny dano tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neapolor atiokisio kotoma airiamunet naka ekaru, apotu aitoroneta nuka iponesio luarokok kogeutu alosit kiding imeeban luka atukot. Apotu akiro nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai kilelebunos kokwam, ido abu koyangau aitodunet naetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu sawa drifuza eli vusi ri si, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi e'do aci memba board ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma o'duko eyi ga angu eyi ma alea tre, eyini ani e'yo 'da e'dazu saaru.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks, fueled by deep-seated grievances and a lack of communication. As frustrations boiled over, the atmosphere became charged with hostility.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki eziwera olw'okwemulugunya okw'amaanyi n'obutaba na mpuliziganya nnungi. Obwennyamivu bwe bwagenda bweyongera, embeera yeeyongera okuba ey'obukyayi.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi cabit ma okato angec, ma obedo macalo adwogi me cwer cwiny ki peko me lok. I kare ma cwer cwiny omede, cwiny me gero omede.
teo_prompt: Apolor akiro ngun adaun isabitin luipu, kanu angurian keda amamus na einer. Kwape apolor aiyalongong, apotu akwap kilelebunos keda amumu.

eng_prompt: Frustration among the citizens had been building for months as they faced increasing financial burdens. Many gathered in the town square to voice their concerns and demand change.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu mu bannansi bubadde bweyongera okumala emyezi nga boolekedde obuzito bw'ensimbi obweyongera. Bangi baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibangirizi ky'ekibuga okwogera ebibaluma n'okusaba enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki cwer cwiny pi dwe mapol pi peko me lim ma obedo kamedde. Dano mapol gugure i town square me tito peko gi ki mito aloka loka.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalongong kanu ilapio luipu naarai apotu kesi kodumutu ationis na ikapun. Apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos aiboisit naeyait ainapeta kotoma otaun kanu aitodun iboro lu epodokinito kesi ka ailip aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza kari anzi eyi ma eselea ri e'bi tu imba eyi ma alea eyini e'yo robia ni 'diyi esuzu tutu risi. Ba karakara eyi tra eyi aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi oluzu azini eyi lezu ojata.

eng_prompt: The school organized a field trip to the science museum to enhance the students' learning experience. To ensure everyone felt supported and engaged, teachers accompanied their students throughout the day.
lug_prompt: Essomero lyategese olugendo mu tterekero lya ssaayansi okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'abayizi mu kusoma. Okukakasa nti buli omu awulira nga awagirwa era nga yeenyigiddemu, abasomesa baawerekera abayizi baabwe olunaku lwonna.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne oyubu wot me cito ka neno jami macon me cayanc pi medo rwom me kwan pa lutino. Pi neno ni dano weng tye ki kony ki miti, lupwonye gubedo kacel ki lutino kwan gi nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Abu esomero itemok alosit aiboisit naingadaere akiro nuka sayanis kanu aitojokar aisisia naka esisiak. Kanu awanyun ebe igangitai itunga kere, apotu isisianakinak kojaunos keda esisiak apaaran kere.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da otu aci muzu pari afa ndundu eyi ma ta mbazu sayansini 'diyi ma alea sukulu anzi eyi ma onita ma omgbo otuzu. Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma isu atita azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi, imba'ba eyi ri sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi be o'du 'da ma alea dria.

eng_prompt: As the event date approached, the organizers realized the need for enhanced safety measures. To ensure a smooth and secure celebration, they deployed security personnel in preparation for the party.
lug_prompt: Olunaku lw'omukolo bwe lwasembera, abategesi baalaba obwetaavu bw'okwongera ku mutindo gw'ebyokwerinda. Okusobola okukakasa nti ebikujjuko bikolebwa bulungi era mu ngeri ey'obukuumi, baateekawo ab'eby'okwerinda okwetegekera akabaga.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma nino me yub ne cok cok, luyub ne oniang ni omyero kimed rwom me gwoko kuc. Me neno ni kwer ne owoto maber dok labongo ayela, kicwalo lugwok ber bedo I kabedo mapatpat me yube pi kwer ne.

lgg_prompt: O'du omu 'da ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Omu 'da ni aa'zu muke azini ageitema be, eyi 'ba 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi otuta 'yezu omu 'da ni.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent economic downturn and a significant decline in customer interest, the decision was made to close the facility. All transactions have been halted, and the staff has been informed of the changes.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'eby'enfuna gyebuvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'obwagazi bw'abaguzi, okusalawo kwakolebwa okuggalawo ekkolero. Enkolagana zonna ziyimiriziddwa, era abakozi bategeezeddwa ku nkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki wel luwil ma odok piny, kimoko tam me loro kacat meno. Kijuko tic weng dok ki niango lutic I kom aloka-loka matye.

eng_prompt: After a long week of hard work and dedication, the team gathered for a meeting to discuss their recent project. As they shared their accomplishments, it became clear that their efforts had not gone unnoticed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki empanvu ey'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, ttiimu yakungaana mu lukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti yaabwe eyaakaggwa. Nga boogera ku bye batuuseeko, kyeyoleka bulungi nti okufuba kwabwe tekubadde kwa bwereere.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit malac me tic matek ki keto cwiny, joo ne gugure pi kacokke me nywako lok I kom yub gi manyen. I kare ma gubedo ka lok I kom jami ma gutimo, nen atyer kamaleng ni dano bene guneno ticgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabiti loepol loka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu etimu kimorikikinos airiamun kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos epurojektikec. Neautar kesi aitetem nuapotu kesi iswamata, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe aponi kowanyunai aswamukec.

eng_prompt: After years of dreaming about exploring Africa, he finally booked a trip to the continent. Excitement filled him as he prepared for his journey, eager to experience the vibrant culture and stunning landscapes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'aloota ku ky'okulambula Afirika, yatuuka ekiseera n'akola enteekateeka okugenda ku ssemazinga oyo. Yafuna essanyu lingi nga yeetegekera olugendo lwe, ng'ayagala nnyo okulaba ebyobuwangwa n'ebifo ebirabika obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me bedo ki lek me cito ka limo lobo Afrika, lacen en oculu pi wot me cito I lobo man. En obedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma tye ka yubbe pi wot mege, ki miti me neno tekwaro ki kabedo mamwonya tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka airujasia nuikamunitos airereonor Africa, abu ngesi kodum alosit toma akwapin ngun. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos ngesi kotoma aitemonokin kanu alosit ke, ekoto noi ajenun inonosio keda aiboisio nuibusiak.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani orobi 'yezu Africa ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu otuta 'ye acizu angu Africa niri ma alia ra. Ayiko fu eri erini otuta 'yeria aci ivileri ni, ava be e'yo suruni 'diyi ndrezu tualu angu ndrizaru 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In recent years, urban development has surged, leading to a significant increase in commercial spaces. As a result, many markets have been constructed.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkulaakulana mu bibuga yeeyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu bifo eby'obusuubuzi. N'ekivuddemu, obutale bungi buzimbibwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dongo lobo I boma madongo omede tutwal, ma oweko kabedo me biacara omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyubu cuk mapol.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin apol naka itaunin, ido ayangau aiboisio nu agwelanar aiyatakin. Kanuka ngun, edukitai isokonin luipu.

eng_prompt: The bustling city of Kampala is known for its vibrant trade and commerce. Among its many attractions, one particular market stands out for its size and variety of goods.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kya Kampala ekirimu abantu abangi kimanyiddwa olw'ebyobusuubuzi ebirimu abantu abangi. Mu bintu bingi ebisikiriza, akatale kamu kaawukana ku ndala olw'obunene n'ebyamaguzi eby'enjawulo.

lgg_prompt: Ba ni aku ambo Kampala ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie ri tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie. Angu erini 'diyi ma eselea, cuu azi alu ni e'da e'yo erini afa ozizaru 'diyi ma omgbo azini wura ndundu 'diyisi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the nation's spending has far outpaced its revenue, leading to a significant financial crisis. As a result, the government is greatly indebted.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ensaasaanya y'eggwanga esukkulumye nnyo ku nfuna yaayo, ekiviiriddeko obuzibu bw'ensimbi obw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti ebanjibwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel cente ma lobo man tiyo kwede dong okato wel cente ma en nongo, man okelo peko me lim madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ki banya madit tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, robia kari ni ayu ri aga robia erini esu ri ra, e'yo fepi e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, gamete ma dria mari angiri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, enshohoza y'eihanga erengire munonga esente ezirikutunga, ekyarugiremu oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti eine amabanja maingi.

eng_prompt: Residents have been growing increasingly frustrated as essential services remain disrupted. Many are struggling to keep their perishable goods from spoiling.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze beeyongedde okunyiiga ng'obuweereza obw'omugaso butaataaganyizibwa. Bangi balwana okukuuma ebintu byabwe ebifa amangu obutayonooneka.

lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi ezaza e'bi tu ra a'dusikuni azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi nga po'di e'de ra. Ba karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma afa ecopi i ezapi mbeleru 'diyi ma tambazu eyini ani eyi ezazu ku.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye beeyongyeire kuhwa amaani ahabw'obuheereza bw'omugasho kuguma nibutataaganisibwa. Abantu baingi nibarwana kurinda ebintu byabo ebirikufa juba.

eng_prompt: Faced with rising electricity costs and environmental concerns, the community sought sustainable alternatives. After extensive research and discussions, they decided to explore renewable energy options.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'amasannyalaze okulinnya n'okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi, abantu banoonya engeri endala eziwangaala. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, baasalawo okunoonyereza ku ngeri endala ez'okukozesaamu amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel mac elektriciti tye ka medde ki lworo I kom cwec ma orumuwa, lwak guyenyo yoo mukene me tic. Ingee kwed ki nywako lok mapol, gumoko tam gi me yenyo yoo me nongo mac ma aa ki icing dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka akim naka epiei keda aiyalongongo naka akwap, apotu itunga kongicata iponesio luajokak. Akaulo naka aingic keda aitemitem akiro, apotu kesi koseutu aingic iwaitin lu itwasamaere akim.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise, shoppers gathered outside the entrance, their excitement palpable. Authorities had implemented strict measures to ensure everyone's safety during the bustling weekend market.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo, abaguzi baakuŋŋaanira wabweru w'omulyango, essanyu lyabwe nga lirabika. Ab'obuyinza baali bataddewo emitendera emikakali okulaba nga buli omu akuumibwa bulungi mu katale akajjudde abantu ku wiikendi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako aa malo, lucat wil gugure woko ki yom cwinygi. Lutela guketo cik matek tutwal me neno ni dano weng gubedo agwoka I kare ma dano mapol gubedo I cuk I tum cabit.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo, apotu agwelanarak kotukokinos kinga naka ekek, apotu iyalamasi. Apotu apedorosio ibwaikisi ainapeta nuepolok kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere kotoma osokoni loka angeset naka esabiti.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria efuzurisi, 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi tra yi ma eselea amve, ayiko yini 'diyi e'dazaru. Okpo e'ipi 'diyi 'ba ndra e'yo okporu 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma ta mba sa'wa cu sabitini i deria 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurugaho, abaguzi baketeerana aheeru y'orwigi, okushemererwa kwabo kukarebeka. Ab'obushoborozi bakaba bateireho oburyo bw'amaani okureeba ngu buri omwe yaaba aine oburinzi omu butare obwabaire burimu abantu baingi aha wiikendi.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious election process, the community has finally chosen a leader who embodies their values and aspirations. Many believe that this decision marks a turning point for the Muslim community in Arua.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okuwanvu era okw'okusika omuguwa, ekitundu kyaddaaki kyalonze omukulembeze alina empisa n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe. Bangi bakkiriza nti okusalawo kuno kulaga enkyukakyuka eri abasiraamu mu Arua.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me yer ma opong ki apoka-poka, lwak dong oyero latela matye ki miti gi. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni moko tam man obedo aloka-loka madit tutwal pi cilam me Arua.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aseo, apotu itunga koseutu engarenon lo itodolikini aomisio kec keda apeleikinata kec. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe erai aseunet na aijulakin aijar naka isiramun luko Arua.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ni sa'wa ezu azini ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ope asizu drice'ba eyi ma egata azini egata eyi ma eselea 'diyi ni. Ba karakara eyi ai'ki kini e'yo 'di oja e'yo isilamu eyi ma eselea Arua 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteera akaruuru akarikumara obwire buraingwa kandi akarimu entongane, abantu bakahendera kutoorana omwebembezi orikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaabo n'ebigyendererwa byabo. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu okusharamu oku nikureetaho empindahinduka omu bantu b'abasiraamu omuri Arua.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many have sought solace and guidance in their faith, believing it to be a source of harmony and understanding. As communities come together to share their beliefs, the underlying message often emphasizes the importance of compassion and unity.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, bangi banoonye okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi mu nzikiriza yaabwe, nga bakkiriza nti nsibuko ya kukkaanya n'okutegeeragana. Nga ebitundu bikungaana wamu okugabana enzikiriza zabyo, obubaka obuli emabega butera okukkaatiriza obukulu bw'obusaasizi n'obumu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, dano mapol guyenyo kwe cwiny ki kony ki I dini gi, kun gitye ki niyee ni obedo yoo me winye ki niang. I kare ma lwak cokke kacel me nywako tam gi, kwena ma aa ki botgi ipol kare nyutu ber pa kica ki ribe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, amoete itunga luipu agangat keda aingarenikinio kotoma aiyuunikec, iyuunitos ebe erai ngesi alibunet naka aimorikikina keda amisiikin. Neautar itunga aimorikikin nepepe kanu aimor aiyuunikec, akiro nuepolok duc itogogongitos ajokis naka aitim keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi nda asi omiza azini imbata eyi ma e'yo a'ita ni 'diyi ma alea, eyini a'izu kini eyi geri ti ecita ni azini vata ni 'diyi esuzu. Ongulumu eyini emuzu tualu e'yo eyini a'ita eyivile 'diyi awazu risi, o'duko eyini esu ri ni tutuni asi 'ba asi ndriza azini ti ecita ma orodri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, baingi batwire nibasherura okuhuumurizibwa n'obuhabuzi omu nyikiriza zaabo, barikwikiriza ngu n'oburugo bw'obumwe n'okwetegyerezana. Abantu ku barikukorera hamwe okubagana enyikiriza zaabo, obutumwa oburikukwata ahari bo, nibuhamya omugasho gw'okusaasira n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various belief systems have shaped human interactions and moral frameworks. By providing guidelines for ethical conduct, these teachings help maintain social order and harmony.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, enzikiriza ez'enjawulo zitondedde enkolagana y'abantu n'emitendera gy'empisa. Mu kuwa ebiragiro ku mpisa, enjigiriza zino ziyamba okukuuma emirembe n'obumu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare weng me tekwaro pa dano, dini mapat-pat okelo alokaloka I kwo pa dano kacel ki kit me kwo gi. Pi miyo cik ma doro kit me kwo, pwony magi konyo me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu iyuunito luegelegela itopoloutu eipone lo itwasamaere itunga keda iponesio luka itunga. Kowai lo aijaikin aicoreta nuka iponesio luajokak, ingarakinete aisisianakino ngun aidar ainapakina keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo aita ni ndundu 'diyi oja e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea 'diyi azini geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi. E'yo driceza fezu 'yeta kililiru 'diyi ma dria risi, e'yo 'diyi azakoma fe 'ba eyi ma eselea aa'ta kililiru azini aa'ta tualu ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, enyikiriza ezitari zimwe, zitwire nizikora aha nkoragana y'abantu hamwe n'emitwarize yaabo. Ahabw'okuheereza engyenderwaho y'emitwarize mirungi,enyegyesa ezi nizihwera omu kurinda obusingye n'obutereera omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered to witness the transition of leadership, anticipation filled the air. However, the atmosphere shifted when it became clear that the outgoing Kadhi would not be present.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaanye okulaba enkyukakyuka y'obukulembeze, waaliwo okweraliikirira kungi. Naye embeera yakyuka bwe kyategeerekeka nti Khadi eyali agenda okuva mu ntebe yali tagenda kubaawo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gugure me neno aloka loka me tela, dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, jami olokke ikare ma onen atyer kamaleng ni Kadhi macon pe obubedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu asesen aijulanakineta nuka engarenone, apotu itunga luipu opotu. Konye, abu ejautene kijulakin netogogongor ebe mam ekadhi lo ebeit ajaikin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini eyi trazu eyi ndrezu e'yo driceza ni ojazu ri ma dria, asi 'baza eyi ga angu 'da ma alea tre. Kani si, e'yo oja'i erini ecazu e'dazaru kini Khadi okuri ngani mu adri 'dani ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe okureeba empinduka y'obwebembezi, haabaho amatsiko maingi. Kwonka, embeera ekahinduka bwanyima y'okureebeka ngu Khadi owabaire naaza kurugaho akaba atarikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: As the transition period approached, tensions began to rise within the office. The outgoing Kadhi expressed reluctance about leaving his position and the responsibilities that came with it.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'enkyukakyuka bwe kyasembera, obunkenke bwatandika okulinnya mu woofiisi. Kadhi agenda okuva mu ntebe yalaga obutayagala kuva mu kifo kye n'obuvunaanyizibwa obwali bujja nakyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kare me aloka-loka ne cok, telle ocako medde I gang tic ne. Kadhi macon onyuto cwer cwiny I kom weko ticce ki tic ma obino kwede.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aijulanakineta, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin koyapiesi. Abu Khadi loajai oicolong itodunit ebe mam ngesi ekoto ajalakin adoketaitike keda aswamisinei nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ojata niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, asi otiza e'do tu ofisi 'da ma alea. Khadi amve ri ece asi otiza erini pari erini 'diyi kuzu azini azi emu'ba 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'empindahinduka ku bwahikire, obunkenke bukatandika kweyongyera omu ofiisi. Kadhi orikuza kurugaho akooreka okwetantara kureka omwanya gwe hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa obwarikwija nagwo.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose in the crowd, concerns about potential unrest grew among the organizers of the event. In response to the escalating situation, local authorities decided to deploy additional officers to the area.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu bantu, okweraliikirira ku butabanguko obuyinza okubaawo kweyongera mu bategesi b'omukolo. Mu kwanukula embeera eyeeyongera, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baasalawo okusindika abasirikale abalala mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde I kin lwak, lworo I kom jemo bene omedde I kin luyub yub eni. Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko enoni, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me cwalo abili mukene I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Neapolor aiyalongong kanejaas itunga, apolor aiyalongong kanejaas lu etemonokinak epucit. Kanu aitemokin ejautene loepolor, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ibwaikisi ipolisin aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu o'bi eyi ma eselea, asi otiza e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria ri tu 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'da ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo azi'ba eyi ma ti pezu angu 'da ma alea dika.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu bantu, okwerarikirira aha butabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho kweyongyeire omu batebeekanisa b'omukoro. Ahabw'embeera eyeyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakacwamu kwongyera ba ofiisa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: After a long period of uncertainty and division, the recent election has brought a sense of unity among the community. Many believe that the new leaders will prioritize inclusivity and address the concerns that have long been overlooked.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera ekiwanvu eky'obutali bukakafu n'enjawukana, okulonda okwakakolebwa kuleese obumu mu bantu. Bangi balowooza nti abakulembeze abapya bajja kukulembeza okwetabyamu n'okukola ku nsonga ezibadde zibuusibwa amaaso okumala ebbanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me telle ki apoka-poka, yer ma otime cokcok-ki okelo ribe ikin lwak. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni lutela manyen gubi keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom dano weng ki cobo peko ma dano gubedo ka cayo pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka amamus acamanar keda atiakatiaka, ayangau aseo na pac aimorikikina kanejaas itunga. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epote engarenok luitetiak aisingarenit aitodolikin itunga kere ka aitemokin atiokisio nuelangir noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ezu e'yo ewaru azini esele coza ma vutia, opeta ebipi o'diru 'diyi eji ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea ra. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini drice'ba o'diru 'diyi nga e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba dria be ri 'du okporu dika eyi nga e'yo 'bani ebi adi 'bo 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bureingwa bw'obutakwatanisa n'okwebaganisamu, akaruuru akahweire kareesireho okukwatanisa omu bantu. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu abebembezi abasya nibaija kwebembeza okukoragana n'abantu boona, n'okukora aha nshonga ezitwire nizirekyererwa kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: In a historic election, the community has chosen a leader who embodies their values and aspirations. With a commitment to fostering understanding and dialogue, the new Kadhi brings a wealth of knowledge to the position.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okw'ebyafaayo, ekitundu kyalonze omukulembeze alina empisa n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe. Olw'obumalirivu bw'okutumbula okutegeera n'okuteesa, Khadi omuggya aleese amagezi mangi mu kifo kino.
ach_prompt: I yer ma obedo me tekwaro, lwak oyero latela ma cobo miti gi. Kadhi manyen ne okelo ngec mapol tutwal I kabedo ne ki keto cwinye me kelo winye ki laro lok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo naka akiro nukolosek, aseutu itunga engarenon lo itodolikini aomisio kec keda apeleikinata kec. Keda ainakina kanu aitopolor acamanara keda aineranara, ayangauni Khadi loitetet acoa naepol noi toma adoketaitike.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu eyi ope drice'ba eyi ma egata azini e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'bapi ra ni i. Asi feza e'yo vata ni azini agbatara ma omgbo otuzu risi, Khadi o'diri ni ondua angiri eji pari 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru k'ebyafaayo, abantu batooraine omwebembezi orikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaabo n'ebigyendererwa byabo. Ahabw'okwehayo kureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okuhanuura, Khadi omusya naareeta obwengye bwingi aha ntebe.

eng_prompt: In the recent community gathering, discussions centered around the importance of leadership in their faith. Many attendees expressed their hopes for a divine selection in the appointment of the new Kadhi.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwali kukwata ku bukulu bw'obukulembeze mu nzikiriza yaabwe. Bangi abaaliwo baalaga essuubi lyabwe mu kulondebwa kwa Kadhi omuggya.
ach_prompt: I kacokke pa lwak ma okato cokcok-ki, nywako lok obedo I kom ber pa tela I dini gi. Dano mapol ma gubedo tye guwaco ni gitye ki gen ni Lubanga aye biyero Kadhi manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga pac, apotu ineresinei kisingarenos nuikamunitos ajokis naka eingarenone kotoma aiyuunikec. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu amuno kec kanu aseun ekadhi loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Okuta ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza 'diyi 'ba asi orodri driceza niri ma dria e'yo aita eyini 'diyi ma alea. Ba karakara emu'ba 'diyi ece asi'baza yini 'bani 'ba opele Kadhi o'diru ri opezu engazu Mungu vu ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekicweka orwabaireho juba, okuhanuura kukaba kukwatiraine n'omugasho gw'obwebembezi omu nyikiriza yaabo. Abaabaire bariho bo boorekire amatsiko gaabo ngu Ruhanga naija kutoorana Khadi omusya.

eng_prompt: After a heated election process, the community gathered to discuss the future of their leadership. Ultimately, the consensus was clear: they needed a strong and unifying figure to guide them in their spiritual and legal matters.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okw'amaanyi, abantu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'obukulembeze bwabwe eby'omu maaso. Mu nkomerero, okukkaanya kwali kutegeerekeka bulungi: baali beetaaga omuntu ow'amaanyi era ow'obumu okubakulembera mu nsonga zaabwe ez'omwoyo n'ez'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer matek tutwal, lwak gugure me nywako lok I kom anyim pa lutela gi. I agiki ne, winye obedo maleng: onongo gimito ngat ma tek dok ma ribe me telogi I lok me cwiny ki cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseo naepol noi, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem ingaren naka engarenok kec. Kawasia, aticepak ecai acamanara: ekotosi kesi itunganan yenegogong ka aimorikikin kanu aingarenikin kesi kotoma akiro nuka edini keda nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ni okporu 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu eyi ma driceza ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria. Asizu, ti ecita nderi e'da kililiru: eyi le ndra 'ba okporu azini ti ecita ejipi eyi ma dri cepi e'yo eyini aita ni 'diyi ma alea azini e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaruuru k'amaani, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nyensya y'obwebembezi bwabo. Ekyarugiremu, okwikirizana kukaba kworekyeire kimwe: bakaba nibenda omuntu w'amaani kandi arikukwatanisa kubarabura omu nshonga zaabo ez'eby'omwoyo hamwe n'ez'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for educated leadership within the Muslim community, a new initiative has been launched. This initiative aims to establish a dedicated institution focused on the development of future leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obukulembeze obusomye mu kitundu ky'abasiraamu, enteekateeka empya etongozeddwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu kutondawo kitongole ekyesigamye ku kukulaakulanya abakulembeze b'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lutela ma gukwano I dini cilam, kicako yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me cako dul ma keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo pa lutela me kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka engarenok lu esiomitos kotoma atutubet naka isiramun, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitolomun atukot naepodokinit aitopoloun engarenok lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu drice'ba isilamu eyini sukulu lapi ra 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu amuti azi 'bani asi 'bazu drice'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ezozu ni e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'obwebeembezi obwegyese omu bantu b'abasiraamu, enteekateeka nsya etandikirweho. Ekigyendererwa n'okutandikaho eitendekyero eririkugyenderera okutunguura abebembezi b'omubiro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In many communities, there is a growing belief that internal disputes can be resolved more effectively without external intervention. This perspective emphasizes the importance of self-reliance and trust within the community.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, waliwo okukkiriza okweyongera nti enkaayana z'omunda zisobola okugonjoolwa bulungi awatali kuyingirira kw'ebweru. Endowooza eno ekkaatiriza obukulu bw'okweyimirizaawo n'okwesiga mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tye tam matye kamede ni telle matye ikin dano gitwero tyeko gi labongo kony pa lobo ma woko. Tam man nyutu ber pa bedo ki gen ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, ejai aiyuun ebe epedorio aitemokin ingungeta luka akwapuwok kopone kaloajokan. Itodunit aomisioit ngin ajokis naka agogong keda amunokina kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba eco e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru e'yo amve 'diyi kokoru. Egata 'diri okpo 'ba orodri 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si dika asi'baza be ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, hariho enteekateeka erikweyongyera ngu entongane z'omunda nizibaasa kukorwaho kurungi hatariho ab'aheeru. Ekiteekateeko eki nikigumya omugasho gw'okwekorera hamwe n'okwesiga abantu omu byaro.

eng_prompt: After months of speculation about leadership changes, the government announced a series of personnel shifts in various districts. Among the most notable changes was the relocation of the resident district commissioner.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga bateebereza ku nkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze, gavumenti yalangirira enkyukakyuka mu bantu mu disitulikiti ez'enjawulo. Mu nkyukakyuka ezaasinga okweyoleka kwe kukyusa pulezidenti wa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me byek I kom aloka-loka me tela, gamente onyuto aloka-loka pa lutic I districts mapat-pat. I kin aloka-loka ma pire tek tutwal obedo kobo pa lador dul me Resident District Commissioner.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomisio nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka engarenok, abu apugan kolimo aijulanakineta nuka eswamak ko disitriktan luegelegela. Adiope kotoma aijulanakineta nuapolok ngesi aijulakin ekomisiona loka edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Mba karakara eyi ma vutia, gamete azi 'ba eyi ma ojata distrikiti ndundu eyi ma alea. Ojata okporu ndeni 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba resident district commissioner ru ri ojazu angu nduni ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteebereza aha mpindahinduka y'obwebembezi, gavumenti ekarangirira empindahinduka y'abakozi omu disiturikiti ezitari zimwe. Omu mpindahinduka ez'omutaano hakaba harimu okuhindura omujwekyerwa w'omwebembezi w'eihanga aha disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly awaiting updates on the installation process. However, recent discussions have left many questions unanswered.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde balindirira obubaka obukwata ku ngeri y'okuteekamu ebintu. Newankubadde, okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa kulese ebibuuzo bingi ebitannaba kuddibwamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kakuru lok manyen I kom kit ma yub eni obi time kwede. Kadi bed kumeno, nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki oweko lapeny mapol ma pe kigamo.
teo_prompt: Auta itunga aidar akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos epone loka aibwaikin. Konye, apotu ipegeta lu atuboros kojalakisi aingiseta nuipu nu mam ebongonokinitai.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi o'dukoti eyi te asi driasi geri 'bani afa 'da eyi osuzu ri ma dria. Kani si, e'yo onzeza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ku zita karakara eyi omvi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire bategyereize n'omuhimbo amakuru ag'omutaano agarikukwata aha nkora y'okutaho ebyoma. Kwonka, okuhanuura okuhweireho kuretsireho ebibuuzo bingi ebitarikugarukwamu.

eng_prompt: Located in the northwestern region of Uganda, the Arua Muslim district is known for its diverse cultural heritage and vibrant communities. It serves as an important center for the Muslim population in the area, fostering unity and collaboration among its residents.
lug_prompt: Disitulikiti y'Abasiraamu eya Arua esangibwa mu bukiikakkono bw'obugwanjuba bwa Uganda era emanyiddwa nnyo olw'ebyobuwangwa n'abantu baayo ab'enjawulo. Kikola nga ekifo ekikulu eri abasiraamu mu kitundu, ekitumbula obumu n'enkolagana mu batuuze baayo.
ach_prompt: Arua Muslim district ma nonge I kumalo me kupoto ceng me Uganda, ngene pi tekwaro gi mapat-pat ki kabedo ma dano gi bedo iye. Obedo kabedo ma pire tek tutwal pi cilam ma ikabedo enuni, ma kelo ribe ki winye ikin lutedero ne.
teo_prompt: Ejai toma atutubet nako nyakoi nako Uganda, ejenara noi edisitrikta loka isiramun loka Arua kanu inonosio luegelegela keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Iswamai kwape aiboisit naepol noi naka isiramun kotoma aiboisit kangin, ayangaun aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba distrikiti isilamu eyini Arua niri esu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma woko etu ni 'deria, dika eri ni i ma e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyisi tualu ongulumu eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu Eri azi nga angu orodriru isilamu eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea ri ru, erini ti ecita azini ti icita ejizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Disiturikiti y'abasiraamu eya Arua, eri omu kicweka ky'amatemba g'oburengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda, nemanywa ahabw'obuhangwa bwayo n'abantu baayo. Nikikora nk'omwanya mukuru gw'abasiraamu omu kyanga, ekirikureetaho okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa omu batuuragye baayo.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing number of displaced families, local education authorities implemented a training program. This initiative aimed to enhance the capabilities of school leaders in effectively managing diverse classrooms.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'amaka agaasengulwa ogweyongera, ab'ebyenjigiriza mu kitundu baateekawo enteekateeka y'okutendeka. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obusobozi bw'abakulembeze b'amasomero mu kuddukanya obulungi ebibiina eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lugangi ma orwenyo gangi gi, lutela me gangi kwan guyubu yub me pwonye. Yub man obedo me medo kero pa lutela me gangi kwan me doro gangi kwan mapat-pat maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loka ikalia lu ekerete, apotu apedorosio nuka asioman itolomutu ainapeta nuka aituutoorio. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar apedor naka engarenok lu isomeroi aitolot atukono nu egelegela ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba e'yo onita ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba otita imbatani ni 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu drice'ba sukulu ni 'diyi ma okpo otuzu kilasi ndundu eyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'amaka ogweyongyeire, abarikukurira eby'obwegyese omu byaro bakataho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kutunguura obushoboorozi bw'abebembezi b'amashomero omu kukora kurungi ebibiina ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve education standards, the government announced a new initiative to support educators. As part of this program, a significant number of teachers were selected to receive financial assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuyamba abasomesa. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, abasomesa bangi baalondeddwa okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan, gamente okati ki yub manyen me konyo lupwonye. Macalo but yub man, ki yero lupwonye mapol me nongo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar adoketait na asioman, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang isisianakinak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, aponi koseunai isisianakinak luipu kanu adumun agangat naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'diru ni atita fezu imba'ba eyini. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba pe imba'ba kalafe angiri ni eyi atita robia niri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera abegyesa. Nk'emwe aha puroguraamu egi, abegyesa baingi bakatooranwa kutunga obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: To foster a collaborative learning environment, a comprehensive program has been developed. This initiative aims to engage all stakeholders in the educational process.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'okusomera awamu, enteekateeka enzijuvu ekoleddwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okwetabyamu abakwatibwako bonna mu nkola y'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me kwan ma winye tye iye, kiyubu yub maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me kelo dano weng I yub me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopoloria aisisia na aimorikikina, etolomun ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aimorikikin itunga kere toma aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otita azi dria 'diyi. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba dria e'yo onitani 'diyi 'bazu e'yo onitani 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera y'okwega erimu okukwatanisa, enteekateeka nungi ekozirweho. Ekigyendererwa ky'ekigyendererwa eki n'okureeta abantu boona omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster a sense of national pride and unity within the school community, the educational program was designed to engage both teachers and students in collaborative activities. This initiative aimed to strengthen their connection to the country's values and history.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enneewulira y'eggwanga n'obumu mu bantu b'essomero, enteekateeka y'ebyenjigiriza yakolebwa okwetabyamu abasomesa n'abayizi mu mirimu egy'awamu. Ekigendererwa kino kyali kya kunyweza nkolagana yaabwe n'empisa n'ebyafaayo by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo awaka me lobo kacel ki ribe ikin lutino kwan, yub me pwony ne kiyubu me weko lupwonye ki lutino kwan gubed tye ikit me tic kacel. Yub man obedo me jingo wat ikin gi ki tekwaro me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiyalama keda aimorikikina kotoma atutubet naka esomero, aponi kitemokinai ainapeta nuka aisisia aimorikikin isisianakinak keda esisiak aswamisinei nu aiswamanara. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun arai aitogogong arucokina kec keda inonosio keda akiro nukolosek nuka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma dria tualu ti ecita be ongulumu sukulu niri ma alea, 'ba ede otita onita ni 'diyi imba'ba eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie 'yeta tualu 'diyi 'yezu. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu yi ma esele cozu e'yo orodriru kari ni azini adi kari ni 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho ekitiinisa ky'eihanga hamwe n'okukwatanisa omu bantu b'eishomero, puroguraamu y'eby'obwegyese ekateebwaho okureetera abeegyesa n'abeegi kukorera hamwe. Ekigyendererwa kikaba kigyendereire kuhamya okukwatanisa kwabo n'emitwarize n'ebyafaayo by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing budgetary pressures and the need for greater accountability, schools implemented training programs for their leadership teams. As a result, headteachers acquired financial management skills.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okunyigirizibwa kw'embalirira okweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'obuvunaanyizibwa obusingawo, amasomero gatadde mu nkola enteekateeka z'okutendeka abakulembeze baago. N'ekyavaamu, abakulu b'amasomero baafuna obukugu mu nzirukanya y'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa peko me byek lim ki miti me tic ki kor tic, gangi kwan guketo yub me pwonye pi lutela gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ludito gangkwan gunongo diro me tic ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka ebajet keda eipud loka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, apotu isomeroi itolomutu ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro kanuka itimun luka engarenok kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu lukapolok isomeroi odumutu acoa naka aidar ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje robia niri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria, sukulu eyi e'do otita imbatani eyi amuti eyivile driceza ni 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, dricere eyi esu ondua robia ayuza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra obweyongyeire hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwongyera embaririra, amashomero gakataho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abebembezi baabo. Ekyarugiremu, bakuru b'amashomero, bakatunga emyoga y'okureeberera esente.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among educators is essential for fostering a positive learning environment. By sharing ideas and resources, they can create effective strategies that benefit both students and the school community.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'abasomesa ya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi. Nga bagabana ebirowoozo n'ebikozesebwa, basobola okutondawo enkola ennungi ezigasa abayizi n'ebitundu by'essomero.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin lupwonye pire tek tutwal pi dongo kabedo maber me kwan. Ki nywako tam ki jami ma mite, gitwero yubu yoo me tic ma konyo lutino kwan ki lwak me gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kiding isisianakinak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria esomero loajokan. Kowai lo aimor aomisio keda iboro, epedorete kesi aitolomun iwaitin lu imedaunete esisiak keda esomero.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita imba'ba eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo eyi awazu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie risi, eyi eco geri kililiru sukulu anzi eyini azini ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma orodri ejipi ra 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa ahagati y'abeegyesa n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Kubarikubagana ebiteekateeko n'ebintu, nibabaasa kukora enkora nungi erikugasira abeegi hamwe n'abantu b'eishomero.

eng_prompt: To ensure transparency and accountability, it is essential to establish clear boundaries between governance and financial management. Allowing school directors to oversee funds could lead to conflicts of interest and undermine the integrity of the budgeting process.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa, kya mugaso okuteekawo ensalo entegeerekeka wakati w'obukulembeze n'enzirukanya y'ensimbi. Okukkiriza ba dayirekita b'amasomero okulondoola ensimbi kiyinza okuviirako okukontana kw'ebigendererwa n'okutyoboola obulungi bw'enkola y'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami weng tye atir, pire tek tutwal me poko kin tela ki kit me tic ki lim. Miyo twero ki ludito me gangi kwan me doro tic ki lim twero kelo apoka-poka I kom miti pa gangi kwan ki balo ber bedo pa yub me byek me lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ibusakinit aitolomun ikoruo lu ecaete kiding epugae keda eyaitene loka ikapun. Aicamakin engarenok lu isomeroi aimaniman ikapun epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuka ipudesia ka aitolitol ainapeta nuka ebajet.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu e'yo ada be azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru esele coza e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma eselea azini geri robia ayuza ni 'diyi ma eselea ri 'bazu kililiru. E'yo drice'ba sukulu ni 'diyi driwala fezu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu ri eco fe e'yo 'ba eyini lele 'diyi ma esele cozu ra dika eri eco e'yo 'bani otita bajeti ni 'diyi 'yezu ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra, n'eky'omugasho okutaho ensharo ahagati y'obwebembezi n'okureeberera esente. Okwikiriza abebembezi b'amashomero okureeberera esente, nikibaasa kureetaho okurwanisa ebyetengo kandi kikashiisha emiteekateekyere y'embaririra.

eng_prompt: In any situation where disagreements arise, it is crucial to address them in a structured manner. Adhering to established guidelines not only ensures fairness but also promotes resolution.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna obutakkaanya gye bujja, kikulu nnyo okubugonjoola mu ngeri entegeke. Okukolera ku mateeka agaateekebwawo tekikoma ku kukakasa bwenkanya naye era kiyamba okugonjoola ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare mo keken ma telle tye, pire tek tutwal me tyeko ne I yoo matir. Lubu cik ma kiketo pe weko dano timo jami i yo maber keken ento bene kelo alokaloka.
teo_prompt: Kojautene ediokere loepedorere amamut acamanar, ejokuna aitemokin ngun koipone kaloejok. Aitup aicoreta nu itolomunitai mam einakinit bon aitodolikin ationis konye eyangauni aitemokineta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria erita ako ni efuzu 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo nde eyi ma aza ko geri kililiru si. Azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizuri feni lu e'yo liza kililiru ku te eri vini e'yo eyi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera yoona etarikwikirizana, nikirungi kukikoraho omu muringo ogutebekanisiibwe. Okukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho tikirikureeta oburingaaniza, kureka nikureetaho n'oburingaaniza.
