eng_prompt: To ensure that all attendees can fully engage with the material presented, we will provide comprehensive resources. This will help reinforce the key concepts discussed during the session.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti bonna abeetabye mu lukungaana basobola okwenyigira mu bujjuvu mu bintu ebyanjuddwa, tujja kuteekawo ebikozesebwa byonna. Kino kijja kuyamba okunyweza ensonga enkulu ezaakubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo mu lutuula.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni dano weng ma gubedo tye i kacokke guwinyo lok ma kikelo, wabi miyo jami weng ma mite. Man bikonyo me jingo tam mapigi tego ma kinywako I komgi I kare me kacoke.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere ajaut keda akiro nu itodiaritai, ibuni sio aijaikin iboro luipu. Ingarakini ngin aitogogong aomisio nuapolok nu ineritere kapak kana airiamunet.
lgg_prompt: Nezu ra kini 'ba dria emu'ba 'diyi eco fi e'yo 'bani nze 'diyi ma alia ra, ama nga afa dria 'diyi fe. Diri nga azakoma fe e'yo okporu 'bani nze sawa 'bani e'yo erizuri ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abaizire omu ruteerane boona babaasa kwejumba omu by'okwega, nitwija kuheereza eby'okukoresa bingi. Eki nikiija kuhwera omu kwongyera amaani omubiteekateeko ebikuru ebirikugambwaho omu rukiiko.

eng_prompt: The organization launched a new initiative to enhance skills in the community. As part of this effort, a comprehensive training program was developed.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka empya okutumbula obukugu mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa mu bujjuvu yakolebwa.
ach_prompt: Dul ne ocako yub manyen me ilo malo rwom me diro I kabedo gi. Macalo but tic man, kiyubu yub me pwonye mapol.
teo_prompt: Abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aikeuna acoa kotunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuituutoonorere.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da e'do otita azi o'diru ni ondua ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do otita imbatani 'diyi dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okutunguura emyoga omu bantu. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu ekabaho.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the school community as differing priorities and expectations emerge. As a result, communication has broken down, leading to misunderstandings and disagreements.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu ky'essomero nga ebintu ebikulu n'ebisuubirwa eby'enjawulo bivaayo. N'ekivuddemu, empuliziganya eyonoonese, ekiviiriddeko obutategeeragana n'obutakkaanya.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lutino kwan ikare ma jami ma pigi tego ki miti mapat-pat obino. Macalo adwogi ne, lok oket woko, ma oweko winye ki telle obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotoma atutubet naka esomero naarai ejaas iboro luegelegela luebeit aswam ka iboro lu eomitai ebe ibusakinit aswam. Kanuka ngun, abu aineranara itolitol, eyangauni amamus acamanar keda acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebi tu ongulumu sukulu ni 'diyi ma eselea e'yo ndundu eyini ega eyi ma dria tualu e'yo ndundu eyini ega eyi ma dria 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo nzeza eza i ra, e'yo erita ako azini erita ako ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bantu b'eishomero, ahabw'okuba ebintu ebitarikushushana n'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana bitandikire kubaho. N'ekyarugiremu,empurizagana esiisire, ekirikureetaho obutetegyerezana n'obutakwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In nature, ecosystems thrive independently, showcasing the resilience of various species. Many organisms have adapted to survive and flourish in their environments, relying solely on natural processes.
lug_prompt: Mu butonde, obutonde bukula bulungi ku bwabwo, ekiraga obugumu bw'ebika eby'enjawulo. Ebintu ebiramu bingi bikyusizza okusobola okuwangaala n'okukulaakulana mu bibatwetoolodde, nga byesigama ku butonde bwokka.
ach_prompt: I cwec ma orumuwa, cwec ma orumuwa dongo labongo kony pa cwec ma orumuwa, man nyutu kero pa jami mapat-pat me kwo. Jami makwo mapol guyube me kwo ki dongo I kabedo gi, kun gijenge I kom jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap, epoloete isuban bon bon bon, itodunitos apedor naka iponesio luegelegela. Apotu iboro luipu lu ejarete kopedosi aijar kosodete apoloun kotoma aiboisio kec, kowai lo aijar kotoma isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Angu nyakuni 'diyi ma alia, afa idri ta mbazu 'diyi zo yi ma ngulupisi, afa esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma okpo e'dapi. Afa idriru karakara 'diyi oja yi idri ta mbazu azini zozu angu yi ma ageia 'diyi ma alia, yi ati lu e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa, eby'obuhangwa nibyeyendeza, ekirikworeka oburemeezi bw'ebintu ebitarikushushana. Ebihangirwe ebingi byetegyereize okubaho n'okutunguuka omu myanya yaabyo, birikwesiga eby'obuhangwa byonka.

eng_prompt: In a highly anticipated match, Onduparaka faced off against Kampala Capital City Authority in front of a passionate home crowd. Despite their efforts, the team struggled to find the back of the net.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogubadde gusuubirwa ennyo, Onduparaka yattunka ne Kampala Capital City Authority mu maaso g'abawagizi b'awaka abanyiikivu. Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka, ttiimu yazibuwalirwa okufuna enkomerero y'akatimba.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma byek tye I kome tutwal, Onduparaka opyem ki dul me Kampala Capital City Authority I nyim lwak ma cwinygi obedo yom tutwal. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek tutwal, dul tuku ne onongo tek tutwal me nongo lageng pa net.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naewomitai ebe ebuni, abu Onduparaka kiteleka keda Atukot naeyait ainapeta ko Kampala. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu, apotu etimu kongurianata adumun akwap naka eneti.
lgg_prompt: A'bala 'bani ega 'diyi ma alea, Onduparaka fu dri Kampala Capital City Authority be 'ba avaru aku eselesi 'diyi ma drilia. Okpo yini 'diyi ma talasi, amuti mupira avipi 'da esu e'yo ewaru geri mupira avizu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano ogurikuteekateekwaho munonga, Onduparaka ekateeraana n'ekitongore kya Kampala Capital City Authority omu maisho g'abahagizi baayo. Oihireho amaani gaabo, tiimu ekarwana kuronda enyima y'akatimba.

eng_prompt: In a thrilling match against their rivals, the team showcased their tactical prowess. Their ability to capitalize on set-pieces proved to be a game-changer.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogw'essanyu ne be baavuganya nabo, ttiimu yalaze obukodyo bwayo. Obusobozi bwabwe obw'okukozesa ssente ku bintu ebiteekeddwateekeddwa kyalaga nti kyaleetawo enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma oyomo cwiny tutwal ki joo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi, dul tuku eni onyuto diro gi. Kero meggi me nongo cente ki I kom jami ma kiyubu obedo gin ma okelo aloka-loka.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naetapit noi keda lueboloboloete keda kesi, apotu itimun itodutu acoasineikec. Apedorit kec naka aitolomun ikapun kotoma aiboisio nueswamauna apotu ijulakisi.
lgg_prompt: Mupira aviza ndrizaru 'ba yini baka sezu yi be 'diyi ma alia, amuti 'da e'da okpo yini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Yi ma okpo tujari 'yezu e'yo 'bani 'ba o'ba 'diyi ma dria ri oja e'yo ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano gw'okushemererwa n'abaabaire nibahakanisa, tiimu ekoreka obukoryo bwayo. Obushoboorozi bwabo bw'okukoresa esente zaabo, bukareetaho empindahinduka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite their strong attacking lineup, the team has struggled to maintain a solid backline throughout the season. As a result, they have frequently conceded goals in crucial matches.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde ttiimu yaayo ya maanyi mu kulumba, ebadde erwana okukuuma omutindo omulungi mu sizoni yonna. N'ekivuddemu, batera okuteeba ggoolo mu mipiira emikulu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul tuku meggi tye ki ludito ma gitye ka lweny matek tutwal, dul tuku ne obedo ka tute matek tutwal me gwoko dul tuku gi I kare me tuku eni weng. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gimiyo golo I tuko mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda eswamae loajokan noi loka asurokinio, etiono etimu ajaut keda eswamae loajokan noi kotoma apak kana kere. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aipet igolon kotoma aboliasio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma esele 'ba amvu 'yapi okporu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti 'da ebi dri ci eyi ma eselea okporu 'diyi ma tambazu ayi ti 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'bi golo eyi osu abala okporu 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enkora yaabo y'amaani omu kutahirira, tiimu etandikire kurwana kurinda enkora nungi omu siizoni yoona. N'ekyarugiremu, bakira kuteeba gooro omu mizaano mikuru.

eng_prompt: In a thrilling match filled with intense competition, both teams showcased their skills and determination. However, it was clear from the outset that one side had the upper hand.
lug_prompt: Mu muzannyo ogwabadde gujjudde okuvuganya okw'amaanyi, ttiimu zombi zaalaze obukugu bwazo n'obumalirivu. Kyokka, kyalabika bulungi okuviira ddala ku ntandikwa nti oludda olumu lwe lwali lusinga.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma opong ki pyem matek tutwal, team aryo weng gunyuto diro ki miti gi. Kadi bed kumeno, nen atyer kamaleng nicake I acaki ni tung botgi acel aye oloyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naetapit noi keda abolobol naepol noi, apotu itimun iarei itodutu acoasineikec keda agogongukec. Konye, apotu kojenutu ageunet ebe ejai ediopetunganan akerianut.
lgg_prompt: Abala ndrizaru a'bala okporu be 'diyi ma alea, amuti iri 'diyi e'da eyi ma ondua azini asi 'baza eyi ma dria. Kani si, e'da i e'dozu e'doria kini kala alu ni okpo be.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano ogwabaire gurimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, tiimu zombi zikworeka emyoga yaazo n'obumazima bwazo. Kwonka, kikarebeka kurugiirira aha ntandikwa ngu orubaju rumwe nirwe rwabaire nirusinga.

eng_prompt: Despite dominating possession throughout the match, the team struggled to find the back of the net. Their lack of finishing touch proved costly as they failed to capitalize on several clear chances.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakubye ggoolo nnyingi mu luzannya lwonna, ttiimu yafunye obuzibu okufuna ggoolo emabega. Ebbula lyabwe ery'okumaliriza lyasangibwa nga ery'omugaso nga balemererwa okweyambisa emikisa egiwerako.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni onongo gitye ki odilo mapol tutwal I kare me tuko, team odilo ne obedo ka tute matek me nongo odilo I nge net. Bedo peke gi me tyeko tic ne okelo peko madit tutwal ikare ma pe gutiyo ki gum mabeco mapol.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda emopira loepol noi kotoma abolia, apotu etimu kongicata noi adumun akwap naka eneti. Amamus kec naka aitodolikin abu koinak kesi etiai loepol noi naarai apotu kesi ipikosi aitwasam arerengesio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu golo be abala ma alia dria ra ti, amuti mupira avipi 'da ri dri ci geri mupira avizu 'diyi esuzu. Eyi ma e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu kililiru ku ri e'da eyi ma aje angiri eyini eyi awini drileba onyiru 'diyi ayu ku risi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteera emipiira omu mupiira gwona, tiimu ekarwana kuronda enyima y'akatimba. Okuremwa kumaririza kikareetaho oburemeezi ahabw'okuremwa kukoresa emigisha mingi.

eng_prompt: After a promising start to the season, the team faced a tough challenge in their latest match. Fans were hopeful that Onduparaka would continue their winning streak, but the outcome was disappointing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutandika sizoni mu ngeri ennungi, ttiimu yayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu mupiira gwayo ogusembyeyo. Abawagizi baali basuubira nti Onduparaka yandyeyongedde okuwangula, naye ebyavaamu tebyali birungi.
ach_prompt: Inge cako kare me pyem tuku maber tutwal, team odilo ne gunongo peko madit tutwal I pyem tuku gi manyen. Lucwak tuku gubedo ki gen ni Onduparaka bimede ki locgi, ento adwogi ne pe obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ageunet najokan naka abolia, abu etimu kodum ainingosit naepol noi kotoma abolia kec naitetet. Amuno egangitok ebe ebuni Onduparaka ainyikokin aitelekaar, konye abu akiro ngun itakadik.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti 'di ma e'dota muke 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu e'yo ewaru eyi ma abala o'diru ri ma alea. Ba atita fepi 'diyi ovu ndra asi 'baza be kini Onduparaka ni nga mu drile e'yo yini ndezuri ma dria, te e'yo efupi 'diyi ndra candisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutandika sizooni kurungi, tiimu ekashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu muzaano gwayo ogwahwaire. Abahagizi bakaba baine amasiko ngu Onduparaka neeza kugumizamu n'okusingura, kwonka ebirugiremu bikaba nibimaramu amaani.

eng_prompt: The team's defense had been impenetrable throughout the season, showcasing remarkable teamwork and skill. Fans were eager to see if they could maintain their perfect record against the formidable Kampala Capital City Authority.
lug_prompt: Abakuumaddembe ba ttiimu babadde tebayingirirwa sizoni yonna, nga balaga okukolera awamu n'obukugu obw'ekitalo. Abawagizi baali beesunga okulaba oba basobola okukuuma likodi yaabwe ennungi nga battunka ne Kampala Capital City Authority.
ach_prompt: Jo ma gwoko tim ne gubedo ki diro me tic matek tutwal I kare weng me tuku. Lucwak odilo gubedo ki miti me neno kace gitwero gwoko rekodgi I kare ma gitye ka pyem ki dul tuku me Kampala Capital City Authority.
teo_prompt: Apotu lu ayuwara luka etimu kojaunos noi kapak naka abolia, itodunitos eswamae loajokan keda acoa. Akapakina egangitok aanyun arai epedorete kesi aidar aiwadikaeta kec nepepe keda Atukot naeyait ainapeta ko Kampala.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ageyitema ni 'da ma ageyitema ri ndra okporu sa'wa 'disi dria, erini azi ngazu tualuri azini ondua onyiru 'diyi e'dazu. Ba atita fepi 'diyi ndra ava be ndrezu kani yi eco yi vile o'duko onyiru 'diyi ma ta mba amuti Kampala Capital City Authority ni okporu 'diyi be ra ya ri.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'ebyokwerinda ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa omu siizoni yoona, erikworeka okukoragana n'emyoga y'omutaano. Abahagizi bakaba baine ekihika ky'okureeba yaaba nibabaasa kugumizamu n'ebyafaayo byabo kurwanisa tiimu y'amaani eya Kampala Capital City Authority.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the team announced that their captain would be sidelined for the match due to an injury. Fans were left wondering how this would impact Onduparaka's performance on the field.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ttiimu yalangiridde nti kapiteeni waabwe ajja kuggyibwa mu mupiira olw'obuvune. Abawagizi baalekebwa nga beebuuza engeri kino gye kikwata ku mutindo gwa Onduparaka mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ur tutwal, dul tuku ne guwaco ni lador dul tuku gi pe obi bedo tye pi awano. Lucwak tuku gubedo ki ngeng I kom kit ma man obalo kwede kit ma dul tuku me Onduparaka tye katuku kwede.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu etimu kolimo ebe mam ekaputein kec ebuni ajaikin toma abolia naarai emusunguna ngesi. Aponi kojalakinai egangitok aomoom epone loepedoria ngin aitolitol eswamae loka Onduparaka kosawe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo osuta ma alia, amuti avitani 'da azi kini 'ba nga eyi ma kaputaini dro abala 'da ma alea ku e'yo nya'biliko nirisi. Ba awi 'ba atita fepi 'diyi osu e'yo 'di ni nga onduparaka ma agata pari avita ni ma alia ri oja ngoniru yari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, tiimu ekarangirira ngu kapiteeni waabo tarikwija kuza omu muzaano ahabw'obuvune. Abahagizi bakasigara nibeebuuza oku eki kirikukwata aha nkora ya Onduparaka omu kishayi.

eng_prompt: The stakes were high as the team prepared for the crucial match, knowing that a victory would boost their reputation and morale. With the support of passionate fans and a strong training regimen, Kampala capital city authority was determined to secure a win.
lug_prompt: Emigabo gyali mingi nga ttiimu yeetegekera omuzannyo omukulu, nga bamanyi nti obuwanguzi bujja kunyweza erinnya lyabwe n'empisa. Olw'obuwagizi bw'abawagizi abanyiikivu n'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi, Kampala Capital City Authority yali emaliridde okufuna obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Peko ne obedo lamal tutwal I kare ma dul tuku ne tye ka yubbe pi tuku ma pire tek tutwal, kun gingeyo ni loc obi ilo malo nying gi ki cwiny gi. Ki kony pa lucwak ki pwonye matek, dul me Kampala Capital City Authority omoko tamgi me loyo tuku.
teo_prompt: Apol noi iboro luetapit etimu aitemonokin kanuka abolia naepol noi, ejenete ebe aitelekaar ebuni aitogogong ekirorikec keda iponesiokec. Keda agangat naka egangitok keda aituutoonor naepol noi, apotu apedorosio nuka esite loka Kampala kopedosi aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo avita ni 'diyi ndra uru amuti 'da ni otuta 'yeria abala okporu 'da ni, eyini nii ra kini agata ni nga eyi ma ru ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma adriza otu. Atita 'ba atita fepi avasi 'diyi vu azini otuta okporu 'diyisi, Kampala Capital City Authority 'ba asi ndezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Emizaano ekaba eri ahaiguru obu tiimu yaabaire neeteekateekyera omuzaano gw'amaani, barikumanya ngu obusinguzi nibwija kutunguura eiziina ryabo n'emitwarize yaabo. Ahabw'obuhwezi bw'abahagizi b'omutaano hamwe n'okutendekwa kurungi, Kampala Capital City Authority ekaba eyehaireyo kusingura.

eng_prompt: The team's aggressive playing style has drawn criticism from fans and analysts alike. As a result, their matches often see a high number of fouls committed.
lug_prompt: Omuzannyo gwa ttiimu ogw'obukambwe guvumiriddwa abawagizi n'abakugu. N'ekivuddemu, emipiira gyabwe gitera okulaba omuwendo omunene ogw'ensobi ezikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Kit tuko ma dul tuku eni tye kwede okelo cwer cwiny ki bot lucwak ki lutim kwed mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, tuku gi ipol kare gineno bal mapol ma kitimo.
teo_prompt: Epone loka abolia loepol noi loka etimu ngol abu koyangau aitoroneta kama ejaasi egangitok keda angicak. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aswam aibucanaro nuipu noi kotoma aboliasio kec.
lgg_prompt: Geri amuti 'da ni avita avizu okporu ri eji e'yo 'ba atita fepi 'diyi vu tualu 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma abala eyi ma alea 'ba eyi e'yo onzi 'ye karakara.
nyn_prompt: Omuzaano gwa tiimu ogurikworeka obwimukiriro, gutungire okwetomboitwa kuruga omu bahagizi hamwe n'abacencuzi. N'ekyarugiremu, emizaano yaabo neekira kureebwamu enshobi nyingi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the urban landscape of Kampala has seen significant growth and development. As a result, various stakeholders are vying for dominance in the city's emerging markets.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ebibuga bya Kampala birabye okukulaakulana okw'amaanyi n'enkulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo bavuganya ku buyinza mu butale bw'ekibuga obujja.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo me boma me Kampala dong odongo tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat matye ki twero mapat-pat tye ka pyem I komgi me bedo ki twero I cuk mapat-pat matye ka dongo I boma madit ne.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi aiboisio nuka itaunin luko Kampala. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu abolobol kanu aipuga kotoma osokonin luka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu tawuni Kampala ni 'diyi e'bi zo okporu tualu angu ezoma be. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi a'bala 'ye okpo esuzu cuu aku ambu cityniri ma alea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, orurembo rwa Kampala rureebire entunguuka n'entunguuka y'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibahakanira obutegyeki omu butare bw'orurembo.

eng_prompt: The excitement was palpable as the team gathered in the locker room, ready to take the field for the first time this season. Fans filled the stands, eager to witness the new talent in action.
lug_prompt: Okwenyumiriza kwalabika nga tiimu ekuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge ky'okwekyusizaamu, nga yeetegese okutwala ekisaawe omulundi ogusoose sizoni eno. Abawagizi bajjuza ebifo, nga beesunga okulaba ekitone ekipya mu bikolwa.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma dul tuku ne gugure I kicika me loko bongo, ma oyubbe me cito I bar pi tyen me acel I kare me tuku eni. Lucwak tuku opong ki miti matek tutwal me neno talanta manyen ne I tic.
teo_prompt: Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama ne atukokina etimu agolaik, ekapakina alomar toma aboliasio kanu apak nasodit kapak kana. Apotu egangitok kilelebunos aiboisio nuiboiete kesi, ekotosi noi asesen atalanta naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko nderi ndra e'dazaru amuti mupira avizu 'da ni eyi trazu jo ale alizu 'diyi ma alea, eyi ngonde muzu mupira avizu pale oko ayi ti 'di ma alea. Ba atita fepi 'diyi ga angu 'ba eyini ri ma alea tre avasi talanta o'diru 'da eyi ndrezu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa kukarebeka nk'oku tiimu yaabaire eyeteekateekire kuza omu kishayi omurundi gw'okubanza omu siizoni egi. Abahagizi bakaijuza emyanya y'okushutama, baine ekihika ky'okureeba etaraanta ensya erikukora.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve energy access in rural areas, local officials announced plans for renewable energy initiatives. One of the key projects identified was a pico power system aimed at providing electricity to underserved communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkola y'amasannyalaze mu byalo, abakungu b'ebyalo baalangirira enteekateeka z'amasannyalaze agaggya obuggya. Omu ku pulojekiti enkulu ezaazuulibwa ye pico power system egendereddwamu okutuusa amasannyalaze mu bitundu ebitakyafuna masannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo yoo me nongo mac icaro, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me nongo mac ma aa ki icaro. Yub acel ma pire tek ma kinongo obedo yub me kubu mac I kabedo ma pe tye ki mac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar adumunun na akim ocaaloi, apotu eswamak luka ocaaloi kolimosi ainapeta nuka aitolom akim na itwasamao. Idiopet kotoma opurojektin luapolok lu aponi kojenunai arai epone loka aitolom akim mama ejaasi itunga lumam edumununete akim.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu aci esuzu angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi otita aci ayuza o'diru 'diyiniri ma dria. Otita azi okporu 'bani esu 'diyi ma azi eri geri aci pico ni 'bani lezu aci awazu angu azi ngazu ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amashanyarazi omu byaro, abakungu b'ebyaro bakarangirira enteekateeka y'okukoresa amashanyarazi agarikubaasa kugaruka kubaho. Emwe aha purogyekiti enkuru ezatandikirweho, n'ey'okukoresa amashanyarazi ga pico, agarikugyenderera okuhisya amashanyarazi omu byaro ebitarikuhikwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for sustainable energy solutions, the team developed an innovative initiative. This initiative aims to harness renewable resources for community use.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'amasannyalaze agawangaala, ttiimu yakola enteekateeka ey'obuyiiya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukozesa ebintu ebizzibwa obuggya mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak me nongo yoo me tic ki mac matye anyim, dul ne guyubu yoo manyen me tic. Yub man tye ki miti me tic ki jami ma ki roco gi me konyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo iyatakinet lo akim, apotu etimu kitolomutu aomisioit naitetet. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitwasam iboro luepedorio aisiteteun kanu aitwasam itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti 'da e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu lonyi 'bani eco ayu dika ra 'diyi ayuzu ongulumu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'okukoresa amashanyarazi agatarikurugaho, tiimu ekakora enteekateeka y'okureetaho obuhangwa. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okukoresa eby'obugaiga ebirikubaasa kugaruka bikoresibwa abantu.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and negotiations, the groundbreaking ceremony for the new energy initiative took place last month. Local leaders hailed the project as a significant step towards sustainable development in the region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka n'okuteesa okumala emyaka, omukolo gw'okutongoza enkola empya ey'amasannyalaze gwaliwo omwezi oguwedde. Abakulembeze b'ebyalo baasiima pulojekiti ng'omutendera ogw'amaanyi eri enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki winye, yub me cako yub manyen me mac otimme I dwe ma okato. Lutela me tedero gupwoyo yub eni macalo yoo maber me dongo lobo i twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin keda ipegeta, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuitetiak nuka akim olap je. Apotu engarenok luka atutubet ituroto epurojekt ngol kwape adoketait naepol noi naka apol kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani otuta 'yezu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, omu 'bani e'yo aci ni o'di 'diyi e'dozu ri 'ye i mba ajerisi. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe awa'difo otita 'da ni ekile e'yo orodriru angu ezoma angu 'da ma alea ri le.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteesa, omukoro gw'okutandikaho enkora ensya y'eby'amashanyarazi gukabaho okwezi okuhweire. Abeebembezi b'ebyaro, bakasiima purogyekiti nk'omutendera muhango omu ntunguuka y'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance energy accessibility and sustainability, officials have announced a comprehensive plan. This initiative aims to address the growing demand for electricity in both urban and rural areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okufuna n'okuyimirizaawo amasannyalaze, abakungu balangiridde enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukola ku bwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera mu bibuga ne mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me nongo mac ki gwoko kwo pa dano, lutic gunyuto yub maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko peko me mac matye kamede i boma ki caro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar adumunet naka akim keda akimian, alimor eswamak ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin eipud loka akim naka epiei kotoma aiboisio nu otaunin keda nu ocaaloi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi otita azi dria ni 'bo. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo aci ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea tualu angu caluru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amashanyarazi, abakuru batumire enteekateeka y'amaani. Ekigyendererwa n'okukora ahabyetaago by'amashanyarazi omu ndembo hamwe n'omu byaro.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing energy demands and frequent outages, officials have prioritized infrastructure improvements. To address these challenges, the government is developing a comprehensive energy strategy.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera n'ebbula erya buli kaseera, abakungu bakulembezza okulongoosa ebizimbe. Okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, gavumenti ekola enteekateeka y'amasannyalaze enzijuvu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me mac ki poto pa mac, lutic guketo cwinygi tutwalle I yubu jami ma mite pi tic. Me tyeko peko magi, gamente tye ka yubu yoo me tic i kom mac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akim lo iyatakin keda amamus na akim, apotu eswamak kisingarenikisi aitojokar iboro. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, euta apugan aitolomun ainapeta nuka akim.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako aci ni tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi azini aci ako ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi 'ba okpo e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete ni otita okporu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma dria ri ede.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'amashanyarazi ebyeyongyeire hamwe n'okukyerererwa kw'amashanyarazi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bateireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyombeko. Okukora aha buremeezi obu, gavumenti eriyo neekora enteekateeka y'amaani y'eby'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: The team was tasked with developing a sustainable energy solution for remote areas. After extensive research, they decided to focus on a pico project that could harness renewable resources.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yaweebwa omulimu gw'okukola enkola y'amasannyalaze ey'obuwangaazi mu byalo. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, baasalawo okussa essira ku pulojekiti ya pico esobola okukozesa ebintu ebizzibwa obuggya.
ach_prompt: Kimiyo tic ki dul enoni me yubu yoo me tic ki mac I caro. Ingee kwedo lok matut, gumoko tamgi me keto cwinygi I kom yub me pico ma twero tic ki jami ma ki nwoyo tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Aponi ijaikinai etimu aswam naka aitolomun iwaitin lu itwasamaere akim kaiboisio nu ocaalo. Akaulo naka aingic noi, apotu kesi ocamutu apodokinit epurojekt lo epedori aitwasam iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Ba fe amuti 'da eyini azi geri aci ayupi sa'wa driasi 'diyi ezozu angu caloru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo vuti ondaza angiri ma vutia, yi asi 'du asi otita azi pico ni ma dria ecopi afa 'bani eco ayu dika ra 'diyi ayuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ekaheebwa omurimo gw'okutandikaho enkora y'okukoresa amashanyarazi omu myanya y'ebyaro. Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, bakasharamu kuta amaani aha purogyekiti ya pico erikubaasa kukoresa eby'obugaiga ebirikubaasa kugarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the local government has initiated several development programs aimed at boosting the economy of the region. One of the key initiatives has been the launch of a new infrastructure project.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, gavumenti z'ebitundu zitandiseewo pulogulaamu z'enkulaakulana ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikoleddwa kwe kutongoza pulojekiti empya.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato angec, gamente me tedero okatti ki yub mapat-pat me dongo lobo ma tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me lim I twok piny eni. Yub acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo cako yub me gedo manyen.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etolomu apugan naka atutubet ainapeta nuepedorete aitopolor edumune loka ikapun kotoma aiboisit. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio nuapolok ngesi aitegeario naka ipurojektin luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi e'do otita angu ezoma ni karakara eyi lezu angu 'da ma lonyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi okporu 'diyi ma azi e'dota otita afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyiniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, gavumenti y'ebyaro etandikireho enteekateeka z'entunguuka ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'entaasya y'ekyanga. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebikozirwe n'okutongoza purogyekiti y'okwombeka ebintu ebisya.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's growing need for recreational space, a proposal for a new park was presented at the town hall meeting. Many residents expressed their support and willingness to contribute to the initiative.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera obw'ebifo eby'okusanyukiramu, ekiteeso kya ppaaka empya kyayanjulwa mu lukiiko lwa town hall. Abatuuze bangi baalaga obuwagizi bwabwe n'obwetegefu okuwaayo eri enteekateeka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak me nongo kabedo me galo wang, kicwalo tam me yubu park manyen I kacokke me town hall. Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwakgi ki miti gi me miyo cente pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka itunga kanu aiboisio nu aiyalama, aponi kitodiarai aomisioit naka aiboisit naidarere itiang kotoma airiamunet naka etaun hall. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu agangat kec ka ekapakina aigang aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lezu angu ayiko eyini ayiko esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, 'ba 'ba egata angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu o'diru ri ma dria ri mitingi town hall niri ma alea. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da atita eyini dika eyi ma ava robia fezu otita 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'abantu eky'omwanya gw'okushemerererwamu, ekiteiso ky'omwanya musya gw'okushemerererwamu kikareetwa omu rukiiko rw'orurembo. Abatuuragye baingi bakooreka obushagiki bwabo n'okwenda kuhayo ahabw'ekigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: Due to the region's unique climate and water availability, alternative energy sources were considered for the facility. Ultimately, the decision was made to prioritize sustainable practices that depended on natural rainfall.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde ey'enjawulo mu kitundu n'okubeerawo kw'amazzi, ensibuko z'amasannyalaze endala zaalowoozebwako mu kifo kino. Mu nkomerero, okusalawo kwakolebwa okukulembeza enkola eziwangaala ezisinziira ku nkuba ey'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Pi alokaloka me piny ki pii matye I but piny eni, ki tamo I kom yoo mukene me nongo mac. I agiki ne, kimoko tam ne me keto cwiny I kom yub matye anyim ma jenge I kom kot.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ekuse ka etepe loitegelikina keda akipi nu ejaas atutubet kangin, aponi koomoomata iponesio ice luka aitolom akim kanu aduketait kangin. Kawasia, aponi kitolomunai aseunet ngin kanu aisingarenit iponesio luajokak lu itwasamaete edou.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma wura ndusi azini yi ma esuta ma e'yosi, 'ba ega geri ndu aci esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Asizu, 'ba 'du e'yo 'di e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo yi 'yezu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi 'duzu okori ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'obwire ey'omutaano omu kyanga hamwe n'oburugo bw'amaizi, oburugo bw'amashanyarazi obundi bukateebwaho ahabw'ekyombeko. Ekyarugiremu, okusharamu kukakorwa kwenda kwebembeza enkora y'obuhangwa erikugyendera aha njura y'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Before moving forward with the power project, the team needed to assess the environmental impact of the proposed site. They decided to conduct a thorough inspection of Okabi stream to evaluate its suitability for the project.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannagenda mu maaso na pulojekiti y'amasannyalaze, ttiimu yali yeetaaga okwekenneenya engeri ekifo ekyo gye kikwata ku butonde bw'ensi. Baasazeewo okwekebejja obulungi omugga Okabi okulaba oba gusaanira pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gucito anyim ki yub me mac, lutic omyero kong gunen adwoki pa kabedo eni I kom cwec ma orumuwa. Gumoko tam gi me ngiyo kulu me Okabi maber tutwal me niang kace opore pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Erongo elosi toma opurojekt lo akim, ekot etimu airereor epone loepedoria aiboisit ngin aitolitol isuban luka akwap. Apotu kesi ocamutu airereonor ejok ecilet loka Okabi kanu aanyun ebe ejokuna kanu epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi mu drile otita aci niri be ku, le amuti 'da ma one e'yo angu 'bani lele 'diyi ma ta mbazu angu ama agei ri ma dria ri ra. Eyi 'du e'yo aci Okabi niri ma ale andrizu kililiru eyini ani ecozu otita 'da 'yezu ra ya ri onezu.
nyn_prompt: Batakagiire omu maisho na purogyekiti y'amashanyarazi, tiimu ekaba neeyetenga kushwijuma oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Bakasharamu kukyebera kurungi omugyera gwa Okabi, okureeba ngu nigubaasa kukoresibwa omu purogyekiti egyo.

eng_prompt: The landscape was dotted with lush greenery, thriving under the gentle embrace of nature's bounty. Nearby, a clear stream meandered through the fields, providing a vital resource for the surrounding farms.
lug_prompt: Ettaka lyali lijjudde ebimera ebirabika obulungi, nga bikulaakulana wansi w'obugabi bw'obutonde. Okumpi awo, omugga omweru gwali gukulukuta mu nnimiro, nga guwa ebintu eby'omugaso ennyo ku faamu eziriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ne opong ki lum matye ka dongo maber tutwal I kare ma cwec ma orumuwa tye ka dongo maber tutwal. Ngat matye cok, kulu ma mol atyer kamaleng okato I poto, ma obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I poto matye cok.
teo_prompt: Arai aiboisit ngin naejaasi keda iraan luibusiak noi, luapotu kotakanutu kotoma aiboisio nuejokuka noi nuka Edeke. Nepetai kangin, apolor ecilet loejok kotoma amisirin, ido ijaikini akoru naejok noi mama ejaasi amisirin nueyapiete.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea ori eyi ndra karakara, eyi zo ndra onyiru e'yo onyiru nyakuni 'diyi ma alea. Angu 'da ma agei, yi ti onyiruri ri aci amvu eyi ma alea, dika eri afa orodriru 'diyi fe amvu 'da ma agei 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gukaba gujwire eby'obuhangwa ebirikubaasa kubaho. Haihi,omugyera ogurikwetegyerezibwa kurungi gukaba niguraba omu misiri, ogwabaire nigureetera abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: After years of searching for a sustainable energy source, the villagers finally discovered a fast-flowing stream nearby. With the right technology, they believed they could harness its energy for their needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga banoonya ensibuko y'amasannyalaze, abatuuze b'oku kyalo baasembye okuzuula omugga ogukulukuta amangu okumpi awo. Nga balina tekinologiya omutuufu, baali bakkiriza nti basobola okukozesa amaanyi gaayo ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yenyo yoo me nongo mac ma rii pi kare malac, dano me caro gunongo kulu ma mol oyot-oyot cok ki kany. Ki diro me tet matir, gubedo ki niyee ni gitwero tic ki kero ne me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu aimo ewai lo itwasamaere akim, apotu itunga luka ecalo kodumutu ecilet lo akerit katipet. Keda etatai loajokan, eyuunitos kesi ebe epedorete kesi aitwasam agogongukec kanu ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia geri eyini ecozu aci esuzu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ndazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba calo'a 'diyi esu asizu yi ara azi acipi okposi ni eyi ma agei. Geri afa ndundu eyi edezu kililiru 'diyisi, eyi a'i ra kini eyi eco eyi ma okpo ayu e'yo eyini le 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi barikuronda oburugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikubaasa kugumaho, abatuuragye bakahendera baashanga omugyera ogurikutamburira juba haihi. Baine tekinorogye ehikire, bakaikiriza ngu nibabaasa kukoresa amaani gaayo kukora ebibarikwetenga.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough assessment of the local energy needs, the team gathered to discuss potential solutions. They identified the stream as a viable source for renewable energy generation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi ebyetaago by'amasannyalaze mu kitundu, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. Baazudde omugga ng'ensibuko y'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Ingee niang maber I kom miti me mac I tedero, dul ne gugure me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko ne. Gu niang ni kulu man obedo yoo maber me nongo mac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor eipuda lo akim kotoma atutubet, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Apotu kesi kojenutu ecilet ngol kwape epone loajokan loka aitolom akim.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu yi ara 'di geri azi muke eyini ecozu aci esuzu o'diru ni i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebyetaago by'amashanyarazi omu byaro, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Bakareeba omugyera nk'oburugo burungi bw'amashanyarazi agarikubaasa kugaruka kubaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's pressing needs, a meeting was held to discuss potential initiatives. The residents recognized the importance of taking action and decided to collaborate on a new project.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ekitundu eby'amangu, olukiiko lwatudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka ezisoboka. Abatuuze baalaba obukulu bw'okukola era ne basalawo okukolera awamu ku pulojekiti empya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti pa lwak, kacoke obedo tye me nywako tam I kom yub mapat-pat matye. Lutedero oniang ber pa timo gin mo dok gumoko tam gi me ribbe I yub manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, aponi itolosai airiamun kanu aitemitem nuiswama. Apotu itunga kojenutu ajokis naka aswam iboro kosodete aiswamanar kanu epurojekt loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo ndundu eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu orodri e'yo 'yezu ri ra dika eyi ai eyi tualu otita o'diru 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, hakabaho orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Abatuuragye bakareeba omugasho gw'okukora, reero bacwamu kukorera hamwe aha purogyekiti ensya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote sustainable living and reduce electricity costs, the local government organized a community event. During this event, residents were offered a special deal on energy-efficient lighting solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu obweyagaza n'okukendeeza ku bisale by'amasannyalaze, gavumenti y'ebitundu yategeka omukolo mu kitundu. Mu mukolo guno, abatuuze baaweebwa ddiiru ey'enjawulo ku by'amasannyalaze ebikozesa amasannyalaze amatono.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwo maber ki dwoko piny wel mac electricity, gamente me tedero oyubu yub pi lwak. Ikare me yub eni, ki miyo kony me mac ma pe balo mac tutwal ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijar najokan ka aitidisiar itiaisinei luka akim, abu apugan naka atutubet kitemok nuikamunitos aijar naka itunga. Kotoma opucit kalo, aponi ijaikinai itunga acuma naepedori aitwasam akim naedit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu azini aci ma aje esizu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri otu omu ongulumu eyini ni. Sawa 'di ma alea, 'ba fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini geri aci ayupi okporu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura emituurire mirungi n'okukyendeeza aha bishare by'amashanyarazi, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekatebekanisa omukoro gw'ekyanga. Omu mukoro ogu, abatuuragye bakaheebwa amashanyarazi agatarikutwara amaani maingi.

eng_prompt: The town had just announced plans to install a new electric grid, promising to bring modern conveniences to every household. Residents gathered in the square, buzzing with anticipation over the possibilities that electricity would bring to their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kyali kyalangiridde enteekateeka z'okussaawo omutimbagano gw'amasannyalaze omupya, nga kisuubiza okuleeta ebintu eby'omulembe mu buli maka. Abatuuze baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibangirizi nga beesunga ebintu eby'enjawulo amasannyalaze bye gajja okuleeta mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Boma ne onongo pud otyeko cwalo lok angeya pi yub me keto mac manyen, kun gicikke me kelo jami ma rwom gi malo I gangi weng. Lutedero gugure i dye bar kun gitye ki miti madit tutwal I kom jami ma mac obikelo I kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Alimo etaun aitemonokineta nuka aibwaikin akim naitetet, isumunitos ayangaun iboro luakwana mama ejaasi ikalia kere. Apotu itunga lu atutubet kotukokinos aiboisit naingadaere ikapun, lu eomitos ebe ebuni akim ayangaun aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni 'da azi nga lu otita aci oseza ni o'diru 'diyi sizu, eyini oyo sozu afa ayuzaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ejizu aku dria eyivu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi angu 'da ma alea eyini asi 'baza be e'yo eyini ani ecozu aci ejizu eyi ma edri o'du driasi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rukaba rwaherize kurangirira enteekateeka y'okutaho enkora y'amashanyarazi ensya, erikuraganisa kureeta ebintu by'omurembe omu maka gaabo. Abatuuragye baketeerana omu kibangirizi, barikuteekateeka aha bintu ebi amashanyarazi garikubaasa kureeta omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the village has undergone significant development, blending traditional architecture with modern amenities. As a result, residents have embraced new technologies while maintaining their cultural heritage.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekyalo kifunye enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi, nga kigatta ebizimbe eby'ennono n'ebintu eby'omulembe. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bakkirizza tekinologiya omupya nga bakuuma eby'obuwangwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, caro ne odongo matek tutwal, ma opoko gedo me tekwaro ki jami me tic ma ite kare ni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero guyee diro manyen kun gigwoko tekwaro gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor ecalo ngol noi, aimorikikin aduketait naka einono keda iboro luakwana. Kanuka ngun, acamutu itunga luka atutubet etatai loitetet kosodete aidar inonosio kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, angu caluniri esu zota okporu, afa edele a'di ni 'diyi tualu afa ayuzaru ewu curu'do 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai e'yo tekenologia ni o'diru 'diyi eyini ani e'yo suruni eyivile 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ekyaro kitungire entunguuka y'amaani, kirimu ebyombeko eby'obuhangwa n'eby'omurembe. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baikiriize tekinorogye ensya kandi bakaguma baine eby'obuhangwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: As technology advanced, the once dark and quiet nights transformed into vibrant evenings filled with the glow of modern conveniences. Homes became more than just shelters; they evolved into hubs of connectivity and comfort.
lug_prompt: Nga tekinologiya akulaakulana, ekiro ekyali ekizikiza n'ekisirifu kyakyuka ne kifuuka akawungeezi akajjudde ebintu eby'omulembe. Amaka gafuuka ekisingawo ku bifo by'okusulamu; gafuuka ebifo eby'okukwatagana n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tet manyen okato anyim, dyewor ma yam col dok laling olokke odoko otyeno ma opong ki jami ma beco me kare-ni. Gangi odoko kama dano bedo iye ma pe obedo kama dano bedo iye keken ento bene odoko kama dano kubbe iye dok bedo ki yom-cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape apolor etatai loakwana, apotu akware nuejaasi keda amuton keda aililing ijulakinos araun iboro luibusiak luejaasi keda aica naka iboro luakwana. Apotu ikalia koraunos luipu adepar neperot bon; apotu kesi koraunos aiboisio nuka arucokina keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia niri ni tuzu drile, ini andra okurunya azini e'yere 'diyi oja eyi ondresi eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu ' Aku eyi eca lu angu 'bani aa'zu 'diyi ma drilea ku; eyi eca angu 'bani eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea azini eyini aa'zu ewakokoru 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku tekinorogye yaayeyongyeire, ekiro ekyabaire kirimu omwirima n'obucureera kikahinduka nyekiro z'okushemererwa, ziijwire okutangaara kw'ebintu by'omurembe. Amaka gakahinduka ekirikukira aha butaaho, gakahinduka emyanya y'okukwatanisa hamwe n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: In recognition of the resident's generosity, the local authorities decided to take action. They wanted to ensure that the individual who selflessly contributed his land would have a place to call home.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusiima obugabi bw'omutuuze, ab'obuyinza mu kitundu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baayagala okukakasa nti buli muntu eyawaayo ettaka lye awatali kwefaako yandifunye aw'okubeera.
ach_prompt: Pi pwoc ma aa ki bot lutedero, lutela me tedero gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo. Gubedo ki miti me neno ni ngat ma omiyo ngom mege labongo paro pire kene nongo kabedo ma en twero lwongo ni gang.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin ainakinet naka itunganan, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet koseutu aswam. Akotosi kesi awanyun ebe itunganan yenejaikit alupok ke komamei atiakatiaka ejaas keda aiboisit naepedori ngesi aiworo ore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ma e'yo egazu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi le ndra ne ra kini 'ba alu alu eyi ma nyaku fepi ikpere kokoru 'diyi ma angu eyini ecozu omvezu akua ni ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusiima embabazi z'omutuuragye, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakacwamu kugira ekibakorera. Bakaba nibenda kureeba ngu omuntu weena owahaireyo eitaka rye, aine omwanya gw'okwetwa omuka.

eng_prompt: The community had high hopes for the new power project, believing it would bring jobs and improve local infrastructure. However, tensions began to rise when a resident revealed that they had been promised a house as part of the agreement.
lug_prompt: Abantu baalina essuubi ddene mu pulojekiti y'amasannyalaze empya, nga balowooza nti ejja kuleetawo emirimu n'okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Newankubadde, obunkenke bwatandika okulinnya omutuuze bwe yategeeza nti baali basuubiziddwa ennyumba nga ekitundu ku ndagaano.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki gen madit tutwal I kom yub me mac manyen ni, kun gitye ki gen ni bikelo tic ki yubu jami ma mite I tedero. Kadi bed kumeno, telle ocako medde ikare ma ngat acel I kin lutedero owaco ni kicikke me minigi ot macalo but winye meggi.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga keda amuno naepol noi kanu epurojekt lo loitetet loka akim, eomitos kesi ebe ebuni ayangaun aswamisinei ka aitojokar iboro luka atutubet. Konye, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin ne alimor etunganan ebe aponi isumunoi kesi adumun etogo kwape acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ma asi'baza eyi ndra otita aci ni o'diru 'da ma dria angiri eyini egazu kini eri nga azi eji dika eri nga afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otu. Kani si, e'yo eyi e'do tu 'ba azi aa'pi angu 'da ma alea ni 'yozu kini 'ba owi eyi dri jo azi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakaba baine amasiko maingi omu purogyekiti y'amashanyarazi ensya, barikwikiriza ngu neija kureeta emirimo n'okutunguura ebyombeko by'omubyaro. Kwonka, obunkenke bukatandika kugyenda omu maisho omutuuragye ku yaagambire ngu bakasikirwa enju nk'ekicweka ky'endagaano.

eng_prompt: Authorities launched an investigation into a series of power outages affecting the neighborhood. During their search, they uncovered a group of individuals engaged in illegal activities related to the electrical infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza ku kubulwa kw'amasannyalaze mu kitundu. Mu kunoonya kwabwe, baazudde ekibinja ky'abantu abeenyigira mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka ebikwata ku by'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Lutela gucako kwed I kom peko me mac ma obedo tye I kabedo enuni. Ikare me kwedgi, gunongo gurup pa dano ma gubedo ka timo jami ma turu cik malube ki yub me mac.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic nuka amamus na akim kotoma aiboisit. Kotoma aingic kec, apotu kesi odumutu egurupu loka itunga luiswamaete iboro lumam ekisil ecamunit kanu akim.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi e'do vuti ondaza e'yo aci ako angu ama agei ri ma alea ri ma dria. Sawa yini angu ndazurisi, eyi esu ongulumu 'ba eyini 'yeta azita palaa ku 'diyi 'yepi e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza aha ku amashanyarazi garikurugaho omu byaro. Omu kuronda kwabo, bakajumbura guruupu y'abantu abaabaire bejumbire omu bikorwa ebitahikire ebirikukwata aha byombeko by'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Tensions in the community had been rising for weeks due to the controversial decisions made by the local government. Frustrated by the lack of action, a group of protesters gathered outside the power station.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke mu kitundu bubadde bweyongera okumala wiiki eziwera olw'okusalawo okw'enjawulo okwakolebwa gavumenti z'ebitundu. Olw'obutabaako kye bakolawo, ekibinja ky'abeekalakaasi baakuŋŋaanidde wabweru w'essundiro ly'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde I kin lwak pi cabit mapol pi tam ma gamente me tedero omoko ma kelo apoka-poka. Pi cwer cwiny pi peko me tic, dul pa lujemo gucokke woko ki I gang tic me mac.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kotoma atutubet kangin adaun isabitin luipu kanuka aseununeta nuetioko nueswamaunit apugan naka atutubet. Kanuka amamus na aswamisio, apotu ediyaongon luka ediyak kotukokinos kinga naka esiteseni lo akim.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ebi tu sabiti karakara eyi ma alea e'yo gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'du e'yo ndundu 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu kurisi, ongulumu 'ba ngiringiri 'ye'baa 'diyi tra yi pari aci osezaniri ma alia amve.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke omu bantu butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'okusharamu kubi okwakozirwe gavumenti y'ekyaro. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabaho ky'okukora, guruupu y'abeshaaringi baketeerana aheeru y'ekitongore ky'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Despite their careful planning, the group underestimated the security measures in place. As night fell, they approached the power station with a mix of excitement and trepidation.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baateekateeka bulungi, ekibinja kyabuusa amaaso enkola z'ebyokwerinda ezaaliwo. Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, baatuukirira essundiro ly'amasannyalaze nga bajjudde essanyu n'okutya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni guyube maber tutwal, gurup ne gucayo cik me gwoko kuc ma kiketo. Ikare ma piny odoko col, gubino cok ki kama mac tye iye ki yomcwiny ki lworo.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi itemonokinos ejok, apotu egurupu itolitoloto iwaitin lu ayuara. Neadolunia akwap, apotu kesi kodolokisi aiboisit naka akim keda aiyalama keda akurianu.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma otita kililiru 'diyi ma talasi, ongulumu 'da adi e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ra. Wudrikuru ni ecaria 'boria, eyi mu angu aci ni 'da ma alea ayiko be tualu asi otiza be.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteekateeka yaabo n'obwegyendesereza, guruupu ekafeerwa eby'okwerinda ebyabaire biriho. Omwirima ku gwahikire, bakahika aha sitesheni y'amashanyarazi n'okushemererwa hamwe n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and reduce reliance on fossil fuels, the government launched a new initiative. This program aimed to promote sustainable energy solutions for communities across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okukendeeza ku kwesigama ku mafuta, gavumenti yatongoza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu kutumbula eby'amasannyalaze ebiwangaazi eri ebitundu okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki dwoko piny rwom me tic ki mac ma aa ki I te ngom, gamente ocako yub manyen. Yub man obedo ki miti me tyelo kor yoo me tic ki mac I kabedo mapatpat I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik aijulanakineta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aitidisiar aitosom iboro luka akinyet, abu apugan kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitopolor iwaitin lu itwasamaere akim kanu itunga luka akwapuwok kere.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika lezu 'ba ma ovu asi'baza be e'yo odu nyakuni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo esizu, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo aci ni aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi otuzu o'bi eyi ma eselea kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okutuubya aha kukoresa amajuuta, gavumenti ekataho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu ekaba negyenderera okutunguura eby'amashanyarazi ebirikugumizamu omu byaro omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: As the local government announced plans for the pico power project, tensions began to rise within the community. Many residents were divided over the potential benefits and drawbacks of the initiative, leading to heated debates and conflicts.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ekitundu bwe yalangirira enteekateeka za pulojekiti y'amasannyalaze ga pico, obunkenke bwatandika okulinnya mu kitundu. Abatuuze bangi baawukana ku miganyulo n'ebizibu ebiri mu nteekateeka eno, ekyaviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gamente me tedero otito yub pi yub me mac me pico, telle ocako dongo ikin lwak. Lutedero mapol gupoke I kom ber ki rac pa yub eni, ma oweko laro lok ki lweny obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Nealimor apugan naka atutubet ainapeta nuka epurojekt loka akim naka pico, apotu ingungeta kogeutu aiyatakin kotoma atutubet. Apotu itunga luipu kotiakakinos kanu ajokisio keda atiokisio nuka aswamisioit ngin, ido abu koyangau ipegeta keda ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni otita eyi azi otita aci pico niri ni 'diyi ma alea risi, asi otiza e'do tu ongulumu eyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ma esele co e'yo orodri eyini azini e'yo ewaru e'yo 'di ni 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani agbatara okporu azini ngiringiri ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ekyaro ku yarangiriire enteekateeka y'okukora purogyekiti y'amashanyarazi eya pico, obunkenke bukatandika kweyongyera omu bantu. Abatuuragye abaingi bakaba batarikukwatanisa aha birungi n'ebibi ebiri omu nteekateeka egi, ekyarugiremu okuhanuura kw'amaani n'obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and abandonment, the once-bustling power station fell silent, leaving it vulnerable to the encroachment of nature. Over time, the surrounding landscape reclaimed the area, transforming it into a lush green sanctuary.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'okusuulibwa, ekkolero ly'amasannyalaze eryali lijjudde abantu lyasirise, ne lileka obuzibu bw'okusaalimbira kw'obutonde. Ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, ettaka eryeetoolodde lyatereera, ne lifuuka ekkuumiro ly'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki weko, gang tic me mac macon ma onongo dano dwong iye-ni ojwik woko, oweko twero me donyo i kom cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo. Ikare ma okato, kabedo ma orumu kabedo ne odoko kama leng tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu lu apalunitai ka apalar, abu esiteseni lo akim loajaasi keda itunga luipu kibiroros, ido kojalakini ngin atiokisio nu amunar isuban luka Edeke. Akaulo naka apak, abu akwap kijulak aiboisit ngin araun aiboisit naibusakinit aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aibo
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu azini adizu 'bori ma vutia, okalamvu aci ni andra okpo be tu ri e'de ciri, erini ani fezu e'yo afa nyakuni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ni ecazu ewakokoru. Sa'wa ma vutia, angu 'ba agei 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi oja angu 'da ra erini ani eri ojazu angu 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okurekurwa, eikorero ry'amashanyarazi eryabaire riine abantu baingi, rikagwa kihuumura, ekyaretsire okutaahirira eby'obuhangwa. Ku haahingwireho obwire,obuhangwa oburikwetorwaire bukagarura busya omwanya, bwaguhindura omwanya murungi gw'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for sustainable food sources, communities are exploring ways to reconnect with the land. As a result, many individuals are turning their attention to farming and gardening practices.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ensibuko z'emmere eziwangaala, ebitundu binoonyereza ku ngeri y'okuddamu okukwatagana n'ettaka. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi essira balitadde ku byobulimi n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo cam maber, lwak tye ka yenyo yoo me kube ki ngom gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka keto cwiny gi i kom pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo iyatakinet loka aiboisio nu inyamat, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu arucokina keda alupok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin apodokinit kec akoru keda amisirin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini nyaka esuzu sa'wa driasi ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu eyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ecizu eyi ma nyaku be 'diyi onda. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'ba e'yo ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'eby'okurya ebirikubaasa kugumaho, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okugaruka kukwatanisa n'eitaka. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibata omutima aha buhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: After a successful trial period, the club's management expressed their excitement about the potential of their latest recruit. Fans eagerly awaited the announcement, hoping the new player would make a significant impact on the team's performance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugezesebwa obulungi, abaddukanya ttiimu baalaga essanyu lyabwe olw'obusobozi bw'omuzannyi waabwe omupya. Abawagizi balindirira n'obwagazi okulangirira, nga basuubira nti omuzannyi omupya ajja kukola kinene ku mutindo gwa ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me pimo maber tutwal, ludito me dul tuku ne gunyuto yom cwinygi pi kero pa ngat manyen ma gucoyo. Lucwak tuku gubedo kakuru lok angeya ne ki miti madit tutwal, kun gitye ki gen ni latuku manyen ne bikelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom kit ma tim ne tye katuku kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio najokan, apotu eyaitene loka ekilabu kitodutu aiyalamakec kanuka apedor naka itunganan yenitetet. Apotu egangitok idarakisi alimoret ngin, komuno ebe ebuni abolian loitetet aitojokar eswamae loka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani e'yo obizu drile suzaru 'bori ma vutia, driceza amuti mupira avizu 'da niri ece ayiko eyini e'yo 'ba eyini 'du o'diru 'diyiniri ma dria. Ba atita fepi 'diyi te e'yo 'da asi driasi asi 'baza be kini 'ba avita avipi o'diru 'da ni nga e'yo okporu 'ye amuti avita ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugyezibwa kurungi, abarikukurira kiraabu boorekire okushemererwa kwabo ahabw'obushoboorozi bw'omuntu waabo omusya. Abahagizi bakategyereza kurungi okurangirira, baine amatsiko ngu omuzaani omusya naija kukora kihango aha kukora kwa tiimu.

eng_prompt: The football club has announced a new addition to their roster. Fans are excited to welcome a talented player with a strong leadership background.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'omupiira gw'ebigere erangiridde omuzannyi omupya ku lukalala lwayo. Abawagizi basanyufu okwaniriza omuzannyi alina ekitone n'obukulembeze obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku odilo man otito ni gumedo ngat manyen I kin lutuku ma gutiyo kwedgi. Lucwak tuku tye ki yomcwiny me jolo latuku matye ki talanta dok tye latela maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Alimo ekilabu lo emopira itunganan yenitetet. Iyalamasi egangitok noi aijaun abolian loajaasi keda atalanta naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti mupira tuzaniri azi 'ba o'dini yi ma eselea 'bo. Ba atita fepi 'diyi ayikosi 'ba avita avipi talanta be driceza okporu be 'diyi ai'zu.
nyn_prompt: Kiraabu y'omupiira erangirire omuntu omusya. Abahagizi bashemereirwe kwakiira omuzaani oine entaranta kandi aine obwebembezi burungi.

eng_prompt: In a bold move to strengthen their squad, Onduparaka FC announced the acquisition of a key player from a rival team. This signing asserted that Onduparaka is not afraid of KCCA.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'obuvumu ow'okunyweza ttiimu yabwe, Onduparaka FC yalangiridde okugula omuzannyi omukulu okuva mu ttiimu evuganya. Omuzannyi ono yakakasa nti Onduparaka tetya KCCA.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me jingo dul tuku meggi, dul tuku me Onduparaka FC guwaco ni guwilo latuku ma pire tek ki I dul tuku ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi. Latuku manyen man owaco ni dul tuku me Onduparaka pe lworo dul tuku me KCCA.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naka aitogogong etimu kec, abu Onduparaka FC kolimo ebe adumutu kesi abolian loepol noi kama ejai etimu loeboloboloete. Abu adumun lo itodunit ebe mam Onduparaka ekuriana KCCA.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi driasi lezu amuti avita ni 'diyi ma okpo otuzu, amuti avita ni onduparaka FC azi e'yo 'bani 'ba avita ni okporu ni isuzu engazu amuti avita ni 'diyi ma alia ri ma dria. Agu 'bani je o'diru 'diri ece kini Onduparaka 'dini 'ye urisi KCCA vu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'amaani ey'okwongyera amaani omu tiimu yaabo, Onduparaka FC ekarangirira okugura omuzaani mukuru kuruga omu tiimu erikuvuganya. Omuzaani owaguzirwe, akagira ngu Onduparaka t'etiinire Kampala Capital City Authority.

eng_prompt: With a strong track record and impressive performances this season, the team has garnered attention from fans and analysts alike. Their roster is filled with talent and skill, making them a formidable opponent on the field.
lug_prompt: N'ebyafaayo eby'amaanyi n'omutindo omulungi mu sizoni eno, ttiimu efunye okufaayo okuva mu bawagizi n'abakugu. Olukalala lwabwe lujjudde ebitone n'obukugu, ekibafuula abavuganya ab'entiisa mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Ki rekod maber tutwal ki kit ma tim ne otimo kwede I kare me tuku eni, dul tuku eni obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom lucwak ki lutim kwed. Dul tuku meggi opong ki talanta ki diro, ma oweko gubedo lumone matek tutwal I bar tuku.
teo_prompt: Keda akiro nuapolok nueswamata kesi keda eswamae loajokan noi kapak kana, apotu egangitok keda angicak luka etimu kisinyikokisi kesi. Ejaasi kesi keda atalanta keda acoa naepol noi, ido ijaikini kesi etiono noi kotoma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye okporu azini avita onyiru sa'wa 'di ma alia 'diyisi, amuti 'di isu asi engaza engazu 'ba atita fepi 'diyi vu azini 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi vu. Yi ma eselea 'ba talanta be azini ondua be tre 'diyi, fe yini ovuzu 'ba avita ni okporu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyafaayo by'amaani n'okukora kurungi omu siizoni egi, tiimu etungire amaani kuruga omu bahagizi hamwe n'abacencuzi. Orukarara rwabo rwijwire etaraanta n'emyoga, ekirikubareetera kuba ab'omuhendo aha kishayi.

eng_prompt: After a series of intense training sessions and strategic meetings, the team is feeling confident about their upcoming match. With the support of their passionate fans, Onduparaka is determined to secure a victory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'enkiiko z'obukodyo, ttiimu ewulira nga yeesiga omuzannyo gwayo ogujja. Olw'obuwagizi bw'abawagizi baabwe abanyiikivu, Onduparaka emaliridde okufuna obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Ingee pwonye matek tutwal ki kacoke mapat-pat, tim ne tye ki tek cwiny I kom tuku gi matye kabino anyim. Ki kony pa lucwakgi, Onduparaka omoko tamgi me nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aituutoorio naepol noi keda airiamununeta, epupe etimu keda amuno kanu abolia kec naebunit. Keda agangat naka egangitokokec, ekapakina Onduparaka aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani okporu 'diyi ma vutia, amuti mupira avipi 'da ni asi'baza be abala eyini emupi 'diyi ma dria. Atita 'ba atita fepi eyidri avasi 'diyiniri si, Onduparaka ni asi 'ba e'yo ndezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutendekwa munonga hamwe n'orukiiko rw'amaani, tiimu neehurira eine obwesigye aha muzaano gwayo ogurikwija. Ahabw'obuhwezi bw'abahagizi baabo, Onduparaka eyehaireyo kusingura.

eng_prompt: With the league standings tightening, every match has become crucial for teams fighting to avoid relegation. The pressure is mounting as Onduparaka prepares to face the formidable Kasasiro boys in a must-win encounter.
lug_prompt: Ng'ennyiriri za liigi zeeyongera okunywezebwa, buli mupiira gufuuse gwa mugaso eri ttiimu ezilwana okwewala okukka okuva mu kibinja. Obunkenke bweyongera nga Onduparaka yeetegekera okuttunka n'abalenzi ba Kasasiro ab'entiisa mu mupiira gwe balina okuwangula.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me tuko odoko tek tutwal, tuku weng odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal pi team ma tye ka lweny me gwokke ki poto I dul tuku mapat-pat. Lyeto tye ka mede I kare ma Onduparaka tye ka yubbe me lweny I kom lutino awobe me Kasasiro I pyem ma omyero gulo.
teo_prompt: Keda adoketait naepol noi naka emopira, erai kangin abolia naepol noi kanu itimun luekotosi ainyekikin aibwo kotoma atutubet. Apolor noi aiyalongong kwape ekapakina Onduparaka airiamun keda isap luka Kasasiro luepolok noi kotoma airiamunet naibusakinit kesi aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo avita ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, abala dria eyi curu'do orodriru amuti a'di 'dipi eyi ma esele cozu ku 'diyi dri. E'yo ewaru ni tu uru ekile Onduparaka ni otuta 'yezu dri fuzu 'ba azi okporu Kasasiro ni 'diyi be a'bala 'bani eco nde ra ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu emizaano ya liigi eyeyongyeire, buri muzaano gukaba guri ogw'omugasho munonga aha tiimu ezirikurwanirira okwetantara okuruga omu kicweka kya kabiri. Okugyemeserezibwa kweyongyeire obu Onduparaka erikweteekateekyera okurwanisa abashaija ba Kasasiro ab'amaani omu mpaka ezi bashemereire kusingura.

eng_prompt: Known for their dynamic style of play, Onduparaka often prioritizes offensive strategies over defensive tactics. Their approach focuses on creating scoring opportunities rather than simply protecting their goal.
lug_prompt: Onduparaka emanyiddwa olw'omuzannyo gwayo ogw'amaanyi, bulijjo ekulembeza obukodyo bw'okulumba okusinga obukodyo bw'okuziyiza. Enkola yaabwe essira balitadde ku kutondawo mikisa gya kuteeba mu kifo ky'okukuuma ggoolo zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Onduparaka ma oywek pi kit tuku gi, ipol kare gi keto diro me lweny I komgi me loyo diro me gwoko gi. Yub meggi tye me nongo gum me moto golo me kaka gwoko golo gi.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Onduparaka kanu epone loka abolia kec, etapit duc aisingarenit acoasinei nu asurokin adepar nu ayuwara. Epodokinit kesi aitolomun arerengesio nuka ainom igolon itia ayuarite igolon kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni Onduparaka ni geri eyini avita avizu okporu 'diyisi, eyi sa'wa driasi geri eyini ageyitema fezu 'diyi 'du okporu aga geri eyini ageyitema fezu 'diyi. Geri yini e'yo 'yezu ri asi 'baza be drileba osuzu 'diyi ma edeta ma dria aga lu eyi ma golo ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Onduparaka emanyirwe ahabw'omuzaano gwayo ogurikwetengwa munonga, buriijo neetwara oburyo bw'okutaahirira kukira obw'okuzibira. Enkora yaabo neeta amaani omu kureetaho emigisha y'okuteeba gooro, omu mwanya gw'okurinda gooro yaabo.

eng_prompt: The team has shown remarkable resilience and skill throughout the season. Fans are eagerly anticipating their next home match, hoping to see another victory.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu eyo eyolesezza obuvumu n'obukugu obw'ekitalo sizoni eno yonna. Abawagizi beesunga omuzannyo gwabwe oguddako awaka, nga basuubira okulaba obuwanguzi obulala.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku eni onyuto kero ki diro maber tutwal I kare me tuku eni. Lucwak tuku gitye ka kuro tuku gi me gang ki miti madit tutwal, ki gen me nongo loc mukene.
teo_prompt: Etodunit etimu agogongu keda acoa naepol noi kapak naka abolia. Ekapakina egangitok abolia kec naetupakini, aomit kesi ebe epote kesi aitelekaar bobo.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da e'da okpo azini ondua onyiru sa'wa 'disi dria. Ba atita fepi 'diyi avita yini emupi akua ri te avasi asi 'baza be agata azini ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu eyorekire amaani n'obwegyendesereza omu siizoni yoona. Abahagizi beine ekihika ky'okureeba omuzaano gwabo ogurikukurataho omuka, baine amatsiko g'okureeba obuhanguzi obundi.

eng_prompt: With a strong recruitment strategy and a focus on developing local talent, the team has built a formidable roster. Their recent performances have showcased the effectiveness of their training and player management.
lug_prompt: Nga balina enkola ey'amaanyi ey'okuyingiza abantu n'okussa essira ku kukuza ebitone by'omu kitundu, ttiimu ekoze olukalala lw'abazannyi olw'amaanyi. Emizannyo gyabwe gye buvuddeko giraga obulungi bw'okutendekebwa kwabwe n'okuddukanya abazannyi.
ach_prompt: Ki yoo me coyo lutic matek tutwal ki keto cwiny I kom dongo talanta me tedero, dul tuku eni oyubu nyinggi maber tutwal. Kit ma gutimo kwede cokcok-ki onyuto maber pa yubgi me pwonye ki doro lutuku.
teo_prompt: Keda epone loajokan loka aitolom itunga keda apodokinit aitopoloun atalantan nuka atutubet, adukun etimu ngol itunga luipu noi. Aswam kec pac itodunit ebe ejokuna noi aituutoonor kec keda eyaitene lo aboliak.
lgg_prompt: Otita okporu 'bani 'ba eyi sizu azini asi 'bazu feta Munguni fe 'diyi ezozu angu 'da ma alea risi, amuti 'da si 'ba karakara eyi. Yeta yini o'diru 'diyi e'da geri yini embata fezu azini driceza 'ba avitani 'diyiniri ma orodri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enkora y'amaani ey'okuheereza abantu emirimo hamwe n'okuta amaani omu kutunguura emyoga y'abantu b'omwihanga, tiimu eyombekire orukarara rw'amaani. Enkora yaabo ey'obwahati, niyooreka oburungi bw'okutendeka kwabo n'okureeberera abazaani baabo.

eng_prompt: To improve their chances of success in the upcoming match, Onduparaka must focus on their defensive strategies. Maintaining discipline and organization will be crucial, especially when they lose control of the ball.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula emikisa gyabwe egy'obuwanguzi mu mupiira ogujja, Onduparaka erina okussa essira ku bukodyo bwayo obw'ebyokwerinda. Okukuuma empisa n'obutebenkevu bijja kuba bikulu nnyo naddala nga tebakyalina buyinza ku mupiira.
ach_prompt: Me medo gum gi me loyo tuku matye kabino ni, Onduparaka omyero guket cwiny gi i kom diro gi me gwoko piny. Gwoko woro ki yub bibedo gin ma pire tek tutwalle kace gurwenyo twero gi iwi odilo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar arerengusio kec nuka aitelekaar kotoma abolia na ebunit, ekot Onduparaka apodokinit iponesiokec luka ayuwara. Ajaut keda ainapara ka ainapara erai ibore yenepol noi, kacut arai mam kesi epedoritos aipuga emopira.
lgg_prompt: Drileba yini abala emupi ri ma alia 'diyi otuzu, le Onduparaka ma 'ba asi geri yini yi ma agei tezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo adriza ala ma ta mbazu azini otuta ma ta mbazu ri ni nga ovu orodriru tuni yini mupira ma okpo avizu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura emigisha yaabo y'obusinguzi omu muzaano ogurikwija, Onduparaka eshemereire kuta amaani omu by'okwerinda. Okukuratira emicwe n'entebekanisa, nikiija kuba eky'omugasho munonga, namunonga ku barikuba batakiine bushoborozi aha mupiira.

eng_prompt: Their ability to control the ball and dictate the pace of the game sets them apart from many opponents. With skilled players and effective strategies, they thrive in possession-based play.
lug_prompt: Obusobozi bwabwe obw'okufuga omupiira n'okulagira sipiidi y'omuzannyo bibawula ku bavuganya bangi. Nga balina abazannyi abakugu n'obukodyo obulungi, bakulaakulana mu muzannyo ogwesigamiziddwa ku kuba n'omupiira.
ach_prompt: Twerogi me doro odilo ki doro kit ma tuku tye kawot kwede weko gi bedo pat ki jo mapol ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi. Ki lutuku matye ki ngec ki diro me tuko maber, gituko maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apedorit kec naka aitikitik emopira keda aijen epone loka abolia einakini kesi atiakakin kanejaas lueboloboloete keda kesi. Keda aboliak lu emisiaritos keda iponesio luajokak, iswamaete kesi ejok noi kotoma abolia.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo mupira ma dri cezu azini e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dri cezu ri ni yi 'ba esele 'ba abala 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea. Ba avitani onduaru azini otita kililiru 'diyisi, eyi avita 'bani avita 'yezu 'diyi ma alea drile.
nyn_prompt: Obushoboorozi bwabo bw'okutegyeka omupiira n'okutegyeka omuzaano nibabataanisa n'abazaani baabo. Ahabw'abazaani abaine emyoga n'oburyo burungi, nibasingura munonga omu kuzaana.

eng_prompt: In the upcoming match, Onduparaka needs to maintain their focus and strategy. They must avoid getting drawn into the tactics that Kampala Capital City Authority prefers.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogujja, Onduparaka yeetaaga okukuuma ebirowoozo n'obukodyo bwayo. Balina okwewala okusendebwasendebwa mu bukodyo ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority bwe kyettanira.
ach_prompt: I tuku matye kabino ni, dul tuku me onduparaka omyero gu ket cwiny gi I kom tuku gi. Omyero pe gudony I diro ma dul me Kampala Capital City Authority maro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia na ebunit, ekot Onduparaka aidar apodokinit kec keda acoasineikec. Ibusakinit kesi aisac alomar toma acoasinei nueminasi Atukot naeyait ainapeta ko Kampala.
lgg_prompt: Abala emupi ri ma alea, le Onduparaka ma 'ba asi e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria tualu geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi pie. Le eyi ma ku e'yo 'bani eyi suzu geri Kampala Capital City Authority ni le 'diyi ma alea ri ja.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano ogurikwija, Onduparaka eshemereire kuguma eyeteekateekire. Bashemereire kwetantara okutwarwa omu bukoryo obu ekitongore kya Kampala Capital City Authority kirikukunda.

eng_prompt: Teamwork is essential in soccer, as each player's contribution can significantly impact the game's outcome. Effective communication and collaboration are key elements that can lead to success on the field.
lug_prompt: Okukolera awamu kya mugaso mu mupiira, nga buli muzannyi ky'akola kisobola okukyusa ebyava mu muzannyo. Empuliziganya ennungi n'okukolagana bye bintu ebikulu ebiyinza okuviirako obuwanguzi mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Tic kacel obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tuku odilo pien gin ma latuku acel acel timo twero kelo adwogi maber I kom tuku. Lok ki winye maber obedo gin ma pire tek ma weko dano cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aswam nepepe ejok noi kotoma abolia naka emopira, naarai epedori ngin abolian aitodolikin nuelomunete kotoma abolia. Einer loajokan keda aiswamanara kes iboro luepedorete ayangaun akerianut kotoma aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza amuti ru ri eri orodriru avita mupira tuzaniri ma alia, ekile 'ba avitani alu alu ma orodri ni eco avita ma agata oja ra. E'yo nzeza kililiru tualu ti ecita be 'diyi afa orodriru ecopi fepi drile suza ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okukorera hamwe nikikuru munonga omu muzaano gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere, ahabw'okuba eki buri muzaani arikukora nikibaasa kukora kihango ahamuhendo gw'omuzaano. Okuganiira kurungi n'okukwatanisa, nibyo bintu ebikuru ebirikubaasa kureeta obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, Onduparaka has announced that their captain will be sidelined for the upcoming match. The team is now preparing to face Kasasiro Boys with a different lineup.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, Onduparaka erangiridde nti kapiteeni waayo ajja kuggyibwa mu mupiira ogujja. Ttiimu kati yeetegekera okuttunka ne Kasasiro Boys mu nsengeka ya njawulo.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ur tutwal, Onduparaka owaco ni lador dul tuku gi pe obi bedo tye I tuku matye kabino ni. Dul tuku eni kombedi tye ka yubbe me pyem ki Kasasiro Boys ki dul tuku mapat.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu Onduparaka kolimo ebe mam ekaputein kec ebuni ajaikin toma abolia na ebunit. Euta kwana etimu aitemonokin aitepeg Kasasiro Boys keda egurupu loegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo osuta ma alia, Onduparaka azi kini 'ba nga eyi ma kaputaini dro abala emupi ri ma alea ku. Amuti mupira avizu 'da ni sa'wa 'disi otuta 'ye muzu a'bala 'yezu Kasasiro Boys be amuti ndu ndu si.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, Onduparaka erangirire ngu kapiteeni waabo tarikwija kuzaana omuzaano ogurikwija. Tiimu obwahati neetebeekanisiza okurwanisa Kasasiro Boys n'entebekanisa y'omupiira etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Despite the recent controversies surrounding the team's performance, the management decided to maintain a low profile. Fans and media alike were left wondering about the club's future plans and strategies.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo okusika omuguwa ku mutindo gwa ttiimu gyebuvuddeko, abaddukanya ttiimu baasazeewo okwekweka. Abawagizi ne bannamawulire bombi baalekebwa nga beebuuza ku nteekateeka za kiraabu ez'omu maaso n'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni laro lok obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom kit ma dul tuku ne otimo kwede, ludito me dul tuku ne gumoko tamgi me bedo piny. Lucwak tuku kacel ki luco lok angeya gubedo ki ngeng I kom yub ki yoo me tic pa dul tuku eni I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ingungeta nuikamunitos eswamae loka etimu, abu eyaitene lo etimu koseu ajaut keda ekiror loedit. Aponi kojalakinai egangitok keda arotak iyemuto aomoom nuikamunitos ainapeta keda acoasinei nuka ekilabu.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako amuti 'da ma agata ma dria o'diru 'diyi ma talasi, driceza amuti 'da niri 'du e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu ku. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi pie ri awi yi osu otuta amuti mupira avizu 'da ni ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obutaikirizana obwahwaireho aha kukora kwa tiimu, abarikukikurira bakasharamu kuguma baine eiziina rikye. Abahagizi hamwe n'abanyamakuru bakasigara nibeebuuza enteekateeka za kiraabu ez'omumaisho hamwe n'oburyo bw'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances, some students were unable to take their exams in the usual setting. As a result, four candidates in Arua sat their Uganda Certificate of Examinations from outside.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, abayizi abamu tebaasobola kukola bigezo byabwe mu mbeera eya bulijjo. N'ekyavaamu, abayizi bana ab'akamalirizo mu Arua baatuula ebigezo byabwe ebya Uganda Certificate of Examinations nga bali bweru.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura, lutino kwan mukene pe gutwero timo penygi I yoo macon. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan angwen me Arua gutimo peny gi me Uganda Certificate of Examinations ki woko.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, mam esisiak ice apedoritos aswam aingitokec kopone kaloejok. Kanuka ngun, apotu esisiak iwongon luko Arua iboikinos aingitokec nakokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyisi, sukulu anzi azi 'diyi awini obeta eyivile 'diyi 'ye geri eyini eyi 'ye ri si ku. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi su Arua 'diyi ri obeta yini Uganda Certificate of Examinations ni 'diyi engazu amve.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etari y'okureeberaho, abeegi abamwe tibarabaasize kukora ebigyezo byabo nk'oku kyabaire kiri. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi bana ab'akamaririzo omuri Arua, bakashutama aheeru y'eishomero kukora ebigyezo byabo ebya Uganda Certificate of Examinations.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple warnings about their behavior, the students continued to disrupt classes and disregard school rules. As a result, the administration had no choice but to take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalabulwa emirundi egiwera ku nneeyisa yaabwe, abayizi beeyongedde okutaataaganya ebibiina n'obutafaayo ku mateeka g'essomero. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze tebaalina kyakukola okuggyako okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki ciko lutino I kom timgi tyen mapol, pud gumede ki balo gang kwan ki kwero lubu cik me gang kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela pe gubedo ki gin atima mapat ki moko tam gi.
