teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai kesi nuikamunitos iponesiokec, apotu esisiak inyikokisi aitolitol atukot kosodete apalunit ikisila luka esomero. Kanuka ngun, amamete eyaitene keda aseunet kilema aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza karakara eyi ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, sukulu anzi eyi mu drile e'yo onzi 'yezu kilasi eyi ma alea eyini ani azita sukulu ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku. E'yo 'disi, driceza nderi vu e'yo azi nduni yo lu e'yo 'duzu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize yaabo, abeegi bagumiizemu kutabangura ebibiina n'okujeemera ebiragiro by'eishomero. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi bakaba bataine ky'okukora okwihaho okukora ekirikubaasika.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose among the student body, a group of individuals began to plot their actions in secret. Their growing frustration with the school's administration led them to devise a plan that would ultimately disrupt the peace.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kibiina ky'abayizi, ekibinja ky'abantu kinnoomu kyatandika okukola enteekateeka zaabwe mu nkukutu. Obwennyamivu bwabwe obweyongera ku bukulembeze bw'essomero bwabaleetera okukola enteekateeka eyanditaataaganyizza emirembe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kin lutino kwan, gurup pa lutino mukene gucako yube me timo gin mo I mung. Cwer cwiny gi I kom tela me gang kwan oweko guyubu yoo me balo kuc.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kanejaas esisiak, apotu igurupun luka itunga kogeutu aitemonokin aswamisiokec kotoma aiyeyea. Anyunyurakec keda eyaitene lo esomero abu koyangau kesi aitemonokin ainapeta nuepedorete aitolitol ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea, ongulumu azi eyi e'do otu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ndindiru. E'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi driceza sukulu niri vu ri fe eyini otuta azi ngapi asizu asianzu ezazuri e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu beegi, guruupu y'abantu bakatandika kukora enteekateeka omu kihama. Okweyongyera kwetomboitwa kwabo ahabw'obwebembezi bw'eishomero, kikabareetera kukora enteekateeka eyabaire neija kutabangura obusingye.

eng_prompt: The school administration has set clear guidelines for attendance during important assessments. It is crucial for all students to adhere to these rules to ensure a fair testing environment.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'essomero bataddewo ebiragiro ebitegeerekeka obulungi eby'okubeerawo mu biseera by'okukeberebwa okw'omugaso. Kya mugaso nnyo abayizi bonna okugoberera amateeka gano okukakasa embeera y'okukeberebwa ey'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Lutela me gang kwan gukati ki cik ma niange maber tutwal me neno ni lutino gubedo tye ikare me timo peny ma pigi tego. Pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan weng me lubu cik magi me neno ni timo peny tye maber.
teo_prompt: Etolomu eyaitene lo esomero aicoreta nuecaete kanu ajaut kapak naka aingic. Erai ibore yenepol noi esisiak kere atupakinit ikisila lu kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sukulu niri o'ba azita kililiru 'ba eyini muzu obeta eyi ma alea sa'wa orodriru 'diyisi. Eri orodriru sukulu anzi dria eyini azita 'diyi ma vuti obizu nezu ra kini e'yo obeta ni 'diyi muke.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'eishomero bateireho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa, ebirikukwata aha kuza omu bigyezo by'omugasho. N'eky'omugasho munonga abeegi boona kukuratira ebiragiro ebi, okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza omu bigyezo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents involving student misconduct, the administration has decided to take a firm stance on maintaining a safe and respectful environment. As a result, the school cannot tolerate lawbreakers.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko awo ebikwata ku nneeyisa y'abayizi embi, abakulembeze basazeewo okuba abanywevu mu kukuuma embeera ey'obukuumi era ey'ekitiibwa. N'ekivuddemu, essomero terisobola kugumiikiriza bamenyi b'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma lubbe ki tim maraco pa lutino kwan, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tamgi me gwoko kuc ki woro ikin lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, gang kwan ne pe twero cwako lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuiswamasi pac nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok luka esisiak, abu eyaitene lo esomero itutub nuikamunitos aidar aiboisit na eyuara ka ayongite. Kanuka ngun, mam esomero epedori atitingit itunga lu ebilibilete ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi curu'do sukulu anzi eyi ma adriza onzi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza sukulu niri 'du e'yo okporu angu 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, sukulu 'da econi 'ba azita onyopi 'diyi ma ti ta ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho juba ebirikukwata aha micwe mibi y'abeegi, abarikukurira eitendekyero bashaziremu kugumizamu kurinda obusingye n'ekitiinisa. N'ekyarugiremu, eishomero tiririkubaasa kugumisiriza abarikuhenda ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Frustration among the students grew as they realized their concerns were being ignored. After several attempts to communicate with the administration, they decided to take a stand.
lug_prompt: Okuggwaamu essuubi mu bayizi kweyongera bwe baakiraba nti ebyeraliikiriza byabwe byali bibuusibwa amaaso. Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako enfunda eziwera okuwuliziganya n'abakulembeze, baasalawo okubaako kye bakola.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny I kin lutino kwan omede ikare ma gunongo ni pe kitye ka tamo I kom peko gi. Inge temo lok ki lutela tyen mapol, gumoko tamgi me cung.
teo_prompt: Apotu esisiak itakadikisi noi nawanyunia kesi ebe mam epalunit aiyalongongokec. Akaulo naka aitam einer keda eyaitene, apotu kesi koseutu aibwo.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri tu ra eyini e'yo eyini asi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ku risi. O'bita karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo nzezu driceza eyi pie 'bo, eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira omu beegi kweyongyeire, ahabw'okureeba ngu ebyabaire bibarikuteganisa bikaba bitahurikiirwe. Bwanyima y'okugyezaho emirundi mingi kugamba n'abebembezi, bakasharamu kutaho enteekateeka.

eng_prompt: After completing their coursework, the students eagerly prepared for their upcoming assessments. To ensure they could sit for the exams, they needed to complete the registration process.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza emisomo gyabwe, abayizi beetegekera n'obwagazi ebigezo byabwe ebijja. Okusobola okukakasa nti batuula ebigezo, beetaaga okumaliriza okwewandiisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko kwan gi, lutino kwan guyube pi peny gi matye kabino anyim. Me neno ni gutimo peny, omyero gutyek coone.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin aswamukec, apotu esisiak itemonokinos kanu aingito na ebunit. Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete kesi aiboikin aingito, ekot kes angetakin aiwadikaun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani yi vileri dezu 'bori ma vutia, sukulu anzi yi otu yi avasi obeta yini emupi 'diyi ni. Lezu nezu ra kini yi eco obeta eyi 'ye ra, le eyi ma de geri ru siza ni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okumara emishomo yaabo, abeegi baketeekateekyera ebibuuzo byabo ebyabaire nibiza kubaho. Okureeba ngu bashutama ebigyezo, bakaba baine kumaririza okwehandikisa.

eng_prompt: After reviewing their circumstances and the challenges they faced, the administration decided to make an exception. The students had worked hard and demonstrated their commitment to their studies despite the obstacles.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera yaabwe n'okusoomoozebwa kwe baayolekagana nakwo, abakulembeze baasalawo okukola eky'enjawulo. Abayizi baali bakoze nnyo era ne balaga obumalirivu bwabwe eri emisomo gyabwe wadde nga waaliwo ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma kwo gi tye kwede ki peko ma gunongo, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo mapat. Lutino kwan gutiyo matek dok gunyutu miti gi me mede ki kwan kadi bed ni peko obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejautene kec keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi, apotu engarenok koseutu aitemokin ngun. Apotu esisiak iswamata kagogong kosodete aitodun ainakina kec toma asiomanikec araida ejaas atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo yini 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini e'yo ewaru yini isule 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da pe e'yo azi 'yezu. Sukulu anzi 'da eyi nga azi okporu eyini ani e'dazu eyi ma asi 'baza onita eyivile 'diyi ma dria ra e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera yaabo hamwe n'oburemeezi obubatungire, abarikubareeberera bakasharamu kukora ekitarikushushana n'ekyo. Abeegi bakakora n'amaani kandi booreka okwehayo kwabo omu mishomo yaabo, oihireho oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Many educators and parents have expressed their concerns about the declining quality of education. As a result, calls for increased funding and resources have become more urgent.

teo_prompt: Apotu isisianakinak keda auriak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aibiror naka adoketait na asioman. Kanuka ngun, ekotoi noi aiyatakin ikapun keda iboro.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents and growing concerns among parents and staff, it has become evident that a more structured approach is necessary. To ensure a safe and conducive learning environment, clear guidelines must be put in place.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera mu bazadde n'abakozi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola entegeke obulungi yeetaagibwa. Okukakasa embeera y'okusoma ennungi, ebiragiro ebitangaavu birina okuteekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lworo matye kamede ikin lunyodo ki lutic, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me tic ma kiyubu maber mite. Me neno ni kwan tye maber, omyero ki ket cik ma niange maber.

eng_prompt: In discussions about school conduct, many parents expressed their concerns regarding the behavior of students in public settings. They emphasized the importance of instilling good manners and respect in their children.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nneeyisa y'essomero, abazadde bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nneeyisa y'abayizi mu bifo eby'olukale. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okussa empisa ennungi n'ekitiibwa mu baana baabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom kit lutino kwan, lunyodo mapol gunyutu lworo gi I kom kit lutino kwan I dye lwak. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lutino gi ki kit mabeco ki woro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos iponesio luka esomero, apotu auriak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu iponesio luka esisiak kotunga. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aisisianakin idwekec iponesio luajokak ka ayongite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza sukulu ma adriza ma dria ri ma alea, tipika karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini sukulu anzi eyi ma adriza o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani anzi eyivile 'diyini adriza kililiru azini inzita fezu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent incidents of misconduct, the school administration has decided to take a firm stance. As a result, the suspension of these students will be an example for the rest.

eng_prompt: The excitement of a new academic year quickly turned to uncertainty as the staff prepared for unexpected changes. Just weeks into the term, the community was shocked by the sudden departure of a key leader.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the movement of people and goods occurs at an unprecedented rate. As a result, infectious diseases can quickly jump from one location to another, leading to widespread outbreaks.

eng_prompt: As we explore potential partnerships, it's important to understand your company's focus and objectives. Could you provide an overview of your operations and target market?

eng_prompt: Vaccines play a crucial role in public health by preventing the spread of infectious diseases. By administering immunizations to the population, we can significantly reduce the risk of outbreaks.

Kanuka ngun, mam ainapeta nuapolok nuka apugan epedorete aijaikin agangat ne ipuda noi.

eng_prompt: Bacteria are microscopic organisms that can be found in various environments, and they play a significant role in both health and disease. Understanding the impact of bacteria on human health is crucial for preventing and treating infections.

teo_prompt: Eraas ikur lu ikidioko noi luepedorio adumun kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, ido iswamaete kesi aswam naepol noi kotoma angaleu keda adekasinei. Ajenun epone loepedoriata ikur aijar naka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aimuke adekasinei.

eng_prompt: In a country where football unites millions, fans often compete for the title of the most dedicated supporter. With vibrant celebrations and unwavering loyalty, one fan stands out among the rest.

ach_prompt: I lobo ma tuku odilo ribo dano milion mapol, lucwak ipol kare gipyem me bedo lucwak ma cwinygi tye I komgi. Ki yub me kwee ki woro matek tutwal, lacwak acel nen pat ki joo mukene.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, sports play a significant role in the culture, with many people gathering to enjoy various games. Among these, football stands out as the most popular pastime for many men.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, emizannyo gikola omulimu munene mu byobuwangwa, nga abantu bangi bakungaana okunyumirwa emizannyo egy'enjawulo. Mu bino, omupiira gw'ebigere gwe gusinga okwettanirwa abasajja bangi.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, tuku tye gin ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro, ki dano mapol ma gure me nongo mit pa tuku mapat-pat. I kin jami magi, tuku odilo obedo gin ma co mapol maro adada.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, iswamaete aboliasio aswam naepol noi kotoma inonosio, itunga luipu atukonokin kanu alelakin aboliasio nuegelegela. Kotoma ngul, emopira ngesi abolia naeminasi ikiliok luipu noi.

eng_prompt: As the excitement builds for the upcoming championship match, fans and media alike are eager to hear from the team's leader. In an effort to address questions and boost morale, a coach holds a press conference a day before the game.
lug_prompt: Nga essanyu lyeyongera olw'omuzannyo gwa bannantammegwa ogujja, abawagizi ne bannamawulire beesunga okuwulira okuva eri omukulembeze wa ttiimu. Mu kaweefube w'okuddamu ebibuuzo n'okutumbula empisa, omutendesi akuba olukungaana lwa bannamawulire olunaku lumu ng'omuzannyo tegunnabaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yomcwiny tye ka mede pi pyem tuku odilo matye kabino ni, lucwak ki lucoo lok angea gitye ki miti matek me winyo lok pa latela pa tim ne. I tute me gamo lapeny ki medo cwiny lutuku, lapwony tuku bedo ki kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya nino acel ma peya tuko ocake.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi itunga aiyalama kanuka abolobol naebunit, ekotosi egangitok keda arotak iyemuto aipup nuikamunitos engarenon loka etimu. Kanu aitemokin aingiseta ka aikeun iponesio luka itunga, einanakini etuutooron einer keda lu iyemuto apaaran adiope eringa abolia.

Okpo 'bazu e'yo yi ma aza kozu azini asi engazu, imbapi avitaniri ni e'yo nze 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie o'du alu de nga po'di avita 'da ecani ku.

Omu kaweefube w'okugarukamu ebibuuzo n'okutunguura emicwe, omutendeki naakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru eizooba rimwe omuzaano gutakabaireho.

eng_prompt: In professional sports, the health and safety of athletes are paramount. As a result, teams often make the decision to bench athletes who are unable to perform at their best due to physical ailments.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, various sports capture the hearts of the people, but one stands out as a national favorite. Among these, football has gained immense popularity and is played passionately across the country.

lgg_prompt: Anzi mupira avipi 'diyi angu ndre drice'ba eyivile 'diyi vu imbata esuzu azini atita esuzu. E'yo nita be angiri 'diyisi, imbapi avitaniri ni geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma agata otuzu 'diyi e'da.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among individuals with diverse skills and perspectives is essential for success. When everyone contributes their strengths, the path to accomplishment becomes clearer.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana mu bantu abalina obukugu n'endowooza ez'enjawulo kya mugaso mu buwanguzi. Buli omu bw'awaayo amaanyi ge, ekkubo erigenda okutuuka ku buwanguzi liba lyangu.

eng_prompt: Corporate sponsorship has become a vital source of funding for sports teams. As a result, many organizations are eager to align their brands with popular football clubs.
lug_prompt: Obuvujjirizi bw'ebitongole bufuuse ensibuko y'ensimbi enkulu eri ttiimu z'ebyemizannyo. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole bingi byagala nnyo okukwataganya amannya gaabyo ne kiraabu z'omupiira ez'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lumii kony ki bot dul mapat-pat odoko yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me nongo lim ki bot team tuko mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat mapol tye ki miti madit tutwal me poro nyinggi ki tim me tuku odilo ma oywek tutwal.

eng_prompt: Renowned for its breathtaking landscapes and rich biodiversity, Uganda captivates visitors from around the world. Its vibrant culture and warm-hearted people further enhance its reputation as a unique destination.

ach_prompt: Inge coko jami wa ki yubu yoo wa, wan weng wabedo ki yom cwiny pi wot ma tye anyim. Ceng obedo ka ryeny, dano gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma watye ka yubbe pi wotwa.

lgg_prompt: Ama vile afa ayuzaru 'diyi trazu azini geri amani acizu 'diyi o'bazu 'bori ma vutia, ama ndra dria ayikosi acita drile ri ni. Angu ma etuka ri ri edri, azini angu nderi ga asi 'baza si amani ama otuta aci amavileri ni ri 'yeria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana ebintu byaitu n'okutebeekanisa omuhanda gwaitu, twena tukashemererwa ahabw'orugyendo oruri omu maisho. Omushana gukaba nigwaka,kandi embeera ekaba eijwire amatsiko twaba nitwetebeekanisiza orugyendo rwaitu.

eng_prompt: Aquatic life is diverse and fascinating, with various species adapted to thrive in their environments. One of the most well-known groups of animals that inhabit these ecosystems is fish.
lug_prompt: Obulamu bw'omu mazzi bwa njawulo era busanyusa, n'ebika by'obutonde eby'enjawulo ebyeyambisibwa okukulaakulana mu mbeera zaabyo. Ekimu ku bibinja by'ebisolo ebimanyiddwa ennyo ebibeera mu mbeera z'obutonde zino bye byennyanja.
ach_prompt: Kwo me pii pat-pat dok yomo cwiny tutwal, ki kwai jami mapat-pat ma oyubbe me dongo I kabedo gi. Dul acel me kin lee ma oywek loyo ma bedo I kabedo magi obedo rec.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi aijar naka akipi keda iponesio luegelegela ido luibusiak, keda iponesio luegelegela luepedorete aijar kotoma aiboisio kec. Idiopet koboro luejenara noi luejaasi toma aiboisio nu eraasi agaria.
lgg_prompt: Angu yi ma alia 'diyi ndu ndu azini ndrizaru, afa esele ndu ndu yi 'yepi yi ma eselea 'diyi pie. Ongulumu azi alu 'bani nile tu anyapa aa'pi angu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'bi eyi.
nyn_prompt: Amagara g'omu maizi n'ag'omutaano kandi nigashemeza, n'obuhangwa bw'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe oburikubaasa kukurira omu myanya yaago. Emwe aha guruupu z'enyamaishwa ezirikumanywa munonga ezirikutuura omu myanya egi n'ebyenyanja.

eng_prompt: I've been considering a career change and I'm really interested in the construction industry. What steps should I take to start my journey?
lug_prompt: Mbadde ndowooza ku ky'okukyusa omulimu era njagala nnyo omulimu gw'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Abedo katamo I kom loko ticca dok atye ki miti I kom tic me gedo.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aomoom nu aijulakin aswamuka ido akoto eong adumun aswam naka aduko.
lgg_prompt: Ma e'bi e'yo ega e'yo azi ma ojata ma dria dika ma ava tu okalamvu afa sizu ri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninteekateeka aha kuhindura omurimo gwangye kandi nyine ekihika ky'okuza omu by'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: In today's business landscape, organizations are increasingly recognizing the importance of integrating sustainability into their operations. This shift raises an important question about the tangible benefits that such initiatives can bring to a company.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya bizinensi eya leero, ebitongole byeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'okuyingiza obuwangaazi mu mirimu gyabwe. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetawo ekibuuzo ekikulu ku miganyulo egirabika enteekateeka ng'ezo gye ziyinza okuleeta mu kampuni.
ach_prompt: I kare me biacara me kareni, dul mapat-pat tye ka niang ber pa gwoko kwo ikare me tic gi. Alokaloka man kelo lapeny mapire tek tutwal I kom ber pa yub ma kit meno twero kelo bot dul mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ebiasara loka lolo, ejenete iriongeta ajokis naka aimorikikin aijar naka itunga toma aswamukec. Eyangauni aijulanakineta ngun aingiseta nuepolok nuikamunitos ajokisio nuepedorio ayangaun nejai ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujarani andruri ma alia, amuti yi curu'do e'yo orodri 'bani e'yo yi 'yepi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi 'bazu yi ma eselea ri ma e'yo ega. Ojata 'di ni zita azi okporu eji orodri e'yo 'dile 'diyi ni eco eji amuti yi driri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obushubuzi eby'erizooba,ebitongore nibyeyongyera kumanya omugasho gw'okureetaho entunguuka omu mirimo yaabo. Empindahinduka egi nereetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho ekirikukwata aha migasho erikureebeka ei ebintu nk'ebyo birikubaasa kureeta omu kampuni.

eng_prompt: I've worked tirelessly for the past year, pouring my heart and soul into my studies. Now, with the deadline approaching, I realize that completing this project is crucial for my degree.
lug_prompt: Nkoze butaweera omwaka oguwedde, nga nnywa omutima gwange n'emmeeme yange mu kusoma kwange. Kati ng'ennaku z'omwezi zisemberera, nkitegedde nti okumaliriza pulojekiti eno kikulu nnyo eri ddiguli yange.
ach_prompt: Atiyo matek tutwal I mwaka ma okato ni, aketo cwinya I kwan mega. Kombedi ma nino me agiki dong cok, aniang ni tyeko project man pire tek tutwal pi digiri na.
teo_prompt: Eswamat eong kagogong kokaru lo atubor, aibwaikin eong etau ka aijar toma asioman ka. Kwana, neyapiete apaarasia nuka awasia, ajeni eong ebe angetakin epurojekt lo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eong adumun ediguri.
lgg_prompt: Ma nga azi ande kokoru eli agapi 'bo ri ma alea, ma 'ba asi azini orindi mavile onita ma alia. Sawa asizuri ni ecazu ogogo risi, ma esu ra kini otita 'di dezu eri orodriru ma vile diguri ni.
nyn_prompt: Nkakora n'amaani omwaka oguhwaire, nkata omutima gwangye n'amagara gangye omu mishomo yangye. Hati, ahabw'obwiire bw'ahamuheru kuhika haihi,nyetegyereize ngu okumara purogyekiti egi n'eky'omugasho aha diguri yangye.

eng_prompt: Due to the demands of my profession, I often find myself immersed in tasks that require constant attention. As a result, my schedule is filled with responsibilities that necessitate my presence every day.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'omulimu gwange, ntera okwesanga mu mirimu egyetaaga okufaayo buli kiseera. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka yange ejjudde obuvunaanyizibwa obwetaagisa okubeerawo kwange buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Pi tic matek ma atiyo, pol kare anongo ni atye ka timo tic ma mito ni abed ki tam kare ki kare. Macalo adwogi ne, kare na opong ki tic mapol ma mito ni abed tye nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipud loka aswamuka, etapit eong aswam aswamisinei nu ekotosi eong apodokinit duc. Kanuka ngun, ipu aswamisinei nuibusakinit eong ajaut kanginipaaran.
lgg_prompt: Azi mavileri ma e'yosi, ma ma ngulupi esu sawa driasi 'yeta lepi mani asi 'bazu drinia sawa driasi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, ma vile otita 'diyi ga e'yo ma ni aa'zu o'du driasi 'diyi pie tre.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'omurimo gwangye,ninkira kwejumba omu mirimo erikwetenga okutaho omutima. N'ekyarugiremu, entebeekanisa yangye eijwire obujunanizibwa oburikwenda ngu mbeho burizooba.

eng_prompt: Many people are forced to flee their homes due to conflict and persecution. As a result, they often find themselves in temporary shelters.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bawalirizibwa okudduka mu maka gaabwe olw'obukuubagano n'okuyigganyizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesanga mu bifo eby'akaseera obuseera.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol guringo gangi gi pi lweny ki aunauna. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi nongo ni gitye I kabedo ma pe rii pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Aponi kobuikinai itunga luipu akerit oreriakec kanuka ingungeta keda aiticanio. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi adumun aiboisio nuka apak naedit.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi apa aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi fezu 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni eyi esu angu aa'zu sa'wa weresi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibagyemeserezibwa okuruga omu maka gaabo ahabw'entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kweshangira omu myanya y'okutuuramu ey'akanya kakye.

eng_prompt: Many rural areas face significant infrastructure challenges. As a result, essential resources like clean water are often scarce.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu by'ebyalo bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'obutonde. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu ebikulu ng'amazzi amayonjo tebitera kubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol me caro nongo peko me gedo. Macalo adwogi ne, jami mapigi tego calo pii maleng ipol kare nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nuipu nu ocaalo ejaas keda ainingosia nuepolok noi. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko iboro kwape akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi e'yo ewaru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, afa orodriru ekile yi ala le 'diyi ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Emyanya mingi y'ebyaro neetunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, ebintu ebikuru nk'amaizi marungi, tibirikukira kubaho.

eng_prompt: The Nile River is one of the longest rivers in the world, flowing through multiple countries in northeastern Africa. Many people are curious about its origins and the geographical features that contribute to its flow.
lug_prompt: Omugga gwa Nile gwe gumu ku migga egisinga obuwanvu mu nsi yonna, nga gukulukuta mu mawanga mangi mu bukiikakkono bw'obuvanjuba bwa Afirika. Abantu bangi baagala okumanya ensibuko yaayo n'ebitundu ebireetawo okukulukuta kwayo.
ach_prompt: Nam me Nile obedo acel me kin nam maboco loyo weng I wilobo, mol I lobe mapol I tung kumalo me tung kunyango me lobo Afrika. Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo kama aa ki iye ki kabedo ma en tye iye.
teo_prompt: Erai ecilet loka Nile ediopet kotoma ocilet loewoja noi kotoma akwap nako nyakoi nako kide nako Africa. Ekotosi itunga luipu ajenun nuikamunitos ageunet ke keda aiboisio nuepedorete ayangaun akerit ke.
lgg_prompt: Yi ara Nile niri eri yi ara azi alu ezu ndeni wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma azi, yi ali kari karakara Africa ma kala etuni efurialeru 'diyi ma alea. Ba karakara eyi ava be geri erini e'dozu 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omugyera Nile nigumwe aha migyera erikukirayo oburaingwa omunsi yoona, nigurabira omu mahanga maingi omumatemba g'oburugwa izooba bwa Africa. Abantu baingi baine ekihika ky'okumanya oburugo bwakyo hamwe n'emyanya y'eitaka erikureetaho entambura yakyo.

eng_prompt: As we finalize the details for the upcoming exam schedule, it's important to clarify the roles of those involved. One key question that arises is, who will be supervising the exams?
lug_prompt: Nga tumaliriza ebikwata ku nteekateeka y'ebigezo ejja, kikulu okulaga obulungi obuvunaanyizibwa bw'abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka tyeko lok matut I kom yub me timo peny matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me niang tic pa joo matye I iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape iwadika iso akiro nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aingito naebunit, ejokuna aitijenar aswam naka ngul luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo dria otita obeta ni emupi ri ma dria 'diyi asizu 'boria, eri orodriru azi 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikuhendera ebirikukwata aha ntebeekanisa y'ebigyezo erikwija, n'eky'omugasho kushoboorora emirimo y'abo abarikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: Our community has been facing significant transportation challenges due to the lack of a reliable crossing over the river. To address this issue, we are exploring options for infrastructure development.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyaffe kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'entambula olw'ebbula ly'ekkubo eryesigika ery'okusala ku mugga. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, tunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okukulaakulanyaamu ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu.
ach_prompt: Kabedo wa obedo kanongo peko madit tutwal I lok kom wot pi bedo peke pa yoo maber me ngolo nam. Me tyeko lok man, watye ka yenyo yoo me dongo jami ma mite pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Etereikina atutubetekosi keda atiokisio nu elose kanu amamus na aitub ecilet. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, iuta sio aingic iwaitin lu itopoloere iboro.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ebi dri fu e'yo ewaru acipa ni 'diyi be a'disiku geri 'bani ecozu yi alizu kililiru ri ma ako si. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, ama geri ndundu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ezozu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kyaitu kitwire nikitunga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'engyenda ahabw'eibura ry'omuhanda murungi gw'okucwekanisa omugyera. Okukora aha nshonga egi, turiyo nitusherura oburyo bw'okutunguura ebyombeko.

eng_prompt: It's important to consider the safety of the water you consume. One common question people have is about the benefits of drinking boiled water.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okulowooza ku bulabe bw'amazzi g'onywa. Ekimu ku bibuuzo abantu bye batera okwebuuza bye birungi ebiri mu kunywa amazzi amafumbe.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom ber pa pii ma imato. Lapeny acel ma dano maro penyo en aye ber pa mato pii ma ki tedo.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nuka ayuwara naka akipi nu imatenenei ijo. Aingiset adiope naetapit itunga aingitun ngesi nuikamunitos ajokis naka aimat akipi nuedoritai.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo egazu yi mini mvu 'diyi ma ageitema ma dria. E'yo azi alu 'ba eyini eyi ozi sa'wa driasi ri eri orodri yi a'diza mvuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kumanya oburungi bw'amaizi agu orikunywa. Ekibuuzo kimwe eki abantu barikukira kubuuza n'omugasho gw'okunywa amaizi agateekirwe.

eng_prompt: I'm considering purchasing a piece of property, but I want to ensure that I have a clear understanding of its boundaries. Before moving forward, I need to find out the expenses involved in having the land surveyed.
lug_prompt: Ndowooza ku ky'okugula ettaka naye njagala okukakasa nti ntegeera bulungi ensalo zaalyo. Nga sinnagenda mu maaso, nneetaaga okumanya ssente ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kunoonyereza ku ttaka.
ach_prompt: Atye ka tamo I kom wilo ngom, ento amito niang maber I kom wang lobo ne. Mapwod pe amedde anyim, omyero kong aniang wel cente ma mite me ngiyo ngom eni.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aomoom nuikamunitos agwel alupok, konye akoto eong aanyun ebe ajeni eong ikoruo ke. Erongo eong elosi, akoto eong ajenun ikapun lu itwasamao kanu airereonor alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ma e'yo ega lonyi ma jeza ma dria, te ale ne ra kini ma e'yo va kililiru boda erini 'diyi ma dria ra. De nga po'di amuni drile ku, le ma ma esu aje 'bani 'ba angu 'da ma ale andrizu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekiteekateeko ky'okugura eitaka, kwonka ninyenda kuhamya ngu ninyetegyereza gye ensharo zaaryo. Ntakatungire ekindi, ninyetenga kumanya enshohoza y'okushwijuma eitaka.

eng_prompt: A stable environment is crucial for progress and growth. However, when individuals or communities feel uncertain about their future, it can create significant barriers to advancement.
lug_prompt: Embeera etebenkedde ya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana. Newankubadde, abantu ssekinnoomu oba ebitundu bwe bawulira nga tebalina bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso, kisobola okuleetawo obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu nkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kabedo maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Kadi bed kumeno, kace dano acel-acel onyo kabedo mapat-pat pe tye ki gen I kom anyimgi, man twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Erai aiboisit na eyuara naejok noi kanu apol keda apol. Konye, arai mam itunga keda atekerin ejenete nuikamunitos ngarenikec, epedori ngin aitolomun iboro luitikitikete apol.
lgg_prompt: Angu aa'pi muke ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. Kani si, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi kani ongulumu yi ka ega kini yi ma ewu drialeri ma dria e'yo azita palaa ku, eri eco e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Obusingye burungi n'obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka. Kwonka abantu n'abantu ku barikuba batarikumanya ebiro byabo by'omumaisho, nikibaasa kuremesa entunguuka.

eng_prompt: The financial report for the last quarter has just been finalized. We need to analyze the performance metrics to understand the overall market impact.
lug_prompt: Alipoota y'ebyensimbi eya kwata y'omwaka ewedde yaakamalirizibwa. Twetaaga okwekenneenya ebipimo by'enkola okusobola okutegeera akatale okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Kityeko tyeko coyo adwogi tic me lim pi mwaka adek ma okato. Omyero wangii kit ma tic tye katimo kwede wek waniang adwoki me biacara.
teo_prompt: Aponi kongetakinai eripoota loka ikapun loka ekaru iuni luatuboros. Ibusakinit oni airereonor eswamae kanu amisiikin epone loepedoria oni aitodolikin esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Ba de nga lu o'duko siza e'yo robia ni eli agapi 'diyi ma alia ri 'bo. Le ama ma andri geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ecozu e'yo cuu ma dria 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota y'eby'empiiha y'omwaka oguhwaire yaaheza kukorwa. Twine kushwijuma enkora y'eby'obushubuzi kwetegyereza entunguuka y'akatare.

eng_prompt: As we analyze our current operations, it's clear that there are several areas where we can enhance our efficiency. We need to focus on understanding our customers' needs better to ensure their satisfaction.
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya emirimu gyaffe egiriwo kati, kyeyoleka bulungi nti waliwo ebitundu bingi mwe tuyinza okwongera ku bukugu bwaffe. Twetaaga okussa essira ku kutegeera obulungi ebyetaago bya bakasitoma baffe okukakasa nti baba bamativu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka ngiyo tic ma watye katimo kombedi, nen atyer kamaleng ni tye kabedo mapol ma watwero medo rwom me tic. Omyero waket cwiny wa I kom niang miti pa luwil wek gubed ki yomcwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio airereonor aswamisio wok kwape kwana, ecai cut ebe ipu aiboisio nuepedoria oni aitojokar. Ekot oni apodokinit amisiikin ipudesia lu agwelak wok kanu awanyun ebe iyalamasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Amani azi ngazu sawa 'disi ri ma ale andriria, eri e'da kililiru kini angu amani ecozu azi ngazu muke ndeni 'diyi karakara. Le ama ma 'ba asi afa ama vile aje'ba 'diyi ma afa lele 'diyi vazu kililiru eyini ani aa'zu ayikosi beni.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikwetegyereza emirimo yaitu obwahati, nikyoreka butunu ngu hariho emyanya mingi ei turikubaasa kwongyeramu amaani. Twine kuta amaani omu kwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo bya bakasitoma baitu, kugira ngu babaase kumarwa.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents of violence and unrest, tensions have been rising within the neighborhoods. Authorities are urging residents to remain calm and allow law enforcement to handle the situation.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bikolwa eby'effujjo n'obutabanguko ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu bitundu. Ab'obuyinza bakubiriza abatuuze okubeera abakkakkamu n'okukkiriza abakuumaddembe okukwasaganya embeera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim gero ma otime cokcok-ki, telle tye ka mede I kin lwak. Lutela tye ka lego lwak me bedo ma cwiny gi opye mot wek abili gutii i kom peko eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuka amumu keda amumu nuapotu kotakanutu pac, iyata aiyalongong kotoma aiboisio. Isinyikokinitos apedorosio itunga asalakin inapara kosodete acamakin ipolisin aitemokin ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, asi otiza e'bi tu angu ama agei 'diyi ma eselea. Okpo e'ipi eyi ai 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi aa'zu e'yere eyini ani fezu polisi eyini e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko obwabaireho juba, obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu byaro. Ab'obushoborozi nibashaba abatuuragye kuguma baine obucureera, barekye ab'ebiragiro kukora aha nshonga.

eng_prompt: I've been trying to keep track of my appointments and tasks better lately. Can you help me figure out how to set a reminder on my phone?
lug_prompt: Mbadde ngezaako okulondoola obulungi ebiseera byange n'emirimu gyange gye buvuddeko.
ach_prompt: Abedo katemo me lubu kor tic ma kimina me atima I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Atamit eong aingic aswamisinei ka pac apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi o'bi e'yo mani 'ba opezaru azini azi ma dria 'diyi ma pamvu ma ta mba o'du 'diyi ma alia kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ningyezaho kukuratira kurungi entebeekanisa zangye n'emirimo yangye ebiro ebi.

eng_prompt: The region is known for its diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes. One of the notable features of this area is a waterway that connects two significant lakes.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kimanyiddwa olw'ebisolo by'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo n'ebifo ebirabika obulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebyewuunyisa mu kitundu kino ly'ekkubo ly'amazzi erigatta ennyanja bbiri enkulu.
ach_prompt: Kabedo eni ngene pi kwai lee lum ki kabedo mamwonya tutwal. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo man obedo yoo me pii ma kubu nam aryo madongo.
teo_prompt: Ejenara aiboisit ngin kanu itiang lukokutwi luegelegela keda aiboisio nuibusiak. Adiopet koboro luejenara noi kotoma aiboisit kana ngesi erot lo arucokinit icorin iarei luepolok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni angu 'da anyapa asea 'diyi ma eselea angu ndrizaru 'diyi pie. Afa azi okporu angu 'di ma alia 'diyi ma azi eri geri yi ni yi alio okporu iri yi ecipi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga nikimanywa ahabw'obuhangwa bwakyo n'oburungi bwakyo. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikumanywa munonga omu mwanya ogu n'omuhanda gw'amaizi ogurikugaita enyanja ibiri.

eng_prompt: After experiencing frequent headaches and fatigue, he decided to visit his doctor for a check-up. During the examination, the doctor took his blood pressure and noted it was unusually high.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulumwa ennyo omutwe n'obukoowu, yasalawo okugenda okukeberebwa omusawo we. Bwe baali bamukebera, omusawo yagezezza puleesa ye era n'akiraba nti yali waggulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo two wic ki olo mapol, en ocito ka pime bot dakta. Ikare me pime, daktar opimo pressure mege dok oniang ni tye malo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ariebo naka akou keda apasit, abu ngesi koseu aipejokin emuronike kanu awanyanario. Kapak naka ainwakio, abu emuron kipima epuresa kosodi aanyun ebe epol noi.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza azini andeza isuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du muzu i vile dakitari vu ari o'bizu. Sawa 'bani eri andriria, dakitari o'bi eri ma ari ma omgbo azini ndre kini eri uru tu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okubona obusaasi bwingi n'oburuhe, akasharamu kuza kukyeberwa omushaho we. Omu kukyeberwa, omushaho akakyebera puresha ye yaareeba ngu ekaba eri ahaiguru munonga.

eng_prompt: I've been struggling with this issue for a while now, and I feel stuck. I've tried several approaches, but nothing seems to work.
lug_prompt: Mbadde nnwanagana n'ensonga eno okumala akaseera kati, era mpulira nga nsibye. Ngezezzaako enkola ez'enjawulo naye tewali kirabika nga kikola.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka lweny ki lok man pi kare malac dong, dok awinyo calo atye ka winye. Atemo yo mapol, ento nen calo pe tye mo ma otiyo.
teo_prompt: Auta eong ainingosit keda akirot ngin adaun apak naepol noi, ido apupi eong ebe emina eong aswam ngun. Atamit eong iponesio luegelegela, konye emamei idiobore yeniswamai.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi a'di 'di e'yo 'di be sawa ezu 'di ma alia, azini ma etumu ci. Ma o'bi geri ndundu eyi 'bo, te e'yo azi ecopi azi ngapi ra ni yo.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninteganisibwa enshonga egi kumara obwire, kandi nimpurira nyine oburemeezi. Ngyezeho emiringo mingi, kwonka tihaine ekirikukora.

eng_prompt: I have faced countless challenges in my life, but I've learned that perseverance is key. With unwavering determination, I refuse to let anything hold me back.
lug_prompt: Nnayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi mu bulamu bwange naye nkizudde nti obugumiikiriza kye kisumuluzo. N'obumalirivu obutakyukakyuka, sigenda kukkiriza kintu kyonna kunziyiza.
ach_prompt: Arwatte ki peko mapol tutwal I kwo na, ento apwonyo ni diyo cwiny obedo gin ma pire tek. Ki tek cwiny madit, pe amito ni gin mo keken ogenga.
teo_prompt: Atereikina eong keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma aijaraka, konye ajenu eong ebe angirikinit erai ibore yenepol noi. Keda aomisioit naepol noi, mam eong acamakin idiobore aitikitik eong.
lgg_prompt: Ma fu dri e'yo ewaru yi be idri maniri ma alia tre, te ma oni kini asi teza eri orodriru. Asi 'baza okporu si, ma ga e'yo azini ma atrizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ntungire oburemeezi bwingi omu magara gangye, kwonka nyegire ngu okugumisiriza nikikuru. N'amaani maingi, tindikwikiriza kintu kyona kunzibira.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated in the crowded square, chaos erupted among the protesters. Eyewitnesses reported a sudden clash that sparked a wave of unrest.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kibangirizi ekyalimu abantu abangi, akavuyo kaabalukawo mu beekalakaasi. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti wabaddewo okulwanagana okw'amangu okwaviiriddeko obutabanguko.

teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit naejaasi keda itunga luipu, abu amumu kobwang kiding lu ediyak. Apotu ajenak olimosi nuka engunget loabu koyangau amumu.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu pari 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea, ngiringiri e'do 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea. Sadini eyi 'yo e'yo ngiringiri ni e'dozu mbeleru e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko ku bwayeyongyeire omu mwanya ogwabaire gurimu abantu baingi, akaimukiriro kakarugaho omubesharingi. Ababiire nibareeba bakagira ngu hakabaho okurwanagana okw'omutaano okwareteireho akaimukiriro.

eng_prompt: I'm trying to find my way around the city, but I'm a bit lost. Could you help me navigate?
lug_prompt: Ngezaako okunoonya ekkubo lyange mu kibuga naye nbuze katono.
ach_prompt: Atye katemo me nongo yo me cito I citi, ento atye ka rweny woko.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aitam aimo eong erot koibuga, konye mam eong ajeni.
lgg_prompt: Ma o'bi ma geri esu aku ambu cityniri ma alia, te ma avi were.
nyn_prompt: Ngyezaho kuronda omuhanda gwangye omu rurembo, kwonka nyebuzire kakye.

eng_prompt: Our team has been working tirelessly to meet the project deadlines, but we've encountered several unexpected expenses. As a result, we don't have enough funds, and a lot is pending on this project.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yaffe ebadde ekola butaweera okutuukiriza ebisale bya pulojekiti, naye tusanga ssente nnyingi ezitasuubirwa. N'ekivuddemu, tetulina ssente zimala era bingi ebitannaba kukolebwa ku pulojekiti eno.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lutic megwa obedo katic matek tutwal me cobo nino me agiki me tic, ento warwatte ki wel cente mapol ma pe wageno. Macalo adwogi ne, pe watye ki cente ma oromo, dok jami mapol pud pe otimme I kom yub man.
teo_prompt: Iswamai etimukosi kagogong kanu aitodolikin ainapeta nuka epurojekt, konye apotu sio adumutu ikapun luipu lu mam iwomit oni. Kanuka ngun, emamiatatar oni keda ikapun luedolitos, ido ipu iboro lumam itemokinitai kanu epurojekt lo.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ebi azi nga okpo kokoru otita 'da ma o'du asizuri ma ta mbazu, te ama esu afa ayuzaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, ama vu robia cani ku, dika e'yo karakara eyi nga po'di 'ye otita 'di ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu yaitu etwire neekora n'amaani okuhikiiriza obwire bwa purogyekiti, kwonka tutungire enshohoza nyingi ezitatebekanisiibwe. N'ekyarugiremu, titwine sente ezirikumara, kandi bingi ebitarakozirwe aha purogyekiti egi.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the team's performance and market trends, the board convened to discuss potential strategies. Ultimately, they reached a consensus on the best course of action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza n'obwegendereza enkola ya ttiimu n'embeera y'akatale, akakiiko kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukodyo obuyinza okukolebwa. Mu nkomerero, baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukwatamu ensonga.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo maber kit ma dul tuku ne tye katimo kwede ki kit ma jami tye ka wot kwede icuk, dul ma doro tic ne gubedo kacoke me nywako tam I kom yoo mapat-pat ma twero tic kwede. I agiki ne, guwinye I kom ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos eswamae loka etimu keda epone loejai osokoni, apotu lukapolok iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin. Kawasia, apotu kesi opotu opone loibusakinitor kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti 'da ma agata azini e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu ra 'diyi ma dria. Asizu, eyi esu ti ecita e'yo eyini 'ye muke ndeni ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza enkora ya tiimu hamwe n'emikorere y'akatare, akakiiko kakashutama kuhanuura aha muringo ogurikubaasa kukoresibwa. Ekyarugiremu, bakaikirizana aha muringo murungi gw'okukoramu.

eng_prompt: I've been looking forward to this all week. After weeks of chatting, we finally decided to meet in person.
lug_prompt: Kino mbadde nkyesunga wiiki yonna. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tunyumya, twasalawo okusisinkana mu buntu.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka kuro man ki mit kom cabit kulu. Ingee cabit mapol me lok, dong wamoko tamwa me rwate ki wangwa.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aidar ngun osabiti kere. Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka einer, apotu sio aseutu airiamun.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi e'yo 'di ndre avasi sabiti 'disi dria. Sabiti 'bani e'yo nzezu 'bori ma vutia, ama asizu asizu dri fuzu ama ma ngulupi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninyetegyereza eki wiiki yoona. Bwanyima y'okumara esande nyingi nitugaaniira, tukaheza tusharamu kubugana butunu.

eng_prompt: I wanted to check in and see how your day is going. Are you swamped with tasks right now?
lug_prompt: Njagala kukebera olabe olunaku lwo bwe lutambula.
ach_prompt: Amito neno kit ma nino ni tye ka wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong aanyun eipone lo elosiotor apaaran kon.
lgg_prompt: Ale ndra mu andri o'du mivileri ni mu ngonia yari ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba niinyenda kureeba oku eizooba ryawe ririkugyenda.

eng_prompt: As the team gathered around the conference table, tensions were high and questions loomed about the progress of the case. Everyone looked at each other, unsure of who was leading the efforts to uncover the truth.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu bwe yakungaana ku mmeeza y'olukiiko, okusika omuguwa kwali kungi era ebibuuzo byabalukawo ku ngeri omusango gye gwali gugenda mu maaso. Buli omu yatunudde mu munne nga tamanyi ani akulembera kaweefube w'okuzuula amazima.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne gugure I nget meja me kacoke, lworo obedo tye dok bene lapeny obedo tye I kom kit ma lok ne tye ka wot kwede. Dano weng gubedo ka nene kekengi, ma pe gingeyo anga matye ka doro yub me niang lok ada.
teo_prompt: Neautar etimu atukokin aiboisit naka airiamunet, apol noi aiyalongong ka aingiseta nuikamunitos apol naka emusago. Apotu itunga kere osesenata yenice, mam ejenete yen engarenikit aswamisioit naka angicun abeit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ni eyi trazu ri ma ageyia, e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra dika eyi e'yo zi e'yo kesi 'da ni muzu drile ri ma dria. Ba dria ndre yi ma eselea, yi nini a'di ni okpo fe e'yo ada isuzu ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ku yaabaire neeteerana aha meeza y'orukiiko, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru kandi ebibuuzo bikabaho aha ntunguuka y'omushango. Buri omwe akareeba mugyenzi we, atarikwetegyereza orikwebembera omurimo gw'okushwijuma amazima.

eng_prompt: It's been several months since you borrowed the funds, and I've been patient long enough. Now, it's time to settle your debt.
lug_prompt: Ziweze emyezi egiwerako bukya weewola ssente, era mbadde mugumiikiriza okumala ebbanga ddene. Kati, kye kiseera okusasula ebbanja lyo.
ach_prompt: Dwe dong okato mapol nicake ma I deno cente, dok abedo ki diyo cwiny pi kare malac. Kombedi, kare dong oromo me culu banya ni.
teo_prompt: Adaun kwana ilapio luipu ageun na ilipunia jo ikapun, ido ajai eong atitingikinit. Kwana, erai kwana apak naka aitac apesenikon.
lgg_prompt: Eri ca mba karakara 'bo e'dozu mini sende a'izuri ma alia, azini ma ebi ovu asi teza be sawa ezu. Sawa ca di mini mi vile mari ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Hahwireho ameezi maingi okwiha orikweguza esente, kandi ntwire niinyegumisiriza kumara obwire burikumara. Hati, n'obwire bw'okushashura eibanja ryawe.

eng_prompt: Recent audits have raised concerns about the financial management of various infrastructure projects. As a result, questions have emerged regarding the allocation and transparency of funds, particularly those from the Uganda road fund.
lug_prompt: Okubalirirwa kw'ebitabo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwaleese okweraliikirira ku nzirukanya y'ensimbi za pulojekiti z'ebizimbe ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ebibuuzo bivuddeyo ku bikwata ku kugaba n'obwerufu bw'ensimbi naddala ezo eziva mu Uganda road fund.
ach_prompt: Ngiyo kor tic ki lim ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lworo I kom kit ma yub mapat-pat me gedo tiyo kwede ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, lapeny tye i kom kit ma ki poko kwede cente ki ada, tutwalle cente ma aa ki bot dul me Uganda road fund.
teo_prompt: Angicio naka ikapun lu atuboros ayangau aiyalongong kanuikamunitos eyaitene loka ikapun luka ipurojektin luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, apotu aingiseta kolomutu kanuikamunitos aikor ikapun ka aica ka abeit, kacut ngul luka Erionget Loka Irotin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza e'yo robia ayuza otita angu siza ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, zita efu e'yo 'bani robia awazu kililiru azini e'yo ada be, tutuni engazu Uganda road fund vu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okushwijumwa kw'ebitabo okwabaireho juba kureesire okwerarikirira aha nkora y'esente za purogyekiti z'ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, ebibuuzo bitandikire kubaho aha bikwatireine n'okugaba sente n'oburingaaniza, namunonga ezirikuruga omu kitongore ky'enguuto ekya Uganda roads fund.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced business environment, many construction projects are facing unexpected delays and challenges. To ensure quality and safety, it is essential for companies to reassess their timelines.
lug_prompt: Mu by'obusuubuzi by'ennaku zino eby'amangu, pulojekiti z'okuzimba nnyingi zisanga okulwawo n'okusoomoozebwa okuteeberezebwa. Okusobola okukakasa omutindo n'obukuumi, kya mugaso amakampuni okuddamu okwekenneenya ebiseera byago.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma biacara tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, yub me gedo mapol tye ka galle ki peko ma pe byek tye I komgi. Me neno ni rwom ki ber bedo tye, pire tek tutwal ki dul mapat-pat me ngiyo kit ma tic gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ebiasara loka lolo, ipurojektin luipu luka aduko ejaas keda aiyap keda atiokisio nu mam eomitai. Kanu awanyun adoketait najokan ka ayuara, ejokuka ikampunin airereor ainapeta kec nuka apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujarani curu'do okposi 'diyi ma alia, otita afa sizu karakara 'diyi sawa ezaza azini e'yo ewaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi isu. Aa'zu muke azini ageitema be, eri orodriru amuti eyini sa'wa eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obushubuzi by'erizooba, purogyekiti nyingi z'okwombeka niziteganisibwa okukyerererwa hamwe n'oburemeezi. Okureeba ngu hariho omutindo murungi n'oburinzi, nikikuru kampuni kushwijuma obwire bwazo.

eng_prompt: The project has faced several delays due to unforeseen circumstances, but the team is now making significant progress. With the final inspections underway, the construction will be complete the following year in February.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti ebaddemu okulwawo okungi olw'embeera etasuubirwa, naye kati ttiimu ekola enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi. Nga okukebera okusembayo kugenda mu maaso, okuzimba kujja kuba kuwedde omwaka ogujja mu mwezi gw'okubiri.
ach_prompt: Yub eni obedo ka galle tyen mapol pi jami ma otimme atura, ento tim ne dong tye ka dongo tutwal. Ki ngiyo kor tic me agiki matye kawot anyim, gedo obi tum I dwe me aryo me mwaka manyen.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi epurojekt ngol keda aiyap naepol noi kanuka iboro lumam kesi ejenete, konye euta kwana etimu aswam ejok. Keda ainwakio na awasia, eponio angetakin aduko okaru ngol Olap Loiyareit.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ebi sa'wa eza sa'wa karakara e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyisi, te amuti 'da ni curu'do mu drile. E'yo angu andrita asizuri ni mu drile risi, 'ba nga angu 'da ma sita de eli drusirisi mba iri si.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti etungire okukyerererwa kwingi ahabw'ebihikiirizi, kwonka tiimu obwahati eriyo neetunguuka. Ahabw'okukyebera eby'ahamuheru okuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho, okwombeka nikwija kuhwa omwaka ogurikukurataho omukwezi kwa kabiri.

eng_prompt: In light of recent allegations, school officials held a press conference to address the situation. They emphasized the importance of due process and urged the community to refrain from making hasty judgments.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigambibwa gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'essomero baatudde olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okukola ku mbeera. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'enkola entuufu era ne basaba abantu okwewala okusalawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki adot ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me gang kwan gubedo ki kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom ngo matye katimme. Guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber pa yoo me tic maber dok gulego lwak pe me ngolo kop oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos akiro nueswamasi pac, apotu eswamak luka esomero kitolototo einer keda lu iyemuto kanu aitemokin ejautene. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitolot akiro ejok kosodete aisinyikokin itunga ainyekikin aitub aomisio nuka atipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba sukulu ni 'diyi 'ye e'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo nde ma aza kozu. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria dika eyi ai ongulumu eyi e'yo liza mbeleru ri kuzu ja.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaire nibigambwa obwahati, abakuru b'eishomero bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kukora aha nshonga egyo. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'enkora nungi kandi bakashaba abantu okwetantara okurahuka kucwa emanja.

eng_prompt: The role of educators extends far beyond academic instruction. Their guidance and support shape not only knowledge but also the values and behaviors of their students.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'abasomesa gusukka nnyo ku kusomesa mu by'ensoma. Okulambika kwabwe n'obuyambi tebikoma ku kukola kumanya kwokka wabula n'empisa n'enneeyisa y'abayizi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Tic pa lupwonye pe kwako pwonyo lutino keken. Kony gi ki kony gi pe yubu ngec keken ento bene rwom me kwo ki kit lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka esisianakinak mam erai aisisianakino naka asioman bon. Aicoreta kec keda agangat kec mam itemonokinete acoa bon konye iponesio keda iponesio luka esisiak kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi imba'ba eyini ri aga e'yo onita ni 'diyi ra. Eyi ma imbata azini atita eyi e'da ni lu e'yo onita ni 'diyi ku te vini e'yo orodriru sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu adriza eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'abeegyesa nigukira aha kwegyesa. Okuhaburwa kwabo n'obuhwezi bwabo tibirikukwata aha kumanya kwonka, kureka n'emitwarize n'emitwarize y'abeegi baabo.

eng_prompt: In today's educational landscape, educators are tasked with navigating a complex array of responsibilities. From addressing diverse student needs to managing limited resources, the demands on teachers continue to grow.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyenjigiriza eya leero, abasomesa baweereddwa omulimu gw'okutambuza obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo. Okuva ku kukola ku byetaago by'abayizi eby'enjawulo okutuuka ku kukola ku byetaago by'abasomesa ebitono, obwetaavu bw'abasomesa bweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare me kwan me kareni, lupwonye tye ki tic mapol tutwal me atima. Nicake ki cobo miti pa lutino mapol me oo I tic ki jami ma nok, miti pa lupwonye tye kamede ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma asioman naka lolo, ejaas isisianakinak keda aswam naepol noi. Anyoun kotoma aitemokin ipudesia luka esisiak luegelegela kitoni aitwasam iboro lu ikidioko, iyatas noi ipudesia luka isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Angu onita ni andruri ma alea, 'ba fe imba'ba eyini azi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. E'dozu e'yo sukulu anzi eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kpere afa ayuzaru were 'diyi ma tambazu, afa imba'ba eyini le 'diyi ma omgbo ni mu drile tu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese eby'erizooba, abegyesa baine obujunaanizibwa bwingi. Okuruga omu kukora ahabyetaago by'abeegi eby'omutaano kuhisya aha kukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga bikye, ebyetengo by'abegyesa bigumizemu kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent financial challenges faced by many educators, it is crucial for them to carefully consider their financial decisions. Experts recommend that teachers explore alternative funding options instead of relying on loans.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyensimbi abasomesa bangi kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, kya mugaso nnyo gye bali okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku kusalawo kwabwe mu byensimbi. Abakugu bakubiriza abasomesa okunoonyereza ku ngeri endala ez'okuvujjirira mu kifo ky'okwesigama ku kwewola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim ma lupwonye mapol gunongo cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni myero gutam matut I kom tam ma gimoko I kom lim. Ludiro miyo tam ni lupwonye omyero guyeny yoo mukene me nongo lim me kaka jenge I kom lim den.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda esisianakinak luipu, ejokuna kesi aomoom ejok kanu aseununeta kec nuka ikapun. Icorakitos ipirioitin ebe ekot isisianakinak aimo iponesio ice luka aigang ikapun itia aijaun ilonin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu sukulu anzi karakara eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru eyi ma ega e'yo eyini 'ye robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria geri kililiru si. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe imbata imba'ba eyini geri azi eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ondazu mari eyi ma dria ri ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obu abeegyesa baingi barikurabamu, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza aha kusharamu kwabo omu by'esente. Abakugu nibahabura ngu abegyesa basherure oburyo obundi bw'okutunga esente, omu mwanya gw'okweyendeza aha rooni.

eng_prompt: Due to budget cuts and a shift in educational priorities, the school district has made the difficult decision to reduce its workforce. As a result, all non-graduate teachers will be laid off.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeeza ku mbalirira n'enkyukakyuka mu by'enjigiriza, disitulikiti y'essomero ekoze okusalawo okukaluba okukendeeza ku bakozi baayo. N'ekinaavaamu, abasomesa bonna abataatikkirwa bajja kugobwa ku mirimu.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ki aloka loka I kom jami ma mite pi kwan, district me cukul omoko tam matek tutwal me dwoko piny wel luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye weng ma pe gukwano kibi kwanyo gioo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda aijulanakineta nuka asioman, eswama edisitrikta lo esomero aseunet na etiono kanu aitidisiar eswamak ke. Kanuka ngun, eponio alemar isisianakinak kere lumam elomunitos kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini e'yo onita ma dria 'diyi ma ojaza ma e'yosi, distrikiti sukulu niri 'du e'yo ewaru azi'ba yini 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga imba'ba dria sukulu depi ku 'diyi dro azia si ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra hamwe n'empindahinduka omu by'obwegyese, disiturikiti y'eishomero eshaziremu kubi okukyendeeza aha bakozi baayo. Ekyarugiremu, abegyesa boona abatakaherize diguri, nibaija kubingwa aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In fostering a positive educational environment, it is essential for families to collaborate with educators. Open communication and mutual respect between parents and teachers can significantly enhance a child's learning experience.
lug_prompt: Mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma, kya mugaso amaka okukolera awamu n'abasomesa. Empuliziganya ennungi n'okussa ekitiibwa mu buli omu wakati w'abazadde n'abasomesa bisobola okutumbula ennyo eby'okuyiga by'omwana.
ach_prompt: I dongo rwom me kwan maber, pire tek tutwal pi gangi me tic kacel ki lupwonye. Lok maber ki woro ikin lunyodo ki lupwonye twero medo rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit najokan naka asioman, ejokuka ikalia aiswamanar keda esisianakinak. Einer loepukora keda ayongit kiding auriak keda isisianakinak epedori aitojokar aisisia naka idwe.
lgg_prompt: Angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru familia eyini ti ecizu imba'ba eyi pie. E'yo nzeza kililiru azini inzita tipika eyi ma eselea imba'ba eyi pie ri eco anzi eyi ma onita ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutunguura eby'obwegyese, ni kikuru amaka kukwatanisa n'abeegyesa. Okugamba kurungi n'okuheerezana ekitiinisa ahagati y'abazaire n'abegyesa, nikibaasa kutunguura eby'okwega kw'omwana.

eng_prompt: Ensuring that educators are supported in their later years is crucial for maintaining morale in the profession. Timely disbursement of benefits is a fundamental aspect of honoring their years of service.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abasomesa bawagirwa mu myaka gyabwe egy'obukadde kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma empisa mu mulimu guno. Okusasula amagoba mu budde kintu kikulu nnyo mu kussa ekitiibwa mu myaka gyabwe egy'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Neno ni lupwonye gunongo kony ikare ma gutii obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kit me tic gi. Miyo kony ki dano ikare ki kome obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me woro tic ma gutimo pi mwaki mapol.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe igangitai isisianakinak kotoma okarukec luapolok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iponesio luka isisianakinak. Ainanakinio naka ikapun kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayongite aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma ne ra kini 'ba atita fe imba'ba eyini eli eyivile 'bo 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi 'yepi sukulu'a 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Afa orodri eyi ofezu sa'wa dria ri eri e'yo azi okporu eyini azi ngazu eli karakara eyi ma alea ri inzizu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abegyesa nibaheebwa obuhwezi omu myaka yaabo y'obukuru, n'eky'omugasho munonga, ahabw'okurinda emicwe y'abegyesa. Okushashura esente zaabo omu bwire, n'eky'omugasho omu kuheereza emyaka yaabo y'obuheereza ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: Many students struggle to reach their full potential due to inadequate facilities and resources. As a result, the learning environment becomes less conducive to academic success.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi balwana okutuuka ku busobozi bwabwe obujjuvu olw'ebikozesebwa n'ebikozesebwa ebitonotono. N'ekivuddemu, embeera y'okusoma efuuka etali nnungi ku buwanguzi mu byensoma.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami weng ma mite pigi pi peko me jami ma mite pi lutino kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo me kwan pe ber pi lutino kwan me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Etionikinitos esisiak luipu aitodolikin apedorosiokec naarai ikidioko iboro ka iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, mam ejautene loka aisisia ejokuna kanu akerianut kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci eyini ecozu eyi ma okpo esuzu ra e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si. E'yo 'disi, angu onitani 'diyi eca muke ku drile suza onitaniri vu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibarwana kuhikiiriza obushoboorozi bwabo ahabw'ebintu ebitarikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, embeera y'eby'obwegyese terikureetera abantu kusingura omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Effective teaching strategies and a supportive classroom environment play a crucial role in shaping student outcomes. As educators, their influence extends beyond mere instruction to fostering a culture of learning and growth.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'okusomesa ennungi n'embeera ennungi mu kibiina bikola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula enkola y'abayizi. Ng'abasomesa, obuyinza bwabwe busukka ku kuyigiriza kwokka n'okutumbula obuwangwa bw'okuyiga n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Diro me pwonyo maber kacel ki kabedo maber ikin lutino kwan konyo totwal i dongo kwan pa lutino. Macalo lupwonye, tic gi pe obedo me pwonyo lutino keken ento bene me dongo tekwaro gi me pwonyo ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu aisisianakin lu iswamaete ejok keda ejautene lo igangit atukot iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin eswamae lo esisiak. Kwape esisianakinak, mam kesi isisianakinete nuka asioman bon konye isisianakinete nuka aisisia ka apol.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani kililiru azini angu atita fepi kilasia 'diyi azi okporu ni nga agata sukulu anzi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu. Imba'ba eyi ru, eyi ma okpo aga lu imbata fezu ri ma dria, eyini ani e'yo onita ni azini zota ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okwegyesa hamwe n'obuhangwa burungi omu kibiina, nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura ebyarugire omu bigyezo by'abeegi. Nk'abeegyesa, omugasho gwabo nigukira aha kwegyesa kwonka, nigubaasisa abantu kwega n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain high educational standards, the selection process for headteachers includes strict eligibility criteria. One of the primary requirements is that candidates must possess a relevant degree.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ogwa waggulu, enkola y'okulonda abakulu b'amasomero erimu ebisaanyizo ebikakali. Ekimu ku byetaago ebikulu kwe kuba nti abayizi abali mu bibiina eby'akamalirizo balina okuba ne diguli ekwatagana.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni rwom me kwan tye malo, yoo me yero ludito gangkwan tye ki jami ma mite pi lutino kwan. Gin acel ma pire tek en aye ni lutino omyero gubed ki digiri.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar adoketait na asioman naikiara, epone lo eseunere apolok isomeroi imoriaritos nutupitono. Idiopet koboro lu ekotoi ngesi ebe ibusakinit abwaak ajaut keda ediguri.
lgg_prompt: Lezu onita ma wura ma ta mbazu uru, geri 'bani dricere eyi opezu ri ma alea e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu 'diyi ma dria okporu. Afa azi alu 'bani lele okporu 'diyi ma azi eri kini le 'ba pa so'baa sukulu'a 'diyi ma ovu diguri 'bani lele 'diyi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese ogw'ahaiguru, enkora y'okutoorana abeebembezi b'amashomero, erimu ebirikwetengwa munonga. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikwetengwa munonga n'okugira ngu abeegi baine kuba baine diguri erikukwata aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous selection process, the school district evaluated the candidates based on their experience and leadership skills. Ultimately, the competition was fierce, and only five teachers qualified for headteacher positions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsulwamu okw'amaanyi, disitulikiti y'essomero yeekenneenya abayizi okusinziira ku bumanyirivu bwabwe n'obukugu bwabwe mu bukulembeze. Mu nkomerero, okuvuganya kwali kwa maanyi, era abasomesa bataano bokka be baayitamu ku bifo by'abakulira amasomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me yer matek tutwal, district me cukul ongiyo lutino kwan malubbe ki ngec gi ki diro gi me tela. I agiki ne, pyem obedo tek tutwal, ki lupwonye abic keken aye gukato peny me doko ludito gangkwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainapeta nuka aseo, abu edisitrikta lo esomero ongic esisiak kotupitete amisiarit kec keda aijen kec naka eingarenone. Kawasia, arai abolobol naepol noi, ido isisianakinak ikany bon kesi apotu kotuboto kanu araun luapolok isomeroi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu okporu 'bori ma vutia, distrikiti sukulu niri andri sukulu anzi sukulu depi 'bo 'diyi e'yo nita eyini 'diyi ma dria azini ondua eyini driceza ni 'diyisi. Asizu, baka seza 'da ndra okporu, dika imba'ba towi eyi aga drice'ba eyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutoorana abeegi, disiturikiti y'eishomero ekashwijuma abeegi kurugirira aha bumanyirizi bwabo n'emyoga yaabo y'obwebembezi. Ekyarugiremu, okuhayahayana kukaba kubi munonga, kandi abegyesa bataano bonka nibo baahikire aha ntebe z'abebembezi b'amashomero.

eng_prompt: Many educators feel undervalued and overworked in their profession. As a result, they often voice their concerns regarding compensation.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi bawulira nga tebatwalibwa nga ba muwendo era bakola nnyo mu mulimu gwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwogera okweraliikirira kwabwe ku by'okuliyirira.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol giwinyo calo pe ki woro gi dok gitiyo matek tutwal I tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi cwalo koko gi i kom cul.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu epupete ebe mam eyangaritai kes ido iswamaete noi kotoma aswamukec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi einer nuikamunitos atacakinio.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi ega kini eyi ma orodri cani ku dika eyi azi nga okporu azi eyini 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi nze e'yo 'bani eyi ofezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibahurira ngu tibarikusiimwa kandi ngu nibakora munonga omu myoga yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kworeka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine n'okurihirirwa.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more independent learning environment, it is essential that educators possess the skills and confidence to manage their classrooms effectively. This autonomy will enable them to focus on student engagement and personalized instruction.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera y'okusoma eyeetongodde, kyetaagisa abasomesa okuba n'obukugu n'obwesige okuddukanya obulungi ebibiina byabwe. Obwetwaze buno bujja kubasobozesa okussa essira ku kukwataganya abayizi n'okusomesa omuntu ku bubwe.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kabedo maber me kwan, pire tek tutwal ni lupwonye gubed ki diro ki tek cwiny me doro gang kwan gi maber. Bedo ki twero eni obi weko gi keto cwiny gi i kom lutino kwan ki pwonyo lutino weng malube ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit naka aisisia na epugaikinit, ejokuna noi isisianakinak ajaut keda acoa ka amuno naka ayait atukona kec ejok. Apedorosio nu epedorete aingarakin kes apodokinit aisisianakin idwe ka aisisianakin kes.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita niri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru imba'ba eyivu ondua azini asi'baza eyivile kilasi eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru. Driwala 'di ni nga fe eyini asi 'bazu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea azini imbata fezu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho embeera y'okweyegyesa eyetongoire, n'eky'omugasho abegyesa kugira emyoga n'obwesigye bw'okureeberera kurungi ebibiina byabo. Obugabe obu nibwija kubabaasisa kuta amaani omu kwegyesa abeegi n'okwegyesa omuntu weena.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain a healthy learning environment, it is essential for everyone to follow proper hygiene practices. This includes regular handwashing and cleanliness in shared spaces.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma embeera y'okusoma ennungi, kya mugaso buli omu okugoberera enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo. Kino kizingiramu okunaaba engalo buli kaseera n'obuyonjo mu bifo eby'okugabana.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko lengo me gang kwan, pire tek ni dano weng omyero gulub yoo me gwoko lengo. Man kwako lwoko cing kare ki kare ki gwoko lengo I kabedo ma dano weng bedo iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisit na asioman na engalei, ejok itunga kere atupakinit nuka aila. Imoriaritos nu ailot akanin duc ka aila aiboisio nu aimor itunga.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni muke ri ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'ba dria eyini alata ma vuti obizu. Di ma alia dri ojiza sawa driasi azini alata angu o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'embeera nungi y'okwega, buri omwe ashemereire kukuratira engyenderwaho nungi y'eby'obuyonjo. Eki nikitwariramu okunaaba engaro obutoosha n'obwecumi omu myanya erikugambwaho.

eng_prompt: The influence of educators extends far beyond the classroom, shaping not only academic skills but also social and emotional growth. As mentors and guides, teachers help children navigate their formative years.
lug_prompt: Obuyinza bw'abasomesa busukka nnyo mu kibiina, nga tebukola bukola obukugu mu byensoma byokka naye era n'okukula mu mbeera z'abantu n'enneewulira. Ng'ababuulirizi n'abalambika, abasomesa bayamba abaana okutambuza emyaka gyabwe egy'okukula.
ach_prompt: Kony pa lupwonye pe aa ki igangkwan keken, kun pe yubu diro me kwan keken ento bene dongo pa dano ki kit ma giwinyo kwede. Macalo lupwonyo ki lutela, lupwonye konyo lutino I kare me kwogi.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka esisianakinak elomuni adepar atukot naka aisisia, mam itopoloori acoa naka asioman bon konye itopoloori itunga keda aomisio. Kwape lu icorakitai ka aingarenikin, ingarakitos isisianakinak idwe aitodolikin ikarukec luka esomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma 'yeta ma omgbo aga kilasia ri ra, dika eyi lu ondua onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ku te eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. Imba'ba eyi imba'ba eyi ru azini 'ba imbata fepi 'diyi ru, imba'ba eyi anzi nyiri eyi ma aza ko eli eyini sukulu lazu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omugasho gw'abegyesa niguhika n'aheeru y'eishomero, ogurikworeka emyoga y'eby'obwegyese, hamwe n'entunguuka y'abantu hamwe n'ebiteekateeko byabo. Abeegyesa, nk'abahabuzi, nibahwera abaana omu myaka yaabo y'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that a supportive home environment significantly influences a child's academic success. In addition to teachers and school resources, the involvement of parents is crucial for fostering a positive attitude towards learning.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera y'awaka ey'obuwagizi erina kinene ky'ekola ku buwanguzi bw'omwana mu kusoma. Ng'oggyeko abasomesa n'ebikozesebwa mu masomero, abazadde okwenyigiramu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula endowooza ennungi eri okusoma.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni kabedo maber me gang konyo tutwal I kwan pa lutino. Medo I kom lupwonye ki jami me gang kwan, bedo tye pa lunyodo bene pire tek tutwal I dongo cwiny maber I kom kwan.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe aiboisit na igangit ore nes iswamai ejok kotoma asioman naka ikoku. Kilema isisianakinak keda iboro lu isomeroi, epolok noi aisisianakino naka auriak kanu aitopoloria aomisio nu ejok kanu aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini angu atita fepi akua ri ni anzi eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otu. Imba'ba eyi ma azi tualu afa sukulu ni 'diyi pie, e'yo tipika eyini aa'zu alenia ri eri orodriru e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu obusingye burungi obw'omuka nibukora kihango aha businguzi bw'abaana omu mashomero. Okwongyera ahari abegyesa hamwe n'ebikwato by'eishomero, okwejumba kw'abazaire n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho emiteekateekyere mirungi aha kwega.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for quality education, the school district has decided to expand its teaching staff. This initiative aims to improve student-to-teacher ratios and enhance learning outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusoma okw'omutindo, disitulikiti y'essomero esazeewo okugaziya abasomesa baayo. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula omuwendo gw'abayizi n'abasomesa n'okutumbula ebikolebwa mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kwan ma rwom gi malo, distrik me cukul omoko tam gi me medo wel lupwonye gi. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom pa lutino ki lupwonye ki medo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman najokan, abu edisitrikta lo isomeroi kitogogong eswamakakec. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar adoketait na esisiak keda isisianakinak ka aitojokar eswamae lo aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu onita muke ri esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, distrikiti sukulu niri 'du e'yo 'ba imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu ra. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu esele sukulu anzi eyini imba'ba eyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu azini onita ma omgbo otuzu.

lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi baagala nnyo ebyemizannyo n'okukolera awamu. N'ekivuddemu, beenyigira n'obunyiikivu mu mirimu egy'enjawulo egy'ebweru w'essomero.

teo_prompt: Eminasi esisiak luipu aboliasio keda aswam nepepe. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete kesi aswamisinei nuegelegela.

nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibakunda emizaano hamwe n'okukorera hamwe. N'ekyarugiremu, nibejumba omu mirimo etari emwe n'emwe etari y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling game filled with intense competition, the players gave their all on the field. In the final minutes, the central region managed to secure a decisive goal.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuzannyo ogw'essanyu ogwabaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi, abazannyi baakola kyonna ekisoboka mu kisaawe. Mu ddakiika ezisembayo, ekitundu ky'amasekkati kyasobodde okuteeba ggoolo esalawo.
ach_prompt: I ngee tuku ma obedo ki pyem matek tutwal, lutuku gumiyo jami weng ma gitwero I bar tuku. I dakika me agiki, tung kupoto ceng me lobo Uganda gumoto golo ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolia naejok noi naejaasi keda abolobol naepol noi, apotu aboliak koinakisi nu apedor kere. Kotoma idakikan luatuboros, abu atutubet nako kiding kopedo adumun egolo loepol noi.

nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'omuzaano ogwabaire gurimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, abazaani bakakora kyona ekirikubaasika omu kishayi. Omu dakiika z'ahamuheru,ekyanga kya rwagati kikabaasa kuteeba goora erikuhwera.

eng_prompt: After an impressive performance filled with skillful plays and crucial goals, the crowd erupted in cheers. His teammates rallied around him, recognizing his outstanding contributions throughout the game.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuzannyo omulungi ogwabadde gujjudde emizannyo egy'obukugu n'okuteeba ggoolo ez'amaanyi, abantu baakubye enduulu. Banne mu ttiimu baamwetooloola nga bamusiima olw'ebirungi bye yakola mu muzannyo gwonna.
ach_prompt: I ngee tuko maber tutwal ma opong ki tuko me diro ki golo mapigi tego, lwak okok ki yomcwiny. Lutuk odilo luwote guribbe I ngetgi, kun gi pwoyo tic maber tutwal ma en otimo I kare me tuko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aswamisioit naejok noi naka abolia keda igolon luapolok, apotu itunga kogeutu aiyalama. Apotu ipaupake luka etimu kimorikikinos keda ngesi, kowanyutu aswamuke naejok noi kotoma abolia.
lgg_prompt: Avita onyiru 'bani avi avita onduaru azini golo okporu 'diyi be 'bori ma vutia, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'do ti odaza ma alia. Azi'ba erivile amuti avitaniri ma alia 'diyi tra yi yi eri ma ageia, yini azi onyiru erini nga avita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'omuzaano murungi ogwabaire gurimu emizaano y'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'okuteeba gooro z'amaani, abantu bakashemererwa munonga. Ba tiimu bagyenzi be bakamwehinguririzaho, barikworeka ngu nibasiima obuhwezi bwe obw'omutaano omu muzaano gwona.

eng_prompt: In the world of competitive sports, outcomes can often be unpredictable and surprising. Fans and players alike may find it beneficial to adopt a more relaxed mindset when watching or participating in matches.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'emizannyo egy'okuvuganya, ebivaamu tebitegeerekeka era byewuunyisa. Abawagizi n'abazannyi bonna bayinza okukisanga nga kya mugaso okubeera n'endowooza eyeeyagaza nga balaba oba nga beetaba mu mipiira.
ach_prompt: I lobo me pyem tuku mapat-pat, adwogi ne ipol kare pe wangeyo dok weko wabedo ki ngeng tutwal. Lucwak tuku kacel ki lutuku gitwero nongo ni ber tutwal me bedo ki tam ma opye mot ka gitye ka neno onyo bedo tye I tuku.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka abolobol naka aboliasio, mam itunga epedorete amisiikin nuelomunete. Epedorete egangitok keda aboliak ajenun ebe ejokuna noi ajaut keda aomisio nu ijalijalaunete kapak kana asesen arai bo ajaikin toma aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru avita a'bala ni 'diyi ma alia, e'yo efu'ba 'diyi ma e'yo 'bani nile ku azini yi osuta si. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba avita avipi 'diyi pie eco esu orodriru eyi ma omi aa'zu e'yere eyini avita eyi ndreria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'emizaano y'okuhayahayana, ebirugamu nibibaasa kuba bitarikwetegyerezibwa kandi birikutangaaza. Abahagizi hamwe n'abazaani nibabaasa kushanga kiri eky'omugasho okukoresa emiteekateekyere mirungi baaba nibareeba emizaano.

eng_prompt: The selection process for the tournament was highly competitive, with strict criteria in place. As a result, many players did not qualify to participate in the tournament.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okusunsulwamu abavuganya yabadde ya kuvuganya nnyo, nga waliwo emitendera egy'amaanyi egyateekebwawo. N'ekyavaamu, abazannyi bangi tebaayitawo kwetaba mu mpaka.
ach_prompt: Yub me yero dano me cito I pyem ne obedo ki pyem matek tutwal dok kiketo cik matek tutwal I tic. Macalo adwogi ne, lutuku mapol pe gukato peny me bedo tye I pyem ne.
teo_prompt: Apol abolobol noi kotoma aseo naka abolobol kangin, ido aponi ibwaikinai nutupitono. Kanuka ngun, mam aboliak luipu apotu kopedosi ajaikin toma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani 'ba eyi opezu abala 'da ma alea ri ndra abala ru, azita okporu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, anzi mupira avipi karakara 'diyi awini aga fizu abala 'da ma alea kuye.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'okutoorana abazaani b'empaka ekaba erimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaani baingi tibarabaasize kwejumba omu mpaka.

eng_prompt: As the final whistle approached, the tension in the stadium was palpable. Both teams had fought hard, but the outcome was becoming increasingly clear.
lug_prompt: Ffirimbi esembayo bwe yasemberera, obunkenke mu kisaawe bwalabika. Ttiimu zombi zaali zirwanye nnyo naye ebyavaamu byali byeyongera okweyoleka.
