ach_prompt: I kare ma whistle me agiki tye cok, lworo obedo tye I bar tuku ne. Dul tuku aryo weng gulwenyo matek tutwal, ento adwogi ne obedo ka nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete epur loka awasia, aponi kowanyunai aiyalongong kotoma oisawe. Apotu itimun ngun kere ojioto kagogong, konye apotu akiro ngun kojenutu.
lgg_prompt: O'duko asizuri ni ecazu ogogo ri si, asi otiza pari avita niri ma alia ri e'da ra. Amuti avitani iri 'diyi 'di ndra a'di avasi, te e'yo efu'ba 'diyi e'bi e'da e'yere.
nyn_prompt: Enfuuru y'ahamuheru kuyabaire eri haihi kuhika, obunkenke omu kishayi bukaba nibureebeka. Tiimu zombi zikaba zirwaniise munonga, kwonka ebirugiremu bikaba nibyeyongyera kwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Despite his extensive training and preparation, he struggled to adapt to his opponent's style. As the match progressed, it became clear that he was not implementing his strategies effectively.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yatendekebwa nnyo n'okwetegeka, yafuba okumanyiira omutindo gw'oyo gwe yali avuganya naye. Omuzannyo bwe gwagenda gugenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti yali tatambuza bulungi bukodyo bwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en opwonye ki yubbe matek tutwal, en onongo tek tutwal me ngeyo kit ma lapyem kwede tye ka tuko kwede. Ikare ma tuku tye ka wot anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni en pe tye katic ki diro ne maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida etapit ngesi aituutoonor noi, abu ngesi kotam ajenun epone loka etepeganike. Neautar abolia alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe mam ngesi itodolikinit acoasinei ke ejok.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro i vile embata azini otuta angiri 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, eri dri ci e'yo 'ba erini baka sezu eri be 'diyiniri 'yezu. A'bala 'da ni mu drile, eri eca e'da kini eri awini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi 'ye kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okutendekwa kwe n'okweteekateekyera kwe kwingi, akateeraho kukorengana n'omuringo gw'omuzaani we. Omupiira ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu akaba atarikukoresa gye obukoryo bwe.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the team was thrilled to learn the results of the national competition. Their innovative project had impressed the judges, leading to an unexpected but well-deserved recognition.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, ttiimu yasanyuka nnyo okumanya ebyava mu mpaka z'eggwanga. Pulojekiti yabwe ey'obuyiiya yasanyusa abalamuzi, ekyaviiriddeko okusiimibwa okwabadde tekusuubirwa naye nga kusaana.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, dul tuku ne cwinygi obedo yom me nongo adwogi me pyem me lobo. Yubgi manyen ne oyomo cwiny lungol kop, ma oweko gunongo pwoc ma onongo pe gitye ka byekone ento onongo opore tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, eyalamasi etimu noi na ajenun akiro nuka abolobol naka akwap. Abu epurojektikec loitetet isiyalamik ikatubok, ido abu koyangau aijen na mam aomitai konye naedolit.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, amuti 'da ndra ayikosi e'yo agata abala kari 'di ma alea 'diyiniri onizu. Yi vile otita o'diru ri fe ayiko 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi dri, erini fezu yi dri inzita 'bani ega kokoru te 'bani lelerile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukora n'amaani, tiimu ekashemererwa kumanya ebirugire omu mpaka z'eihanga. Purogyekiti yaabo ey'omutaano ekashemeza abacwi b'emanja, ekyarugiremu okuheebwa ekitiinisa ekyabaire kitarikuteekwateekwa.

eng_prompt: The annual regional competition drew significant interest this year, showcasing talent from across the nation. As a result, sixteen provinces participated in the competition.
lug_prompt: Empaka z'ebitundu ezitegekebwa buli mwaka zaaleetawo obwagazi bungi omwaka guno, nga ziraga ebitone okuva mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo. N'ekyavaamu, amasaza kkumi na mukaaga ge geetaba mu kuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Pyem tuku me but lobo man ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka okelo miti madit tutwal I mwaka ni kun nyutu talanta ma aa ki I but lobo man mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe apar wiye abicel gubedo tye I pyem ne.
teo_prompt: Abu abolobol naka atutubena kangun kangolikaru koyangau eipud loepol noi kokaru kalo, itodunit atalantan nuka akwapuwok kere. Kanuka ngun, apotu aiboisio atomonakanyape kojaikinos toma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Abala angu ndundu eyi ma alea eli vusi 'diyi eji ava angiri eli 'disi eyini ani feta Munguni fe 'diyi e'dazu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti mudri drini azia fi abala 'da ma alea ni.
nyn_prompt: Empaka z'ebyanga ezirikubaho buri mwaka, zikareetaho oburemeezi bwingi omwaka ogu, okworeka emyoga kuruga omwihanga ryona. N'ekyarugiremu, amagomborora ikumi namukaga gaketaba omu mpaka.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent announcement about the beloved team's financial struggles, a passionate group of supporters quickly mobilized. Their determination to keep the team afloat led to the creation of a fundraising campaign.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okulangirira okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kulwanagana kwa ttiimu eyagala ennyo mu by'ensimbi, ekibinja ky'abawagizi abajjudde obwagazi baakungaanya mangu. Okumalirira kwabwe okukuuma ttiimu ku mulamwa kwaviirako okutondawo kaweefube w'okusonda ssente.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kicwalo lok angeya cokcok-ki I kom peko me lim pa dul tuku man ma gimaro tutwal, dul pa lucwak ma cwinygi yom oyotoyot tutwal gucoke. Cwiny gi me gwoko dul tuku eni okelo yub me jogo cente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuikamunitos atiokisio nuka etimu, apotu egurupu loka egangitok kiswamata katipet. Apodokinit kec naka aidar etimu aijar abu koyangau aitolomun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ecezu o'diru amuti leleturi ma e'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyi ma dria, ongulumu 'ba atita fepi avasi 'diyi tra yi ma eselea mbeleru. Asi 'baza yini amuti 'da ma ta mbazu drile ri fe 'bani ti odaza robia trazu ri e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okurangirira okwabaireho obwahati ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente bwa tiimu, abahagizi baingi bakahayo amaani ahonaaho. Okumariirira kwabo kurinda tiimu, kikareetaho enteekateeka y'okushorooza esente.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming championship game, the community is rallying together to show their support. Excitement is building, and the fans will mobilize resources for the team.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuzannyo gwa bannantammegwa ogujja, abantu bakungaanye wamu okulaga obuwagizi bwabwe. Essanyu lyeyongera era abawagizi bajja kukungaanya ebyetaago bya ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki pyem tuku odilo ma tye kabino anyim, lwak tye kacoke kacel me nyutu cwakgi. Yomcwiny tye ka mede, dok lucwak gubi jogo cente pi dul tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abolia naka abolobol naebunit, eutasi itunga aimorikikin kanu aitodun agangat kec. Ejai aiyalama noi, ido epote egangitok aituk iboro kanuka etimu.
lgg_prompt: A'bala avita championshipni emupi ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu eyi ma atita e'dazu. Ayiko ni tu uru, dika 'ba atita fepi 'diyi nga afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra amuti avita ni 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuzaano gw'empaka ezirikwija kubaho, abantu beeteeraine hamwe kworeka obushagiki bwabo. Okushemererwa kuriyo nikweyongyera kandi abahagizi nibaza kurundaana eby'okukoresa aha tiimu.

eng_prompt: In order to support the upcoming event, the organizing committee has decided to implement a mandatory contribution from each attendee. As part of this initiative, all fans will contribute ten thousand shillings.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuwagira omukolo ogujja, akakiiko akategesi kasazeewo okussa mu nkola okuwaayo okukakatako okuva eri buli muzannyi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abawagizi bonna bajja kuwaayo emitwalo kkumi.
ach_prompt: Me tyelo kor yub matye kabino ni, dul ma yubu yub ne gumoko tamgi me miyo kony ki bot dano weng matye I yub eni. Macalo but yub man, lucwak weng gubi miyo ciling alip apar.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang epucit lo ebunit, aseun ekomiti lo itemonokini aitolomun agangat kama ejaasi itunga kere luejaas. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote egangitok kere aijaikin isirigin ilukumin itomon.
lgg_prompt: Lezu atita fezu e'yo emu'ba 'diyi dri, komiti otupi 'diyi 'du e'yo 'ba dria emu'ba 'diyi ma dria afa fezu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba dria atita fepi 'diyi nga silingi fe alifu mudri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushagika omukoro ogurikwija,akakiiko akarikutebekanisa,kashaziremu kutaho obuhwezi kuruga ahari buri omwe oriho. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, abahagizi boona nibaija kuhayo shiringi emitwaro ikumi.

eng_prompt: The team has been struggling to manage its budget effectively. As a result, they are facing significant financial challenges related to logistics.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde erwana okuddukanya obulungi embalirira yaayo. N'ekivuddemu, boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi okwekuusa ku by'okutambuza ebintu.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku eni obedo ka yele me tic ki byek limgi maber. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka nongo peko me lim madit tutwal malube ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Auta etimu ationis aidar ebajet ke ejok. Kanuka ngun, etereikina kesi keda atiokisio nu ikapun nuikamunitos iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi dri ci otita aje robia niri ayuzu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu e'yo afa eyi ma ayuta ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etwire negyezaho kukoresa kurungi embaririra yaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'empiiha oburikukwata aha ntwaza y'ebintu.

eng_prompt: Despite their passionate efforts and numerous fundraising events, the supporters struggled to meet their financial goals. In the end, their contributions amounted to a modest sum.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakola n'obunyiikivu n'emikolo mingi egy'okusonda ssente, abawagizi baalwana okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe eby'ensimbi. Ku nkomerero, ssente ze baawaddeyo zaali ntono.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki miti matek dok gubedo ki yub mapol me jogo cente, lucwak ne gubedo ki peko me cobo miti gi me lim. I agiki ne, cente ma gumiyo obedo nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu keda aituk ikapun, apotu egangitok kongetakisi aitodolikin apeleikinata kec nuka ikapun. Kawasia, arai agangat kec naedit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo okpo yini 'diyi ma talasi azini e'yo robia trazu karakara 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba atita fe'baa 'diyi dri ci e'yo yini lele robia esuzu 'diyi 'yezu. Asizu, afa yini fele 'diyi ma ongmbo ndra ongmbo wereru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo n'emikoro mingi y'okushorooza esente, abahagizi bakarwana kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo by'esente. Aha muheru, obuhwezi bwabo bukaba buri obw'omuhendo mukye.

eng_prompt: After a season filled with ups and downs, the team was determined to prove their worth. Fans gathered in anticipation, hoping for a thrilling performance that would reignite their passion for the club.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa sizoni ejjudde ebirungi n'ebibi, ttiimu yali emaliridde okulaga omugaso gwayo. Abawagizi baakuŋŋaanidde mu ssuubi, nga basuubira omuzannyo ogw'essanyu ogwandizzaawo obwagazi bwabwe eri ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me pyem ma opong ki jami mabeco ki maraco, dul tuku ne omoko tamgi me nyutu ber pa gi. Lucwak tuku gugure kacel ki miti madit tutwal, kun gitye ki gen me neno tuku maber tutwal ma obi kelo mar gi pi dul tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolia naejaasi keda aiboisio nuepolok ka nuarokok, apotu etimu itodutu ebe ejokuna kesi. Apotu egangitok kotukokinos keda aiyalama naepol noi, aomitos ebe epote kesi aitodolikin amina kec nejai ekilabu.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti 'di ma vutia e'yo onyiru azini onzi 'diyi be tre, amuti 'da le ndra e'da kini eyi orodriru. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tra eyi asi driasi, asi 'baza be avita ndrizaru eyini ani eyi ma leta amuti mupira avizu 'da ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire burungi n'obubi, tiimu ekaba eyehaireyo kworeka omugasho gwayo. Abahagizi baketeerana baine amatsiko, baine amatsiko g'okukora kurungi, ekireije kugaruraho rukundo yaabo aha kiraabu.

eng_prompt: As we navigate the challenges of modernization and globalization, it becomes increasingly important to reflect on our roots. Preserving our traditions and values is essential for maintaining our identity.
lug_prompt: Nga tutambula mu kusoomoozebwa kw'omulembe guno n'okugatta ensi yonna, kifuuka kikulu nnyo okufumiitiriza ku nsibuko zaffe. Okukuuma eby'obuwangwa n'empisa zaffe kya nkizo mu kukuuma endagamuntu yaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka kato ki peko ma bino macalo adwogi me dongo lobo ma ite kare ni, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kakare wa. Gwoko tekwaro wa pire tek tutwal pi gwoko lanyut ma megwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina oni keda ainingosia nuka apol keda akwap kere, erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nuikamunitos iraasitwok. Aidar inonosio wok keda iponesio lukajokak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ajenanut wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ewaru ewu curu'do ri ni azini e'yo wudrikuru ma eselea ri ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma alea risi, eri eca orodriru tu e'yo egazu ama ma ola eyi ma dria. E'yo a'bi amavile 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru e'yo ama ni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikugyenda omu maisho n'oburemeezi bw'eby'omurembe n'okukwatanisa kw'ensi yoona, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho okuteekateeka aha mirandira yaitu. Okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'emitwarize yaitu n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda endagamuntu yaitu.

eng_prompt: A strong framework of laws is essential for a diverse society to thrive. By establishing common principles and values, the foundation of governance can foster a sense of belonging and cooperation.
lug_prompt: Etteeka erinywevu lya mugaso eri ebitundu eby'enjawulo okukulaakulana. Mu kuteekawo emisingi egy'awamu n'empisa, omusingi gw'obukulembeze gusobola okutumbula enneewulira y'okubeera awamu n'okukolagana.
ach_prompt: Cik matego obedo gin ma pire tek pi kabedo ma padi padi me dongo. I yoo me keto cik ki cik ma kwako dano weng, guti me tela twero weko dano winye dok gitiyo kacelo.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit aitolomun ikisila luegogong kanu apol naka itunga luegelegela. Kowai lo aitolomun ainapeta keda ajokis, epedori apugan aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Azita okporu ni eri orodriru ongulumu ndundu eyini zozu. Geri 'bani e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu azini e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu risi, e'yo driceza ni 'diyi eco aa'ta tualu tualu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'ebiragiro n'ey'omugasho ahabw'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe kutunguuka. Kurabira omu kutaho emisingye hamwe n'emitwarize, omusingye gw'obwebembezi nigubaasa kureetaho enkoragana n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for civic engagement, the team convened to outline strategies for enhancing public awareness of constitutional rights. They recognized the importance of a structured approach to facilitate these initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, ttiimu yatuula okuteekawo enkola z'okwongera okumanyisa abantu ku ddembe lya ssemateeka. Baakitegeera obukulu bw'enkola entegeke obulungi okusobola okukwasaganya enteekateeka zino.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak me bedo tye, dul ne gubedo ka lok i kom yoo me rweyo lwak i kom twero gi malube ki pencik. Gu niang ber pa yoo ma kiyubu maber me konyo yub magi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka itunga, abu etimu iriamunos kanu aitolomun iwaitin lu isisianakinete itunga apedorosio nu ikisila. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aitodolikin aswamisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo lezu o'bi eyini aa'zu tualu risi, amuti 'da eyi tra geri eyini ecozu o'bi eyini imbata fezu drilemgbo a'yota kari dricezu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. Eyi esu orodri geri 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru 'diyiniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abantu kweyongyera kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki, tiimu ekeetaba kureetaho oburyo bw'okumanyisa abantu obugabe bwabo oburikwikirizibwa omu ngyenderwaho y'eihanga. Baketegyereza omugasho gw'okukora ebintu omu muringo ogurikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In a historic shift towards modernization, the traditional power structures within the community are being redefined. As part of this transformation, clan leaders will become constitutional leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'ebyafaayo egenda mu maaso, enkola y'obukulembeze eya bulijjo mu kitundu ekyogerwako. Ng'omu ku nkyukakyuka eno, abakulembeze b'ebika bajja kufuuka abakulembeze ba ssemateeka.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka me tekwaro ma tye ka kelo aloka-loka manyen, yub me tela macon I kabedo mapat-pat tye ka loke. Macalo but aloka-loka man, lutela kaka gubi doko lutela malube ki pencik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulanakineta nuka akiro nukolo kanu aitodolikin epone loakwana, eutai aijulakin epone loka aipuga kotoma atutubet. Kwape ediope kotoma aijulanakineta nu, epote engarenok lu atekerin araun engarenok lu ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ojata ewu driorisi ewu curu'dorisi ri ma alea, 'ba geri opi nyaza ni oku 'diyi ma e'yo otu o'diru ongulumu eyi ma alea. Ojata 'di ma azi ru, drice'ba suru ni 'diyi nga eca drice'ba azita kari dricezu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'eby'obuhangwa erikuza omu by'omurembe, enkora y'obutegyeki eya ira omu bantu eriyo neegarukwamu. Nk'ekicweka ky'empindahinduka egi, abebembezi b'ebika nibeija kuhinduka abebembezi b'engyenderwaho y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the rain-soaked festival, the members gathered to discuss their shared vision. To symbolize their unity and resilience, they decided on a distinctive emblem.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kivvulu ekyali kijjudde enkuba, bammemba baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ndowooza yaabwe. Okulaga obumu bwabwe n'obuvumu, baasalawo ku kabonero ak'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwer ma kot opong iye, lumemba gucokke me nywako tam gi. Me nyutu ribe gi ki tek cwiny gi, gumoko tam gi me yubu alama mapat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loepol edou, apotu imeban kotukokinos kanu aitemitem aomisio kec. Kanu aitodun aimorikikina kec, apotu kesi koseutu aanyunet na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ma alea ozoo 'dipi 'diyi ma talasi, memba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini ega eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'dazu ti ecita yini azini okpo yini 'diyi, eyi pe e'yo ecetaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'ekivvulu ekyabaire kiijwire enjura, abanyakibiina baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha kiteekateeko kyabo. Kubaasa kworeka okukwatanisa kwabo, bakasharamu kukoresa akamanyiso k'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In a world where people come from various backgrounds and cultures, the challenge of finding common ground becomes increasingly evident. While differences can enrich our experiences, they also introduce complexities in achieving true harmony.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi abantu mwe bava okuva mu mbeera n'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo, okusoomoozebwa kw'okufuna ekintu kye bafaanaganya kweyongera okulabika. Wadde nga enjawulo zisobola okugaggawaza obumanyirivu bwaffe, nazo zireeta obuzibu mu kutuuka ku kukkaanya okwa nnamaddala.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma dano aa ki kama pat pat ki tekwaro mapat pat, peko me nongo lok ma winye tye kamede. Kadi bed ni apoka-poka twero medo ngec ma watye kwede, man bene kelo peko me bedo ki winye I kinwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naelomunitos itunga kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, etiono noi aimorikikin. Karaida epedorete atiakatiaka aitojokar akiro wok, eyangaunete kesi bobo atiokisio kanu adumun aimorikikina na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'ba eyini engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea tualu e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru e'yo eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea 'diyi esuzu ri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ka tro e'yo amani esu 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra ti, eyi vini e'yo ewaru eji ti ecita adaru ri ma esuta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu abantu abarikuruga omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe n'obuhangwa butarikushushana, oburemeezi bw'okushanga enshonga z'okukwatanisa nibweyongyera. N'obu okwebaganisamu kuraabe nikubaasa kutunguura eby'okureeberaho byaitu, nabwo nikureetaho oburemeezi omu kuhikwaho okukwatanisa okwabuzima.

eng_prompt: In private meetings, the leader expressed deep concerns about the state of the economy and the growing discontent among citizens. However, during public appearances, they maintained a facade of confidence and optimism.
lug_prompt: Mu nkungaana ez'obwannannyini, omukulembeze yalaze obweraliikirivu obw'amaanyi ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna n'obutali bumativu obweyongera mu bannansi. Newankubadde, mu kulabikako mu lujjudde, baakuuma ekifaananyi ky'obwesige n'essuubi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo kene, latela ne onyuto lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma lok me lim tye kwede ki cwer cwiny matye kamede I kin lwak. Kadi bed kumeno, ikare ma gubino inyim lwak, gubedo ki gen dok gubedo ki gen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta nuka itunga, abu engarenon itodu aiyalongongikec kanu ejautene loka ikapun keda amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga. Konye, kapak na ajaikina kesi otunga, apotu kesi iswamata kwape lu emunokina.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ngulupisi 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba 'da ece asi otiza angiri e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo asi ako kari anzi eyini 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Kani si, yini e'daria o'bi yi ma eselea, yi 'ba e'da asi'baza azini asi'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'abantu buntu, omwebembezi akooreka okwerarikirira kwe ahabw'embeera y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'obutashemererwa obweyongyeire omu bantu. Kwonka, obu baabaire nibareebeka omu bantu, bakaba nibareebeka nk'abaine amatsiko.

eng_prompt: After a contentious election, he emerged as the leader of the nation. His administration promised significant reforms and a new direction for the country.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okwalimu enkaayana, yavaayo ng'omukulembeze w'eggwanga. Gavumenti ye yasuubiza enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi n'obulagirizi obupya eri eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer ma opong ki apoka-poka, en odoko latela me lobo man. Tela mege ocikke me kelo aloka-loka mapol ki tela manyen pi lobo man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseo naejaasi keda epeget, abu ngesi kobu kwape engarenon loka akwap. Abu eyaitene ke isumun aijulanakineta nuepolok ka aingarenikinio naitetet naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa erita ako ru ri ma vutia, efu drice'ba kari niri ru. Driceza eri vileri so oyo ojata okporu azini driceza o'diruni fezu kari dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaruuru k'obutaikirizana, akarugaho nk'omwebembezi w'eihanga. Obwebembezi bwe bukaraganisa empindahinduka n'obwebembezi busya bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The organization has finalized plans for their upcoming events. As part of the schedule, they will hold a chief installation activity.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kimalirizza enteekateeka zaakyo ez'emikolo egijja. Ng'ekitundu ku nteekateeka, bajja kuba n'omulimu omukulu ogw'okuteekamu.
ach_prompt: Dul ne dong otyeko yubu yubgi pi yub gi matye kabino anyim. Macalo but yub gi, gubi bedo ki yub me keto jami weng I tic.
teo_prompt: Adau erionget aitemonokin ainapeta nuka epucitikec lo ebunit. Kwape adiope kotoma ainapeta, epote kesi aitolot aswam naepol noi naka aipikakin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da de otita eyi otuta eyini emuzu 'diyi ma dria 'bo. Otita 'da ma azi ru, eyi nga mu 'yeta okporu 'bani eyi osuzu ri 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kimazire kukora enteekateeka y'emikoro yaabo erikwija. Nk'emwe aha ntebeekanisa, nibeija kukora omurimo gw'okutaho ebyoma.

eng_prompt: The upcoming election is approaching quickly, and we encourage all eligible members to consider running for a position. To ensure your participation, it's important to take the necessary steps to register.
lug_prompt: Okulonda okujja kusemberera mangu era tukubiriza bammemba bonna abalina ebisaanyizo okulowooza ku ky'okwesimbawo. Okukakasa nti weetaba, kya mugaso okukola emitendera egyetaagisa okwewandiisa.
ach_prompt: Yer matye kabino ni cok tutwal, dok wacuku cwiny lumemba weng matye ki twero me cung. Me neno ni I bedo tye, pire tek me timo jami weng ma mite me cone.
teo_prompt: Ejai aseo na ebunit atipet, ido isinyikokit sio itunga kere lu ekotoi aibwo. Kanu aanyun ebe ijaikina ijo toma, ejokuna aitodolikin nu ekotoi kanu aiwadikaun.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa emupi ri ni eca mbeleru, dika ama eka 'ba dria ecopi ra 'diyi e'yo egazu pa sozu pari azi ma alia ra. Lezu mi ma fi ra, eri orodriru mi ma 'ye e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ru sizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru oburikwija nibuhika juba, kandi nituhiga abanyakibiina boona abaine ebirikwetengyesa kwesimbaho. Okureeba ngu oketabamu, n'eky'omugasho okukora ebirikwetengyesa okwehandikisa.

eng_prompt: In a world often divided by conflict and strife, the role of governance becomes crucial. A well-crafted constitution can serve as a foundation for unity and stability among diverse populations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi etera okwawukana olw'obukuubagano n'obukuubagano, omulimu gw'obukulembeze gufuuka gwa mugaso nnyo. Ssemateeka akoleddwa obulungi asobola okukola ng'omusingi gw'obumu n'obutebenkevu mu bantu ab'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opoke pi lweny ki lweny, tic pa tela doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pencik ma kiyubu maber twero bedo guti me ribe ki ber bedo ikin dano ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka duc kanuka ingungeta keda ingungeta, erai aswam naka apugan naepol noi. Aitutuket na iwadikatai ejok epedori aswam kwape atukot naka aimorikikina keda ainapakina kanejaas itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma esele coza e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyisi, azi driceza niri eca okporu. Azita kari dricezu 'bani si kililiru ri eco azi nga e'yo ti icita ni azini asianzu ni 'diyi ma e'dota ru o'bi esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikukira kwebaganisamu entaro n'obutabanguko, omurimo gw'obwebembezi niguhinduka ogw'omugasho munonga. Engyenderwaho erikukorwa kurungi neebaasa kukora nk'omusingye gw'okukwatanisa n'obutebekana omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In our pursuit of unity and equality, it is essential to establish a framework that embraces all citizens. This foundational document aims to ensure that every individual is treated with respect and dignity, regardless of their background.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya obumu n'okwenkanankana, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola ekkiriza bannansi bonna. Ekiwandiiko kino ekigendererwa kya kukakasa nti buli muntu ayisibwa n'ekitiibwa awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko ye.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yenyo ribe ki bedo marom, pire tek tutwal me keto yub ma jolo anywali weng. Gin acoya man tye ki miti me neno ni dano weng kitero gi ki woro labongo paro pi kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo aimorikikina keda eirian, ejokuna aitolomun ainapeta nuepedorete aimorikikin itunga kere. Alosikinet naka apapula ngin erai awanyun ebe itunga kere eyangaritai keda ayongit keda angosibib, araida elomunit kesi aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama ni ti ecita azini trotro ri esuzu ri ma alea, eri orodriru geri azi ngazu kari anzi dria eyi ma eselea ri e'dozu. E'yo siza 'di ma asisile lezu nezu ra kini 'ba 'ba dria yi 'ye inzita azini inzita si, yini engazu ngua ri ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda obumwe n'oburinganiza, ni kikuru kutaho enkora erikwikiriza abantu boona. Ekihandiiko eki nikigyenderera kureeba ngu buri muntu yaatwarwa n'ekitiinisa n'ekitiinisa, oihiremu oburugo bwe.

eng_prompt: The community had been gathering for worship and fellowship for many years. Eventually, they decided to formalize their efforts and create a dedicated place of worship.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kikungaana okusinza n'okukolagana okumala emyaka mingi. Ku nkomerero, baasalawo okutongoza kaweefube waabwe n'okutondawo ekifo eky'okusinzizaamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka gure pi woro ki ribbe pi mwaki mapol. I agiki ne, gumoko tam gi me cako gang lega gi.
teo_prompt: Atukonokinos itunga ailip ka aimorikikin keda luce adaun ikar luipu. Kawasia, apotu kesi ocamutu aitodolikin aswamukec kosodete adukun aiboisit na ilipere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi oku yi oku inzita inzizu azini aa'ta tualuri ma alea eli karakara. Asizu, eyi 'du e'yo 'yeta eyini 'diyi 'bazu azita palaa dika eyi e'do angu inzita inzizu 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibeeteerana kuramya n'okukwatanisa okumara emyaka mingi. Bwanyima, bakasharamu kutandikaho omurimo gwabo kandi batandikaho n'omwanya gw'okuramizamu.

eng_prompt: The role of faith-based organizations in fostering community engagement cannot be underestimated. Many universities benefit from the support and resources that local churches provide, enhancing their overall growth and outreach.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'ebitongole by'enzikiriza mu kutumbula okukwatagana mu bantu tegusobola kubuusibwa maaso. Amatendekero ga yunivasite mangi gaganyulwa mu buyambi n'ebikozesebwa amakanisa bye gawa, ekitumbula enkulaakulana yaago okutwalira awamu n'okutuuka ku bantu.
ach_prompt: Tic pa dule ma jenge i kom dini i tyelo kor tic pa lwak pe kitwero cayo. Gang kwan me rwom ma malo mapol nongo ber pa kony ki jami ma kanica me tedero miyo, medo dongo gi kacel ki cwalo ngec gi bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka iriongeta lu ediini kanu aitopoloria itunga mam epedorio aitapatan. Iunibasitin luipu imedaunenete kotoma agangat keda iboro lu ijaikitos ikanisan luka atutubet, aitojokar apol kec keda aitodolikinio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba econi azi amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ni e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo esi ku. Univasiti karakara eyi orodri esu engazu atita kanisa eyini fe 'diyisi, eyini ani zozu tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'ebitongore by'amadiini omukureetaho entunguuka omu bantu tigurikubaasa kutwarwa nk'ogutari gw'omugasho. Za Yunivasite enyingi nizigasirwa omu buhwezi n'ebintu ebi ekanisa z'omubyaro zirikuhayo, ekirikureetaho entunguuka n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for local organizations to step up and provide support. One such institution, deeply rooted in tradition and service, plays a vital role in addressing the needs of its community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso nnyo ebitongole by'ebitundu okuvaayo ne biwa obuyambi. Ekimu ku bitongole ng'ebyo, ekinyweredde mu buwangwa n'obuweereza, kikola omulimu omukulu mu kukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu kyayo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi dule me tedero me aa malo ka miyo kony. Gang kwan acel ma kit meno, ma tye ki tekwaro ki tic matek tutwal, timo tic mapire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ejokuka iriongeta luka atutubet aibwo kosodete aijaikin agangat. Adiopet kotoma atukot kangin, naejaasi keda einono keda aijanakin, iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyini pa sozu azini atita fezu. Amuti alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi, e'yo a'bini azini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alia, azi okporu nga e'yo lepi ongulumu yini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho ebitongore by'omubyaro okureeta obuhwezi. Eitendekyero rimwe nk'eryo, eririmu eby'obuhangwa n'obuheereza, nirikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora aha byetaago by'abantu baayo.

eng_prompt: Many people find solace and strength in their faith, turning to prayer in times of need. It is often said that the power of belief can lead to miraculous changes.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuna okubudaabudibwa n'amaanyi mu kukkiriza kwabwe, nga baddukira mu kusaba mu biseera by'obwetaavu. Kitera okugambibwa nti amaanyi g'okukkiriza gasobola okuleeta enkyukakyuka ez'ekyamagero.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ginongo kwe cwiny ki teko ki i niye gi, gilego ikare me peko. Pol kare kiwaco ni teko pa niyee twero kelo aloka-loka I yoo me tango.
teo_prompt: Edumunenete itunga luipu agangat keda agogongu kotoma aiyuunikec, aijulakin ailipasinei kapak naka ationis. Ebakai duc ebe epedori agogong naka aiyuun ayangaun aijulanakineta nukajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asi omiza azini okpo esu eyi ma aita si eyini eyi ojazu izita vu sa'wa ewaru eyi ma alea. Ba sawa driasi 'yo kini okpo a'ita niri eco fe ojata e'yo onyiru 'diyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibatunga okuhuumurizibwa n'amaani omu kwikiriza kwabo, barikuza omu kushaba omu bwire bw'oburemeezi. Nikigambwa ngu amaani g'okwikiriza nigabaasa kureetaho empindahinduka y'omutaano.

eng_prompt: The congregation gathered eagerly, ready to absorb the wisdom shared by their pastor. Each week, they delve deeper into the core messages of their faith.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye n'obwagazi, nga beetegefu okuwuliriza amagezi omusumba waabwe ge yabawadde. Buli wiiki, banyiikira mu bubaka obukulu obw'enzikiriza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lucristayo gugure ki mit kom, ma oyubbe me winyo lok me ryeko pa lakwatgi. Cabit ki cabit, gimedo niang matut i kom kwena ma pigi tego me niyee gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikuristayon kimorikikinos keda eipud, ekapakina aimor acoa naelimokinit epasita kec. Kangolisabiti, isisiaete kesi akiro nuka aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Ba kanisa'a 'diyi tra eyi avasi, ngonde ondua atalao eyini 'diyi ma e'yo 'duzu. Sabiti alu alu vusi, eyi e'yo eyi ma aita ni okporu 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeeranira hamwe n'omuhimbo, beteekateekire kwega obwengye obu pasita yaabo yabagambiire. Buri sande, nibacondooza munonga aha butumwa bw'okwikiriza kwabo.

eng_prompt: In the heart of the city, a new educational institution was established to foster learning and community engagement. To complement this initiative, plans were made for a place of worship that would serve both students and residents alike.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kibuga, ettendekero ly'ebyenjigiriza eppya lyatandikibwawo okutumbula eby'enjigiriza n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu. Okwongera ku kaweefube ono, enteekateeka zaakolebwa ku kifo ky'okusinzizaamu ekijja okuweereza abayizi n'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: I cwiny boma ne, kiyubu gang kwan manyen me tyelo kor kwan ki tic pa lwak. Me medo yub man, kiyubu yub pi kabedo me lega ma obi konyo lutino kwan ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kokiding na esite, aponi odukoi esomero loitetet kanu aitopolor asioman keda aiswamanar itunga. Kanu aitodolikin aswamisioit na, aponi kitolomunai aitemonokineta nuka aiboisit na ilipere na ijaikini esisiak keda itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma agadria, 'ba si pari onitani o'diruni onita ma omgbo otuzu azini o'bi yi ma esele cozu. E'yo 'di ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba 'ba otita eyi pari inzita ni sukulu anzi eyini azini 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gw'orurembo, eitendekyero risya ry'eby'obwegyese rikatebwaho okureetaho okwega n'okureetaho abantu omu byaro. Okwongyera aha nteekateeka egi, hariho enteekateeka y'omwanya gw'okuramizamu ogurikubaasa kuhwera abeegi n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for higher education, the university decided to expand its reach. This initiative aimed to provide more accessible learning opportunities for students across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusoma okw'oku ntikko, yunivasite yasalawo okugaziya obuwanvu bwayo. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abayizi mu ggwanga lyonna emikisa gy'okusoma egituukirirwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutino kwan me rwom ma malo, gang kwan me yunibaciti ne omoko tamgi me medo rwom me kwan gi. Yub man obedo ki miti me miyo gum me kwan ma yot ki lutino kwan I but lobo man mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman naka okuju, abu eunibasite koseu aitanyanyar aiboisit ke. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai kanu aijaikin esisiak kotoma akwap kere arerengesio nuka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini lezu onita uruleruri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, univasiti 'da 'du e'yo eyini ani cazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu drileba onita ni 'diyi fezu sukulu anzi kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'obwegyese obw'ahaiguru, Yunivasite ekasharamu kwongyera aha buheereza bwayo. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kureetera abeegi okwetoroora eihanga boona emigisha y'okwega.

eng_prompt: The corporate training program was designed to ensure consistency across all locations. As a result, all university branches have the same company teachings.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa mu bitongole yakolebwa okukakasa obutakyuuka mu bifo byonna. N'ekivuddemu, amatabi ga ssetendekero gonna galina emisomo gya kkampuni gye gimu.
ach_prompt: Yub me pwonye me dul enoni kiyubu me neno ni tic tye kawot maber I kabedo weng. Macalo adwogi ne, jang gang kwan me yunibaciti weng tye ki pwony marom.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitemokinai ainapeta nuka aitutuoro kanu awanyun ebe ejai duc aiboisio kere. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi atenun kere nuka eunibasite keda aisisianakino adiope.
lgg_prompt: Ba 'ba otita imbatani amuti eyini 'da nezu ra kini e'yo eyi 'ye sa'wa driasi pari dria eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, arakala dria univasiti ni 'diyi ma imbata amuti nde ni 'diyi alu.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu omu bitongore ekaba etebekanisiibwe okureeba ngu ebintu nibigyenda omu maisho omu myanya yoona. N'ekyarugiremu, amataagi ga Yunivasite goona gaine eby'okwegyesa ebirikushushana.

eng_prompt: As the church seeks to grow its influence and reach new communities, careful planning and consideration are essential. However, the process is not without its difficulties.
lug_prompt: Nga ekkanisa enoonya okukulaakulanya obuyinza bwayo n'okutuuka mu bitundu ebipya, okuteekateeka n'okufaayo bikulu. Newankubadde, enkola eno erina obuzibu bwayo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kanica tye ka yenyo me dongo rwom gi ki oo bot lwak manyen, yub ki tamo matut obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, yoo ne bene tye ki peko ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekoto ekanisa aiyatakin apedoroke ka adolokin itunga luitetiak, ibusakinit aitemonokin ka aomoom ejok. Konye, mam ainapeta ngun emamei atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa ni lezu okpo erini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini cazu ongulumu o'diru 'diyi ma alea, otuta kililiru azini egata kililiru ri eri orodriru. Kani si, e'yo 'di ma alia e'yo ewaru yi ci.
nyn_prompt: Obu ekanisa erikugyezaho kutunguura amaani gaayo n'okuhika omu bantu abasya, okuteekateekyera n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho munonga. Kwonka, enkora egyo teine buremeezi bwayo.

eng_prompt: As part of their commitment to environmental stewardship, the school organized a volunteer day for the students. Excited to make a difference, they gathered their supplies and prepared for the task ahead.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa byabwe eby'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi, essomero lyategese olunaku lw'obwannakyewa eri abayizi. Nga basanyufu okuleetawo enjawulo, baakuŋŋaanya ebintu byabwe ne beetegekera omulimu ogwali mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub meggi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, gang kwan ne oyubu nino pa lutino kwan me miyo kony. Ki yomcwiny madit tutwal me kelo aloka-loka, gujogo jami gi ka guyube pi tic matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainakina kec kanu aidar alupok, abu esomero itemok aparan naka aijaanakin esisiak. Keda aiyalama naepol noi kanu aitolomun aijulanakineta, apotu kesi kitukokinos iboro kec kosodete aitemonokin kanuka aswam naingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini owizu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma azi ru, sukulu 'da otu o'du 'ba owi'ba 'diyi niri sukulu anzi eyini. Ayiko fu eyini ojata ejizu risi, eyi tra eyi ma afa ayuzaru 'diyi dika eyi otu eyi azi eyini drilia ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka yaabo y'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi, eishomero rikatebekanisa eizooba ry'okwehayo ahabwa abeegi. Ahabw'okushemererwa kw'okukora empindahinduka, bakarundaana ebintu byabo kandi beeteekateekyera omurimo ogwabaire guri omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster unity and understanding among diverse faiths, the community organized a series of interfaith gatherings. Participants from various backgrounds came together to share their beliefs and practices.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana mu nzikiriza ez'enjawulo, ekitundu kyategese enkiiko z'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo. Abeetabamu okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo baakuŋŋaana wamu okugabana enzikiriza n'enkola zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo ribe ki niang ikin dini mapat-pat, lwak guyubu kacoke mapat-pat me ribbe pa dini mapat-pat. Dano ma aa ki kabedo mapatpat guribbe kacel me nywako tamgi ki timgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro kanejaas idiinin luegelegela, apotu itunga itemokisi airiamununeta nuka aiyuunikec. Apotu itunga luegelegela kimorikikinos aimor aiyuunikec keda iponesiokec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita azini vata ejizu dini ndundu eyi ma eselea, ongulumu 'da otu okuta e'yo aitanisi 'diyi karakara. Ba engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi emu tualu e'yo eyini a'ita eyivile 'diyi awazu tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana omu madiini agatari gamwe, abantu bakatebekanisa enteerane z'amadiini agatari gamwe. Abeejumbiremu kuruga omu myanya etari emwe, bakeetaba hamwe kugamba aha nzikiriza n'emitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the storm intensified, dark clouds gathered ominously overhead, unleashing torrents of water. The wind howled fiercely, rattling windows and shaking the very foundations of the house.
lug_prompt: Embuyaga bwe yagenda yeeyongera, ebire ebiddugavu byajja waggulu, ne bitonnya amazzi mangi. Empewo yali ewuluguma nnyo, ng'ekuba amadirisa era ng'ekuba emisingi gy'ennyumba.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yamo magwa omede ki cwer, pol macol ocako cwer matek tutwal, ma okwanyo pii mapol tutwal. Yamo okuto matek adada, otongo wang dirica ki tyen ot bene oyenge.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ekwam noi, apotu idokolen luiriokok kodumutu akipi nuipu noi. Abu ekwam kogeu noi, kosodi ainang adirisan keda atutubena nuka etogo.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da ma okpo ni tuzurisi, angu iniru 'diyi tra eyi ma dria e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani yi ma omgbo otuzu. Oli ma o'duko ri okporu, ri jo ma dirisa eyi ma ti oji azini jo ma vuti sizu indi.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, ebire ebirikwiragura bikateerana ahaiguru, byashohoza emiyaga y'amaizi. Omuyaga gukahuha munonga, gukahuha amadirisa, kandi gukankanya n'omusingi gw'enju.

eng_prompt: Rescue teams were tirelessly searching through the debris, hoping to find any survivors. The storm had wreaked havoc on the town, leaving destruction in its wake.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu z'abadduukirize zaanoonya nnyo mu bifunfugu, nga zisuubira okuzuula abasimattuse. Omuyaga gwali gukosezza nnyo ekibuga ne gulekawo ebintu bingi.
ach_prompt: Lutic me laro kwo gubedo ka yenyo jami ma oballe, ki gen me nongo ngat mo ma obwot. Yamo ne obalo boma ne tutwal, oweko bal mapol tutwal I ngeye.
teo_prompt: Autasi itunga lu ayuwar aiboisio aimo iboro lu amunaros, kowomitos ebe epote kesi adumun itunga luapotu kokuwata. Abu ekwam itolitol etaun, kojalak aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'ba yi opa'ba 'diyi ri afa yi o'di'ba 'diyi ma ale andri ava kokoru asi 'baza be 'ba idri ta mba'ba 'diyi esuzu. Ozoo 'da eza tawuni 'da ra erini ani afa eyi ezazu.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu z'abajunanizi zikaba nizironda omu bicumintiriirwe, ziine amatsiko g'okushanga omuntu weena owahonokireho. Omuyaga gukaba gukozire akabi munonga omu rurembo, gukasigaho okucwekyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the crime that took place late last night. Initial reports indicate that the victim's father was in another district during the incident time.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza banoonyereza ku mbeera eyeetoolodde omusango ogwabaddewo ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero. Lipoota ezisooka ziraga nti taata w'omugenzi yali mu disitulikiti endala mu kiseera we byabeererawo.
ach_prompt: Lutela tye ka kwedo ngo ma otimme I kom bal ma otime laworo dye-wor. Adwogi tic ma okwongo nyutu ni wego pa ngat ma onongo peko ne obedo I dicitrwik mukene I kare ma peko eni otimme.
teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic akiro nuapotu kotakanutu akware nabian. Itodunitos iripotan lusodit ebe ajai papake kodisitrikt ece kapak naka akangas kangin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'yo vuti ondaza 'ye e'yo onzi 'yepi aje inisi 'diyi ma dria. O'duko oko 'diyi ece kini agu e'yo 'da ma atini ndra distrikiti nduni ma alea sa'wa e'yo 'da ni i 'yeria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibacondooza ebyabaireho ahabw'ekihagaro ekyabaireho nyekiro. Ripoota z'okubanza nizooreka ngu ishe w'omugyenzi akaba ari omu disiturikiti endiijo obu ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: As the storm intensified, dark clouds gathered ominously overhead. The sound of thunder rumbled in the distance, signaling the impending downpour.
lug_prompt: Embuyaga bwe yeeyongera, ebire ebiddugavu byajja waggulu. Oluyoogaano lw'okubwatuka kw'eggulu lwali wala nnyo nga lulaga nti enkuba egenda kutonnya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kot tye ka cwer matek tutwal, pol macol obino malo. Dwol me mor pa kot obedo ka winye I bor piny, ma nyutu ni kot tye ka cwer.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ekwam noi, apotu idou luiriokok kodumutu kuju. Apotu iporotoi luka ekwam kokinga, itodunit ebe ebuni edou aitep.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo ma okpo ni tuzurisi, angu iniru 'diyi tra yi ma dria e'yo onzi 'yepi. O'duko ozoo ni 'diyi e'da e'yo ozoo ni emupi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, ebire ebirikwiragura bikongyera ahaiguru. Orwari rw'okubwatuka kw'enkuba rukaba ruri hare, okworeka ngu enjura eri haihi kugwa.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous proposals and budget allocations, the plans for campus improvements were repeatedly postponed. As a result, the administration failed to renovate the buildings.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ebiteeso bingi n'embalirira, enteekateeka z'okutereeza ettendekero zaayongezebwayo emirundi n'emirundi. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze baalemererwa okuddaabiriza ebizimbe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kimiyo tam mapol ki byek me lim, yub me yubu gang kwan me univaciti kicoro anyim tyen mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela ne pe guyubu gedo ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aomisio keda ebajet, aponi isiekikinai ainapeta nuka aitojokar esomero. Kanuka ngun abu eyaitene ipiko aitemonokino adukena ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otiza karakara azini otita ajeni 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba idri otuta angu onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi drile pale karakara. E'yo 'disi, driceza 'da awini jo 'da eyi ede o'diru kuye.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho enteekateeka nyingi n'embaririra, enteekateeka y'okutunguura eishomero ekaba eyongyezibwayo emirundi mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi bakaremwa kuhunduuza ebyombeko.

eng_prompt: The library's roof had been leaking for weeks, and the staff struggled to keep the water at bay. Despite their efforts, the heavy downpour finally overwhelmed the building's defenses.
lug_prompt: Akasolya k'etterekero ly'ebitabo kaali kakulukuta okumala wiiki eziwera, era abakozi baalwana okuziyiza amazzi. Ng'oggyeko okufuba kwabwe, enkuba ey'amaanyi yatuuka n'okusaanyaawo eby'okwerinda by'ekizimbe.
ach_prompt: Wii ot me ot gwoko buk obedo ka cwer pi cabit mapol, dok lutic obedo ka tute matek me gwoko pii ne. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek tutwal, kot ma ocwe matek tutwal oweko gedo ne pe obedo ki gwok.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi atuluru naka etogo loka itaboi keda akipi kanu isabitin luipu, ido apotu eswamak kongetakisi aidar akipi. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogong, abu edou loepol kibirokin ayuwara naka aduketait.
lgg_prompt: Jo dri pari buku ta mbazuri ma dria ri ri ebi asi sabiti eyi ma alea, azini azi'ba eyi ndra dri ci yi 'da ma ta mbazu. Yi ma okpo ni tro ovuzu ra ti, ozo okporu 'diyi asizu jo 'da ma ageyi te.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye ky'eibikiro ry'ebitabo kitwire nikitonyoka kumara esande, kandi abakozi bakarwana kurinda amaizi. Oihireho amaani gaabo, enjura y'amaani ekahendera eretsire ebyoma by'okweriinda eby'ekyombeko.

eng_prompt: Emergency responders arrived at the scene shortly after the accident was reported. After assessing the situation, they determined that the victim required immediate medical attention.
lug_prompt: Abakola ku by'amangu baatuuse mu kifo akabenje we kaagudde nga waakayita akaseera katono nga kabaliriddwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera, baakizuula nti eyaakosebwa yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Lugwok kuc ki ber bedo gu oo I kabedo ma peko enoni otimme iye I ngee kare manok keken ma kidoto iye peko enoni. Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede, gumoko ni ngat ma onongo peko ne mito kony me ot yat oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu lu engeso kodolokisi aiboisit na akangas akaulo na alimor akangas. Akaulo naka airereor ejautene, apotu kesi kodumutu ebe ekoto itunganan amukian katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ba azakoma fepi mbeleru 'diyi eca pari drileonzi 'da ni i'yezu ri ma alea indikindi 'bani drileonzi 'da oluzu 'bori ma vutia. Bani e'yo nderi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu kini 'ba e'yo 'da 'yepi ri le azakoma arojoni mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi b'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahika ahu butandu yabeireho bwanyima y'okuha ripooti. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera, bakasharamu ngu owabaire aine akabi akaba nayetenga obujanjabi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent feedback from parents and community members, the administration has decided to address the urgent need for improvements. To discuss potential plans and gather input, the school will hold a stakeholders meeting to renovate the building.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bye baakafuna okuva mu bazadde n'abantu b'omu kitundu, abakulembeze basazeewo okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkulaakulana. Okuteesa ku nteekateeka ezisoboka n'okukungaanya ebiteeso, essomero lijja kutuuza olukiiko lw'abakwatibwako okuddaabiriza ekizimbe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tam ma aa ki bot lunyodo ki lwak, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tamgi me timo alokaloka ma mitte pi oyot-oyot tutwal. Me nywako lok I kom yub ma twero bedo tye ki coko tam, gang kwan obi bedo ki kacoke me roco ot.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu auriak keda itunga luka atutubet kolimutu pac, aseutu eyaitene aitemokin aomisio nuekotosi aswam. Kanu aitemitem ka aitolomun akiro, ebuni esomero aitolot airiamunet kanu aitemonokino aduketait.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tipika eyini azini 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma dria, driceza 'da 'du e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo eyi otuzu mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Lezu agbatara gbazu otita ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria tualu egata eyi trazu, sukulu 'da ni mu mitingi 'ba ambo eyi pie ri 'ye jo 'da edezu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha bi abazaire hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro bagambire, abarikukurira eishomero bashaziremu kukora aha byetaago by'amaani by'okutereeza eishomero. Okuhanuura aha nteekateeka n'okurundaana ebiteiso, eishomero niriija kugira orukiiko rw'abarikukwataho okuhunduuza ekyombeko.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events and the ongoing investigation, authorities have determined that the victim's family is at risk. To ensure their safety and well-being, immediate action is being taken.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso, ab'obuyinza bakakasizza nti famire y'omugenzi eri mu katyabaga. Okusobola okukakasa obukuumi bwabwe n'obulungi bwabwe, waliwo ekikolebwa mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki kwed matye kawot anyim, lutela gumoko ni lugang pa ngat ma onongo peko tye kama rac tutwal. Me neno ni gwokke ki bedo maber, kitye ka timo gin mo oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aingic na elosi akonye, ejenete apedorosio ebe ejai ekale loka itunganan ationis. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda aijar kec, eutai aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo vuti ondaza mupi drile 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba eyi esu ra kini familia 'ba e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyiniri e'yo ewaru ma alea. Lezu nezu ra kini eyi ma ta mba azini eyi ma aa muke, 'ba e'yo 'ye mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho, ab'obushoborozi bashangire ngu eka y'omugyenzi eri omu kabi. Okureeba ngu baine oburinzi n'amagara marungi, hariho ekirikukorwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: During the recent inspection of the facility, several areas were identified as requiring urgent repairs. Among these, the staff quarters stood out as the most critical concern.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya ekifo gyebuvuddeko, ebitundu ebiwerako byazuuliddwa nga byetaaga okuddaabirizibwa mu bwangu. Mu bino, ebisulo by'abakozi byalabika ng'ekikulu ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede cokcok-ki, kinongo kabedo mapol ma mito yubu gi oyot-oyot tutwal. I kin jami magi, kabedo pa lutic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka aanyanar aiboisit kangin, aponi kodumunai aiboisio nuipu nu ekotos aitemonokino katipet. Kotoma ngun, apotu itogoi luka eswamak kitodunitos kwape ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani angu 'da andrizu o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba esu angu karakara eyi lepi 'ba ma ede eyi mbeleru. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, jo azi'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi efu e'yo okporu ndeni ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kurambura kw'eikorero, emyanya mingi ekaba neeyetenga kugarurwa busya ahonaaho. Omuri ebi, oburaaro bw'abakozi nibwo bwabaire nibukye munonga.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing delays and budget overruns in the current school construction projects, officials have decided to intervene. In an effort to streamline the process and ensure timely completion, a new plan has been proposed.
lug_prompt: Olw'okulwawo okugenda mu maaso n'embalirira esukkiridde mu pulojekiti z'okuzimba amasomero ezigenda mu maaso, abakungu basazeewo okuyingira mu nsonga. Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza enkola n'okukakasa nti emalirizibwa mu budde, enteekateeka empya eteeseddwa.
ach_prompt: Pi galle matye kawot anyim ki byek me lim madwong I yub me gedo gangi kwan matye katime kombedi, lutic gumoko tamgi me donyo I tic ne. I tute me yubu yoo me tic ki neno ni kityeko tic I cawa kikome, ki kelo yub manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyap keda aibiror naka ebajet kotoma opurojektin lu aduko isomeroi, aseutu eswamak alomun. Kanu aitam aitapatan ainapeta ngun ka awanyun ebe engetakina kotoma apak, aponi kitemokinai ainapeta nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sa'wa ezaza ni azini bajeti ma ongmbo ni tuzu otita sukulu eyini 'diyi ma alea risi, azi'ba eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu. Okpo 'bazu e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru azini nezu ra kini e'yo 'di de sa'wa dria, 'ba o'ba otita azi o'diru ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyerererwa n'embaririra y'okwombeka eishomero erikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru bashaziremu kutaahamu. Omu kaweefube w'okutereeza omurimo n'okureeba ngu gwahwa omu bwire, enteekateeka ensya eteirweho.

eng_prompt: The devastating floods swept through the town, causing widespread destruction and chaos. In the aftermath, the community began to assess the damage and support those affected.
lug_prompt: Amataba ag'amaanyi gaayita mu kabuga, ne galeetawo okusaanyaawo ebintu n'obutabanguko. Oluvannyuma lw'ekyo, abantu baatandika okwetegereza ebyayonoonebwa n'okuyamba abo abaakosebwa.
ach_prompt: Pii aluka ma obalo jami mapol obalo boma ne dok okelo kuku kuku mapol tutwal. Ingeye, lwak ocako niang ngo ma oballe ki konyo joo ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Apotu ebulone kibiroros otaun, ido abu koyangau amunar keda amumu naepol noi. Akaulo na akiro ngun, apotu itunga kogeutu airereor atiokisio kosodete aigang ngul luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: Yi tiza onzi 'diyi aci tawuni ma alea dria, e'yo ezaza ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi eji ra. E'yo 'da ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do afa ezale 'diyi ma omgbo one dika eyi fe atita 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omwegyemure gw'amaizi gukareeta akavuyo n'akavuyo omu rurembo. Ekyarugiremu, abantu bakatandika kushwijuma ebyasisikaire n'okuhwera abo abakoseddwa.

eng_prompt: As the government reviewed its financial priorities for the upcoming year, education advocates expressed concerns about the lack of investment in infrastructure. Despite rising enrollment numbers, the allocation for educational facilities remained alarmingly low.
lug_prompt: Nga gavumenti yeetegereza enteekateeka zaayo ez'ebyensimbi ez'omwaka ogujja, abalwanirira ebyenjigiriza baalaga obweraliikirivu olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi mu bikozesebwa. Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abayizi gweyongera, ensimbi eziweebwayo ku by'enjigiriza zaasigala ntono nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gamente tye ka ngiyo kor yub me lim ma en oketo pi mwaka manyen, joo ma cwako lok me kwan gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko me keto lim I gedo mapat-pat. Kadi bed ni wel lutino matye kadonyo i gang kwan tye ka medde, wel cente ma kimiyo pi gangi kwan pud tye piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar apugan airereor ainapeta ke nuka ikapun kanuka ekaru lo ebunit, apotu lu egangitos nuka asioman itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus aipikakin ikapun toma adukena. Karaida iyata enaaba loka esisiak, ikidioko ikapun lu itwasamao kanu aiboisio nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni e'yo erini lele robia esuzu eli drusirisi 'diyi ma ale andriria, 'ba a'di 'dipi onita ma dria 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ma ako ma dria. Kalafe sukulu anzi sukulu'a 'diyi ni tuzu ra ti, robia 'bani fe sukulu anzi eyini ri awi eleru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku yaabaire neeshwijuma enteekateeka yaayo y'esente y'omwaka ogurikwija, abarikurwanirira eby'obwegyese boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'okuburwa sente z'okutandikaho ebyombeko. Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abeegi, esente ezirikushashurirwa eby'obwegyese zikaguma zikye munonga.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a stable and conducive learning environment for students, it is essential to prioritize long-term investments in educational infrastructure. This approach will not only enhance the quality of education but also provide a safe space for future generations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa embeera y'okusoma ennungi eri abayizi, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza eby'ekiseera ekiwanvu. Enkola eno tejja kukoma ku kutumbula mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza naye era ejja kuwa emirembe egijja ekifo ekirungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kwan tye maber pi lutino kwan, pire tek tutwal me keto lim I gangi kwan pi kare malac. Yoo man pe obi ilo malo rwom me kwan keken ento bene obi bedo kabedo maber pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai esomero loejok kanu esisiak, ibusakinit aisingarenit aipikakin ikapun toma asioman naka apak naepol. Mam epone lo ebuni aikeun adoketait na asioman bon konye ijaikini aiboisit na eyuwara nejaas itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu sukulu anzi eyini onita onizu kililiru azini kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma dria ri 'bazu okporu angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea. Geri 'di ngani lu onita ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini angu kililiru fe ewu drusiri ni.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abeegi batunga obusingye n'obwegyese burungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuta esente nyingi omu by'obwegyese. Enkora egi terikwija kwongyera aha mutindo gw'eby'obwegyese kyonka, kureka neija kureetera n'eminyeeto y'omumaisho obusingye.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose on a crisp autumn morning, students, teachers, and alumni gathered on the school grounds, buzzing with excitement. Festive decorations adorned the hallways, and a sense of nostalgia filled the air as everyone prepared for a momentous occasion.
lug_prompt: Ng'omusana guvaayo ku makya g'obutiti, abayizi, abasomesa, n'abaaliko ku ssomero baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibangirizi ky'essomero nga basanyuka nnyo. Ebisiige by'ebikujjuko byayooyoota amakubo, n'okwegomba kwajjula empewo nga buli omu yeetegekera omukolo ogw'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng tye ka ryeny odiko, lutino kwan, lupwonye ki lutino macon gugure i gang kwan kun gibedo ki yomcwiny. Yub me kwero nino madit oyubbe I korot, dok dano mapol gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma dano weng tye ka yubbe pi yub man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kwape ebunit akolong tupuruc, apotu esisiak, isisianakinak, keda esisiak luakolo kotukokinos aiboisit naka esomero, aiyalamasi keda aiyalama. Apotu aiboisio nu inumunumete ipucito kibusakisi irotin, ido apotu itunga luipu kopuputu aiyalama naarai ekapakina itunga kere kanuka epucit loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria o'bitisi, sukulu anzi, imba'ba, azini sukulu anzi oku 'diyi tra yi aku ambu sukulu niri ma alia ayiko si. E'yo ayiko zuza ni 'diyi ede angu 'bani acizu 'diyi, dika 'ba dria yi oturia yi otuta 'yezu omu inzile inzi 'diyiniri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku guraabe nigweyongyera omu kasheeshe k'obutiti, abeegi, abegyesa, hamwe n'abaaherize kwega bakateeranira omu irindiro ry'eishomero, bashemereirwe munonga. Ebishushani by'okujaguza bikashemeza emyanya y'okuraaramu, kandi buri omwe yaaba nayeteekateekyera omukoro gw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In the early 20th century, the community recognized the need for skilled tradespeople to support local industries. As a result, they established an institution focused on practical training and workforce development.
lug_prompt: Ku ntandikwa y'ekyasa ky'abiri, abantu baalaba obwetaavu bw'abasuubuzi abakugu okuyambako amakolero g'omu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, baatandikawo ettendekero erissa essira ku kutendeka n'okukulaakulanya abakozi.
ach_prompt: I acaki me cencwari me pyer aryo, lwak guniang ni mite ni omyero ki kony lucat ma ludiro me cako ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, guyubu gang kwan ma keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom pwonye ki dongo lutic.
teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ekaru ilukumin iarei, apotu itunga kojenutu eipud loka agwelanarak lu emisiaritos aigang icuman luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi odukutu erionget lo isingarenit aitutuoro ka aitopol eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Eli alifu kaliri ma e'doria, ongulumu 'da esu e'yo lezu 'ba tujari 'yepi ondua be 'diyini okalamvu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atizu. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do pari azi ni asi 'bazu imbata drisi 'diyi ma dria azini azi'ba eyi ma ezota ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntandikwa y'ekyasha kya 20, abantu bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'abantu abaine obukugu omu by'obushubuzi, okuhwera amakorero g'omubyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatandikaho eitendekyero eririkugyenderera okutendeka n'okutunguura abakozi.

eng_prompt: Excitement filled the air as students gathered in the courtyard, eagerly discussing the day's events. Everyone was buzzing with anticipation for the festivities that would bring the community together.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwajjula empewo ng'abayizi bakungaanidde mu luggya, nga bateesa n'obwagazi ku bibaddewo olunaku. Buli omu yabadde yeesunga nnyo ebikujjuko ebinaakwataganya ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Cwiny lutino obedo yom tutwal I kare ma gucokke I dyekal, kun gitye ka lok I kom jami ma otimme I nino enuni. Dano weng gubedo ki miti madit tutwal pi kwer ma obi ribo lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kwape esisiak lu atukokinos alaro, itetemete akiro nuiswamasi aparan ngin. Ejaasi itunga kere keda eipud loka epucit loepedori aimorikikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu oli si sukulu anzi eyi okupi aku dria, eyini agbatara gbazu e'yo i 'yepi o'du 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria avasi. Ba dria ri ndra ava be omu 'bani ecozu ongulumu eyi ejizu tualuri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Akashemererwa kakaija omu mwanya, abeegi ku barikuteeranira omu mbuga, barikuhanuura aha byabaireho eizooba eryo. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okujaguza omukoro ogwabaire niguza kugarukanisa abantu.

eng_prompt: After months of searching for a position, he finally received an offer from the local school. Reflecting on his journey, the teacher said he was grateful to have a job at the school.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi ng'anoonya ekifo, yasembayo okufuna omulimu okuva mu ssomero ly'omu kitundu. Ng'alowooza ku lugendo lwe, omusomesa yagamba nti musanyufu okuba n'omulimu ku ssomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee yenyo tic pi dwe mapol, lacen en onongo tic ki I gang kwan me tedero. I kare ma tye ka tam I kom wot mege, lapwony ne owaco ni en tye ki yomcwiny me nongo tic I gang kwan ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aimo adoketait, abu ngesi kodum aswam kosomero loka atutubet. Koomoom nuikamunitos alosit ke, abu esisianakinan kotema ebe eyalama ngesi noi adumun aswam kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia pari ndazu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu azi engazu sukulu angu 'da ma alea ri vu. Erini e'yo egazu aci erini ma dria, imbapi 'da kini i ayikosi azi esuzu sukulu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi arikuronda omwanya, ahamuheru akatunga omurimo kuruga omu ishomero ryabo. Omwegyesa arikuteekateeka aha rugyendo rwe, akagira ngu akashemererwa ahabw'okutunga omurimo aha eishomero.

eng_prompt: Throughout their journey, they have faced numerous challenges and opportunities for growth. As a result, their dedication and hard work have led to significant milestones.
lug_prompt: Mu lugendo lwabwe lwonna, basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi n'emikisa gy'okukulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, okwewaayo kwabwe n'okukola ennyo biviiriddeko ebikulu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me wotgi, gunongo peko mapol ki gum me dongo. Macalo adwogi ne, keto cwiny gi kacel ki tic matek oweko gutimo jami mapol ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orot kec kere, apotu kesi odumutu atiokisio nuipu keda arerengesio nu apolo. Kanuka ngun, ainakina kec keda aswam kagogong ayangau aitodolikineta nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Aci yini ma alia dria, yi fu dri e'yo ewaru azini drileba zozu 'diyi be tre. E'yo 'disi, asi 'baza yiniri azini azi ngaza yini okporu ri fe e'yo orodriru 'diyi isu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rugyendo rwabo rwona, batungire oburemeezi bwingi hamwe n'emigisha y'okutunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, okwehayo kwabo n'okukora n'amaani, bireesireho entunguuka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly awaiting the approval of the budget for the new school. Once the necessary financial support is secured, the project can finally move forward.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kirindirira n'obwagazi okukakasibwa kw'embalirira y'essomero eppya. Singa obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwetaagisa bufunibwa, pulojekiti esobola okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kakuru ki miti madit ni kimok byek me lim pi gang kwan manyen. Ka ki nongo cente ma mite, yub eni dong twero mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Idaritos itunga noi aitigogongio naka ebajet loka esomero loitetet. Arai kedumun agangat na ikapun, epedori epurojekt alosit ngaren.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi te asi driasi otita ajeni sukulu o'diru 'da ni ri ma e'yo atizu. Ba ka atita robia niri esu 'bo, otita 'da eco mu drile ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibategyereza n'ekihika ngu embaririra y'eishomero erisya ehamibwe. Obushagiki bw'esente oburikwetengwa bwanyima y'okutunga, purogyekiti neebaasa kugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming school year, the administration held a meeting to discuss budget allocations. During the discussion, the teacher emphasized the importance of financial responsibility.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera omwaka gw'essomero ogujja, abakulembeze baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbalirira. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo, omusomesa yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi mwaka me kwan manyen, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom byek me lim. Ikare me nywako lok, lapwony oloko I kom ber pa tic ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanu ekaru lo esomero lo ebunit, abu eyaitene kitolot airiamun kanu aitemitem nuka ebajet. Kotoma apak naka aitemitem, abu esisianakinan kitogogong ajokis naka aitodolikin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Otuta eli sukulu ni emupi ri ni 'diyisi, driceza 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu otita ajeni 'diyi ma dria. Sawa agbatara nirisi, imbapi 'da 'ba okpo orodri e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera omwaka gw'eishomero ogurikwija, abarikukurira eishomero bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha mbariirira y'eishomero. Omu kuhanuura, omwegyesa akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukoresa gye esente.

eng_prompt: When educators and parents work together to support students, it fosters a sense of accountability and shared purpose. This collaborative approach can create a more conducive learning environment.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa n'abazadde bwe bakolera awamu okuyamba abayizi, kireetawo obuvunaanyizibwa n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu. Enkola eno ey'okukwatagana esobola okutondawo embeera ennungi ey'okusomeramu.
ach_prompt: Ka lupwonye ki lunyodo gutiyo kacelo me konyo lutino, man weko lutino bedo ki ngec me timo tic gi. Yoo me ribbe man twero kelo kabedo maber me kwan.
teo_prompt: Arai isisianakinak keda auriak iswamaete nepepe kanu aigang esisiak, itopolori aomisioit naka aswam keda aswam nepepe. Ewai lo lo aiswamanara epedori aitolomun aiboisit najokan na aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyi ka tualu tipika eyi pie azi nga tualu sukulu anzi eyi ma aza kozu, eri e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma e'yo eyi 'ye tualu. Geri ti icita ni 'diri eco angu onita ni muke ndeni ri e'do ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa n'abazaire ku barikukorera hamwe okuhwera abeegi, nikireetaho enshonga n'ekigyendererwa. Enkora y'okukorera hamwe neebaasa kureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost enrollment and foster a sense of community, the headteacher organized a meeting to discuss the school's programs and achievements. He emphasized the importance of parental involvement in their children's education.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okwewandiisa n'okutumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu, omukulu w'essomero yategeka olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulogulaamu z'essomero n'ebituukiddwaako. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'abazadde okwenyigira mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo wel lutino kwan kacel ki bedo ki cwiny me ribbe, ladit gang kwan oyubu kacoke me nywako lok I kom yub ki jami ma gang kwan tye katimo. En owaco ni pire tek tutwal ni lunyodo omyero gubed tye ikwan pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eswamae lo aisisianakin esisiak keda aisisianakin itunga, abu apolon esomero kitemok airiamunet kanu aitemitem ainapeta nuka esomero keda aitodolikineta. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka auriak ajaut toma asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu sukulu anzi eyi ma kalafe otuzu tualu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, dricere 'da otu mitingi eyi agbatara gbazu otita sukulu 'da ni 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie. Eri fe okpo orodri tipika eyini aa'zu eyi ma anzi eyi ma onita ma alea indi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera omuhendo gw'abeegi, mukuru w'eishomero akatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha puroguraamu z'eishomero hamwe n'ebikozirwe. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'abazaire kwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent assessments highlighting the need for upgrades, the administration held a meeting to discuss potential improvements. They concluded that significant financial support was necessary to address the aging facilities.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko okulaga obwetaavu bw'okulongoosa, abaddukanya emirimu baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku by'okulongoosa. Baamaliriza nti obuyambi bw'ensimbi obw'amaanyi bwetaagibwa okukola ku bifo ebikaddiye.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki ma onyuto ni omyero kimed rwom me tic, ludito me gang tic gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom jami ma twero yube. Guwaco ni kony me lim mapol mite pi yubu jami ma otii.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aanyanario naka akiro nuitodunitos eipud loka aitojokaario, abu eyaitene kitolomu airiamunet kanu aitemitem aitojokaario. Apotu kesi ongetakisi ebe ekotoi agangat na ikapun kanu aitemokin aiboisio nu emojongitos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma dria, driceza 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo otuza ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi de asi kini atita robia niri ma omgbo angiri ri eri orodriru e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okucondooza okwakozirwe juba okurikworeka ekyetengo ky'okutunguura, abarikukurira ekitongore bakakora orukiiko okuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutunguuka. Bakahendera ngu obuhwezi bw'esente obw'amaani bukaba nibwetengwa kukora aha nshonga z'ebyombeko ebikuru.

eng_prompt: After hearing about the exciting new programs and activities being offered, the young students felt a surge of enthusiasm. Their curiosity was piqued by the stories of older students who had thrived in the vibrant school environment.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ku pulogulaamu empya ezinyuma n'emirimu egiweebwa, abayizi abato baawulira essanyu lingi. Baakwatibwako nnyo olw'ebyafaayo by'abayizi abakulu abaakola obulungi emirimu gyabwe mu ssomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo lok I kom yub manyen ki jami mapat-pat matye katime, lutino kwan gubedo ki yomcwiny. Miti gi obedo I kom ododo pa lutino kwan ma otii ma gutimo maber I gang kwangi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup nuikamunitos ainapeta nuitetiak ka aswamisinei nu ijaikitai, apotu esisiak lu edisiak opuputu aiyalama. Apotu akirokec kisinyikokisi akiro nuikamunitos esisiak luemojongito luapotu iswamata ejok kosomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizu otita o'diru ayiko fepi 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, sukulu anzi oderu 'diyi ma ava tu ra. Eyi ma ava enga e'yo anzi depi 'bo 'diyi ma dria e'yo eyini esu sukulu 'da ma alea drile suzaru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira ebirikukwata aha puroguraamu n'emirimo misya, abeegi bato bakagira omuhimbo. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikareetwa emboozi z'abeegi abakuru abaabaire batungire kurungi omumwanya gw'eishomero.

eng_prompt: During the annual alumni gathering, the headmaster highlighted the significant impact of past graduates on the school's development. Their dedication and support over the years have been invaluable to our community.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lw'abayizi abaava mu ssomero olutegekebwa buli mwaka, omukulu w'essomero yayogedde ku mugaso gw'abayizi abaava mu ssomero ku nkulaakulana y'essomero. Okwewaayo kwabwe n'obuyambi okumala emyaka bibadde bya muwendo nnyo eri ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lutino kwan ma okato mwaka ki mwaka, ladit gang kwan oloko i kom adwoki mabeco ma lutino kwan ma okato ni okelo i kom dongo pa gang kwan. Dyeregi kacel ki konygi pi mwaki ma okato obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka esisiak lumojong kangol ekaru, abu apolon esomero kitetem epone loepedoriata esisiak lumojong aitopol esomero. Ainakina kec keda agangat kec adaun ikaru luipu eraasi nuepolok noi mama ejaasi itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Sawa okuta sukulu anzi onita depi 'bo 'diyiniri ma alia, dricere 'da ece e'yo 'ba sukulu depi 'bo 'diyi ni sukulu ma zota ma dria ra. E'yo yini yi owizu azini atita yini fe eli agapi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ebi ovu orodriru ongulumu amavileri dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'abeegi abamazire emishomo yaabo, mukuru w'eishomero akagamba aha mugasho gw'abeegi abamazire emishomo yaabo aha ntunguuka y'eishomero. Okwehayo kwabo n'obuhwezi bwabo okumara emyaka mingi, bitwire nibihwera munonga abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges facing the community, local leaders gathered to discuss ways to foster growth and development. They emphasized the importance of education as a cornerstone for a brighter future.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula enkulaakulana. Baakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okusoma ng'omusingi gw'ebiseera by'omu maaso ebitangaavu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gugure me nywako tam i kom yoo me dongo lobo. Guketo cwiny gi i kom ber pa kwan macalo guti me kelo anyim maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itopoloere apol keda apol. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka asioman kwape amoru naka atutubet naejok koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu eturisi 'diyisi, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu zota ejizu ri ma dria. Eyi 'ba okpo orodri onita niri ma dria ekile afa okporu ewu drialeri ma alea ri le.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu batungire, abebembezi b'ebyaro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguura ebyaro n'entunguuka. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'obwegyese nk'eibaare ry'oburugo bw'ebiro bya nyensya birungi.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the annual summit, the leaders gathered to discuss their visions for the future. They were eager to share their insights and inspire the community with their plans.
lug_prompt: Nga beetegekera olukungaana olutegekebwa buli mwaka, abakulembeze baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku birowoozo byabwe eby'omu maaso. Baali beetegefu okugabana amagezi gaabwe n'okuzzaamu abantu amaanyi n'enteekateeka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, lutela gucokke me nywako tam gi pi anyim. Gubedo ki miti matek me nywako tam gi ki cuku cwiny lwak ki yub gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamunet naka ekaru, apotu engarenok kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem aomisio kec nuka oingaren. Akapakina kesi aimor aomisio kec ka aisinyikokin itunga keda ainapeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Otuta dri fuza eli vusi ri ni ri ma alia, drice'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu egata eyini ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ndra avaru e'yo eyini ega 'diyi awazu dika eyi ma ava enga ongulumu eyi ma alea otita eyini 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza orukiiko rw'omwaka, abebembezi baketeerana kuhanuura aha bigyendererwa byabo by'omubiro bya nyensya. Bakaba baine ekihika ky'okugabana ebiteekateeko byabo n'okugaruramu abantu amaani n'enteekateeka zaabo.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicated a significant drop in test scores across multiple grade levels. Parents and educators gathered to discuss the troubling trend and its potential impact on the future of their children.
lug_prompt: Alipoota ezaakaggwa zaalaze okukendeera kw'obubonero mu bibiina eby'enjawulo. Abazadde n'abasomesa baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kikolwa kino ekizibu n'engeri gye kiyinza okukosaamu ebiseera by'abaana baabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel lutino matye ka kato peny ojwik tutwal. Lunyodo ki lupwonye gugure kacel me nywako lok I kom jami matye katimme I kare-ni ki adwoki ne I kom anyim pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu aibiror naka amakesin nuka aingito kotoma iguredi luipu. Apotu auriak keda esisianakinak kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos ationis na keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol idwe kec koingaren.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini agata obeta ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra kilasi karakara eyi ma alea. Tipika eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ewaru 'di ma dria eyini ani ecozu eyi ma anzi eyi ma ewu drialeri 'yezu ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa zikooreka okukyendeera kw'obubonero omu bibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abazaire hamwe n'abeegyesa baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha muringo ogurikuteganisa n'oburemeezi bw'abaana baabo omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote a healthy lifestyle, the school organized a seminar on the dangers of substance abuse. During the event, experts shared alarming statistics and personal stories to emphasize the importance of making safe choices.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu obulungi, essomero lyategese omusomo ku kabi akali mu kukozesa ebiragalalagala. Mu mukolo, abakugu baagabana ebibalo ebitiisa n'emboozi z'obuntu okukkaatiriza obukulu bw'okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwo maber, gang kwan ne oyubu kacoke me pwonye I kom rac pa nywaro tic ki yadi. Ikare me yub eni, ludiro gupoko lok angeya ma kelo lworo ki ododo pa dano me nyutu ber pa moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijar najokan, abu esomero itemok airiamun nuikamunitos atiokisio nu aimat ikee. Kotoma opucit kangol, apotu ipirioitin kimorata akiro nuikamunitos aijar keda akiro nuka itunga kanu aitogogong ajokis naka aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu aa'ta muke ri otuzu, sukulu 'da otu otita imbatani e'yo onzi aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza ma dria 'diyi. Yeta 'da ma alea, 'ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi ece e'yo eyi 'yepi saaru 'diyi tualu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'duzu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho amagara marungi,eishomero rikatebekanisa omushomo ogurikukwata aha kabi k'okukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko. Omu mukoro, abakugu bakagamba ebirikwerarikiriza hamwe n'ebyabaireho ahabwaabo, kugira ngu bahamize omugasho gw'okucwamu gye.
