eng_prompt: As part of their guidance on making positive life choices, the teachers emphasized the importance of surrounding oneself with supportive and uplifting peers. They highlighted the potential negative influences that could arise from associating with the wrong crowd.
lug_prompt: Ng'omu ku bulagirizi bwabwe ku kukola okusalawo okulungi mu bulamu, abasomesa bakkaatiriza omugaso gw'okweetooloola ne banno abawagira era abasitula. Baalaga emize emibi egiyinza okuva mu kubeera n'emikwano emibi.
ach_prompt: Macalo but konygi me yero kwo maber, lupwonye guwaco ni pire tek me bedo ki lurem ma cuku cwiny dano. Gunyutu jami maraco ma twero bino macalo adwogi me bedo ki lurem maracu.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma aicoreta kec kanu aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak kotoma aijar, apotu isisianakinak kitogogongoto ajokis naka ajaut keda ipaup luigangitos keda lu isinyikokitos. Apotu kesi kitodutu atiokisio nuepedorete alomun kotoma aiswamanar keda itunga luarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini imbata fezu e'yo muke 'diyi pezu ri ma azi ru, imba'ba 'da eyi fe okpo orodri 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma agyipika atita fepi azini ava engapi 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Eyi ece e'yo onzi ecopi engapi aa'ta 'ba onzi eyi pie ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha buhabuzi bwabo aha kucwamu kurungi omu magara, abegyesa bakahamya omugasho gw'okwetorwaana n'abantu abarikushagika n'okugaruramu amaani. Bakashoboorora oburemeezi oburikubaasa kuruga omu kukorengana n'abantu ababi.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected educational landscape, collaboration among institutions is essential for fostering a supportive learning environment. By working together, schools can share resources, best practices, and innovative ideas to enhance student outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyenjigiriza eyeeyongedde okukwatagana, enkolagana wakati w'amatendekero ya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'okusoma ewagira. Mu kukolera awamu, amasomero gasobola okugabana ebintu, enkola ennungi, n'ebirowoozo ebiyiiya okutumbula ebyava mu kusoma kw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwan matye kamede ki kube, ribbe ikin gangi kwan obedo gin ma pire tek me dongo kabedo me kwan maber. Ka gutiyo kacelo, gangi kwan twero poko jami, yoo me tic maber, ki tam manyen me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma asioman naepol noi, aiswamanara kiding isomeroi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria eswamae loajokan loka aisisia. Kowai lo aiswamanara nepepe, epedorete isomeroi aimor iboro, iponesio luajokak, keda aomisio nuitetiak kanu aitojokar eswamae lo idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni 'di ma alea, ti icita pari onita ni 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru angu onita ni atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Azi ngaza tualu si, sukulu eyi eco afa ayuzaru 'diyi awa tualu geri eyini eyi 'yezu muke 'diyi pie tualu egata o'diru 'diyi pie sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese ebyeyongyeire kukwatanisa, okukwatanisa ahagati y'amatendekyero n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okukorera hamwe, amashomero nigabaasa kugabana eby'obugaiga, enkora nungi hamwe n'ebiteekateeko ebirikutunguura eby'emishomo y'abeegi.

eng_prompt: To foster a stronger sense of community and support for students, collaboration between educational institutions and local organizations is essential. One key partnership that could greatly benefit families is between schools and churches.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'ekitundu ey'amaanyi n'obuyambi eri abayizi, enkolagana wakati w'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza n'ebitongole by'omu kitundu kya mugaso. Enkolagana emu enkulu eyinza okuganyula ennyo amaka eri wakati w'amasomero n'amakanisa.
ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me ribbe ikin lwak ki miyo kony ki lutino kwan, ribbe ikin gangi kwan ki dule me tedero pire tek tutwal. Ribbe acel ma pire tek ma twero konyo gangi obedo ikin gangi kwan ki kanica.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor eipud loka itunga keda agangat nejaas esisiak, ibusakinit aiswamanara kiding isomeroi keda iriongeta luka atutubet. Aimorikikina adiope naepol noi naepedori aimedaun ikalia erai kiding isomeroi keda ikanisan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu azini atita fezu sukulu anzi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, ti ecita angu onita ni 'diyi ma eselea amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru. Ti ecita azi okporu familia eyini orodri ejipi saaru ri eri sukulu eyi ma eselea kanisa eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho obumwe n'obuhwezi aha beegi, okukwatanisa ahagati y'amatendekyero n'ebitongore by'omubyaro n'eky'omugasho. Enkoragana emwe enkuru erikubaasa kuhwera amaka n'ahagati y'amashomero n'amakanisa.

eng_prompt: Creating an atmosphere conducive to learning is essential for academic success. Research has shown that the surroundings in which students study can significantly impact their focus and retention of information.
lug_prompt: Okutondawo embeera ennungi ey'okuyiga kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi mu by'ensoma. Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera abayizi mwe basomera erina kinene ky'ekola ku ngeri gye batunuuliramu ebintu n'engeri gye babikuumamu.
ach_prompt: Yubu kabedo maber me kwan pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa lutino kwan. Kwed onyuto ni kabedo ma lutino kwano iye twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom keto cwiny gi ki gwoko ngec gi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun ejautene lo iswamai ejok kanu aisisia ejok. Itodunit aingic ebe aiboisio nu isisiaete esisiak epedorete aitigogong aomisio kec ka aiitun akiro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni 'diyi ma edeta eri orodriru drile suza onitaniri ni. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini angu sukulu anzi eyini onita onizu 'diyi eco e'yo eyini asi 'bazu kililiru azini e'yo eyi ma ta mbazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho obusingye burungi bw'okwega, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese. Okucondooza kworeka ngu emyanya ei abeegi barikwegyeramu neekora kihango aha kuteekateeka kwabo n'okubiika amakuru.

eng_prompt: Families often prioritize education when choosing where to live, and this area has become a popular choice for parents. Many residents believe that access to quality education is a key factor in their community's appeal.
lug_prompt: Amaka gatera okukulembeza ebyenjigiriza nga galondawo ekifo we banaabeera, era ekitundu kino kifuuse eky'okweroboza eri abazadde. Abatuuze bangi balowooza nti okufuna ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo kye kintu ekikulu mu kusikiriza ekitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Gangi ipol kare gi tero kwan macalo gin ma pire tek ikare me yero kabedo me bedo, dok kabedo man dong odoko gin ma lunyodo maro yero. Lutedero mapol gitye ki niyee ni nongo kwan maber obedo gin ma pire tek ma weko kabedo gi bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc ikalia aisingarenit asioman kapak kana aseun aiboisit na aiboi, ido erai na aiboisit na ejenara noi kanejaas auriak. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe adumunun asioman na ejok erai ibore yenitegelikina kanu aitelekaar aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Familia eyi tutuni e'yo onita niri 'du okporu eyini angu aa'zu ri pezuria, dika angu 'di eca e'yo tipika eyini leleri ru. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi ai ra kini onita muke ri esuzu ri eri e'yo okporu ongulumu eyivile 'diyini ava esuzu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Amaka nigakunda kwebembeza eby'obwegyese baaba nibatoorana ahu barikuza kutuura, kandi omwanya ogu nigwo abazaire barikukunda munonga. Abatuuragye abaingi nibaikiriza ngu okutunga obwegyese burungi, nikyo kintu kikuru omu kushemererwa kw'ekyanga kyabo.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and dedication, the students were eager to showcase their skills. Their hard work paid off as they entered the final match with confidence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okwewaayo, abayizi baali beetegefu okulaga obukugu bwabwe. Okukola ennyo kwabwe kwavaamu ebibala bwe baayingira omuzannyo ogw'akamalirizo n'obwesige.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye matek tutwal, lutino kwan gubedo ki miti me nyuto diro gi. Tic matek ma gutimo okelo adwogi maber pien gudonyo I pyem tuku me agiki ki tekcwiny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitutuonoro keda ainakina, ekotosi esisiak aitodiar acoasineikec. Apotu kesi kiswamata kagogong kosodete alomar toma abolia naka awasia keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Imbapi eyi ma vutia imbata okporu azini ava feza si, sukulu anzi eyi ndra avaru eyi ma ondua e'dazu. Azi okporu eyini nga ri esu orodri eyini fizu abala asizu ri ma alea asi'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okwehayo, abeegi bakaba baine ekihika ky'okworeka emyoga yaabo. Omurimo gwabo gw'amaani gukashashurwa ahabwokuba bakaza omu muzaano gw'ahamuheru n'obwesigye.

eng_prompt: In a tense match that kept everyone on the edge of their seats, the players fought hard against their rivals. With a crucial save in the final minutes, the goalkeeper secured the victory for the school team.
lug_prompt: Mu muzannyo ogw'obunkenke ogwakuumira buli omu ku mabbali g'entebe ze, abazannyi baalwana nnyo n'abavuganya nabo. Mu ddakiika ezisembayo, omukwasi wa ggoolo yawonya ttiimu y'essomero.
ach_prompt: I tuku matek tutwal ma oweko dano weng obedo iwi komgi, lutukoni gulwenyo matek adada I kom jo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi. Ki gwok ma pire tek tutwal I dakika me agiki, lamak odilo okelo loc pi tim me cukul.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naetiono noi naemina itunga kere aiboikin aiboisio kec, apotu aboliak ojioto noi keda lueboloboloete keda kesi. Keda ayuwar naepol noi kotoma idakikan luatuboros, abu ekaman egolo koinak etimu loka esomero aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: A'bala okporu 'ba dria ni 'bazu yi vile kiti dria, 'ba avitani 'diyi 'di a'di okporu 'ba yini baka sezu yi be 'diyi be. Sawa okporu dakika asizu 'diyi ma alea risi, 'ba golo biipi ri fe agata amuti sukulu niri dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano ogwabaire guri ogw'obunkenke ogwabaire nigureetera buri omwe kuguma aha ntebe ze, abazaani bakarwana n'amaani n'abaabaire nibahakanisa. Ahabw'okukiza munonga omu dakiika z'ahamuheru, omukwasi wa gooro akahamya obuhanguzi bwa tiimu y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: With only a few days left until the big match, the players gathered for a strategy meeting. They knew that their recent performance had not been up to par.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebula ennaku ntono omupiira omunene gutuuke, abazannyi baakuŋŋaana mu lukiiko. Baali bakimanyi nti enkola yaabwe gye buvuddeko teyali ntuufu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma odong nino manok keken me oo I tuko odilo madit, lutukoni gugure pi kacoke. Onongo gingeo ni kit ma gutimo kwede ikare ma okato ni pe obedo maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaarasia adis kitoni abolia napolon, apotu aboliak kotukokinos kanu airiamunet. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe mam eswamae kec loka pac iswamat ejok.
lgg_prompt: O'du acezu were kpere abala amburi ma alia, 'ba avitani 'diyi tra yi mitingi otuta ni ma alia. Eyi nii ra kini e'yo eyini 'ye o'diru 'diyi aa'ni muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Obu hakiriyo ebiro bikye kuza aha muzaano gw'amaani, abazaani baketeeranira omu rukiiko rw'ebiteekateeko. Bakaba nibamanya ngu emikorere yaabo etakahikire aha rurengo.

eng_prompt: In the world of competitive sports, various formats and rules are designed to level the playing field. One such format that has gained popularity is known as handicap.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'emizannyo egy'okuvuganya, enkola n'amateeka ag'enjawulo gakolebwa okuteekawo obwenkanya. Omuzannyo ogumu ogumanyiddwa ennyo gwe ogwo oguyitibwa handicap.
ach_prompt: I lobo me pyem tuku mapat-pat, yub mapat-pat ki cik mapat-pat kiyubu me kelo rwom me pyem marom. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye tuko ma kilwongo ni handicap.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka abolobol naka aboliasio, iponesio luegelegela keda ikisila luegelegela kes itolomunitai kanu aitirian abolia. Epone ediopebon loejenara noi loenyaritai handicap.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru avita a'bala ni 'diyi ma alia, 'ba otita azini azita ndu ndu 'diyi ede e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu. Geri 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'dile 'diyi ma azi 'bani esu ewu drialeri ma alea ri 'bani omvele handicap ru ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'emizaano y'okuhayahayana, emiringo etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'ebiragiro by'emizaano, nibiteebwaho kugira ngu omuzaano gube ogurikwingana. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga, nigumanywa nka handicap.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities rely on livestock for their livelihoods, yet access to adequate grazing land has become increasingly limited. To support these communities and promote sustainable agriculture, a solution is needed.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu by'omu byalo bingi byesigama ku bisolo okubeezaawo obulamu bwabwe, naye okufuna ettaka erimala ery'okulundirako kweyongedde okukendeera. Okuyamba ebitundu bino n'okutumbula ebyobulimi ebiwangaala, eky'okugonjoola kyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol me caro jenge I kom dyangi me kwo, ento nongo ngom ma oporre me pit tye ka doko tek tutwal. Me tyelo kor kabedo magi ki medo rwom me pur, yoo me cobo peko eni omyero obed tye.
teo_prompt: Ipu itunga lukocaloi lu ejarete keda ibaren, konye etiono noi adumun alupok nu ekorete. Kanu aigang itunga lu ka aitopolor akoru na ejok, ekot aitemokin ationis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu calu ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi yi ati anyapa yi ma ta mbaza ma dria, te angu anyapa ta mbazuri ma esuta eca curu'do ewaru. Ongulumu 'diyi atizu azini agirikica ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, le 'ba ma esu e'yo azi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu byaro, nibabeisaho amatungo okubaisaho amagara gaabo, kwonka okutunga eitaka ririkumara ry'okuriisa, nikweyongyera kukyendeera. Okuhwera abantu aba, n'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikugumaho, nikyetengyesa eky'okukora.

eng_prompt: The increasing demand for tobacco products has led farmers to expand their cultivation areas. As a result, vast tracts of forested land are being cleared to make way for tobacco fields.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebikolebwa mu taaba obweyongera buleetedde abalimi okugaziya ebifo mwe balima. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu by'ettaka ebinene ennyo ebirimu ebibira bitemebwa okusobola okuteekawo ennimiro za taaba.
ach_prompt: Medde pa miti me nongo jami ma aa ki I taa oweko lupur omedo kabedo gi me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka tongo bunga mapol tutwal me yubu poto taa.
teo_prompt: Apolor na eipuda lo iboro lu etaba einakini akoriok aiboisio nu ekoriete kesi. Kanuka ngun, eutai aibiror aiboisio nuipu nuka ikibiran kanu amisirin nuka etaba.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani afa edele taba si 'diyi lezu tu ri fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma angu ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma ongmbo otu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba angu jere ru 'diyi ma ongmbo angiri 'diyi oli angu taba sazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'ebintu ebirikuruga omu taabe, kireesire abahingi n'abariisa kwongyera aha myanya yaabo y'okubihingaho. N'ekyarugiremu, eitaka rihango eririmu ebibira ririyo niritemwa kugira ngu habeho emyanya y'okuhingamu etaabe.

eng_prompt: Deforestation has become a pressing issue in many regions, driven by the demand for timber and land. As a result, valuable species of trees are cut down.
lug_prompt: Okusaanyaawo ebibira kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi mu bitundu bingi olw'obwetaavu bw'embaawo n'ettaka. N'ekivuddemu, ebika by'emiti eby'omuwendo bitemebwa.
ach_prompt: Tongo yadi dong odoko peko madit tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat, malubbe ki miti me bao ki ngom. Macalo adwogi ne, kwai yadi mapol ma pigi tego kitongo gi woko.
teo_prompt: Erai atubutubio na ikito ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu, kanu eipuda lo abawoi keda alupok. Kanuka ngun, atubutub ikito lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo pati ogaza niri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea ni ru, e'yo 'bani mbawu eyi ayuzu azini nyaku esuzu ri si. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pati wura orodriru 'diyi oga va.
nyn_prompt: Okutema emiti, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani omu byanga bingi, ahabw'obwetaavu bw'embaaho n'eitaka. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'emiti ey'omugasho neetemwa.

eng_prompt: Recent heavy rainfall and deforestation in the area have raised concerns among environmental experts. As a result, local farmers are being urged to adopt sustainable land management practices.
lug_prompt: Enkuba ennyingi eyaakavaako n'okutema ebibira mu kitundu bireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakugu mu butonde bw'ensi. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi b'omu kitundu bakubirizibwa okwettanira enkola z'okuddukanya obulungi ettaka.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek tutwal ki tongo yadi I kabedo eni okelo lworo ikin ludiro ma neno lok kom cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego lupur me tedero me tic ki yoo me gwoko ngom maber.
teo_prompt: Apol naka edou loepol noi keda atubutubio naka ikito kotoma aiboisit kangin eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas ipiriotin luka akwap. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai akoriok luka atutubet aitosom iponesio luajokak luka aidar alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi o'diru 'diyi azini pati ogaza angu 'da ma alea ri eji asi otiza 'ba onita angiri be angu ama agei ri ma dria 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba a'i 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi geri nyaku ma tambazu kililiru 'diyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi n'okutema emiti omu mwanya bikareetaho okwerarikirira omu bakugu omu by'obuhangwa bw'ensi. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi b'omubyaro nibashabwa kukoresa emiringo y'okureeberera eitaka.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating in the region as both groups lay claim to the same territories. Historical grievances and competing interests have fueled disputes over land ownership and usage.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu ng'ebibinja byombi bigamba nti birina ebitundu bye bimu. Okwemulugunya kw'ebyafaayo n'ebigendererwa ebivuganya bireeseewo enkaayana ku bwannannyini ku ttaka n'engeri y'okukozesaamu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo eni pien gurup aryo weng tye ka waco ni gitye I twok piny acel. Koko macon kacel ki miti mapat-pat matye ka pyem ikin dano okelo tele I kom ngom ki kit me tic kwede.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma aiboisit kangin naarai ekotosi igurupun ngun kere aiboisio nueputosi. Angurian nukolo keda ipudesia lueboloboloete kes eyangautu ingungeta kanuikamunitos alupok keda epone loitosomaere.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu angu 'da ma alea ekile amuti iri 'diyi ni e'yo 'yozu angu aluri ma dria. E'yo onzi andra drio 'diyi tualu e'yo 'bani lezu baka sezu 'diyi pie fe e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni azini nyaku ayuza ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga ahabw'okugira ngu ebibiina byombi nibyetenga eitaka rimwe. Okwetomboitwa okwabaireho kare hamwe n'okwerwanirira ebyetengo byongyeire omuriro omu ntongane z'obwannannyini n'okukoresa eitaka.

eng_prompt: Many agricultural practices prioritize the cultivation of cash crops, but alternative uses of land can also be considered. For instance, certain types of plantations may offer opportunities for more diverse agricultural production.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'obulimi nnyingi zikulembeza okulima ebirime eby'okutunda, naye enkozesa endala ez'ettaka nazo zisobola okulowoozebwako. Okugeza, ebika by'ennimiro ebimu biyinza okuwa emikisa gy'ebirime eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Pur mapol giketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom puru cam me acata, ento bene kitwero tamo I kom tic mukene me ngom. Me lapore, kwai poti mukene twero miyo gum me yubu jami apura mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu akoru luipu isingarenitos akoru iraan lu agwelanar, konye epedorio aomoom iponesio ice luka alupok. Kwape awanyunet, epedorete amisirin ace aijaikin arerengusio nuka akoru iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ni karakara 'diyi okpo 'ba ori ezoza tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma dria, te 'ba eco vini e'yo 'du geri azi 'diyi ma dria ra. Ekile ecetasi, amvu azi 'diyi eco drileba fe ori ezoza esele ndu ndu 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebingi nibitwara okuhinga ebihingirwe nk'ekintu kikuru, kwonka n'emiringo endiijo y'okukoresa eitaka nayo neebaasa kuteekateekwaho. Nk'eky'okureeberaho, emiringo emwe y'obuhingi n'oburiisa neebaasa kurugwamu ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership hinges on strong interpersonal connections, as trust and communication are vital for team success. Building rapport fosters a positive work environment and encourages collaboration among team members.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwesigama ku nkolagana ey'amaanyi wakati w'abantu, kubanga obwesige n'empuliziganya bikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwa ttiimu. Okuzimba enkolagana kireetawo embeera ennungi ey'emirimu n'okukubiriza okukolera awamu mu bammemba ba ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Tela maber jenge I kom ribbe matek ikin dano, kit ma gen ki lok obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti pa dul pa dano. Bedo ki winye I kinwu weko tic bedo maber dok weko winye bedo tye ikin lumemba me dul.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan itodunit eidicane loajokan kiding itunga, naarai amunokina ka einer ejok kanu akerianut naka etimu. Adukio na eidicane eyangauni ejautene loajokan loka aswam ka aisinyikokit aimorikikina kanejaas itunga luka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri ni aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea okporu ri ma dria, a'dusikuni asi'baza azini e'yo nzeza eyi orodriru amuti eyi ma drile suza ni. Erita ako ma sita ni angu azi ngazu kililiru ri ma omgbo otu dika eri ava fe ti ecita ni 'ba amuti ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwegamira aha kukwatanisa kw'abantu, ahabw'okuba okwesiga hamwe n'empurizagana n'eby'omugasho aha businguzi bwa tiimu. Okwombeka enkoragana, nikureetaho embeera nungi y'okukoreramu, kandi nikureetaho okukwatanisa omu ba memba ba tiimu.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, practical experience often holds more value than theoretical knowledge. Employers increasingly prioritize tangible results over traditional credentials.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ejjudde okuvuganya, obumanyirivu bubeera bwa mugaso okusinga amagezi. Abakozesa beeyongera okukulembeza ebivaamu ebirabika okusinga ebiwandiiko eby'edda.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem ma ite kare ni, ngec ma dano tye kwede pire tek loyo ngec ma dano tye kwede. Wegi tic tye ka keto miti gi tutwalle I kom adwoki me tic mapat-pat makwako kom tic macon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka abolobol naka lolo, amisiarit naka aswam erai naepol noi adepar acoa naka aomisio. Etapit ikulepek aswam aisingarenit akiro nu iwanyunitai adepar akiro nukolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, nita e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru ndeni aga ondua e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ri. ꞋBa azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi asi ꞌba eꞌyo ꞌbani esu ꞌdiyi ma dria aga eꞌyo ꞌbani esu ꞌdiyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, obumanyirizi oburikukoresibwa nibukira okuba obw'omugasho kukira obwengye oburikugambwaho. Abakozesa beeyongyeire kwebembeza ebyarugire omu mirimo yaabo okukira eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns from the community, the government organized a special session. Key stakeholders gathered to discuss pressing matters that required immediate attention.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, gavumenti yategeka olutuula olw'enjawulo. Abakwatibwako abakulu baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu ezeetaaga okufiibwako amangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede pa lwak, gamente oyubu kacoke mo ma pire tek. Dano mapigi tego gugure kacel me nywako tam i kom lok ma omyero ki tii iye oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, abu apugan itemok airiamun na itegelikina. Apotu itunga luapolok kotukokinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuekotosi aitemokin katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba ongulumua 'diyi ma asi otiza tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete otu otita azi ndu ni. Ba ambo e'yo ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erikugarukamu okwerarikirira kw'abantu, ekatebekanisa orukiiko rw'omutaano. Abantu abakuru baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani ezaabaire nizetengwa kukorwaho juba.

eng_prompt: In order to foster community engagement and address pressing issues, it is essential for those in positions of authority to connect with residents directly. This approach will help ensure that the voices of the community are heard and considered in decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula okukwatagana kw'abantu n'okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu, kyetaagisa abo abali mu bifo by'obuyinza okukwatagana n'abatuuze butereevu. Enkola eno ejja kuyamba okukakasa nti amaloboozi g'abantu gawulirwa era gatwalibwa mu nkola y'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Me kelo ribbe ikin lwak ki cobo peko matye, pire tek tutwal pi joo matye ki twero me kube ki lwak atir. Yoo man bikonyo me neno ni dwon pa lwak ki winyo dok bene ki tamo I komgi ikare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit itunga aiswamanar ka aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok, ejokuka ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok arucokina keda itunga. Ebuni epone lo aingarakin awanyun ebe epupio ka apodokinit iporotoi luka itunga kapak kana aitolomun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma ti ojizu tualu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu, eri orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni eyi ecizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Geri 'di ni nga fe ra kini 'ba ma eri o'duko ongulumu eyini 'diyi dika 'ba ma ega e'yo eyi ma dria e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho okwetabamu kw'abantu n'okukora aha nshonga z'amaani, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obushoborozi kukorengana n'abatuuragye butunu. Enkora egi neija kuhwera okureeba ngu amahurire g'abantu gahurirwa kandi gatwarwa omu nkora y'okusharamu.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, it's essential for individuals to possess the necessary tools and knowledge to succeed. Empowering people with practical skills can significantly enhance their employability and self-sufficiency.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero ak'okuvuganya ku mirimu, kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu okuba n'ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa n'amagezi okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okutumbula abantu n'obukodyo bw'emikono kisobola okwongera ku busobozi bwabwe obw'okufuna emirimu n'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I kom tic, pire tek tutwal pi dano me bedo ki jami tic ki ngec ma mite me cobo miti gi. Miyo kero ki dano ki diro me tic twero medo kero gi me nongo tic ki nongo jami ma mite pigi kengi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka aswamisinei, ejokuna noi itunga ajaut keda iboro ka acoa kanu akerianar. Aitogogong itunga keda acoa na itwasamao epedori aitojokar aswamisinei kec ka aijar kec bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyini ovuzu afa ayuzaru azini ondua lele 'diyi be drile suza esuzu. Okpo feza 'ba eyini ondua afa edele drisi 'diyisi ri eco fe eyini aa'zu azi be dika eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'eby'emirimo ak'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, nikikuru omuntu weena kugira ebikwato n'obwengye ebirikwetengwa kubaasa kusingura. Okuheereza abantu emyoga, nikibaasa kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo n'okubaasa kwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges faced by the community, the organization recognized the need for a strategic approach. Key stakeholders gathered to brainstorm effective outreach methods.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, ekitongole kyalabye obwetaavu bw'enkola ey'obukodyo. Abakwatibwako abakulu baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ennungi ez'okutuuka ku bantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, dul ne oniang ni omyero gubed ki yoo me tic maber. Dano mapigi tego gugure kacel me nywako tam gi i kom yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubet kangin, abu erionget koany ebe ibusakinit kesi aitodolikin epone loajokan. Apotu itunga luapolok kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iponesio luajokak luka adolonokin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu eturisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti 'da esu ra kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo 'ye geri kililiru si. Ba ambo e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu geri eyini ecozu eyi ma aza kozu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu batungire, ekitongore kikareeba ekyetengo ky'okukoresa oburyo burungi. Abantu b'omugasho baketeeranira hamwe, kugira ngu batunge oburyo burungi bw'okuhikwaho obutumwa.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations, the local government finally secured a deal with a prominent investor. Excitement grew in the community as they learned about the ambitious plans for development.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga bateesa, gavumenti y'ebitundu yafuna ddiiru n'omusigansimbi omututumufu. Essanyu lyeyongedde mu kitundu bwe baamanya ku nteekateeka ennene ez'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye pi dwe mapol, gamente me tedero dong otyeko nongo winye ki latim biyacara ma oywek. Yomcwiny omede ikin lwak ikare ma gunongo ngec i kom yub madongo me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka ipegeta, abu apugan naka atutubet kodum acamanar keda agwelanaran. Apotu itunga luka atutubet iyalamasi noi naarai apotu kesi kojenutu nuikamunitos ainapeta nuapolok nuka apol.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu 'da ma alea ri esu asizu otuta 'yezu 'ba lonyi vuti alezani okporu 'diyi pie ra. Ayiko zo ongulumu eyi ma alea eyini e'yo onizu otita amboru angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekahendera yaakora endagaano n'omusigansimbi w'amaani. Okushemererwa kweyongyeire omu bantu ahabw'okumanya enteekateeka nungi y'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: The East African region has seen significant diplomatic efforts to foster cooperation among its nations. As a result, Uganda has been able to strengthen its ties with its neighbouring countries.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu ky'obuvanjuba bwa Afirika kirabye kaweefube ow'amaanyi mu by'obufuzi okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'amawanga gaakyo. N'ekivuddemu, Uganda esobodde okunyweza enkolagana yaayo n'amawanga agagiriraanye.
ach_prompt: Dul lobo mapat-pat manonge I but lobo Afrika kunyango gutiyo matek me dongo winye ikin lobe gi. Macalo adwogi ne, Uganda obedo ki kero me jingo wat I kingi ki lobo ma orumu gi.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunit atutubet naka East Africa aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor aiswamanara kiding akwapin ke. Kanuka ngun, apedorit Uganda aitogogong eidicaneke keda akwapin nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Kari Africa ma kala etuni efuria 'diyi e'bi okpo okporu 'diyi 'ba ti ecita kari yini 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, kari Uganda niri o'bi aa'ta kari eri ma jo ejele ru 'diyi pie ri ma okpo enga.
nyn_prompt: Ekicweka ky'oburugwa-izooba bwa Afirika kitwire nikigyezaho munonga okureetaho okukwatanisa omu mahanga gaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, Uganda ebaasize kuhamya enkoragana yaayo n'amahanga agagiherereire.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly defined by collaboration and unity, it is essential for nations to recognize their shared challenges and opportunities. By fostering a sense of solidarity, African nations can amplify their voices on the global stage.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongedde okulambikibwa enkolagana n'obumu, kyetaagisa amawanga okutegeera ebisoomooza n'emikisa gye gagabana. Mu kutumbula obumu, amawanga ga Afirika gasobola okusitula eddoboozi lyago ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma winye ki ribbe tye kamede, pire tek tutwal pi lobe me niang peko ki gum ma gitye kwede. Lobo mapat-pat manonge I Afrika twero medo dwon gi I rwom me lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi aimorikikina keda aimorikikina, ejokuka akwapin ajenun atiokisio kec keda arerengesiokec. Kowai lo aitopolor aimorikikina, epedorete akwapin nuka Africa aitopoloor iporotoikec kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea tualu ti ecita be tualu, eri orodriru kari eyini e'yo ewaru eyini esu tualu drileba eyini esule 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo ti icita niri ma omgbo otuza si, kari Africa ni 'diyi eco o'duko yini 'diyi ma omgbo otu wudrikuru ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa, ni kikuru amahanga kumanya oburemeezi n'emigisha yaago. Okureetaho okukwatanisa, amahanga ga Afirika nigabaasa kwongyera amahurire gaago omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: The economic landscape in the region is bustling with opportunities. Many entrepreneurs are drawn to the border districts due to their strategic location and diverse market potential.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenfuna mu kitundu ejjudde emikisa. Abasuubuzi bangi basikirizibwa mu disitulikiti eziri ku nsalo olw'ekifo kyazo ekirungi n'obugagga bw'akatale obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lobo man tye ki gum madwong me timo biacara. Lutim biacara mapol gicito I districts matye I wang lobo pi kabedo gi ki cato jami mapat-pat ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ipu arerengesio nuka edumune loka ikapun kotoma aiboisit kana. Itunga luipu luitolosete ibiasaran elosete odisitriktan lu oikoru kanu aiboisit kec najokan keda esokoni loegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robiani angu 'di ma alea 'diyi drileba eyi pie tre. Ba tujari 'yepi karakara eyi emu distrikiti boda'a 'diyi ma alea e'yo angu eyini aa'zu kililiru risi azini cu eyini ndundu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya omu kyanga biijwire emigisha. Abashuubuzi baingi nibaza omu disiturikiti eziri aha nsharo, ahabw'oburungi bwazo n'oburungi bw'akatare kazo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and anticipation, the day of the conference finally arrived. The atmosphere buzzed with excitement as attendees began to fill the room.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tuteekateeka era nga tusuubira, olunaku lw'olukuŋŋaana kyaddaaki lwatuuka. Embeera yabadde ya ssanyu ng'abaabaddewo batandika okujjuza ekisenge.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki bedo ki byek, nino me kacoke ne dong oo. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma dano mapol gubino I ot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin ka aomisio, abu aparan naka atukonokin kodolu. Apotu itunga luka atukot kogeutu ailelebikin agola ngin keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, o'du okuza niri eca asizu ra. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ni e'doria jo ale aliza 'da ma alea tre.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi nz'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateeka, eizooba ry'oruteerane rikahika. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabwokuba abaizire omu ruteerane bakatandika kwijuza ekishengye.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated outreach and support, the community finally recognized the efforts made to improve agricultural practices. As a result, the organization was thanked for educating peasants.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga babuulira abantu era nga babawagira, abantu baakitegeera nti waliwo okufuba okukolebwa okutumbula ebyobulimi n'obulunzi. N'ekyavaamu, ekitongole kyasiimibwa olw'okusomesa abalimi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me miyo kony ki kony bot lwak, lwak dong guneno tute ma otimme me ilo malo rwom me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, ki pwoyo dul ne pi pwonyo lupur.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka airiamun keda agangat, apotu itunga kowanyutu agogong naka aitojokar iponesio luka akor. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiyalamikinai erionget kanu aisisianakin itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi esu asizu e'yo 'bani 'ye e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe awa'difo amuti 'da ni eyini imbata fezu 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi dri risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuhutuura n'obuhwezi, abantu bakahendera baamanya amaani agakozirwe okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ekyarugiremu,ekitongore kikasiimwa ahabw'okwegyesa abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote empowerment and self-sufficiency, a community program was launched. Participants eagerly gathered to learn and develop new abilities that would enhance their personal and professional lives.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana n'okweyimirizaawo, enteekateeka y'ekitundu yatongozebwa. Abeetabamu baakungaana n'obwagazi okuyiga n'okukulaakulanya obusobozi obupya obwanditumbudde obulamu bwabwe obw'obuntu n'obw'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tic ki kero pa lwak, kicako yub me konyo lwak. Dano ma gubedo tye i yub eni gugure me pwonyo ki dongo diro manyen ma twero medo rwom me kwo gi ki rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolorite aitigogongio keda aijar naka itunga, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuka atutubet. Apotu itunga lu ajaas atukokinos kanu aisisia ka aitolomun acoasinei nuitetiak nuepedorete aitojokar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma okpo otuzu dika eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otita azi ongulumu eyini ni. Ba emu'ba 'diyi tra eyi avasi onita onizu azini ondua o'diru eyini ecozu eyi ma edri eyi ma ngulupi ni azini azi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho amaani n'okwebaisaho, puroguraamu y'ekyanga ekatongozibwa. Abeejumbiremu baketeeranira hamwe n'omuhimbo kwega n'okutunga emyoga misya erikubaasa kutunguura amagara gaabo g'omuntu buntu hamwe n'ag'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments, a crucial gathering has been scheduled to address key national issues. Leaders from various sectors will convene to discuss strategies and policies, with the prime minister taking the lead.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso gye buvuddeko, olukungaana olukulu lutegekeddwa okukola ku nsonga z'eggwanga enkulu. Abakulembeze okuva mu bitongole eby'enjawulo bajja kutuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka n'enkola, nga ssaabaminisita y'akulembeddemu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, kiyubu kacoke ma pire tek me lok I kom lok mapigi tego me lobo. Lutela ma aa ki I tenge mapat-pat gubi rwate me nywako tam I kom yub ki cik mapat-pat, ki lawii coko pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac, itemokinitai airiamun naepol noi kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuka akwap. Epote engarenok luka iriongeta luegelegela airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin keda ainapeta, ido eminisita lokapolon ngesi engarenikinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba otu mitingi azi okporu ni e'yo okporu kari ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Drice'ba enga'ba esele ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi nga eyi tra e'yo otuta ni azini azita eyi ma dria, drice'ba minista eyini 'diyi ma drileru.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka eriho obwahati,hotebekanisiibwe orukiiko rw'amaani kukora aha nshonga nkuru z'eihanga. Abebembezi kuruga omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, nibaza kubugana kuhanuura aha nkora n'ebiragiro, kandi engazi y'eihanga neija kwebembera.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seeking financial assistance often find themselves navigating a complex system of requirements and paperwork. As a result, it is a long process to access these loans.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abanoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi batera okwesanga nga balina ebisaanyizo n'ebiwandiiko bingi. N'ekivuddemu, kitwala ebbanga ddene okufuna looni zino.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gipenyo pi kony me lim ipol kare nongo gitye ka wot I yoo mapek me jami ma mite ki karatac mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, obedo yoo mabor tutwal me nongo lim den magi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu ekotosi agangat na ikapun ewanyunete ebe ibusakinit kesi aitodolikin iboro luipu ka apapulai nuipu. Kanuka ngun, ejai apak naepol noi kanu adumun ilonin lu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakarau azakoma robia niri lepi 'diyi eyi esu eyini geri e'yo eyini lezu azini kokobi eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, eri geri ezu mari 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikushaba obuhwezi omu by'empiiha, nibakira kweshangira nibagyendera aha birikwetengwa hamwe n'empapura nyingi. N'ekyarugiremu, nikitwara obwire bureingwa okutunga za rooni ezi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, many educators have faced increasing financial pressures due to rising living costs and stagnant salaries. As a result, they are seeking out community resources and networks to improve their financial literacy and access better financial options.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise abasomesa bangi boolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa mu by'ensimbi olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'emisaala okuyimirira. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya ebikozesebwa mu kitundu n'emikutu okutumbula okusoma kwabwe mu by'ensimbi n'okufuna enkola z'ensimbi ennungi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lupwonye mapol tye ka nongo peko me lim pi wel cam ki mucara matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo kony ki kubbe ikin lwak me medo rwom me ngec gi i kom lim ki nongo yoo me nongo lim maber.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina isisianakinak luipu keda ationis na ikapun naarai iyata etiai loka aijar keda atacio na eropit. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aimo iboro luepedorete aingarakin itunga luka atutubet kec aitojokar aijen kec naka ikapun ka adumun iponesio luajokak luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, imba'ba karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu azini musara eyini aa'zu pa sozu ri si. E'yo 'disi, eyi afa o'bi eyini 'diyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma onita e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu eyini ani ecozu geri robia esuzu muke ndeni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abegyesa baingi batungire oburemeezi bw'esente obweyongyeire ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire hamwe n'emishaara y'abashomesa eyeyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibaronda obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu n'emikutu y'empurizagana kwenda kwongyera aha bwengye bwabo omu by'esente n'okutunga oburyo burungi bw'okutunga esente.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve education quality and support local communities, the government has announced a significant funding initiative. This initiative aims to empower teacher groups across the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka y'obuyambi ey'amaanyi. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula ebibiina by'abasomesa mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki konyo lwak, gamente otyeko cwalo cente madit tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me tyelo kor gurup pa lupwonye I but piny eni weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar adoketait na asioman ka aigang itunga luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ikapun luipu noi. Alosikinet na erai aitigogong igurupun lu isisianakinak katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo angiri robia fezu ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma asisile lezu okpo fezu amuti imba'ba eyini angu 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese n'okuhwera abantu b'omubyaro,gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka y'esente nyingi. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura guruupu z'abegyesa omu kyanga kyona.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the proposals submitted, the committee has decided to allocate financial support to several deserving initiatives. As a result, three organizations from different regions have received the funds.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ennyo ebiteeso ebyaweebwayo, akakiiko kasazeewo okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezisaanira. N'ekyavaamu, ebitongole bisatu okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo bifunye ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo matut tam ma kimiyo, dul ne omoko tamgi me miyo kony me lim bot dul mapat-pat ma opore me timo ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat adek ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat gunongo lim ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aomisio nu ijaikitai, abu ekomiti itutub agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi aswamisio nuipu. Kanuka ngun, adumutu iriongeta iuni luka aiboisio nuegelegela ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'bale 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'du e'yo atita robia ni 'diyi fezu e'yo ndundu orodriru 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, amuti na engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu robia 'da 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebiteiso ebyaheirweyo, akakiiko kashazireho kuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente omu nteekateeka nyingi ezirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bishatu kuruga omu byanga ebitarikushushana bitungire esente.

eng_prompt: In today's challenging economic climate, educators are increasingly seeking additional sources of income. As a result, many teachers have turned to entrepreneurship to supplement their salaries.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna enzibu ey'ennaku zino, abasomesa beeyongera okunoonya ensibuko z'ensimbi endala. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa bangi baddukidde mu byobusuubuzi okwongera ku misaala gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye matek tutwal, lupwonye tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me nongo cente. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye mapol gucako timo biacara me medo mucara gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun, eutasi isisianakinak aimo iponesio ice luka adumun ikapun. Kanuka ngun, alomasi isisianakinak luipu agwelanar kanu aiyatakin eropit kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia, imba'ba eyi curu'do geri azi eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi nda. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba karakara eyi oja eyi tujari 'yezu eyi ma musara otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu buremeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwa hati, abegyesa nibaronda oburugo bw'entaasya obundi. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa baingi batandikire kukora bizinesi kwenda kwongyera aha mishaara yaabo.

eng_prompt: Due to unexpected expenses and a decline in donations, the organization faced a severe budget shortfall. As a result, they struggled to distribute funds to all the educators in need.
lug_prompt: Olw'ensaasaanya etasuubirwa n'okukendeera kw'obuyambi, ekitongole kyafuna ebbula ly'ensimbi lingi. N'ekyavaamu, baalwana okugabira abasomesa bonna abali mu bwetaavu obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Pi cente ma kitiyo kwede ma pe byek tye I komgi kacel ki nok pa kony ma kimiyo, dul ne onongo peko me byek lim madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ki peko me poko cente bot lupwonye ma lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitosom ikapun lu mam eomitai ka aitidisiar agangat, abu erionget kodum ekadakada lo ebajet. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itereikina aikor ikapun mama ejaasi isisianakinak kere lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Aje ayuza 'bani ega kokoru azini afa feza ma omgbo esizu risi, amuti 'da esu e'yo robia ayuza niri ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu e'yo ewaru robia awazu imba'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshohoza etarikuteekateekwaho hamwe n'okukyendeera kw'obuhwezi, ekitongore kikashanga eibura ry'embaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, bakarwana kugabira abegyesa boona abatarikwebaasa esente.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous fundraising efforts and promises of support, many groups are still waiting for financial assistance. This delay has left them struggling to continue their vital work in the community.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okukungaanya kw'ensimbi okungi n'ebisuubizo by'obuyambi, ebibiina bingi bikyalindiridde obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Okulwawo kuno kubalese nga balwana okugenda mu maaso n'emirimu gyabwe emikulu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub tye me jogo cente ki cikke me miyo kony, gurup mapol pud tye kakuru kony me cente. Galle eni oweko gubedo ki peko me mede ki ticgi mapire tek I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aswamisio nuka aituk ikapun keda aisumuneta nuka agangat, eringa igurupun luipu idaritos agangat na ikapun. Aiyap na ajalakisi kesi etiono ainyikokin aswamukec na epol ajokis kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani robia trazu karakara 'diyi ma talasi azini owita atita fezu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti karakara eyi nga po'di atita robia niri te. Sa'wa ezaza 'di fe eyini dri ci muzu drile azi eyini okporu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri be.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani maingi g'okurundaana esente hamwe n'ebiraganiso by'obuhwezi, guruupu nyingi zikiriyo nizirinda obuhwezi bw'esente. Okukyerererwa oku kubarekire nibarwana kugumizamu n'emirimo yaabo y'omugasho omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming community event, the organizers are seeking to increase participation. To achieve this goal, the group leaders are asked to mobilise more people to join them.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mukolo gw'ekitundu ogujja, abategesi banoonya okwongera okwetaba. Okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa kino, abakulembeze b'ebibiina basabiddwa okukunga abantu abalala okubeegattako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub me tedero matye kabino anyim, luyub tye ka yenyo yoo me medo wel dano matye ka bedo tye. Me cobo miti eni, ki lego lutela me gurup me rweyo dano mapol me donyo I gurupgi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos epucit lo ebunit, ekotosi lu itemonokinak aiyatakin ajaut. Kanu aitodolikin alosikinet na, elimokitai engarenok lu igurupun aisinyikokin itunga luipu alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: Yeta ongulumu eyini emuzu ri ma e'yo si, 'ba otupi 'diyi le 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe otu. Asisile 'diri esuzu, 'ba ai drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba karakara eyi trazu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omukoro gw'ekyanga ogurikwija kubaho, abatebekanisa nibenda kwongyera aha bakeetabamu. Okuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa eki, abebembezi b'ebibiina nibashabwa kurundana abantu baingi kubagaitaho.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seeking financial support often turn to microfinance banks for loans. However, they quickly discover that the terms offered are not as favorable as they had hoped.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abanoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi batera okudda mu bbanka z'ebyensimbi okufuna looni. Newankubadde, bakizuula mangu nti obukwakkulizo obubaweebwa si bulungi nga bwebabadde basuubira.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gimito nongo kony me lim pol kare gidok bot beng matino tino me gamo lim adena. Kadi bed kumeno, ginongo oyot-oyot ni cik ma kimiyo ni pe ber kit ma gubedo ki gen kwede.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu ekotosi agangat na ikapun elosenenete aingadisia nuka ikapun kanu ilonin. Konye, apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe mam ikisila lu ijaikitai ejok kwape lu aomitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara atita robia niri lepi 'diyi eyi oja eyi ero robia ta mbazu omvele microfinance bank ru 'diyi vu mari esuzu. Kani si, eyi esu mbeleru kini azita fele 'diyi ovuni muke eyini egarisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwenda obuhwezi omu by'empiiha, nibaza omu banka z'eby'empiiha kutunga za rooni. Kwonka, nibamanya juba ngu obukwakurizo oburikubaheebwa tiburungi nk'oku babaire nibateekateeka.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among different organizations is essential for achieving common goals. However, there are instances where this cooperation is lacking.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'ebitongole eby'enjawulo ya mugaso mu kutuukiriza ebigendererwa eby'awamu. Kyokka waliwo ebiseera omukago guno we gubulamu.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin dule ma padi padi pire tek tutwal me cobo miti gi. Kadi bed kumeno, tye kare ma winye man peke.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kiding iriongeta luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin apeleikinata. Konye, icie apakio emamei aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi esuzu. Kani si, e'yo azi ti icita 'di ni ovuzu yo 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Enkoragana ahagati y'ebitongore ebitarikushushana n'ey'omugasho omu kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabyo. Kwonka, hariho oburemeezi obu okukwatanisa oku kurikuba kutariho.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the unique challenges faced by their communities, the educators gathered to discuss ways to enhance local involvement in education. They believed that empowering grassroots initiatives would lead to more effective solutions tailored to the needs of the village.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo ebitundu byabwe kwe bisanga, abasomesa baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula okwetaba kw'abantu mu byenjigiriza. Baalowooza nti okutumbula enteekateeka z'oku ntikko kyandiviiriddeko okugonjoola ebizibu okusinziira ku byetaago by'ekyalo.
ach_prompt: Pien guniang peko mapat-pat matye I kabedo gi, lupwonye gucokke me nywako tam i kom kit me medo rwom me kwan pa lutedero. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni tyelo kor yub ma aa ki bot lwak obi kelo yoo me cobo peko mapat-pat malube ki miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda atutubena kec, apotu isisianakinak kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokaret ajaut keda itunga luka atutubet toma asioman. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitigogong aswamisio nuka itunga luka atutubet epedori ayangaun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok lu itodolikinete ipudesia luka ecaalo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, imba'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri otuzu onita ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini okpo feza e'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria ri ni nga fe e'yo otuza kililiru 'diyi esu angu 'da ma e'yo lepi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'omutaano obu abantu baabo barikurabamu, abegyesa bakateerana kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okureetaho okwejumba kw'abantu omu by'obwegyese. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okutunguura enteekateeka z'ahansi nikiija kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza ebyetaago by'ekyaro.

eng_prompt: Many educators face significant financial challenges due to low salaries and rising living costs. As a result, public school teachers are highly indebted.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi olw'emisaala emitono n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa mu masomero ga gavumenti babanja nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol nongo peko me lim pi mucara matidi ki wel cente madwong ma mite me kwo. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye me gangi kwan pa gamente gitye ki banya mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nu ikapun kanu iropito lu ikidioko ka aijar na ikiara. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi isisianakinak luka isomeroi luka apugan keda apesenin nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu e'yo musara eyini aa'zu were risi azini aje eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo tuzu risi. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba sukulu gameteni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi mari be angiri.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente ahabw'emishaara mikye hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa b'amashomero ga gavumenti baine amabanja maingi.

eng_prompt: Many educators are passionate about their work and dedicate countless hours to their students, yet they often find themselves struggling financially. Despite their important role in shaping future generations, the compensation they receive falls short of meeting basic living expenses.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi baagala nnyo emirimu gyabwe era bawaayo obudde bungi nnyo eri abayizi baabwe, naye batera okwesanga nga balwanagana mu by'ensimbi. Ng'oggyeko omulimu gwabwe omukulu mu kubumba omulembe ogujja, okuliyirira kwe bafuna kukendedde mu kutuukiriza ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol gimaro tic gi tutwal dok gitiyo ki cawa malac tutwal pi lutino kwangi, ento ipol kare ginongo ni gitye ki peko me lim. Kadi bed ni gitiyo tic mapire tek me yubu anyim, cul ma ginongo pe romo cobo miti me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu eminasi aswamukec ido itosomaete isawan luipu kanu esisiak kec, konye etapit kesi ajaut keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Karaida ejaasi kesi keda aswam naepol noi naka aitolomun iraan lu oingaren, mam atacio na edumunenete kesi epedori aitodolikin aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi ava be azi eyivile 'diyi ma dria dika eyi sa'wa fe sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyini sa'wa karakara, te eyi sa'wa driasi eyi esu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea. Erini tro ovuzu azi orodriruni ngazu ewu drialeri ma alea ra ti, ofeta eyini esu ri cani afa eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibakunda munonga emirimo yaabo kandi nibamara eshaaha nyingi omu kwegyesa abeegi baabo, kwonka nibakira kwesanga bari omu mbeera mbi y'esente. N'obu baraabe nibakora omurimo gw'omugasho omu kukora eminyeeto y'omumaisho, okushumbuusibwa okubarikutunga tikurikuhika aha byetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain academic integrity and ensure that students receive a well-rounded education, the district has implemented strict guidelines for resource allocation. As a result, the district education officer doesn't allow teachers to practice multiple borrowing.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obulungi bw'ebyenjigiriza n'okukakasa nti abayizi bafuna obuyigirize obulungi, disitulikiti etaddewo ebiragiro ebikakali ku nkozesa y'ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti takkiriza basomesa kwewola mirundi mingi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko ber bedo pa lutino kwan ki neno ni lutino tye ka nongo pwony maber, district oketo cik matek tutwal I tic me poko jami. Macalo adwogi ne, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan i district pe yee ki lupwonye me deno lim tyen mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar asioman najokan ka awanyun ebe edumunenete esisiak asioman najokan, etolomu edisitrikt ainapeta nuikamunitos aikor iboro. Kanuka ngun, mam eswaman loka asioman ko disitrikt ecamakinit isisianakinak aijaun ilonin luipu.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi onita kililiru ri esu, distrikiti 'ba azita okporu 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba onita ni distrikiti'a ri fe imba'ba eyini mari 'duzu karakara ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda oburungi bw'eby'obwegyese n'okureeba ngu abeegi batunga obwegyese burungi, disiturikiti eteireho ebiragiro by'amaani omu kugaba ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, orikukurira eby'obwegyese aha disiturikiti, tarikwikiriza abegyesa kweguza emirundi mingi.

eng_prompt: The community has been facing significant financial challenges, making it difficult for families to meet their basic needs. To address this issue, the organization is offering loans to support local residents in their efforts to achieve financial stability.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'enfuna, ekizibuwaza amaka okutuukiriza ebyetaago byaago ebikulu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, ekitongole kiwola ssente okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu mu kaweefube w'okufuna obutebenkevu mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka nongo peko me lim ma oweko obedo tek tutwal ki lugangi me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Me tyeko peko man, dul ne tye ka miyo lim adena me konyo lutedero me nongo lim maber.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuipu nuka ikapun, einakini ationis ikalia aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, euta erionget aijaikin ilonin kanu aigangit itunga luka atutubet kanu adumun ainapakina naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu, erini fezu familia eyini aa'zu ewaru afa eyini lele aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti 'da ni loni eyi fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini atita fezu okpo eyini 'bazu geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'entaasya, ekirikugumira amaka okuhikiiriza ebyetengo byago. Okukora aha nshonga egi,ekitongore kiriyo nikiheereza za rooni kuhwera abatuuragye omu nteekateeka yaabo y'okutunga obutebekana omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are seeking financial assistance to fund their projects. Fortunately, a new program has been introduced to provide loans to eligible applicants.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuvujjirira pulojekiti zaabwe. Ekirungi, enteekateeka empya etongozeddwa okuwa looni eri abo abalina ebisaanyizo okusaba.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo kony me lim pi yub gi. Ki gum maber, ki kati ki yub manyen me miyo lim den ki joo ma opore me nongo lim den.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo agangat na ikapun kanu aigang ipurojektin kec. Arereng najokan, aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aijaikin ilonin mama ejaasi ngul lu ekotoi.

eng_prompt: The new initiative aims to address the pressing challenges faced by the local community. By implementing sustainable practices and providing essential resources, the project seeks to foster economic growth and social well-being.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okukola ku kusoomoozebwa okw'amangu abantu b'omu kitundu kwe basanga. Mu kuteeka mu nkola enkola eziwangaala n'okuwa ebintu ebikulu, pulojekiti enoonya okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Yub manyen eni tye ki miti me tyeko peko mapol ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye. I yoo me keto yub eni itic ki miyo jami ma mite, yub eni tye ki miti me medo rwom me lim ki rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Alosikinet naka ainapeta nuitetiak erai aitemokin atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubet. Kowai lo aitodolikin iponesio luajokak ka aijanakin iboro lu itwasamao, ekot epurojekt aitopolor apol naka ikapun keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Otita o'diru 'da le e'yo ewaru 'ba angu ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza ko. Otita 'di le zota e'yo robiani azini geri o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo otu.

eng_prompt: The community had long awaited a project of this magnitude, one that promised to transform their landscape and improve their quality of life. Excitement buzzed in the air as residents gathered to witness a historic moment.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyali kilindiridde okumala ebbanga ddene pulojekiti ey'amaanyi ng'eno, eyasuubiza okukyusa ensi yaabwe n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe. Essanyu lyabunye mu bbanga ng'abatuuze bakungaanidde okulaba akaseera ak'ebyafaayo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kakuru pi kare malac yub ma dit kuman, ma ocikke me loko kabedo gi ki ilo malo rwom me kwo gi. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gucokke me neno gin ma otimme I kare macon.
teo_prompt: Auta itunga aidar apak naepol noi epurojekt lo epol noi, lo ebeit aijulakin aiboisio kec ka aitojokar aijar kec. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu asesen akiro nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da te sa'wa ezu otita azi okporu 'dile ni, azi ngapi eyi ma angu ojazu dika eyi ma edri otuzu. Ayiko fu angu ma alia 'ba angu ma alia 'diyini yi trazu e'yo adi ni 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakaba batwire bategyereize purogyekiti y'amaani nk'egi, erikubaraganisa kuhindura emyanya yaabo n'okutunguura omutindo gw'emituurire yaabo. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okuba baketeeranira hamwe kureeba ekiro ky'ebyafaayo.

eng_prompt: We are eager to understand the unique needs of your institution and explore potential collaborations. Can you elaborate on how our offerings align with your goals?
lug_prompt: Tuli beetegefu okutegeera ebyetaago by'ettendekero lyo eby'enjawulo n'okunoonyereza ku nkolagana ezisoboka.
ach_prompt: Watye ki miti madit tutwal me niang miti pa gang kwan megwu ki bene neno kit ma watwero winye kwede.

eng_prompt: Our home is a place of warmth and hospitality. We take pride in creating an inviting atmosphere for everyone who visits.
lug_prompt: Amaka gaffe kifo kya bbugumu n'okusembeza abagenyi. Twenyumiriza mu kutondawo embeera ey'okwaniriza buli muntu akyalira.

teo_prompt: Erai orekosi aiboisit na isiyalamikit ka aijaun itunga. Isiyalamikit sio kanu aitolomun ejautene lo ijaunit itunga kere lu ipejok.

eng_prompt: As the event gained popularity, various regions expressed interest in contributing to its success. Consequently, several local groups began forming to help coordinate the logistics and activities.
lug_prompt: Omukolo bwe gwagenda gweyongera okumanyika, ebitundu eby'enjawulo byalaga obwagazi okuwagira obuwanguzi bwagwo. N'ekyavaamu, ebibiina by'ebitundu eby'enjawulo byatandika okutondebwawo okuyambako okukwasaganya ebyentambula n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub eni omede ki yweka, but lobo mapat-pat bene onyuto miti gi me konyo I yub eni. Macalo adwogi ne, gurup me tedero mapol gucako kati me konyo yubu jami ki tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejenara noi epucit ngol, apotu aiboisio nuipu itodutu eipud loka aingarakin kanu akerianut ke. Kanuka ngun, apotu igurupun lu atutubet ogeutu aitolomun kanu aingarakin aitemonokin iboro ka aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ni ecaria ru, angu ndundu eyi e'da ava eyini azi ngazu drile suza erini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu karakara angu ma alia 'diyi e'do yi e'do azakoma fezu e'yo 'bani 'ba yi ojizu azini e'yo yi 'yezu 'diyi ma ti ojizu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and organizing, we have finalized all the arrangements. The team has worked diligently to ensure everything is in place for the event.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tuteekateeka, tumalirizza enteekateeka zonna. Ttiimu ekoze n'obunyiikivu okulaba nga buli kimu kitegekeddwa ku mukolo.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, angetakin sio aitemonokineta kere. Iswamat etimu kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe itemokitai iboro kere kanuka epucit.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otuta 'yezu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, ama de otuta dria 'bo. Amuti 'da nga azi okporu nezu ra kini e'yo dria pari 'du e'yo 'da ni.
