eng_prompt: The annual festival attracts thousands of visitors from neighboring regions. As a result, local businesses thrive and benefit significantly from the influx of tourists.
lug_prompt: Ekivvulu ky'omwaka kisikiriza enkumi n'enkumi z'abagenyi okuva mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo. N'ekivuddemu, bizinensi z'omu kitundu zikulaakulana era ziganyulwa nnyo mu kujja kw'abalambuzi.
ach_prompt: Kwer man ma time mwaka ki mwaka kelo wele mapol tutwal ki I but lobo matye cok. Macalo adwogi ne, biacara me tedero dongo dok ginongo magoba madit tutwal ki I kom jo ma bino ka limo piny.
teo_prompt: Ingalauni epucit ngol ngol ekaru ipejok luipu kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare. Kanuka ngun, epoloete ibiasaran luka atutubet kosodete aimedaun kanejaas itunga lu elatok.
lgg_prompt: Omu eli vusi ri ni omu eyi eji engazu angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea alifu alifu. E'yo 'disi, tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tu ra dika eyi orodri esu angiri engazu 'ba emupi angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'okujaguza buri mwaka nigureeta enkumi n'enkumi z'abagyenyi kuruga omu byanga ebiri haihi. N'ekyarugiremu, bizinesi z'omubyaro nizikura kandi nizigasirwa munonga omu kutaha kw'abarambuzi.

eng_prompt: The hotel staff worked tirelessly to ensure every detail was perfect for their visitors. With a focus on wellness and comfort, they aimed to create a welcoming environment.
lug_prompt: Abakozi ba wooteeri baakola butaweera okulaba nga buli kintu kiba kirungi eri abagenyi baabwe. Nga essira balitadde ku bulamu obulungi n'obutebenkevu, baluubirira kutondawo embeera ey'okwaniriza.
ach_prompt: Lutic me otel gutiyo matek tutwal me neno ni jami weng tye maber pi wele gi. Ki keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber bedo ki ber bedo, miti gi obedo me kelo kabedo me jolo dano.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu eoteri iswamata agogongu kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna noi aiboisio kere kanuka ipejok kec. Keda apodokinit nuka aijar najokan keda aijar najokan, apotu kesi okotosi aitolomun aiboisit na ijaunet.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba hoteli ni 'diyi nga azi okposi nezu ra kini e'yo dria yi onyiru omu yini 'diyi dri. Asi 'baza be alata ma dria, eyi le angu 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ri edezu.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi ba hoteeri bakakora n'amaani okureeba ngu buri kimwe kiba kihikire aha bagyenyi baabo. Ahabw'okuta amaani aha magara marungi n'obwegyendesereza, bakagyezaho kureetaho embeera erikwakiira abantu.

eng_prompt: Our district is known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Visitors often come to explore the various sites and experiences we have to offer.
lug_prompt: Disitulikiti yaffe emanyiddwa olw'ebyafaayo byayo eby'obugagga n'ebyobuwangwa ebinyuma. Abagenyi batera okujja okwetegereza ebifo eby'enjawulo n'ebyo bye tulina okuwaayo.
ach_prompt: Dictrikwa ngene pi tekwaro ki tekwaro ma beco tutwal. Wele ipol kare bino ka neno kabedo ki jami ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ejenara edisitriktakosi kanu akiro nukolo keda nuka einono. Eponenete ipejok airereonor aiboisio nuegelegela keda iboro lu ijanakinete oni.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni distrikiti amavileri e'yo ewu agapi 'bo 'diyisi tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie. Omu eyi emu sa'wa driasi angu ndundu eyi onezu tualu e'yo ndundu amani esu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Disiturikiti yaitu nemanywa ahabw'ebyafaayo byayo n'eby'obuhangwa. Abagyenyi buriijo nibaija kurambura emyanya etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'ebintu ebitarikushushana ebi twine.

eng_prompt: As new drilling projects are initiated, local infrastructure and services are expected to expand significantly. This influx of activity will create numerous opportunities for businesses and residents alike.
lug_prompt: Nga pulojekiti z'okusima eby'obugagga ebyomuttaka empya zitandikibwawo, ebikozesebwa n'obuweereza mu kitundu bisuubirwa okugaziwa ennyo. Okuyingira kw'emirimu kuno kujja kutondawo emikisa mingi eri abasuubuzi n'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kicako yub manyen me tongo tangi, jami ma konyo dano ki kony bene bimedde tutwal. Medde pa tic man bikelo gum mapol tutwal pi biacara ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kwape egeunere ipurojektin luitetiak luka aibok alupok, eomitai ebe epote aiboisio keda aijanakino naka itunga aiyatakin noi. Ebuni aswamisioit ngin aitolomun arerengesio nuipu kanuka ibiasaran keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita o'diru e'doria, afa ayuzaru azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni nga tu ra. E'yo 'di ni nga drileba fe tujari eyini tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obu purogyekiti nsya z'okutimba zaatandika, ebyombeko hamwe n'obuheereza nibiteekateekwaho kweyongyera munonga. Okweyongyera kw'emirimo, nikwija kureetaho emigisha mingi omu by'obushubuzi hamwe n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: The government has announced a series of new initiatives aimed at improving economic opportunities for low-income families. As a result of these efforts, there will be a poverty reduction.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya ezigendereddwamu okutumbula emikisa gy'ebyenfuna eri amaka agafuna ssente entono. Olw'okufuba kuno, wajja kubaawo okukendeera kw'obwavu.
ach_prompt: Gamente otito pi yub mapol manyen ma ki keto pi ilo malo rwom me lim pi gangi matye ki cente manok. Macalo adwogi me tute magi, can bi dwogo piny.
teo_prompt: Alimo apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotore aitojokar arerengesio nuka ikapun mama ejaasi ikalia lu ikidioko ikapun. Kanuka aswamisio nu, epote ican aitidisiar.
lgg_prompt: Gamete azi e'yo o'diru 'bani lezu drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu familia lonyi be were 'diyi dri. Okpo 'diyi ma e'yosi, alio ma omgbo ni nga esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'entaasya y'amaka againe entaasya nkye. Ahabw'amaani aga, nihaija kubaho okukyendeeza obworo.

eng_prompt: Collaborating with international firms can enhance our product offerings. By leveraging their expertise, we can ensure that we deliver exceptional quality to our customers.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana ne kampuni z'ensi yonna kisobola okutumbula ebyamaguzi byaffe. Nga tukozesa obukugu bwabwe, tusobola okukakasa nti tuwa bakasitoma baffe eby'omutindo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Winye ki kampuni ma aa ki lobo mawoko twero medo rwom me jami ma watye kwede. Ka watiyo ki ngec gi, watwero neno ni wamiyo jami ma rwomgi lamal bot luwil wa.
teo_prompt: Aswam nepepe keda ikampunin luka akwapin ace epedori aitojokar iboro luitolomete oni. Kowai lo aitwasam acoasineikec, ipedori oni aanyun ebe ijaikini oni agwelak wok iboro luejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita amuti kari eselia 'diyi pie ri eco ama vile afa ozizaru 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo yini ni 'diyi ma ayuza si, ama eco ne ra kini ama afa onyiru 'diyi eji aje'ba ama vile 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa na kampuni z'amahanga goona nikibaasa kutunguura ebintu byaitu. Twakoresa obukugu bwabo, nitubaasa kuhamya ngu turikuheereza abaguzi baitu ebintu by'omutindo gw'aheiguru.

eng_prompt: Effective crime prevention strategies require timely communication and collaboration between law enforcement and the community. Ensuring that the police are promptly informed of any suspicious activities can play a crucial role in maintaining public safety.
lug_prompt: Enkola ennungi ez'okutangira obumenyi bw'amateeka zeetaaga empuliziganya mu budde n'okukolagana wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'abantu b'omu kitundu. Okukakasa nti poliisi etegeezebwa amangu ku bikolwa byonna ebiteeberezebwa kisobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kukuuma obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Yub me gengo timo bal mito lok ki winye ikin abili ki lwak ikare ki kome. Neno ni ki niango abili oyot-oyot I kom tim mo keken ma byek tye I kome twero konyo tutwal I gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu itikitikere abilibilio naka ikisila ekotos aineranara ka aiswamanara kiding ipolisin keda itunga. Aanyun ebe elimonorio ipolisin katipet nuikamunitos aswamisinei nu eomitai ebe iswamaete ejok kanu aidar ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo onzi atrizu kililiru 'diyi le e'yo nzeza azini ti icita 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie sa'wa dria. E'yo 'bani polisi eyini e'yo ecezu mbeleru e'yo azi 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma dria ri ni nga azi okporu 'ye o'bi eyi ma agei tema ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okuzibira ebihagaro neeyetenga empurizagana n'okukwatanisa ahagati y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro hamwe n'abantu. Okureeba ngu poriisi emanyisibwa bukiri kare ebikorwa byona ebirikuteekwateekwaho, nikibaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda oburinzi bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have shown the detrimental effects of smoking on health. As a result, public health campaigns have increasingly focused on raising awareness about the risks associated with tobacco use.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okungi kulaga obulabe bw'okunywa sigala ku bulamu. N'ekivuddemu, kampeyini z'ebyobulamu mu bantu zeeyongedde okussa essira ku kumanyisa abantu ku kabi akali mu kukozesa taaba.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto ni mato taa tye ki adwoki marac i kom yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me miyo ngec i kom peko ma aa ki I mato taa obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yub me miyo ngec i kom peko ma aa ki I mato taa.
teo_prompt: Apotu aingic naepol itodutu atiokisio nuka aimat esigala. Kanuka ngun, isingarenitos ikampeins luka angaleu nuka itunga aisisianakin itunga atiokisio nuikamunitos aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo onzi taba seza ni 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ti odaza e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ba asi o'bi eyini mile ozizu e'yo onzi taba ma ayuza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kworeka oburemeezi bw'okureesa aha magara. N'ekyarugiremu, ehururu z'eby'amagara g'abantu zigumire nizigyenderera okumanyisa abantu akabi akari omu kukoresa etaabe.

eng_prompt: Farmers are increasingly turning to industrial agriculture methods to maximize their yields. By leveraging advanced technology and efficient practices, they can significantly reduce costs and increase output.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beeyongedde okudda ku nnima ey'amakolero okusobola okwongera ku makungula gaabwe. Nga bakozesa tekinologiya ow'omulembe n'enkola ennungi, basobola okukendeeza ennyo ku nsaasaanya n'okwongera ku bifulumizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lupur tye ka cako tic ki cuma me pur me medo kac gi. I yoo me tic ki diro me tet manyen ki diro me tic maber, gitwero dwoko piny wel jami ma mite ki medo rwom me jami ma giyubu.
teo_prompt: Eutasi akoriok aijulakin aiboisio nu akoru kanu aiyatakin esakec. Kowai lo aitwasam etatai loakwana keda iponesio luajokak, epedorete kesi aitidisiar itiaisinei luipu ka aiyatakin akoru.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi curuꞌdo eꞌyo amvu ꞌyazu ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ꞌye amvu ꞌyazu ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma dria. Geri afa ndundu eyi edezu o'diru 'diyi ayuzu risi, eyi eco aje ma omgbo esi dika afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa beeyongyeire kwejunisa emiringo y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ey'amakorero okubaasa kwongyera aha musharuura gwabo. Kurabira omu kukoresa tekinorogye ey'omurembe n'emitwarize mirungi, nibabaasa kukyendeeza aha nshohoza n'okwongyera aha by'amasharuura.

eng_prompt: The demand for charcoal has been a significant driver of deforestation in many regions. By finding alternative energy sources, we can reduce the pressure on forests and promote sustainable land use.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'amanda buviiriddeko nnyo okusaanyaawo ebibira mu bitundu bingi. Mu kunoonya ensibuko z'amasannyalaze endala, tusobola okukendeeza ku puleesa ku bibira n'okutumbula enkozesa y'ettaka mu ngeri ey'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Miti me mako maka obedo gin ma okelo tongo yadi I but lobo mapol. Ka wanongo yoo mukene me nongo mac, watwero dwoko piny lyeto matye I kom bunga ki medo rwom me tic ki ngom.
teo_prompt: Eipuda lo atotol erai lo eyangaunit atubutubio na ikito kotoma aiboisio nuipu. Kowai lo aimo iponesio ice luka aitwasam akim, ipedori oni aitidisiar ariebo naka amagoron ka aitopolor aitwasam alupok koipone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa 'bani maka eyi lezu ri ebi ovu e'yo okporu e'yo pati eyi ogazu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea ri i. Geri aci esuzu ndu ndu 'diyisi, ama eco okpo fe pati eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi dika ama eco angu ayu kililiru ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetenga amakara, nikwo kureesireho okutema emiti omu byanga bingi. Twaronda oburugo bw'amashanyarazi obundi, nitubaasa kukyendeeza aha buremeezi bw'ebibira n'okureetaho enkora nungi y'eitaka.

eng_prompt: Many organizations are working to provide sustainable livelihoods for displaced individuals. One such initiative focuses on empowering refugees through skill development and job opportunities.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bingi bikola okuteekawo embeera z'obulamu ez'olubeerera eri abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebyo kwe kuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu okufuna obukugu n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Dule mapol tye ka tic me miyo kwo maber ki joo ma orwenyo gangi gi. Yub acel ma kit meno keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo kero pa luring ayela kun gitiyo ki diro ki gum me nongo tic.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete iriongeta luipu kanu aijaikin aijar naejok nejaas itunga lu aponi itobwounai. Adiopet koboro kwape kangun erai aitigogong ikerai kowai lo aitopoloun acoa ka adumun aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi azi nga geri aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi fezu 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi dri. Otita alu 'dile 'diyi asi 'ba okpo feza emunyale eyini ri ma dria geri ondua otuzu azini drileba azi ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore bingi biriyo nibikorera kureebeka ngu abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo babaasa kwebaisaho. Enteekateeka emwe nk'egyo neeta omutima aha kutunguura empungi kurabira omu kutunguura emyoga n'emirimo.

eng_prompt: Many people underestimate the harmful effects of smoking on their health. It is important to understand the various ways in which smoking can impact bodily functions.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banyooma obulabe bw'okunywa sigala ku bulamu bwabwe. Kikulu okutegeera engeri ez'enjawulo okunywa sigala gye kikosaamu emirimu gy'omubiri.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe tamo I kom rac pa mato taa I kom yot komgi. Pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma mato taa balo kwede tic pa kom dano.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuka aimat esigala. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin iponesio luegelegela luepedoriata aimat esigala aitolitol eswamae loka akwan.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo onzi taba seza ni fe eyi ma rua ri ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo esi ku. Eri orodriru geri ndundu taba seza ni ecozu rua ma azi ezazu 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibarikufayo aha kabi akari omu kureesa aha magara gaabo. N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe ei okureesa kurikubaasa kuteganisa emirimo y'omubiri.

eng_prompt: Smoking has long been associated with a variety of serious health issues, including cancer and heart disease. Yet, the addictive nature of nicotine keeps a significant number of individuals hooked on this harmful habit.
lug_prompt: Okunywa sigala kibadde kikwatagana n'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'enjawulo omuli kookolo n'endwadde z'omutima. Newankubadde, omuze gw'okunywa nicotine guviiriddeko abantu bangi okwenyigira mu muze guno ogw'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Mato taa obedo ki kubbe pi kare malac ki peko me yot kom mapol, ma I kingi obedo cancer ki two aduno. Kadi bed kumeno, tic ki nicotine weko dano mapol bedo opii pa tim man marac-ci.
teo_prompt: Adaun apak naepol noi erucokinitere aimat esigala keda atiokisio nuipu nuka angaleu, aimoriarit ekansa keda adeka naka etau. Konye, epone loepedoriata itunga aimat nicotine einakinit itunga luipu ajaut keda eipone lo lo erono.
lgg_prompt: Taba seza ebi ovu sawa ezu ecizaru e'yo rua ala ni okporu 'diyi pie, azo cancer ni azini azo culuniri pie. Te, e'yo 'bani nicotine ma ayuza ma dria ri ni fe kalafe angiri 'ba eyini aa'zu 'yeta onzi 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okureesa kutwire nikukwatanisibwa n'oburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu kokoro n'endwara z'omutima. Kwonka, omuze gw'okunywa nicotine nigureetera abantu baingi kukoresa emize egi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the health risks associated with smoking have become increasingly evident. As a result, many groups are launching initiatives to raise awareness and promote healthier lifestyles.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, emitawaana gy'ebyobulamu egikwatagana n'okunywa sigala gyeyongedde okweyoleka. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina bingi bitongoza enteekateeka okumanyisa abantu n'okutumbula obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rac pa mato taa i kom dano omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gurup mapol tye ka cako yub me rweyo lwak i kom kit me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor atiokisio nuka aimat esigala. Kanuka ngun, eutasi igurupun luipu aitegear iboro lu isisianakinete itunga aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alia, e'yo onzi rua ala ni eyi ecipi taba seza be 'diyi e'bi eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi e'do otita eyini ani imbata fezu azini geri aa'zu alata be 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, akabi akarikuruga omu kureesa, keeyongyeire kweyoreka. N'ekyarugiremu, guruupu nyingi zitandikireho enteekateeka y'okumanyisa abantu n'okutunguura amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: The cultivation and use of tobacco have a long and complex history, dating back to ancient civilizations. Over the decades, the industry has evolved significantly, adapting to changing regulations and consumer preferences.
lug_prompt: Okulima n'okukozesa taaba kulina ebyafaayo ebiwanvu era ebitabuddwatabuddwa, okuva mu nkulaakulana ey'edda. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, amakolero gakyuse nnyo, nga gakwatagana n'okukyuka kw'amateeka n'ebyo abakozesa bye baagala.
ach_prompt: Puru ki tic ki taa obedo gin macon tutwal, cakke wa I kare macon. I mwaki ma okato angec, tic ne olokke tutwal, ma lubbe ki aloka loka pa cik ki miti pa luwil.
teo_prompt: Akoru keda aitwasamao na etaba ejaas keda akiro nukolo nukokau, ageun kapakio nukolo. Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi aswamisioit ngin, kotupitete aijulanakineta nuka ikisila keda ipudesia luka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Taba ma ezoza azini ayuza ma e'yo ewu drio 'diyi ma alia, e'dozu ewu drio 'diyi ma alia. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, okalamvu 'di oja i e'yo azita ojazu azini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma egata ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhinga n'okukoresa etaabe biine ebyafaayo biringwa kandi bigumire, kuruga omu bantu aba ira. Kumara emyaka mingi, eby'obushubuzi bihindukire munonga, kurugiirira aha mpindahinduka y'ebiragiro hamwe n'ebi abaguzi barikwenda.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote public health, local volunteers have organized a series of workshops. These sessions aim to raise awareness about various health risks and encourage healthier lifestyle choices.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu, bannakyewa mu kitundu bategese emisomo egy'enjawulo. Entuula zino zigendereddwamu okumanyisa abantu ku kabi akali mu byobulamu n'okukubiriza obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak, lutic me tedero guyubu kacoke me pwonye mapol. Yub eni tye me rweyo lwak i kom peko ma twero balo yotkom ki bene me cuku cwiny dano me yero yoo me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor angaleu naka itunga, etemokisi itunga luka atutubet aisisiaeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aisisianakin nuka atiokisio nu angaleu ka aisinyikokit itunga aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala otuzu, 'ba owi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu otita imbatani karakara eyi. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu o'bi eyini imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria tualu geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu ala be 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu, abarikwehayo omu byaro batebekaniise emishomo mingi. Enteerane ezi nizigyenderera okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha ndwara n'okureetaho amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Before you light up, consider the potential consequences for your health and the environment. Remember, the choice is yours, but it comes with responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kwokya, lowooza ku biyinza okuvaamu eri obulamu bwo n'obutonde bw'ensi. Jjukira nti okusalawo kwo, naye kijja n'obuvunaanyizibwa.
