teo_prompt: Erongo ijo icuma, oomoom nu epedori aswam kanuka angaleukon keda isuban lu akwap. Kiituni ebe erai aseunet kon, konye ebuni keda aswam.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi ecani ku, le mi ma ega e'yo mini eco 'ye mi ma rua ala ma dria tualu angu ama agei 'diyi pie ri ma dria ra. E'yo egazu, e'yo 'duza eri mini, te eri emu e'yo azi ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire, reeba ebirikubaasa kukwata aha magara gaawe hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Ijuka ngu okutoorana n'okwawe, kwonka nikwija n'obujunaanizibwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's efforts to implement legal reforms, many citizens remain skeptical about the effectiveness of the judicial system. As a result, Ugandan laws are not seriously taken into consideration.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti efubye okuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu mateeka, bannansi bangi bakyabuusabuusa enkola y'ekitongole ekiramuzi. N'ekivuddemu, amateeka ga Uganda tegafiibwako nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente tye ka yele me kelo aloka-loka I cik, dano mapol pud tye ki akala-kala I kom kit ma dul ma ngolo kop tiyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, pe kitamo tutwal I kom cik me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat apugan kagogong aitodolikin aijulanakineta nuka ikisila, itunga luipu erongo emamete keda aomisio nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ikatubok. Kanuka ngun, mam epodokinitai ikisila luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro okpo 'ba ojata e'yo azita ni ma alia 'diyi 'yezu ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi aa e'yo ega e'yo geri 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'duni azita kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi okporu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani ga gavumenti okureetaho empindahinduka omu biragiro, abatuuragye baingi tibarikwikiriza ngu enkora y'ekitongore ekiramuzi neekora kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiragiro bya Uganda tibirikutwarwa nka bikuru munonga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, public health campaigns have intensified, highlighting the dangers of smoking and its impact on society. As a result, lawmakers implemented stricter regulations to combat tobacco use and its associated crimes.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, kakuyege w'ebyobulamu ab'olukale yeeyongedde, ng'alaga obulabe bw'okunywa sigala n'engeri gye kikosaamu abantu. N'ekyavaamu, ababaka baateekawo amateeka amakakali okulwanyisa enkozesa ya taaba n'emisango egikwatagana nayo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me miyo ngec i kom yotkom pa lwak omede ki nyutu rac pa mato taa ki adwoki ne i kom lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, luwang lwak I ot moko cik guketo cik matek tutwal me lweny i kom mato taa ki bal mapat-pat makubbe kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakinos ikampeins luka angeleu, itodunitos atiokisio nuka aimat esigala keda epone loetiroritor ngesi itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu imeeban itolomutu ikisila lu itigogongoritai kanu aitikitik aimat esigala keda imusagon lu ikamanara keda ngun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu, e'yo onzi taba seza ni 'diyi ecezu tualu e'yo erini 'ye o'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi o'ba azita okporu 'diyi a'di 'dizu taba ma ayuza azini e'yo onzi 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ehururu y'eby'amagara g'abantu eyeyongyeire, erikworeka akabi akari omu kureesa hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha bantu. N'ekyarugiremu,abany'eishengyero bakataho ebiragiro by'amaani okurwanisa okukoresa etaabe hamwe n'ebihagaro ebirikukihikaho.

eng_prompt: Many cities have implemented strict regulations to protect public health. As a result, various laws have been enacted to limit smoking in shared environments.
lug_prompt: Ebibuga bingi biteekeddewo amateeka amakakali okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, amateeka ag'enjawulo gateereddwawo okukomya okunywa sigala mu bifo ebirimu abantu.
ach_prompt: Cities mapol guketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo cik mapol me gengo mato taa I kabedo ma dano mapol bedo iye.
teo_prompt: Apotu isitei luipu ibwaikisi ikisila lu ededeng kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ikisila luegelegela kanu aitikitik aimat esigala kotoma aiboisio nuetapit itunga aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo karakara eyi 'ba azita okporu 'diyi o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'ba azita ndundu eyi taba seza ma omgbo esizu angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Endembo nyingi ziteireho ebiragiro by'amaani okurinda amagara g'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiragiro bingi bitandikirweho okuzibira okureesa omu myanya erikushangwa abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have highlighted the adverse effects of smoking on overall health. Among these, the impact on cardiovascular health is particularly concerning.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kungi kuzudde obulabe bw'okunywa sigala ku bulamu okutwalira awamu. Mu bino, okukosa ku bulamu bw'omutima n'emisuwa kwe kweraliikiriza okusinga.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto adwoki marac ma mato taa kelo i kom yotkom pa dano. I kin magi, adwogi ne I kom yotkom pa cwiny dano obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aingic naepol itodunit atiokisio nuka aimat esigala kanu angaleu. Kanejaas nu, epodokinit noi nuikamunitos angaleu naka etau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo onzi taba seza ni 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo yi 'yepi azo culuniri ma rua ri ma dria ri eri asi otiza ru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kworeka oburemeezi bw'okureesa aha magara. Omuri ebi, ebirikukwata aha magara g'omutima n'emitsi nibyo bikuru munonga.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have linked tobacco use to various health issues. Among these, one of the most alarming consequences is the increased risk of developing cancer.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kungi kukwataganye okunywa taaba n'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, ekimu ku bisinga okweraliikiriza kwe kwongera kw'obulabe bw'okukwatibwa kookolo.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyutu ni mato taa kelo peko mapol i kom dano. I kin magi, adwogi acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal en aye medo gum me nongo two kanca.
teo_prompt: Aingic naepol itodunit eidicane loejai kiding aimat esigala keda atiokisio nuegelegela nuka angaleu. Kotoma akiro nu, idiopebore yenepol noi ngesi ationis na adumun ekansa.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza karakara eyi 'ba e'yo taba ma ayuza ni e'yo rua ala ni ndundu eyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo alu asi otizaru tu ri eri e'yo azo cancer niri esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kuhamize okukoresa etaabe n'oburemeezi bwingi aha magara. Omuri ebi, ekimwe aha birikukirayo kureetaho okwerarikirira n'oburemeezi bw'okukwatwa kokoro.

eng_prompt: Smoking has numerous harmful effects on health, particularly on the cardiovascular system. One of the most significant consequences is the impact it has on blood vessels.
lug_prompt: Okunywa sigala kikosa nnyo obulamu naddala obw'omutima n'emisuwa. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebivaamu kwe kukosa emisuwa gy'omusaayi.
ach_prompt: Mato taa tye ki adwoki marac mapol I kom yotkom, tutwalle kom dano. Adwogi acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye adwogi ne I kom remo.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi aimat esigala keda atiokisio nuipu noi mama ejaasi angaleu naka itunga kacut luka etau. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuepolok noi ngesi epone loepedoriata aokot.
lgg_prompt: Taba seza ni e'yo onzi eyi 'ye rua ala ma dria tutuni afa omvele heart and blood vessel system ru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo efupi okporu ndeni 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo erini 'ye ari ma ari ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okureesa nikureetaho oburemeezi bwingi aha magara, okukira munonga aha mitwarize y'omutima. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikubaasa kurugamu n'oburemeezi oburikukwata aha mitwe y'eshagama.

eng_prompt: Many people turn to smoking as a way to cope with stress and difficult emotions. However, research shows that this habit can actually exacerbate feelings of anxiety.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baddukira mu kunywa sigala ng'engeri y'okugumira okweraliikirira n'enneewulira enzibu. Wabula okunoonyereza kulaga nti omuze guno mu butuufu gusobola okwongera okweraliikirira.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gidok I mato taa macalo yoo me lweny I kom lworo ki par mapol. Kadi bed kumeno, kwed nyutu ni tim man twero medo lworo.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu egeunete aimat esigala kwape epone loka aitikitik aiyalongong keda aomisio nuetioko. Konye, itodunit aingic ebe epedori aswamisioit na aiyatakin aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi taba se geri 'bani ecozu e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Kani si, e'yo eti ondaza ece kini adriza 'di eco asi otiza ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibatandika kureesa nk'omuringo gw'okurwanisa okwerarikirira n'ebiteekateeko bigumire. Kwonka, okucondooza nikworeka ngu omuze ogu nigubaasa kwongyera okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing health concerns associated with smoking, many public health organizations are prioritizing studies on tobacco use. These investigations aim to better understand its impact on both individual health and society as a whole.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera okukwatagana n'okunywa sigala, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bingi bikulembeza okunoonyereza ku nkozesa ya taaba. Okunoonyereza kuno kugenderera kutegeera bulungi engeri gye kukosaamu obulamu bw'omuntu n'obw'ekitundu okutwaliza awamu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yoto kom matye kamede macalo adwogi me mato taa, dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom yoto kom tye ka keto cwinygi I kwed I kom mato taa. Kwed magi tye ki miti me niang maber adwogi ne I kom yotkom pa dano ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu naka aimat esigala, eutasi iriongeta luipu luka angaleu aisingarenit aisisia nuikamunitos aimat etaba. Alosikinet naka aingic kangin ngesi amisiikin ejok epone loepedoriata aijar naka itunganan keda itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala nisi taba seza ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti karakara e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi e'yo vuti ondaza taba ma ayuza ma dria 'diyi 'ba okporu. E'yo eti ondaza 'diyi lezu e'yo erini 'ye 'ba alu alu ma rua ala ma dria azini ongulumu ma dria 'diyi vazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire oburikukwata aha kureesa, ebitongore by'ebyamagara biriyo nibitandika kucondooza aha kukoresa etaabe. Okucondooza oku nikugyenderera kwetegyereza gye ebirikukwata aha magara g'omuntu n'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness of the health risks associated with smoking, many individuals continue to engage in tobacco use. This persistent habit affects millions globally, contributing to various health issues.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abantu bangi bamanyi akabi akali mu kunywa sigala, bangi beeyongera okumunywa. Omuze guno ogutaggwaawo gukosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu nsi yonna, ekiviiriddeko obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol tye ki ngec i kom rac pa mato taa, dano mapol pud tye ka mede ki mato taa. Tim man ma pe lokke ni balo kwo pa dano milion mapol I wilobo lung, ma okelo peko me yot kom mapol.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejenete itunga luipu atiokisio nuka aimat esigala, inyikokitos itunga luipu aimat esigala. Aswamisioit na naepol noi itolitoli imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuipu nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ni ta tro e'yo onzikanya taba seza ni 'diyi ma dria ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi mu taba seza ma alea drile. Adriza 'diri candi fe 'ba milioni karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi dri, dika eri fe e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okumanyisibwa kw'akabi akarikuruga omu kureesa, abantu baingi nibagumizamu n'okureesa etaabe. Omuze ogu ogurikuguma nigukwata abantu baingi omu nsi yoona, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have shown a strong correlation between tobacco use and various health issues. Among these, one of the most alarming consequences is the development of lung cancer.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okungi kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'okunywa taaba n'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, ekimu ku bisinga okweraliikiriza kwe kukulaakulanya kookolo w'amawuggwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto kubbe matek ikin mato taa ki peko me yot kom mapol. I kin magi, adwogi acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal obedo nongo two cancer me adunu.
teo_prompt: Apotu aingic naepol itodutu eidicane loepol noi kiding aimat esigala keda adekasinei nuegelegela. Kotoma ngun, ediopet kotoma atiokisio nueroko noi ngesi adumun ekansa loka iukoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo 'bani taba ma ayuza ma eselea e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo azi onzi tu ni azo cancer furufuru niri ma ezota ni.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kworeka okukwatanisa ahagati y'okureesa etaabe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. Omuri ebi, ekimwe aha birikukirayo kurabanisamu n'okukura kwa kokoro y'ebihaha.

eng_prompt: Public health campaigns have increasingly highlighted the dangers associated with smoking and tobacco use. As a result, many individuals and organizations advocate for healthier lifestyle choices.
lug_prompt: Kampeyini z'ebyobulamu mu bantu zeeyongedde okulaga obulabe obuva mu kunywa sigala n'okukozesa taaba. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi n'ebitongole balwanirira obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Yub me miyo ngec i kom yotkom pa lwak tye ka nyutu rac pa mato taa. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ki dule mapol gitye ka lweny pi kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikampeins luka angaleu kitodutu atiokisio nu ikamanara keda aimat esigala keda etaba. Kanuka ngun, itunga keda iriongeta luipu isinyikokitos aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Ti odaza e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ece e'yo onzi eyi ecipi taba seza be 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi tualu amuti karakara eyi pie a'di 'di geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu rua ala be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ehururu y'eby'amagara g'abantu eyeyongyeire kworeka akabi akarikuruga omu kureesa n'okukoresa etaabe. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu n'ebitongore bingi nibirwanirira amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to reduce smoking rates and improve public health, many governments are implementing stricter regulations on harmful substances. One of the most significant measures taken is the imposition of heavy taxes on tobacco products.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukendeeza ku muwendo gw'okunywa sigala n'okutumbula obulamu bw'abantu, gavumenti nnyingi zissa mu nkola amateeka amakakali ku bintu eby'obulabe. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo ebyakolebwa kwe kussa emisolo eminene ku bintu ebikolebwa mu taaba.
ach_prompt: I tute me dwoko piny rwom me mato taa ki medo rwom me yoto kom pa lwak, gamente mapol tye ka keto cik matek i kom jami maracu. Yub acel ma pire tek tutwal ma kitimo en aye keto mucoro madit tutwal iwi jami ma aa ki I taa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik aimat esigala ka aitojokar angaleu naka itunga, eutasi apuganisinei aipikakin ikisila luikidioko nuikamunitos iboro luededeng. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luitolomunitai ngesi aipikakin isolosinei luikiara noi mama ejaasi iboro luitolomete etaba.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu taba seza ma omgbo esizu azini alata o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete karakara eyi azita okporu 'diyi 'ba afa onzi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma azi eri musoro 'bani 'ba afa edele taba si 'diyi ma dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukyendeeza omuhendo gw'okureesa n'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu,gavumenti nyingi ziteireho ebiragiro by'amaani aha bintu eby'akabi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebikozirwe n'okutaho emishoro mingi aha bintu ebirikuruga omu taabe.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the well-being of its citizens is a top priority for the government. To achieve this, substantial financial resources are allocated to the healthcare sector each year.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bw'abantu baayo kye kintu gavumenti ky'ekulembeza. Okutuukiriza kino, obuyambi bw'ensimbi bungi buweebwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu buli mwaka.
ach_prompt: Gamente tye ki miti madit tutwal me neno ni anywali ne tye maber. Me cobo man, kiketo lim madit tutwal I tenge me yot kom mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Aimaniman aijar najokan naka itungake erai ibore yenepol noi kanejai apugan. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ijanakino ikapun luipu toma orionget loka angaleu kangolikaru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba kari anzi erini 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eri e'yo okporu gameteni 'diyi ma azi. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba robia angiri 'ba esele alataniri ma alia eli vusi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abatuuze baayo batunga amagara marungi, nikyo kintu kikuru munonga omu gavumenti. Okuhikiiriza eki, esente nyingi niziheebwayo omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara buri mwaka.

eng_prompt: Smoking is not only harmful to the individual, but it also poses significant dangers to those around them. When a father chooses to smoke, he inadvertently exposes his family to the harmful effects of secondhand smoke.
lug_prompt: Okunywa sigala si kya bulabe eri omuntu, naye era kya bulabe eri abo abamwetoolodde. Taata bw'asalawo okunywa sigala, mu butamanya ateeka ab'omu maka ge mu bulabe bw'okunywa sigala.
ach_prompt: Mato taa pe balo kwo pa ngat acel acel keken ento bene kelo peko madit tutwal I kom joo ma orumu gi. Ka wego mo oyero mato taa, en balo kwo pa jo me ode labongo ngeyo.
teo_prompt: Mam aimat esigala emunari itunganan bon, konye eyangauni atiokisio mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi keda kesi. Arai koseu papa aimat esigala, epedori ngesi aimusung ekale ke aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: Taba seza ovuni lu onzi 'ba ma ngulupi ni ku, te eri vini e'yo onzi eji 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi dri indi. Ata ka taba se, eri familia ivile 'diyi 'ba e'yo onzi taba sezani 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okureesa tikurikukosa omuntu wenka, kureka n'abo abarikwetorwaire. Omushaija ku arikucwamu kureesa, arikworeka ab'omuka ye akabi akarikuruga omu kureesa.

eng_prompt: Many people are unaware of the various health risks associated with smoking. In addition to its well-known effects on the lungs, smoking can also impact other senses.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi tebamanyi kabi akali mu kunywa sigala. Ng'oggyeeko ebikosa amawuggwe, okunywa sigala nakyo kikosa ebitundu by'omubiri ebirala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe gingeyo rac pa mato taa. Medo I kom adwogi ne I kom adunu, mato taa bene twero balo jami mukene.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuka aimat esigala. Kilema atiokisio nuejenara noi nuka aimat esigala, epedori bobo aimat esigala aitolitol aijen ace.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi nini e'yo onzi ndundu rua ala ni eyi ecipi taba seza be 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo erini eco 'ye furufuru ma dria ri ma azi, taba seza eco vini e'yo azi 'diyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibarikumanya akabi akari omu kureesa. Okwongyera aha kabi akarikumanywa aha bihaha, okureesa nikubaasa kuteganisa n'ebintu ebindi.

eng_prompt: Many people are unaware of the dangers associated with being around smokers. One significant health risk is the phenomenon known as passive smoking.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi tebamanyi kabi akali mu kubeera n'abanywa sigala. Ekimu ku bintu eby'obulabe eri obulamu bwe kunywa sigala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe gingeyo rac pa bedo ki joo ma mato taa. Peko acel madit tutwal ma twero balo yotkom pa dano obedo mato taa.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuikamunitos ajaut keda lu emasete esigala. Adiopet atiokisio nu angaleu nes aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi nini e'yo onzi eyi ecipi aa'ta 'ba taba sepi 'diyi pie ri ma dria ku. E'yo azi okporu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri e'yo 'bani nile taba seza si ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibarikumanya akabi akarikuruga omukukorengana n'abareesi ba sigara. Omuringo gumwe ogw'akabi aha magara, n'okureesa.

eng_prompt: Tobacco cultivation has been a significant agricultural practice in many regions. The demand for tobacco products continues to provide economic opportunities for local farmers.
lug_prompt: Okulima taaba kibadde kikolwa kya bulimi kya mugaso mu bitundu bingi. Obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebiva mu taaba bukyagenda mu maaso n'okuwa abalimi b'omu kitundu omukisa mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Puru taa obedo pur ma pire tek tutwal I but lobo mapol. Dwaro pa jami ma aa ki I taa tye kamede ki kelo gum me timo biacara bot lupur me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akoru na etaba erai epone loajokan noi loka akor kotoma aiboisio nuipu. Eipuda lo iboro lu etaba eyangauni arerengesio nuka ikapun mama ejaasi akoriok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Taba ezoza ebi ovu 'yeta orodriru agirikica ni angu karakara eyi ma alea. Aje afa edele taba si 'diyi niri ni mu drile drileba robia esuzu 'diyi fe 'ba ori ezo'ba ogogo 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okuhinga etaabe n'omuringo murungi gw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu byanga bingi. Ekyetengo ky'ebintu ebirikuruga omu taabe kigumiizemu kureetera abahingi n'abariisa b'omwihanga emigisha y'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Despite growing awareness of the health risks associated with smoking, the demand for tobacco products remains high. As a result, many cigarette factories are thriving financially.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okumanyisibwa okw'amaanyi ku kabi akali mu kunywa sigala, obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebiva mu taaba bukyali waggulu. N'ekivuddemu, amakolero ga sigala mangi gakulaakulana mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me ngec i kom rac pa mato taa tye kamede, miti pa jami ma aa ki I taa pud tye lamal. Macalo adwogi ne, Cuma mapol ma yubu taa tye ka dongo i yo me lim.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata aijen naka atiokisio nuka aimat esigala, epol noi eipuda lo iboro lu etaba. Kanuka ngun, eutasi icuman luipu luiswamaete esigala apol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu mile be e'yo onzikanya taba seza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, afa edele taba si 'diyi ma cu nga po'di angiri. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu taba edepi karakara 'diyi drile tu robia ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'okumanya akabi akarikuruga omu kureesa, okwetenga ebintu ebirikuruga omu taabe kukiri ahaiguru. N'ekyarugiremu, amakorero maingi agarikukora sigara gariyo nigakurakurana omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that peer influence plays a significant role in adolescent behavior. Many teenagers are susceptible to adopting habits and lifestyles that are prevalent within their social circles.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti okupikirizibwa kw'emikwano kukola kinene nnyo mu nneeyisa y'abavubuka. Abavubuka bangi bakwatibwa mangu emize n'enneeyisa y'obulamu eri mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni lurem konyo tutwal I kom tim pa bulu. Bulu mapol gitye ki gum me lubo kit kwo ma dano me kabedogi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe aomisio nuka ipaupa iswamaete nuepolok noi kotoma iponesio luka atumunak. Epedorete atumunak luipu adumun iponesio keda iponesio luka aijar luepolok noi kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyi orodriru adriza anzi zopi zozo 'diyini ri ma dria. Anzi zopi zozo karakara 'diyi e'yo 'yeta yini azini geri yini aa'zu 'diyi 'du ewakokoru angu yini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu emiteekateekyere y'eminyeeto neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu micwe y'eminyeeto. Eminyeeto emingi neebaasa kwejumba omu micwe n'emitwarize y'abantu abu erikutuura nabo.

eng_prompt: Many people struggle with breaking free from harmful habits. One of the most challenging addictions to overcome is smoking.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuba nnyo okwekutula ku mize emibi. Emu ku mize egisinga okusoomooza okuvvuunuka kwe kunywa sigala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka tute matek me weko tim maraco. Acel me kin jami ma tek tutwal me weko en aye mato taa.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete itunga luipu kagogongu kanu ajalakin iponesio luarokok. Adiopet kotoma iponesio luetioko luibusakinit oni aipikor ngesi aimat esigala.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi dri ci adriza onzi 'diyi kuzu ja. Adriza azi alu e'yo ewaru tu 'bani ecozu agazu ri eri taba seza ni.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kureka emize mibi. Emwe aha mize egumire kusingura n'okureesa.

eng_prompt: In many educational systems, children typically progress through grades based on their age. Therefore, a child who is ten years old would generally be expected to be in primary four.
lug_prompt: Mu masomero mangi, abaana batera okukulaakulana nga bayita mu bibiina okusinziira ku myaka gyabwe. N'olw'ekyo, omwana ow'emyaka ekkumi ateekeddwa okuba mu pulayimale eyokuna.
ach_prompt: I yub me pwonye mapol, lutino ipol kare gi kato ki igred malubbe ki mwaka gi. Pi meno, latin ma tye ki mwaka apar omyero obed I primary angwen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osomeroi luipu, iswamaete idwe ejok kotoma oguredi kotupitete ikarukec. Kanuka ngun, ikoku yen ikaru itomon ibusakinit ajaut opuraimare loiwongonet.
lgg_prompt: Otita onita ni karakara 'diyi ma alea, anzi eyi tutuni zo geri kilasia eyini aa'zu risi eli eyivile 'diyi vusi. Ka'dini, mva eli be mudri ri ma ovu pirimari su ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'eby'obwegyese, abaana nibakura kurabira omu bibiina kurugirira aha myaka yaabo. N'ahabw'ekyo, omwana ow'emyaka ikumi, ashemereire kuba ari omu kibiina kya kana.

eng_prompt: Every morning, the young boy follows a strict routine to prepare for his day. He believes that starting with a tidy home sets a positive tone for his school day ahead.
lug_prompt: Buli ku makya, omulenzi omuto agoberera enteekateeka enkakali okwetegekera olunaku lwe. Alowooza nti okutandika n'awaka omulungi kiteekawo embeera ennungi mu lunaku lwe olw'essomero mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Odiko ducu, awobi matidi lubu yoo me tic matek tutwal me yube pi nino ne. En tye ki niyee ni cako ki gang ma kiyubu maber kelo alokaloka maber I gang kwan mege I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanginitupuruc, etupakini esapat ngol ainapeta nuka aitemonokin kanuka apaaranike. Iyuunit ngesi ebe ageunet keda ere lo eyuara einakini ngesi ainapeta nuajokak kanu aparanike naka esomero koingaren.
lgg_prompt: O'biti vusi, agupiamva werea 'da ni otita azi okporu 'diyi ma vuti obi i otuzu o'du ivileri ni. Eri a'i ra kini e'dozu aku kililiru ri be ri ni e'yo onyiru 'ye o'du eri vile sukuluni drilia ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Buri kasheeshe, omwojo muto naakuratira enteekateeka y'okweteekateekyera eizooba rye. Naayikiriza ngu okutandika n'omuka ogutebeekanisiibwe kurungi, nikimureetera okushemererwa omu eizooba rye ry'eishomero.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the family decided to transform their backyard into a thriving vegetable garden. They realized that with the right care, it could not only provide fresh produce for their meals but also generate extra income.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, ab'omu maka baasalawo okufuula oluggya lwabwe ennimiro y'enva endiirwa ekulaakulana. Baazuula nti bwe balabirira bulungi, tekikoma ku kubafunira mmere mpya naye era kivaamu n'ensimbi endala.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic matek pi mwaki mapol, lugang ne gumoko tamgi me loko dyekalgi me doko poto pot cam ma dongo. Gu niang ni ki gwoko maber, pe twero miyo cam manyen keken ento bene kelo lim mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu ikalia kijulakisi alaro kec araun amisiri naka idiasio. Apotu kesi ojenutu ebe koipone kalo ejok, mam epedori aijaikin kesi inyamat lukatutubet bon konye epedorete kesi adumun ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, familia 'da 'du e'yo eyi ma jo ngukua ojazu amvu tibi ini eyini ri ru. Eyi esu ra kini 'ba ka eyi ma ta mba kililiru risi, eyi econi lu nyaka eyivile 'diyi esu ku te eyi vini robia esu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, eka ekacwamu kuhindura embuga zaabo omu misiri y'emboga. Baketegyereza ngu okureeberera kurungi, tikirikubaasa kubaheereza eby'okurya ebishemeire byonka, kureka n'okwongyera aha ntaatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: In their family, gardening is considered an important skill that connects them to nature. To ensure the boys grow up with a strong appreciation for the environment, their parents take an active role in their education.
lug_prompt: Mu maka gaabwe, okulima ettaka kitwalibwa ng'ekikugu eky'omugaso ekibagatta ku butonde. Okusobola okukakasa nti abalenzi bakula nga basiima nnyo obutonde bw'ensi, bazadde baabwe bakola kinene mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I gang gi, poto obedo diro ma pire tek ma kubu gi ki cwec ma orumu gi. Pi neno ni lutino awobe gidongo ki pwoc madit tutwal pi cwec ma orumuwa, lunyodogi timo tic matek tutwal I kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kokalia kec, eyangaritai amisiri kwape acoa naejok naerucokinit kesi keda isuban luka Edeke. Kanu awanyun ebe epoloete isap keda aiyalama naepol noi kanuka ejautene lo akwap, iswamaete auriakakec aswam naepol noi kotoma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Familia eyivile 'diyi ma alea, amvu 'yaza eri ondua azi orodriru eyini eyi ecipi e'yo nyakuni 'diyi pie ri'I. E'yo agupianzi eyini zozu ayikosi angu ama agei ri ma dria, tipika eyi ma tipika eyi azi okporu 'ye eyi ma onita ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka gaabo, okuhinga n'omurimo gw'omugasho ogurikubahwera kukwatanisa n'obuhangwa. Okureeba ngu aboojo nibakura nibasiima obuhangwa bw'ensi, abazaire baabo nibeejumba munonga omu kwegyesa kwabo.

eng_prompt: Many small-scale farmers prioritize sustainability and self-sufficiency in their agricultural practices. As a result, they often cultivate a variety of plants to meet their family's dietary needs.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi abalima obutono bakulembeza obuwangaazi n'okweyimirizaawo mu byobulimi byabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulima ebirime eby'enjawulo okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'amaka gaabwe mu by'endya.
ach_prompt: Pol pa lupur matino-tino giketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom gwoko kwo pa dano kacel ki gwoko jami ma mite pigi kengi I pur gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gipuru jami apita mapatpat me cobo miti me cam pa jo me odigi.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu lu ikidioko kes isingarenitos aidar ikorion kec bon. Kanuka ngun, ekoriete kesi iraan luegelegela kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba kalafe weresi 'diyi ma pari 'du e'yo ecozu yi ma ta mbazu azini ecozu yi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu 'diyi e'yo ori ezoza yini 'diyi ma alia okporu. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi ori ndundu eyi ezo eyini ani familia eyivile 'diyi ma nyaka esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa abaingi abarikukora emirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu byaro, nibatwara eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nk'ekintu kikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kuhinga ebihingwa bitari bimwe na bimwe, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'amaka gaabo eby'eby'okurya.

eng_prompt: After fleeing their war-torn country, they struggled to provide adequate meals for their children. Fortunately, they discovered a local initiative aimed at supporting displaced families with essential food resources.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okudduka mu nsi yaabwe eyali etaaguddwataaguddwa entalo, baalwana okufuna emmere emala eri abaana baabwe. Ekirungi, baazuula enteekateeka y'omu kitundu egendereddwamu okuyamba amaka agaasengulwa n'emmere ey'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Inge ngwec ki I lobogi ma lweny obalo, gin gubedo ki peko me miyo cam ma oromo ki lutino gi. Ki gum maber, gunongo yub mo ma tye ki miti me konyo lugangi ma orwenyo gangi gi ki cam ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akerit kotoma akwapukec naejaasi keda ejie, apotu kesi itereikina adumun inyamat luedolitos kanuka idwekec. Arereng najokan, apotu kesi odumutu ainapeta nuka atutubet kanu aigang ikalia lu aponi itobwounai keda inyamat lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Eyi apa kari eyini a'di ezale 'da ma alea risi 'bori ma vutia, eyi ndra dri ci nyaka fezu anzi eyivile 'diyini angiri. Drilebaru, eyi esu otita azi angu 'da ma alea 'bani lezu atita fezu familia eyini aa'pi angu 'da ma alea ku 'diyi dri nyaka orodriru 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwiruka kuruga omu ihanga ryabo eririmu entaro, bakarwana kutunga eby'okurya ebirikumara abaana baabo. Ekyomugisha murungi, bakashanga enteekateeka y'omubyaro erikugyenderera okuhwera amaka agabingirwe n'ebyokurya ebikuru.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of displaced populations, our organization has developed a comprehensive initiative. This program aims to address critical nutritional deficiencies faced by refugees.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'abantu ababundabunda ebyeyongera, ekitongole kyaffe kikoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo ebbula ly'emmere abanoonyiboobubudamu lye basanga.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti pa joo ma orwenyo gangi gi, dul megwa okatti ki yub mapat-pat. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko peko me peko me cam ma luring ayella nongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ekerete aiboisio kec, etolomu erionget wok ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitemokin ationis naka ekadakada lo enyamete ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti amavileri e'do otita azi dria. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo ewaru nyaka ako emunyale eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kyaitu kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okureeberera ebyetaago by'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'okurya obu empungi zirikushanga.

eng_prompt: The initiative aims to address community needs more effectively. Collaborative efforts are essential for maximizing resources and impact.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka egendereddwamu okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu mu ngeri esingayo obulungi. Kaweefube w'okukolera awamu wa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula ebyetaago n'ebikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Yub eni tye ki miti me cobo miti pa lwak. Tic kacelo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me nongo kony ki adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga koipone kaloejok. Aswam na aimorikikina nes ejok kanu aitodolikin iboro ka aitodolikin akiro.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi orodriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekigyendererwa n'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu omu muringo murungi. Enkora y'okukorera hamwe n'ey'omugasho omu kukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing humanitarian crisis, our organization has developed a comprehensive initiative. This initiative focuses on addressing the urgent needs of displaced individuals and communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ekitongole kyaffe kikoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno essira eritadde ku kukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu ebyasengulwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kamede, dul megwa okatti ki yub mapat-pat. Yub man keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyeko peko pa dano ki kabedo ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na itunga, etolomu erionget wok ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso nuka itunga keda atutubena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti amavileri e'do otita azi dria 'diyi. Otita 'di 'ba asi e'yo 'bani le mbeleru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyini azini ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire, ekitongore kyaitu kitandikireho enteekateeka. Enteekateeka egi neeta amaani omu kukora aha byetaago by'abantu n'ebyanga ebitarikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing humanitarian crisis, the organization has committed to supporting displaced individuals in need. Each month, they gather resources to ensure that refugees receive essential supplies.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekigenda mu maaso, ekitongole kyeyamye okuyamba abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu abali mu bwetaavu. Buli mwezi, bakungaanya ebintu okukakasa nti abanoonyiboobubudamu bafuna ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me kony ma tye kawot anyim, dul ne ocikke me miyo kony ki joo ma orwenyo gangi gi. Dwe ki dwe, gicoko lim me neno ni luring ayela gunongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, abu atukot ngin iswama agangat nejaas itunga lu ican. Kangol elap, etukete kesi iboro kanu aanyun ebe edumunenete ikerai iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'da owi i atita fezu 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi dri. Imba alu alu vusi, eyi afa eyi tra nezu ra kini emunyale eyi afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho,ekitongore kyehaireyo kuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa. Buri kwezi, nibarundaana eby'okukoresa okureeba ngu empungi zitunga ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Many families in the community rely on the monthly food distribution for their basic needs. Unfortunately, this month's supply has fallen short of expectations.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu geesigama ku kugabibwa kw'emmere okwa buli mwezi ku byetaago byago ebikulu. Eky'omukisa omubi, ebiterekero by'omwezi guno tebinnaba kutuukirizibwa nga bwe kyali kisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol ikabedo gi jenge I kom cam ma ki poko dwe ki dwe me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Ki gum marac, jami acata me dwe man pe obedo marom kit ma byek tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu kotoma atutubet ejarete keda inyamat lu ekorio kangolilap kanu aijar kec. Nukaiturur, mam iboro luka elap kalo edumunio kwape eomitai.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi yi ati e'yo nyaka awaza mba vusiri ma dria afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. Drile onziru, afa feza mba 'disi ri e'de e'yo 'bani egale 'diyi vurisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga nigeemerera ahaby'okurya ebirikugabwa buri kwezi. Eky'omugisha mubi, ebikozeso by'omwezi ogu, tibirikuhika nk'oku kyabaire nikiteekateekwa.

eng_prompt: After years of working in a corporate job, she decided to pursue her passion for gardening. With a variety of plants and vegetables flourishing, she found a way to turn her hobby into a profitable venture.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola mu kampuni, yasalawo okutandika okukola mu nnimiro. Ng'ebimera n'enva endiirwa eby'enjawulo bikulaakulana, yafuna engeri y'okufuula omulimu gwe ogw'okukola amagoba.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi mwaki mapol I dul mo, en omoko tamme me cako pur. Ki kodi ki pot dek mapat-pat matye ka dongo, en onongo yoo me weko miti ne odok biacara ma kelo magoba madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar lu aswam kotoma aswam naka ekampuni, abu ngesi koseu aitodolikin aminake naka amisiri. Keda iraan keda iraan luegelegela lueutasi apol, abu ngesi kodum epone loka aijulakin aswamuke araun aswam naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli azi ngazu amuti azi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri asi 'du e'yo erini le amvu 'yazu ri 'yezu. Ori ndundu azini tibi ini eyi ma ezota si, eri esu geri azi ecozu e'yo erini leleri ojazu tujari orodriruni ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikukorera ekitongore, akasharamu kukora eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ahabw'ebimera n'emboga ezitarikushushana, akatunga omuringo gw'okuhindura eby'okukunda kwe omu bizinesi erikureeta amagoba.

eng_prompt: Many aspiring gardeners are eager to cultivate their own produce, but they often face significant challenges. Despite their enthusiasm, they lack the skills and knowledge of vegetable growing.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi abagala okulima mu nnimiro baagala nnyo okulima ebintu byabwe, naye batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Wadde nga balina obwagazi, tebalina bukugu na kumanya ku kulima nva endiirwa.
ach_prompt: Pol pa lupur matye ki miti me puru jami apita gi, ento ipol kare ginongo peko mapol. Kadi bed gitye ki miti matek, pe gitye ki diro ki ngec me puru pot dek.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi akoriok luipu akoru iraan kec bon, konye ejaas kesi keda atiokisio nuepolok. Karaida ekotosi kesi noi, emamiatatar kesi keda acoa na akoru idiasio.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara lepi amvu 'yapi 'diyi ava be amvu 'yazu eyi ma ngulupi si te eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu sa'wa driasi. Aa'zu ava be ra ti, eyi vu ondua azini ondua tibi ini ezoza ma dria yo.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwenda kuhinga omu musiri, baine ekihika ky'okweyendeza, kwonka buriijo nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Oihireho okushemererwa kwabo, tibaine bukugu n'obwengye bw'okuhinga emboga.

eng_prompt: Starting a vegetable garden can be a rewarding way to grow your own food. Even if you have limited space, there are many creative ways to cultivate a thriving garden.
lug_prompt: Okutandika ennimiro y'enva endiirwa eyinza okuba engeri ennungi ey'okulima emmere yo. Ne bw'oba n'ekifo ekitono, waliwo engeri nnyingi ez'obuyiiya ez'okulima ennimiro ekulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Cako poto pot cam obedo yoo maber me puru cam mamegi. Kadi bed ni itye ki kabedo matidi, tye yoo mapol me dongo poto maber.
teo_prompt: Ageun amisiri naka idiasio erai epone loajokan noi loka akoru inyamat kon. Karaida ikidioko aiboisit kon, ipu iwaitin lu itolomunete ijo akoru amisiri.
lgg_prompt: Amvu tibi ini eyini ri e'dozu ri eco ovu geri azi orodriru mini ecozu nyaka mi ngulupi niri ezozu ni i. Angu mini ovuzuri ka tro ovu werea ra ti, geri onduaru 'bani ecozu amvu ezozu onyiru 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho omusiri gw'emboga n'omuringo murungi gw'okuhinga ebyokurya byawe. Nobu waakuba oine omwanya mukye, hariho emiringo mingi y'okuhinga omusiri murungi.

eng_prompt: After spending countless hours tending to his small patch of soil, he realized how much joy gardening brought him. Inspired by the success of his first harvest, he began dreaming of a larger space filled with fresh produce.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala essaawa eziwera ng'alabirira akatundutundu k'ettaka lye akatono, yakitegeera nti okulima mu nnimiro kyamuleetera essanyu lingi. Ng'akubirizibwa obuwanguzi bw'amakungula ge agasooka, yatandika okuloota ku kifo ekinene ekijjudde ebirime ebibisi.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko cawa mapol tutwal me gwoko potone matidi, en oniang yomcwiny ma poto okelo bote. Pi adwogi maber pa kac ma okwongo, en ocako bedo ki lek me bedo ki kabedo madit ma opong ki cam manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adaun isawan luipu aidar alupok ke, abu ngesi kojen aiyalama na eyangaunit amisiri ngesi. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi kanu akerianut naka esake losodit, abu ngesi kogeu airujasia nuka aiboisit naepol noi naejaasi keda iraan luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini aa'zu angu eriniri ma ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu e'yo ayiko amvu 'yazaniri ni eri dri ejile ri ra. Erini ava esuzu drile suza eri vile ori okuza okori vurisi, eri e'do orobi 'ye angu angiri 'diyi ma dria ori efi o'diru 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eshaaha nyingi arikureeberera akataka ke kakye, akeetegyereza okushemererwa okurikureetwa omusiri. Ahabw'obuhanguzi bw'ebihingirwe bye eby'okubanza, akatandika kuteekateeka aha mwanya muhango ogurimu ebihingirwe ebisya.

eng_prompt: In many regions, agricultural education programs have been established to support local farmers. These programs focus on sustainable practices and effective gardening techniques.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, pulogulaamu z'okusomesa ku byobulimi zitandikiddwawo okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu. Pulogulaamu zino zissa essira ku nkola eziwangaala n'obukodyo bw'okulima obulungi.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, ki keto yub me pwonyo lupur me konyo lupur me tedero. Yub magi keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom diro me pur ma beco.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, etolomun ainapeta nuka aisisianakin nuka akoru kanu aigang akoriok. Isingarenitos ainapeta ngun iponesio luajokak luka amisiri.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'do otita imbatani agirikica ma dria 'diyi 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi atizu. Otita 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria azini geri amvu 'yazu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, enteekateeka z'okwegyesa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa zitandikirweho okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro. Puroguraamu ezi nizigyenderera enkora nungi y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in the involvement of women in various activities within the refugee camps. Their engagement spans from organizing community events to leading support groups for families.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu kwenyigira kw'abakyala mu mirimu egy'enjawulo mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu. Okwenyigira kwabwe kuva ku kutegeka emikolo gy'ekitundu okutuuka ku kukulembera ebibiina ebiyamba amaka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, wel mon matye ka timo jami mapat-pat I kem pa luring ayela omede tutwal. Ticgi cako ki yubu yub me kabedo gi me oo I doro dule ma konyo gangi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor noi aswam naka angor kotoma okabin lu ikerai. Apotu kesi kiswamaunos kotoma aitemonokin aswamisio nuka atutubet kitoni aingarenikin igurupun lu igangakitos ikalia.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo oku eyini 'yeta ndundu eyi 'yezu kembe emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo yini 'ye 'diyi e'do e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi otuzu kpere amuti atita fepi familia eyini 'diyi ma dricezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehwaire, habaireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abakazi abeejumbire omu mirimo etari emwe omu kampu z'empungi. Okukwatanisa kwabo nikuruga aha kutebekanisa emikoro y'ekyanga kuhika aha kwebembera guruupu z'okushagika amaka.

eng_prompt: With the right techniques and care, anyone can cultivate a thriving garden. Even those with limited space can enjoy the benefits of homegrown produce.
lug_prompt: Omuntu yenna asobola okulima ennimiro ennungi ng'alina obukodyo n'okulabirira ebituufu. N'abo abalina ebifo ebitono basobola okunyumirwa emigaso gy'ebirime eby'awaka.
ach_prompt: Ki diro ki gwok maber, ngat mo keken twero pito poto maber. Kadi wa jo matye ki kabedo ma tidi bene gitwero nongo ber pa cam ma ki puru ki paco.
teo_prompt: Keda acoa najokan keda aidar, epedori idiotunganan akoru amisiri na ejokuna. Karaida ngul lu ikidioko aiboisio epedorete aimedaun kotoma iboro lu akoru ore.
lgg_prompt: Geri kililiru azini tambaza be, 'ba dria eco amvu azi onyiru 'diyi ezo ra. Ata 'ba angu be were 'diyi eco vini orodri afa ofule akua 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuntu weena yaaba aine oburyo n'okureeberera kurungi, naabaasa kuhinga omusiri murungi. N'abo abaine emyanya mikye, nibabaasa kugasirwa omu bihingwa by'omuka.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, many individuals often overlook the importance of maintaining their well-being. Raising awareness about the impact of lifestyle choices on health is crucial for fostering a healthier society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, abantu bangi batera okubuusa amaaso obukulu bw'okukuuma obulamu bwabwe obulungi. Okumanyisa abantu ku ngeri obulamu gye bukosaamu ebyobulamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obulamu obulungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, dano mapol gi cayo ber pa gwoko kwo gi. Miyo ngec bot lwak i kom adwogi ma kwo kelo i kom yotkom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo yotkom i kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka aidar aijar kec. Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos epone loajokan loka aijar kanu angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo orodri eyini aa'zu muke ri ma tambazu ri ma dria ku. Imbata fezu 'ba eyini aa'zu alata be ri ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu alata be ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, abantu tibarikufayo aha mugasho gw'okureeberera amagara gaabo. Okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho amagara marungi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, individuals fleeing their homes often face immense emotional and psychological challenges. Providing a compassionate environment can help them navigate their difficult journey.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, abantu badduka mu maka gaabwe batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu nneewulira n'ebirowoozo. Okubawa embeera esaasira kiyinza okubayamba mu lugendo lwabwe oluzibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano ma ringo gangigi ipol kare ginongo peko me tam ki tam mapol tutwal. Miyo kabedo matye ki cwiny me kica twero konyogi me kato ki I peko ma gitye iye.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, itunga lu ekerete oreriakec itereikina keda ainingosia nuipu noi. Aijaikin kesi aiboisit na isiyalamikit kes ingarakini kesi aitodolikin alosit kec naronon.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, 'ba aku eyini apa 'diyi ma alea 'diyi tutuni e'yo ewaru eyi esu. Angu asi ndriza fezu ri eco eyi ma aza ko aci eyini aa'zu ewaru 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu abarikutoroka omu maka gaabo, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okuha abantu obusingye burungi, nikibaasa kubahwera omu rugyendo rwabo orugumire.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing humanitarian crisis, local organizations rallied together to gather supplies. Volunteers worked tirelessly to collect and package essential items for those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekyeyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byakungaanidde wamu okukung'aanya ebintu. Bannakyewa baakola butaweera okukung'aanya n'okupakinga ebintu ebikulu eri abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kamede, dul mapat-pat me tedero guribbe kacel me coko jami. Lumii kony gutiyo matek tutwal me coko ki yubu jami ma mite pi joo ma can tye ka yelo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet kimorikikinos aimorikikin iboro. Apotu luka aijaanakinak iswamata agogongu kanu aituk keda aibwaikin iboro lu itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba ada eyini tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi trazu. Ba owi'ba 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru afa orodriru 'diyi trazu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire,ebitongore by'omubyaro bikakorengana kurundaana ebintu. Abarikwehayo bakakora n'amaani okurundaana n'okurundaana ebintu by'omugasho ahari abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough analysis of their operations, the consultants presented their findings to the team. The business owners were eager to learn effective strategies for improving their financial performance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi emirimu gyabwe, abawi b'amagezi baayanjudde ebizuuliddwa byabwe eri ttiimu. Bannannyini bizinensi baali baagala nnyo okuyiga engeri ennungi ey'okutumbula enkola yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo tic gi maber tutwal, ludiro gu nyutu ngo ma gunongo bot dul ne. Lutim biacara gubedo ki miti matek me pwonyo yoo maber me medo rwom me timo biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok aswamisio kec, apotu itunga itodutu akiro kec mama ejaasi etimu. Akotosi agwelanarak noi aisisia iwaitin lu itojokaret eswamae kec loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza kililiru 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi ece e'yo yini esu 'diyi amuti 'da dri. Tujari ipika eyi ndra avaru geri kililiru eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ayuza otuzu 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye emirimo yaabo, abahabuzi bakareeta ebirugiremu omu tiimu. Bakama ba bizinesi bakaba baine ekihika ky'okwega oburyo burungi bw'okutunguura emikorere yaabo omu by'empiiha.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance collaboration and innovation, a diverse group of executives convened for an important event. The atmosphere was charged with anticipation as they prepared to share insights and strategies.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana n'obuyiiya, ekibinja ky'abakulembeze ab'enjawulo baatuula ku mukolo omukulu. Embeera yabaddemu okusuubira nga bwe beetegekera okugabana amagezi n'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo ribbe ki diro manyen, ludito tic mapol gugure pi yub mo ma pire tek. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma gubedo ka yubbe me nywako tam ki yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aiswamanara keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak, apotu egurupu loka engarenok luegelegela kitukokinos kanuka epucit loepol ajokis. Apol noi aomisio nuka itunga kwape ekapakina kesi aimor acoasineikec keda acoasineikec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ejizu, ongulumu 'ba drice'ba ndu ndu 'diyi tra yi tualu e'yo azi okporu ni ma alia. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra asi 'baza be eyini eyi otuzu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi awazu tualu geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okujumbura, guruupu y'abebembezi b'emiringo etari emwe, eketeeraine aha mukoro gw'omugasho. Embeera ekaba erimu amatsiko ahabw'okweteekateekyera okubagana ebiteekateeko n'obukodyo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster collaboration and share best practices, the organization organized a national workshop. Participants were invited to engage in discussions and activities aimed at addressing key challenges facing their communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana n'okugabana enkola ennungi, ekitongole kyategese omusomo gw'eggwanga lyonna. Abeetabamu baayitiddwa okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo n'emirimu egigendereddwamu okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okukulu mu bitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me kelo ribbe ki nywako tam mabeco, dul ne oyubu kacoke me pwonye I lobo ni lung. Kilwongo joo ma obedo tye me nywako tam ki tic ma ki keto pi tyeko peko mapigi tego matye I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aiswamanara keda aimor iponesio luajokak, abu erionget itemok airiamun na akwap kere. Aponi kolimokinai itunga ajaikin toma oineresinei keda aswamisinei nu ekotosi aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas atutubet kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu azini geri onyiru 'diyi awazu, amuti 'da otu otita imbatani kari 'di ma alea ndulu ni. Ba ai 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'yo onzezu azini e'yo 'yezu e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okugabana emiringo mirungi, ekitongore kikatebekanisa omushomo gw'eihanga ryona. Abeejumbiremu bakashabwa kwejumba omu kuhanuura n'emirimo erikugyenderera okutereeza oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikushangwa omu byanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming council meeting, each representative gathered detailed financial reports from their respective districts. This information was crucial for ensuring transparency and accountability in the allocation of resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukiiko lw'akakiiko olujja, buli mukiise yakungaanya alipoota y'ebyensimbi okuva mu disitulikiti ye. Amawulire gano gaali ga mugaso nnyo mu kukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira mu kugabanya eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kacokke pa kancil matye kabino anyim, lacungu acel-acel ogamo adwoki me tic ki lim ma aa ki idistrikgi. Ngec man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni ada ki kor tic tye ikare me poko lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamunet naka ekansulo lo ebunit, abu abwoikinitok kere kituk eripoota loka ikapun ko disitriktan kec. Ajokuna akiro nu kanu awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere iboro.
lgg_prompt: Otuta mitingi kanisulu ni emupi ri ni, 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi tra o'duko siza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi engazu distrikiti eyivile 'diyi ma alea. O'duko 'diri ndra orodriru e'yo ada azini geri 'bani afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera orukiiko rw'akakiiko orurikwija, buri mujwekyerwa akarundaana ripoota y'esente kuruga omu disiturikiti zaabo. Amakuru aga gakaba gaine omugasho munonga omukureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra omu kugaba eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, financial independence is crucial for individuals to thrive. Ensuring that everyone has access to resources and opportunities can lead to a more equitable society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okweyimirizaawo mu byenfuna kikulu nnyo eri abantu okukulaakulana. Okukakasa nti buli omu afuna ebyetaago n'emikisa kisobola okuleetawo obwenkanya mu bantu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot ni, bedo agonya I lok kom lim pire tek tutwal pi dano me dongo. Neno ni dano weng tye ki gum me nongo jami ki gum me tic twero weko dano weng bedo marom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, erai aipugaikin bon kotoma ikapun ibore yenepol noi kanu itunga lukatutubet apolor. Aanyun ebe epedori nginitunganan adumunun iboro keda arerengesio ayangaun aiboisit na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, aa'ta e'yo robia ni si ri eri orodriru 'ba alu alu eyini ecozu zozu. E'yo nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco afa ayuzaru azini drileba eyi esu ra ri eco ongulumu 'ba eyini aa'zu trotro ri eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okwetegyeka omu by'empiiha n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'abantu okukura. Okureeba ngu buri omwe atunga eby'obugaiga n'emigisha nikibaasa kureetaho oburinganiza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, challenges such as poverty, inequality, and climate change are becoming increasingly pressing. To address these issues effectively, collaboration and collective action are essential.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyuka mangu, ebisoomooza nga obwavu, obutali bwenkanya, n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde byeyongera okuba eby'amangu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, okukwatagana n'okukola awamu bikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, peko macalo can, apoka-poka, ki alokaloka me piny tye ka medde ameda. Me tyeko lok magi maber, ribbe ki tic kacelo pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina atipet, ainingosia kwape ican, amamus airiamara, keda aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda loka ikwamin eraas nuepolok noi. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, ibusakinit aimorikikina keda aswam nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia ojata okposiri ma alia, e'yo ewaru ekile alio le, e'yo esele coza le, azini e'yo angu mile ma ojata le 'diyi eca curu'do okporu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, ti ecita azini e'yo 'yezu tualu ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, oburemeezi nk'obworo, obutaingana hamwe n'empindahinduka y'obwire nibweyongyera. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, okukwatanisa n'okukorera hamwe n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, citizens look to their leaders for guidance and support. It is essential for public officials to prioritize the needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, bannansi batunuulira abakulembeze baabwe okufuna obulagirizi n'obuwagizi. Kya mugaso abakungu ba gavumenti okukulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, anywali yenyo kony ki tira ki bot lutela gi. Pire tek tutwal ki lutic pa gamente me keto miti pa lwak obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, emoete itunga engarenok kec kanu aingarenikinio ka agangat. Erai ibore yenepol noi eswamak luka apugan aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, kari anzi eyi asi eyi ma drice'ba eyi vu imbata esuzu azini atita esuzu. Eri orodriru azi'ba gameteni 'diyini e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi 'bazu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abatuuragye nibasherurira abebembezi baabo obuhabuzi n'obuhwezi. N'eky'omugasho abakungu ba gavumenti kwebembeza ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: During the monthly meeting, the residents expressed their concerns about various issues affecting their neighborhood. After a lengthy discussion, they decided it was time to take action and seek assistance from their leader.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwa buli mwezi, abatuuze baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikwata ku kitundu kyabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga eddene, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako kye bakolawo era banoonye obuyambi okuva eri omukulembeze waabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma bedo tye dwe ki dwe, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko mapat-pat matye ka yelo kabedo gi. Ingee nywako lok pi kare malac, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo me nongo kony ki bot latela gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangol elap, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanuikamunitos akiro nuegelegela nuetiroritos aiboisit kec. Akaulo naka aineranara apak naepol, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aswam kosodete adumun aingarakinio kama ejai engarenonikec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi imba alu alu vusi ri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza ezu ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo e'yo 'yezu azini eyi ma aza kozu engazu eyi ma drice'ba vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orurikubaho buri kwezi, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha nshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa ebyaro byabo. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura kumara obwire buraingwa, bakasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okutandikiraho okushaba obuhwezi kuruga aha mwebembezi waabo.

eng_prompt: After years of living in solitude, the old man found himself at the center of a heated dispute with his neighbors. Tensions escalated when accusations of property damage were leveled against him.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'abeera yekka, omusajja omukadde yeesanga mu butakkaanya obw'amaanyi ne baliraanwa be. Obunkenke bweyongedde bwe baamulumiriza okwonoona ebintu.
ach_prompt: Ingee bedo kene pi mwaki mapol, ladit-ti onongo ni en tye ka laro lok ki jirani ne. Lworo omede ikare ma kikok I kome pi balo jami.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu aiboi bon, abu epolon ngol kodum akekuan kotoma opeget keda idunyetake. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos ne itoronere ngesi kanu amunar iboro.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini aa'zu a'dule 'bori ma vutia, agu dezari isu i erita ako okporuni ma agadria i ma jo ejele yi be. E'yo erita ako niri tu uru 'bani eri tozu e'yo afa ezazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutuura wenka,omushaija omugurusi akeeshanga ari ahagati y'obutaikirizana bw'amaani na bataahi be. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire obu bamuhababira ngu akacwekyereza ebintu.

eng_prompt: Many children face unique struggles during their formative years, but those without parents often encounter additional obstacles. The absence of a familial support system can lead to feelings of isolation and uncertainty.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi basanga ebizibu eby'enjawulo mu myaka gyabwe egy'okukula, naye abo abatalina bazadde batera okusanga ebizibu ebirala. Okubulawo kw'obuyambi okuva mu maka kiyinza okuleetawo enneewulira y'okweyawula n'obutali bukakafu.
ach_prompt: Lutino mapol nongo peko mapat-pat ikare gi me dongo, ento lutino ma peke ki lunyodo ipol kare nongo peko mukene. Bedo peke pa kony ma aa ki bot lunyodo twero weko dano bedo kengi.
teo_prompt: Idwe luipu etereikina keda atiokisio nuegelegela kapak kana idwe, konye ngul luemameototor auriakakec itereikina keda atiokisio nuipu. Amamus na igangitok luka ekale epedori ayangaun aiyalongong keda amamus ajenanut.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu eli eyini zozu ri ma alea, te 'ba tipika kokoru 'diyi e'yo ewaru azi eyi esu. Afa azakoma fepi familia eyini yo ri eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ku dika eyi ma aa e'yo eyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abaana abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'omutaano omu myaka yaabo y'obwegyese, kwonka abo abataine bazaire, nibatunga oburemeezi obundi. Obutabaho bw'obuhwezi kuruga omu maka, nikibaasa kureetaho okwetantara n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: From a young age, he displayed an extraordinary gift for music that set him apart from his peers. As he honed his skills and gained recognition, opportunities began to pour in.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu myaka emito, yalaga ekirabo ky'okuyimba eky'enjawulo ekyamufuula ow'enjawulo ku banne. Bwe yeeyongera okukuguka era n'atandika okumanyibwa, emikisa gyajja.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma en pud tidi, en onyuto mic me goyo wer ma oweko en obedo pat ki luwote. I kare ma en odongo dirone dok oywek, gum mapol obino.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, abu ngesi kitodu ainakinet naka ayoere na itegeari ngesi kama ejaasi ipaupakec. Neautar ngesi aiteteun acoake kosodi aijen, apotu arerengesio kogeutu alomun.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu eli werea ri ma alea, eri e'da feta ongo cozani wura ndusi eri 'bapi 'diyi vurisi. Erini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi otuzu azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi esuzu 'boria, drileba yi e'do efuria.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga akiri muto, akooreka ekiconco ky'okweshongora eky'omutaano ekyamubaasiise kuba ow'omutaano kukira bagyenzi be. Bwanyima y'okutunguura emyoga ye yaatandika kumanywa, emigisha ekatandika kwija.

eng_prompt: Despite their qualifications and public support, women faced numerous barriers in the political arena. As a result, systemic policies were implemented to exclude them from holding any political office.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko ebisaanyizo byabwe n'obuwagizi bw'abantu, abakyala baasanga ebizibu bingi mu byobufuzi. N'ekyavaamu, enkola ez'enjawulo zaateekebwawo okubalemesa okukwata woofiisi yonna ey'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni onongo gitye ki kwan ki kony pa lwak, mon onongo peko mapol tutwal I lok me cungu iwi bye. Macalo adwogi ne, ki keto cik mapat-pat I tic me juku gi bedo I dog tic me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apedorosio keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, apotu angor odumutu atiokisio nuipu kotoma politikis. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka aitikitik kesi kotoma aiboisio nuka politikis.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma onita azini atita o'bi yiniri ma talasi, oku eyi esu e'yo karakara eyi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'ba azita eyi eyini ani eyi atrizu azi politikini 'diyi 'duzu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho emishomo yaabo hamwe n'obuhwezi bw'abantu, abakazi bakashanga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'obutegyeki. N'ekyarugiremu, engyenderwaho z'eby'obutegyeki zikateebwa omu nkora okubazibira kugira ofiisi y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After years of growing apart and constant arguments, she finally decided it was time to make a change in her life. Despite the challenges, she felt a sense of relief as she contemplated her future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga beeyawula era nga buli kiseera bayomba, yasemba okusalawo nti kye kiseera okukola enkyukakyuka mu bulamu bwe. Wadde ng'ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa, yawulira obuweerero bwe yalowooza ku biseera bye eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me pokke ki daa, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me kelo alokaloka i kwone. Kadi bed ni onongo tye ki peko mapol, en obedo ki yomcwiny I kare ma obedo ka tam I kom anyim mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka atiakakin keda epeget, abu ngesi kotub apak naka aijulakin aijarake. Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda atiokisio, abu ngesi kopup aiyengun najaar ngesi aomoom nuikamunitos ngarenike.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani esele cozu azini agata gazu sawa driasi 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu asizu e'yo 'duzu kini sa'wa ca 'di ojata 'yezu idri eriniri ma alia ra. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, eri etumu asi anzuru erini e'yo egazu ewu drusiri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwahukana hamwe n'okuhajaana, akahendera yasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora empindahinduka omu magara gye. Oyihireho oburemeezi, akahurira obuhuumuro arikuteekateeka aha biro bye eby'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support and uplift the community, local organizations organized a series of events. One of the highlights was a workshop specifically designed for single mothers to enhance their skills and confidence.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira n'okutumbula ekitundu, ebitongole by'ekitundu byategeka emikolo egy'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bikulu kyali musomo ogwategekebwa naddala bamaama abali obwannamunigina okutumbula obukugu bwabwe n'obwesige.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak, dul mapat-pat me tedero guyubu yub mapat-pat. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo kacoke me pwonye ma kiyubu tutwalle pi mege ma peke ki cware me medo diro gi ki tek cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigangit ka aikeun itunga, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet itemonokisi aswamisinei nuipu. Adiopet kotoma akiro nuapolok arai airiamun naitemokinitai kanu angor lumam edukokina kanu aitogogong acoasineikec keda amunokina kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma aza kozu dika eyi otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo eyi karakara. E'yo okporu 'diyi ma azi eri otita imbatani 'bani o'bale 'ba ayia a'dule 'diyi dri ondua yini 'diyi otuzu azini asi'baza yiniri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhagira abantu n'okubagaruramu amaani, ebitongore by'ebyaro bikatebekanisa emikoro mingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru, n'omushomo ogwatebekanisiibwe munonga abazaire abatari mu bushwere kutunguura emyoga yaabo n'okweyikiririzamu.

eng_prompt: As the fundraising event came to a close, the community gathered to hear the Bishop's heartfelt remarks. He looked out at the crowd, filled with supporters who had generously contributed to the cause.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gw'okusonda bwe gwali gunaatera okuggwa, abantu baakuŋŋaana okuwuliriza ebigambo by'Omulabirizi. Yatunula mu bantu, abajjudde abawagizi abaawaddeyo ssente zaabwe ku lw'ekigendererwa ekyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub me jogo cente cok tum, lwak gugure me winyo lok pa Bishop. En oneno lwak ma opong ki lucwak ma gumiyo kony ki cwinygi ducu.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aituk ikapun angetakin, apotu itunga kotukokinos aipup akiro nuka ebishop. Abu ngesi kosesen itunga luipu luejaasi keda egangitok luejaasi keda agangat naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Omu robia trazuri ni ecaria i deria, ongulumu eyi tra eyi e'yo Bisopi ni asi driasi 'diyi erizu. Eri ndre 'ba ongulumuru, 'ba atita fe'baa afa fepi asi driasi e'yo 'da ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'okushorooza esente ku gwahikire aha muheru, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhurikiza ebi bishopu yaagambire kuruga aha mutima. Akareeba abantu baingi, abaabaire bahereize omurimo ogwo.

eng_prompt: It was a somber day filled with memories and tears as we gathered to honor his life. The church was filled with friends and family, all coming together to say their final goodbyes.
lug_prompt: Lwali lunaku lwa nnaku nga lujjudde ebijjukizo n'amaziga nga tukungaanidde okussa ekitiibwa mu bulamu bwe. Ekkanisa yali ejjudde ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda, nga bonna bazze wamu okusiibula abantu baabwe abasembayo.
ach_prompt: Obedo nino marac tutwal ma opong ki tam ki pig wang I kare ma wacokke me woro kwo ne. Kanica opong ki lurem ki lugang ma gubino ka weko lutino gi me agiki.
teo_prompt: Arai aparan naetiono noi naejaasi keda aiituneta keda akio nuapotu sio atukokinos aiitun aijarake. Apotu ipapero keda lukokale kilelebunos okanisa kanu aisiyalamikin kes.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'dari ndra o'du candiru e'yo egaza be tre azini owuza be tre amani trazu eri ma idri inzizu. Kanisa ga 'ba eyi ma agyipi eyi pie tualu familia eyi pie eyini emuzu tualu eyini eyi ma asizuri nzezu.
nyn_prompt: Ekaba eri eizooba ry'obusaasi eryabaire riijwire ebirikwijuka hamwe n'amarira obu twabaire nitukungaana kumuheereza ekitinisa. Ekanisa ekaba eijwire abanywani hamwe n'abanyabuzaare, boona barikwija hamwe kumusiibuura.

eng_prompt: In times of difficulty, it's essential to foster a sense of community and understanding. By standing together, we can overcome any challenge that comes our way.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, kya mugaso okukulaakulanya enneewulira y'omukago n'okutegeeragana. Bwe tuyimiridde awamu, tusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kwonna okujja mu kkubo lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki winye ikin lwak. Ka wacung kacelo, watwero loyo peko mo keken matye i yo wa.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu etioko, ejokuna noi aimorikikin keda apuponoro. Kowai lo aibwo nepepe, ipedori oni aipikor adio ainingosit na ebuni orot wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru aa'ta tualu azini vata ma omgbo otuzu. Aka so pa tualu, ama eco e'yo ewaru dria emu'ba ama vu 'diyi aga ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana. Twayemerera hamwe, nitubaasa kusingura oburemeezi bwona oburikubaasa kutuhikaho.

eng_prompt: During our conversation about kindness and compassion, he shared his thoughts on how we can make a positive impact in the world. He emphasized the importance of helping those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu mboozi yaffe ku kisa n'obusaasizi, yagabana ebirowoozo bye ku ngeri gye tuyinza okukyusaamu ensi. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma watye ka lok I kom kica ki kica, en opoko tamme I kom kit ma watwero kelo alokaloka maber I lobo. En owaco ni pire tek tutwal me konyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aineranarawok nuikamunitos asianut keda aitim, abu ngesi komor aomisioke nuikamunitos epone loipedoria oni aitodolikin akiro nukajokak kotoma akwap. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile e'yo nzeza asi ndriza azini asi ndriza ma dria ri ma alea, eri ece egata ivile geri amani ecozu ojata kililiru ejizu wudrikuru ma dria 'diyi ra. Eri fe okpo orodri 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugaaniira kwaitu aha mbabazi n'embabazi, akagamba aha ku turikubaasa kuhindura ensi. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okuhwera abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In a world often plagued by scandals and dishonesty, it is important to recognize that integrity still exists among those in power. While many may succumb to the temptations of corruption, there are individuals who remain committed to ethical leadership.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde emivuyo n'obutali bwesimbu, kikulu okumanya nti obwesimbu bukyaliwo mu abo abali mu buyinza. Wadde nga bangi bayinza okugwa mu bikemo by'obuli bw'enguzi, waliwo abantu ssekinnoomu abasigala nga beewaddeyo eri obukulembeze obw'empisa.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki bal ki tim me camucana, pire tek tutwal me niang ni dano ma tye ki twero pud gitye ki ada. Kadi bed ni dano mapol gitwero poto i atematema me camcana, tye dano mapol matye ki miti me tela maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda abilibilio naka ikapun keda amamus amunonoro, ejokuna ajenun ebe eringa amunonoro ejaas kanejaas ngul luejaasi toma apugan. Karaida epedorete itunga luipu aibiror kanuka amidicio naka apiyai, ejaasi itunga luipu lueminasi aingarenikinio naejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo onzi azini e'yo ada kokoru 'diyi tre, eri orodriru egazu kini e'yo ada ni nga po'di ovu 'ba opi dria 'diyi ma eselea ci. Ba karakara eyi ka tro e'de e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma alea ra ti, 'ba azi eyi asi 'bapi driceza muke ri ma alea 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu obushomankuzi n'obutari bwesigwa, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu obwesigwa bukiriho omu abo abari omu bwebembezi. N'obu baingi barikubaasa kugwa omu kwohibwa kw'obushomankuzi, hariho abantu abarikuguma baine obwebembezi burungi.

eng_prompt: In his quest for spiritual growth, he seeks guidance and wisdom from various texts. Among them, he finds the most solace in the pages of the Bible.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya okukula mu by'omwoyo, anoonya obulagirizi n'amagezi okuva mu byawandiikibwa eby'enjawulo. Mu byo, asinga kufuna okubudaabudibwa mu mpapula za Baibuli.
ach_prompt: I yenyo dongo i yo me cwiny, en yenyo tira ki ryeko ki I bukke mapat-pat. I kingi, en nongo kwe cwiny madit loyo ki I buk me Baibul.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo apolo, emoi ngesi aicoreta keda acoa kama ejaasi iitabon luegelegela. Kotoma akiro ngun, edumuni ngesi agangat kotoma aiboisio nuka Ebaibuli.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini zota onitaniri ma alia, eri imbata azini ondua nda engazu buku ndundu yi ma alia. Yi ma eselea, eri asi omiza esu tu engazu pari Bibilia ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda okutunguuka kwe omu by'omwoyo, naasherura obuhabuzi n'obwengye kuruga omu bitabo bitari bimwe na bimwe. Omuri byo, akabona okuhuumurizibwa okurikukirayo omu Baibuli.

eng_prompt: During our discussion about forgiveness, he shared his thoughts on the importance of letting go of past grievances. He emphasized that holding onto anger only weighs us down.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwaffe ku kusonyiwa, yafulumizza ebirowoozo bye ku bukulu bw'okulekawo okwemulugunya okwayita. Yakikkaatirizza nti okusibira ekiruyi kituzitowa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma watye ka lok I kom timo kica, en owaco tamme I kom ber pa weko cwer cwiny macon. En owaco ni bedo ki akemo i cwiny dano balo kero wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aineranarawok nuikamunitos aitim, abu ngesi kiner aomisioke nuikamunitos ajokis naka ajalakin angurian nukolo. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe aimidicar anyunyura einakini oni aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Sawa amani e'yo onzezu truta ma dria risi, eri ece e'yo erini ega orodri e'yo onzi agapi 'bo 'diyi kuzu ja ri ma dria ra. Eri 'ba asi kini aoko ma ta mbazuri ni lu ama ma okpo esi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura kwaitu aha kusaasira, akatuha ebiteekateeko bye aha mugasho gw'okwihaho okwetomboita okwabaireho enyima. Akashoboorora ngu okuguma twine ekiniga nikituremesa.

eng_prompt: As we settled into our seats, the congregation buzzed with quiet conversations. The church was filled with a sense of anticipation as the pastor approached the pulpit.
lug_prompt: Bwe twatuula mu bifo byaffe, abantu mu kkanisa baatandika okunyumya mu kasirise. Ekkanisa yabadde ejjudde okweraliikirira ng'omusumba asemberera entebe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wabedo I kabedowa, lwak gubedo ka lok mot mot. Lutela dini gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma latela dini obino I wi kom lega.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio aiboikin toma aiboisio kosi, apotu ikurisitayon kinerata noi. Apotu itunga luka ekanisa kilelebunos noi najaar epasita toma oicolong.
lgg_prompt: Amani amazu pari amavile 'diyi ma alia, 'ba kanisa'a 'diyi e'yo nze e'yere. Kanisa 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayikosi atalaoni eyini muzu pari e'yo 'yezu 'da ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Ku twakashutama omu ntebe zaitu, ab'ekanisa bakatandika kugamba. Ekanisa ekaba eijwire amatsiko ahanyima y'omwahure kuhika aha ntebe.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous campaigns promoting kindness and community support, it seems that some individuals prioritize their own needs above others. This ongoing trend raises concerns about the state of empathy in society.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo kampeyini nnyingi ezitumbula ekisa n'obuyambi okuva mu bantu, kirabika abantu abamu bakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe okusinga eby'abalala. Enkola eno egenda mu maaso ereeta okweraliikirira ku mbeera y'okusaasira mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub tye mapol me miyo kony ki kica bot lwak, nen calo dano mukene giketo miti gi bedo mukwongo. Tim man ma tye kawot anyim kelo lworo I kom kit ma cwiny dano tye kwede I kom luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ikampeins lu isinyikokitos itunga ajaut keda agangat, esubit bala isingarenitos icetunga ipudesiakec adepar luce. Eipone lo lo elosi akonye eyangauni aiyalongong kanu ejautene loka aitim itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti odaza karakara 'diyi ma talasi asi ndriza azini atita ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, eri ena kile 'ba azi 'diyi eyi ma e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'du okporu aga 'ba azi 'diyi. E'yo 'di ni fe asi otiza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
