eng_prompt: In today's society, many individuals prioritize possessions and wealth over experiences and relationships. This trend reflects a growing emphasis on consumerism and the value placed on tangible goods.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, abantu bangi bakulembeza ebintu n'obugagga okusinga obumanyirivu n'enkolagana. Omuze guno gulaga okussa essira ku kugula ebintu n'omugaso oguteekebwa ku bintu ebirabika.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kare-ni, dano mapol giketo jami ki lonyo bedo gin ma pire tek loyo ngec ki bedo ki lurem. Man nyutu ni dano tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom jami ma dano tiyo kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, itunga luipu isingarenitos iboro keda abar adepar ajenanut keda eidicane. Itodunit aswamisioit na ebe ejai agogong naepol noi naka agwel keda iboro luetakanunete.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi afa eyi ma ta mbazu tualu lonyi be 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo eyini esu 'diyi azini aa'ta eyi ma eselea ri. E'yo 'di ece e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu afa jeza ma dria tualu orodri 'bani 'ba afa ndundu 'diyi ma dria ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, abantu baingi nibatwara eby'obugaiga nka bikuru kukira eby'obuhangwa n'omukago. Enkora egi neeyoreka okugyenda kweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'ebintu ebirikureebeka n'ebitarikureebeka.

eng_prompt: As he looked at the faded photographs on the wall, memories of his childhood flooded back. He couldn't help but notice how time had changed his father.
lug_prompt: Bwe yatunuulira ebifaananyi ku bbugwe nga biweddewo, ebintu bye yajjukira mu buto bwe byamujjira mu birowoozo. Yakiraba nti ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, taata we yakyuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka neno cal ma otum I kor ot, wiye opo I kom kare ma en pud tidi. En oneno kit ma kare okelo alokaloka I kom wone.
teo_prompt: Neasesenia ngesi aputosia nuejaasi arwatat, apotu aiituneta nuka apesur ke kopotu bobo. Mam ngesi abu kopedo aanyun epone loajulakinor apak papake.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'daria e'da abi ma dria 'diyi ndreria, e'yo eri vile mvaari ma e'yo ega vile. Eri econi ndra e'yo ndre ku geri sawa ni i ma ati ojazu ri.
nyn_prompt: Ku yaabaire nareeba ebishushani aha kisiika, eby'obuto bwe bikagaruka omu biteekateeko bye. Akaba atarikubaasa kwetegyereza oku obwire bwahindwire ishe.

eng_prompt: Feeling unwell and exhausted, he decided it was best to take a day off. His parents agreed that rest was more important than attending classes.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali tawulira bulungi era ng'akooye nnyo, yasalawo okuwummulako olunaku lumu. Bazadde be bakkiriziganya nti okuwummula kwa mugaso okusinga okugenda mu bibiina.
ach_prompt: Pien en onongo kome pe yot dok ool tutwal, en omoko tamme me kwanyo nino mo me yweyo. Lunyodone guye ni yweyo obedo gin ma pire tek loyo cito i gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Naarai mam ngesi apupi ejok ido apasit, abu ngesi kotema ebe ejokuna aiyengun apaaran adiope. Apotu auriakake ocamutu ebe ejokuna aiyengun adepar alosit atukot.
lgg_prompt: Erini i amazu muke ku azini andezaru, eri 'du e'yo kini eri muke ndeni o'du azi 'duzu. Eri ma tipika ai ra kini ava liza eri orodriru aga muzu kilasi'a ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba atarikwehurira gye kandi aruhire munonga, akasharamu ngu nikirungi kutwara eizooba ry'okuhuumura. Abazaire be bakaikirizana ngu okuhuumura n'ekyomugasho kukira okuza omu bibiina.

eng_prompt: After moving to a new country, he realized the importance of communicating with those around him. Determined to fit in, he sought out classes to improve his language skills.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugenda mu nsi endala, yakiraba nti kikulu nnyo okuwuliziganya n'abantu abamwetoolodde. Olw'okuba yali amaliridde okwegatta ku balala, yanoonya emisomo gy'okuyiga ennimi.
ach_prompt: Inge kobo I lobo mukene, en oniang ber pa lok ki jo ma orumu. Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me bedo I kin lwak, en oyenyo kilac me medo ngecce I kom leb.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aibwot akwap naitetet, abu ngesi kojen ajokis naka einer keda itunga luejaasi ngesi. Keda ekapakina aitodolikin, abu ngesi komo atukono kanu aitojokar angajep ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini muzu kari o'di ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri esu orodri e'yo nzezu 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi pie ri ra. E'yo erini lezu aa'zu o'bi eyi ma eselea risi, eri nda kilasi eyi imbata ti eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuza omu eihanga erindi, akeetegyereza omugasho gw'okugamba n'abantu abamwetooroire. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba amaririire kuhikaana n'abantu, akasherura emishomo y'okutunguura emyoga ye y'orurimi.

eng_prompt: After experiencing frequent headaches and fatigue, he decided to visit the doctor for a check-up. During the examination, the physician took his blood pressure readings.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulumwa ennyo omutwe n'obukoowu, yasalawo okugenda okukeberebwa omusawo. Omusawo bwe yali amukebera, yakebera puleesa ye.
ach_prompt: Inge bedo ki arem wic ki olo mapol, en ocito ka pime bot dakta. Ikare me pime, dakta opime ki pressure.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ariebo naka akou keda apasit, abu ngesi koseu aipejokin emuron kanu awanyanario. Kotoma apak naka ainwakio, abu emuron kipima epuresa ke.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza azini andeza isuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo muzu dakitari vu ari o'bizu. Sawa 'bani eri andriria, dakitari 'du eri ma ari ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okubona obusaasi bwingi n'oburuhe, akasharamu kuza kukyeberwa omushaho. Omu kukyeberwa, omushaho akamukyebera puresha.

eng_prompt: After many years of dedicated service, the community gathered to bid farewell to a beloved figure. It was announced during Sunday mass that our parish priest was transferred to another parish.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obuweereza obw'obwesimbu, abantu baakuŋŋaana okusiibula omuntu omwagalwa. Kyalangirirwa mu kusaba kwa Ssande nti omusumba waffe ow'ekigo yakyusibwa n'atwalibwa mu kigo ekirala.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek, lwak gugure me weko dano ma gimaro. Kicwalo lok angeya ikare me lega I ceng cabit ni ki kobo padi wa me paric I paric mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin, apotu itunga ogurokisi itunganan yeniminan. Aponi kolimorai kotoma ailip naka Naesabiti ebe aponi ijularai esaseredoti wok aiboisit acie.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyini azi ngazu asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi 'ba eyi ma leta be 'diyi ma ti pezu. Ba azi e'yo 'da kanisa ma alea kini 'ba oja padere amavile parisi ri parisi nduni ma alea.

eng_prompt: The church has seen a significant increase in vocations this year. As a result, many young men have answered the call to serve.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa elabye okweyongerayongera okw'amaanyi mu kuyitibwa kw'abakkiriza omwaka guno. N'ekivuddemu, abavubuka bangi bazzeemu omulanga gw'okuweereza.
ach_prompt: Kanica oneno mede pa wel lutino kwan ma tye ka kwano leb munu I mwaka ni. Macalo adwogi ne, bulu mapol gudok I lwongo me tic.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunit ekanisa aiyatakino naepol noi naka aijaanakinio naka esisiak okaru lo. Kanuka ngun, apotu atumunak luipu kocamutu aijaanakin.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa ndre e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi trazu sukulu'a ri ma omgbo ni tu eli 'disi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ode karakara eyi ai 'bani eyi omvezu azi ngazu.
nyn_prompt: Ekanisa ereebire okweyongyera kw'amajuta omwaka ogu. N'ekyarugiremu, eminyeeto mingi eikiriize okwetwa kw'okuheereza.

eng_prompt: After weeks of campaigning and debates, the community gathered at the polling station. Excitement filled the air as residents prepared to make their voices heard.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bakuba kampeyini n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abantu baakuŋŋaanidde mu kifo we balondera. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'abatuuze beetegekera okuleeta amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bito kwir ki laro lok, lwak gugure I kabedo me bolo kwir. Cwiny lwak obedo yom tutwal I kare ma lutedero guyube me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luka aisup aseeta keda ipegeta, apotu itunga kotukokinos aiboisit naka aicak abootin. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma aiboisit naarai akapakina itunga aiwe iporotoikec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani ti odaza 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu tra yi pari voti 'bezuri ma alia. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini eyi otuzu o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuronda akaruuru n'okuhanuura, abantu baketeerana aha mwanya gw'okuteera akaruuru. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okuba abatuuragye baketeekateekyera kuhurira eiraka ryabo.

eng_prompt: After months of anticipation and searching, the church finally announced the arrival of their new spiritual leader. The congregation gathered in the town hall to discuss plans for a warm welcome.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okusuubira n'okunoonya, ekkanisa yasembayo okulangirira okutuuka kw'omukulembeze waayo ow'omwoyo omuggya. Abantu baakuŋŋaanidde mu town hall okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka z'okwaniriza abagenyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kuro ki yenyo, kanica dong otyeko cwalo kwena me oo pa latela gi manyen me cwiny. Lucristayo gugure I town hall me nywako lok I kom yub me jolo dano.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aidar keda aimo, abu ekanisa kolimo adolonokin naka engarenon loitetet. Apotu ikurisitayon kotukokinos otaun hall kanu aitemitem nuka aijaun itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo egazu azini ndazu 'bori ma vutia, kanisa azi asizu e'yo emuzu drice'ba o'diru e'yo aitanisi 'diyiniri ma dria ra. Ba kanisa'a 'diyi tra yi aku ambu town hall niri ma alea agbatara gbazu otuta eyini ecozu eyi ai'zu ayikosi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okutegyereza n'okuronda, ekanisa ekaheza kurangirira okuhika kw'omwebembezi waabo omusya ow'eby'omwoyo. Abantu baketeeranira omu town hall kuhanuura aha nteekateeka y'okutangirirwa gye.

eng_prompt: Lately, it feels like every conversation ends in confusion and hurt feelings. It's as if we're all speaking different languages, unable to connect with one another.
lug_prompt: Ennaku zino, kirabika nga buli mboozi eggwa mu kusoberwa n'okulumwa enneewulira. Kiringa ffenna twogera ennimi ez'enjawulo, nga tetusobola kukwatagana.
ach_prompt: Ite kare ni, nen calo lok weng gik i anywena-nywena ki awano. Obedo calo wan weng watye kalok leb mapat-pat, ma pe watwero kube ki luwotwa.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu, esubit bala ingunget kere enangi kotoma aitolitol ka aimusung aomisiokec. Esubit bala inera oni angajepisinei nuegelegela, mam oni ipedori einer keda luce.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'diyi ma alia, eri ena kile e'yo nzeza dria yi i de e'yo ewaru ma alia azini asi nyoza ma alia. Eri ekile ama dria ti ndundu eyi nze le, ama econi e'yo nze ama eselea ku.

lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ebitundu byabwe ebigenda byeyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti ezisobola okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna. Baazudde enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezeetaagisa ensimbi okutumbula ebizimbe n'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo pa miti pa lwak, lutela me tedero gubedo ka lok i kom yub ma twero kelo dongo lobo. Gin gunongo yub mapigi tego mapol ma mito cente me medo rwom me gedo ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga kec, apotu engarenok luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem ipurojektin luepedorete aitopolor apol. Apotu kesi odumutu ainapeta nuipu nu ekotos ikapun kanu aikeuna aiboisio ka aijanakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu otita ecopi e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otupi ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu otita okporu karakara eyini robia lezu afa ayuzaru azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu omu byaro byabo, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakateerana kuhanuura aha purogyekiti ezirikubaasa kutunguura eby'entaasya. Bakareeba emirimo y'amaani eyabaire neeyetenga esente z'okutunguura ebyombeko hamwe n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: After weeks of intense competition and anticipation, fans are eagerly awaiting the culmination of the tournament. Teams have trained hard, and the atmosphere is electric as everyone prepares for the showdown.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki z'okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okusuubira, abawagizi balindirira n'essanyu enkomerero y'empaka. Ttiimu zitendekeddwa nnyo era buli omu yeetegekera okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem matek tutwal pi cabit mapol, lucwak tye kakuru agiki me pyem ne. Tim mapat-pat tye ka pwonye matek tutwal dok dano weng tye ka yubbe pi pyem matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luka abolobol naepol noi, eutasi egangitok aidar angetakinet naka abolobol. Apotu itimun ituutoonosi kagogong, ido ejai aiboisit naepol noi naarai ekapakina itunga kere kanuka abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani baka sezu okporu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi te avita 'da ma agata avasi. Amuti avita ni 'diyi embata 'ye avasi, dika angu 'da ma alea 'ba dria eyi otuta 'ye abala 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuhayahayana n'okutegyereza, abahagizi bategyereize okuhendera kw'empaka. Za tiimu zitendekirwe munonga, buri omwe ayeteekateekire okurwanisa.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, political parties are gearing up to present their nominees. Voters are eager to learn about the various individuals vying for the highest office in the land.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okulonda esembera, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi byetegekera okwanjula abesimbyewo baabyo. Abalonzi baagala nnyo okumanya ebikwata ku bantu ab'enjawulo abavuganya ku bifo eby'oku ntikko mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka yubbe me nyutu lucungu gi. Lubol kwir tye ki miti madit tutwal me pwonyo dano ma padi padi matye ka pyem I kom gangi tic madongo I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, ekapakina ipatei aitodiar abwoak kec. Ekotosi aseak noi aisisia nuikamunitos itunga luegelegela lueboloboloete kanu eyapiesi loapolon kakere kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria, amuti politiki ni 'diyi eyi otu eyi ma 'ba pa tupi eyivile 'diyi e'dazu. O'bi voti 'bepi 'diyi avasi e'yo onizu 'ba ndu ndu a'bala 'yepi pari opi nyazani uru ndeni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi,ebibiina by'obutegyeki biriyo nibyeteekateekyera okureeta abesimbireho. Abateezi b'akaruuru baine ekihika ky'okwega ebirikukwata aha bantu b'omutaano abarikuhakanira ofiisi y'ahaiguru omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In a highly anticipated event, the leading presidential candidates gathered to discuss their platforms. The atmosphere was charged with excitement as supporters and media alike awaited their arrival.
lug_prompt: Mu mukolo ogubadde gusuubirwa ennyo, abeesimbyewo ku bukulembeze bw'eggwanga baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka zaabwe. Embeera yabadde ejjudde essanyu ng'abawagizi n'abamawulire bonna balindirira okutuuka kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I yub ma byek tye I komgi tutwal, lucungu I yer pa ladit lobo ma oywek gugure me nywako tam gi. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma lucwak ki lucoo lok angea gubedo kakuru oo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loewomitai ebe ebeit ajaikin, apotu abwoak luapolok lukapolok akwap kotukokinos kanu aitemitem akiro kec. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai apotu egangitok keda arotak iyemuto idaritos adolunikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ega 'diyi ma alea, 'ba drice'ba pa tupi purezidenti ru 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba osisiani 'diyi pie eyini eyi ma ecata tezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro ogwabaire niguteekateekwaho munonga, abeesimbireho ahabwa mukuru w'eihanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nteekateeka zaabo. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'abahagizi n'abanyamakuru kutegyereza okuhika kwabo.

eng_prompt: Despite its rich natural resources and vibrant culture, Uganda faces numerous challenges that hinder its progress. Addressing issues such as infrastructure, education, and healthcare is crucial for the country's development.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga Uganda erina eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka bingi n'obuwangwa obulungi, eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi okugilemesa okukulaakulana. Okukola ku nsonga ng'ebizimbe, ebyenjigiriza n'ebyobulamu bya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni Uganda tye ki lonyo me cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo ki tekwaro mabeco, Uganda tye ki peko mapol ma gengo dongo lobo ne. Cobo peko macalo gedo, pwony ki yot kom pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi Uganda keda iboro luipu luka Edeke keda einono loejok, ejaasi Uganda keda atiokisio nuipu nuimikit apoloke. Aitemokin akiro kwape aduketa, asioman keda amukian ejok kanu apol naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni tro ovuzu lonyi nyakuni 'diyi be angiri tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie ra ti, e'yo ewaru eri ma zota atripi 'diyi karakara. E'yo ewaru ekile afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie, onita pie azini e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru tu angu ezoma ni.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho eby'obuhangwa bingi n'obuhangwa burungi, Uganda eine oburemeezi bwingi oburikuzibira entunguuka yaayo. Okukora aha nshonga nk'ebyombeko, eby'obwegyese hamwe n'eby'amagara n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The excitement in the air was palpable as supporters gathered in large numbers. Many had traveled from far and wide to hear the candidate speak.
lug_prompt: Essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika ng'abawagizi bakungaanidde mu bungi. Bangi baali bavudde mu bitundu eby'ewala okuwulira eyeesimbyewo ng'ayogera.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma lucwak gucokke I wel madit tutwal. Dano mapol gu aa ki kabedo maboco me bino ka winyo lok pa lacungu eni.
teo_prompt: Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma okwam naarai apotu egangitok kotukokinos luipu. Alosete itunga luipu kotoma aiboisio nuelwaka kanu aipup einer loka abwoan.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko oli alia ri ndra e'dazaru 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ni okuzu kalafe angiri si. Ba karakara eyi emu engazu angu re ru 'diyi ma alea muzu 'ba pa tupi 'da ma e'yo erizu.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa okwabaire kuri omu mwanya kukaba nikureebeka ahabw'abashagiki okurundaana omubwingi. Abantu baingi bakaba barugire omu myanya ya hare kuhurira omwebembezi owabaire ayesimbireho kugamba.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of American politics, numerous individuals have thrown their hats into the ring for the presidency. However, the path to nomination is often fraught with challenges and obstacles.
lug_prompt: Mu kuvuganya kw'ebyobufuzi mu America, abantu bangi batadde enkoofiira zaabwe mu kuvuganya ku bwa pulezidenti. Newankubadde, ekkubo erigenda mu kusunsulwa litera okubaamu okusoomoozebwa n'ebiziyiza.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem I lok me cungu iwi bye me lobo Amerika, dano mapol gucako cungu I yer me bedo ladit lobo. Kadi bed kumeno, yoo me cito I yer ipol kare opong ki peko ki ariya mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka epolitikis loka America, ipu itunga luejaasi toma abolobol naka araun lokapolon akwap. Konye, epone lo itodolikinere aseo etapit duc ajaut keda atiokisio keda atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: A'bala politiki kari Amerika niri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi 'be eyi ma okpo e'yo purezidenti ni 'diyi ma alea. Kani si, geri 'bani 'ba opezuri ma alia e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi tre.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpaka z'eby'obutegyeki omuri Amerika, abantu baingi bateire enkoofiira zaabo omu kuhakanira entebe y'omwebembezi w'eihanga. Kwonka, omuhanda gw'okutooranwamu nigukira kuba gurimu oburemeezi n'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Empowering the younger generation is crucial for fostering innovation and fresh perspectives in our communities. By encouraging youth involvement, we can ensure a diverse range of voices in decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula omulembe omuto kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obuyiiya n'endowooza empya mu bitundu byaffe. Nga tukubiriza abavubuka okwenyigiramu, tusobola okukakasa amaloboozi ag'enjawulo mu nkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Miyo kero ki joo matino obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi kelo diro manyen I kabedo wa. Ka wacuku cwiny bulu me bedo tye, ci wabineno ni dwon pa dano mapol tye I kare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong atumunak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria acoasinei nuitetiak kotoma atutubenawok. Kowai lo aisinyikokit atumunak ajaut toma aswamisio, ipedori oni awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga luipu keda iporotoi luegelegela kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza 'ba oderu 'diyini ri eri orodriru e'yo o'diru 'diyi ezozu azini egata o'diru 'diyi ejizu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea. Ba ode eyini ava fezu e'yo eyi 'yezu risi, ama eco ne ra kini o'duko ndundu eyi e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eminyeeto n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho okujumbura n'ebiteekateeko ebisya omu byanga byaitu. Twahiga eminyeeto kwejumba omu mirimo, nitubaasa kureeba ngu habaho amahurire gatarikushushana omunkora y'okusharamu.

eng_prompt: Despite his extensive experience in public speaking, many felt he struggled to connect with voters. As the campaign progressed, his speeches became a focal point of concern among his supporters.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yalina obumanyirivu bungi mu kwogera mu lujjudde, bangi baalowooza nti yazibuwalirwa okukwatagana n'abalonzi. Kampeyini bwe yagenda mu maaso, okwogera kwe kwafuuka ensonga enkulu mu bawagizi be.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo ki ngec mapol I lok ki lwak, dano mapol onongo giwinyo ni en tye ka tute matek me kube ki lubol kwir. I kare ma yub me bito kwir tye ka mede anyim, lok mege odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kin lucwak mege.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda amisiarit naepol noi kotoma einer, apotu itunga luipu kowomitos ebe etiono ngesi arucokina keda aseak. Neautar ikampeins alosit, abu einerike koraun ibore yenepol noi kama ejaasi egangitokoke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu nita be angiri e'yo nzezu o'bi ma eselea ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini eri dri ci e'yo nzezu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi pie. Ti odaza ni muzu drile, e'yo erini nze 'diyi eca asi otiza ru 'ba eri ati'ba 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine obukugu bwingi omu kugamba omu bantu, baingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu akaba aine oburemeezi bw'okukwatanisa n'abateezi b'akaruuru. Kampeyini kuyagyendeire omu maisho, okugamba kwe kukareetera abahagizi be okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: Many young people lack a basic understanding of financial principles and economic systems. This gap in knowledge can lead to misconceptions about the country's economic situation.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi tebalina kutegeera kwa musingi ku misingi gy'ebyensimbi n'enkola z'ebyenfuna. Ekituli kino mu kumanya kiyinza okuvaako endowooza enkyamu ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Bulu mapol pe gitye ki niang matut I kom cik ma doro lok kom lim ki yoo me timo biacara. Peko me ngec man twero weko dano bedo ki tam ma pe atir I kom lok me lim me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Atumunak luipu emamiatatar keda amisiikin nuikamunitos ikapun keda epone loka adumun ikapun. Acoa na naka acoa epedori ayangaun aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos ejautene loka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara eyi ma vata e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria azini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria yo. E'yo niza ma esele coza 'diri eco fe egata onzi e'yo lonyi ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Eminyeeto emingi teine bwijwire aha misingye y'eby'esente hamwe n'enkora y'eby'entaasya. Ekituga eki omu kumanya nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyereza okutahikire ahaby'entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges facing our nation, community leaders gathered to discuss strategies for progress. They emphasized the importance of unity and collaboration among citizens.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa eggwanga lyaffe kwe lyolekaganye nakwo gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukulaakulana. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'obumu n'okukolagana mu bannansi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lobo wa tye ka kato ki iye cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo gugure me nywako tam i kom yoo me dongo lobo. Guketo cwinygi I kom ber pa ribe ki winye ikin anywali.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda akwapuwok pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itopoloere. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari amavileri ni esu o'diru 'diyisi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu muzu drile ri ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri ti ecita ni azini ti icita ni kari anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu eihanga ryaitu ryatungire, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguuka. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the city as protests erupted over the controversial decision. In response, law enforcement was deployed to maintain order, but their methods quickly drew criticism.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kibuga olw'okwekalakaasa okwaliwo olw'okusalawo okwali kwawukana. Mu kwanukula, abakuumaddembe baayiiriddwa okukuuma obutebenkevu, naye enkola zaabwe zaaleetawo okwemulugunya amangu ddala.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I boma madit ne I kare ma jemo ocake pi moko tam matye ki apoka-poka. Macalo adwogi ne, kicwalo abili me gwoko kuc, ento yoo gi okelo koko oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos koibuga naarai apotu aidiya kogeutu kanuka aseunet ngin. Kanu abongokin, aponi ibwaikinai ipolisin aidar ainapakina, konye apotu iponesiokec kitoronata.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri tu aku ambu city niri ma alea e'yo ngiringiri ni e'dozu e'yo 'duza 'da ma e'yosi. E'yo 'di ma omvitaniria, 'ba 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi 'ba azita ma ta mbazu, te geri yini 'diyi eji e'yo onzi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu rurembo ahabw'obwesharingo obwabaireho ahabw'okusharaho. Omu kugarukamu, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakateebwaho kurinda obusingye, kwonka enkora yaabo ekareetaho okwetomboita.

eng_prompt: After weeks of research and interviews, she finally felt ready to share her findings with the world. The topic had sparked her curiosity for years, and she was eager to engage her audience.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'anoonyereza era ng'abuuzibwa ebibuuzo, kyaddaaki yawulira nga mwetegefu okugabana bye yazuula n'ensi. Omulamwa gwali gumusanyusizza okumala emyaka, era yali ayagala nnyo okusikiriza abawuliriza be.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kwed ki lok ki dano, en dong otyeko winyo ni etye atera me nywako jami ma en onongo ki lobo. Pwony man okelo miti ne pi mwaki mapol, dok en onongo tye ki miti matek me miyo ngec bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aingic keda aingisingisio, abu ngesi kopup ekapakina aimor akeswam keda akwap kere. Akoto ngesi akiro ngun adaun ikar luipu, ido akoto ngesi aitelekaar itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia e'yo vuti ondaza azini ozita eyi ma alea 'diyi ma vutia, eri ega asizu kini i ngonde e'yo erini esu 'diyi awazu wudrikuru be ra. E'yo nde fe eri dri ava eli karakara, dika eri ava be 'ba erivile 'diyi dri e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okucondooza n'okubuuzibwa, ahamuheru akahurira ayeteekateekire kugabana ebiyarikushanga n'ensi yoona. Omutwe gukaba gumureesireho ekyetengo kumara emyaka mingi, kandi akaba aine ekihika ky'okushendashenda abantu be.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the principles of transparency and representation are fundamental. It is essential for the governing bodies to uphold their responsibilities to the populace they serve.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, emisingi gy'obwerufu n'okukiikirirwa bikulu nnyo. Kya mugaso nnyo ebitongole ebifuga okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwaabyo eri abantu be biweereza.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, cik me ada ki cung iwi lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gucob tic gi bot lwak ma gitiyo pigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, epolok noi ainapeta nuka aica ka abwoikinitok. Erai ibore yenejok aiboisio nu epugae aitodolikin aswamukec mama ejaasi itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democratia ni ma alea, e'yo ada azini 'ba pa tupi 'diyi orodriru. Eri orodriru amuti driceza ni 'diyi ni azi eyini nga o'bi eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ri 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, engyenderwaho y'oburingaaniza n'okujwekyerwa n'ey'omugasho munonga. N'eky'omugasho ebitongore ebirikutegyeka okuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwabyo ahabantu abu birikuheereza.

eng_prompt: In times of moral uncertainty and societal division, the guidance of spiritual figures can provide a much-needed perspective. Their insights can help bridge the gap between faith and governance, fostering a more compassionate approach to leadership.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali butebenkevu mu mpisa n'enjawukana mu bantu, okulambika kw'abantu b'eby'omwoyo kusobola okuwa endowooza eyeetaagibwa ennyo. Okutegeera kwabwe kusobola okuyamba okuziba ekituli wakati w'enzikiriza n'obukulembeze, okutumbula enkola y'obukulembeze ey'obusaasizi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me kwo ki apoka-poka ikin lwak, kony pa lutela dini twero miyo tam ma mite tutwal. Ngec gi twero konyo me juko apoka poka ikin dini ki tela, ki kelo yoo me tela ma lakica.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus aijen ka atiakatiaka kotoma atutubet, aingarenikinio naka itunga luka edini epedori aijaikin aomisio nuepolok noi. Epedorete acoasinei kec aingarakin aitikitik atiaketait naejai kiding aiyuun keda epugae, aitopolor epone loesiana noi loka aingarenikin.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezu azini esele coza ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea, imbata 'ba e'yo aita ni 'diyi ni 'diyi niri eco geri 'bani egazu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi fe ra. Egata yini 'diyi eco azakoma fe esele coza a'ita ma eselea driceza be ri ma omgbo otuzu, geri asi ndriza be driceza ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwerarikirira hamwe n'okwebaganisamu omu bantu, okuhaburwa kw'abantu b'eby'omwoyo nikubaasa kureetaho enteekateeka erikwetengwa munonga. Ebiteekateeko byabo nibibaasa kuhwera omu kuzibira omwanya oguri ahagati y'enyikiriza n'obwebembezi, okureetaho engyenderwaho y'obwebembezi ey'embabazi.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling trend in political systems around the world. Many nations are experiencing a decline in civic engagement and political freedoms.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga enkola etabula mu nkola z'ebyobufuzi okwetooloola ensi yonna. Amawanga mangi galaba okukendeera mu kwegatta kw'abantu n'eddembe ly'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto jami ma tye katimme I tenge me cungu iwi bye I wilobo lung. Lobo mapol tye kaneno dwogo piny pa rwom me bedo tye pa lwak kacel ki bedo agonya I lok me cungu iwi bye.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit epone loetiono noi kotoma akiro nuka politikis kotoma akwap kere. Akwapin nuipu ewanyunitos aibiror naka aineranara naka itunga keda ailajara naka politikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza fepi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria wudrikuru ma kalasi dria. Kari karakara eyi e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea azini driwala politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi esi esi esi esi.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'eby'obutegyeki omu nsi yoona. Amahanga maingi gariyo nigakora aha kukyendeera kw'abantu n'obugabe bw'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After years of working for others, he finally decided it was time to pursue his own dreams. With a solid plan in hand and a passion for innovation, he started up a new business.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka ng'akolera abalala, yasemba okusalawo nti kye kiseera okutuukiriza ebirooto bye. Olw'okuba yalina enteekateeka ennungi era ng'ayagala nnyo okukola ebintu ebipya, yatandikawo bizinensi empya.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi jo mukene pi mwaki mapol, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me cobo lek ma mege. En ocako biacara manyen pien onongo tye ki yub maber dok tye ki miti me timo jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kanuka luce, abu ngesi kotub apak naka aitodolikin airujasia ke. Keda ainapeta nuajokak keda eipud loka aitolomunun iboro luitetiak, abu ngesi kogeu ebiasara loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu 'ba azi 'diyi dri 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asizu kini sawa ca di orobi i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ra. Otita kililiru be drinia azini leta e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria, eri e'do tujara o'dini'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikukorera abandi, akacwamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okukuratira ebirooto bye. Ahabw'okugira enteekateeka nungi omu ngaro hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okujumbura, akatandikaho bizinesi nsya.

eng_prompt: After waiting for hours without any response, they decided to reach out to him directly. Concerned about his silence, they picked up the phone to see if he was okay.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulinda okumala essaawa eziwera nga tewali azzeemu, baasalawo okumutuukirira butereevu. Olw'okweraliikirira olw'okusirika kwe, baakwata essimu okulaba oba yali bulungi.
ach_prompt: Inge kuro pi cawa malac labongo nongo lagam, gumoko tamgi me lok kwede atir. Pi lworo ma obedo kwede, gukwanyo cim me neno ka en tye maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar adaun isawan luipu komamei abongokinet, apotu kesi kopedosi adolokin ngesi. Apotu kesi kopodokisi nuikamunitos aililingakec, apotu kesi kodumutu esimu kanu awanyun arai ejokuna ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani te omvita kokoru 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai e'yo nzezu eyi ma eselea. Asi otiza erini ovuzu ciri ma e'yosi, eyi 'du simu ndrezu kani eri muke yari.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurinda eshaaha nyingi bateine eki bagarukiremu, bakasharamu kumuhikaho butunu. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'okwisirika kwe, bakakwata esimu kureeba yaaba ari gye.

eng_prompt: Authorities received numerous complaints about the content being broadcasted. After a thorough investigation, they decided to take immediate action against the station.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baafunye okwemulugunya kungi ku bintu ebiragibwa ku mpewo. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo ku siteegi.
ach_prompt: Lutela gunongo koko mapol I kom jami ma kibedo ka cwalo iwi yamo. Ingee kwedo lok matut, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo I kom dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio odumutu angurian nuipu nuikamunitos akiro nueutasi aitodiar kotelebision. Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu kesi koseutu aswam katipet mama ejai esitesen ngol.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi esu onu karakara eyi e'yo 'bani oyu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo 'du coti coti pari radio ni 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakatunga okwetomboitwa kwingi aha bikwatiraine n'ebintu ebyabaire nibiheebwa aha mikutu. Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi, bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho aha sitesheni.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and collaboration, the team was excited to finally see their efforts come to fruition. Participants arrived eager to engage in the activities designed to foster creativity and teamwork.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okukwatagana, ttiimu yasanyuka okulaba nga kaweefube waabwe atuuse ku buwanguzi. Abeetabamu baatuuka nga beesunga okwenyigira mu mirimu egyateekebwawo okutumbula obuyiiya n'okukolera awamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki winye, dul pa lutic ne cwinygi obedo yom me neno ni tute gi ocobo miti gi. Dano gubino ki miti me bedo tye i yub ma kiyubu pi dongo diro ki tic kacel.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin keda aiswamanara, eyalama etimu noi nawanyunia kesi aswamukec. Apotu itunga luka atukot ngin kopotu ekapakina alomar toma aswamisinei nu itolomunitai kanu aitopolor acoa ka aswam nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu tualu ti ecita be, amuti 'da ndra ayikosi eyini ani e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi esuzu asizu. Ba emu'ba 'diyi eca avasi e'yo 'yeta 'bani otule e'yo ndundu eyi edezu o'diru azini azi ngazu tualu 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, tiimu ekaba eshemereirwe kureeba amaani gaayo garikuhikiirira. Abeejumbiremu bakaija baine ekihika ky'okwejumba omu mirimo etebekanisiibwe okureetaho okujumbura n'okukorera hamwe.

eng_prompt: Participants from various backgrounds gathered to enhance their skills and knowledge. Excitement filled the air as the event was about to begin.
lug_prompt: Abeetabamu okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanye okwongera ku bukugu n'amagezi gaabwe. Obwagazi bwajjula empewo ng'omukolo gunaatera okutandika.
ach_prompt: Dano ma aa ki kabedo mapatpat gugure kacel me medo ngecgi ki diro gi. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma yub ne onongo cok cake.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luegelegela kotukokinos kanu aikeuna acoa kec keda acoa. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam najaar epucit ageun.
lgg_prompt: Ba engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi eyi ma ondua azini ondua otuzu. Ayiko fu oli alia omu 'da ni e'dozu 'boria.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu kuruga omu myanya etari emwe, baketeeranira hamwe okwongyera emyoga n'obwengye bwabo. Akashemererwa kakarugaho ahabwokuba omukoro gukaba guri haihi kutandika.

eng_prompt: As the planning committee finalized the details, they reached out to various companies for support. Their efforts paid off, as the event had several sponsors.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko akakola ku nteekateeka bwe kaali kamaliriza ebintu byonna, baatuukirira kkampuni ez'enjawulo okufuna obuyambi. Okufuba kwabwe kwavaamu ebibala, kubanga omukolo gwaliko abavujjirizi bangi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma dul ma doro yub tye ka tyeko tic gi, gu lok ki dul mapat-pat me nongo kony. Tute gi okelo adwogi maber pien yub eni onongo tye ki joo ma culu pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Neautar ekomiti loka aitemonokin ainapeta ngun, apotu kesi odolokisi ikampunin luegelegela kanu agangat. Apotu agogongukec kotacata, naarai ajaasi epucit ngol keda egangitok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Komiti otita eyi o'bapi 'diyi ni e'yo eyi 'yezu 'boria, eyi esu amuti ndundu eyi atita fezu. Okpo eyini 'ba ri ofe ra a'dusikuni 'ba atita robia niri fepi 'diyi ndra karakara.
nyn_prompt: Akakiiko k'okuteekateekyera akarikuhendera ebirikukwata aha nshonga, kakahika ahari kampuni nyingi kutunga obuhwezi. Amaani gaabo gakashashurwa, ahabw'okuba omukoro gukaba gwine abarikugushagika baingi.

eng_prompt: Delegates from around the world gathered in the bustling city, eager to share their insights and innovations. The atmosphere buzzed with anticipation as participants prepared for the opening remarks.
lug_prompt: Ababaka okuva mu nsi yonna baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibuga ekirimu abantu abangi nga baagala okugabana amagezi gaabwe n'obuyiiya bwabwe. Embeera yabaddemu okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ng'abeetabye mu lukungaana beetegekera okwogera okuggulawo.
ach_prompt: Luwang lwak ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat gugure I citi man ma dano dwong iye tutwal, ki miti me nywako tam gi ki jami manyen ma guyubu. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma gubedo ka yubbe pi lok ma oyabo.
teo_prompt: Apotu abwoikinitok luka akwap kere kotukokinos osite lo ejai itunga luipu noi, ekotosi aimor acoasineikec keda acoasineikec nuitetiak. Ajaasi itunga keda eipud loepol noi loakapakina kanu einer loebeitor apukor.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi tra yi aku ambu city ru 'diyi ma alia avasi yi ma egata azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi awazu. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra asi 'baza be eyini eyi otuzu e'yo 'ba eyini nze 'diyi ma ti zizu.
nyn_prompt: Abajwekyerwa kuruga omunsi yoona, baketeerana omu rurembo orurimu abantu baingi, barikwenda kugabana ebiteekateeko byabo n'obuhangu bwabo. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga ahabw'okweteekateekyera okugamba kw'okwiguraho.

eng_prompt: As guests began to arrive, a long line formed outside the venue. Everyone was required to show identification and pass through a metal detector before entering.
lug_prompt: Abagenyi bwe baatandika okutuuka, olunyiriri oluwanvu lwatandikibwawo wabweru w'ekifo. Buli omu yabadde yeetaagibwa okulaga endagamuntu n'okuyita mu byuma ebikebera ebyuma nga tanayingira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wele gucako oo, lain ma boco ocake woko. Dano weng omyero gunyut lanyut mamegi nyo ID gi dok bene gukat I Cuma ma ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede ma peya gudonyo.
teo_prompt: Neageuna aipejonokin ipejok, apotu ikokoro luapolok kiswamaunos kokinga naka aiboisit. Ibusakinit nginitunganan aitodun apapula naka aiwadikaet kosodi aitub ainwakio naka acuma eringa elomaria.
lgg_prompt: Omu eyini e'dozu ecazu 'boria, layini ezuru 'diyi e'do pari avita ni 'da ma alea amve. Ba le 'ba dria ma e'da kokobi e'dazuri azini ma ali afa cuma afa ndundu eyi onyuzu 'diyi ma alea raka de nga po'di eyi fi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abagyenyi ku batandikire kuhika, orunyiriri ruraingwa rukabaho aheeru y'omwanya. Buri omwe akaba ashemereire kworeka endanga muntu kandi arikuraba omu byoma atakatahire.

eng_prompt: The exclusive event was shrouded in mystery, with only a select few receiving the coveted invitations. Organizers wanted to ensure an intimate atmosphere for the gathering.
lug_prompt: Omukolo ogw'enjawulo gwali mu kyama, nga batono abalondeddwa bokka be baafuna ebiwandiiko ebibayita. Abategesi baali baagala okuteekawo embeera ey'omukwano mu lukungaana.
ach_prompt: Yub eni obedo gin ma mung, jo manok keken aye gunongo lwongo ma obedo kamito tutwal. Luyub gubedo ki miti me neno ni dano ducu gubedo agonya i kacokke ne.
teo_prompt: Epucit lo loitegelikina arai lo aiyeyea, ido ikidioko lu aseun bon kesi apotu kodumutu aiwororio. Akotosi lu itemonokinak aanyun ebe ejai eidicane loajokan noi.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ma alea e'yo azi 'bani nile ku ni eyi ndra ci, 'ba were 'bani ope 'diyi esu lu omveta 'bani le saaru 'diyi. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi le ndra ne ra kini e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma ovu onyiru tu okuta 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'omutaano gukaba guri ogw'ekihama, abantu bakye nibo baaherize kwetwa. Abatebekanisa bakaba nibenda okureeba ngu enteerane eba ey'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming workshop, organizers emphasized the importance of proper identification. To ensure a smooth check-in process, attendees were reminded of the necessary documentation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera omusomo ogujja, abategesi bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okumanya obulungi. Okukakasa enkola y'okukebera obulungi, abeetabye bajjukiziddwa ku biwandiiko ebyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi kacoke me pwonye matye kabino ni, luyub ne gucuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa lanyut maber. Me neno ni yub me donyo obedo maber, ki poyo wi joo ma obedo tye i yub enoni i kom coc ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin nuka airiamun naebunit, apotu luitemonokinak kitogogongoto ajokis naka ajenanut. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ainwakio, aponi isiitikinai itunga aiwadikaeta nu ekotos.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita imbatani emupi 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba otuta otupi 'diyi 'ba asi orodri e'dazu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba emu'ba 'diyi andrizu kililiru, 'ba ega 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma e'yo kokobi eyini lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza omushomo ogurikwija, abatebekanisa bakahamya omugasho gw'okumanywa kurungi. Okureeba ngu enkora y'okukyeberamu ekabaho kurungi, abaizire omu ruteerane bakaijusibwa ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising cost of living and economic challenges, many communities in Uganda are seeking new ways to improve their financial stability. As a result, Ugandans have started engaging in several income-generating activities.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna, abantu bangi mu Uganda banoonya engeri empya ez'okutumbula embeera yaabwe ey'eby'enfuna. N'ekivuddemu, Bannayuganda batandise okwenyigira mu mirimu egy'enjawulo egivaamu ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa wel cente me kwo ki peko me can lim, lwak mapol I Uganda tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me limgi. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda gucako timo jami mapol ma kelo lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka aijar keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aitojokar ejautene kec loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ageutu itunga luko Uganda aswam aswamisinei nu itolomete ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje idri nyazaniri tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi pie, ongulumu karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi geri ndundu eyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi e'do 'yeta ndundu robia ejipi 'diyi 'ye 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera hamwe n'oburemeezi omu by'entaasya, abantu baingi omu Uganda nibaronda emiringo misya y'okutunguura entatsya yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abanya Uganda batandikire kwejumba omu mirimo mingi erikureeta entaasya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost the local economy and support community development, the organization has formed a strategic alliance with several businesses. This collaboration aims to enhance workforce skills and create sustainable job openings.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu, ekitongole kikoze omukago ne bizinensi eziwerako. Enkolagana eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obukugu bw'abakozi n'okutondawo emirimu egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor tic me lim ki dongo lobo, dul eni oyubu winye ki biacara mapol. Ribbe man tye ki miti me ilo rwom me diro pa lutic ki yubu dog tic matye pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun ka aigangit apol naka itunga, eswamau erionget aiswamanara keda ibiasaran luipu. Alosikinet naka aimorikikina kangin erai aitojokar acoa naka eswamak ka aitolomun aswamisinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu ongulumu eyini zozu ri ma alea, amuti 'da e'do ti ecita tujari karakara eyi pie. Ti ecita 'di ma asisile lezu ondua fezu azi'ba eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu dika lezu 'ba eyi ma esu azi eyi sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'entunguuka omu byaro, ekitongore kitandikireho enkoragana n'ebitongore bitari bimwe. Enkoragana egi negyenderera okutunguura emyoga y'abakozi n'okutandikaho emirimo erikugumaho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster innovation and development, both nations have recognized the importance of collaboration in key sectors. This strategic alliance aims to leverage each country's strengths to address common challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obuyiiya n'enkulaakulana, amawanga gombi gakkirizza obukulu bw'okukolagana mu bintu ebikulu. Omukago guno ogw'obukodyo gugenderera okukozesa amaanyi ga buli ggwanga okukola ku kusoomoozebwa okwa wamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo diro manyen ki dongo lobo, lobe aryo weng guneno ber pa winye I tenge mapigi tego. Dul man tye ki miti me tic ki kero pa lobo acel-acel me tyeko peko matye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor acoasinei nuitetiak keda apol, ejenete akwapin ngun kere ajokis naka aiswamanara kotoma atutubena nuepolok. Alosikinet naka aimorikikina ngin erai aitwasam agogong naka akwap kanu aitemokin atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ndundu eyi edezu azini angu ezoma ma omgbo otuzu, kari iri 'diyi esu orodri ti icita ni esele okporu 'diyi ma alea ri ra. Ti ecita 'di ma asisile lezu okpo kari alu alu ni 'diyi ayuzu e'yo ewaru yi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okujumbura n'entunguuka, amahanga gombi gatungire omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu bitongore ebikuru. Omukago ogu nigugyenderera okukoresa amaani ga buri eihanga kukora ahaburemeezi bwaboona.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of Ebola in the region, health officials are implementing new measures to ensure public safety. As part of these efforts, the ministry will monitor vaccination against Ebola in West Nile.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kwa Ebola mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bateeka mu nkola enkola empya okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule ejja kulondoola okugema kwa Ebola mu West Nile.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ebola ma otime cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom tye ka kati ki yoo manyen me gwoko kwo pa lwak. Macalo but yub eni, gangkal obi bedo ki wang mabit I kom yub me gwero dano i kom two ebola I West Nile.
teo_prompt: Kanu abwangunor adeka naka ebola kotoma aiboisit, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aitolomun iwaitin luitetiak kanu ayuarite itunga. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, ebuni erionget aimaniman aikis ekato loka ebola ko West Nile.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu angu 'di ma alea ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi 'ba o'bi eyi ma tambazu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu alataniri nga aro soza azo ebola nirisi angu westnile niri ma alea ri ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ya ebora omu kyanga kyabo, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibakoresa emiringo misya okurinda abantu. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, minisiture neija kureebuuza okugyema ebola omuri West Nile.

eng_prompt: The logistics for the upcoming vaccination campaign have been finalized. Teams are currently mobilizing to ensure timely delivery of vaccines to various regions.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kaweefube w'okugema ogujja biwedde. Ttiimu mu kiseera kino zikunga okukakasa nti eddagala erigema lituusibwa mu bitundu eby'enjawulo mu budde.
ach_prompt: Ki tyeko tic ki jami weng ma mite pi yub me gwero dano matye kabino ni. Dul mapat-pat tye ka rweyo dano me neno ni yat agwera oo I kabedo mapat-pat I cawa kikome.
teo_prompt: Aponi ongetakinai akiro nuikamunitos ekato lo ebunit. Eutasi kwana itimun aimorikikin kanu awanyun ebe edolonokinete ikee luikisere adekasinei kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba de e'yo otita aro soza ni emupi 'diyi ma dria 'bo. Amuti eyi sa'wa 'disi eyi tra eyini ani aro azo atrizu 'diyi ma esuta angu ndundu eyi ma alea sa'wa dria ri nezu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'okukoresa omu hururu y'okusirika erikwija, byahwaire. Za tiimu obwahati ziriyo nizikorera hamwe, okureeba ngu emibazi y'okugyema etwarwa omu bwire burungi omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have developed a comprehensive vaccination plan. Prioritizing those on the front lines, the initial phase will focus on immunizing health workers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakoze enteekateeka y'okugema enzijuvu. Nga tukulembeza abo abali ku mwanjo, omutendera ogusooka gujja kussa essira ku kugema abasawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom guyubu yub me gwero dano weng. Ki keto cwiny I kom joo matye I nyimgi, dul me acel obi keto cwiny I kom gwero lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ainapeta nuka aikis ekato. Kowai lo aisingarenit ngul luejaas oingaren, eponio aisingarenit aikis ekato mama ejaasi eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita aro soza ni 'diyi dria. E'yo driceza fezu 'ba drilea 'diyi ma dria, e'yo okori nga asi 'ba arojo'a 'diyi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire, abakuru omu by'amagara batandikireho enteekateeka y'okugyema. Okwebembeza abo abari omu myanya y'okubanza, omutendera gw'okubanza nigwija kuta amaani aha kusirika abakozi b'ebyamagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rise in ebola cases, community leaders expressed the urgent need for a coordinated effort to address the health crisis. As a result, district officials in West Nile organised a meeting following the ebola outbreak.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera kw'abalwadde ba ebola, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaze obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu ba disitulikiti mu West Nile baategeka olukiiko oluvannyuma lw'okubalukawo kwa ebola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two ebola, lutela me kabedo mapatpat guwaco ni omyero ki tii matek tutwal me lweny i kom peko me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me dictrikme west nile guyubu kacoke inge poto pa two ebola.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda ebola, apotu engarenok luka atutubet itodutu eipud loka aswam kagogong kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak luko West Nile kitemokisi airiamunet kanu abwangun naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu okporu risi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ece e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba distrikiti ni westnilea 'diyi otu mitingi e'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba ebola, abebembezi b'ebyanga boorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu disiturikiti omuri West Nile bakakora orukiiko ahabw'okubarukaho kwa ebola.

eng_prompt: In the ongoing battle against the pandemic, prioritizing the safety of those on the front lines is crucial. Ensuring that health workers receive vaccinations first can help protect both them and the vulnerable populations they serve.
lug_prompt: Mu lutalo olugenda mu maaso okulwanyisa ekirwadde bbunansi, okukulembeza obukuumi bw'abo abali ku mwanjo kikulu nnyo. Okukakasa nti abasawo basooka kugemebwa kisobola okuyamba okubakuuma n'abantu abateesobola be baweereza.
ach_prompt: I lweny matye kawot anyim me lweny i kom two ma opoto ni, gwoko kwo pa jo ma tye i nyim lweny pire tek tutwal. Neno ni lutic yoto kom kong gikwongo nongo yat agwera twero konyo me gwokogi kacel ki jo magoro magitye ka tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojie lo elosi akonye kanu aitiji adeka naka ekorona, ibusakinit aisingarenit ayuwar naka ngul lu ejaas oingaren. Aanyun ebe edumununete eswamak lu adekis ekato losodit epedori ayuarite kes keda itunga lu ican lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'diza mupi drile a'di 'dizu azo 'dezaniri be ri ma alea, e'yo 'ba a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a' Ba ka ne ra kini 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi oso aro azo atrizurisi oko, 'di eco yi ma ta mba azini 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia yini azi ngazu yi be 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have identified several areas with a high number of reported symptoms. To contain the spread of the virus, the ministry will vaccinate a circle suspected to be having ebola cases.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bazudde ebifo bingi ebirimu obubonero bungi. Okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka, minisitule ejja kugema abantu abateeberezebwa okuba n'abalwadde ba ebola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two eni, lutic me yot kom gunongo kabedo mapol matye ki lanyut mapol tutwal. Me gengo nya pa two eni, gangkal obi gwero dano ma byek tye ni gitye ki two ebola.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kodumutu aiboisio nuipu nuejaasi keda ijenuneta luipu. Kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona, ebuni erionget aikis ekato mama ejaasi itunga lu eomitai ebe ejaas keda ebola.

eng_prompt: Due to limited vaccine supplies, the health authorities have implemented a new policy. As a result, only contacts of contacts will be vaccinated.

ach_prompt: Pi nok pa yat agwera, lutic yoto kom gukati ki cik manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma gubedo cok ki jo ma gubedo cok kwedgi keken aye kibi gwero gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikidioko ikee luikisere ekato, etolomutu apedorosio nuka angaleu ainapeta nuitetiak. Kanuka ngun, itunga bon luejaasi keda itunga luekorete keda ekorona kes eponio aikis ekato.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu emibazi y'okusirika nkye, ab'eby'amagara bateireho engyenderwaho nsya. N'ekyarugiremu, abo bonka abaabaire baine akakwate n'abo abaabaire baine akakwate, nibo barikuza kusirikwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing discussions about public health and safety, it is crucial to consider the impact of closures on communities. Maintaining access to essential services is vital for both education and economic stability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kukubaganya ebirowoozo okugenda mu maaso ku byobulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri okuggalawo gye kukosaamu ebitundu. Okukuuma obuweereza obwetaagisa kikulu nnyo mu by'enjigiriza ne mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nywako lok matye kawot anyim I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki pa loro piny I kom lwak. Bedo ki gum me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano pire tek tutwal pi kwan ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ineresinei lu elosi akonye nuikamunitos angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nuka agolokinio naka akwap mama ejaasi itunga. Ajaut keda ejanakine loejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka asioman keda ainapakina naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara ni mupi drile e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo angu ti opiza ni 'diyi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma dria ri ma dria. Afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi ma esuta ma tambaza eri orodriru onita ni azini e'yo robiani 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhanuura okurikugyenda omu maisho ahaby'amagara n'okwerinda kw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oburemeezi bw'okukingaho abantu omu byaro. Okugumizamu n'okutunga obuheereza bw'omugasho n'eky'omugasho omu by'obwegyese hamwe n'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In light of recent outbreaks, it is crucial to prioritize public health education. Empowering communities with accurate information can significantly reduce the risk of transmission.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'obulwadde buno gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza okusomesa abantu ku byobulamu. Okutumbula ebitundu n'obubaka obutuufu kisobola okukendeeza ennyo obulabe bw'okusiigibwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me keto pwony me yot kom obed gin ma pire tek. Miyo kero ki lwak ki ngec matir twero dwoko piny rwom me nyaa pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo abwangunor adekasinei pac, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aisisianakino naka angaleu naka itunga. Aitogogong itunga keda akiro nuka abeit epedori aitidisiar atiokisio nuka awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo onita e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ri 'duzu okporu. Ongulumu eyini okpo fezu o'dukoti kililiru 'diyisi ri eco e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esi ra.
