eng_prompt: The lack of designated entry points for inspections poses significant challenges for security measures. As a result, the flow of goods and people remains largely unmonitored.
lug_prompt: Obutabeera na bifo ebiteekeddwateekeddwa okwekebejjebwa kireetawo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri eby'okwerinda. N'ekivuddemu, entambula y'ebyamaguzi n'abantu esigala nga tekeberebwa.
ach_prompt: Bedo peke pa kabedo me donyo ma kiyubu pi ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede kelo peko madit tutwal I tenge me gwoko kuc. Macalo adwogi ne, wot pa jami ki dano pol kare pe kineno.
teo_prompt: Amamus na aiboisio nu itodunitai kanu aingic itunga eyangauni ainingosit naepol noi mama ejaasi ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, mam ewanyunitai elose loka iboro keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani ope fizu angu onezu 'diyi ma ako ni e'yo ewaru eji e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo afa ozizaru azini 'ba yini acizu 'diyi ma dria ri ma pamvu ku.
nyn_prompt: Obutabaho bw'emyanya y'okutayayisa abantu, nikireetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, entambura y'abantu n'ebintu terikukyeberwa.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous testing and monitoring, health officials reported a significant decline in new ebola cases. In a press conference, the ministry announced the successful containment of the virus.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukebera ennyo n'okulondoola, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza okukendeera kw'abalwadde ba ebola abapya. Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, minisitule yalangiridde obuwanguzi mu kuziyiza akawuka.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pimo ki bedo ki wang matek, lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two ebola odok piny tutwal. I kare me lok ki luco lok angeya, gangkal owaco ni guloyo lweny i kom two corona.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu ainwakio ka aanyanar, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kitodutu ebe ekidiokoto noi adekak luka ebola. Kotoma airiamun naka arotak iyemuto, abu erionget kolimo ebe epedorio aitikitik ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu azini eyi ma pamvu onezu okporu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma kalafe esi ra. E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri ma alea, okalamvu alataniri azi e'yo 'bani ecozu azo 'da ma aza kozu ra ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukyebera n'okureebuuza, abakuru omu by'amagara bakagira ngu omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba ebola gukakyendeera. Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisiture ekarangirira obusinguzi omu kurwanisa akakooko.

eng_prompt: Health officials reported a sudden outbreak of Ebola in the region. Despite efforts to contain the virus, the situation quickly escalated, leading to tragic consequences.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza ku kubalukawo kwa Ebola mu kitundu. Newankubadde waaliwo kaweefube w'okuziyiza akawuka, embeera yayonooneka mangu ekyavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni two ebola opoto atura I twok piny eni. Kadi bed ni ki keto tek me lweny i kom two eni, peko ne omede oyot ma okelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi abwangun naka adeka naka ebola katutubet. Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitikitik ekorona, abu ejautene itolitol noi, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alatani 'diyi ece e'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu angu 'da ma alea mbeleru ri ma dria. Okpo 'bani 'ba azo 'da ma aza kozu ra ti, e'yo 'da ma omgbo tu mbeleru, erini fezu e'yo onzi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bakagamba aha kubarukaho kw'endwara ya Ebola omu kyanga. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okurwanisa akakooko, embeera ekeyongyera, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Health officials are closely monitoring the situation in the region. Recent reports indicate a surge in Ebola cases in nearby nations, raising concerns for Uganda's safety.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balondoola embeera mu kitundu. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti abalwadde ba Ebola beeyongedde mu mawanga agaliraanyeewo, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira ku by'okwerinda kwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom tye ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I twok piny eni. Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel dano matye ki two ebola tye ka medde tutwal I lobo ma orumuwa, ma man okelo lworo I kom gwoko kuc pa lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak lu adekis aanyanar ejok ejautene lo aiboisit. Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ebola kotoma akwapin nu idunyare, ido eyangauni aiyalongong naka ayuwara nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo angu 'da ma alea ri ma pamvu one. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo fe asi otiza kari Uganda niri ma ageitema ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bariyo nibareebuuza embeera omu kyanga. Ripoota ez'obwahati nizooreka okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba Ebola omu mahanga agatuherereire, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kwa Uganda.

eng_prompt: After weeks of intensive efforts and collaboration with local health organizations, the situation began to stabilize. Health officials reported a significant decrease in new cases, indicating that their strategies were proving effective.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bakolagana n'ebitongole by'ebyobulamu mu kitundu, embeera yatandika okutebenkera. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baaloopa okukendeera kw'abalwadde abapya, ekiraga nti enkola zaabwe zaali zikola.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me tic matek kacel ki dule me yot kom me tedero, jami ocako bedo maber. Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two odok piny tutwal, ma nyutu ni yoo gi tye ka tic maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aswam kagogong keda aiswamanara keda iriongeta luka angaleu, abu ejautene kogeu ainapakina. Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe ekidiokoto noi adekasinei nuitetiak, itodunit ebe iswamaete kesi ejok.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia okpo 'bazu tualu azi ngazu tualu amuti e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie, e'yo 'da e'do otu ra. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo be o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra, ecepi kini geri yini 'diyi nga azi nga ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'amaani n'okukwatanisa n'ebitongore by'ebyamagara eby'omubyaro, embeera ekatandika kutereera. Ab'eby'amagara bakagira ngu omuhendo gw'abarwaire abasya gukakyendeera munonga, ekirikworeka ngu enkora yaabo ekaba neekora.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown that while the vaccine developed by the World Health Organization provides a significant level of protection, it does not completely eliminate the risk of infection. Experts are urging continued public health measures alongside vaccination efforts to ensure community safety.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti wadde ng'eddagala ly'ebyobulamu eryakolebwa ekitongole ky'ensi yonna likola kinene nnyo mu kukuuma abantu, terigonjoola mu bujjuvu bulabe bw'okukwatibwa obulwadde. Abakugu bakubiriza okugenda mu maaso n'enkola z'ebyobulamu wamu n'okugema okukakasa obukuumi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni kadi bed ni yat agwera ma dul me World Health Organisation oyubu gwoko dano, pe kwanyo peko me nongo two. Ludiro tye ka lego ni omyero kimedde ki tic i kom yotkom pa lwak kacel ki yub me gwero dano pi gwoko kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos ebe araida ekato loitolomunit erionget loka angaleu loka akwap kere ijaikini ayuwara, mam elemari atiokisio nuka adekasinei. Isinyikokitos ipirioitin itunga ainyikokin aitikitik adekasinei nepepe keda aikis ekato kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da kini aro soza amuti wudrikuru ni alata ma e'yo ondrepi World Health Organization niri ni e'dozu ri ka tro ageitema fe ra ti, eri ngani e'yo azo esuzuri atri ku. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi a'i e'yo o'bi yi ma rua ala ni 'diyi mu drile okpo 'bani 'ba osozu aro azo atrizurisi 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu n'obu omubazi ogwakozirwe ekitongore ky'ebyamagara eky'ensi yoona gurikubaasa kurinda munonga, tikirikumaraho kimwe akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire. Abakugu nibashaba abantu kugumizamu n'okukuratira engyenderwaho y'eby'amagara hamwe n'okukoresa emibazi y'okusirika, okureeba ngu ebyanga bigumire.

eng_prompt: Local health officials have raised concerns about the increasing number of Ebola cases in the region. Despite their efforts, the resources available to combat the outbreak are severely limited.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba Ebola ogweyongera mu kitundu. Wadde nga bafubye nnyo, ebyetaago ebiriwo okulwanyisa okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bitono nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom me tedero gunyutu lworo gi pi wel dano matye ki two ebola matye kamede i twok piny eni. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek, jami ma mite me lweny i kom poto pa two eni nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongong kanuka enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ebola kaiboisit. Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogong, ikidioko iboro luejaas kanu aitikitik abwangun naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza e'yo kalafe azo ebola niri ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Okpo yini 'diyi ma talasi, afa 'bani esu a'di 'dizu e'dota azo korona niri be 'diyi were.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara omu byaro boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba Ebola ogweyongyeire omu kyanga. Oihireho amaani gaabo, eby'okukoresa ebirikuba biriho kurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara n'ebikye munonga.

eng_prompt: Health officials have issued a warning about the potential spread of infectious diseases from neighboring regions. As a precaution, local communities are being advised to monitor any unusual health symptoms.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bafulumizza okulabula ku kusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa okuva mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo. Ng'obwegendereza, ebitundu biweebwa amagezi okulondoola obubonero bw'ebyobulamu obutali bwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gumiyo lok me ciko dano i kom nya pa two ma kobo i kabedo ma orumuwa. Macalo yoo me gwokke, ki lego lwak me bedo ki wanggi I kom lanyut me two mo keken.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis ikwenyasi nuikamunitos awea na adekasinei nu ikopas kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare. Kwape ayuwara, icorakitai itunga aanyanar aanyuneta nuka adekasinei nu mam etapit.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alata ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza azo ecopi eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ekile ageitema ru, 'ba fe embata ongulumu eyini aa'zu mile be e'yo azo ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara barabwire aha kujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira kuruga omu byanga ebituherereire. Nk'eky'okwerinda, abantu b'omubyaro nibahaburwa okwetegyereza obubonero bw'eby'amagara obutari bwa buriijo.

eng_prompt: The outbreak of Ebola in various regions has raised significant public health concerns. Health officials are urging communities to be aware of the symptoms and transmission methods of this deadly virus.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kwa Ebola mu bitundu eby'enjawulo kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu byobulamu by'abantu. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okumanya obubonero n'engeri akawuka kano ak'obulabe gye kasaasaanamu.
ach_prompt: Two ebola ma opoto I but lobo mapat-pat okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom yot-kom pa lwak. Lutic yoto kom tye ka lego lwak me bedo ki ngec i kom lanyut ki kit ma two eni kobo kwede.
teo_prompt: Abwangun naka ebola kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela eyangaunit aiyalongong naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga. Isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga acoite ijenuneta keda iponesio luka awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azo ebola niri ma e'dota angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri eji asi otiza angiri e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ai aa'zu mile be wura azo 'di ni i e'dazu 'diyi ma dria tualu geri azo 'di ni i erezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kwa Ebola omu bicweka bitari bimwe, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu by'amagara g'abantu. Abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kumanya obubonero n'oku akakooko ka korona karikuturira.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and health of all patients and staff, strict hygiene protocols have been implemented throughout the facility. As part of these measures,
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulamu bw'abalwadde bonna n'abakozi, amateeka amakakali ag'obuyonjo gateekeddwa mu nkola mu ddwaliro lyonna.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko ber bedo ki yot kom pa lutwo ki lutic weng, ki keto cik me gwoko lengo I tic I ot yat weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda angaleu naka adekak keda eswamak, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka aila adekis kere.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu kililiru kini 'ba azoru azini azi'ba eyi ma rua ala ni, 'ba 'ba azita okporu alata ni 'diyi arojo 'da ma alea dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abarwaire n'abakozi boona baine amagara marungi, engyenderwaho y'eby'obuyonjo eteirwe omu nkora omwirwariro ryona.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a significant increase in Ebola cases in neighboring regions. As a result, Ugandans should be ready to battle with the ebola outbreak.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu bategeezezza nti abalwadde ba Ebola beeyongedde nnyo mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo. N'ekyavaamu, Bannayuganda balina okubeera abeetegefu okulwanyisa okubalukawo kwa ebola.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two ebola omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat matye cok ki Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda omyero oyubbe me lweny i kom poto pa two ebola.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ebola kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare. Kanuka ngun, ekot itunga luko Uganda akapakina aitiji abwangun naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini kalafe 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tu angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma aa ngonde a'di 'dizu azo ebola niri be.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba Ebola omu byanga ebituherereire. N'ekyarugiremu, abanya Uganda bashemereire kweteekateekyera okurwanisa okubarukaho kwa ebola.

eng_prompt: To ensure compliance with healthcare regulations, the staff has been instructed to maintain accurate records. This process is essential for providing quality care and tracking patient progress.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu, abakozi balagiddwa okukuuma ebiwandiiko ebituufu. Enkola eno ya mugaso mu kuwa obujjanjabi obw'omutindo n'okulondoola enkulaakulana y'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutic me yot kom lubu cik, ki lego gi me gwoko rekod ma tye kakare. Yub man pire tek tutwal me miyo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo ki bene neno kit ma lutwo tye ka wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe etupitai aicoreta nuka angaleu, ecorakin eswamak aidar aiwadikaeta nu abeit. Erai na ibore yenejok noi kanu aijanakin amukian najokan ka aanyanar apol naka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Ba fe azi'ba eyini azita e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma vuti obizu 'diyi ma tambazu eyi ma kokobi eyi ma tambazu kililiru. Otita 'di eri orodriru azakoma kililiru fezu azini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma zota ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebiragiro by'eby'amagara nibikuratirwa, abakozi bahairwe ebiragiro by'okurinda ebihandiiko ebihikire. Enkora egi n'eyomugasho omu kuheereza obujanjabi burungi n'okukuratira entunguuka y'omurwaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of Ebola in the region, the hospital has implemented strict safety protocols. To ensure the safety of both staff and patients, the hospital personnel have been equipped with protective equipment to fight off Ebola.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kya Ebola mu kitundu, eddwaliro litadde mu nkola amateeka amakakali agakwata ku by'okwerinda. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abakozi n'abalwadde, abasawo baweereddwa eby'okwekuumisa okulwanyisa Ebola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ebola ma okato cokcok-ki, ot yat oketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko kwo pa lutwo. Pi gwoko lutic ki lutwo, lutic me ot yat gunongo jami ma gwoko komgi me lweny i kom two ebola.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ebola kotoma aiboisit, abu adekis ipikak ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Kanu awanyun ayuara naka eswamak keda adekak, ejaikitai eswamak lu adekis iboro lu ayuara kanu aitiji ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu o'diru angu 'di ma alea risi, arojo 'da 'ba azita okporu ageitema ni 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Azi'ba eyi ma tambazu azini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu, 'ba fe azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri afa tambaza fepi azo ebola nirisi 'diyi a'di 'dizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ya Ebola omu kyanga kyaitu, eirwariro riteire omu nkora ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abakozi hamwe n'abarwaire, abakozi b'eirwariro bateirweho eby'okwerinda okurwanisa Ebola.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of Ebola in the region, health officials have been working tirelessly to implement effective containment strategies. To address the growing number of cases, the hospital management has established simple clinics to manage Ebola cases.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kwa Ebola gyebuvuddeko mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde bakola butaweera okussa mu nkola enkola ennungi ez'okuziyiza. Okukola ku muwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, abaddukanya eddwaliro bataddewo obujjanjabi obutonotono okukwasaganya abalwadde ba Ebola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ebola ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gubedo katic matek tutwal me keto yoo me gengo ne itic. Me lweny i kom wel lutwo Ebola matye kamede, ludito me ot yat guyubu odi yadi matino tino me tic i kom lutwo Ebola.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ebola kotoma aiboisit, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aswam agogongu kanu aitegear iwaitin lu itikitikere adeka. Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol loka adekak, adukutu eyaitene lo adekis adekisia nuepataka kanu aidar adekak ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu angu 'di ma alea ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru geri 'bani ecozu azo 'da atrizu ra 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Kalafe tupi tupi 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma aza kozu, driceza arojo niri e'do pari arojo eyini aa'zu ewakokoru 'diyi 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ya ebora omu kyanga kyabo, ab'ebyamagara batwire nibakora n'amaani kutaho oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira. Okukora aha muhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire, abarikukurira eirwariro, batandikireho oburwariro bukye bw'okuragurira abarwaire ba Ebola.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of cases in neighboring regions, local health officials have implemented strict preventive measures. As a result, the community remains vigilant and proactive in safeguarding public health.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abalwadde gweyongedde mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu bataddewo enkola enkakali ez'okuziyiza. N'ekivuddemu, abantu basigala bulindaala era nga beetegefu okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel dano matye ki two tye ka medde I but lobo ma orumuwa, lutic me yot kom me tedero guketo yoo matek me gengo two eni itic. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak bedo ma wanggi twolo dok gitiyo matek me gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka adekak kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu iwaitin lu itikitikere adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete itunga ejok kanu aidar angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo be angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba geri okporu e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi aa mile be azini eyi azi nga e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire omu byanga ebituherereire, ab'eby'amagara omu byaro bateireho enkora y'amaani y'okuzibira. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibagyenda omu maisho n'obwegyendesereza omu kurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak of the virus spread rapidly, health officials implemented strict measures to contain it. One of the key strategies involved isolating individuals who exhibited symptoms of the disease.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kw'akawuka kusaasaana mangu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baateekawo enkola enkakali okuziyiza. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyakolebwa kwe kwawula abantu abaalina obubonero bw'obulwadde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma poto pa two eni omede ki nya oyot, lutic me yot kom guketo yoo matek me gengo ne. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo poko dano matye ki lanyut me two.
teo_prompt: Neautar abwangun naka ekorona aisiarakin katipet, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu iwaitin luegogong kanu aitikitik. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin luapolok imoriaritos aitiak itunga lu ajaas keda ijenuneta luka adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo korona niri ni i erezu mbeleru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba geri okporu 'diyi e'yo nde ma aza kozu. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye ri ma azi eri 'ba yi ma esele cozu 'ba eceta azo 'da ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'akakooko kurikweyongyera, ab'eby'amagara bakataho oburyo bw'okukaremesa. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho gukaba gurimu okushoroora abantu abaabaire baine obubonero bw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rise in Ebola cases, health officials launched a campaign to educate the public about preventive measures. One of the most effective strategies highlighted was the importance of proper hand hygiene.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera kw'abalwadde ba Ebola, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatandikawo kaweefube w'okusomesa abantu ku ngeri y'okwewalamu. Obumu ku bukodyo obusinga okukola obulungi obwogeddwako bwe bukulu bw'obuyonjo bw'emikono.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ebola, lutic me yot kom gucako yub me pwonyo lwak i kom kit me gengo ne. Yo acel maber tutwal ma kinyuto obedo ber pa gwoko lengo me cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ebola, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aisisianakin itunga iwaitin lu itikitikere adeka. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok lu aponi kitodunai ngesi ajokis naka aila naka akanin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu okporu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita imbata fezu o'bi eyini geri eyini ecozu eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria. Otita azi alu 'bani ece kililiru ndeni ri eri orodri dri alata kililiru ri niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba Ebola, ab'eby'amagara batandikireho ehururu y'okwegyesa abantu ebirikubaasa kuzibirwa. Omwe aha muringo ogurikukirayo kukora kurungi ogwagambirweho, n'omugasho gw'okwejumba omu by'obuyonjo bw'engaro.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have implemented strict measures to control the situation. This includes identifying individuals who may have been exposed to the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bataddewo enkola enkakali okukendeeza ku mbeera. Kino kizingiramu okuzuula abantu abayinza okuba nga baakwatibwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gukati ki yoo matek me gengo poto pa two eni. Man kwako niang anga ma onongo twero bedo ki two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ikisila lu itidisiaret kanu aitikitik ejautene. Imoriaritos nu ajenun itunga lu aticepak edumutu ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi e'yo nde ma aza kozu. E'yo 'di ma alia 'ba 'bani ecozu aa'zu azo 'da be ra 'diyi ma e'yo esuzu indi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ab'eby'amagara bateireho oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egyo. Eki nikitwariramu okumanya abantu abarikubaasa kuba bakwasirwe akakooko.

eng_prompt: The Ebola virus is a severe and often fatal illness that affects humans and nonhuman primates. It is transmitted through direct contact with bodily fluids of infected individuals, leading to a range of alarming symptoms.
lug_prompt: Akawuka ka Ebola bulwadde bwa maanyi era butta abantu n'ebisolo. Kisiigibwa okuyita mu kukwatagana butereevu n'amazzi g'omubiri gw'abantu abakwatibwa akawuka, ekivaako obubonero obw'enjawulo obweraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Two Ebola obedo two marac tutwal ma mako dano ki jami mukene. Kobo I yoo me kube ki pii kom dano ma two tye I komgi, ma kelo lanyut mapat-pat ma kelo lworo.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka ebola adeka naronon noi naeyari itunga keda itiang. Ikoparitai kotoma arucokina keda akipi nuka akwan nuka itunga luedekasi, ido eyangauni ijenuneta luipu luitukurianete.
lgg_prompt: Azo ebola niri eri azo azi onzi azini sa'wa driasi 'ba o'dipi 'diyi biipi 'ba ada eyi pie. Eri i ere geri 'bani i ecizu yi rua 'ba azo be 'diyi pie risi, e'yo ewaru 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Akakooko ka Ebola n'endwara y'amaani kandi erikukira kwita abantu n'enyamaishwa. Nikijanjaara kurabira omu kukoragana kurungi n'amaizi g'omubiri gw'abantu abakwasirwe akakooko, ekirikureeta obubonero bwingi oburikutiinisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, the government has prioritized measures to safeguard public health. As part of this initiative, health facilities will be installed to prevent the spread of Ebola in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti ekulembezza okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amalwaliro gajja kuteekebwawo okutangira okusaasaana kwa Ebola mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente oketo cwinye tutwalle I gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Macalo but yub man, kibi yubu odi yadi me gengo nya pa two ebola I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan isingarenit ayuwara naka angaleu naka itunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio adukun aiboisio nu adekis kanu aitikitik eikor loka ebola kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba okpo e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga arojo eyi si azo ebola niri ma ereta atrizu kari 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, gavumenti etandikire kurinda amagara g'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, amarwariro nigeija kwombekwa okuzibira okujanjaara kwa Ebola omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Health officials were on high alert as reports of a potential outbreak emerged in the region. After thorough investigations, the alarming news confirmed the presence of the virus.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baali bulindaala nnyo nga alipoota z'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe zaavaayo mu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, amawulire ag'entiisa gakakasa okubeerawo kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gubedo ma wanggi twolo tutwal I kare ma adwogi me poto pa two obedo tye I twok piny eni. Ingee kwed matut, lok angea ma okelo lworo I kom dano omoko ni two eni tye.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis okapakina noi naarai apotu iripotan luka abwangun naka adeka kolomutu katutubet. Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu iyemuto luitukurianete itigogongoto ajaut naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ndra mile be e'yo o'duko efupi e'yo azo korona niri ni e'dozu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, o'duko asi otizani 'diyi ece kini azo 'da ci.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi b'ebyamagara bakaba beteekateekire munonga, ahabw'okugira ngu haabaho okubarukaho kw'endwara omu kyanga. Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, amahurire agarikwerarikiriza gakahamya okubaho kw'akakooko.

eng_prompt: After receiving news of a beloved community leader's passing, the people gathered in large numbers to pay their respects. Despite warnings about the ongoing outbreak, they felt compelled to honor their traditions and support the grieving family.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna amawulire g'okufa kw'omukulembeze w'ekitundu omwagalwa, abantu baakuŋŋaana mu bungi okussa ekitiibwa kyabwe. Newankubadde baalabuddwa ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, baawulira nga bawaliriziddwa okussa ekitiibwa mu nnono zaabwe n'okuwagira ab'omu maka abakungubaga.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo kwena me to pa latela me kabedo ma dano maro, dano mapol gugure me miyo woro gi. Kadi bed ni ki ciko gi i kom poto pa two ni, gin guwinyo ni omyero guwor tekwaro gi dok gu kony lugang pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun iyemuto luka atwanare naka engarenon loajokan lo atutubet, apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos kanu aisiyalamikin kes. Karaida ikwenyaritai nuikamunitos abwangun naka adeka, apotu kesi opupoto ebe ibusakinit kesi ayongite inonosio kec ka aigang ekale loilito.
lgg_prompt: O'duko erini esuzu 'bori ma vutia kini drice'ba ongulumu ni leletu ni dra 'bori ma vutia, 'ba eyi tra eyi kalafe angiri si eyini inzita inzizu. E'yo bile ndu liza e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma dria 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, eyi ega eyi ma inzi e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria dika eyi fe atita familia candiru 'da eyini.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga amahurire g'okufa kw'omwebembezi w'ekyanga owabaire nakundwa munonga, abantu baingi baketeeranira hamwe kubaha ekitiinisa. Oihireho okurabura okurikukwata aha kubarukaho kw'endwara, bakeehurira baine kuheereza ekitinisa eby'obuhangwa bwabo n'okushagika eka eyabaire eri omu maganya.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and increasing demand for services, local officials have proposed a comprehensive development plan. As part of this initiative, the government will establish new infrastructures in Arua.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo bateesezza enteekateeka y'enkulaakulana enzijuvu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ejja kuteekawo ebizimbe ebipya mu Arua.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano kacel ki mede pa miti me nongo kony, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me dongo lobo. Macalo but yub man, gamente obi yubu jami gedo manyen I Arua.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka aijanakino, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitolomutu ainapeta nuka apol. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni apugan adukun aiboisio nuitetiak ko Arua.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma eyi fezu ri pie, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe egata otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete ni mu afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi si Arua.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza obweyongyeire, abakuru omu byaro bateireho enteekateeka y'entunguuka. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti neija kutandikaho ebyombeko bisya omuri Arua.

eng_prompt: As the economy continues to recover, new initiatives are being introduced to stimulate growth. These initiatives aim to create a vibrant environment for entrepreneurs and investors alike.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna byeyongera okudda engulu, enteekateeka empya zitandikibwawo okutumbula enkulaakulana. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera kutondawo embeera ennungi eri abasuubuzi ne bamusigansimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara tye ka medde ki dongo, kitye ka kati ki yoo manyen me medo rwom me dongo lobo. Yub magi tye ki miti me kelo kabedo maber pi lutim biacara ki luket lim I biyacara.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit eiriago aiyatakin, eutai aitolomun iboro luitetiak kanu aitopolor apol. Alosikinetekec erai aitolomun ejautene loejok kanu agwelanarak keda agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu ri ni mu drile drile, 'ba e'do e'yo o'diru 'diyi zota ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu angu 'ba tujari 'ye'ba azini 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entaasya ku birikugumizamu nibitereera, enteekateeka nsya nizitandikwaho okureetaho entunguuka. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okureetaho embeera nungi y'abashubuzi hamwe n'abashubuzi.

eng_prompt: With the implementation of new financial programs and support systems, individuals will have greater access to resources. As a result, people will get capital and increase their income levels.
lug_prompt: N'okuteekebwa mu nkola kwa pulogulaamu z'ensimbi empya n'enkola z'obuyambi, abantu ssekinnoomu bajja kufuna eby'obugagga ebisingawo. N'ekinaavaamu, abantu bajja kufuna entandikwa era bongere ku nnyingiza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki keto yub me lim manyen I tic, dano gubi nongo kony ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, dano gubi nongo capital ki medo rwom me cente gi.
teo_prompt: Keda aitegeario naka ainapeta nuitetiak nuka ikapun, epedorete itunga adumun iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, epote itunga adumun ikapun luingadaere ikapun kosodete aiyatakin edumune kec loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Otita robia ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'dota si, 'ba alu alu 'diyi nga afa ayuzaru 'diyi esu ewakokoru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi mu robia tujari 'yezu ri esu eyini ani robia eyini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutandikaho enteekateeka nsya y'esente hamwe n'obuhwezi, abantu nibaija kutunga obuhwezi. Ekyarugiremu, abantu nibaija kutunga esente z'okutandika emirimo kandi bongyere aha ntatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, individuals are constantly seeking ways to improve their financial situation. As a result, they are motivated to explore various opportunities for income generation and investment.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ejjudde okuvuganya, abantu buli kaseera banoonya engeri y'okutumbula embeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, bakubirizibwa okunoonyereza ku mikisa egy'enjawulo egy'okufunamu ensimbi n'okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me limgi. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo miti me yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo cente ki keto lim I tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret ejautenekec loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokinitai kesi aingic arerengesio nuka adumun ikapun keda aipikakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi sa'wa driasi geri nda eyini ecozu eyi ma geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, eyi ava esu geri ndundu eyini ecozu robia esuzu azini lonyi vuti aleza 'yezu 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura embeera yaabo y'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, nibahebwa omuhimbo gw'okushwijuma emigisha mingi y'okutunga entaasya hamwe n'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced individuals continues to rise due to ongoing conflicts and natural disasters, the need for humanitarian assistance has become more urgent than ever. Many organizations are calling for a stronger response to address the challenges faced by these vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu ababundabunda gweyongera okulinnya olw'entalo ezigenda mu maaso n'obutyabaga obw'obutonde, obwetaavu bw'obuyambi bw'obuntu bufuuse obw'amangu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ebitongole bingi bisaba wabeewo eky'amaanyi eky'okukola ku kusoomoozebwa abantu bano abateesobola kwe basanga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi tye ka medde ameda pi lweny matye kawot anyim ki peko ma poto atura, miti me miyo kony bot dano dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Dule mapol tye ka lego ni myero kimed kero me cobo peko ma dano ma goro eni tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luekerete koreriakec kanuka ingungeta keda atiokisio nuka isuban, ejai eipud loka aingarakinio noi. Isinyikokinitos iriongeta luipu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ni mu drile tu e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile azini e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ni 'diyisi, e'yo lezu azakoma fezu 'ba ada eyidri ri eca curu'do okporu ndeni aga oku driorisi. Amuti karakara eyi ai 'bani e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yezu e'yo ewaru 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera ahabw'entaro n'ebihikiirizi ebirikugyenda omu maisho, ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi kihindukire ky'amaani munonga. Ebitongore bingi nibishaba ngu habeho okugarukwamu kw'amaani, okukora ahaburemeezi obu abantu abo abatarikwebaasa barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: Many families are struggling to make ends meet in today's economy. As a result, essential resources for raising children are becoming increasingly difficult to obtain.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu ebikulu mu kukuza abaana byeyongera okuba ebizibu okufuna.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite ikwo me kare-ni. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo jami ma mite pi gwoko lutino tye ka doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ikalia luipu ainingosit kanu aijar kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi adumun iboro lu itwasamao kanu aitopoloun idwe.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci afa esuzu ewu curu'do 'di ma alea. E'yo 'disi, afa orodriru anzi eyi ezozu 'diyi ma esuta ni eca curu'do ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigarwana kwebaisaho omu by'entaasya by'erizooba. N'ekyarugiremu, ebintu by'omugasho omu kukuza abaana, bigumire kutunga.

eng_prompt: To enhance the quality of our offerings, we have developed a comprehensive strategy. This initiative aims to address current gaps and improve overall performance.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula omutindo gw'ebintu bye tuwaayo, tukoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo ebituli ebiriwo n'okutumbula enkola okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me jami ma wamiyo, wayubu yoo me tic maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko peko matye kombedi ki medo rwom me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aikeun adoketait na iboro wok, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas ido aitojokar eswamae.
lgg_prompt: Afa amani fele 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, ama e'do otuta azi dria 'diyi 'bo. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini 'yeta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura omutindo gw'ebintu byaitu, tutandikireho enkora nungi. Enteekateeka egi egyendereire kumaraho oburemeezi oburiho hati n'okutunguura emikorere.

eng_prompt: The project team has been diligent in maintaining accurate records throughout the implementation phase. As a result, there is proper documentation for the project beneficiaries.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ya pulojekiti ebadde n'obunyiikivu mu kukuuma ebiwandiiko ebituufu mu kitundu kyonna eky'okussa mu nkola. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo ebiwandiiko ebituufu eri abaganyulwa mu pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Dul pa project gubedo ki mit kom me gwoko rekod matye kakare I kare weng me keto yub eni itic. Macalo adwogi ne, coc maber tye pi joo ma gunongo kony ki I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Eswama etimu loka epurojekt ejok aidar aiwadikaeta nuka abeit kotoma apak naka aitegeario. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiwadikaeta nuejok kanu aimedaunak nuka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azi ngapi otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma tamba kililiru sa'wa 'bani otita 'da 'bazu 'yeta ma alea risi dria. E'yo 'disi, kokobi kililiru 'diyi 'ba orodri esupi otita 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ya purogyekiti etwire neekora n'amaani okurinda ebihandiiko ebihikire omu bwire bw'okukora purogyekiti. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho ebihandiiko birungi ebirikukwata ahari abo abarikugasirwa omu purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve infrastructure and education in underserved regions, local authorities have been working closely with various organizations. As a result of these collaborative efforts, significant developments have taken place in Arua.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebikozesebwa n'ebyenjigiriza mu bitundu ebitaweebwa bulungi, ab'obuyinza mu byalo babadde bakolera wamu n'ebitongole eby'enjawulo. Olw'okufuba kuno okw'awamu, enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi ebaddewo mu Arua.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me tic ki kwan I kabedo ma pe ki kony ma oromo, lutela me tedero gubedo katic kacelo ki dule ma padi padi. Macalo adwogi me tic kacel, dongo lobo madit otime I Arua.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar iboro ka asioman kotoma aiboisio nu mam ijanakino, iswamaete apedorosio nuka atutubena keda iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka aswamisio nu aimorikikina, apol noi kotoma Arua.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa ayuzaru azini onita ma omgbo otuzu angu azi ngazu ku 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga tualu amuti ndundu eyi pie. E'yo ti icita 'diyiniri ma e'yosi, angu ezoma orodriru 'diyi ebi pari 'du Arua.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura ebyombeko hamwe n'eby'obwegyese omu byanga ebitarikuhikwaho obuheereza, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batwire nibakorera hamwe n'ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ahabw'obwegyendesereza obu, entunguuka y'amaani ekozirwe omuri Arua.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote sustainable living and reduce reliance on imported cooking equipment, community workshops have been organized across the region. These initiatives aim to empower individuals with practical skills that can enhance their self-sufficiency.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu obweyagaza n'okukendeeza ku kwesigama ku bikozesebwa mu kufumba okuva ebweru w'eggwanga, emisomo gy'ekitundu gitegekeddwa okwetoloola ekitundu. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera kuwa bantu bukugu obw'omugaso obusobola okutumbula okweyimirizaawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwo ki dwoko piny rwom me tic ki jami tedo ma aa ki ilobo mawoko, kacoke me pwony ki pwonye obedo tye ikabedo mapat-pat manonge I twok piny eni. Yub magi tye ki miti me miyo kero ki dano ki diro me tic ma twero weko gitiyo tic gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijar na ejok ka aitidisiar aitosom iswamasia lu itolomunitai akwapin nukokinga, itemonokinitai airiamunun na itunga katutubet kere. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitigogong itunga keda acoa naepedori aitogogong aijar kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu geri aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu dika geri 'bani afa nyaka a'dizu engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo esizu, 'ba otu otita imbatani ongulumu eyini 'diyi angu 'di ma alea ndulu. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu 'ba yi dri okpo fezu ondua 'bani ecozu yi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu ra 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entuura nungi n'okukyendeeza okugyendera aha byoma by'okuteeka ebirikuruga aheeru y'eihanga, emishomo y'ebyaro etebekanisiibwe omu byanga byoona. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abantu emyoga erikubaasa kubahwera kwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the project's scope and objectives, it has become clear that its resources and outcomes are specifically tailored to address the needs of a particular region. As a result, the project will benefit only the people of West Nile.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza obulungi obunene bwa pulojekiti n'ebigendererwa byayo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebyetaago byayo n'ebinaavaamu bikwatagana n'ebyetaago by'ekitundu ekimu. N'ekinaavaamu, pulojekiti ejja kuganyula bantu ba West Nile bokka.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom dit pa yub eni ki miti ne, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami ticgi ki adwogi ticgi kiyubu malubbe ki miti pa twok piny moni. Macalo adwogi ne, yub eni obi konyo dano me west nile keken.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos alosikinet naka epurojekt keda apeleikinata, ecai cut ebe iboro keda iboro lu itwasamao kes itodolikinitai kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, ebuni epurojekt aingarakin itunga luko West Nile bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ma omgbo azini e'yo 'bani lezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'da kililiru kini afa 'bani ayu 'diyi azini e'yo efupi 'diyi 'ba e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, otita 'da ni nga orodri esu lu 'ba westnilea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ekigyendererwa kya purogyekiti, kimanyirwe butunu ngu eby'okukoresa n'ebirikuruga omu purogyekiti, nibikorwa kurugirira ahabyetaago by'ekyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti neija kugasira abantu ba West Nile bonka.

eng_prompt: After extensive research and collaboration with local farmers, we have identified key areas for improvement in our farming practices. By implementing innovative techniques and technologies, we aim to address the challenges faced by the agricultural sector.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukolagana n'abalimi b'omu kitundu, tuzudde ebitundu ebikulu eby'okulongoosaamu mu nnima yaffe. Nga tussa mu nkola obukodyo obuyiiya ne tekinologiya, tugenderera okukola ku bisoomooza ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bye kisanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok matut ki winye ki lupur me tedero, waniang kama omyero wamed iye rwom me pur wa. Ki keto diro ki diro manyen I tic, watye ki miti me tyeko peko ma tenge me pur tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic keda aiswamanara keda akoriok luka atutubet, apotu sio ajenutu aiboisio nuibusakinit oni aitojokar nuka akoruwok. Kowai lo aitwasam acoasinei nuitetiak, ikoto oni aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas erionget loka akor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza angiri ma vutia tualu ti ecita 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma vutia, ama esu angu okporu amani ecozu ama ma agirikica otuzu ra 'diyi. Geri ondua o'diru 'diyi ma ayuza si, ama le e'yo ewaru esele agrikica niri ni esu 'diyi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga n'okukwatanisa n'abahingi b'omubyaro, tutungire emyanya mikuru y'okutunguura omu mirimo yaitu y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Turikukoresa oburyo n'ebya tekinorogye, nituteekateeka kumaraho oburemeezi oburi omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: As economic growth continues and access to education expands, communities are finding new opportunities for advancement. This shift in resources and knowledge is leading to significant changes in quality of life.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana mu byenfuna egenda mu maaso n'okufuna ebyenjigiriza kweyongera, ebitundu bifuna emikisa emipya egy'okukulaakulana. Enkyukakyuka eno mu by'obugagga n'amagezi eviiriddeko enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu mutindo gw'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Ka dongo pa lim tye kamede ki dongo pa kwan bene tye kamede, kabedo mapatpat tye kanongo gum manyen me dongo lobo. Alokaloka man me lonyo ki ngec tye ka kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai apol naka ikapun keda asioman, eutasi itunga adumun arerengesio nuitetiak nuka apol. Aijulanakineta nuka iboro keda acoa eyangauni aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma adoketait naka aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni tuzu ri ni mu drile azini geri onita esuzu ri ni tuzu, ongulumu eyi drileba o'diru 'diyi esu zota esuzu. Ojata 'di afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alia azini ondua ma alia ri ni ojata okporu eji geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'ebyentatsya hamwe n'okutunga obwegyese, abantu nibatunga emigisha misya y'okutunguuka. Empindahinduka y'eby'obugaiga n'obwengye eriyo nereetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu mitwarize y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of the community, local officials have been advocating for improved medical services. As part of this initiative, the government has facilitated Arua regional referral hospital with an ambulance.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde balwanirira empeereza y'ebyobulamu ennungi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ewaddeyo ambyulensi mu ddwaliro lya Arua regional referral hospital.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lwak me nongo kony me yot kom, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lweny pi medo rwom me kony me yot kom. Macalo but yub man, gamente omiyo ambulance ki ot yat madit me Arua.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin lo amukian naka itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aitigogong nuka amukian. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaiki apugan adekis napolon nako Arua amotoka nadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete fe arojo Arua Regional referral Hospital dri ambulansi ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebyeyongyeire omu bantu, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibarwanirira obuheereza burungi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, gavumenti ehereize eirwariro rikuru erya Arua ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent natural disasters and public health crises, local officials have been assessing the current response capabilities. As a result, the government aims at handling emergency cases in the district.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bikangabwa eby'obutonde n'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde beekenneenya obusobozi bw'okukwatamu mu kiseera kino. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti eruubirira okukola ku misango egy'amangu mu disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko me yot-kom pa lwak, lutic me tedero gubedo ka neno kit ma twero tic kwede kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ki miti me tic i kom peko ma opoto atura I district.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka isuban keda atiokisio nuka angaleu naka itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet airereor eipone lo ebeitor aitemokin ngun. Kanuka ngun, ekoto apugan aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso ko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi geri 'bani ecozu e'yo nde ma aza kozu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni asi 'ba e'yo mbeleru distrikitia 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, abakungu b'ebyaro batwire nibarondoora eby'okukora. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti negyenderera okukora aha nshonga z'ahonaaho omu disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals, the government has implemented various initiatives to support both refugees and their host communities. These efforts aim to promote social cohesion and improve overall well-being in areas significantly impacted by the influx of newcomers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu n'ebitundu ebibakyaza. Kaweefube ono agendereddwamu okutumbula okukwatagana mu bantu n'okutumbula embeera y'obulamu mu bitundu ebikoseddwa ennyo olw'okuyingira kw'abapya.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel luring ayela, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me konyo luring ayela ki kabedo ma gitye iye. Yub eni tye me kelo ribbe ikin lwak ki medo rwom me kwo pa dano ikabedo ma wel dano matye kabino ikabedo enoni tye ka yelo gi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol loka ikerai, etolomu apugan iponesio luegelegela kanu aigang ikerai keda aiboisio nu ijaunitos kesi. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitopolor aimorikikina keda aitojokar ejautene loka itunga kotoma aiboisio nuetirorit abwotun na itunga luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu emunyale eyini tualu ongulumu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie. Okpo 'dayi lezu ti ecita o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini geri eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu angu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyiniri ni candi fezu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhunga omu maka gaabo ogweyongyeire,gavumenti eteire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi z'okuhwera empungi hamwe n'abantu abarikubakiira. Amaani aga nigagyenderera okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okutunguura entuura y'abantu omu byanga ebirikuteganisibwa okutahirira kw'abantu abasya.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health needs of displaced populations, local organizations have been working tirelessly to improve healthcare access. One crucial initiative involves deploying mobile medical units to underserved areas.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera obw'abantu ababundabunda, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bibadde bikola butaweera okutumbula obujjanjabi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikoleddwa kwe kuteekawo obujjanjabi obutonotono mu bitundu ebitakyalimu bujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me yot kom pa dano ma orwenyo gangi gi, dul mapat-pat me tedero gubedo katic matek tutwal me yubu yoo me nongo kony me yot-kom. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo cwalo odi yadi ma woto I kabedo ma pe tye ki kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka angaleu loka itunga luekeriaka, iswamaete iriongeta luka atutubet agogongu kanu aitojokar adumunun amukian. Aswam adiope naepol noi imoriarit aipikakin aiboisio nu imukerun aiboisio nu mam ijanakino.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi okporu ni ma azi eri arojo aci'ba 'diyi ma ti pezu angu 'bani azakoma fele ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebirikweyongyera omu bantu ababingirwe, ebitongore by'omubyaro bitwire nibikora n'amaani okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Ekigyendererwa kimwe ky'omugasho n'okutandikaho obuheereza bw'amarwariro omu myanya etarikuheebwa obuheereza.

eng_prompt: Recent investments in healthcare infrastructure and training for medical personnel are expected to enhance the quality of care provided to mothers and newborns. As a result, there will be a reduction in maternal and neonatal rates because of improved medical facilities.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko mu bujjanjabi n'okutendeka abasawo kusuubirwa okutumbula omutindo gw'obujjanjabi obuweebwa bamaama n'abaana abaakazaalibwa. N'ekinaavaamu, wajja kubaawo okukendeera kw'omuwendo gw'abakyala abazaala n'abaana abaakazaalibwa olw'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi okulongooka.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I tenge me yot kom ki pwonye pa lutic yoto kom obi medo rwom me kony ma kimiyo ki mege ki lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, wel mege matye ka nywal ki lutino matye ka nywal obidok piny pi yub me yot kom ma oyube.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun luitetiak toma aiboisio nuka amukian ka aitutuonoro naka eswamak luka angaleu ebuni aikeun adoketait na amukian na ijaikitai nuatoto keda imukerun. Kanuka ngun, ebuni aitidisiar atwakisia nuka angor keda imukerun naarai itojokaritai aiboisio nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni o'diru arojo eyi ma alea azini imbata fezu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri ri ni nga azakoma fele ayia eyini azini odekua eyini ri ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'disi, kalafe ayia eyini osizu azini anzi nyiri eyini osizu 'diyi ma omgbo ni nga esi ra e'yo arojo eyini otuzu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu by'amagara n'okutendeka abashaho, nikiteekateekwaho kutunguura omutindo gw'okureeberera abazaire n'abaana. Ekiraarugyemu, nihaija kubaho okukyendera kw'omuhendo gw'abakazi abarikuzaara n'abaana abarikuzaarwa, ahabw'eby'amagara ebirikutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Access to emergency medical care is a fundamental aspect of public health. Ensuring that help is just a call away can save lives in critical situations.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'amangu kintu kikulu nnyo mu byobulamu by'abantu. Okukakasa nti obuyambi buli wala nnyo kisobola okutaasa obulamu mu mbeera embi.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom pi peko ma opoto atura obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yot kom pa lwak. Neno ni kony tye kama bor romo laro kwo pa dano ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na engeso erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma angaleu naka itunga. Aanyun ebe ejai aingarakinio aiboisit naejaasi keda esimu ediope bon epedori ayuwar aijar kotoma ojautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ecozu aro esuza mbeleru ri esuzu ri eri e'yo azi okporu e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini ri ma alea ni i. E'yo nezu ra kini 'ba ma omve lu azakoma ra ri eco 'ba ma idri pa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi obw'ahonaaho n'ekintu kikuru omu by'amagara g'abantu. Okureeba ngu obuhwezi nibubaho, nikibaasa kucungura amagara omu bwire bw'akabi.

eng_prompt: In emergency situations, having the right resources can make all the difference. That's why the medical team relies on a fully stocked vehicle for rapid response.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ez'amangu, okubeera n'ebikozesebwa ebituufu kisobola okuleetawo enjawulo. Eyo y'ensonga lwaki abasawo beesigama ku mmotoka ezijjudde ebintu okusobola okukola amangu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ma opoto atura, bedo ki jami ma mite twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal. Man aye tyen lok ma oweko lutic yoto kom gijenge I kom mutoka matye ki jami weng ma mite me miyo kony oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo engeso, ajaut keda iboro luedolitos epedori aijulakin. Ngun ngesi emunokina etimu loka angaleu amotokan nuejaasi keda iboro kere kanu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, ovuzu afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi be ri eco ojata eji ra. Dari e'yo amuti arojo ni 'diyi ni asi 'bazu mutukari afa dria 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'yezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'akabi munonga,okugira eby'okukoresa ebihikire nikibaasa kureetaho empindahinduka. Niyo nshonga ahabw'enki tiimu y'abashaho eyegyendesereize emotoka erimu eby'okukoresa byona, okubaasa kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Access to timely medical care is crucial for saving lives, yet many regions in Uganda face significant challenges in emergency response. As a result, the country's healthcare infrastructure struggles to provide adequate support during critical situations.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde kikulu nnyo mu kutaasa obulamu, naye ebitundu bingi mu Uganda bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kukola ku mbeera ez'amangu. N'ekivuddemu, ebyobulamu mu ggwanga birwana okuwa obuyambi obumala mu biseera ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal me laro kwo pa dano, ento but lobo Uganda mapol tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal I yoo me tic i kom peko ma opoto atura. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I lobo Uganda nongo tek tutwal me miyo kony ma oromo I kare me peko.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayuwar aijar, konye itereikina aiboisio nuipu ko Uganda keda ainingosia nuepolok noi kotoma aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit erionget loka angaleu kotoma akwapuwok aijanakin agangat naedolit kotoma apakio nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Aro esuzu sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru idri eyi pazu, te angu karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu alatani kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri ci atita kililiru fezu sawa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi omu bwire n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kucungura amagara, kwonka ebyanga bingi omu Uganda nibitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kukora ahaburemeezi. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'amagara g'eihanga bigumire kuheereza obuhwezi oburikumara omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for emergency medical services, officials have announced a new initiative. This plan aims to enhance healthcare accessibility for all citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'amangu, abakungu balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obujjanjabi eri bannansi bonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom ma opoto atura, lutic gunyuto yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me medo yoo me nongo kony me yot kom pi anywali weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian na engeso, alimosi eswamak ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitojokar adumunun amukian kama ejaasi itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma esuta kari anzi dria eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'amarwariro ag'ahonaaho, abakuru batongoize enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara aha batuuze boona.

eng_prompt: The urgency of medical emergencies necessitates a high level of expertise in emergency response. Therefore, it is crucial that those who drive and operate ambulances possess the necessary training and skills.
lug_prompt: Obwangu bw'ebyobujjanjabi obw'amangu bwetaagisa obukugu obw'ekika ekya waggulu mu kuddukanya embeera ez'amangu. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abo abavuga n'abaddukanya ambyulensi okuba n'okutendekebwa n'obukugu obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Peko me yot kom ma opoto atura mito ludiro me rwom ma lamal tutwal. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni ludwoo ambulance gubed ki pwony ki diro ma mite.
teo_prompt: Apolou na atiokisio nu amukian ekoto ipirioitin lu epol noi lu epedorete aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi ngul lu irengeete ka aitwasam amotokan nuadekis ajaut keda aitutuoro ka acoa na ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mbeleru e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyiniri le 'ba nita be angiri e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyiniri ma dria. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba ambulance onzupi azini azi ngapi 'diyi vu imbata azini ondua lele 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obw'ahonaaho, nikyetengyesa obukugu bw'ahaiguru omu kukora ahabw'oburemeezi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho munonga abo abarikuvuga emotoka za ambyurensi kugira okutendekwa n'emyoga.

eng_prompt: After years of service, the aging ambulance was becoming increasingly unreliable. To ensure the safety and efficiency of emergency responses, the hospital decided it was time for an upgrade.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakozesa emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde, ambyulensi enkadde yali yeeyongera obuteesigika. Okukakasa obukuumi n'obwangu bw'abajjanjabi ab'amangu, eddwaliro lyasalawo nti kye kiseera okulongoosa.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi mwaki mapol, ambulance macon-ni onongo dong pe gene tutwal. Me neno ni tic ma time i kom peko ma opoto atura tye maber, ot yat omoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me medo rwom me ticgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam, mam amotoka naka adekis na emojongit ejokuna noi. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuara ka eswamae loajokan lo engeso, abu adekis kotema ebe erai apak naka aisiteteun.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu 'bori ma vutia, ambulansi deza 'da e'bi eca asi'baza kokoru. E'yo 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, arojo 'da 'du e'yo kini eri sa'wa 'bani e'yo 'yezu o'diru ni i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obuheereza, ambyurensi enkuru ekaba etarikwesigwa. Okuhamya oburinzi n'oburungi bw'eby'okugarukamu ebitarikwetengwa, eirwariro rikasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing healthcare landscape, it is essential for medical institutions to be equipped with the necessary resources and infrastructure. This ensures that they can effectively address the diverse needs of patients and provide comprehensive care.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulamu eky'ennaku zino ekyukakyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo amalwaliro okuba n'ebikozesebwa n'ebizimbe ebyetaagibwa. Kino kikakasa nti basobola okukola ku byetaago by'abalwadde eby'enjawulo n'okuwa obujjanjabi obujjuvu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me yot kom tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi odi yadi me bedo ki jami weng ma mite. Man weko gitiyo maber i kom miti pa lutwo ki miyo kony weng ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu ejulakinor noi nuka amukian, ejokuna noi adekisia ajaut keda iboro ka iboro lu itwasamao. Einakini ngin kesi aanyun ebe epedorete kesi aitemokin ipudesia luegelegela luka adekak ka aijanakin amukian naejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru arojo eyini aa'zu afa ayuzaru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. Di ni fe eyini ani ecozu e'yo ndundu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru dika eyi ma aza ko dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'amagara biriyo nibihinduka munonga, n'eky'omugasho amatendekyero g'eby'amagara kugira eby'okukoresa n'ebyombeko ebirikwetengwa. Eki nikyoreka ngu nibabaasa kukora ahabyetaago by'abarwaire kandi bakabaha obujanjabi bw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Due to rising operational costs and decreasing reimbursements, many healthcare facilities are struggling to balance their budgets. As a result, essential services like ambulance maintenance are often neglected.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongerayongera kw'ebisale by'okuddukanya emirimu n'okukendeera kw'ensasula, amalwaliro mangi galwana okukuuma embalirira yaago. N'ekivuddemu, obuweereza obwetaagisa ng'okuddaabiriza emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde butera okulagajjalirwa.
ach_prompt: Pi wel cente ma mite me tic ki odi yadi matye ka medde ki wel cente ma mite me culo lutwo, odi yadi mapol tye ka tute matek me gwoko byek me limgi. Macalo adwogi ne, tic mapigi tego calo yubu ambulance ipol kare ki cayo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka etiai loepol noi loka ikapun lu itwasamao keda ikapun lu ikidioko lu atacio, eutasi adekisia nuipu ainingosit aidar ebajet kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc apalunit aijanakino kwape nat aitemonokin amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma ongmbo tuzu azini robia 'bani ofe 'diyi ma omgbo esizu risi, arojo karakara eyi dri ci robia eyini ayu ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi sa'wa driasi azakoma okporu ekile ambulansi eyi ma tambazu 'diyi adi te.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebishare by'okukora emirimo hamwe n'okutuubya aha bishare by'okuragurira, amarwariro maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okurinda embaririra yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, emirimo y'omugasho nk'okugarura busya emotoka za ambyurensi, buriijo neerekyererwa.

eng_prompt: Improving access to emergency medical care is crucial for enhancing health outcomes in communities. By implementing efficient ambulance services, we can significantly impact the survival rates of patients in critical conditions.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi obw'amangu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula ebyobulamu mu bitundu. Mu kuteekawo empeereza ya ambyulensi ennungi, tusobola okukyusa ennyo emiwendo gy'abalwadde abawangaala mu mbeera embi.
ach_prompt: Yubu yoo me nongo kony me yot kom pi peko ma opoto atura pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me yot kom ikabedo wa. Ka waketo yub me ambulance maber I tic, watwero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lutwo matye I kwo matek.
teo_prompt: Aitojokar adumunun amukian naka atipet erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokar nuka angaleu kotoma atutubena. Kowai lo aitegear amotokan nuadekis nu iswamaete ejok, ipedori oni aitojokar aijar naka adekak lu ejaas keda ejautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea. Amuti ambulansi eyini 'diyi ma azi ngazu kililiru risi, ama eco geri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma idri ta mbazu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura omuringo gw'okutunga obujanjabi obw'amaani n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'amagara omu byanga. Kurabira omu kutaho obuheereza burungi bwa ambyurensi, nitubaasa kureetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu magara g'abarwaire abari omu mbeera mbi.

eng_prompt: Protecting our natural resources is crucial for maintaining biodiversity and preventing environmental degradation. Therefore, strict measures must be taken against those who violate regulations by encroaching on wetlands.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma eby'obugagga byaffe eby'obutonde kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma obutonde n'okutangira okwonoona obutonde bw'ensi. N'olw'ekyo, ebikolwa ebikakali birina okukolebwa ku abo abamenya amateeka nga bayingirira entobazi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko jami makwo mapatpat ki gengo balo cwec ma orumuwa. Pi meno, omyero kimok yoo matek i kom joo ma turu cik me donyo i dagu.
teo_prompt: Aidar iboro lu isuban luka Edeke erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iboro luipu ka aitikitik amunario naka isuban luka Edeke. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aitolot iboro luitegelikina mama ejaasi ngul luebilibilete ikisila kowai lo alomar osama.
lgg_prompt: Afa amavile nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini angu ama agei 'diyi ma ezaza atrizu. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ba azita nyo'baa angu yiru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda ebintu byaitu eby'obuhangwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okuzibira okushiisha eby'obuhangwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, hashemereire kubaho enkora y'amaani ahari abo abarikuhenda ebiragiro barikutaahirira ebisharara.

eng_prompt: The rapid urban development and industrialization in the surrounding area have led to significant changes in the landscape. As a result, the natural flow and ecosystem of the river have been disrupted.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebibuga ey'amangu n'amakolero mu bitundu ebiriraanyewo bireeseewo enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu nsi. N'ekivuddemu, entambula y'obutonde n'ebiramu by'omugga bikoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otimme oyot-oyot tutwal I boma madongo ki yubu jami mapat-pat I kabedo ma orumu kabedo enoni okelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I kabedo enoni. Macalo adwogi ne, kit ma pii mol kwede ki cwec ma orumu wang nam eni oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol na katipet naka itaunin keda aitolomunio naka acuman kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare ayangau aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolitolorai akerit keda aijar naka icorin.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini zozu mbeleru tualu okalamvu eyi pie angu 'da ma agei 'diyi ma alea ri fe ojata angiri angu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, yi rapi rara yi ma eselea 'diyi azini afa yi ma eselea 'diyi eza i ra.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'ahonaaho omu ndembo hamwe n'okutunguuka kw'amakorero omu myanya erikwetorwaire, bireesireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu by'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, okutamburira kw'omugyera n'obuhangwa bwagwo biteganisibwe.

eng_prompt: Due to prolonged drought conditions and inadequate infrastructure, the local communities are struggling to meet their basic needs. As a result, the region has a poor supply of water.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekyeya ekimaze ebbanga era n'ebizimbe ebitono, abantu b'omu kitundu bafuba nnyo okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kirina amazzi amabi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me ceng matye pi kare malac ki jami tic ma goro, lwak tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, but piny eni pe tye ki pii ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka akamu na apak naepol noi keda amamus na iboro lu itwasamao, eutasi itunga luka atutubet aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Kanuka ngun, ejaas aiboisit keda akipi nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'wiruri ma e'yosi azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa E'yo 'disi angu 'da ma alea yi ma esuta muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyanda ky'obwire buraingwa hamwe n'ebyombeko ebitarikumara, abantu b'omubyaro nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo. N'ekyarugiremu, ekyanga tikiine maizi marungi.

eng_prompt: In many regions, infrastructure development has lagged behind population growth. As a result, communities struggle to secure reliable water supply systems.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe esigadde mabega ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu birwana okufuna amazzi ageesigika.
ach_prompt: I twok piny mapol, dongo lobo odong cen ki dongo pa wel dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ka tute matek me nongo yoo me nongo pii maber.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, ejai apol naka adukena kau naka enaaba loka itunga. Kanuka ngun, etiono itunga adumun akipi nu eyuara.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ezota ma omgbo esi zota 'ba eyini ri ma vutia. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi dri ci geri yi awazu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the region has faced severe drought conditions, leading to a significant decline in water sources. As a result, local communities are struggling to meet their basic needs.

ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, but piny eni obedo ki peko me ceng matek tutwal ma oweko pii odok piny. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.

nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho,ekyanga kitungire ekyanda ky'amaani, ekyareteire oburugo bw'amaizi kukyendeera. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omubyaro nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, rivers have served as vital trade routes, facilitating commerce and transportation. As communities developed along their banks, economic activities began to flourish in these strategic locations.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, emigga gikoze nga amakubo g'ebyobusuubuzi amakulu, nga ganguyiza eby'obusuubuzi n'entambula. Ebitundu bwe byakulaakulana ku mbalama zaabyo, eby'enfuna byatandika okukulaakulana mu bifo bino ebirungi.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, kulu obedo yoo ma pire tek tutwal me cato wil, weko cato wil ki wot bedo yot. I kare ma kabedo mapat-pat odongo I nget benggi, tic me lim ocako dongo I kabedo magi mabeco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, iswamaete icilena kwape iponesio luka agwelanar, aitapatan agwelanar keda alosit. Kwape apolor aiboisio nu oicorinikec, apotu aswamisinei nu ikapun kogeutu apolo kotoma aiboisio nu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, yi ara 'diyi nga azi geri orodriru tujari ni 'diyi ru, e'yo tujari ni azini acipa ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ongulumu eyini zoria yi ma kalatia, e'yo robiani 'diyi e'do zo angu orodriru 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: The rapid loss of wetlands due to human activities has raised significant environmental concerns. To protect these vital ecosystems, immediate action is necessary.
lug_prompt: Okubula kw'entobazi olw'emirimu gy'abantu kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku butonde bw'ensi. Okusobola okukuuma ebintu bino ebikulu, kyetaagisa okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa dagu pi tic pa dano okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa. Me gwoko cwec magi ma pigi tego, omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Aibiror naka isama kanu aswamisio nuka itunga eyangaunit aiyalongong naepol noi mama ejaasi isuban luka akwap. Kanu ayuarite isuban lu, ekot aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba ada eyini angu yiru 'diyi avizu mbeleru ri eji asi otiza angiri angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria. Afa nyakuni orodriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu, le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhwaho kw'ebisharara ahabw'emirimo y'abantu, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Okubangira eby'obuhangwa ebi eby'omugasho munonga, nikyetengyesa okukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Heavy rainfall in the region has caused water levels to rise significantly. Local authorities are warning residents to stay alert as conditions worsen.
lug_prompt: Enkuba ennyingi mu kitundu ereetedde amazzi okulinnya ennyo. Ab'obuyinza mu byalo balabudde abatuuze okubeera obulindaala ng'embeera yeeyongera okwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek tutwal I but piny eni oweko pii omede tutwal. Lutela me tedero tye ka ciko lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo ka jami tye ka time.
teo_prompt: Apol naka edou loepol noi kotoma aiboisit kangin eyauni adoketait na akipi aiyatakin noi. Icorakitos apedorosio nuka atutubet itunga asalakin ekapakina naarai erono ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Ozo okporu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe yi ma omgbo tu ra. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu mile be e'yo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi omu kyanga ereteire amaizi kweyongyera munonga. Ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro nibarabura abatuuragye kuguma beteekateekire ahabw'embeera kweyongyera kuba mbi.

eng_prompt: Wetlands play a crucial role in maintaining biodiversity and regulating water quality. Educating the public about their ecological significance is essential for conservation efforts.
lug_prompt: Entobazi zikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obutonde n'okulungamya omutindo gw'amazzi. Okusomesa abantu ku bukulu bw'obutonde bw'ensi kya mugaso nnyo mu kaweefube w'okubukuuma.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye pire tek tutwal I gwoko jami makwo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kab Pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa cwec ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal I yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete isama aswam naepol noi kanu aidar iboro luegelegela ka aidar adoketait na akipi. Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ajokis naka isuban lu akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Angu yiru 'diyi azi okporu nga afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini yi ma wura otuzu. O'bi eyini imbata fezu orodri angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ri ni.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant impact of human activities on the climate. As a result, various regions are experiencing altered weather conditions.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti ebintu abantu bye bakola bikosa nnyo embeera y'obudde. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu eby'enjawulo bifuna embeera y'obudde ekyuse.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto adwoki marac ma tic pa dano tye kwede i kom piny. Macalo adwogi ne, but lobo mapat-pat tye kanongo alokaloka I kom kit ma piny tye kwede.

eng_prompt: The rapid population growth in Arua has led to increased demand for land and resources. As a result, many natural habitats are being transformed for agricultural and residential use.

ach_prompt: Medde pa wel dano oyot-oyot tutwal I Arua okelo dongo pa miti me nongo ngom ki jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapol me cwec ma orumuwa tye ka loke me tic i kom pur ki gangi pa dano.

eng_prompt: In a desperate bid for power and resources, individuals began to form secret alliances with influential figures. Their shared ambition to exploit the land led them to target the vulnerable wetlands.

ach_prompt: I tute matek tutwal me nongo twero ki lim, dano acel acel ocako winye I mung ki dano ma oywek. Mitigi me tic ki ngom eni oweko gucako tic ki dagu matye kama goro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo apedor keda iboro, apotu itunga kogeutu aiswamanar keda itunga luepolok. Alosikinetekec naka aitwasam alupok ngun abu koyangau kesi aitemokin aiboisio nuka isama nuetioko.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing evidence of climate change and its impacts, many decision-makers prioritize short-term economic gains over long-term sustainability. This disregard for ecological consequences reflects a troubling trend in leadership priorities.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo obujulizi obweyongera ku nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'ebivaamu, abakola okusalawo bangi bakulembeza amagoba g'ebyenfuna mu bbanga ttono okusinga okuwangaala mu bbanga eggwanvu. ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol I kom alokaloka piny ki adwogi ne, pol pa joo ma moko tam gi keto cente I tic pi kare manok tutwal ma ka gwoko kwo pa dano pi kare malac. Pe tamo I kom adwogi marac ma bino I kom cwec ma orumuwa nyutu kit ma tela tye ka timo kwede jami ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata aitogogongoret naka aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda atiokisio, itunga luipu luiswamaete aseununeta kes isingarenitos ameda naka ikapun kotoma apak naedit adepar aidar ejautene loka apak naepol.
