nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhame obweyongyeire oburikukwata aha mpindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabwo, abarikukora ebiteiso nibakulembeza eby'entaasya eby'obwire bukye kukira eby'obwire bureingwa. Okurekyerera ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi nikyoreka engyenderwaho y'obwebembezi erikwerarikiriza.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness of climate change and its impacts, many policymakers have prioritized economic growth over sustainability. As a result, critical regulations designed to protect the environment have often been overlooked or ignored.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abantu bangi bamanyi ku nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'ebiyinza okuvaamu, abakola amateeka bangi bakulembeza enkulaakulana mu byenfuna okusinga obuwangaazi. N'ekivuddemu, amateeka amakulu agateekebwawo okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi gatera okubuusibwa amaaso oba okubuusibwa amaaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol tye ki ngec i kom alokaloka pa piny ki adwogi ne, lutela mapol guketo dongo lobo me biacara obedo gin ma pire tek loyo gwoko kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, cik mapigi tego ma kiyubu me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ipol kare ki cayo onyo ki cayo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi itunga luipu keda acoa naikamunit aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda atiokisio nuka ekuse keda ecae, isingarenitos luitolomete ikisila apol naka ikapun adepar aidar akwap. Kanuka ngun, epalunitai duc ikisila lu ekotoi kanu ayuarite isuban luka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mile oziza angu mile ma ojata ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara e'yo azita sipi 'diyi 'ba e'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria okporu aga e'yo yi ma ta mbazuri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ebi azita okporu 'bani o'bale angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okumanyisibwa kwingi aha mpindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'oburemeezi bwayo, ab'eby'obutegyeki beebembeire entunguuka omu by'entaasya okukira okugumizamu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiragiro ebikuru ebyateirweho kurinda eby'obuhangwa bitwairweho amaisho.

eng_prompt: Efforts to preserve natural habitats have gained momentum in recent years. As a result, certain regions have seen significant improvements in their ecological health.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi yeeyongedde mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu ebimu birabye enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu bulamu bw'obutonde bwabyo.
ach_prompt: Tute me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa omede tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, but lobo mukene gunongo dongo pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Aswam na aidar aiboisio nu akwap eyatakin noi kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, awanyutu aiboisio ace aitojokaar ejautene lo akwap kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba angu nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri esu okpo eli agapi 'diyi ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, angu azi 'diyi ndre e'yo angu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma rua ala ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Amaani g'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bweyongyeire omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebicweka ebimwe birebire entunguuka y'amaani omu by'obuhangwa bwabyo.

eng_prompt: As urban development continues to expand, the demand for land and resources has intensified. This rapid growth has led to significant environmental consequences.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeeyongera okugaziwa, obwetaavu bw'ettaka n'ebikozesebwa bweyongedde. Enkulaakulana eno ey'amangu ereeseewo ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo tye kamedde anyim, miti me ngom ki jami mukene bene tye kamede. Dongo lobo man ma otimme oyot-oyot tutwal okelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos apol naka itaunin, apolor eipuda lo alupok keda iboro. Apol na katipet ayangau atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi isuban luka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tawuni eyi ma alea ri ni mu drile ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, e'yo 'bani lezu nyaku azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Zota mbele mbele 'diri eji e'yo onzi angu ama agei ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku entunguuka y'endembo erikugumizamu, okwetenga eitaka n'eby'obugaiga kweyongyeire. Entunguuka y'amaani ereesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha buhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: The increasing frequency of flooding and environmental degradation in coastal areas has raised concerns among experts. As a result, many are urging caution regarding real estate investments in vulnerable regions.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'amataba n'okwonoona obutonde bw'ensi mu bitundu by'oku lubalama lw'ennyanja bireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakugu. N'ekivuddemu, bangi bakubiriza okwegendereza ku nsonga z'okusiga ensimbi mu by'amayumba mu bitundu ebyesudde.
ach_prompt: Pol pa pong pa pii ki bale pa cwec ma orumu dog nam okelo lworo ikin ludiro. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka cuku cwiny gi me gwokke ki keto lim I odi I kabedo ma peko tye iye.
teo_prompt: Eyatakin na ebulone keda amunar aiboisio nu idoketait nes eyaunit aiyalongong kanejaas ipiriotin. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos itunga luipu acoit kanu ikapun lu itogoi kaiboisio nu ican.
lgg_prompt: Yi tiza ma omgbo tupi tupi tu azini angu ama agei 'diyi ma ezaza angu yi tia 'diyi ma alea ri fe asi otiza 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi asi omiza fe e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni angu e'yo ewaru be 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omwegyemure n'okusisikara kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi omu myanya y'aha rubaju rw'enyanja, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu bakugu. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi nibashaba okwerinda eby'obushubuzi bw'amaju omu bicweka ebitarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: As urban development continues to expand, many investors are seeking new opportunities in unconventional areas. One such area gaining attention is the often-overlooked wetlands, which present unique potential for growth.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeeyongera okugaziwa, bamusigansimbi bangi banoonya emikisa emipya mu bifo ebitali bya bulijjo. Ekimu ku bifo ebyo bye ntobazi ezitera okubuusibwa amaaso, nga zino zirina obusobozi bw'okukulaakulana mu ngeri ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo me boma tye kamedde anyim, lutim biacara mapol tye ka yenyo gum me timo biacara i kabedo mapat-pat. Kabedo acel ma tye ka nongo miti madit tutwal obedo dagu ma pol kare kicayo gi, ma tye ki kero me dongo ma pat tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos apol naka itaunin, eutasi agwelanarak luipu aimo arerengesio nuitetiak kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuekotosi itunga apodokinit ngesi isama lumam etapit apodokinit, luejaasi keda apedor naka apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tawuni eyi ma alea ri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi drileba o'diru 'diyi nda angu ndundu eyi ma alea. Angu alu 'dile 'bani asi 'bazu yi ma dria ri angu yiru 'bani asi 'bazu yi ma dria ku 'diyi, angu ecopi zozu wura ndu si 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku entunguuka y'endembo erikugyenda omu maisho, abashubuzi baingi nibaronda emigisha misya omu myanya etari ya buriijo. Omwanya gumwe ogurikureetaho amaani n'ebisharara ebirikukira kurekyererwa, ebirikubaasa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the increasing threats to their natural resources, local leaders in the region sought effective measures to address environmental degradation. In response to growing concerns about deforestation and pollution, they decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukitegeera nti eby'obugagga byabwe eby'obutonde byeyongera okutiisibwatiisibwa, abakulembeze b'ebyalo mu kitundu banoonya engeri ennungi ey'okukwatamu okwonoona obutonde bw'ensi. Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kusaanyaawo ebibira n'okwonoona obutonde, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gunongo yoo maber me lweny i kom bale pa cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tongo yadi ki balo kabedo, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok luka atutubet kowanyutu aitukurianeta nuka isuban luka Edeke, apotu odumutu iwaitin lu epedoriata kesi aitemokin abilibilio naka isuban luka Edeke. Kanuka aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit atubutubio naka ikito keda amunar aiboisio, apotu kesi koseutu aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi ma lonyi nyakuni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ra, eyi nda geri kililiru eyi ecozu e'yo angu eyi ma ageia 'diyi ezazu ri ma aza kozu. E'yo asi otiza tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi e'yo pati ogaza ni azini e'yo angu ezapi 'diyi ma dria, eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obweyongyeire ahaby'obuhangwa, abebembezi b'ebyaro omu kyanga bakasherura oburyo bw'okurwanisa okushiisha eby'obuhangwa. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahabw'okutema emiti n'okusiisikara kw'eitaka, bakasharamu kukoraho.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing environmental degradation and loss of biodiversity, local officials have announced a new initiative. This plan aims to enhance ecological resilience and support wildlife habitats in the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okwonooneka kw'obutonde bw'ensi okugenda mu maaso n'okubula kw'ebiramu eby'enjawulo, abakungu b'ebyalo balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi n'okunyweza ebifo ebisolo by'omu nsiko we bibeera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me balo cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki rweny pa jami makwo mapat-pat, lutic me tedero gucwalo lok angeya manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa ki gwoko kabedo pa lee lum i twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka akwap keda aibiror naka iboro luegelegela, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitojokar ejautene lo akwap keda aiboisio nuka itiang lukokutwi katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma ezaza azini afa nyakuni ndu ndu 'diyi ma aviza ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di 'ba asi angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini atita fezu angu anyapa asea 'diyiniri ma ta mbazu angu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushiisha eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okufeerwa eby'obuhangwa, abakuru omu byaro barangirire enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okushagika obutaaho bw'enyamaishwa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the government has prioritized environmental conservation efforts to combat climate change and protect biodiversity. As part of this initiative, significant resources have been allocated to the preservation of natural habitats.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti ekulembezza okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi okusobola okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okukuuma ebiramu eby'enjawulo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, eby'obugagga bingi biteekeddwa mu kukuuma obutonde.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente oketo cwinye tutwalle I gwoko cwec ma orumuwa me lweny i kom alokaloka me piny ki gwoko jami makwo mapat-pat. Macalo but yub man, kiketo lim mapol me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, abu apugan isingarenit aidar isuban luka akwap kanu aitikitik aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aidar iboro luegelegela. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaikitai iboro luipu kanu aidar aiboisio nuka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, gamete 'ba e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri okporu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba robia angiri angu nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing environmental concerns, officials have recognized the urgent need to address the degradation of natural habitats. As part of their commitment to sustainability, they have allocated funds to support various ecological restoration projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi okweyongera, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ku kwonoona ebifo by'obutonde. Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa byabwe eby'obutebenkevu, bawaddeyo ensimbi okuyamba pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ez'okuzzaawo obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom cwec ma orumuwa, lutic guniang ni mitte tutwal me lweny i kom balo kabedo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub meggi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, guketo lim me konyo yub mapat-pat me roco cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo na akwap, ejenete eswamak ebe ibusakinit aitemokin atiokisio nu amunar aiboisio nu akwap. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamukec naka aidar ejautene lo akwap, ejaikisi kesi ikapun kanu aigang ipurojektin lu egelegela luka ainyakun isuban luka akwap.

eng_prompt: Despite their strong track record, the team entered the match with a sense of overconfidence. They believed their previous victories would guarantee an easy win against their rivals.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko ebyafaayo byabwe ebirungi, ttiimu yayingidde omuzannyo nga yeekakasa ekisukkiridde. Baalowooza nti obuwanguzi bwabwe obw'emabega bwandikakasizza obuwanguzi obwangu ku bavuganya nabo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutimo maber tutwal, team odilo ne odonyo I tuku ne ki tek cwiny madit tutwal. Gubedo ki gen ni loc ma guloyo I kare ma okato ni obi weko giloyo lupyem kwedgi oyot.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda akiro nuajokak, apotu etimu kolomutu toma abolia ngin keda amunokina naepol noi. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitelekaar kec sek ijaikini kesi aitelekaar lu eboloboloete keda kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini 'ye okporu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti 'da fi abala 'da ma alea asi'baza be. Yi a'ira kini agaza yini oku 'diyi nga fe yini agazu ewakokoru 'ba yini baka sezu yi be 'diyi ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: After a grueling match filled with missed opportunities, the players gathered in the locker room, their faces reflecting disappointment. Despite their efforts, the scoreboard told a different story, marking the end of their winning streak.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuzannyo ogukooya ogwabadde gujjudde emikisa egyasubwa, abazannyi baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge mwe baakyusiranga, nga ffeesi zaabwe ziraga obwennyamivu. Newankubadde baakola kyonna ekisoboka, ekipande kyalaga ekintu ekirala, ekyalaga enkomerero y'obuwanguzi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge tuku ma obedo ma ol ki gum mapol ma orwenyo, lutuku gucokke I ot ma kiloko iye, wang gi onyuto cwer cwinygi. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek, bao ma ki keto iye makci pe otito lok mapat, ma obedo agiki pa locgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolia naetiono noi keda arerengesio nuapotu otwakiasi, apotu aboliak kotukokinos toma agola naka aijulakin igoenekec. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogong, abu abawo naka ainom akiro kiner akiro nuegelegela, itodunit angetakinet naka aitelekaar kesi.
lgg_prompt: A'bala avita ni andezuri ma vutia, drileba avile 'diyi pie, 'ba avitani 'diyi tra yi pari yi ojazu 'diyi ma alia, yi ma andretia e'da asi nyoza ni. Yi ma okpo ni tro ovuzu ra ti, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi ece e'yo nduni, e'dazu kini eyi nde asizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'omuzaano gw'amaani ogwabaire gurimu emigisha mingi, abazaani baketeeranira omu kishengye ky'okuhinduramu emizaano, amaisho gaabo garikworeka okuhwa amaani. Oihireho amaani gaabo, ekipande ky'obubonero kikagamba enshonga ezitarikushushana, ekyabaire nikyoreka enkomerero y'obusinguzi bwabo.

eng_prompt: As the final whistle blew, the atmosphere in the stadium was electric, with fans chanting and cheering for their team. The players felt an overwhelming sense of belief and encouragement from the stands, fueling their determination to succeed.
lug_prompt: Nga enfuufu esembayo efuuwa, embeera mu kisaawe yabadde ya masannyalaze, nga abawagizi bakuba enduulu n'okujaganya ttiimu yabwe. Abazannyi baawulira okukkiriza okungi n'okuzzibwamu amaanyi okuva mu bantu, ekyayongera amaanyi mu bumalirivu bwabwe obw'okuwangula.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ki goyo whistle me agiki, kabedo ma obedo I bar tuku ne obedo mac, ki lucwak ma gubedo ka goyo wer ki cwak pi tim meggi. Lutuku guwinyo tekcwiny ki cuku cwiny madit tutwal ki bot lutuku ma obedo tye, ma oweko gumoko tamgi me loyo tuku.
teo_prompt: Kwape eporotoi lo awasia, apol noi ejautene kosawe loka abolia, keda egangitok luipu luiwoete ka aiyalama kanuka etimu kec. Apotu aboliak opuputu aiyuun naepol noi ka aisinyikokinio kanejaas itunga, ido abu koinak kesi apodokinit aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani firindi asizu ri sizurisi, angu avita ni pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia ri ndra aci ru, 'ba atita fe'baa 'diyi ni o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o'duko o Anzi mupira avipi 'diyi esu asi'baza azini ava engazu pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia, yini asi 'bazu drile suzaru.
nyn_prompt: Obu efurembe y'ahamuheru yaabaire neefuuhirira, embeera omu kishaayi ekaba eri ey'amashanyarazi, abahagizi barikweshongora n'okushagika tiimu yaabo. Abazaani bakehurira okwikiriza kw'amaani n'okugarurwamu amaani kuruga omu barikwemerera, ekyabahaire amaani g'okusingura.

eng_prompt: In a show of unwavering support, the local community gathered to discuss ways to help their beloved team. They brainstormed various ideas, ultimately deciding that fundraising would be the best way to ensure the team's success.
lug_prompt: Mu kulaga obuwagizi obutakankana, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuyambamu ttiimu yaabwe eyagala ennyo. Baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bintu ebitali bimu, era ne basalawo nti okusonda ssente y'engeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutumbula ttiimu.
ach_prompt: I nyuto cwak matek tutwal, lwak gugure kacel me nywako lok I kom kit me konyo dul tuku meggi ma gimaro. Gu tam I kom tam mapat-pat, I agiki ne gumoko ni jogo cente obedo yoo maber loyo weng me neno ni dul tuku ne oloyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun agangat, apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu ingarakinete kesi etimu. Apotu kesi itetemoto aomisio nuegelegela, kosodete aseun ebe aituk ikapun ngesi epone loajokan kakere loka aitodolikin akerianut naka etimu.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming tournament, the coaches decided to organize a friendly competition. This would allow the players to bond and showcase their skills in a relaxed environment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera empaka ezijja, abatendesi baasalawo okutegeka empaka z'omukwano. Kino kyandisobozesezza abazannyi okukwatagana n'okwolesa obukugu bwabwe mu mbeera eyeeyagaza.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi pyem tuku matye kabino ni, lupwony tuku gumoko tamgi me yubu pyem tuku me larem. Man bimiyo kare ki lutuku me winye ki nyutu diro gi I kabedo ma opye mot.

eng_prompt: As the players warmed up on the field, dark clouds began to gather ominously overhead. Just as the whistle was about to blow, the first drops of rain started to fall.
lug_prompt: Abazannyi bwe baagenda beebuguma mu kisaawe, ebire ebiddugavu byatandika okukungaana waggulu. Enfuufu bwe yali enaatera okufuuwa, amatondo g'enkuba agasooka gaatandika okutonnya.

teo_prompt: Neautar aboliak aiyatakin kotoma oisawe, apotu idokolen luiriokok kogeutu aibwo. Kwape ajai epiei aibwo, abu edou kogeu aibiror.

nyn_prompt: Abazaani kubarikweteekateekyera omuzaano, ebire ebirikwiragura bikatandika kurundaana ahaiguru yaabo. Obu efurembe yaabaire eri haihi kugwa, amatondo g'enjura gakatandika kugwa.

eng_prompt: As the final whistle blew, the tension in the stadium shifted to jubilation among the home fans. Cheers erupted as they celebrated their team's victory, reveling in the misfortune of their rivals.
lug_prompt: Olukonde olwasembayo bwe lwakubibwa, obunkenke mu kisaawe bwakyuka ne bufuuka okusanyuka mu bawagizi b'awaka. Abantu baakubye enduulu nga bajaguza olw'obuwanguzi bwa ttiimu yaabwe era nga basanyukira wamu n'abo be baali bavuganya nabo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ki goyo whistle me agiki, lworo I bar tuku ne olokke odoko yom-cwiny ikin lucwak me gang. Dano gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gitye ka kwero loc pa dul tuku meggi, kun gibedo ki yomcwiny I kom can pa jo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Neautar aiwo na awasia, abu aiyalongong kotoma oisawe kijulakin araun aiyalama kanejaas egangitok. Apotu itunga lukatutubet inumunumata aitelekaar etimu kec, aiyalama kanuka atiokisio nuka etimu loeboloboloete keda kesi.

eng_prompt: As the local teams continue to gain popularity, the excitement among fans is palpable. Community leaders are optimistic about the positive impact of sports on regional unity and tourism.
lug_prompt: Nga ttiimu z'omu kitundu zeeyongera okufuna ettutumu, essanyu mu bawagizi lirabika. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu balina essuubi ku bikolwa ebirungi eby'emizannyo ku bumu bw'ekitundu n'ebyobulambuzi.
ach_prompt: Ka dul tuku me tedero tye ka medde ki nongo yweka, yomcwiny ikin lucwak tye ka nen. Lutela me kabedo gitye ki gen I kom adwoki mabeco ma tuku twero kelo I kom ribbe ki wot me limo piny.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itimun luka atutubet aijen, iyalamasi egangitok noi. Ejaasi engarenok luka atutubet keda aomisio nuikamunitos ajokis naka aboliasio kotoma aimorikikina keda elatok.

eng_prompt: As the announcement approached, the atmosphere in the stadium buzzed with anticipation. Supporters gathered in groups, eagerly discussing their hopes for the upcoming season.
lug_prompt: Ng'okulangirira kusembera, embeera mu kisaawe yabadde ya ssanyu. Abawagizi baakuŋŋaanidde mu bibinja, nga baagala nnyo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye basuubira mu sizoni ejja.

lgg_prompt: E'yo azi eceza ni ecazu ogogo, angu pari avita niri ma alea ri ma alea 'ba eyi ma asi 'ba asi driasi. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tra eyi ongulumu eyi ma alea agbatara gbazu asi 'baza eyini 'diyi ma dria ayi ti emupi ri ma alea.

eng_prompt: After years of watching their team struggle in the league, the fans felt increasingly disillusioned. Frustration grew as the management failed to make necessary changes, leading many to seek a new home for their loyalty.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga balaba ttiimu yaabwe ng'erwana mu liigi, abawagizi beeyongera okuggwaamu essuubi. Okwenyamira kweyongera nga abaddukanya emirimu balemererwa okukola enkyukakyuka ezeetaagisa, ekyaletera bangi okunoonya amaka amapya olw'obwesigwa bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me neno kit ma tim meggi tye ka canne kwede I pyem tuku, lucwak odoko lucan tutwal. Cwer cwiny omede ikare ma ludito tic pe gutimo aloka-loka ma mite, ma oweko dano mapol guyenyo gang manyen pi lugen gi.

eng_prompt: To maintain its prestigious reputation, the club has implemented strict recruitment criteria. As a result, they attract only the best talent in the sport.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'ba eyini 'ba eyi sizu ri ma omgbo otuzu, driceza 'da 'du e'yo asi 'bazu 'ba sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu lapi sukulu E'yo 'disi, amuti 'da si lu azi'ba agupiru 'diyi.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions about the importance of diversity in the workplace, the hiring committee ultimately decided to prioritize technical skills over gender representation. As a result, they did not add any females to the technical team.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi ku bukulu bw'enjawulo mu bifo by'emirimu, akakiiko akanoonya abakozi mu nkomerero kaasazeewo okukulembeza obukugu obw'ekikugu okusinga okukiikirira ekikula ky'abantu. N'ekyavaamu, tebaagatta bakazi ku ttiimu y'abakugu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni nywako lok mapol obedo tye I kom ber pa bedo ki jami mapat-pat I gang tic, dul madoro tic omoko tamgi me keto rwom me diro me tic I kom cung pi mon ki coo. Macalo adwogi ne, pe gumedo mon mo keken I dul pa ludiro.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent staffing changes, a new plan has been implemented to ensure smooth operations. As part of this plan, the deputised officer will work with the human resource officer.

ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka ma otimme I kom lutic cokcok-ki, ki keto yub manyen I tic me neno ni tic owoto maber. Macalo but yub man, lalub kor latic obi tic ki latic ma doro tic pa lutic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka eswamak, etolomun ainapeta nuitetiak kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aswam. Kwape ediope kotoma aitemonokineta nu, ebuni atupiton eswaman aswam keda eswaman loiswamai eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Ojata azi'ba eyini o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba otita o'diru azi ngazu kililiru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, azi'ba 'da ma endru ni nga azi nga azi'ba azi fepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'empindahinduka y'abakozi eyabaireho juba, enteekateeka nsya eteirwe omu nkora okureeba ngu emirimo neekorwa kurungi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,omumyoka w'ofiisa naija kukorera hamwe n'orikukurira abakozi.

eng_prompt: As the organization prepares for its upcoming restructuring, a thorough evaluation of potential candidates is underway. This process will ensure that the different leadership positions will be filled up.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole kyetegekera okuddaabirizibwa, okwekenneenya kw'abo abeesimbyewo kugenda mu maaso. Enkola eno ejja kukakasa nti ebifo by'obukulembeze eby'enjawulo bijja kujjuzibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne tye ka yubbe pi aloka-loka matye kabino anyim, ngiyo kit ma joo ma twero cung kwede tye kawot kwede. Yub eni obi neno ni kabedo me tela mapat-pat opong.
teo_prompt: Kwape itemonokini erionget aijulanakineta, eutai airereonor itunga lu ekotosi abwaak. Ebuni ainapeta nu awanyun ebe eponio ailelebun aiboisio nu engarenok lu egelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ni otuta 'yeria e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma ale andrizu geri kililiru si ri ni mu drile. Geri 'di ni nga ne ra kini 'ba nga pari driceza ni ndundu 'diyi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ekitongore kirikweteekateekyera okuhindura emirimo yaakyo, okushwijuma kurungi abarikwenda kwesimbaho kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho. Enkora egi neija kureeba ngu emyanya y'obwebembezi etarikushushana eijuzibwa.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the project stays on schedule and meets quality standards, a strong management team is essential. To achieve this, two leaders will supervise the construction project.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti pulojekiti etuuka mu budde era etuukana n'omutindo, ttiimu y'obukulembeze ey'amaanyi ya mugaso. Okutuukiriza kino, abakulembeze babiri bajja kulondoola pulojekiti y'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni project owoto I cawa kikome ki rwom mamalo, dul pa ludito tic ma tek obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me cobo man, lutela aryo gubi doro yub me gedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt aitodolikin kotoma apak ka adoketait najokan, ibusakinit ajaut keda etimu loka eyaitene loegogong. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, epote engarenok iyarei aimaniman epurojekt lo aiduk.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni aa'zu sa'wa 'bani 'bale ri ma alea azini aa'zu wura kililiru ri ma alea, amuti okporu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru. E'yo 'di 'yezu, drice'ba iri ni eyi mu otita afa sizu 'da ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu purogyekiti eguma omu bwire n'omutindo, tiimu y'obwebembezi ey'amaani n'ey'omugasho. Okuhikiiriza eki, abebembezi babiri nibaija kureeberera purogyekiti y'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the management expressed their preference for a more male-dominated team. When questioned about the hiring policy, the staff said they do not need female staff.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, abakulembeze baalaze okwagala kwabwe eri ttiimu esinga okufugibwa abasajja. Bwe baabuuzibwa ku nkola y'okupangisa abakozi, abakozi baagamba nti tebeetaaga bakozi bakazi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, ludito tic gunyutu miti gi me bedo ki lutic ma polgi gubedo coo. I kare ma kipenyo lutic pi cik me coyo lutic, guwaco ni pe gimito lutic ma mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu engarenok itodutu ebe ekotosi kesi etimu loepol ikiliok. Neingitingitai nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aitac eswamak, apotu eswamak kotemasi ebe mam kesi ekotosi eswamak nungor.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, driceza 'da ece e'yo eyini le amuti agupi eyini aa'zu alenia ri ra. Ba ka azi'ba 'da eyi ozi azita eyini azi fezu 'diyi ma dria, eyi 'yo kini eyi leni azi'ba okuru 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, abarikukurira tiimu boorekire ngu nibenda tiimu erikwebemberwa abashaija. Ku baabuuziibwe ebikwatiraine n'ebiragiro by'okupangisa abakozi, abakozi bakagira ngu tibarikwetenga abakozi abakazi.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted significant disparities in educational attainment between genders. One concerning trend is the increasing number of girls leaving school before completing their education.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu kusoma kw'ekikula ky'abantu. Ekimu ku byo kwe kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abawala abava mu ssomero nga tebannamaliriza misomo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me kwan ikin mon ki coo. Gin acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal obedo wel lutino anyira matye ka weko kwan ma pwod pe gutyeko kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit atiaketait naepol noi naka asioman kiding ikiliok keda angor. Idiopebore yenepol noi ngesi enaaba loepol noi loka apesur lu elomanarete esomero eringa engetakina asiomanikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza angiri sukulu lazu agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma dria. E'yo azi asi otiza fepi 'diyi ma azi kalafe ezoanzi eyini sukulu kuzu de nga po'di eyi de sukulu ku ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'amaani omu by'obwegyese ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikwerarikiriza, n'omuhendo gw'abaishiki abarikweyongyera kuruga omu mashomero batakahwire emishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality in the workplace, the organization is actively seeking diverse candidates for its open positions. To support this initiative, women are still encouraged to apply for new posts.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu mu bifo by'emirimu, ekitongole kinoonya nnyo abantu ab'enjawulo abeesimbyewo ku bifo byakyo ebikalu. Okuwagira enteekateeka eno, abakyala bakyakubirizibwa okusaba ebifo ebipya.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo I dog tic, dul ne tye ka yenyo dano ma pat pat me cung I dog ticgi. Me cwako yub man, pud kicuku cwiny mon me penyo pi dog tic manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolorite nuka angor keda ikiliok kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam, euta atukot ngin aimo itunga luegelegela kanu aiboisio nuejaas. Kanu aigang aswamisioit na, isinyikokitai angor ailip aiboisio nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri otuzu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea, amuti 'da ni 'ba karakara eyi nda pari eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea. Atita fezu e'yo 'di ma dria, 'ba ai nga po'di oku eyi waraga sizu azi o'diru 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza aha mirimo, ekitongore nikikora munonga kuronda abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe aha mirimo yaakyo. Okuhagira enteekateeka egi, abakazi nibashabwa kushaba emirimo misya.

eng_prompt: After weeks of intense debate and negotiations among lawmakers, the government presented its proposed financial plan for the upcoming fiscal year. Following extensive discussions and revisions, the parliament of Uganda finally approved the budget.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'enteeseganya mu babaka ba palamenti, gavumenti yayanjudde enteekateeka yaayo ey'ebyensimbi ey'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okuddamu okwetegereza, paalamenti ya Uganda yasembayo okukkiriza embalirira.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me laro lok ki winye ikin luwang lwak I ot moko cik, gamente onyuto yub me lim meggi pi mwaka me lim matye kabino ni. I ngee nywako lok ki ngiyo kor tic mapol, ot moko cik me Uganda dong omoko byek lim ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka epeget keda ipegeta kiding imeeban luka ikisila, abu apugan kitodu akapanakinetake naka ikapun kanuka ekaru loka ikapun lo ebunit. Akaulo naka aitemitem keda airereonor, abu airabet koUganda kocam ebajet.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia agbatara okporu azini otuta 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'bo, gamete e'da otita e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria eli robiani emupi ri ni. E'yo onzeza angiri 'diyi ma vutia, koloseni Uganda niri ai asizu bajeti 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuhanuura n'okuteesa ahagati y'abany'eishengyero, gavumenti ekashohoza enteekateeka yaayo y'esente y'omwaka gw'esente ogurikwija. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okugaruka kushwijuma, eishengyero rya Uganda rikaikiriza embaririra.

eng_prompt: The government has announced plans to decentralize administrative functions. As a result, more districts will be created in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka z'okusaasaanya emirimu gy'obukulembeze. N'ekinaavaamu, disitulikiti endala zijja kutondebwawo mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Gamente otito pi yub me poko tic pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, kibi yubu districts mapol I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Alimo apugan aitemonokineta nuka aisiarakin aswamisinei nuka eyaitene. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitolomun idisitriktan luipu ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Gamete azi otita eyi e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga distrikiti azi eyi e'do kari Uganda niri ma alea dika.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka y'okugaba emirimo y'obwebembezi. Ekirikurugamu, disiturikiti ezindi niziija kutandikwaho omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: The event is set to celebrate the achievements of local communities and their contributions to regional development. Organizers are excited to announce that the state minister for local government will be the guest of honour.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gutegekeddwa okujaguza ebituukiddwaako abantu b'omu kitundu n'ebyo bye bakoze mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Abategesi basanyufu okulangirira nti minisita wa gavumenti z'ebitundu ajja kuba omugenyi omukulu.
ach_prompt: Yub eni tye me kwero jami ma lwak me tedero gutimo ki jami ma gutimo me dongo lobo. Luyub tye ki yom cwiny me waco ni minista ma loyo lok kom gamente me tedero bibedo welo madit.
teo_prompt: Itemokinitai epucit ngol kanu ainumunum aitodolinikineta nuka itunga luka atutubet keda aswam kec kanu aitopol aiboisit. Eyalamasi lu itemonokinak alimor ebe ebuni eminisita loka apugan naka atutubet araun epejonon lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Ba otu omu 'da ayiko zu e'yo 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini 'ye angu 'da ma ezota ma alea 'diyi pie. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi ayikosi azi ngazu kini minisita kari ni e'yo local government ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu adri omu inzile inzi ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gutebekanisiibwe kujaguza ebikozirwe abantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'obuhwezi bwabo omu ntunguuka y'ekyanga. Abatebekanisa bashemereirwe kurangirira ngu minisita wa gavumenti z'ebyanga naija kuba omugyenyi mukuru.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and collaboration, the team gathered to discuss the latest developments. They eagerly anticipated the outcomes of their efforts, hoping for positive news.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okukwatagana, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bigenda mu maaso. Baasuubira n'obwagazi ebinaava mu kufuba kwabwe, nga basuubira amawulire amalungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek kacel ki winye, joo ne gugure me nywako lok I kom jami matye katime. Gubedo ki miti madit me neno adwogi ticgi, kun gigeno lok angea mabeco.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda aiswamanara, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuitetiak nuiswamasi. Apotu kesi kopodokisi akiro nuelomunete kotoma aswamukec, aomitos ebe epote kesi adumun iyemuto luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini ti icita ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi te asi driasi agata okpo eyini 'diyi ma dria, eyini asi 'baza be e'yo muke eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukorera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha ntunguuka eyabaireho. Bakategyereza ebyarugyire omu kuteeraho kwabo, baine amatsiko g'amahurire marungi.

eng_prompt: In a recent address, the President emphasized the importance of accountability and justice for all citizens. He stated that every individual, regardless of their status, must adhere to the legal framework established in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe gye buvuddeko, Pulezidenti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'embalirira n'obwenkanya eri bannansi bonna. Yagamba nti buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera ye, alina okugoberera amateeka agaateekebwawo mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I lok ma ladit lobo omiyo cokcok-ki, en oloko tutwal I kom ber pa tic ki kor tic ki ngolo kop atir pi anywali weng. En owaco ni dano weng, labongo paro pi rwom me kwogi, omyero gulub cik ma ki keto I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerikec napac, abu lokapolon akwap kitogogong ajokis naka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda aitodunit etube loajokan mama ejaasi itunga kere. Abu ngesi kotema ebe kanginitunganan, araida ejaasi keda adoketait na ejai, ekot aitup ikisila lu itolomunitai kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza erini o'diru ri ma alea, Prisdent 'da fe okpo orodri e'yo nzeza azini e'yo liza kililiru kari anzi dria eyini ri ma dria. Eri 'yo kini le 'ba dria eyi ma obi azita kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe okuherize kubaho, omwebembezi w'eihanga akahamya omugasho gw'okuheereza abantu boona embaririra n'oburingaaniza. Akagira ngu buri muntu weena, oihireho embeera ye, ashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous allegations surrounding his conduct, the investigation revealed several inconsistencies in the claims made against him. As a result, authorities concluded their inquiries without taking any formal action.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo ebigambibwa bingi ku nneeyisa ye, okunoonyereza kwazudde obutali bukwatagana bungi mu bigambibwa ebimwogerwako. N'ekyavaamu, ab'obuyinza baamaliriza okunoonyereza kwabwe nga tebalina kye bakolawo mu butongole.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni adot mapol obedo tye I kom tim mege, kwed onyuto ni adot mapol tye I kome. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela ogiko kwedgi labongo timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aitoroneta nuikamunitos iponesioke, apotu aingic kitodu aibucaret naepol noi kotoma aitoroneta nuikamunitos ngesi. Kanuka ngun, apotu apedorosio kongetakisi aingic kec komam aswam adiokirot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo eri ma adriza ma dria karakara 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo eti ondaza ece e'yo 'bani 'yo eri ma dria 'diyi ma esele coza karakara. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba eyi de e'yo eyi ma vuti ondaza e'yo azini 'ye kokoru.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ebirikugambwa aha mitwarize ye,okucondooza kukareetaho ebitarikuhikaana omu bigambirwe ahariwe. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera okubuuririza kwabo bateine eki baakozire.

eng_prompt: After a series of vandalism incidents in the neighborhood, police launched an investigation to identify the culprit. Witnesses reported seeing him near the scene of the crime just before the damage occurred.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusaanyawo ebintu mu kitundu, poliisi yatandika okunoonyereza okuzuula abazzi b'emisango. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baamulaba okumpi n'ekifo awaagudde omusango ng'ebyonoonese tebinnabaawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tim me balo jami I kabedo enuni, abili ocako kwed me niang ngat ma otimo bal ne. Lucaden guwaco ni gunene cok ki kama bal ne otime iye ma peya bal ne otime.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu naepol noi kotoma aiboisit, apotu ipolisin kogeutu aingic kanu ajenun itunganan yeniswamauna ngun. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu ngesi eidunya keda aiboisit naeswamauna ngun eringa iswamauna ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ezazu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vutia, polisi eyi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre eri pari 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ma ageia de nga po'di e'yo onzi 'da 'yeni i ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucwekyereza ebintu omu byaro, poriisi ekatandikaho okucondooza kumanya abo abaakozire ebihagaro. Abajurizi bakagira ngu bakamureeba haihi n'omwanya ahu ekihagaro kyabeire kitakahikire.

eng_prompt: After the altercation, the police quickly apprehended the suspect. Concerned witnesses urged authorities to ensure the accused received medical attention.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa, poliisi yakwata mangu ateeberezebwa. Abajulizi abakwatibwako baasabye ab'obuyinza okukakasa nti avunaanibwa afuna obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok, abili omako ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome oyot-oyot tutwal. Lucaden mapol gulego lutela me neno ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye onongo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget, apotu ipolisin kikamasi katipet loetepesenitai. Apotu ajenak kilipata apedorosio awanyun ebe edumunete lo iwosatai amukian.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri 'da ma vutia, polisi eyi obi 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ri mbeleru. Sadini asi'baza be 'diyi ai drice'ba eyi nezu ra kini agu 'bani to 'da esu arojo'a.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutongana, poriisi ekakwata ahonaaho owabaire nateekateekwaho. Abajurizi abarikukwatwaho bakashaba ab'obushoborozi kureeba ngu orikujunaanwa yaatunga obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, the authorities gathered enough evidence to support their suspicions. The defendant's actions raised serious concerns about loyalty to the nation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okuwagira okuteebereza kwabwe. Ebikolwa by'omuwawaabirwa byaleetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku bwesigwa eri eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela guyubu caden ma oromo me cwako byek gi. Tim pa ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom bedo ki gen I kom lobo man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol, apotu apedorosio kodumutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aitogogong aomisiokec. Aswamisio nuka lo iwosatai abu koyangau aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos amunokina mama ejai akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini eyi e'yo onzi 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo agu 'bani toleri ni 'ye 'diyi eji asi otiza okporu e'yo asi 'baza kari ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakarundaana obujurizi burikumara okushagika okuteekateeka kwabo. Ebikorwa by'orikujunaanwa bikareetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani ahabw'obwesigwa bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After a violent altercation with the police, the suspect was apprehended and sustained injuries that required medical attention. Once in the hospital, he seized the opportunity to flee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa ne poliisi, ateeberezebwa yakwatibwa n'afuna ebisago ebyetaagisa obujjanjabi. Bwe yatuuka mu ddwaliro, yakozesa akakisa ako okudduka.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny matek ki abili, kimako ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome dok onongo awano ma mito kony me ot yat. I kare ma en oo I ot yat, en omako kare ne me ngwec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget keda ipolisin, aponi ikamarai loetepesenitai kosodi adumun amusungun nuekotosi amukian. Neadolunia ngesi adekis, abu ngesi kodum arereng naka akerit.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako polisi eyi pie 'bori ma vutia, 'ba obi agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ra erini ani nya'biliko eyi esuzu eyini ani lezu aro esuzu ra. Erini cazu arojoa 'boria, eri 'du drileba apazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutongana na poriisi, owabaire nateekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro akakwatwa yaatunga obuhuta obwarikwetenga obujanjabi. Ku yaahikire omwirwariro, akakoresa omugisha gw'okutoroka.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, law enforcement officials gathered enough evidence to warrant an arrest. Following the suspect's apprehension, the authorities decided to detain him for further questioning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, abakwasisa amateeka baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okukakasa okukwatibwa. Oluvannyuma lw'omutemu okukwatibwa, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okumusiba okwongera okumubuuza ebibuuzo.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, lutic ma gwoko cik guyubu caden ma oromo ma oweko kimako ngat moni. Inge mako ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome, lutela gumoko tamgi me make pi lapeny mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu ipolisin odumutu ajenanut na edolit kanu aikamanario. Akaulo na aikamanario naka lo ekamunitai, apotu apedorosio koseutu aidar ngesi kanu aingisingisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi tra afa ecetaru 'bani ecozu 'ba bizu ra 'diyi. E'yo 'bani agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da bizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'ipi 'diyi asi 'du eri ombezu e'yo ozizu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakarundaana obujurizi burikumara okureetaho okukwatwa. Ahanyima y'omusibe kukwatwa, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kumukomerezaho okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo.

eng_prompt: During the trial, the defense attorney argued that the injuries sustained by the accused were a direct result of the incident in question. As a result, the accused expressed concern over the financial burden of his medical treatment.
lug_prompt: Mu kugezesebwa, munnamateeka w'oludda oluvunaanibwa yagamba nti ebisago by'omuwawabirwa byava ku ebyo ebyaliwo. N'ekyavaamu, avunaanibwa yalaze obweraliikirivu olw'obuzito bw'ensimbi bw'obujjanjabi bwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pido, lacungu pi adot owaco ni awano ma ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni onongo obedo macalo adwogi me gin ma otimme. Macalo adwogi ne, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye onyuto lworo I kom wel cente ma en twero tic kwede me nongo yat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka aipup emusago, abu epulida loitepegit itunga kotema ebe amusunguneta nu abu lo iwosatai kodum erai kanuka akiro ngun. Kanuka ngun abu lo iwosatai kitodu aiyalongong kanu ikapun lu amukian ke.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo lizurisi, 'ba a'di 'dipi 'diyi 'yo kini nya'biliko agu 'bani to 'da isu 'diyi e'yo i 'yepi 'da ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, agu 'bani to 'da ece asi otiza e'yo eri ma robia aro esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omubwiire bw'okuhurira omushango, rooya w'orubanja akagira ngu obuhuta obu orikujunaanwa yaatungire bukaruga aha bintu ebyabaireho. N'ekyarugiremu, orikujunaanwa akooreka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente bw'okuragurirwa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, authorities uncovered evidence linking the suspect to a foreign government. This alarming discovery prompted law enforcement to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, ab'obuyinza baazuula obujulizi obukwataganya omutemu ne gavumenti y'ebweru. Okuzuula kuno okw'entiisa kwaleetera abakuumaddembe okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, lutela gunongo caden ma kubu ngat ma kimako ni ki gamente me lobo ma woko. Gin ma ki nongo man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom lutic cik me timo gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret na arucokinit lo iwosatai keda apugan nakokinga. Abu adumunet ngin koinak ipolisin aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu e'yo ecepi kini agu 'bani ega eza e'yo ri eci gamete kari azi amve 'diyi pie. E'yo 'bani esu orisi 'diri fe 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'yo 'ye indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, ab'obushoborozi bakareeba obuhame oburikworeka ngu owabaire nateekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro akaba aine akakwate na gavumenti y'eihanga erindi. Ekijumbwirwe eki eky'omutaano kikareetera ab'ebiragiro kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy hearing, the judge reviewed the evidence presented by both the prosecution and defense. Ultimately, the court determined that the accused posed no flight risk and met the conditions for release.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ebbanga eddene, omulamuzi yeetegereza obujulizi obwaleetebwa oludda oluwaabi n'oludda oluvunaanibwa. Ku nkomerero, kkooti yasalawo nti omuwawaabirwa teyali mu katyabaga k'okudduka era yatuukiriza obukwakkulizo bw'okuteebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo lok pi kare malac, langol kop ongiyo caden ma adot ki adot okelo. I agiki ne, kot omoko ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni pe twero ngwec dok ocobo jami ma mite me gonye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apupio na apak naepol noi, abu ekatubon koanyana aitogogongoret naetolomunitai kama ejaasi emusago keda luitepesenitai. Kawasia abu ekooti kodum ebe mam lo iwosatai epedori akerit kosodi aitodolikin nutupitono kanu alacakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eriza ezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri andri afa e'dapi kini e'yo liza azini e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ra. Asizu, koti 'du e'yo kini agu 'bani toleri ovuni e'yo ewaru apazu ku dika eri 'ye e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma ofuzu 'diyi ra.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya amateeka amapya, yawulira nti gaali gakyamu era nga ga bulabe eri enkulaakulana y'eggwanga. N'ekyavaamu, yasalawo okwogera ebimweraliikiriza mu lukungaana.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ainapeta nuitetiak, abu ngesi koany ebe mam kesi iswamaete ejok ido emunarete apol naka akwap. Kanuka ngun, abu ngesi koseu alimun aiyalongongoke kotoma airiamunet.

eng_prompt: During the trial, the defense attorney presented several witnesses who testified about the conditions in the detention center. In a dramatic turn, the accused took the stand to share his harrowing experience.

ach_prompt: Ikare me winyo pido, langol kop pa langol kop okelo caden mapol ma otito kit ma kwo tye kwede I buc. I aloka-loka madit tutwal, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ocung me tito peko ma en okato ki iye.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in crime rates, community leaders urged local authorities to take immediate action. As a result, more police officials were deployed to ensure night security.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baasabye ab'obuyinza mu byalo okubaako kyebakola mu bwangu. N'ekyavaamu, abapoliisi abalala baayiiriddwa okukuuma eby'okwerinda ekiro.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa rwom me timo bal ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gulego lutela me tedero me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Macalo adwogi ne, kicwalo abili mapol me gwoko ber bedo I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka abilibilio naka ikisila, apotu engarenok isinyikokisi apedorosio nuka atutubet aswam katipet. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ipolisin luipu kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara akware.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongmbo e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo 'yezu mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba polisi azi eyi dika ageitema inisi ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ebyaro bakashaba ab'obushoborozi kukora ahonaaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abapooriisi baingi bakaheebwa omurimo gw'okurinda nyekiro.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising between the two districts for months, as each side accuses the other of mismanaging resources. The root of their conflict lies in the contentious issue of how funds are allocated and shared.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati wa disitulikiti ebbiri okumala emyezi, nga buli ludda lunenya luli olw'okukozesa obubi eby'obugagga. Ensibuko y'obukuubagano bwabwe eri mu butakkaanya ku ngeri ensimbi gye zigabanyizibwamu n'okugabanyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde I kin districts aryo ne pi dwe mapol, kun tung acel acel okok I kom lawote pi tic ki lim I yoo marac. Telo tol matye ikin gi tye I lok me apoka-poka I kom kit ma ki poko ki poko kwede lim.
teo_prompt: Eyatakinos ingungeta kiding idisitriktan ngun iarei adaun ilapio luipu, naarai itoronete kesi luce kanu aitolitol iboro. Akirot naka ingungeta kec ejai toma ationis naka epone loekorere ikapun keda aimor.

eng_prompt: In response to recent incidents of theft and vandalism, the management decided to enhance the safety measures in the area. To address these concerns, nightguards were deployed to improve security.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bubbi n'okwonoona ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okutumbula eby'okwerinda mu kitundu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga ezo, abakuumi b'ekiro baateekebwawo okutumbula eby'okwerinda.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim me kwo ki balo jami ma otime cokcok-ki, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me gwoko kuc I kabedo eni. Me tyeko peko magi, kicwalo lukur piny me medo rwom me gwoko kuc.

ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny I kin lwak odoko tek tutwal I kare ma rwom me kony ma pire tek omedde ki dok piny. Dano mapol gubedo ki tam ni pe ki keto cwinygi I kom peko gi pi kare malac tutwal.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple attempts to reach him, he remained unresponsive during the call. Frustration grew as the deadline approached, and he was expected to provide crucial information.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising between the two communities for weeks, fueled by rumors and misunderstandings. As a result, the group felt increasingly unsafe and on edge.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati w'ebitundu bino ebibiri okumala wiiki eziwera olw'olugambo n'obutategeeragana. N'ekyavaamu, ekibinja kyawulira nga tekirina bukuumi era nga kiri ku bunkenke.

lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala emyezi, nga okwekalakaasa kweyongedde mu kulwanagana okw'effujjo. Olugambo olw'obukuubagano obwali bugenda okusaasaana, abantu beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'obutabanguko obuyinza okubaawo.

E'yo nzeza e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni i erezurisi, ongulumu eyi ma asi otiza e'yo ngiringiri ni ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria ri tu ra.

eng_prompt: Residents in the neighborhood had been receiving alarming messages for weeks. Concerned for their safety, they decided to take action and report the situation.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu kitundu babadde bafuna obubaka obweraliikiriza okumala wiiki eziwera. Olw'okweraliikirira ku lw'obukuumi bwabwe, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo ne baloopa embeera.

nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye omu kicweka ekyo batwire nibatunga obutumwa oburikwerarikirira kumara esande nyingi. Ahabw'okwerarikirira eby'okwerinda kwabo, bakasharamu kukora ekirikubaasika kandi bakaha ripoota y'embeera.

eng_prompt: Despite repeated requests for assistance, the community felt increasingly vulnerable. Frustrated by the lack of support, residents voiced their concerns about the officers' presence.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baasaba obuyambi enfunda n'enfunda, abantu beeyongera okuwulira nga tebalina buyambi. Olw'obutaba na buyambi, abatuuze baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku kubeerawo kw'abasirikale.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kilego pi kony tyen mapol, lwak obedo ka winyo marac tutwal. Pi cwer cwiny pi can kony, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom bedo tye pa abili.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilipitos kesi aingarakinio, apotu itunga opupoto ican noi. Kanuka amamus na agangat, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ajaut naka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani azakoma aizu 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, ongulumu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra e'yo ewaru ma alea sa'wa driasi. E'yo atita ako nirisi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo azi'ba 'da eyini aa'zu 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba obuhwezi emirundi mingi, abantu b'omukyanga ekyo bakeeyongyera kwehurira nk'abatarikwebaasa. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'obutaheebwa bushagiki, abatuuragye bakahayo okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'okubaho kw'abaserukare.

eng_prompt: In a community where tensions often run high, residents frequently turn to law enforcement for assistance. Many believe that the police play a crucial role in resolving conflicts and ensuring public safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ng'obunkenke butera okubeera waggulu, abatuuze baddukira mu bakuumaddembe okufuna obuyambi. Bangi bakkiriza nti poliisi ekola omulimu gwa maanyi nnyo mu kugonjoola obukuubagano n'okukuuma abantu nga batebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma telle tye iye, lutedero pol kare gidok bot abili pi kony. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni abili timo tic mapire tek tutwal me tyeko kuku kuku ki neno ni lwak tye agwoka.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuejaasi keda ingungeta luipu, etapit itunga aijulakin nejaas ipolisin kanu aingarakinio. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe iswamaete ipolisin aswam naepol noi kanu aitemokin ingungeta ka aidar ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni ovuzu uru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi oja eyi polisi eyi vu azakoma esuzu. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini polisi eyi azi okporu ni nga ngiringiri eyi ma aza kozu azini o'bi eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ahu obunkenke burikuba buri ahaiguru, abatuuragye nibahindukirira ab'eby'obutegyeki kutunga obuhwezi. Abaingi nibaikiriza ngu poriisi neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumaraho entaro n'okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: Effective communication between the community and law enforcement is essential for maintaining public safety. To enhance their response to local issues, the police should be equipped with relevant and up-to-date information.

ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ki miti me jami, lutic me tedero gumiyo tam me loko wang lobo pa gamente. Ingee nywako lok mapol ki tam pa lwak, kimoko yub eni.

lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie risi, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe egata e'yo boda eyini 'diyi otuzu o'diru ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri 'diyi ma vutia azini o'bi yi ma egata ma vutia, 'ba ai otita 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'ebintu, abakuru b'ebyaro bakaha ekiteiso ky'okuhindura ensharo z'obwebembezi. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga hamwe n'ebiteiso by'abantu, enteekateeka ekaikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly discussing the upcoming spiritual gatherings. Organizers have finalized the schedule and are excited to announce the details.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde bateesa n'obwagazi ku nkungaana z'eby'omwoyo ezijja. Abategesi bamalirizza enteekateeka era basanyufu okulangirira ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lok ki miti madit tutwal I kom gure me dini matye kabino ni. Luyub otyeko tyeko yub me yub eni dok cwiny gi yom me miyo ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga aitemitem keda eipud airiamununeta nu eyapiei. Apotu luitemonokinak ongetakisi ainapeta ngun ido iyalamasi alimor akiro nukaidules.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da eyi e'bi agbatara gba saaru okuta e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi de otita 'da 'bo dika eyi ayikosi e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi oluzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibagaaniira n'ekihika aha nteerane z'eby'omwoyo ezirikwija kubaho. Abatebekanisa bamazireho entebekanisa kandi bashemereirwe kurangirira ebirikukiraho.

eng_prompt: In the midst of rising tensions and conflicts within the neighborhood, the local leaders gathered to discuss potential solutions. Recognizing the need for unity and harmony, they sought guidance on how to foster a sense of togetherness among residents.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke n'obukuubagano obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukigonjoolamu. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'obumu n'obumu, baanoonya okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okutumbula obumu mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle ki lweny tye ka mede I kabedo enuni, lutela me tedero gucokke me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Pien guniang ber pa ribe ki winye, guyenyo tira i kom kit me kelo ribe ikin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka aiyalongong keda ingungeta lu eyatakinos kotoma aiboisit, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aimorikikina keda acamanara, apotu kesi odumutu aicoreta nuka epone loka aitopolor aimorikikina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo lezu ti ecita azini aa'ta tualuri ma dria, eyi nda imbata geri eyini ecozu ti ecita ejizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke n'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire omu byaro, abebembezi b'ebyaro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa n'obumwe, bakasherura obuhabuzi aha ku barikubaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: In their community gathering, the leaders discussed the various challenges they faced, emphasizing the need for integrity and transparency. With a shared commitment to justice, they decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwabwe olw'ekitundu, abakulembeze baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku kusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo kwe baasanga, ne bakikkaatiriza obwetaavu bw'obwesimbu n'obwerufu. Olw'okwewaayo kwabwe eri obwenkanya, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me kabedo gi, lutela ne guloko I kom peko mapat-pat ma gunongo, kun giwaco ni omyero dano gubed ki ada ki ada. Ki miti madit tutwal I kom ngol matir, gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kec, apotu engarenok kitetemoto atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi, itogogongitos eipuda lo abeit ka aica. Keda ainakina kec nejai etube loajokan, apotu kesi koseutu aswam.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi agbatara gba e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma dria, eyini asi 'bazu e'yo ada azini e'yo ada ma dria. Asi 'baza tualu e'yo liza kililiru ri si, eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwabo orw'ekyanga, abebembezi bakahanuura ahaburemeezi obubarikubugana, barikworeka ekyetengo ky'obwesigwa n'oburingaaniza. Ahabw'okwehayo kimwe ahabw'oburingaaniza, bakasharamu kukora.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's growing concerns, the leader called for a gathering to unite everyone in hope and reflection. Recognizing the importance of spiritual support during challenging times, she decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula okweraliikirira kw'ekitundu okweyongera, omukulembeze yayita olukungaana okugatta buli omu mu ssuubi n'okufumiitiriza. Olw'okukimanya nti obuyambi bw'omwoyo bwa mugaso mu biseera ebizibu, yasalawo okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma lwak tye kwede, latela ne olwongo kacoke me ribo dano weng I gen ki tam. Ki niang ber pa kony me cwiny ikare me peko, en omoko tamme me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, abu engarenon kolimok atukonokin kanu aimorikikin itunga kere toma amuno keda aomoom. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka agangat naka aomisio kotoma apakio nuetioko, abu ngesi koseu aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba 'da omve okuta 'ba dria eyi ecizu asi'baza azini egata eyi ma dria. Erini e'yo orodri atita onitani ma dria 'diyi esuzu sawa e'yo ewaru ma alia 'boria, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira kw'abantu, omwebembezi akeeta orukiiko rw'okugarukanisa buri omwe omu matsiko n'okuteekateeka. Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'obuhwezi bw'omwoyo omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, akasharamu kugira eki yaakora.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive environment, maintaining integrity is crucial for effective leadership. Therefore, it is essential for leaders to uphold ethical standards in all their dealings.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, okukuuma obwesimbu kya mugaso nnyo eri obukulembeze obulungi. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukuuma emitindo gy'empisa mu nkolagana zaabwe zonna.
ach_prompt: I kare man me pyem matek tutwal, gwoko ber bedo pire tek tutwal pi tela maber. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me lubu cik ikare weng ma gitye ka tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka abolobol lolo, aidar amunonoro erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka eingarenone loajokan. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi engarenok aitup iponesio lukajokak kotoma aswamukec kere.
lgg_prompt: Angu a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, aa'ta e'yo ada be ri ma tambaza eri orodriru driceza muke ri ni. Ka'dini, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini 'yeta eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo dria eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, okurinda obwesigwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abebembezi okugira emitwarize mirungi omu mirimo yaabo yoona.

eng_prompt: The organizers have announced a prestigious lineup for the charity gala. Among the notable attendees, the First Lady will be the event's guest of honour.
lug_prompt: Abategesi balangiridde enteekateeka ey'ekitiibwa ey'omukolo gw'okugaba obuyambi. Mu bantu abakulu abajja ku mukolo, omukyala wa pulezidenti y'ajja okuba omugenyi omukulu.
ach_prompt: Luyub okatti ki lok angeya I kom joo ma gubi bedo tye I yub me miyo kony bot lupeko. I kin joo ma gubedo tye, dako pa ladit lobo aye obi bedo welo madit.
teo_prompt: Alimo etemonokinak ainapeta nuajokak noi nuka ainapeta nuka aidar agangat. Kotoma otunga luejenara, Aberu naka lokapolon akwap nges ebuni araun epejonon lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo otu'ba 'diyi azi 'ba wura onyiru 'diyi omu 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyiniri ma alia. Ba inzile inzi emu'ba 'diyi ma eselea, oku drile kari ni ri ni mu adri omu inzile inzi omu 'da ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abatebeekanisa batumire abantu b'omutaano aha mukoro gw'okugaba obuhwezi. Omuri abo abarikumanywa munonga, omukazi w'omwebembezi w'eihanga naija kuba omugyenyi mukuru aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: The community has come together to celebrate a significant milestone in local governance. Invitations have been extended to various dignitaries and influential figures.
lug_prompt: Abantu bakungaanidde wamu okujaguza ekintu ekikulu ennyo mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu. Okuyitibwa kukoleddwa eri abakungu ab'enjawulo n'abantu ab'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lwak guribe kacel me kwero nino madit tutwal I tela me tedero. Kicwalo lwongo bot ludito ki dano ma oywek mapol.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga imorikikinos ainumunum apolou naepol noi kotoma apugan naka atutubet. Aponi ijukunai aiwororio mama ejaasi itunga luapolok keda luapolok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi emu tualu ayiko zuzu e'yo azi okporu ni eyi ma dria e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma alea. Ba omve 'ba inzile inzi 'diyi karakara azini 'ba okporu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakwatanisize okujaguza omukoro gw'amaani omu bwebembezi bw'ebyaro. Abantu b'ekitiinisa n'ab'amaani batwirwe.

eng_prompt: The current archbishop has announced his retirement after many years of dedicated service. As a result, the church is preparing for a significant transition in leadership.
lug_prompt: Ssaabalabirizi aliko alangiridde okuwummula kwe oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obuweereza obw'obwesimbu. N'ekyavaamu, ekkanisa yeetegekera enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Latel wi bicop ma kombedi otito ni ebiweko tic I nge mwaki mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, kanica tye ka yubbe pi aloka loka madit tutwal I tela.
teo_prompt: Alimo Ebisop lokapolon loejai kwana aiyengun ke akaulo naka aijanakin ikar luipu. Kanuka ngun, euta ekanisa aitemonokin kanu aijulakin engarenone loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Archbishopi sawa 'disi ri azi i ma ava liza azi kuzu eli karakara azi ngazu asi driasi 'bori ma vutia. E'yo 'disi, kanisa ni otuta 'ye ojata okporu ni driceza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Akibiishopu oriho obwahati arangirire okuhuumura kwe bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza. N'ekyarugiremu, ekanisa eriyo neeteekateekyera empindahinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set over the cathedral, the congregation gathered in anticipation. Many were eager to hear the final words of wisdom from their beloved leader.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa ku lutikko, abantu baakuŋŋaana nga beesunga. Bangi baali beesunga okuwulira ebigambo eby'amagezi ebisembayo okuva eri omukulembeze waabwe omwagalwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto i wi ot lega madit, lwak gucokke ma cwinygi yom. Dano mapol gubedo ki miti me winyo lok me ryeko pa latela meggi ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror kokanisa, apotu ikuristayon kotukokinos. Akotosi itunga luipu apupokin akiro nuka awasia nuka acoa kanejai engarenon kec loamina.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'dezu kanisa ambori ma dria, 'ba kanisa ni 'diyi tra eyi asi driasi. Ba karakara eyi ndra avaru e'yo ondua ni asizu 'diyi erizu engazu drice'ba eyivile leletu ri vu.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga aha kanisa enkuru, abantu baketeeranira hamwe bategyereize. Baingi bakaba baine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebigambo by'obwengye kuruga aha mwebembezi waabo omukundwa.

eng_prompt: In our organization, we value the experience and wisdom that comes with age. To ensure a smooth transition and the infusion of new ideas, we have established a retirement age for our leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyaffe, tusiima obumanyirivu n'amagezi ebiva mu myaka. Okukakasa enkyukakyuka ennungi n'okuyingiza ebirowoozo ebipya, tutaddewo emyaka gy'okuwummula eri abakulembeze baffe.
ach_prompt: I dul megwa, watero ngec ki ryeko ma dano nongo ikare ma gutii calo gin ma pire tek. Me neno ni aloka-loka tye maber dok bene ki kelo tam manyen, waketo mwaka me weko tic pi lutela wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget wok, isingarenit sio amisiarit keda acoa na elomuni keda apolo. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aijulanakineta keda aitolomun aomisio nuitetiak, itolomutu sio ikaru lu iyengunete engarenok wok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ma alea, ama e'yo nita azini ondua emupi eli be 'diyi 'du orodriru. E'yo ojata kililiru ni azini egata o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, ama 'ba eli azi kuzu drice'ba amavile 'diyi dri 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyaitu, nitusiima obumanyi n'obwengye oburikwija n'emyaka. Okureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka nungi hamwe n'okureetaho ebiteekateeko ebisya, tutaireho emyaka y'okuhuumuriraho abeebembezi baitu.

eng_prompt: At a young age, he felt a strong calling to help others and spread his beliefs. Driven by his passion, he embarked on a journey that would change his life forever.
lug_prompt: Ku myaka emito, yawulira omulanga ogw'amaanyi okuyamba abalala n'okubunyisa enzikiriza ye. Olw'okwagala ennyo ebintu, yatandika olugendo olwali lugenda okukyusa obulamu bwe emirembe gyonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma en pud tidi, en owinyo lwongo matek tutwal me konyo jo mukene ki poko niyene. Pi mitine, en ocako wot ma obiloko kwone matwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lodidi, abu ngesi kopup aiwororio naepol noi naka aingarakin luce ka aisiarakin aiyuunike. Keda eipuda loepol noi, abu ngesi kogeu alosit aijulakin aijarake.
lgg_prompt: Eli werea ri ma alea, eri etumu omveta okporu 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini i ma a'ita eyi erezu. Afa erini leleri ma e'yosi, eri e'do aci azi ngapi eri ma idri ojazu ewule ewule ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire akiri muto, akahurira eiraka ry'amaani ry'okuhwera abandi n'okujanjaaza enyikiriza ye. Ahabw'okwenda kwe, akatandika orugyendo orwabaire niruza kuhindura amagara gye ebiro byona.

eng_prompt: Throughout his life, he dedicated himself to making a positive impact on his community and inspiring others. As he reflects on his journey, he knows that his legacy will endure long after he's gone.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu bwe bwonna, yeewaayo okukola ebirungi mu kitundu kye n'okuzzaamu abalala amaanyi. Bw'alowooza ku lugendo lwe, akimanyi nti omukululo gwe gujja kuwangaala ng'amaze okufa.
ach_prompt: I kare me kwone ducu, en oketo cwinye me kelo alokaloka maber I kabedo ne ki cuku cwiny dano mukene. Ka en tamo I kom wot mege, en ngeyo ni lanyut mege bimedde anyim kadi bed ni en dong otoo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijarake kere, abu ngesi koinak akekuan aswam kagogong kotoma atutubeteke keda aisinyikokinit luce. Neautar ngesi aomoom nuikamunitos alositeke, ejeni ngesi ebe ebuni ekirorike angetakin apak naepol noi akaulo naka atwanareke.
lgg_prompt: Idri erini ma alia dria, fe i ma ngulupi e'yo 'yezu onyiru ongulumu erivileri ma dria azini ava fezu 'ba azi 'diyi dri. Erini e'yo egazu geri erini acizu ri ma dria, eri nii kini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi nga ovu ewu ezu erini drazu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara gye goona, akeehayo kuhwera abantu b'omukyanga kye n'okugaruramu abandi amaani. Ku arikuteekateeka aha rugyendo rwe, naamanya ngu ekicweka kye nikiija kugumaho bwanyima y'okufa kwe.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing issue in his town, he felt compelled to take action. With a heavy heart, he gathered local leaders to discuss the alarming rise in exploitation.
lug_prompt: Bwe yalaba ekizibu ekyali kyeyongedde mu kabuga ke, yawulira nga yeetaaga okubaako ky'akolawo. N'omutima omuzito, yakungaanya abakulembeze b'ebyalo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kweyongera kw'okunyigirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma oniang peko matye kamede I taun mege, en obedo ki miti me timo gin mo. Ki cwer cwiny madit, en olwongo lutela me tedero me lok I kom medde pa tim me nywaro dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ationis na iyata noi koibuga ke, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam ibore. Keda aiyalongong, abu ngesi kitukok engarenok luka atutubet kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aibucaret naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru tawuni erivileri ma alea ri ma e'yo ndrezu 'boria, eri ega kini eri ma asi 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Asi driasi, eri tra drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ayuza ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureeba oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu tawuni ye, akeehurira naagyemeserezibwa kugira eki yaakora. N'omutima gw'oburemeezi, akarundaana abebembezi b'ebyaro kuhanuura aha kweyongyera kw'okubonabonesibwa.

eng_prompt: As a respected leader in the community, he often addressed pressing social issues during his sermons. Recently, he focused on the urgent need to combat the rising tide of violence against women and marginalized groups.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze ow'ekitiibwa mu kitundu, yateranga okwogera ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu mu kubuulira kwe. Gye buvuddeko, essira yalissa ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulwanyisa okweyongera kw'obutabanguko ku bakazi n'ebibinja ebyasuulibwa ku mabbali.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela ma kiworo I kabedo enoni, en pol kare loko I kom lok mapigi tego I kare me pwony mege. Cocoki, en oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom miti me lweny I kom tim gero I kom mon kacel ki joo ma pe ki twero konyo gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon loeyongitai noi kotoma atutubet, etapit ngesi einer nuikamunitos akiro nuepolok noi kotoma aijaanakinike. Apakio nu, abu ngesi kiner nuikamunitos eipud loka atipet loka aitikitik amumu naka angor keda igurupun luemameototor itunga.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba inzita be ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ru, eri ri e'yo nze e'yo okporu o'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria sa'wa erini e'yo oluzu 'diyi ma alea. O'du 'diyi ma alia, 'ba asi e'yo lezu e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi oku yi ma rua 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi orikuheebwa ekitiinisa omu bantu, akaba akira kugamba aha nshonga z'abantu omu kubuzya kwe. Enyimaho, akata omutima aha kyetengo ky'amaani eky'okurwanisa obwimukiriro aha bakazi hamwe n'abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Respect and equality are fundamental in any relationship, and violence has no place in our society. It is crucial to uphold the dignity and safety of every individual, regardless of gender.
lug_prompt: Okussa ekitiibwa n'okwenkanankana bikulu mu mukwano gwonna, era obutabanguko tebulina kifo mu kitundu kyaffe. Kya mugaso nnyo okukuuma ekitiibwa n'obukuumi bwa buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku kikula ky'omuntu.
ach_prompt: Woro ki bedo marom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I winye mo keken dok tim gero pe omyero obed tye I kabedo wa. Pire tek tutwal me gwoko woro ki ber bedo pa dano weng labongo paro pi coo onyo mon.
teo_prompt: Ayongit keda aibuses eraas nuepolok noi kotoma ajanara, ido amumu emamei aiboisit kotoma atutubetekosi. Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar angosibib keda ayuwara naka itunga kere, araida ikiliok arai angor.
lgg_prompt: Inzita azini trotro ri eri orodriru aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma alea, dika e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma pari ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea yo. Eri orodriru inzita azini ageitema fezu 'ba dria eyidri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitiinisa n'oburinganiza n'eby'omugasho omu mukago gwona, kandi obutabanguko tiburikwikirizibwa omu bantu baitu. N'eky'omugasho kurinda ekitinisa n'oburinzi bwa buri muntu, oihiremu omushaija n'omukazi.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societies have often perpetuated harmful norms that devalue certain groups, leading to widespread injustices. One of the most pervasive issues arising from these norms is gender-based violence, which has roots in cultural and systemic inequalities.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu babaddenga bakuuma empisa ez'obulabe ezityoboola abantu abamu, ekiviiriddeko obutali bwenkanya obususse. Emu ku nsonga ezisinga okusaasaana okuva mu bulombolombo buno bwe butabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula ky'abantu, obwesigamiziddwa ku buwangwa n'obutafaanagana mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, lwak pol kare gubedo ki tim maraco ma balo rwom pa dul mogo, ma okelo ngolo kop alenga mapol tutwal. Lok acel ma onya tutwal ma aa ki I kom cik magi obedo tim gero ikin mon ki coo, ma ocake ki apoka-poka me tekwaro ki yub mapat-pat.
