lgg_prompt: Ba tutuni truta ndre ekile e'yo onyiru ni ru, te 'ba karakara eyi dri ci e'yo eyini eza drio 'diyi kuzu ja. E'yo 'di fe zita azi orodriru ni efu e'yo 'ba ada eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okusaasira nikureebwa nk'omuringo murungi, kwonka abantu baingi nibarwana kureka okwetomboita okwabaireho enyima. Eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho ekirikukwata aha buremeezi bw'ebiteekateeko by'abantu hamwe n'emikago yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a healthy relationship, mutual respect and collaboration are essential for growth. To build a strong partnership, both individuals should prioritize their shared goals and aspirations.
lug_prompt: Mu mukwano omulungi, okuwaana ekitiibwa n'okukolagana bikulu nnyo mu kukulaakulana. Okuzimba omukago ogw'amaanyi, abantu bombi balina okukulembeza ebiruubirirwa n'ebiruubirirwa bye bafaanaganya.
ach_prompt: I kin dano ma komgi yot, woro ki winye ikin gi obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo. Pi yubu wat matek, dano aryo weng omyero guket yub ki miti gi ikare acel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma eidicane loejok, ayongit keda aiswamanara ejok kanu apol. Kanu aiduk eidicane loegogong, ekot itunga kere aisingarenit alosikinetekec keda apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta muke ri ma alea, inzita tualu ti icita be 'diyi orodriru zota esuzu. Aa'ta tualu okporu ri sizu, le 'ba iri 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bushwere burungi, okuheerezana ekitiinisa n'okukwatanisa n'eby'omugasho omu kutunguuka. Okwombeka omukago gw'amaani, abantu bombi bashemereire kwebembeza ebigyendererwa byabo hamwe n'ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In many households, discussions about money can lead to tension and conflict. As a result, some women may choose to keep their financial situations private from their partners.
lug_prompt: Mu maka mangi, okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ssente kusobola okuleetawo okusika omuguwa n'obukuubagano. N'ekivuddemu, abakazi abamu bayinza okusalawo okukuuma embeera zaabwe ez'ebyensimbi nga za kyama eri abaami baabwe.
ach_prompt: I gangi mapol, nywako lok i kom cente kelo telle ki tele. Macalo adwogi ne, mon mukene twero yero me gwoko lok kom limgi I mung ki bot coo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oreria luipu, epedorete ineresinei nuikamunitos ikapun ayangaun aiyalongong keda ingungeta. Kanuka ngun, epedorete angor ace aseun aingop ejautene kec loka ikapun kama ejaasi ikiliokokec.
lgg_prompt: Aku karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri eco e'yo eyi eji ra. E'yo 'disi, oku azi 'diyi eco pe e'yo yini robia ma dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu yi ma agupi yi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka maingi, okuhanuura aha sente nikibaasa kureetaho obunkenke n'obutaikirizana. N'ekyarugiremu, abakazi abamwe nibabaasa kusharaho okureka embeera yaabo y'esente omu kihama aha bashaija baabo.

eng_prompt: As government spending rises to support public services and infrastructure, the burden often falls on taxpayers. Consequently, the financial demands placed on individuals and families can significantly impact their daily expenses.
lug_prompt: Ensaasaanya ya gavumenti bwe yeeyongera okuyamba abantu n'ebizimbe, omugugu gutera kugwa ku muwi w'omusolo. N'olw'ekyo, ebyetaago by'ensimbi ebiteekebwa ku bantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka bisobola okukosa ennyo ensaasaanya yabwe eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Kace wel cente ma gamente tiyo kwede me konyo tic pa lwak tye ka medde, peko ne tye I kom lucul mucoro. Macalo adwogi ne, miti me lim makiketo I kom dano ki gangi twero balo cente ma gitiyo kwede nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata etiai loka ikapun lu itwasamao apugan kanu aigangite ejanakine lo apugan keda iboro lu itwasamao, ejai duc epone ngol mama ejaasi itunga lueinanakete isolosinei. Kanuka ngun, eipuda lo ikapun lo ipikakinitai mama ejaasi itunga keda ikalia epedori aitolitol ikapunukec luka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Robia gamete ni ayu o'bi eyini azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ni turia, e'yo 'da ni e'de 'ba musoro ofepi 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, e'yo robia lepi 'bani 'ba yi ma ngulupi ma dria azini familia yi ma dria 'diyi eco e'yo yini ayu o'du driasi 'diyi 'ye onzi ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku enshohoza ya gavumenti erikweyongyera kuhwera abantu n'ebyombeko, oburemeezi nibukira kugwa ahari abo abarikushashura emishoro. N'ahabw'ekyo, ebyetengo by'esente ebiteirwe aha bantu hamwe n'amaka, nibibaasa kuteganisa enshohoza yaabo eya burizooba.

eng_prompt: With the rapid advancement of technology, financial services have become more accessible than ever. One of the most significant innovations in this space is the rise of mobile payment solutions.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukulaakulana kwa tekinologiya okw'amangu, empeereza y'ebyensimbi efuuse nnyangu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ekimu ku bintu ebipya ebikulu ebikoleddwa mu nsonga eno kwe kweyongera kw'enkola z'okusasula ssente ku masimu.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa tet manyen ma tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, kony me lim dong odoko yot tutwal. Alokaloka acel ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo man obedo dongo pa yoo me culu cente ki icim.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka etatai loakwana, epatana adumunun ikapun kwape kapakio nukokau. Adiopet koboro luitegelikina luitolomunitai kotoma akwap kana ngesi apol naka epone loka aitac ikapun kosimu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologianiri ma zota okposiri ma e'yosi, e'yo robia ni 'diyi eca curu'do ewakokoru aga oku driorisi. Eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌye sawa ꞌdi ma alia okporu ꞌdiyi ma azi eri geri ꞌbani robia ofezu simuasi ꞌdiyi ma omgbo tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka ya tekinorogye, obuheereza bw'esente buhindukire oburikwetengwa munonga. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebikozirwe omu mwoga ogu, n'okutandikaho enkora y'okushashurira aha masimu.

eng_prompt: Governments often implement taxes on various goods to generate revenue. This financial burden typically affects both producers and consumers in the marketplace.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti zitera okussaawo emisolo ku bintu eby'enjawulo okusobola okufuna omusolo. Omugugu guno ogw'ensimbi gutera okukosa abakola ebintu n'abaguzi mu katale.
ach_prompt: Gamente ipol kare keto mucoro iwi jami mapatpat me nongo lim. Peko me lim man pol kare kelo peko I kom lucat ki luwil bene.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc apugan aitolomun isolosinei mama ejaasi iboro luegelegela kanu adumun ikapun. Ationis na na ikapun emunari akoriok keda agwelak kosokoni.
lgg_prompt: Gamete eyi tutuni musoro 'ba afa ndundu eyi ma dria robia esuzu. E'yo robia ni 'diri tuni 'ba afa edepi 'diyi azini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi bii indi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti nizikira kutaho emishoro aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe kugira ngu zitunge emishoro. Omugugu gw'esente ogu nigukira kuteganisa abarikuguza ebintu hamwe n'abarikubikozesa omu butare.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, effective communication and promotion are essential for success. As a result, professionals in the business world must be equipped with the ability to market their products and services effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ejjudde okuvuganya, empuliziganya ennungi n'okutumbula ebintu bikulu nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. N'ekyavaamu, abakugu mu by'obusuubuzi balina okuba n'obusobozi bw'okutunda ebintu byabwe n'obuweereza bwabwe obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kare man me pyem matek tutwal, lok ki tyelo kor tic obedo gin ma pire tek pi nongo loc. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro me biacara omyero gubed ki kero me cato jami gi ki tic gi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, einer ejok ka aitopolorio ejok kanu akerianut. Kanuka ngun, ekot ipirioitin luka akwap ajaut keda iboro lu igwelanarete iboro kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, e'yo nzeza kililiru azini otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba onita be tujari ma alea 'diyi ma esu afa dria eyini ani ecozu eyi ma afa ozizaru 'diyi ozizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, empurizagana n'okushongyera kurungi n'eby'omugasho aha businguzi. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu omu by'obushubuzi bashemereire kuba baine eby'okuguza ebintu byabo n'obuheereza bwabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: When evaluating the pricing strategy, it's essential to consider various elements that can impact the overall expenses. These elements can range from production costs to market demand and competition.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya enkola y'ebbeeyi, kya mugaso okulowooza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebiyinza okukosa ensaasaanya yonna. Ebintu bino bisobola okuva ku ssente ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kufulumya ebintu okutuuka ku bwetaavu mu katale n'okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngiyo kit me keto wel, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom jami mapol ma twero balo wel jami weng. Jami magi twero aa ki I kom wel cente ma mite me yubu jami, miti pa lucat ki pyem.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aanyanar etiai loka iboro, ibusakinit aomoom iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitolitol etiai loka ikapun. Epedorete iboro lu ageun kotoma ikapun lu itwasamao kanu aitolomun iboro, kitoni eipuda lo esokoni keda abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani aje 'bazu ri ma ale andrita ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo ndundu ecopi aje 'bani ayu dria 'diyi ojapi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi eco e'do e'yo aje 'bani afa edezu 'diyi ma dria, e'yo cu ni lezu azini baka seza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooshwijuma enteekateeka y'emihendo, n'eky'omugasho okureeba ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kukora aha nshohoza yaawe yoona. Ebintu ebi nibibaasa kurugiirira aha nshohoza y'okukora ebintu, ebyetaago by'akatare hamwe n'okuhayahayana.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with climate change and the depletion of fossil fuels, there is a growing emphasis on sustainable energy solutions. One promising approach involves harnessing natural processes that can be replenished over time.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi erwanagana n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okusaanawo kw'ebikozesebwa mu masannyalaze, waliwo essira eryeyongera ku kukozesa amasannyalaze ag'olubeerera. Enkola emu esuubiza ezingiramu okukozesa enkola z'obutonde ezisobola okuzzaawo oluvannyuma lw'ebbanga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki alokaloka me piny kacel ki rweny pa mac ma aa ki I kom jami macon, dano tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom yoo me nongo mac matye anyim. Yoo acel matye ki gen obedo tic ki jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo ma ki roco kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda akolong keda aikidiokor naka iboro luedumununei akinyet, ejai agogong naepol noi naka aitemokin nuka akim naejok. Epone ediope loepedori aswam imoriarit aitwasam iponesio luka Edeke luepedorio aisiteteun akaulo naka apak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ma ojata ma dria azini e'yo 'bani odu 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri be, asi 'baza e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri ma azi eri geri 'bani ecozu e'yo yi 'yepi sa'wa driasi 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanagana n'empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'okuhwaho kw'ebintu ebirikukoresa amajuuta g'omu itaka, hariho amaani agarikweyongyera ahaby'amashanyarazi ebirikugumizamu. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureeta amatsiko n'okukoresa emiringo y'obuhangwa erikubaasa kugarurwaho bwanyima y'obwire.

eng_prompt: In many households, traditional cooking methods are being replaced by more sustainable options. As a result, innovative technologies like cookstoves and biogas are gaining popularity for their efficiency and environmental benefits.
lug_prompt: Mu maka mangi, enkola z'okufumba eza bulijjo zikyusiddwa n'ez'obutonde. N'ekivuddemu, tekinologiya omupya nga essigiri n'amafuta ga biogas gafuna ettutumu olw'obwangu bwago n'emigaso gy'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I gangi mapol, kit me tedo macon tye ka leyo ka wang gi ki yoo me tedo ma beco. Macalo adwogi ne, diro manyen calo keno ka tedo ki biogas tye ka nongo yweka pi ticgi maber ki ber pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oreria luipu, eutai aijulakin iponesio lumojong luka aipo keda iponesio luajokak. Kanuka ngun, iponesio luitetiak kwape nat asigirin keda ekwam lo akinyet kes ejenete noi kanu aswam kec ejok ka ajokis na akwap.
lgg_prompt: Aku karakara eyi ma alea, geri nyaka a'dizu oku 'diyi ma paria geri nyaka a'dizu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, ondua o'diru 'diyi ekile sigiri azini biogas le 'diyi e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu muke azini orodri angu ama agei ri ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka maingi, emiringo y'obuhangwa y'okuteeka eriyo neehindurwa ey'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, tekinorogye y'obuhangwa nka esitoovu hamwe n'omwika ogurikwetwa biogas, nizikundwa munonga ahabw'oburungi bwazo hamwe n'oburungi bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, businesses must find effective ways to reach their target audience. Understanding the various marketing strategies available is crucial for driving sales and brand awareness.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, bizinensi zirina okunoonya engeri ennungi okutuuka ku bantu be zigenderera. Okutegeera enkola z'okutunda ez'enjawulo eziriwo kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula ebyamaguzi n'okumanyisa abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, biacara omyero gunong yoo maber me oo bot dano ma gimito. Niang diro mapat-pat me cat ma tye pire tek tutwal pi kelo cat ki ngec I kom jami mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, ekot ibiasaran adumun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu adolokin itunga lu ekotos kesi. Amisikin iponesio luegelegela luka agwelanar lu ejaas erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor agwelanar keda ajenara.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ewu andruri ma alea, le tujari eyi ma esu geri kililiru eyini ecozu cazu 'ba eyini lele 'diyi vu. Geri cuu ndazu ndundu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru tujara ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo 'bani afa ozizu 'diyi ma dria ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, abashubuzi bashemereire kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okuhika aha bantu abu barikwenda. Okwetegyereza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okuguza ebintu n'eky'omugasho omu kumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: As the demand for renewable energy sources continues to rise, many consumers are exploring options for solar energy. However, the initial investment for solar products can be a significant barrier for some households.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze agaggya obuggya bweyongera okulinnya, abakozesa bangi banoonyereza ku masannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba. Newankubadde, okusiga ensimbi okusooka mu bintu by'amasannyalaze g'enjuba kuyinza okuba ekizibu eri amaka agamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me nongo mac ma aa ki iceng tye kamede kwede, luwil mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me nongo mac ma aa ki iceng. Kadi bed kumeno, keto lim me acaka I kom jami ma aa ki iceng twero bedo ariya madit tutwal I gangi mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda loka aiboisio nu itwasamaere akim naka esola. Konye, agwel iboro luka esola erai ationis naepol noi mama ejaasi ikalia ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu geri aci ni 'bani eco ayu o'diru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tutu risi, 'ba karakara eyi aci solar niri ma ayuta nda. Kani si, lonyi vuti aleza oko afa solar ru 'diyi ma dria ri eco ovu e'yo ewaru aku azi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'amashanyarazi ebirikubaasa kugaruka kweyongyera, abarikubikozesa nibasherura oburyo bw'okukoresa amashanyarazi ga soora. Kwonka, okuta esente omu bintu by'amasanyarazi ga soora nikireetera amaka gamwe oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: With the increasing popularity of solar energy, many consumers are eager to invest in solar products. However, the market is also flooded with counterfeit items that can mislead unsuspecting buyers.
lug_prompt: Olw'ettutumu ly'amasannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba eryeyongera, abaguzi bangi beetegefu okusiga ensimbi mu bintu ebiva mu masannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba. Kyokka, akatale era kajjudde ebintu ebijingirire ebiyinza okubuzaabuza abaguzi abatategedde.
ach_prompt: Ki yweka pa mac ma aa ki iceng, luwil mapol tye ki miti me keto cente I jami ma aa ki iceng. Kadi bed kumeno, cuk bene opong ki jami ma pe obedo ada ma twero bwolo luwil ma pe gingeyo.
teo_prompt: Keda ejenara noi naka esola, ekotosi itunga luipu aipikakin ikapunukec toma akinyeta nuka esola. Konye, eleleba esokoni keda iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit luepedorete aisab agwelak lumam ejenete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani aci solar niri ma omgbo otuzuri ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'baza be robia ayuzu afa solar ru 'diyi ma dria. Kani si, cu 'di ga vini afa enzoru ecopi 'ba afa je'baa ega kokoru 'diyi obepi ra 'diyi si tre.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu amashanyarazi ga soora nigeeyongyera kumanywa, abantu baingi baine ekihika ky'okutandika kugakoresa. Kwonka, akatare karimu ebintu bingi ebitahikire ebirikubaasa kuhabya abaguzi abatarikumanya.

eng_prompt: In the world of business, individuals often face uncertainty and challenges that require bold decisions. Those who choose to pursue their own ventures must be willing to embrace the unknown.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya bizinensi, abantu batera okusanga obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa ebyetaagisa okusalawo okw'obuvumu. Abo abasalawo okwenyigira mu mirimu gyabwe balina okuba abeetegefu okwaniriza ebitamanyiddwa.
ach_prompt: I tenge me biacara, dano ipol kare ginongo peko ma mito tekcwiny me moko tam. Jo ma gimoko tam gi me timo tic gi omyero gubed atera me jolo jami ma pe gingeyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka agwelanar, ejaas itunga keda atiokisio nuekotosi kesi aitolomun aseununeta nuegogong. Ngul lu eseunete aswam iboro kec bon ekot ekapakina aijaun iboro lumam kesi ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru tujari niri ma alea, 'ba yi dri fu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru lepi 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi pie. Le 'ba azi ngapi eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi ma aa ngonde e'yo eyini nile ku 'diyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'eby'obushubuzi, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi oburikwetenga okucwamu n'obumanzi. Abo abarikucwamu kukora emirimo yaabo, bashemereire kuba beteekateekire kwakiira ebitarikumanywa.

eng_prompt: Expanding market reach is essential for any company aiming to increase its revenue. By attracting new customers, businesses can enhance their sales potential and overall success.
lug_prompt: Okugaziya akatale kya mugaso eri kkampuni yonna egenderera okwongera ku nfuna yaayo. Mu kusikiriza bakasitoma abapya, bizinensi zisobola okutumbula obusobozi bwazo obw'okutunda n'obuwanguzi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Dongo cat obedo gin ma pire tek pi dul mo keken matye ki miti me medo lim ma en nongo. I yoo me nongo luwil manyen, biacara twero medo rwom me catgi ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aisiarakin esokoni erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka ediokampuni lo ekoto aiyatakin ikapun ke. Kowai lo adumun agwelak luitetiak, epedorete ibiasaran aiyatakin agwelanar kec keda akerianut.
lgg_prompt: Cuu ma omgbo edrizu ri eri orodriru amuti ci lepi robia erini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ni. Tujura eyi ka aje'ba o'diru 'diyi esu, eyi ma tujari eyi ma omgbo tualu drile suza eyini ri pie ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera akatare n'eky'omugasho aha kampuni yoona erikwenda kwongyera aha ntatsya yaayo. Eby'obushubuzi ku birikutunga abaguzi abasya, nibibaasa kutunguura eby'obushubuzi bwabyo n'obusinguzi bwabyo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the ability to adapt and learn new competencies is essential for personal and professional growth. Many individuals seek opportunities to enhance their capabilities through various methods.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, obusobozi okukyusakyusa n'okuyiga obusobozi obupya kya mugaso mu nkulaakulana y'obuntu n'obw'ekikugu. Abantu bangi banoonya mikisa okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki kero me ngiyo ki pwonyo diro manyen pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ngat moni ki dongo pa ludiro. Dano mapol giyenyo gum me medo kero gi kun gitiyo ki yoo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na esipidi noi, apedorit aijulakin ka aisisia iboro luitetiak erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka apol naka itunganan keda epirioit. Eutasi itunga luipu aimo arerengesio nu aitogogong apedorosiokec kowai kalo egelegela.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ewu andruri ma alea e'yo yi 'yepi mbele mbele mbele 'diyi ma alea, ecozu e'yo ojazu azini ondua o'diru 'diyi onizu ri eri orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupi ni azini onita ma dria ri ni. Ba karakara eyi drileba nda eyi ma okpo otuzu geri ndundu eyi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, okubaasa kuhikaana n'embeera n'okwega emyoga misya n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka kw'omuntu n'omurimo gwe. Abantu baingi nibaronda emigisha y'okutunguura emyoga yaabo barikurabira omu miringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: At many formal events, organizers often invite notable figures to enhance the occasion. These special guests can add prestige and draw more attention to the ceremony.
lug_prompt: Ku mikolo emikulu egisinga, abategesi batera okuyita abantu abamanyifu okutumbula omukolo. Abagenyi bano ab'enjawulo basobola okwongera ekitiibwa n'okusikiriza abantu ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: I yub madongo mapol, luyub yub gi lwongo dano ma oywek me medo rwom me yub eni. Wele magi ma pigi tego gitwero medo rwom me woro ki keto cwiny I kom yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucito luipu luapolok, enyaraunete luitemonokinak itunga luejenara noi kanu aitojokar epucit. Ipejok lu lu itegelikina eyangaunete aibuses naepol noi nejai epucit.
lgg_prompt: Omu inzile inzi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi oku 'ba ru 'diyi omve omu 'da ma omgbo otuzu. Omu inzile inzi 'diyi eco inzita eji dika e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi eji omu 'da ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Aha mikoro y'amaani, abatebekanisa nibetwa abantu b'amaani kutunguura omukoro. Abagyenyi b'omutaano nibabaasa kwongyera ekitiinisa n'okureetaho okwetegyereza aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, meals are often structured around specific times of the day. One of the most common traditions is gathering for dinner after the sun sets.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, emmere etera okutegekebwa mu budde obumu mu lunaku. Obumu ku buwangwa obusinga obungi kwe kukungaana okulya ekyeggulo ng'enjuba emaze okugwa.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, cam ipol kare kiyubu malube ki kare ma kicimo. Tekwaro acel ma dano mapol timo en aye camo cam me otyeno I nge poto pa ceng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, itemonokino inyamat kotupitete apakio nuka apaaran. Adiopet kotoma inonosio luetapit itunga atukonokin kanu ainyam inyamat luka aparaan akaulo naka aibiror akolong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba nyaka eyi 'ba sa'wa azi eyi ma alea. E'yo azi 'bani 'ye tu 'diyi ma azi eri okuta nyaka ondresiri nyazu etuka ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa bingi, eby'okurya nibiteganisibwa omu bwire butari bumwe na bumwe omu eizooba. Emwe aha migyenzo erikukirayo kubaho, n'okweteeranira hamwe kurya kyamushana bwanyima y'eizooba kurenga.

eng_prompt: As concerns about the quality of education continue to grow, many citizens are questioning the effectiveness of current policies. In light of recent reports highlighting disparities in student performance, it's crucial to explore potential solutions.
lug_prompt: Nga okweraliikirira ku mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza kweyongera, bannansi bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'amateeka agaliwo. Okusinziira ku alipoota ezaakaggwa eziraga enjawulo mu nsoma y'abayizi, kikulu nnyo okunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lworo tye kamedde I kom rwom me kwan, anywali mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom tic pa cik matye kombedi. Ma lubbe ki adwoki me kwed ma okato cokcok-ki ma nyutu apoka-poka matye I kin lutino kwan, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos adoketait na asioman, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka ainapeta nu ejaas kwape kwana. Katupitos iripotan luitetiak lu itodunitos amamus na eswamae lo esisiak, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo onita ma wura ma dria ri ni mu drile tu, kari anzi karakara eyi e'yo azita curu'do 'diyi ma 'yeta ma dria. E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ecepi esele coza sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma alea ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okwerarikirira aha mutindo gw'eby'obwegyese nikuguma nikweyongyera, abatuuragye baingi nibabangaanisa okukora kurungi kw'ebiragiro ebiriho hati. Kurugirira aha ripoota ezihererukireyo kworeka entaaniso omu kukora kw'abeegi, n'eky'omugasho okuronda oburyo bw'okukikora.

eng_prompt: In many families, the pursuit of education is seen as a vital investment in a child's future. As a result, financial support often comes from parents or guardians who prioritize their children's learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu maka mangi, okusoma kutwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu eky'okusiga ensimbi mu biseera by'omwana eby'omu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi bw'ensimbi butera okuva mu bazadde oba abakuumi abakulembeza emikisa gy'okusoma kw'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: I gangi mapol, nongo kwan kineno calo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi anyim pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, kony me lim ipol kare aa ki bot lunyodo onyo joo ma gwoko lutino gi ma keto gangi kwan pa lutino gi bedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okalia luipu, ewanyunitai asioman kwape ibore yen epol ajokis kanu aijar naka idwe koingaren. Kanuka ngun, agangat na ikapun duc elomunit kama ejaasi auriak keda edarak lu ipolokitos asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Aku karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba onita ma vuti obiza ndre ekile lonyi vuti aleza orodriru ni ru mva eyi ma ewu drialeri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, atita robia nirisi ri ni tutuni enga engazu tipika eyi vu kani 'ba eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu eyini anzi eyivile 'diyi ma onita 'du okporu ri vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka maingi, okushoma nikureebwa nk'ekintu ky'omugasho omubiro bya nyensya by'omwana. N'ekyarugiremu, obuhwezi bw'esente nibukira kuruga omu bazaire nainga abarikureeberera abaana baabo abarikwebembeza eby'obwegyese bw'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing job market, students face numerous challenges in choosing the right career path. To help them navigate these complexities, educational institutions play a crucial role in providing support and resources.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akakyuka amangu, abayizi basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kulonda amakubo g'emirimu amatuufu. Okubayamba okutambula mu buzibu buno, amatendekero gakola omulimu omukulu mu kuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tic tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, lutino kwan nongo peko mapol ikare me yero gin ma gimito timo ikare me kwangi. Me konyogi me lweny i kom peko magi, gangi kwan timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka aswamisinei lolo, etereikina esisiak keda atiokisio nuipu kanu aseun aswam na abeit. Kanu aingarakin kes aitodolikin atiokisio nu, iswamaete isomeroi aswam naepol noi kowai lo aijaikin agangat keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: Angu curu'do azi oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, sukulu anzi eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu geri kililiru eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu ri pezu. Yi ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, pari onita ni 'diyi azi okporu nga atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'emirimo ehindukire munonga, abeegi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu kutoorana emirimo ehikire. Okubahwera kurabira omu buremeezi obu, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, he was grateful for the opportunity provided to him. The trust's support had been instrumental in helping him navigate the challenges of his academic journey.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yali musanyufu olw'omukisa ogwali gumuweereddwa. Obuyambi bw'ekitongole ekyo bwamuyamba nnyo okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kwe yafuna mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek, en obedo ki pwoc pi gum ma kimiye. Kony ma dul enoni omiyo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kare ma okato ki I peko me kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong, eyalama ngesi kanu arereng na ijaikitai ngesi. Agangat naka atukot ngin abu ingarak ngesi aitodolikin atiokisio nuka asiomanike.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, eri ndra awa'difo be drileba 'bani fele erini risi. Atita amuti 'da niri ndra orodriru eri ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru erini esu onita ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, akashemererwa ahabw'omugisha ogwamuheirwe. Obuhwezi bw'ekitongore kikuru kikamuhwera kurabira omu buremeezi bw'obwegyese bwe.

eng_prompt: In a remarkable turn of events, a group of talented young individuals has demonstrated exceptional potential despite facing significant challenges. Their hard work and determination have caught the attention of generous sponsors looking to support their educational journeys.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ekibinja ky'abavubuka abalina ebitone balaze obusobozi obw'enjawulo wadde nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Okukola ennyo n'obumalirivu bwabwe bisikiriza abavujjirizi ab'omutima omugabi abanoonya okubayambako mu misomo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka maber tutwal, gurup pa bulu ma gitye ki talanta gunyutu kero gi kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo peko mapol. Tic matek kacel ki keto cwiny gi oyomo cwiny dano mapol ma gimito culu pi kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, egurupu loka atumunak luejaasi keda atalanta itodunitos apedor naepol noi karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok. Aswam kec na aswam kagogong ka agogongu abu ingalau agangat kama ejaasi itunga luekotosi aigang aswamukec naka asioman.

nyn_prompt: Omu muringo gw'omutaano, guruupu y'eminyeeto eyine etaraanta, boorekire obushoboorozi bw'omutaano, oihireho oburemeezi bw'amaani. Omurimo gwabo gw'amaani hamwe n'okwehayo kwabo bitungire okwetegyerezibwa kw'abantu baingi abarikwenda kubashagika omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In many regions, cultural and economic barriers disproportionately affect girls' access to education. As a result, systemic inequalities persist, hindering their academic progress.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obuwangwa n'ebyenfuna bikosa nnyo abawala mu kusoma. N'ekivuddemu, obutali bwenkanya mu nkola bukyaliwo, ekibalemesa okukulaakulana mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, peko me tekwaro ki can lim balo yoo pa lutino anyira me nongo kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, apoka-poka matye ikin gangi kwan pud tye, ma weko pe gi kato maber.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, iponesio luka atekerin keda nuka ikapun itolitolete apesur adumunun asioman. Kanuka ngun, inyikokinitos atiakatiaka kotoma aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo suruni azini e'yo robiani 'diyi ezoanzi eyi ma esuta onita ma alea ri eza. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi nga po'di aa ci, e'yo eyi ma zota onita ma alea ri atripi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi, eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'eby'entaasya nibiremesa abaishiki kwega. N'ekyarugiremu, obutaingana bukiriho, ekirikuremesa entunguuka yaabo omuby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Many students often feel overwhelmed when choosing their academic paths. This perception can lead to the belief that certain fields, particularly the sciences, require an exceptional level of intelligence and dedication.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi batera okuwulira nga bazitoowereddwa nga balondawo emisomo gyabwe. Endowooza eno eyinza okuviirako okukkiriza nti ebitundu ebimu, naddala ebya ssaayansi, byetagisa amagezi n'obumalirivu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol pol kare giwinyo peko ikare me yero yoo me kwangi. Tam man twero weko dano tamo ni kabedo mukene, tutwalle cayan, mito ryeko ki keto cwiny ma lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu epupete epone loepol noi kapak kana aseun aiboisio nu isisiaete kesi. Epedori aomisioit ngin ayangaun aomisioit ebe iboro ice, kacut luka esayanis, ekotosi adoketait naejok noi naka acoa keda ainakina.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi sa'wa driasi eyi ama asi eyini geri eyini sukulu lazu 'diyi pe ria. Egata 'diri eco fe 'ba eyini a'izu kini pari azi 'diyi, tutuni sayansini 'diyi, le 'ba ma ovu onduaru azini asi 'baza be.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with endless options, it's important to focus on what truly matters to you. Remember, not everything is essential; prioritize wisely.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusalawo okutaliiko kkomo, kya mugaso okussa essira ku ebyo ebikukwatako. Jjukira nti si buli kimu nti kyetaagisa; sooka okole mu magezi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki yoo mapol, pire tek tutwal me keto cwinyi I kom ngo ma pire tek piri. Wii opo ni pe jami weng pire tek tutwal; ket jami ma pigi tego obed mukwongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseununeta nuipu, erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nu epol ajokis kanejai jo. Kiituni ebe mam ibore kere epol ajokis; isingarenit ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia opeta yi tre, eri orodriru asi 'bazu afa orodriru mi dri 'diyi ma dria. Mi ma ega kini e'yo dria ovuni orodriru ku; le mi ma 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire eby'okukora ebitarikuhwaho, n'eky'omugasho okuta omutima aha bintu ebikuru ahariiwe. Ijuka, ti buri kimwe ngu n'eky'omugasho, teeraho kwebembeza n'obwengye.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, investing in the future of our society is crucial. One of the most effective ways to achieve this is by ensuring that every individual has access to quality learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okusiga ensimbi mu biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu kyaffe kikulu nnyo. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukakasa nti buli muntu afuna emikisa gy'okusoma egy'omutindo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot ni, keto lim I kom anyim pa lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man obedo neno ni dano weng tye ki gum me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, epolok noi aipikakin ikapun toma oingaren naka itunga wok. Ediopet koboro luepedorete aitodolikin ngun ngesi awanyun ebe kanginitunganan edumuni asioman na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, lonyi vuti aleza ewu drialeri ma alea ri eri orodriru. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru ri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma esu drileba onita ni onyiru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okuta esente omu by'omumaisho n'eky'omugasho munonga. Omwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okukora eki n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga emigisha y'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and countless meetings, the team was determined to secure the necessary financial support for their project. They reached out to potential donors and organized fundraising events to gather contributions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'enkiiko eziwerako, ttiimu yali emaliridde okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwetaagisa ku pulojekiti yaabwe. Baakwatagana n'abagabi b'obuyambi era ne bategeka emikolo gy'okusonda ssente okusobola okukungaanya obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki kacokke mapol, dul ne omoko tamgi me nongo kony me lim ma mite pi yub meggi. Gu rwatte ki joo ma mito miyo kony dok guyubu yub me jogo cente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda airiamununeta nuipu, apotu etimu okapakina adumun agangat na ikapun kanu epurojekt kec. Apotu kesi odolokisi itunga luepedorete aijaikin agangat kosodete aitemokin ainapeta nuka aituk ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta 'yezu azini mitingi karakara 'diyi ma vutia, amuti 'da 'du asi atita robia ni 'diyi esuzu otita eyivile 'da ni. Eyi esu 'ba ecopi robia fepi ra 'diyi azini eyi otu e'yo robia trazu 'diyi robia trazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'enkiiko nyingi, tiimu ekaba eyehaireyo kutunga esente ezirikwetengwa kukora purogyekiti yaabo. Bakahika aha bantu abarikubaasa kuba abagabi b'obuyambi batebekanisa emikoro y'okushorooza esente.

eng_prompt: Acts of kindness can create a ripple effect in our communities. When we lend a hand to those in need, we foster a sense of connection and support.
lug_prompt: Ebikolwa eby'ekisa bisobola okuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu bitundu byaffe. Bwe tuwaayo omukono eri abo abali mu bwetaavu, tukuza enkolagana n'obuwagizi.
ach_prompt: Tim me kica twero kelo adwogi maber I kabedo wa. Ka wamiyo kony bot lupeko, man weko wawinyo ni watye ki wat macok kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuka asianut epedorete ayangaun epone loajokan kotoma atutubenawok. Neinakini oni akan mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi keda ipudesia, isinyikokini oni aimorikikina keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: Yeta asi ndrizani 'diyi eco ojata eji ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra. Aka dri fe 'ba azakoma le'ba 'diyi dri, ama ama esele coza azini atita ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ebikorwa by'embabazi nibibaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu byanga byaitu. Kuturikuhayo omukono gw'obuhwezi ahari abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi, nitureetaho enkoragana n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: When planning a vacation, it's important to consider your accommodation options. Many travelers find that the cost of staying at certain hotels can quickly add up.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka okugenda mu luwummula, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri gy'oyinza okusula. Abatambuze bangi bakizuula nti ebisale by'okusula mu wooteeri ezimu bisobola okwongera amangu.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubbe me cito I yweyo, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom kabutu ma imito. Luwot mapol ginongo ni wel cul me bedo I hotel mogo twero mede oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokini jo aiyeng, ibusakinit ijo aomoom aiboisit naebeit jo aiboi. Itunga luipu lu alotok esesenete ebe epol etiai loka aiboi kooterin ice.
lgg_prompt: Eka ava liza otu, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu angu mini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria. Ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu kini aje aa'zu hoteli azi 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateekyera ekihuumuro, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ahu orikuza kutuura. Abagyenzi baingi nibashanga ngu ebishare by'okuraara omu hoteeri ezimwe nibibaasa kweyongyera juba.

eng_prompt: The alarming rise in reports of domestic abuse has highlighted a critical issue in our society. As a community, we must address the root causes and find effective ways to protect vulnerable individuals.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'amawulire agakwata ku kutulugunyizibwa mu maka kulaga ekizibu ekinene mu kitundu kyaffe. Ng'ekitundu, tulina okukola ku biviirako n'okunoonya engeri ennungi ez'okukuumamu abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Medde pa lok me tim gero I gang onyuto peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa. Macalo lwak, omyero walweny i kom jami ma kelo peko ki nongo yoo maber me gwoko dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Apol naka iripotan luka amumu nakokalia itodunit ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubetekosi. Kwape itunga, ekot oni aitemokin atiokisio nu ejai ka adumun iwaitin lu igangakino itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani o'duko e'yo ngiringiri aku eselesi 'diyiniri ma omgbo tuzu ri ece e'yo azi okporu ongulumu amavileri ma alea ni i. Ongulumu ru, le ama ma ko e'yo e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza dika ama ma esu geri kililiru 'diyi 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'amahuriire g'okutuntuzibwa omu maka, nikyoreka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bantu baitu. Nk'ekicweka, twine kukora aha bintu ebirikubireetaho n'okutunga oburyo burungi bw'okurinda abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: It is essential to recognize that equality and justice must extend to all individuals, regardless of their gender. Advocating for the rights of every person is fundamental to building a fair and inclusive society.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okutegeera nti omwenkanonkano n'obwenkanya birina okutuuka ku bantu bonna, awatali kufaayo ku kikula kyabwe. Okulwanirira eddembe lya buli muntu kya mugaso mu kuzimba ekitundu eky'obwenkanya era ekirimu abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang ni dano weng omyero gubed marom labongo paro pi coo onyo mon. Lweny pi twero pa dano acel-acel pire tek tutwal me yubu kabedo ma dano weng tye iye.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obukuubagano n'enjawukana, kya mugaso eri ebitundu okukulaakulanya obumu n'okutegeeragana. Mu kutumbula empisa z'okusaasira n'okukwatagana, abakulembeze b'eby'omwoyo basobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kubumba ekitundu eky'emirembe.

lgg_prompt: Amani aciria e'yo ewaru ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo ewaru ama vile ongulumu 'diyi bipi 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi dri ci e'yo eyi ma edri o'du driasi azini ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Understanding the various factors that influence women's well-being is crucial for promoting healthier pregnancies. One key aspect of this is maternal health, which encompasses the physical and mental well-being of women during pregnancy.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ensonga ez'enjawulo ezikwata ku bulamu bw'abakyala kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula embuto ennungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kino bye byobulamu bwa bamaama, nga bino bizingiramu embeera y'omubiri n'ebirowoozo by'abakyala mu biseera by'embuto.

eng_prompt: Despite advancements in medical care, childbirth remains a risky endeavor for many women around the world. Tragically, complications during labor can lead to devastating outcomes for both mothers and their newborns.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo enkulaakulana mu byobulamu, okuzaala kukyali kwa bulabe eri abakyala bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna. Eky'ennaku, ebizibu mu kuzaala bisobola okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri bamaama n'abaana baabwe abaakazaalibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me yot kom tye malo, nywal pud obedo gin marac tutwal ki mon mapol I wilobo. Ki gum marac, peko ma bino ikare me nywal twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom mege ki lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka amukian, eringa aidoun erai ibore yenetiono noi kanejaas angor kotoma akwap kere. Erono noi, atiokisio nuka aidoun epedorete ayangaun atiokisio mama ejaasi angor keda idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni arojoa 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, mva osita ni nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni oku karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi 'diyi dri. Drile onziru, e'yo ewaru osita ma alia 'diyi eco adri e'yo onzi ejipi ayia eyi ma rua azini anzi eyivile osipi o'diru 'diyi pie.

ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, dano mapol tye kaketo bedo agonya gi ki miti me tic gi ikare me timo jami ma con. Macalo adwogi ne, kwo pa gangi tye ka loke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, itunga luipu epodokinitos ailajaara kec keda aswamukec adepar ainakina. Kanuka ngun, ejulakinete aijar naka ikalia noi.

nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, abantu baingi nibatwara obugabe bwabo n'emirimo yaabo nka bikuru kukira eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, entwaza y'amaka eriyo neehinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: Infidelity often creates a deep rift between partners, leading to a loss of trust and emotional connection. As relationships struggle to recover from betrayal, many couples find themselves unable to heal.
lug_prompt: Obutali bwesigwa butera okuleetawo enjawukana wakati w'abaagalana, ekiviirako okubula kw'obwesige n'enkolagana mu nneewulira. Obufumbo bwe buzibuwalirwa okuwona obutali bwesigwa, abaagalana bangi beesanga nga tebasobola kuwona.
ach_prompt: Tim me abor ipol kare kelo apoka-poka madit ikin joo ma onyome, ma weko dano pe gene dok pe gibedo ki wat maber ikin gi. Lunyom mapol nongo ni pe giromo cango I kare ma nyomgi odoko tek tutwal.

eng_prompt: Expecting a child is a significant and transformative experience for both partners. It is essential for men to support their wives emotionally and physically during this crucial time.
lug_prompt: Okusuubira omwana kintu kya makulu era eky'enkyukakyuka eri abaagalana bombi. Kya mugaso nnyo abasajja okuyamba bakyala baabwe mu nneewulira ne mu mubiri mu kaseera kano akazibu.

teo_prompt: Aidoun ikoku erai ibore yen epol ajokis ido ijulakini itunga kere. Erai ibore yenejok noi ikiliok aigang angor kec kotoma apak kana.

eng_prompt: After a long and challenging labor, the doctors finally confirmed that the baby was healthy. With a sigh of relief, he rushed to the hospital to meet his wife and their newborn.

eng_prompt: During pregnancy, many women seek support and guidance from healthcare professionals. One of the key roles in this process is played by midwives, who provide care during labor and delivery.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'embuto, abakyala bangi banoonya obuyambi n'obulagirizi okuva mu basawo abakugu. Omulimu ogumu omukulu mu nkola eno gukolerwa abazaalisa, abalabirira mu biseera by'okuzaala n'okuzaala.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okwegeraageranya n'omutindo ogutali mutuufu, kyangu okuwulira nga toteredde. Jjukira nti essanyu erya nnamaddala liva mu kusiima emikisa mu bulamu bwo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki porre kacel ki rwom me jami ma pe tye kakare, yot tutwal me bedo ma cwinyi pe yom. Wii opo ni yomcwiny me ada pole aa ki I pwoyo mot ma itye kwede I kwo ni.

eng_prompt: To ensure a safe and healthy delivery, it is important for expectant mothers to be well-prepared. Regular check-ups and consultations with healthcare professionals can help address any concerns and provide essential information.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okuzaala okulungi era okw'obulamu, kya mugaso eri bamaama abali embuto okwetegeka obulungi. Okukeberebwa buli kaseera n'okwebuuza n'abakugu mu byobulamu bisobola okuyamba okukola ku kweraliikirira kwonna n'okuwa obubaka obukulu.

eng_prompt: Many adolescents face significant physical and emotional challenges as they navigate the complexities of early motherhood. It is crucial to understand the risks associated with teenage pregnancies and their impact on both the mother and child.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the global refugee crisis has drawn attention to the struggles faced by displaced individuals. Many organizations are now hosting events to raise awareness and support for these communities.

eng_prompt: Each year, communities come together to celebrate their traditions and foster connections. These gatherings often include festivals, parades, and other activities that highlight local culture.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, ebitundu bikuŋŋaana wamu okujaguza eby'obuwangwa byabwe n'okutumbula enkolagana. Enkungaana zino zitera okubeeramu ebikujjuko, emisinde, n'emirimu emirala egiraga obuwangwa bw'ekitundu.

lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, ongulumu eyi emu tualu eyi ma a'bi eyi inzizu tualu eyi ma eselea. Okuta 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia okuta yi, otuta yi azini 'yeta azi 'diyi e'dapi e'yo suruni angu ma alia 'diyi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals fleeing conflict and persecution seek safety in neighboring countries. As a result, they often find temporary shelter in designated areas for displaced persons.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa banoonya obukuumi mu nsi eziriraanyeewo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okufuna aw'okusula ak'ekiseera mu bifo ebironderwamu abantu ababundabunda.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma ringo lweny ki aunauna giyenyo gwok ki I lobo ma orumu gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare ginongo kabedo pi tutunu I kabedo ma kiyubu pi luring ayela.

nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa nibaronda obuhungiro omu mahanga agatuherereire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kutunga oburaaro bw'akanya kakye omu myanya eteirweho ahabw'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Every year, millions of people are forced to flee their homes due to conflict, persecution, and natural disasters. To raise awareness about their plight and promote their rights, a special day is dedicated to honoring refugees globally.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu badduka mu maka gaabwe olw'obukuubagano, okuyigganyizibwa, n'obutyabaga obw'obutonde. Okumanyisa abantu ku mbeera embi gye balimu n'okutumbula eddembe lyabwe, olunaku olw'enjawulo lutegekeddwa okussa ekitiibwa mu banoonyiboobubudamu mu nsi yonna.

eng_prompt: Sports have become a global phenomenon, uniting people through competition and teamwork. As a result, athletes from diverse backgrounds and cultures are emerging on the international stage.
lug_prompt: Ebyemizannyo bifuuse bya nsi yonna, nga bigatta abantu okuyita mu kuvuganya n'okukolera awamu. N'ekivuddemu, bannabyamizannyo okuva mu mbeera n'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo bavaayo ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.

eng_prompt: Many people seek ways to improve their physical fitness and overall health. One popular method that has gained traction over the years is engaging in various forms of exercise.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya engeri y'okutumbula omubiri gwabwe n'obulamu bwabwe okutwalira awamu. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okukola dduyiro mu myaka egiyise kwe kukola dduyiro ow'engeri ez'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: With the rise of digital platforms and online gaming, the variety of entertainment options has expanded significantly. Gamers now have access to countless titles across different genres and styles.
lug_prompt: N'okweyongera kw'emikutu gya digito n'okuzannya emizannyo ku mutimbagano, eby'amasanyu eby'enjawulo byeyongedde nnyo. Abazannyi kati basobola okufuna emizannyo egitali gimu mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa kubbe me intanet ki tuku me intanet, yoo me galo wang mapat-pat omede tutwal. Lutuk goga kombedi gitye ki gum me nongo nying tuku mapol tutwal I yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka elago keda aboliasio nuka elago, apolor noi epone loka aitelelio. Epedorete kwana aboliak adumunun iponesio luegelegela luka aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Afa omvele digito ru 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu tualu avita oli aliasi 'diyi pie, geri avita avizu 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. Ba avita avi'ba 'diyi eco curu'do avita avita ni 'diyi esu wura ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'emikutu ya digito hamwe n'okuzaana emizaano aha mitimbagano, eby'okushemererwa eby'emiringo mingi byeyongyeire munonga. Abazaani b'emizaano hati nibabaasa kutunga emizaano y'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: In a just society, every individual deserves respect and equal opportunities, regardless of their physical or mental abilities. It is essential to recognize the inherent value of all people and ensure that everyone has access to the same rights and resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya, buli muntu asaana okuweebwa ekitiibwa n'emikisa egyenkanankana, awatali kufaayo ku busobozi bwe mu mubiri oba mu birowoozo. Kikulu nnyo okutegeera obulungi bw'abantu bonna n'okukakasa nti buli omu afuna eddembe n'ebyetaago bye bimu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma oporre, dano weng omyero gunong woro ki gum marom, labongo paro pi kero me komgi onyo tamgi. Pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa dano weng ki neno ni dano weng tye ki twero ki jami ma rom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet najokan, ekot nginitunganan ayongit keda arerengesio nueriakasi, araida ejaasi keda apedorosio nuka akwan keda aomisiokec. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka itunga kere ka awanyun ebe itunga kere edumunenete apedorosio keda iboro lu eputosi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kililiru ma alea, le 'ba dria ma fe inzita azini drileba trotro 'diyi eyini ta tro aa'zu rua si kani omi si ra ti. Eri orodriru 'bani orodri 'ba dria eyini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi ma drilemgbo azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta trotro.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirimu oburinganiza, buri omwe ashemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa n'emigisha erikwingana, oihiremu amaani g'omubiri n'obwengye bwe. N'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'abantu boona n'okureeba ngu buri omwe atunga obugabe n'ebintu ebirikushushana.

eng_prompt: Many individuals go through life without fully recognizing their unique abilities. This lack of self-awareness can prevent them from pursuing opportunities that align with their true potential.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bayita mu bulamu nga tebamanyi busobozi bwabwe obw'enjawulo. Obutaba na bumanyirivu kisobola okubalemesa okunoonya emikisa egikwatagana n'obusobozi bwabwe obwa nnamaddala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol woto I kwo labongo niang I kom kero gi. Bedo peke pa ngec eni twero gengo gi ki nongo gum ma rwatte ki kero gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu elosenenete aijar komam ejenete apedorosiokec. Amamus na ajenanut kes epedori aitikitik kesi kotoma aitodolikin arerengesio nuepedorete kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi mu idri ma alea eyini ani e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi esuzu ku. Eꞌyo ꞌbani yi ma ngulupi ma dria ku ꞌdi eco yi atri drileba yini eco ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma vuti obizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibahika omu magara gaabo batarikumanya emyoga yaabo. Okubura okwetegyereza, nikibaasa kubazibira kukorerera emigisha erikuhikaana n'obushoboorozi bwabo.

eng_prompt: Every individual possesses unique abilities waiting to be discovered. With dedication and effort, these skills can flourish over time.
lug_prompt: Buli muntu alina obusobozi obw'enjawulo obulindiridde okuzuulibwa. N'obumalirivu n'okufuba, obukugu buno busobola okukulaakulana oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera.
ach_prompt: Dano acel-acel tye ki kero mapat-pat matye kakuru nongo. Ki keto cwiny ki tute matek, diro magi twero dongo ikare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan ejaas keda apedorosio nu itegelikina nu ekotoi ajenun. Keda ainakina keda agogongu, epedorete acoasinei nu apoloun kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Ba alu alu ma ondua wura ndusi 'diyi te 'bani ecozu yi esuzu ra. Asi feza azini okpo 'bazasi, ondua 'diyi eco zo sawa ma vutia ra.
nyn_prompt: Buri muntu aine obushoboorozi bw'omutaano oburikutegyerezibwa kujumburwa. N'okwehayo n'amaani, emyoga egi neebaasa kutunguuka bwanyima y'obwire.

eng_prompt: In the world of sports, individuals often dedicate their lives to mastering specific skills and techniques. These individuals, known for their exceptional abilities and dedication, play a crucial role in competitions and inspire others.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyemizannyo, abantu batera okuwaayo obulamu bwabwe okukuguka mu bukugu obumu n'obukodyo. Abantu bano, abamanyiddwa olw'obusobozi bwabwe obw'enjawulo n'obumalirivu, bakola omulimu omukulu mu kuvuganya n'okuzzaamu abalala amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I lobo me tuku, dano ipol kare gi keto kwogi I tic ki diro mapat-pat. Dano magi, ma oywek pi kero gi ki keto cwiny gi, gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal I pyem enoni dok gi cuku cwiny dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka aboliasio, einanakinete itunga aijarakec kanu ajenun acoasinei keda iwaitin luegelegela. Itunga lu, luejenara noi kanu apedorosiokec keda ainakina kec, iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma abolobol kosodete aisinyikokin luce.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru avita niri ma alea, 'ba alu alu 'diyi eyi ma edri owi eyi ondua azini ondua azi 'diyi ma dria. Ba 'diyi, 'bani nile eyi ma okpo azini ava feza eyisi, eyi azi okporu ni nga abala eyi ma alea dika eyi ava fe 'ba azi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'eby'emizaano, abantu nibamara amagara gaabo omu kumanya emyoga n'obukodyo. Abantu aba, abarikumanywa ahabw'obushoboorozi bwabo n'okwehayo kwabo, nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu mpaka n'okugaruramu abandi amaani.

eng_prompt: Many communities are coming together to support local charities and health initiatives. One popular way to raise funds and awareness is through organized running events.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi bijja wamu okuwagira ebibiina by'obwannakyewa eby'omu kitundu n'enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okusonda ssente n'okumanyisa abantu kwe kuyita mu misinde egyategekebwa.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol tye ka ribbe kacel me miyo kony ki dul ma miyo kony me yot kom. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal me jogo cente ki rweyo lwak obedo ngwec.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimorikikin nepepei kanu aigang atukona nuka agangat keda nuka angaleu. Epone ediope loejok noi loka aituk ikapun keda aisisianakin itunga ngesi aitolot akerit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi emu tualu atita fezu 'ba azakoma fepi angu eyi ma alea 'diyini tualu otita e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi pie. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu robia trazu azini imbata fezu o'bi eyidri ri eri geri ongu nzuza otuzu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi biriyo nibikwatanisa kushagika eby'obuhwezi hamwe n'ebindi ebirikukwata ahaby'amagara. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga ogw'okushorooza esente n'okumanyisa abantu, n'okurabira omu mikoro y'okwiruka etebekanisiibwe.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and despair, we often seek out things that uplift our spirits. Whether through art, nature, or the stories of others, inspirations are a source of hope.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okuggwaamu essuubi, tutera okunoonya ebintu ebituzzaamu amaanyi. Ka kibeere okuyita mu by'emikono, obutonde, oba emboozi z'abalala, okubudaabudibwa nsibuko ya ssuubi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki turcwiny, wamaro yenyo jami ma weko cwiny wa bedo yom. Kadi I yoo me cal, cwec ma orumuwa, onyo ododo pa jo mukene, gin ma cuku cwiny dano obedo yoo me bedo ki gen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut ka amunokina, iuta oni aimo iboro lu isinyikokitos oni. Arai kotoma aputosia, isuban luka Edeke, arai bo akiro nuka luce, isinyikonokinete kesi itunga amuno.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ava ako ni 'diyi ma alia, ama tutuni afa ama ma orindi engapi 'diyi nda. Ka tro trayi e'da gbaza ma aliasi, e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma aliasi, kani e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma aliasi, ava feza eyi asi'baza eji.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'okwerarikirira, nitukira kuronda ebintu ebirikutugaruramu amaani. Yaaba okurabira omu by'emikono, eby'obuhangwa, nainga emboozi z'abandi, okuhuumuriza n'oburugo bw'amatsiko.

eng_prompt: As the sirens blared and chaos erupted around us, we knew we were entering uncharted territory. Everyone was on high alert, trying to navigate the uncertainty of the situation.
lug_prompt: Bwe twawulira enduulu n'obutabanguko, twakitegeera nti twali tuyingidde mu kitundu kye tutamanyirangako. Buli omu yali ku bunkenke, ng'agezaako okutambulira mu mbeera etali nnambulukufu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma siren tye ka dange ki lweny obedo tye I kabedowa, wangeyo ni watye ka donyo I kabedo ma pe wangeyo. Dano weng gubedo ma wanggi twolo tutwal, kun gitye ka yenyo yoo me kato ki I peko matye ni.
teo_prompt: Neautar isirigin aiworor kosodi amumu aibiror, apotu sio ajeni ebe elomuni sio toma aiboisit namam sio ijeni. Ejaasi itunga kere keda acoa naepol noi, kotamitos aitodolikin ejautene lomam ejena.
lgg_prompt: O'duko sireni 'diyi ni e'deria azini ngiringiri ni e'doria ama kalasi kuru, ama nii ra kini ama fi angu 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma alia. Ba dria ovu ndra mile be, yini o'bizu e'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obu sirini zaabaire nizihuumura hamwe n'akaimukiriro, tukaba nitumanya ngu nitutaaha omu mwanya ogu tutarikumanya. Buri omwe akaba ayeteekateekire munonga, arikugyezaho kurabira omu mbeera etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are forced to leave their home countries due to conflict, persecution, or natural disasters. As a result, they seek safety and a new life in foreign lands.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bawalirizibwa okuva mu nsi zaabwe olw'obukuubagano, okuyigganyizibwa, oba obutyabaga. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya obukuumi n'obulamu obupya mu nsi engwira.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol kidiyogi me weko lobogi pi lweny, auna, onyo peko ma poto atura. Macalo adwogi ne, giyenyo gwok ki kwo manyen I lobo ma woko.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ebuinikinio anyoun kotoma akwapin kec kanuka ingungeta, aiticanio, arai atiokisio nu akwap. Kanuka ngun, emoete kesi ayuara keda aijar naitetet kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi kari eyivile aku 'diyi ku e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyisi, candi feza ni 'diyisi, kani e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, eyi ageitema nda azini eyi ma edri o'diru 'diyi nda kari amve 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibagyemeserezibwa kuruga omu mahanga gaabo ahabw'entaro, okuhiiganisibwa, nainga ebihikiirizi. N'ekyarugiremu, nibasherura oburinzi n'amagara masya omu mahanga g'aheeru.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis and conflict, various organizations and individuals strive to address the needs of affected populations. Their primary focus is on alleviating suffering and ensuring that basic human rights are upheld.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke n'obukuubagano, ebitongole eby'enjawulo n'abantu bagezaako okukola ku byetaago by'abantu abakoseddwa. Essira baliteeka ku kukendeeza ku kubonaabona n'okukakasa nti eddembe ly'obuntu ery'omusingi likuumibwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki lweny, dul mapat-pat ki dano gi tute matek me cobo miti pa dano ma peko opoto i komgi. Miti gi madit tye me dwoko piny deno can ki neno ni kiworo twero pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio keda ingungeta, iswamaete iriongeta keda itunga luegelegela kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luetirorit. Alosikinet kec nes aitidisiar atiokisio ka awanyun ebe eyuwaritai apedorosio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alia, amuti ndundu azini 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi okpo 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi ma aza kozu. Asi 'baza yiniri okporu ri candi esuza ma omgbo esizu azini nezu ra kini 'ba driwala 'ba ada eyini 'diyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi n'obutabanguko, ebitongore bingi hamwe n'abantu nibateeraho kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abakoseddwa. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekikuru n'okukyendeeza okubonabona n'okureeba ngu obugabe bw'abantu bukorwaho.

eng_prompt: As the heavy rains began to pour relentlessly, communities braced themselves for the inevitable challenges ahead. Unfortunately, the downpours proved too much for the riverbanks to contain.
lug_prompt: Enkuba bwe yatandika okutonnya buli kiseera, abantu beetegekera okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso. Eky'omukisa omubi, enkuba yabadde nnene nnyo ku lubalama lw'omugga.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kot ocako cwer matek tutwal, lwak guyube pi peko matye anyim. Ki gum marac, kot ocwe matek tutwal ma kulu ne pe twero jukone.
teo_prompt: Neageuna edou aitep noi, apotu itunga okapakina kanuka atiokisio nuejaas ngaren. Nukaiturur, abu edou loepol noi mam apedori aitikitik aiboisio nu ecilet.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi okporu 'diyi ni e'doria e'doria e'yere, ongulumu eyi otu eyi e'yo ewaru eyini esu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi 'yezu. Drile onziru, ozo 'da eyi ndra okporu tu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ti ta mbazu ku.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi ku yatandikire kugwa, abantu bakeeteekateekyera oburemeezi oburi omumaisho. Eky'omugisha mubi, enjura ekaba nyingi munonga aha rubaju rw'omugyera.

eng_prompt: In a well-functioning society, the protection of individuals and their rights is paramount. Therefore, ensuring safety and security is a fundamental responsibility of the state.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekikola obulungi, okukuuma abantu ssekinnoomu n'eddembe lyabwe kye kisinga obukulu. N'olw'ekyo, okukakasa obukuumi n'obutebenkevu buvunaanyizibwa bwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma kwo tye maber, gwoko dano ki twero gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, gwoko kuc ki ber bedo obedo tic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na iswamai ejok, ayuarite itunga keda apedorosiokec erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka ngun, awanyun ebe eyuwara ka ayuwara erai aswam naepol noi naka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma alea, 'ba alu alu 'diyi ma tambaza azini drilemgbo yini 'diyi ma tambaza eri okporu ndeni. Ka'dini, ageitema fezu ri eri azi okporu kari ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikukora kurungi, okurinda abantu n'obugabe bwabo nikyo kintu kikuru munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo, okureeba ngu hariho oburinzi n'eby'okwerinda n'obujunanizibwa bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In order to rebuild their lives, it is essential for displaced individuals to find a safe and welcoming environment. A sense of stability and protection is crucial for their integration and well-being.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe, kikulu nnyo abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu okufuna ekifo ekirimu obukuumi era ekisikiriza. Okubeerawo kw'obutebenkevu n'obukuumi bya mugaso nnyo eri okwegatta kwabwe n'obulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Me yubu kwo gi odoco, pire tek tutwal pi joo ma orwenyo gangi gi me nongo kabedo maber dok ma jolo dano. Bedo ki kuc ki ber bedo pire tek tutwal pi ribbe ki ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiteteun aijarakec, ejokuna noi itunga lu ekerete adumun aiboisit naeyuwara ido ijaunit kesi. Ainapakina keda ayuwara erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aimorikikina kec keda aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Lezu eyi ma edri sizu o'diru, eri orodriru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma esu angu kililiru azini ayiko fepi 'diyi. Asi anzuru azini ageitema ma e'yo eri orodriru yi ma ti ecizu azini aa'zu muke beni.
nyn_prompt: Okugaruka kwombeka amagara gaabo, n'eky'omugasho abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo kutunga obusingye n'oburungi. Obusingye n'oburinzi n'eby'omugasho ahabw'okugarukana kwabo n'amagara gaabo marungi.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, access to legal representation is crucial for ensuring justice for all citizens. To facilitate this, various organizations are authorized to provide legal aid services.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, okufuna abakiise mu mateeka kya mugaso nnyo mu kufuna obwenkanya eri bannansi bonna. Okusobozesa kino, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikkirizibwa okuwa obuyambi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, nongo luwang lwak I kot pire tek tutwal me neno ni anywali weng nongo ngol matir. Me konyo eni, dul mapat-pat tye ki twero me miyo kony me cik.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, adumunun abwoikinet kotoma okisila erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga kere keda etube loajokan. Kanu aitapatan ngun, ecamakitai iriongeta luipu aijaikin aingarakinio na ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, 'ba pa tupi e'yo azita palaa 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo liza kililiru ri esuzu kari anzi dria eyini. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba fe amuti ndundu eyini driwala azakoma fele e'yo liza ni 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, okuhikwaho abantu abarikujwekyerwa omu biragiro, n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu abatuuze boona batunga oburingaaniza. Okuhwera eki,ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe biine orusa rw'okuheereza obuhwezi bw'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has become a focal point for international development efforts. As a result, various global organizations have established a presence in the country to address pressing humanitarian issues.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekikulu mu nteekateeka z'ensi yonna ez'enkulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ensi yonna eby'enjawulo bitandikiddewo okubeerawo mu ggwanga okukola ku nsonga z'obuntubulamu ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda odoko kabedo me dongo lobo I kin lobe mapat-pat me wilobo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me wilobo mapat-pat gucako ticgi I lobo man me cobo peko ma dano tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eraun Uganda aiboisit naepol noi naka apol kotoma akwapin nukokinga. Kanuka ngun, adukutu iriongeta luegelegela luka akwapin ace ajaut toma akwapuwok kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri eca angu okporu e'yo angu ezoma ni kari eselia 'diyiniri ru. E'yo 'disi, amuti wudrikurusi karakara 'diyi e'do yi ma pari kari ma alia e'yo ewaru 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya gw'entunguuka y'amahanga goona. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ensi yoona bingi bitandikireho omwihanga kukora aha nshonga z'abantu.

eng_prompt: Accurate data collection is essential for effective decision-making. Therefore, a report must reflect the right information.
lug_prompt: Okukungaanya amawulire amatuufu kya nkizo mu kukola okusalawo okulungi. N'olw'ekyo, alipoota erina okulaga obubaka obutuufu.
ach_prompt: Coko ngec matir pire tek tutwal pi moko tam maber. Pi meno, ripot omyero onyut lok ada.
teo_prompt: Aituk akiro nuka abeit ejok kanu aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak. Kanuka ngun, ekot eripoota aitodun akiro nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyi trazu kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru. Ka'dini, le o'duko siza ma ece e'yo adaru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okurundaana amakuru agahikire n'eky'omugasho omu kukora okusharamu kurungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, ripoota eshemereire kworeka amakuru agahikire.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and brainstorming sessions, the committee gathered a wealth of innovative suggestions from the society's members. Recognizing the potential of these contributions, they decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, akakiiko kakung'aanyizza ebirowoozo bingi okuva mu bammemba b'ekibiina. Olw'okumanya obusobozi bw'obuyambi buno, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam mapol, dul enoni onongo tam mabeco mapol ki bot lumemba me dul enoni. Pien guneno ber pa jami magi, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda aomisio nuipu, abu ekomiti kodum aomisio nuipu noi kanejaas imeban luka atukot. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka agangat na, apotu kesi koseutu aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'diyi ma vutia, komiti 'da tra egata o'diru 'diyi engazu 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu. E'yo orodri afa feza 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi nizu 'boria, eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okuteisa, akakiiko kakoresa obwengye bwingi kuruga omu bantu. Ahabw'okumanya obushoboorozi bw'obuhwezi obu, bakasharamu kukora.

eng_prompt: The data collected from various sources has been meticulously analyzed. As a result, the findings provide valuable insights into the current trends and patterns.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement plays a crucial role in maintaining order and safety within communities. Their responsibilities extend beyond local concerns, impacting the overall security of the country.
lug_prompt: Abakwasisa amateeka bakola omulimu munene mu kukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu bitundu. Obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe busukka ku nsonga z'ebitundu, okukosa eby'okwerinda by'eggwanga okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Lugwok cik gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal I gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I kabedo mapatpat. Ticgi pe kwako lok ma kwako tedero keken, man balo gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Apedorosio nu ikisila iswamaete aswam naepol noi kowai lo aidar ainapakina keda ayuwara kotunga. Aswamisinei kec mam elosete toma akiro nuka atutubet, ido itolitolete ayuwara naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi okporu 'ye e'yo otuza ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea. Azi yini 'diyi aga e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra, e'yo angu agei tema ni kari ma alia 'diyi 'yepi ra.

eng_prompt: Many individuals who have experienced traumatic events struggle to cope with their emotions and the aftermath of their experiences. Providing support and resources is crucial for their healing process.

teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luetereikina keda akiro nuarokok itereikina keda aomisiokec keda atiokisio nuapotu kotakanutu. Aijaikin agangat keda iboro luipudasi kesi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara aa'pi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi pie. Atita fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu ri eri orodriru eyini atita esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abatungire oburemeezi bw'amaani, nibarwana kurwanisa ebiteekateeko byabo hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo. Okuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okukira kwabo.

eng_prompt: The Ugandan legal system is comprised of various roles that ensure the administration of justice. Among these roles, there are key figures responsible for interpreting and upholding the law.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'amateeka mu Uganda erimu emirimu egy'enjawulo egikakasa enkola y'obwenkanya. Mu mirimu gino, mulimu abantu abakulu abavunaanyizibwa ku kutaputa n'okukuuma amateeka.

teo_prompt: Ejaasi ikisila luko Uganda keda iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitodolikin etube loajokan. Kotoma aswamisinei nu, ejaasi itunga luapolok luepedorete amisiikin ka aidar ikisila.

nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ebiragiro omu Uganda erimu emirimo mingi erikureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza. Omu myoga egi, harimu abantu b'omugasho abarikujunanizibwa aha kushoborora n'okurinda ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Many countries struggle to achieve their full potential due to various systemic issues. One of the most significant obstacles they face is the pervasive nature of corruption.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi zirwana okutuuka ku busobozi bwazo obujjuvu olw'ensonga z'enkola ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bizibu ebikulu bye basanga kwe kubunye obulyi bw'enguzi.

teo_prompt: Etionikinit akwapin nuipu aitodolikin apedorosiokec kere kanuka akiro nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuepolok nuetereikina keda kesi ngesi amidicio naka apiyai.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi dri ci ecozu eyi ma okpo esuzu e'yo ndundu eyini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo azi okporu yini dri fuzu yi be ri e'yo anyamgbolo ni ovuzu pari dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga maingi nigarwana kuhikiiriza obushoboorozi bwago bwona ahabw'eshonga nyingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikubaremesa munonga, n'obushomankuzi obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Despite facing its own economic challenges, Uganda plays a significant role in providing humanitarian assistance to neighboring nations. This support often comes in the form of food, medical supplies, and logistical aid.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga Uganda eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna, ekola kinene nnyo mu kuwa obuyambi eri amawanga agagiriraanye. Obuyambi buno butera okujja mu ngeri y'emmere, ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba, n'obuyambi mu ntambula.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed Uganda tye ki peko me can lim, Uganda tye ki tic madit tutwal me miyo kony bot lobo ma orumuwa. Kony man ipol kare bino macalo cam, jami me ot yat ki kony me wot.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi Uganda keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, iswamai Uganda aswam naepol noi kowai lo aijaikin agangat mama ejaasi akwapin nu idunyare. Eponenete agangat ngin kwape inyamat, iboro lu amukian, keda iboro ice.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi esuzu ra ti, kari Uganda niri ni azi okporu nga azakoma fezu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi dri. Azakoza 'diri sawa driasi emu nyaka si, afa aro esuzu 'diyi pie, azini azakoma e'yo 'yezu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Residents have been complaining about the deteriorating infrastructure in the region. Many have expressed frustration over the condition of the roads that link their communities.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde beemulugunya ku bintu ebigasiza awamu abantu mu kitundu. Bangi balaze obwennyamivu olw'embeera y'enguudo ezigatta ebitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo kakok I kom jami ma tye ka bale I twok piny eni. Dano mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi kit ma gudi ma kubu kabedo gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Angurianete itunga nuikamunitos aiboisio nuarokok katutubet. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu amamut aiyalama kanu ejautene lo irotin lu arucokinit aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi onu afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo si. Ba karakara eyi e'da candi nzila eyi ecipi eyi ma ongulumu eyi pie 'diyi ma wura si.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibetomboitwa ahabw'ebyombeko ebirikusiisikara omu kyanga. Abantu baingi boorekire obusaasi ahabw'embeera y'enguuto ezirikugaita ebyanga byabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societal norms have often placed men in positions of power and authority, leading to a widespread belief in their dominance. This perspective has shaped cultural attitudes and practices across various civilizations.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, enkola z'abantu zitera okuteeka abasajja mu bifo by'obuyinza n'obuyinza, ekiviiriddeko okukkiriza mu bufuzi bwabwe. Endowooza eno efudde endowooza n'enkola z'obuwangwa mu nkulaakulana ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, cik me kabedo pa dano ipol kare keto coo I kabedo me twero ki twero, ma oweko dano mapol tye ki niyee I kom locgi. Tam man okelo aloka-loka I kom kit me kwo ki tim me tekwaro I kabedo mapat-pat me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, einakinitos iponesio luka itunga ikiliok aiboisio nuka apedor keda apedor, ido ijaikini itunga aiyuun ebe epedorete kesi aipuga. Apotu aomisio nu itopoloutu iponesio luka inonosio keda iponesio luka inonosio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba agupi eyi pari okpo ni azini driceza ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo fezu 'ba karakara eyi ma a'ita eyi ma driceza ma dria. Egata 'diri oja e'yo suruni 'diyi azini e'yo yi 'yepi suru ndundu yi ma eselea 'diyi ra.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling trend in societal attitudes towards women. As economic and political instability persists, many communities are witnessing a rise in gender-based violence.
