teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu eipone lo itakadikitotor itunga angor. Kwape ejai amamus na ainapakina naka ikapun keda politiks, ewanyunitos itunga luipu apol naka amumu na okalia.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza ni ongulumu eyi ma alea oku eyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni azini politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ni mu drile, ongulumu karakara eyi ngiringiri oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka omuze ogurikuteganisa omu miteekateekyere y'abantu aha bakazi. Obutabanguko omu by'entaasya n'eby'obutegyeki ku burikugumaho, ebyanga bingi nibireeba okweyongyera kw'okunyangaraza abantu kurugirira ahakikura kyabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various societal norms and traditions have shaped the roles and expectations of men and women in African communities. As a result, these cultural influences have played a significant role in perpetuating disparities between genders.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, empisa n'ennono ez'enjawulo zikoze emirimu n'ebisuubirwa by'abasajja n'abakazi mu bitundu bya Afirika. N'ekivuddemu, ebyobuwangwa bino bikoze omulimu munene mu kusigalawo enjawulo wakati w'ekikula ky'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon weng, cik ki tekwaro mapat-pat me kabedo mapat-pat oyubu tic ki gen pa coo ki mon I kabedo mapat-pat me lobo Afrika. Macalo adwogi ne, tekwaro eni okelo apoka-poka ikin mon ki coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, iponesio luegelegela luka itunga keda inonosio luegelegela kes etolomutu aswamisinei keda aomisio nuka ikiliok keda angor kotoma atutubena nuka Africa. Kanuka ngun, apotu inonosio lu iswamata ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar atiakatiaka kiding ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ndundu ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria azini a'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi 'ba e'yo agupi eyini azini oku eyini ega angu Africa ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo suruni 'diyi nga azi okporu esele coza agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, emicwe n'emigyenzo y'abantu etarikushushana, etandikiireho emirimo n'ebiteekateeko by'abashaija n'abakazi omu byanga bya Afirika. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obuhangwa ebi bikozire omurimo gw'amaani omukureetaho entaaniso ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: In a close-knit community where loyalty and trust are paramount, the idea of betrayal weighs heavily on one's conscience. Many believe that seeking outside intervention in personal matters undermines the sanctity of marriage.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekinywevu nga obwesimbu n'obwesige bye bisinga obukulu, ekirowoozo ky'okulya mu nsi olukwe kizitowa nnyo ku muntu ow'omunda. Bangi balowooza nti okunoonya ab'ebweru okuyingira mu nsonga z'obuntu kityoboola obutukuvu bw'obufumbo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma ribbe tye iye kama bedo ki gen ki gen obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, tam me turu gamente kelo peko madit tutwal I cwiny ngat moni. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni yenyo kony ki bot ngat mukene balo woro me nyom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejaasi keda aimorikikina naepol noi naka amunokina keda amunokina, aomisioit naka amengerikin itunganan etiono noi kotoma aomisioke. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe aimo alomar toma akiro nuka itunga itidisiari aila naka edukone.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ti ecita be tualu e'yo a'da azini asi'baza ni ovuzu okporu tu 'diyi ma alia, egata 'bani 'ba azi ma o'di o'dizu ri eri nzizaru 'ba azi ma asi'baza ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ai'ki kini 'ba azi amve 'diyi ma ti pezu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma alea ri ni aje akuniri ma wura onzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikukwatanisa gye, ahu obwesigwa n'okwesiga biri ebikuru munonga, ekiteekateeko ky'okureebya omubi nikiremera munonga omuntu waawe w'omunda. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu okuronda okurabamu okurikuruga aheeru omu nshonga z'abantu kikashiisha oburungi bw'obushwere.

eng_prompt: Access to comprehensive health care is crucial for ensuring the well-being of expectant mothers. By providing essential support and resources, these services play a vital role in maternal health.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'awamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kulaba nga bamaama abali embuto babeera bulungi. Mu kuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa ebikulu, obuweereza buno bukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu bulamu bwa bamaama.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko mon ma oyac. I yo me miyo kony ki jami ma mite, kony magi konyo tutwal I yot kom pa mon ma oyac.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian naejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejokuka angor nuepotiete. Kowai lo aijanakin agangat keda iboro lu itwasamao, iswamaete kesi aswam naepol noi kotoma angaleu naka nuatoto.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua alanisi dria 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru ayia okporovu ru 'diyi ma aa'ta muke ri nezu. Atita azini afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi fezurisi, azakoma fele 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo rua ala ayia eyini ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obw'omutaano n'eky'omugasho omu kureeba ngu abakazi abaine enda baba gye. Omu kuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa, obuheereza obu nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda.

eng_prompt: The group has recently launched a campaign aimed at addressing the challenges faced by mothers in the workplace. Their mission is to advocate for policies that support the unique needs of women balancing family and career.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko ekibiina kitongozza kaweefube agenderera okukola ku kusoomoozebwa bamaama kwe basanga ku mirimu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kulwanirira enkola eziwagira ebyetaago eby'enjawulo eby'abakyala okutebenkeza amaka n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Dul eni cokcok-ki ocako yub me lweny i kom peko ma mege nongo ikare me tic. Miti gi tye me lweny pi cik ma cwako miti pa mon me gwoko gang gi ki dog tic gi.
teo_prompt: Ageu egurupu lo ikampein kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas nuatoto kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam. Alosikinetekec erai aikeun nuka ainapeta nu igangitos ipudesia luka angor kanu aimorikikin ekale keda aswam.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da e'do o'diru otita azi 'bani lezu e'yo ewaru ayia eyini esu angu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Asisile yiniri lezu a'di 'dizu e'yo azita ni atita fepi e'yo oku eyini le 'diyi ma dria familia eyi ma eselea azi eyini 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Guruupu etandikireho ehururu erikugyenderera okutereeza oburemeezi bw'abazaire aha mirimo. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okurwanirira ebiragiro ebirikushagika ebyetaago by'omutaano by'abakazi, okurinda amaka gaabo n'emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities across Africa, traditional norms and practices continue to dictate the roles and rights of women. As a result, access to education and economic opportunities for females remains severely limited.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi okwetooloola Afirika, obulombolombo n'enkola z'obuwangwa bikyagenda mu maaso n'okulagira emirimu n'eddembe ly'abakyala. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna ebyenjigiriza n'emikisa gy'ebyenfuna eri abakyala bikyali bikendeera nnyo.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol I lobo Afrika, tekwaro ki tim me tekwaro pud tye ka doro tic ki twero pa mon. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo kwan ki gum me nongo lim pi anyira pud tye magoro tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu ko Africa, iswamaete inonosio keda iponesio lu atekerin itodunitos aswamisinei keda apedorosio nuka angor. Kanuka ngun, adumunun asioman keda arerengesio nuka ikapun mama ejaasi angor eringa ikidioko noi.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara Africaa 'diyi ma alea, e'yo a'bini 'diyi azini 'yeta oku eyini 'diyi nga po'di azi oku eyini 'diyi azini drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, geri oku eyini ecozu onita esuzu azini drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma esuta ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi omuri Afirika, emigyenzo n'emitwarize y'obuhangwa neegumizamu neegamba aha mirimo n'obugabe bw'abakazi. N'ekyarugiremu, abakazi tibarikubaasa kwega n'okutunga entaasya.

eng_prompt: In many communities, power dynamics often skew in favor of men, leading to a culture where women's voices are marginalized. This imbalance allows clan leaders to exploit vulnerable individuals, perpetuating cycles of injustice.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, enkulaakulana y'obuyinza etera okusinziira ku basajja, ekiviirako obuwangwa ng'amaloboozi g'abakyala gasuuliddwa ku mabbali. Obutali bwenkanya buno busobozesa abakulembeze b'ebika okukozesa abantu abateesobola, ekireetawo obutali bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, rwom me tela ipol kare jenge I kom coo, ma man kelo tekwaro kama kicayo iye dwon pa mon. Telo tol man weko lutela me kaka tiyo ki dano ma goro, ma weko tim me ngolo kop alenga medde anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, ejai apedor na ikiliok, ido eyangauni inonosio lu angor mam epupokinitai. Ationis na ijaikini engarenok luka atekerin aitwasam itunga lumam epedoritos aingarakin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo opi nyaza ni 'diyi tutuni agupi eyini atita fe eyini ani e'yo oku eyini 'diyi 'yezu ku. Esele coza 'diri fe drice'ba suru eyini 'diyini 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ayuzu eyini ani e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, obutegyeki buriijo nibukunda abashaija, ekirikureetaho eby'obuhangwa ahu eiraka ry'abakazi riri aha rubaju. Obutabanguko obu nibubaasisa abebembezi b'ebika kutuntuza abantu abatarikwebaasa, ekirikureetera obutari buringaaniza kugumaho.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in gender equality, many communities still grapple with deep-rooted issues of gender-based violence. This pervasive problem has far-reaching consequences for the health and well-being of women and girls.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu, ebitundu bingi bikyalwanagana n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi eby'obutabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula ky'abantu. Ekizibu kino ekibunye buli wamu kirina ebivaamu eby'amaanyi eri obulamu n'obulamu obulungi bw'abakyala n'abawala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka madit otime I lok me bedo ki mon ki coo marom, pol pa dano pud gitye ka lweny ki peko me tim gero ikin mon ki coo. Peko man ma onya tutwal ni tye ki adwoki marac tutwal I kom yotkom ki kwo pa mon ki anyira.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naepol noi kotoma airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor, eringa itunga luipu ejaas keda ationis naepol noi naka amumu na okalia. Ejaasi ationis na keda atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi angor keda apesur.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileba angiri agupi eyini aa'zu oku eyi pie trotro ri ma talasi, ongulumu karakara eyi nga po'di dri ci e'yo okporu ngiringiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri be. E'yo ewaru 'di ma omgbo angiri ri ni e'yo eyi 'ye e'yo rua ala ni azini aa'ta muke ni oku eyini azini ezoanzi eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'oburinganiza, ebyanga bingi bikiriyo nibirwanagana n'obutabanguko bw'ekikura ky'abantu. Ekizibu eki ekirikujanjaara munonga kiine oburemeezi bw'amaani aha magara g'abakazi n'abaishiki.

eng_prompt: Domestic violence remains a pervasive issue in our society, affecting individuals from all walks of life. Despite increased awareness and resources, many victims still struggle to seek help and report their situations.
lug_prompt: Obutabanguko mu maka bukyali kizibu mu kitundu kyaffe, kikosa abantu okuva mu mbeera zonna ez'obulamu. Newankubadde waliwo okumanyisa n'obuyambi, abakoseddwa bangi bakyalwana okunoonya obuyambi n'okuloopa embeera zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Tim gero me ot pud tye peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa, ma tye ka yelo dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat. Kadi bed ni rwom me miyo ngec ki kony tye malo, jo mapol ma onongo peko pwod gitye ka yele me nongo kony ki doto peko gi.
teo_prompt: Amumu nakokalia eringa erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubetekosi, etirori itunga luka aiboisio kere. Karaida iyatakitai aijen keda iboro, eringa itunga luipu luiticanitai eutasi aimo aingarakinio ka alimor ejautenekec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri aku eselesi 'diyi nga po'di e'yo 'ba dria ma eselea 'diyi biipi ra. E'yo mile oziza ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi ma karakara eyi nga po'di dri ci azakoma esuzu azini e'yo eyini esu 'diyi oluzu.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko bw'omumaka bukiri enshonga y'amaani omu bantu baitu, erikuteganisa abantu b'emiringo yoona. N'obu haraabe hariho okumanyisibwa n'obuhwezi obweyongyeire, abantu baingi abarikubonabonesibwa nibarwana kuronda obuhwezi n'okuhababira embeera zaabo.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the community has witnessed a troubling increase in violent incidents that have left many feeling unsafe. As tensions rise, local leaders recognize the urgent need for intervention to restore peace and harmony.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ekitundu kirabiddemu okweyongera mu bikolwa eby'obukambwe ebirese bangi nga tebawulira bukuumi. Obunkenke bweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakitegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuyingira mu nsonga okuzzaawo emirembe n'obumu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak guneno medde pa tim gero ma oweko dano mapol pe gubedo agwoka. Ka telle tye kamedde, lutela me tedero guniang ni omyero gutim gin mo pi dwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ewanyunit itunga aiyatakin naka amumu najalakisi itunga luipu amamut ayuwara. Kwape iyata aiyalongong, ejenete engarenok luka atutubet eipud loka alomun kanu ainyakun ainapakin keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'da ndre e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra erini fezu 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu ageitema koko. Erita ako ni turia, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo 'yezu mbeleru asianzu azini aa'ta tualu ri ogozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abantu bareebire okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko oburetsire abantu baingi kwetenga oburinzi. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibamanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okugaruraho obusingye n'obumwe.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and gathering of evidence, law enforcement officials announced a breakthrough in the case. The community had been in shock and mourning since the tragic incident occurred.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukung'aanya obujulizi, abakwasisa amateeka baalangirira obuwanguzi mu musango. Ekitundu kyali mu kutya n'okukungubaga okuva ekikangabwa kino lwe kyaliwo.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki coko caden, lutic ma gwoko cik guwaco ni ginongo adwogi maber I kom lok ne. Lwak gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma peko man otimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka aituk ajenanut, apotu ipolisin kolimosi ebe aponi kitolomunai akiro kotoma omusago kangol. Ajaasi itunga toma aumokin keda aimony ageun ne atakanunor akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi e'yo efupi kesi 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. Ongulumu nderi ebi ovu ori azini emvo ma alia e'dozu e'yo ewaru 'da ni i 'yezu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okurundaana obujurizi, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakarangirira okuhinguzibwa omu mushango. Abantu babaire bari omu bwire bw'ekikangabwa n'okucura kuruga obu ekikangabwa ekyo kyabaho.

eng_prompt: The rising rates of substance misuse have become a pressing concern for local leaders. As families struggle with the consequences, the impact on public health and safety is increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'ebbeeyi y'okukozesa ebiragalalagala kifuuse ekyeraliikiriza ennyo abakulembeze b'ebyalo. Nga amaka galwanagana n'ebivaamu, okukosebwa kw'ebyobulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu kweyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Medde pa rwom me nywaro tic ki yadi odoko peko madit tutwal bot lutela me tedero. I kare ma gangi tye ka lweny ki adwogi ne, adwogi ne I kom yot kom ki ber bedo pa lwak tye ka nen tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aimat ikee luitemerete erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas engarenok luka atutubet. Kwape eutasi ikalia ainingosit keda nuelomunitos, epol noi ationis naka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza ma omgbo tupi tutu ri eca asi otiza okporu ni eyi ru drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini. Familia yini dri ciria e'yo onzi 'diyi be, e'yo onzi 'yepi o'bi yi ma rua ala ma dria azini ageitema ma dria 'diyi e'da yi drile.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikukoresa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko, nikyerarikiriza munonga abebembezi b'ebyaro. Amaka ku garikurwana n'ebirugiremu, ebirikukwata aha magara g'abantu hamwe n'oburinzi byeyongyeire kweyoreka.

eng_prompt: Community engagement and education play crucial roles in addressing the root causes of conflict. By fostering open dialogue and understanding among individuals, we can create a foundation for lasting peace.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigiramu kw'abantu n'okusomesebwa bikola kinene nnyo mu kugonjoola ensibuko y'obukuubagano. Nga tukuza okuteesa okw'olwatu n'okutegeeragana mu bantu, tusobola okutondawo omusingi gw'emirembe egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa lwak kacel ki pwony konyo tutwal I tyeko jami ma kelo kuku kuku. Ka wakelo lok ki winye ikin dano, watwero yubu guti me kuc ma rii pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin itunga keda aisisia iswamaete iboro lu epol ajokis kanu aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununete ingungeta. Kowai lo aitopolorite aineranara ka apuponoro kanejaas itunga, ipedori oni aitolomun ainapakin na edaun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu onita be 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo ngiringiri ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo nzeza ngmboru azini vata ma omgbo otuzu 'ba yi ma eselea ri si, ama eco angu si asianzu aa'pi ewule 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kw'abantu hamwe n'eby'obwegyese nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurwanisa ebirikureeta entaro. Kurabira omukureetaho okuganiira okw'amazima n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu, nitubaasa kutaho omusingi gw'obusingye obw'obutuura.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by rural communities, the organization has launched a series of initiatives aimed at economic development. Through workshops and training programs, they are equipping members with the skills needed for sustainable growth.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu byalo kwe boolekaganye nakwo, ekitongole kitongozza enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okukulaakulanya eby'enfuna. Nga bayita mu misomo n'enteekateeka z'okutendeka, bawa bammemba obukugu obwetaagisa okukulaakulana okw'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Pien niang peko ma dano ma icaro nongo, dul enoni ocako yub mapol me dongo lobo. Kun gitiyo ki kacoke me pwonye ki yub me pwonye, gitye ka miyo ngec ma mite pi dongo lobo matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga lukocaloi, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuepedorete aitopolor edumune loka ikapun. Kotoma airiamunun keda ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro, eutasi kesi aijaikin imeban acoa na ekotoi kanu apol na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu caloa 'diyi ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, amuti 'di e'do e'yo ndundu eyini lezu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri 'yezu. Trayi otita imbatani azini otita imbatani 'diyi vusi, yi 'ba yi dri ondua lele zota sawa ezu ri ma alia 'diyi fe.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburikushangwa abantu b'omubyaro,ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Barikurabira omu mishomo hamwe na puroguraamu z'okutendeka, nibaheereza abantu emyoga erikwetengwa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In the intricate web of nature, various organisms rely on each other for survival. Among these, trees play a crucial role in supporting diverse wildlife.
lug_prompt: Mu nkwatagana y'obutonde, ebiramu eby'enjawulo byesigama ku birala okusobola okuwangaala. Mu bino, emiti gikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuyimirizaawo ebisolo by'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapat-pat me cwec ma orumuwa, jami makwo mapat-pat jenge I kom luwotgi pi kwo gi. I kin magi, yadi timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko kwo pa lee lum mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka Edeke, ejarete iboro luipu nepepe kanu aiku. Kotoma ngul, iswamaete ikito aswam naepol noi kanu aigangite itiang lukokutwi luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma alia, afa idriru 'diyi yi ati yi ma eselea yi ma ta mbazu. Diyi ma eselea, pati yi azi okporu nga afa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa ebirikuteganisa, ebintu ebirikubaho nibyegamirana kugira ngu bibeho. Omuri ebi, emiti neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeberera enyamiishwa nyingi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address community needs, the organization has initiated collaborative projects. These initiatives aim to foster partnerships that enhance support for local families and children.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu, ekitongole kitandiseewo pulojekiti ez'awamu. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera okutumbula enkolagana ezitumbula obuyambi eri amaka n'abaana b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak, dul ne ocako yub mapat-pat me ribbe. Yub eni tye ki miti me kelo winye ikin gangi ki lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, etolomu erionget ipurojektin lu aiswamanara. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitopolor aiswamanara naka ikalia keda idwe.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do otita eyi tualu. Otita 'diyi lezu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu atita fezu familia angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azini anzi nyiri eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu, ekitongore kitandikireho purogyekiti z'okukorera hamwe. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okureetaho enkwatanisa erikwongyera obuhwezi aha maka n'abaana b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, environmental concerns have become a central focus for many communities. As a result, local organizations have sought ways to encourage sustainable practices among their members.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, abantu bangi bafaayo nnyo ku butonde bw'ensi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ebitundu byanoonye engeri z'okukubiriza enkola ez'obutebenkevu mu bammemba baabyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lok kom cwec ma orumuwa odoko gin ma dano mapol tye ka paro pire. Macalo adwogi ne, dule me tedero guyenyo yoo me cuku cwiny lumemba gi me timo jami ma kelo ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, epodokitos itunga luipu nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap. Kanuka ngun, aimo iriongeta luka atutubet iwaitin lu isinyikokinete imebanakec aswam iboro lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi eca e'yo okporu ongulumu karakara eyini 'diyi ru. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nda geri eyini ecozu 'yeta eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu eyi ma memba eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okwerarikirira eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi kwebembeire abantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ebyaro birondeire oburyo bw'okureetaho enkora nungi omu bantu babyo.

eng_prompt: The continuous removal of topsoil due to wind and water can lead to significant agricultural challenges. As nutrients are washed away, the land becomes less productive over time.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera okuggyawo ettaka olw'empewo n'amazzi kiyinza okuleetawo okusoomoozebwa mu byobulimi. Ebirimu bwe bikendeera, ettaka lifuuka eritali ggimu oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa ngom malubbe ki yamo ki pii twero kelo peko madit tutwal ilok me pur. Ka moc cam ma i ngom orweny woko, ngom pe bedo ki jami mapol me acama ka kare okato.
teo_prompt: Aijulakin alupok kanu ekwam keda akipi epedori ayangaun atiokisio nu akoru. Arai kibiroros inyamat luka alupok, mam alupok epedori aswam ejok akaulo naka apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nyaku dria 'diyi odrozu sawa driasi oli ma e'yosi azini yi ma e'yosi ri eco e'yo ewaru agirikica ni 'diyi eji ra. Afa nyakuni 'diyi ni yi ojizu ra, nyaku ni eca orodri kokoru sawa ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kutwara eitaka ahaiguru ahabw'omuyaga n'amaizi, nikibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ebintu ebirikubaisa omutaka ku birikuhwerekyerera, eitaka niritwara obwire butari bwingi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental sustainability and enhance local biodiversity, the local council has initiated a new green initiative. As part of this program, the community is encouraged to plant trees on unused farmland.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi n'okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi obw'enjawulo mu kitundu, akakiiko k'ekyalo katandiseewo enteekateeka empya ey'obutonde. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, abantu bakubirizibwa okusimba emiti ku ttaka ly'okulimirako eritakozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa, kancil me tedero ocako yub manyen me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub man, kicuku cwiny lwak me pito yadi I ngom ma pe kitiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor aiboisio nu akwap keda aitojokar aiboisio nu ekwam, etolomu ekansulo loka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekwam. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta, isinyikokitai itunga aira ikito alupok numam itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu azini afa nyakuni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba ai ongulumu eyi pati eyi sazu angu ori ezozu 'bani ayule ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa omu byaro, akakiiko k'ebyaro katandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abantu nibahigwa kubyara emiti ahaitaka eritarikukoresibwa.

eng_prompt: In his recent address to the congregation, the Bishop emphasized the importance of environmental stewardship and the role of faith communities in caring for God's creation. He highlighted the urgent need to combat climate change and restore natural habitats.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe gyebuvuddeko eri ekibiina, Omwepiskoopi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okulabirira obutonde bw'ensi n'omulimu gw'enzikiriza mu kulabirira ebitonde bya Katonda. Yassa essira ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okuzzaawo obutonde.
ach_prompt: I lokke cokcok-ki bot lwak, Laneno oketo cwinye I kom ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki tic pa dini me gwoko cwec pa Lubanga. En owaco ni mitte tutwal me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki roco kabedo pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerikec mama ejaasi ikuristayon, abu ebisop kitogogong ajokis naka aidar ejautene lo akwap keda aswam naka aiyuunikec kotoma aidar isuban luka Edeke. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka atipet loka aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka ainyakun aiboisio nuka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini nze o'diru kanisa dri, Bisopi 'da fe okpo orodri angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma dria azini azi ongulumu aita ni 'diyi ni afa Munguni ede 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. Ece e'yo orodriru a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be azini angu nyakuni 'diyi ogozu ogogo ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe aha bantu, Bishopu akashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeberera obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'omurimo gw'ediini omu kureeberera ebihangirwe bya Ruhanga. Akashoborora ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okugaruraho eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental awareness and community involvement, a collaborative initiative was launched. As a result, students from different educational institutions have taken part in tree planting.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ku butonde bw'ensi n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, enteekateeka y'okukolagana yatongozebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi okuva mu matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza ag'enjawulo beetabye mu kusimba emiti.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa ki bene weko lwak gubed tye, yub me ribbe ocake. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan ma aa ki I gangi kwan mapat-pat gubedo tye I yub me pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit aisisianakin itunga nuka ejautene lo akwap, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuka aimorikikina. Kanuka ngun, esisiak luka isomeroi luegelegela alomasi aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu mile oziza angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu azini ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otuta ti icita ni. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi engapi angu onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi fi e'yo pati saza niri ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, enteekateeka y'okukorera hamwe ekatandikwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi kuruga omu matendekyero agatari gamwe, bejumbire omu kubyara emiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental awareness and sustainability, a local organization organized a tree planting initiative. As part of this program, the tree seedlings were distributed among two secondary schools.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okumanyisibwa kw'obutonde bw'ensi n'obutebenkevu, ekitongole ky'omu kitundu kyategese enteekateeka y'okusimba emiti. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, endokwa z'emiti zaagabibwa mu masomero ga sekendule abiri.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa, dul mo me tedero oyubu yub me pito yadi. Macalo but yub man, ki poko kodi yadi bot gangi kwan me cinia aryo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit aisisianakino nuka alupok keda akwap, abu erionget loka atutubet kitemok aira ikito. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, aponi okorakinai ikito ngun mama ejaasi isomeroi iarei luka esinia.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental stewardship, the local community has established various initiatives. One key aspect of these initiatives involves the church's role in overseeing tree planting efforts.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkwata y'obutonde bw'ensi, abantu mu kitundu bataddewo enteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka zino mulimu omulimu gw'ekkanisa mu kulondoola okulima emiti.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, lwak me tedero gucako yub mapat-pat. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub eni obedo tic pa kanica me doro yub me pito yadi.

lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi ya mugaso okutuuka ku biruubirirwa eby'awamu mu pulojekiti yonna. Nga bakungaanya ebyetaago n'obukugu, ttiimu zisobola okwongera ku mikisa gyazo egy'obuwanguzi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving market, organizations must adapt to stay competitive. To achieve this, teams need to prioritize innovative approaches that address current challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akatambula amangu, ebitongole birina okukyusakyusa okusobola okusigala nga bivuganya. Okutuukiriza kino, ttiimu zeetaaga okukulembeza enkola ez'obuyiiya ezigonjoola ebisoomooza ebiriwo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the need to address the disparities between regions in the country. As a result, various initiatives have been launched to improve infrastructure, education, and healthcare in Northern Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obwetaavu bw'okukola ku njawulo wakati w'ebitundu mu ggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okutumbula ebizimbe, ebyenjigiriza n'ebyobulamu mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.

ach_prompt: Macalo but yub pa gamente me ilo malo rwom me tic mapatpat, kiketo lim madit tutwal I tenge me wot. Yub man tye ki miti me medo kubbe ki dongo lobo I but lobo enoni weng.

ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki jogo cente, yub me yabo ot yat manyen dong otum. Lutela me kabedo gitye ki gen I kom adwogi ne I kom yoo me nongo kony me yot kom I kabedo eni.

lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko eddwaliro lyagaziya ebifo n'obuweereza bwalyo okusobola okusuza abalwadde abangi. N'ekivuddemu, kati kyetegefu okukola ku kuyingira kw'abantu abanoonya obujjanjabi okuva mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Cocoki ot yat omedo rwom me jami ticgi wek otel lutwo mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, kombedi tye ki jami weng ma mite me tic i kom dano mapol matye kabino ka nongo kony me yot kom ki I kabedo ma orumu.
teo_prompt: Apolor pac adekis aiboisio ke ka aijanakinakec kanu aidar adekak luipu. Kanuka ngun, epedorio kwana aitemokin itunga luipu lueutasi alomar toma aiboisio nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da edri o'diru afa erini ayuzaru 'diyi azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi 'bazu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe angiri beni. E'yo 'disi, eri sawa 'disi afa dria 'diyi be ecozu e'yo 'ba eyini emuzu aro esuzu engazu angu eyi ma agei 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro rikagaziya ebyombeko n'obuheereza bwaryo okubaasa kutwariramu abarwaire baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, obwahati kiine ebikwato by'okukora aha bantu abarikuruga omu myanya eyetorwaire kuronda obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and securing permits, the project is finally set to begin. Construction crews are ready to break ground on the new community center.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okufuna olukusa, pulojekiti esembyeyo okutandika. Abazimbi beetegefu okutandika okuzimba ekizimbe ky'ekyalo ekipya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nongo twero, yub eni dong obucako. Lutic me gedo tye atera me cako tic i kom gang tic manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitemonokin ka adumun apapulai nuka apedor, epedorio ageun epurojekt. Ekapakina itunga lu edukete aiduk atutubet naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza ma vutia azini kokobi driwala esuzu 'bori ma vutia, otita 'di nga asizu e'do ra. Ba afa si'ba 'diyi ngonde e'dozu angu o'bi eyini aa'zu o'diru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okutunga orusa, purogyekiti yaheza kutandika. Abombeki beeteekateekire kutandika omurimo gw'okwombeka omwanya musya.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing emphasis on improving healthcare access and quality. As a result, more individuals have entered the health workforce to meet the rising demand for services.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okussa essira ku kutumbula obujjanjabi n'omutindo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bayingidde mu byobulamu okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'obuweereza obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gudonyo I tic me yot kom me cobo miti me kony ma tye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru luatuboros, ejai agogong naepol noi kanu aitojokar adoketait na amukian. Kanuka ngun, alomasi itunga luipu toma aswam naka angaleu kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu azini wura alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi fi azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma alea lezu azakoma fele 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, abantu beyongyeire kuta amaani omu kutunguura omutindo gw'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bejumbire omu mirimo y'eby'amagara kwenda kuhikwaho obuheereza obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: When evaluating healthcare facilities, it's essential to consider the range of services they offer. Patients often seek comprehensive care that addresses their diverse health needs.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba weekenneenya ebifo by'ebyobulamu, kikulu okulowooza ku buweereza bwe biwa. Abalwadde batera okunoonya obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo obutuukana n'ebyetaago byabwe eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngiyo kit ma odi yadi tye kwede, pire tek tutwal me neno rwom me kony ma gitye kwede. Lutwo ipol kare giyenyo kony me yot kom ma cobo miti gi mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana airereonor aiboisio nu amukian, ejokuna noi airereonor iponesio lu ijaikitos kesi. Etapit adekak aimo amukian naejok na itodolikinete ipudesia kec luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojo ni 'diyi ma ale andrita ma alia, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu azakoma yini fele 'diyi ma dria. Ba azoru 'diyi tutuni azakoma fele e'yo dria eyini le 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooshwijuma amarwariro, ni kikuru kumanya obuheereza obu barikugaba. Abarwaire nibakira kuronda obujanjabi oburikukwata ahabyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that patient outcomes can vary significantly based on the cultural competence and understanding of healthcare providers. This has led to discussions about the effectiveness of doctors from different racial backgrounds in addressing the needs of diverse populations.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti ebinaava mu balwadde bisobola okwawukana okusinziira ku buwangwa n'okutegeera kw'abasawo. Kino kiviiriddeko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukugu bw'abasawo okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo mu kukola ku byetaago by'abantu ab'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni adwogi me tic pa lutwo twero bedo pat-pat malubbe ki tekwaro ki niang pa lutic yot-kom. Man okelo nywako lok I kom kit ma ludaktari ma aa ki I kaki ma pat pat tiyo kwede me cobo miti pa dano ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe epedorete akiro nuelomunete kanejaas adekak atiakatiaka kotupitete eswamae lo atekerin keda amisiikin naka eswamak lu adekis. Eyangau na aineranara nuikamunitos eswamae loka imurok luka atekerin nuegelegela kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eco co esele e'yo suruni azini vata 'ba azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri vusi ra. E'yo 'di fe agbatara e'yo dakitari engapi suru ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini azi ngazu kililiru e'yo 'ba ndundu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu ebirikubaho ahabarwaire nibibaasa kutaana kurugirira aha buhangwa n'okwetegyereza kw'abashaho. Eki kireesireho okuhanuura aha bukoryo bw'abashaho kuruga omu nganda ezitari zimwe omu kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: Access to mental health care remains a significant challenge in many parts of Uganda. The stigma surrounding mental illness often leads to a lack of resources and support for those in need.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi bw'obwongo kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi mu bitundu bya Uganda bingi. Okutyoboola eddembe ly'obuntu okwetoolodde obulwadde bw'obwongo kitera okuvaako ebbula ly'obuyambi n'obuyambi eri abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom me adam pud obedo peko madit tutwal I but lobo Uganda mapol. Nywaro nying dano matye ki two me adam ipol kare kelo can lim ki kony bot joo matye i peko.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian naka adam eringa erai ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu ko Uganda. Amumu na ejaas adekasinei nu adam eyangauni amamus na iboro ka agangat nejaas ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo omi ni 'diyi esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni kari Uganda niri ma woko karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani 'ba omi azo be 'diyi ma dria ri ni fe 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri afa ayuzaru azini atita ako ni.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara g'emitwe kikiri ekizibu omu bicweka bingi omu Uganda. Okwetomboitwa okurikukwata aha ndwara z'emitwe, nikireetaho eibura ry'ebintu n'obuhwezi ahabw'abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for accessible healthcare, the government launched a nationwide initiative. This program aims to ensure that every citizen has access to essential medical services.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obutuukirirwa, gavumenti yatongoza enteekateeka mu ggwanga lyonna. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okulaba nga buli munnansi afuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente ocako yub me miyo kony me yot kom I lobo ni weng. Yub man tye ki miti me neno ni anywali acel acel nongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian na epatana adumun, abu apugan kitegea ainapeta nuka akwap kere. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga kere keda amukian naedolit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu risi, gamete e'do e'yo 'di kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu nezu ra kini kari mva dria ma esu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ekatandikaho enteekateeka y'okuragurira eihanga ryona, ahabw'omuhendo gw'eby'amagara oguriyo nigweyongyera. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeba ngu buri mutuuragye atunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's growing need for accessible healthcare services, the local government held a meeting to discuss potential solutions. During the discussions, the chairperson expressed his commitment to improving public health in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obutuukirirwa, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri z'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo, ssentebe yalaze obweyamo bwe mu kutumbula ebyobulamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me miti pa lwak me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente me tedero obedo ki kacoke me nywako tam ma twero konyo gi. Ikare me nywako lok, won kom onyuto cwinye me ilo malo rwom me yot kom I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka itunga adumun amukian na epatana adumun, abu apugan naka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Kotoma opeget, abu apolon eicolong kitodu ainakina ke kanu aitojokar angaleu na itunga katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Sawa agbatara nirisi, ogua e'i ece ava erini fe e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'abantu eky'okwenda obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikwetengwa, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha nshonga. Omu kuhanuura, mukuru w'entebe akooreka okwehayo kwe kutunguura eby'amagara omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Recent surveys indicate a growing satisfaction among citizens regarding the accessibility and quality of health care. Many believe that the government's initiatives are making a significant positive impact on their well-being.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti bannansi beeyongedde okuba abamativu ku bikwata ku kufuna n'omutindo gw'obujjanjabi. Bangi bakkiriza nti enteekateeka za gavumenti zikola kinene ku mbeera yaabwe ey'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni dano tye ki yomcwiny I kom yoo me nongo kony me yot kom. Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni yub pa gamente tye ka kelo adwogi maber i kom kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic itodunit ebe iyatakina itunga adumunun amukian keda adoketait na abeit. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe eutasi ainapeta nuka apugan aitojokar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kini kari anzi yi ma ayiko tu e'yo geri alata ni 'diyi ma esuta ma dria azini wura ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini e'yo gamete ni 'diyi nga orodri eyi ma edri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati nikworeka okumarwa okurikweyongyera omu bantu ahabw'okushangwaho n'omutindo gw'obujanjabi. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu enteekateeka za gavumenti nizikora kihango aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of communities, various faith-based groups have mobilized resources to address these challenges. Their commitment to service has led to the establishment of numerous medical facilities dedicated to providing compassionate care.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu bitundu, ebibiina by'enzikiriza eby'enjawulo bikungaanyizza eby'obugagga okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno. Obumalirivu bwabwe obw'okuweereza buviiriddeko okuteekebwawo kw'amalwaliro mangi agafaayo ku balwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak i kom yoto kom, dul mapat-pat ma jenge i kom dini gu jogo jami me cobo peko magi. Cwinygi me miyo kony oweko kiyubu odi yadi mapol ma miyo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian kotoma atutubena, apotu igurupun lu ediini otukutu iboro kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu. Apodokinit kec aijanakin ayangau adukio naka adekisia nuipu nu ijaikitos amukian na itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti e'yo aita nisi 'diyi tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi ma ava azi ngazu ri fe 'bani arojo karakara eyi sizu azakoma asi ndriza si 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebyeyongyeire omu bantu, guruupu z'amadiini zitungire eby'okukoresa kukora aha buremeezi obu. Okwehayo kwabo omu buheereza, kireesireho okwombeka amarwariro maingi agarikworeka embabazi.

eng_prompt: Access to essential medical services is crucial for community well-being. When health facilities are readily available, residents are more likely to seek preventive care and treatment.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu obulungi bw'ekitundu. Ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bwe biba biriwo, abatuuze batera okunoonya obujjanjabi n'okuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak. Ka odi yadi tye, lutedero maro yenyo kony me gengo ki nongo yat.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga. Arai ejaas adekisia, epedorete itunga aimo amukian ka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke ri ni. Afa arojo ni 'diyi ka ovu cirisi ci, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eco e'yo azo atrizu azini aro esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obw'omugasho n'eky'omugasho ahabw'amagara marungi g'abantu. Amaduuka g'eby'amagara ku garikuba gariho, abatuuragye nibabaasa kuronda obujanjabi n'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed alarming practices within the pharmaceutical industry. In some cases, patients have unknowingly received medications that are past their expiration dates.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga ebikolwa eby'entiisa mu makolero g'eddagala. Mu mbeera ezimu, abalwadde bafunye eddagala nga tebamanyi nti lyaggwaako.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim marac tutwal I tenge me yubu yadi. Ikare mukene lutwo nongo yat ma nino me tic ne okato woko labongo ngec.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio luajokak noi kotoma okampuni loka ikee. Kotoma ojautene ice, adumutu adekak ikee lumam ejenete apakio nu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi 'yepi okalamvu aro edepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi. Sa'wa azi 'diyisi, 'ba azoru 'diyi esu aro eyi ma o'du 'bani eyi ma o'du 'duzu 'bo 'diyi ni kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebikorwa bibi omu makorero g'emibazi. Obumwe, abarwaire nibatunga emibazi etakahwireho batabimanyire.

eng_prompt: The hospital's blood supply has reached critically low levels, causing grave concerns among the medical staff. Despite urgent appeals for donations, the response has been insufficient to meet the growing demand for transfusions.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'omusaayi mu ddwaliro gukendedde nnyo, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu basawo. Wadde nga wabaddewo okusaba okw'amangu okw'obuyambi, okuddibwamu kubadde kutono okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okuteekebwamu omusaayi.
ach_prompt: Rwom me remo I ot yat dong odok piny tutwal ma oweko lutic yoto kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal. Kadi bed ni kilego pi kony oyot-oyot tutwal, dwoko ne pe obedo ma oromo me cobo miti me medo remo I kom dano.
teo_prompt: Adisiar noi adoketait na aokot kadekis, ido eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak lu adekis. Karaida ilipitai noi agangat, mam epedorio aitodolikin eipud loka aokot.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da ma ari ma omgbo esi ra, e'yo 'di fe asi otiza amboru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi omvezu mbeleru atita fezu 'diyi ma dria ra ti, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi omvizu ri cani e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma ari 'bazu ri ma omgbo otuzu ku.
nyn_prompt: Eshagama y'eirwariro eri ahansi munonga, ekireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bashaho. Oihireho okushaba kw'amaani kw'obuhwezi, ebyarugiremu tibirikumara kuhikiiriza ekyetengo ky'okutamu eshagama.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of a serious car accident, emergency responders rushed to assess the injuries of those involved. The severity of the collisions often leads to traumatic wounds that can result in significant blood loss.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje k'emmotoka ak'amaanyi, ab'obuyambi bangu badduka okwekenneenya ebisago by'abo abakwatibwako. Obulumi bw'obubenje butera okuleeta ebiwundu ebiwuniikiriza ebiyinza okuvaamu okufiirwa omusaayi mungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee can me gudu madit tutwal, joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot guyenyo dano ma onongo awano. Rwom me poto pa mutoka ipol kare kelo awano ma twero kelo rweny pa remo mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas naepol noi naka emotoka, apotu lu engeso kiswamata katipet kanu airereor amusungut naka ngul luetirorit. Amumu na akangasia eyangauni ajimis naepol noi naepedori ayangaun atwaniar aokot nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileonzi onzi mutukariniri ma vutia, 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ari yi 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma nya'biliko eyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo onzikanyaru e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyiniri ni sawa driasi fe bile onzi ecopi ari avipi angiri 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabenje k'emotoka ak'amaani, ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahunga kushwijuma obuhuta bw'abo abaabaire bejumbiremu. Oburemeezi bw'okutomerana, buriijo niburugwamu ebironda by'amaani ebirikubaasa kurugwamu okuferwa eshagama nyingi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent medical crisis affecting our community, the leader addressed the public during a press conference. Emphasizing the urgent need for support, they urged everyone to take action.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko mu kitundu kyaffe, omukulembeze yayogeddeko eri abantu mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire. Nga bakkaatiriza obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi, baakubiriza buli omu okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye ka yelo kabedo wa cokcok-ki, latela ne oloko ki lwak I kare me lok ki lucoo lok angeya. Gin gulego dano weng me timo gin mo pi tyelo kor miti me nongo kony oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka amukian naka atutubetekosi, abu engarenon kiner keda itunga kotoma apak naka einer keda lu iyemuto. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka agangat katipet, apotu kesi isinyikokisi itunga kere aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi ongulumu amavileri bipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba 'da nze e'yo o'bi eyidri sa'wa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi. Erini asi 'bazu e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma mbeleru ri ma dria, eyi ai 'ba dria eyi e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburi omu kyanga kyaitu, omwebembezi akagambira abantu omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru. Ahabw'okureeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi, bakashaba buri omwe kugira eki yaakora.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure timely medical responses, the facility must enhance its emergency preparedness. One critical aspect of this is having a reliable system in place for urgent blood deliveries.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obujjanjabi mu budde, eddwaliro lirina okutumbula obwetegefu bwalyo obw'amangu. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kuba n'enkola eyeesigika ey'okutambuza omusaayi mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni ot yat tye ka miyo kony me yot kom ikare ki kome, ot yat omyero oyubbe pi peko ma poto atura. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo bedo ki yoo ma gene me kelo remo oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorio amukian kotoma apak, ekot adekis aitogogong akapakina ke nuka engeso. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu ngun ngesi ajaut keda ewai lo ejok kanu aitodolikin aokot katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aza kozu arojoa sa'wa dria, le arojo eyi ma otu eyi ma otuta e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ra. E'yo azi okporu 'di ma azi eri ovuzu geri 'bani ecozu asi 'bazu ra 'bani ari ejizu mbeleru 'diyi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho obujanjabi omu bwire, eirwariro rishemereire kwongyera aha bweteekateeko bwaryo ahabw'ebihikiirizi. Ekikuru munonga omuri eki n'okugira enkora y'okureeta eshagama ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Every year, the demand for blood donations increases as hospitals strive to meet the needs of patients in critical care. To address this growing need, the national blood bank implements various outreach programs to encourage community participation.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, obwetaavu bw'obuyambi bw'omusaayi bweyongera ng'amalwaliro gagezaako okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abalwadde abali mu mbeera embi. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno obweyongera, bbanka y'omusaayi ekola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo okukubiriza abantu okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, miti me remo mede pien odi yadi tye ka tute matek me cobo miti pa lutwo ma komgi lit. Me tyeko peko man matye kamede ameda, dul me national blood bank tye katic ki yub mapat-pat me konyo lwak me bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kangol ekaru, iyata eipuda lo ainanakin aokot naarai ekotosi adekisia aitodolikin ipudesia luka adekak lu ejai adekis. Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo lo eyatakin, ejai aingadis naka ikapun loka aokot ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma.
lgg_prompt: Eli alu alu vusi, lezu 'ba eyi ma ari fezu ri ma omgbo ni tu arojo eyini okpo 'bazu 'ba azoru azoru 'diyi ma tambazu. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti ari ta mbapi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi otuta ndundu eyi 'ye ongulumu eyini atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhayo eshagama nigweyongyera ahabw'okugira ngu amarwariro nigakora n'amaani okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abarwaire abari omu marwariro ag'amaani. Okukora aha kyetengo ky'eshagama ekyeyongyeire, eibikiro ry'eshagama ry'eihanga nirikora enteekateeka z'okuhwera abantu baingi kwejumba omu by'eshagama.

eng_prompt: Many women experience significant blood loss during childbirth, which can lead to complications if not properly managed. As a result, healthcare providers often prepare for the possibility of needing additional blood supplies.
lug_prompt: Abakyala bangi bafiirwa omusaayi mungi nga bazaala, ekiyinza okuleeta ebizibu singa tekikolebwa bulungi. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo beetegekera obwetaavu bw'omusaayi.
ach_prompt: Mon mapol rwenyo remo mapol ikare me nywal, ma twero kelo peko ka pe kitiyo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom ipol kare giyube pi peko me medo remo.
teo_prompt: Angor nuipu etwakianarete awokot kapak naka aidoun, ido epedori ayangaun atiokisio arai mam itemonokino ejok. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc imurok luka angaleu akapanakin kanuka aokot nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Oku karakara eyi ari ako esu sa'wa eyini mva osizu risi, dika eri eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza ko ra 'ba ka eyi ma aza ko kililiru ku ria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi eyi otu sa'wa driasi e'yo eyini ecozu ari esuzu dika ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi baingi nibafeerwa eshagama omu bwire bw'okuzaara, ekirikubaasa kurugwamu oburemeezi bwanyima y'okukorwa kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho nibeteekateekyera oburemeezi bw'okwetenga eshagama endiijo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been growing concern about the ethical practices within the healthcare industry. Many individuals have reported feeling vulnerable and taken advantage of by those they trust with their well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bikolwa eby'empisa mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu. Abantu bangi bagamba nti bawulira nga bali mu bwetaavu era bakozesebwa abo be beesiga n'obulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo tye ka mede I kom tim ma beco I tenge me yot kom. Dano mapol guwaco ni giwinyo magoro dok joo ma gigeno gi aye gutiyo kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos iponesio luajokak luka angaleu. Ebakasi itunga luipu ebe epupete kesi ican ido itwasamaete kesi ngul lu emunokina kesi kanu aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu e'yo 'yeta kililiru okalamvu alata niri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi 'yo kini eyi aa e'yo ewaru ma alea dika 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma agei tema si 'diyi eyi ayu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize mirungi omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara. Abantu baingi bagambire ngu nibahurira bataine maani kandi barikukoresibwa abo abu barikwesiga.

eng_prompt: In the medical field, gender dynamics can significantly impact professional relationships. Unfortunately, instances of bias and disrespect can arise, particularly in interactions between male and female colleagues.
lug_prompt: Mu byobujjanjabi, enkyukakyuka mu kikula ky'abantu esobola okukosa ennyo enkolagana y'abakugu. Eky'omukisa omubi, embeera z'okusosola n'obutawa kitiibwa zisobola okuvaayo naddala mu nkolagana wakati w'abasajja n'abakazi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, aloka-loka ikin mon ki coo twero kelo adwoki marac i kom wat ikin lutic. Ki gum marac, tyen lok me apokapoka ki pe woro twero bedo tye, tutwalle ikin coo ki mon.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo amukian, epedorete aijulanakineta nuka ikiliok keda angor aitolitol eidicane lo itunga. Nukaiturur, epedorete iponesio luka atiakatiaka keda amamut ayongit atakanun, kacut kotoma aiswamanara kiding ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojoni ma alia, esele coza oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri eco e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea azi'ba eyi pie 'diyi oja ra. Drile onziru, e'yo opendu ni azini inzita ako ni 'diyi eco efu tuni aa'ta agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'amagara, enkora y'ekikura ky'abantu neebaasa kuhindura munonga enkoragana y'abantu. Eky'obusaasi, oburemeezi bw'okushoroora hamwe n'obutaheereza abantu ekitiinisa nibibaasa kubaho, okukira munonga omukukorengana kw'abashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: Due to limited resources and specialized medical facilities, many patients in Uganda face significant challenges in receiving adequate heart care. As a result, healthcare providers often recommend seeking treatment abroad for advanced heart conditions.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'ebifo eby'obujjanjabi eby'enjawulo, abalwadde bangi mu Uganda basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna obujjanjabi bw'omutima obumala. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo batera okuwa amagezi okufuna obujjanjabi ebweru w'eggwanga olw'endwadde z'omutima ezigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Pi nok pa lim ki odi yadi, lutwo mapol I lobo Uganda ginongo peko me nongo kony me yot kom ma mite pi cwinygi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom ipol kare giwaco dano omyero gucit ka nongo yat ilobo ma woko pi peko me two cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ikapun lu ikidioko keda aiboisio nuka amukian nu itegelikina, ejaas adekak luipu keda atiokisio nuka adumun amukian na adeka naka etau. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos duc imurok lu adekis aimuke akwapin nukokinga kanu adekasinei nu etau.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru azini arojo wura ndusi 'diyi ma kalafe were si, 'ba azoru karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini atita culuniri esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba arojo ni 'diyi le 'ba ma mu aro esu kari amve 'diyi ma alea azo culuniri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eby'obugaiga bikye hamwe n'amarwariro ag'omutaano, abarwaire baingi omu Uganda nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga obujanjabi bw'omutima oburikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho nibahabura okuragurirwa aheeru y'eihanga ahabw'embeera y'omutima eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Many hospitals prioritize patients who have a history of blood donation during emergencies. This practice helps ensure that those who contribute to the community's health receive timely care when they require it.
lug_prompt: Amalwaliro mangi gafaayo nnyo ku balwadde abalina ebyafaayo by'okugaba omusaayi mu biseera by'obwetaavu obw'amangu. Enkola eno eyamba okukakasa nti abo abakola ku by'obulamu mu kitundu bafuna obujjanjabi mu budde bwe babwetaaga.
ach_prompt: Odi yadi mapol pwonyo lutwo macon me miyo remo ikare me peko ma opoto atura. Tic man konyo me neno ni joo ma miyo kony me yot kom ki lwak ginongo kony ikare ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Adekisia nuipu isingarenitos adekak luejaasi keda akiro nukakolo nuka ainanakin aokot kotoma apakio nu engeso. Ingarakini aswamisioit na awanyun ebe ngul lu igangakitos nuka angaleu edumunenete amukian kotoma apak na ekotosi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Arojo karakara eyi asi 'ba asi 'bapi 'bo 'diyi ma ari fe sa'wa e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyisi. Yeta 'di ni fe nezu ra kini 'ba azakoma fepi e'yo rua alanisi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi aro esu sa'wa eyini eri lezu risi.
nyn_prompt: Amarwariro maingi nigakunda abarwaire abaine ebyafaayo by'okugaba eshagama omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi. Enkora egi neehwera okureeba ngu abo abarikukora ahaby'amagara g'abantu batunga obujanjabi omu bwire obu barikubwetenga.

eng_prompt: Regular blood donation is a vital practice that benefits both the donor and those in need of transfusions. It plays a crucial role in maintaining overall health and supporting community health initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okugaba omusaayi buli kaseera kya mugaso nnyo eri abo abagaba omusaayi n'abo abeetaaga okuteekebwamu omusaayi. Kikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma ebyobulamu okutwalira awamu n'okuwagira enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Miyo remo kare ki kare obedo tic ma pire tek tutwal ma konyo ngat ma miyo remo ki jo ma mito remo. Tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal I gwoko yot kom ki cwako yub me yot kom I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Ainanakin aokot duc erai ibore yen epol ajokis na imedauni ngul lu ijaikete aokot keda ngul lu ekotos aokot. Ejaasi keda aswam naepol noi naka aidar angaleu ka aigangite nuka angaleu kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ari feza sawa driasi ri eri 'yeta azi orodriru orodriru 'ba ari fepiri piyi 'ba ari esupi 'diyi pie. Eri azi okporu nga e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma tambazu azini atita fezu e'yo alata ni ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Okugaba eshagama buri kaire n'omuringo gw'omugasho ogurikugasira orikugiha n'abo abarikwetenga eshagama. Nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda amagara n'okushagika enteekateeka y'eby'amagara omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Access to safe and sufficient blood supplies is crucial for effective healthcare delivery. Establishing blood storage centres in every district would ensure timely availability of blood for emergencies and medical procedures.
lug_prompt: Okufuna omusaayi ogumala n'obukuumi kya mugaso nnyo eri obujjanjabi obulungi. Okuteekawo amaterekero g'omusaayi mu buli disitulikiti kijja kukakasa nti omusaayi gubeerawo mu budde mu mbeera ez'amangu n'enkola z'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Nongo remo maber dok ma oromo pire tek tutwal pi miyo kony me yot kom maber. Yubu ka gwoko remo I dicitrwik weng obi weko remo bedo tye ikare ki kome pi peko ma poto atura ki tic me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Adumunun aokot nu eyuara ido lu edolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian najokan. Aitolomun aiboisio nu imonoere aokot ko disitrikt kere epedori ayangaun awokot kotoma apak kanu atiokisio nu engeso keda nu amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ari esuzu kililiru azini capirisi ri eri orodriru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyini. Pari ari ta mbazu 'diyi sizu distrikiti dria eyi ma alea ri ni nga fe 'ba eyini ari esu sa'wa dria e'yo azakoma mbeleru azini e'yo arojo ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okubona eshagama nungi kandi erikumara n'eky'omugasho omu by'amagara. Okwombeka emyanya y'okuterekamu eshagama omu disiturikiti zoona, nikiija kureetaho eshagama omu bwire bwayo, ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaani n'emihanda y'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In order to improve healthcare services and ensure a steady supply of blood for transfusions, the community has recognized the need for a dedicated facility. However, the financial implications of such an initiative are significant.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obujjanjabi n'okukakasa nti omusaayi guteekebwa mu bantu buli kaseera, abantu balabye obwetaavu bw'ekifo eky'enjawulo. Kyokka, eby'ensimbi ebiva mu nteekateeka ng'eyo bikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom ki neno ni remo tye ma oromo, lwak guniang ni omyero ki yub ot yat. Kadi bed kumeno, peko me lim ma bino macalo adwogi me timo tic enoni obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar amukian ka awanyun ebe ejai aokot nu itwasamao, ejenete itunga eipud loka adukokin aiboisit ngin. Konye, epol noi atiokisio nuka ikapun nuka aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini lezu 'ba ma esu ari sa'wa driasi, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma si pari arojo ni 'diyi ci. Kani si, e'yo robia ni e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi amboru.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara n'okureeba ngu eshagama erikugyenda omu maisho, abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu bareebire ekyetengo ky'okwombeka eirwariro. Kwonka, eby'esente ebirikuruga omu nteekateeka nk'egyo n'eby'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the collaboration between cultural institutions and health organizations has become increasingly vital. This partnership has led to innovative initiatives aimed at improving public health awareness and access to services.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkolagana wakati w'ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa n'ebitongole by'ebyobulamu yeeyongedde okuba ey'omugaso. Enkolagana eno ereeseewo enteekateeka ez'obuyiiya ezigendereddwamu okutumbula okumanyisa abantu ku byobulamu n'okufuna obuweereza.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, ribbe ikin dule me tekwaro ki dule me yot kom odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Ribbe man okelo yub manyen mapat-pat ma tye ki miti me rweyo lwak i kom yot-kom ki nongo kony.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, erai aiswamanara kiding atukono nuka inonosio keda iriongeta luka angaleu ibore yenepol noi. Aimorikikina na ayau aitolomun iboro luitetiak lu ekotosi aitojokar aijen naka angaleu keda adumunun ejanakine.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ti ecita amuti suruni 'diyi ma eselea amuti alata ni 'diyi pie ri eca curu'do orodriru. Ti ecita 'di fe e'yo o'diru 'bani lezu o'bi eyini imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria azini geri eyini ecozu azakoma esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okukwatanisa ahagati y'ebitongore by'eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebitongore by'ebyamagara kweyongyeire. Enkoragana egi ereesireho enteekateeka nungi ezirikugyenderera okumanyisa abantu ahaby'amagara hamwe n'okutunga obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In many regions, access to quality healthcare remains a significant challenge. As a result, various groups are stepping in to address these gaps and enhance medical services.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina eby'enjawulo biyingiddewo okumalawo ebituli bino n'okutumbula obuweereza bw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, nongo kony me yot kom maber pud obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat tye ka donyo me tyeko peko magi ki ilo malo rwom me kony me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, eringa adumunun amukian na abeit erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, eutasi igurupun luipu alomar kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu kanu aitojokar amukian.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, geri alata muke 'diyi esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, amuti ndundu eyi fi e'yo 'di ma aza kozu azini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okutunga obujanjabi burungi, kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebitarikushushana biriyo nibireetaho oburemeezi obwo n'okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Maintaining proper blood volume is essential for overall health. Blood plays a crucial role in transporting oxygen and nutrients throughout the body.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma omuwendo gw'omusaayi omulungi kya mugaso eri obulamu okutwalira awamu. Omusaayi gukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kutambuza omukka gwa oxygen n'ebiriisa mu mubiri gwonna.
ach_prompt: Gwoko remo maber pire tek tutwal pi yot kom. Remo tiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal I cwalo yamo ayweya ki moc cam I kom dano weng.
teo_prompt: Aidar aokot ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu. Iswamai aokot aswam naepol noi kanu ayangar ekwam keda inyamat toma akwan kere.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma ari ma omgbo ma ta mbazu kililiru ri eri orodriru rua ala ni. Ari ni azi okporu ni nga oli seza oli seza omvele oxygen ru ri ojizu azini afa rua fepi 'diyi ojizu rua ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omuhendo murungi gw'eshagama n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Eshagama neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutwara omwoya gw'okwisya n'eby'okurya omu mubiri gwona.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak of infectious diseases in the area, community leaders gathered to discuss preventive measures. During the meeting, the district health officer emphasized the importance of maintaining cleanliness to safeguard public health.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuziyizaamu. Mu lukiiko, omukungu w'ebyobulamu ku disitulikiti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obuyonjo okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma kobo ikare ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo gugure me nywako tam i kom kit me gengo ne. Ikare me kacokke, latic me yot kom I district owaco ni pire tek me gwoko lengo pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adekasinei nu ikopas noi kotoma aiboisit, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itikitikere. Kotoma airiamunet, abu eswaman loka angaleu kodisitrikt kitogogong ajokis naka aidar aila kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ni e'dozu o'diru angu 'da ma alea risi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria. Mitingi 'da ma alea, azi'ba alata ni distrikiti'a ri fe okpo e'yo alata ma tambazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira omu kyanga, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura oku barikubaasa kuzibira. Omu rukiiko, orikukurira eby'amagara omu disiturikiti, akashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda obuyonjo, okurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about public sector salaries, there has been a noticeable focus on the compensation packages for high-ranking officials. This has led to comparisons between the earnings of government ministers and those of other civil servants in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku misaala mu bitongole bya gavumenti, essira libadde liteekeddwa nnyo ku nsasula y'abakungu ab'oku ntikko. Kino kiviiriddeko okugeraageranya wakati w'omusaala gwa baminisita ba gavumenti n'ogw'abakozi ba gavumenti abalala mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom mucara pa lutic pa gamente, dano mapol oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom yub me culu lutic ma rwom gi malo. Man oweko kiporo mucara pa luminicta ki pa lutic pa gamente mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos iropito luka itunga, ejai apodokinit noi nuka atacakinio naka eswamak luapolok. Eyangaunit ngin aitirian ikapun kiding iminisitan keda eswamak ice luka apugan kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo musara o'bi eyini ri ma dria, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ofezu azi'ba okporu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'di fe 'bani oya minisita gameteni 'diyi ma eselea azi'ba gameteni kari ma alia 'diyi ma eselea ri o'bizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha mishaara y'abakozi ba gavumenti, habiire hariho okuta amaani omu kushumbuusibwa kw'abakozi b'amaani. Eki kireesireho okugyeragyeranisa ahagati y'emishaara ya ba minisita ba gavumenti n'ey'abakozi ba gavumenti abandi omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In today's political landscape, motivations can vary widely among those seeking office. While some are driven by a genuine desire to make a difference, others may have more self-serving interests.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eya leero, ebisikiriza bisobola okwawukana ennyo mu abo abanoonya woofiisi. Wadde ng'abamu bakubirizibwa okwagala okwa nnamaddala okuleetawo enjawulo, abalala bayinza okuba nga beenoonyeza byabwe.
ach_prompt: I lok me cungu iwi bye me kare-ni, miti pa joo matye ka yenyo tic gi pat-pat tutwal. Kadi bed ni miti pa jo mukene tye me kelo aloka-loka, jo mukene gitye ki miti me cobo miti gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis lolo, egelegela noi aomisio nuka ngul luekotosi aibwo. Karaida ekotosi icetunga aitolomun aijulanakineta, epedorete ice aitodolikin ipudesia kec bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba pa tupi ofisi eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ava fepi 'diyi eco aa ndundu saaru. E'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni lezu e'yo ojata ejizu ra ti, 'ba azi 'diyi ma egata yi ma ngulupi ma e'yosi.
