eng_prompt: In order to ensure the well-being and prosperity of our citizens, it is essential that we prioritize our financial resources effectively. A well-structured fiscal plan can address the most pressing challenges faced by the population.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulungi n'okukulaakulana kwa bannansi baffe, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza ensimbi zaffe mu ngeri ennungi. Enteekateeka y'ebyensimbi entegeke obulungi esobola okukola ku kusoomoozebwa okw'amangu abantu kwe basanga.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kwo pa anywali wa tye maber, pire tek tutwal ni omyero waket lim ma watye kwede obed mukwongo. Yub me lim ma kiyubu maber twero cobo peko mapigi tego ma dano nongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga luka akwapuwok keda aijar najokan, ibusakinit oni aisingarenit iboro luka ikapun koipone kaloejok. Aitemonokineta nuajokak nuka ikapun epedorete aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuetereikina keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini kari anzi amavile 'diyi ma aa muke dika eyi ma zo tualu, eri orodriru amani robia amani 'diyi 'bazu okporu geri kililiru si. Otita e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria kililiru ri eco e'yo ewaru o'bi eyini esu 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abatuuragye baitu batunga amagara marungi n'obusinguzi, n'eky'omugasho ngu tuteekateekye kurungi eby'empiiha zaitu. Enteekateeka nungi y'eby'esente neebaasa kukora aha buremeezi bw'amaani obu abantu barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: Despite recent efforts to improve access to learning resources, significant disparities remain in the quality of education across different areas. As a result, many students in the northern region continue to face challenges in their academic pursuits.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'okutumbula enkola y'ebyenjigiriza gyebuvuddeko, waliwo enjawulo mu mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi bangi mu kitundu ky'obukiikakkono bakyasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitye katemo me medo rwom me nongo jami me kwan ikare-ni, apoka-poka madongo pud tye I rwom me kwan I kabedo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol I kumalo me Uganda pud gitye ka nongo peko I kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar adumunun iboro lu asioman, eringa ejaas atiakatiaka kotoma adoketait naka asioman kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, eringa esisiak luipu luko nyakoi etereikina keda atiokisio kotoma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eturisi afa onita ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, esele coza okporu ni eyi nga po'di aa angu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea 'diyi mu drile e'yo ewaru eyi esu onita eyivile ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani agarikukorwa omu by'obwegyese obwahati, hariho entaaniso y'amaani omu mitindo y'eby'obwegyese omu myanya etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi omu kicweka ky'amatemba g'eihanga bagumiizemu kutunga oburemeezi omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing protests from educators, the administration has been under pressure to address the concerns of the teaching workforce. As a result, officials have been discussing potential reforms to improve compensation for teachers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okwekalakaasa okugenda mu maaso okuva mu basomesa, abakulembeze babadde ku puleesa okukola ku kweraliikirira kw'abasomesa. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu babadde bateesa ku nnongoosereza eziyinza okukolebwa okutumbula okuliyirira abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo pa lupwonye, lutela tye ki lyeto me cobo peko pa lupwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic gubedo ka lok I kom aloka-loka ma twero bedo tye me medo cul pa lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin aidiya na elosi akonye kama ejaasi esisianakinak, ejai apedor na aitemokin atiokisio nuka esisianakinak. Kanuka ngun, eutasi eswamak aitemitem nuka aijulanakineta kanu aitojokar atacio naka isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako imba'ba eyini ri ma e'yosi, driceza sukulu niri ebi ovu okpo alea e'yo ewaru imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi e'bi agbatara gba ojata ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria imba'ba eyi ma ofeta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwesharinga kw'abeegyesa, abeebembezi batwire nibagyemeserezibwa kukora aha nshonga z'abashomesa. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru batwire nibagaaniira aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kukorwa okutunguura omushara gw'abegyesa.

eng_prompt: The government allocates a significant budget to support the operations of its legislative body. As part of this funding, various financial benefits are provided to elected officials.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti eteekawo embalirira ennene okuyambako emirimu gy'ebitongole byayo eby'amateeka. Ng'ekitundu ky'obuyambi buno, ensimbi ez'enjawulo ziweebwa abakungu abalonde.
ach_prompt: Gamente miyo byek lim madit tutwal me tyelo kor tic pa luwang lwak I ot moko cik. Macalo but lim man, kony me lim mapat-pat kimiyo ki lutic ma kiyero gi.
teo_prompt: Ijanakini apugan ebajet loepol noi kanu aigang aswam naka atukot naka ikisila. Kwape ediope kotoma apiyai nu, ijanakino ikapun luegelegela mama ejaasi eswamak lu eseunitai.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni bajeti angiri 'ba atita fezu azi amuti legiko ni 'diyi dri. Robia 'di ma azi ru, 'ba orodri robia ni ndundu 'diyi fe azi'ba 'bani ope 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti neetaho embaririra y'amaani y'okushagika emirimo y'eishengyero. Nk'emwe aha sente ezi, abakozi abaronzirwe nibaheebwa obuhwezi bw'esente butari bumwe na bumwe.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the compensation for public officials varies significantly based on their roles and responsibilities. Among these officials, judges stand out for their substantial salaries, reflecting the importance of their position in the judicial system.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, okuliyirira abakungu ba gavumenti kwawukana okusinziira ku mirimu gyabwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Mu bakungu bano, abalamuzi beeyawula ku balala olw'emisaala gyabwe eminene, ekiraga obukulu bw'ekifo kyabwe mu kitongole ekiramuzi.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, cul pa lutic pa gamente pat-pat malubbe ki ticgi. I kin lutic magi, lungol kop mapat-pat nen pi mucara gi madit tutwal, ma nyutu ber pa kabedogi I tenge me ngolo kop.
teo_prompt: Kakwapin nuipu, egelegela atacio naka eswamak luka apugan kotupitete aswam kec keda aswamukec. Kotoma eswamak kalu, itegelikina ikatubok kanu eropitikec loepol, itodunit ajokis naka adoketaitikec kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, ofeta azi'ba gameteni 'diyini ri co esele azi eyini 'ye 'diyi vusi. Azi'ba 'diyi ma eselea, ꞌba eꞌyo lipi ꞌdiyi yi ma eselea ꞌba yi ma musara ongmbo angiri ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyosi, ꞌbani eꞌdazu eꞌyo ꞌbani yi vile pari ꞌba eꞌyo lipi ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma orodri ma eꞌyosi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, okushumbuusibwa kw'abakozi ba gavumenti nikutaanira kimwe kurugirira aha mirimo yaabo n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo. Omu bakuru aba, abaramuzi nibamanywa ahabw'emishaara yaabo mingi, ekirikworeka omugasho gw'omwanya gwabo omu kitongore ekiramuzi.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, management presented a new salary proposal aimed at improving employee retention and satisfaction. However, the response from the workforce has been unexpectedly negative, raising concerns among the leadership team.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abaddukanya emirimu baayanjudde ekiteeso ky'omusaala omupya ogugendereddwamu okutumbula ensimbi z'abakozi n'obumativu bwabwe. Newankubadde, okuddamu okuva mu bakozi kubadde kubi mu ngeri etasuubirwa, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu ttiimu y'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, ludito tic gumiyo tam manyen ma lubbe ki wel mucara ma mite me weko lutic bedo ki yomcwiny. Kadi bed kumeno, lagam ma aa ki bot lutic pe obedo ber tutwal, ma okelo lworo ikin lutela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta pac, abu eyaitene kitodu aomisioit naka eropit loitetet kanu aitojokar eswamak keda aiyalama. Konye, abongokinet kama ejaasi eswamak erai ibore yen mam eomitai ebe ebuni ayangaun aiyalongong kanejaas engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, driceza 'da e'da egata musara o'diru ni 'bani lezu azi'ba eyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu azini eyini aa'zu ayikosi. Kani si, omvita engazu 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi vu ri ebi ovu e'yo onzi 'bani ega kokoru, e'yo asi otiza ejipi amuti driceza ni 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezihweireho, abarikukurira ekitongore bakooreka enteekateeka y'emishaara misya erikugyenderera okureeba ngu abakozi bagumizemu n'okumarwa. Kwonka, ebyarugiremu kuruga omu bakozi tibiratebekanisiibwe, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira omu beebembezi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve community services and attract more qualified individuals, the government has implemented a new compensation structure. As a result, local service leaders have started receiving monthly salaries from the government than before.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obuweereza mu kitundu n'okusikiriza abantu abalina ebisaanyizo, gavumenti etaddewo enkola empya ey'okuliyirira. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo batandise okufuna emisaala okuva mu gavumenti buli mwezi okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony ki lwak ki me kelo joo matye ki ngec, gamente okatti ki yoo manyen me culu dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero gucako nongo mucara ki bot gamente dwe ki dwe.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar ejanakine lo itunga ka aisukunyun itunga lu itutuoritai, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka atacakinio. Kanuka ngun, ageutu engarenok luka eswamak luka atutubet adumun eropit kangolilap kanejai apugan adepar sek.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azakoma ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu dika 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi ejizu, gamete 'ba geri o'diru 'bani 'ba eyi ofezu ri 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba azi ngapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do musara esu engazu gamete vu imba alu alu vusi aga oku driorisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obuheereza omu bantu n'okushendashenda abantu abaine ebirikwetengwa, gavumenti eteireho enkora ensya y'okurihirira abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ebyaro batandikire kutunga emishaara kuruga omu Gavumenti buri kwezi.

eng_prompt: Many citizens feel disconnected from their government, leading to questions about accountability and representation. This growing sentiment has sparked discussions about the relationship between elected officials and their constituents.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi bawulira nga tebakyalina kakwate na gavumenti yaabwe, ekireetera okubuusabuusa ku buvunaanyizibwa n'okukiikirirwa. Endowooza eno egenda yeeyongera ereeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkolagana wakati w'abakulembeze abalonde n'abalonzi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Anywali mapol giwinyo calo gipe ki kubbe ki gamente gi, man kelo lapeny i kom kor tic ki luwang gi. Cwiny man ma tye ka dongo okelo nywako lok I kom wat ikin lutela ma kiyero gi ki lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Eomitos itunga luipu ebe emamei arucokina keda apuganikec, eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda abwoikinitokokec. Apotu aomisio nu eyangautu ipegeta nuikamunitos eidicane loejai kiding eswamak lu eseunitai keda itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi ega eyi ecipi gamete eyivile 'diyi pie ku, e'yo 'di fe eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu e'yo eyi ma dria azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ma dria. Egata 'di ma omgbo ni tu ri fe agbatara eyi e'do aa'ta 'ba opeta eyi 'be 'diyi ma eselea 'ba angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi nibahurira batarikukwatanisa na gavumenti yaabo, ekirikubareetera kwebuuza aha nshonga n'okujwekyerwa. Enteekateeka egi eyeyongyeire, ereesireho okuhanuura aha nkoragana y'abantu abaronzirwe n'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the education system faces numerous challenges, including inadequate funding and support for educators. As a result, many professionals in the teaching sector struggle with low salaries and limited resources.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enkola y'ebyenjigiriza eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi omuli ebbula ly'ensimbi n'obuyambi eri abasomesa. N'ekivuddemu, abakugu bangi mu by'obusomesa balwanagana n'emisaala emitono n'ebikozesebwa ebitono.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, yub me kwan tye ki peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo nok pa lim ki kony ma mite pi lupwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro mapol i tenge me pwony gitye ka lweny ki mucara matidi ki lim ma nok.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaas erionget loka asioman keda atiokisio nuipu, aimoriarit amamus na ikapun ka agangat na isisianakinak. Kanuka ngun, ipirioitin luipu lu isisianakinak itereikina keda eropit lo ikidioko keda iboro lu ikidioko.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo onita ni 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi be, eyi ma azi eyi robia esuzu azini atita fezu imba'ba eyidri ri ma ako. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba karakara esele imba'ba eyini ri ma alea 'diyi dri ci oya were si azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe were si.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, eby'obwegyese biine oburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu obuhwezi bw'esente n'obuhwezi bw'abeegyesa obutarikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu baingi omu by'obwegyesa nibarwanagana n'emishaara mikye hamwe n'ebintu bikye.

eng_prompt: The telecommunications industry in Uganda has seen significant growth over the past decade. As a result, various firms have emerged to meet the increasing demand for mobile and internet services.
lug_prompt: Ebyempuliziganya mu Uganda byeyongedde nnyo mu myaka ekkumi egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, kkampuni ez'enjawulo zivuddeyo okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera obw'empeereza y'amasimu ne yintaneeti.
ach_prompt: Tenge me cim I lobo Uganda odongo tutwal I mwaki apar ma okato angec. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat okati me cobo miti me tic ki cim ki intanet matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi erionget loka isimun ko Uganda kotoma ikar itomon luatuboros. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikampunin luegelegela kolomutu kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo isimun keda elago.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu e'yo oyuza ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri esu zota okporu eli agapi mudri 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu ndundu efu e'yo lezu 'ba eyini afa ayule simu si azini oli internet ni 'diyi ma ayuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'empurizagana omu Uganda bitunguukire munonga omu myaka ikumi ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi zitandikireho kukora aha byetaago by'empurizagana aha simu hamwe na intaneeti.

eng_prompt: Consumers often find it challenging to choose the right telecommunications provider. Price comparisons reveal significant disparities in calling rates among different companies.
lug_prompt: Abaguzi batera okukisanga nga kizibu okulonda kkampuni y'ebyempuliziganya entuufu. Okugeraageranya emiwendo kulaga enjawulo mu miwendo gy'amasimu mu kkampuni ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Luwil ipol kare ginongo tek tutwal me yero dul ma miyo kony me cim maber. Pimo wel nyutu apoka-poka madit tutwal I wel cul me goyo cim I kin dul cim mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit duc agwelak aseun ekampuni loajokan loka isimun. Aitirian itiaisinei itodunit atiaketait naepol noi naka itiaisinei luka ainom esimu kama ejaasi ikampunin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Aje'ba eyi eri esu ewaru sa'wa driasi amuti e'yo oyuza ni kililiru 'diyi opezu. Aje eyi ma o'bizu ri ece e'yo esele coza okporu aje simu gbaza ni 'diyi ma alea amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi nibakira kushanga oburemeezi omu kutoorana ekitongore ky'empurizagana ekihikire. Okugyeragyeranisa emihendo, nikyoreka entaaniso y'amaani omu mihendo y'okuteera esimu omu kampuni ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote tourism and showcase its beautiful landscapes, Uganda welcomed participants from around the world. The event attracted both amateur and professional golfers, eager to compete in a stunning setting.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'obulambuzi n'okulaga ebifo byayo ebirabika obulungi, Uganda yayaniriza abantu okuva mu nsi yonna. Omukolo gwasikiriza abazannyi ba ggoofu abakugu n'abatali bakugu, nga beesunga okuvuganya mu bifo ebyewuunyisa.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tic me limo piny ki nyuto kabedo mamwonya tutwal, Uganda ojolo dano ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat. Yub eni okelo lutuku golf ma pe gubedo ludiro ki ludiro, ma cwinygi obedo yom me pyem I kabedo mamwonya tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor ewai lo elatok ka aitodiar aiboisio ke nuibusiak, abu Uganda ijau itunga luka akwap kere. Abu epucit ngol ingalau aboliak luka egolf luemamete keda lu epirioitin, lu ekotosi abolobol kotoma aiboisio nuibusiak noi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo mile otizaniri ma omgbo otuzu azini angu ndrizaru 'diyi e'dazu, Uganda a'i 'ba engapi wudrikuru ma kalasi dria 'diyi ra. Yeta nderi eji 'ba avita golf avipi avasi 'diyi tualu 'ba avita golf avipi 'diyi pie avasi a'bala 'yezu angu ndrizaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi n'okworeka oburungi bwabyo, Uganda ekeakiira abantu kuruga omunsi yoona. Omukoro gukareetaho abazaani ba gorufu abatendekirwe n'abatendekirwe, abaabaire baine ekihika ky'okuzaana omu mwanya murungi munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite its global popularity, many sports in Uganda tend to overshadow golf. As a result, the sport struggles to attract a significant following among the local population.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kimanyiddwa mu nsi yonna, emizannyo mingi mu Uganda gitera okubuutikira goofu. N'ekivuddemu, omuzannyo gufuba okusikiriza abagoberezi abangi mu bantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni oywek tutwal I wilobo lung, tuku mapol I lobo Uganda tye ki miti me loyo tuko golf. Macalo adwogi ne, tuku ne tye ka tute matek me nongo dano mapol I kin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejenara noi kotoma akwap kere, aboliasio nuipu ko Uganda ejenasi noi adepar abolia naka golf. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi abolia ngin adumun atupitok luipu kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu 'ba ru wudrikurusi dria ra ti, avita karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi tuni avita golf niri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, avita 'di ni dri ci 'ba eyi esuzu 'ba angu ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okumanywa kwayo omunsi yoona, emizaano mingi omu Uganda neekira kureebeka nka gorufu. N'ekyarugiremu,omuzaano nigurwana kutunga abakurasi baingi omu bantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: I'm curious about the scoring system used in this game. Can you explain how the points are calculated?
lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya engeri gye bateebamu obubonero mu muzannyo guno.
ach_prompt: Atye ki miti madit tutwal me ngeyo kit ma kitingo kwede golo I tuko man.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun eipone lo itwasamaere igolon kotoma abolia kana.
lgg_prompt: Ma ava be geri 'bani ecozu golo eyi osuzu avita 'di ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekihika ky'okumanya enkora y'okuteeba obubonero omu muzaano ogu.

eng_prompt: In competitive athletics, the ultimate goal is to outperform your opponents. Achieving victory often hinges on your ability to accumulate more points than anyone else.
lug_prompt: Mu misinde egy'okuvuganya, ekigendererwa ekikulu kwe kuwangula abo b'ovuganya nabo. Okutuuka ku buwanguzi kitera kwesigama ku busobozi bwo okukung'aanya obubonero bungi okusinga abalala.
ach_prompt: I pyem ngwec, miti madit en aye me loyo jo ma itye ka pyem kwedgi. Nongo loc ipol kare jenge I kom kero ni me nongo points madwong loyo ngat mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka akerit, alosikinet erai aitelekaar lu itepegit ijo. Aitodolikin aipikor itodunit ebe ipedori jo adumun apointan nuipu adepar luce.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ongu nzuzaniri ma alia, asisile asizuri 'ba mini baka sezu 'diyi agazu. E'yo agazu ri ma esuta ni tutuni aa e'yo mini ecozu point eyi trazu angiri ndeni aga 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In any competitive sport, individual talent often shines through as a key factor in determining the outcome. When the stakes are high, the performance of standout athletes can make all the difference.
lug_prompt: Mu muzannyo gwonna ogw'okuvuganya, ekitone ky'omuntu bulijjo kyeyoleka ng'ensonga enkulu mu kusalawo ebivaamu. Emikutu bwe giba waggulu, omutindo gw'abazannyi ab'enjawulo gusobola okuleetawo enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I pyem tuku mo keken, diro pa ngat acel acel ipol kare nen calo gin ma pire tek ma moko adwogi ne. Ka jami tye mapigi tego, kit ma lungwec ma oywek timo kwede twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia adio na abolobol, etala lo itunganan nes erai ibore yenepol noi naepedori aitodolikin akiro nuelomunete. Arai ejai iboro luipu, epedori eswamae loka akerak luitegelikina ayangaun atiaketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Avita dria baka seza ni ma alia, feta Munguni fe 'ba alu alu eyidri ri ni e'da e'yo okporu e'yo efupi 'diyi ma alea ri ru. E'yo ewaru ka ovu uru, 'yeta 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi niri eco ojata eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu muzaano gwona ogw'okuhayahayana, etaraanta y'omuntu, niyo erikukira kureebeka nk'enshonga nkuru erikureetaho ebirugyemu. Emikutu yaaba eri ahaiguru, enkora y'abairuki ab'omutaano neebaasa kureetaho entaaniso.

eng_prompt: In the world of sports, various competitions cater to different athletes and their skills. Among these, golf tournaments stand out as a premier platform for showcasing the talents of dedicated golf players.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyemizannyo, empaka ez'enjawulo zikwata ku bannabyamizannyo ab'enjawulo n'obukugu bwabwe. Mu bino byonna, empaka za goofu ziraga ebitone by'abazannyi ba goofu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me tuku, pyem mapat-pat tye pi lungwec mapat-pat ki diro gi. I kin magi, pyem tuku golf tye macalo yoo maber me nyuto mot pa lutuku golf.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka aboliasio, ejaas abolobol naka akerak luegelegela keda acoasineikec. Kotoma ngul, ejenete abolobol naka egolf kwape epone loajokan noi loka aitodiar atalantan nuka aboliak egolf.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru avita niri ma alea, a'bala ndundu eyi 'ba ongu onzu'ba ndundu 'diyi pie. Diyi ma eselea, avita golfni 'diyi e'da kililiru ekile pari onyiru 'bani feta Munguni fe 'ba avita golfni avipi 'diyini 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'eby'emizaano, empaka z'emizaano ezitarikushushana nizitwariramu abairuki b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe n'emwe hamwe n'emyoga yaabo. Omuri ebi,empaka za gorufu nizimanywa nk'omuringo murungi gw'okworeka emyoga y'abazaani ba gorufu.

eng_prompt: Despite its popularity in many countries, golf has a unique presence in Uganda's sporting landscape. The country boasts a few well-maintained courses that attract both local enthusiasts and international visitors.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kya ttutumu mu nsi nnyingi, omuzannyo gwa goofu gwa njawulo nnyo ku mizannyo emirala mu Uganda. Eggwanga lyewaana olw'ebisaawe ebitonotono ebirabirirwa obulungi ebisikiriza abaagazi b'ebitundu n'abagenyi abava ebweru w'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tuko golf oywek tutwal I lobe mapol, en tye tuku ma kite dok pat tutwal I lobo Uganda. Lobo man tye ki bar tuku ma kiyubu maber ma kelo miti pa lutedero ki wele ma aa ki lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejenara noi kotoma akwapin nuipu, epol noi abolia naka golf koUganda. Ejaasi akwap keda ikoosin idis lu idaritai ejok lu ingalaunete itunga luka atutubet keda ipejok luka akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu e'dazaru kari karakara eyi ma alea ra ti, avita golf niri ma wura kari Uganda niri ma alea ri nduni. Kari 'di ma alia pari avita ni 'bani ta mba kililiru 'diyi ma kalafe were yi 'ba lepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ejipi tualu omu engapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okumanywa kw'omupiira gwa gorufu omu mahanga maingi, nigwo muzaano gw'omutaano omu Uganda. Eihanga riine koosi nkye ezirikureebererwa kurungi ezirikureetaho abagyenzi b'omunda hamwe n'ab'aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to attract new players and retain existing ones, the golf industry is exploring innovative strategies. Recognizing the challenges facing the sport, golf leaders are committed to revitalizing interest and participation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okusikiriza abazannyi abapya n'okusigaza abo abaliwo, amakolero ga goofu ganoonyereza ku bukodyo obuyiiya. Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa omuzannyo gwa goofu kwe gusanga, abakulembeze beewaddeyo okuzzaawo obwagazi n'okwetabamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo lutuku manyen ki weko lutuku matye, dul tuku me golf tye ka yenyo yoo manyen. Pien gingeyo peko ma tuku golf tye ka kato ki iye, lutela tye ki miti me roco miti ki bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aitelekaar aboliak luitetiak kosodete aidar ngul lu ejaas, euta erionget loka golf aingic iwaitin luitetiak. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas abolia ngin, ekapakina engarenok luka golf aisiteteun eipud keda ajaikina.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba avitani o'diru 'diyi ejizu azini 'ba aa'pi 'bo 'diyi ma ta mbazu, okalamvu avita golf niri ni geri o'diru 'diyi onda. E'yo ewaru avita golf niri ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba golf ni 'diyi owi eyi e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeta abazaani abasya n'okusigaza abariho, ab'eby'omupiira gwa gorufu bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutandikaho emizaano misya. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburi omu muzaano gwa gorufu, abebembezi beehayo kugarura busya ekyetengo n'okwejumbamu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote physical activity and teamwork, local community centers have launched a new sports initiative. As part of this program, youths are being trained to play golf.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyemizannyo n'okukolera awamu, ebitundu bitongozza enteekateeka empya ey'ebyemizannyo. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, abavubuka batendekebwa okuzannya goofu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yub me rweyo lee ki tic kacel, dule me tedero gucako yub manyen me tuku. Macalo but yub man, kitye ka pwonyo bulu me tuku golf.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aswamisio nuka akwan keda aswam nepepe, etegeasi atutubena nuka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aboliasio. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, itutuonoro atumunak abolia egolf.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'yeta rua ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu azi ngazu tualu, angu ongulumu eyini 'diyi e'do e'yo avita ni o'diru ni eyi. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba ode yi imba avita golfniri avizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'emizaano hamwe n'okukorera hamwe, ebitongore by'ebyaro bitandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'eby'emizaano. Nk'emwe aha puroguraamu egi, eminyeeto neetendekwa okuzaana gorufu.

eng_prompt: While football is often considered the most popular sport in many countries, it is important to recognize the diversity of athletic competitions available. From basketball to soccer, various sports capture the interest of fans around the world.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omupiira gw'ebigere gutwalibwa nga omuzannyo ogusinga okwettanirwa mu nsi nnyingi, kyamugaso okumanya empaka z'emizannyo ez'enjawulo eziriwo. Okuva ku basketball okutuuka ku mupiira, emizannyo egy'enjawulo gikwata obwagazi bw'abawagizi okwetooloola ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tuku odilo ipol kare kineno calo tuku ma oywek loyo i lobe mapol, pire tek tutwal me niang pyem mapat-pat matye. Nicake ki tuko basketball me oo I tuko odilo, tuku mapat-pat tye ki miti pa lucwak I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Karaida eyangaritai emopira kwape abolia naetapit kakere kotoma akwapin nuipu, epolok noi ajenun abolobol naka akerit naegelegela. Anyoun kotoma abolia naka emopira loka akan kitoni abolia naka emopira, ejaasi aboliasio nuipu nueminasi amaak kotoma akwap kere.

E'dozu basketball vurisi kpere mupira tuza vurisi, avita ndundu eyi 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma ava eji wudrikuru ma alea ndulu.

eng_prompt: In every competition, participants strive for victory, showcasing their skills and determination. As the tournament progresses, the stakes rise, and the excitement builds among the teams and their supporters.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kuvuganya, abeetabamu bafuba okuwangula, nga balaga obukugu bwabwe n'obumalirivu. Empaka bwe zigenda mu maaso, emigabo girinnya, n'okusanyuka kweyongera mu ttiimu n'abawagizi baazo.

eng_prompt: Excitement is building as the annual golf tournament approaches. Organizers are finalizing the details to ensure a successful event.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing emphasis on initiatives that empower the younger generation. As a result, many organizations are focusing their efforts on programs designed specifically for youth engagement and development.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okussa essira ku nteekateeka ezitumbula abavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole bingi bitadde amaanyi gaabyo ku pulogulaamu ezikoleddwa okusikiriza abavubuka n'okubakulaakulanya.

teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai apodokinit naepol noi nuka aitogogong atumunak. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iriongeta luipu aibwaikin agogongu kec toma ainapeta nuitemonokinitai kanu aitopoloun atumunak.

eng_prompt: The economic challenges facing the country have led to a significant rise in joblessness among young people. As a result, many graduates are struggling to find suitable employment opportunities.

ach_prompt: Peko me can lim ma lobo man tye ka kato ki iye oweko rwom me bedo labongo tic I kin bulu omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol ma otyeko kwangi gitye ka yele me nongo tic maber.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia kari ni esu 'diyi fe 'ba ode eyi ma eselea azi ako ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara onita univasiti niri depi 'bo 'diyi dri ci drileba azi esuzu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.

eng_prompt: Aquaculture has become an increasingly popular method for producing seafood to meet global demand. One of the key practices within this industry is fish farming, which involves the controlled cultivation of fish.
lug_prompt: Okulunda mu mazzi kweyongedde okuba enkola emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okufulumya emmere y'omu nnyanja okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'ensi yonna. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa mu mulimu guno kwe kulunda ebyennyanja.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lee i pii dong odoko yoo ma oywek tutwal me yubu cam me nam me cobo miti me wilobo. Tic acel ma pire tek I tenge me pur man obedo gwoko rec, ma man kwako gwoko rec maber.

nyn_prompt: Okuriisa ebyokurya by'omu maizi, nikyeyongyera kuba omuringo murungi gw'okuriisa ebyokurya by'omu maizi, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'ensi yoona. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikukorwa omu kitongore eki n'okuriisa ebyenyanja, ekirikutwariramu okuriisa ebyenyanja omu muringo ogurikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Aquaculture has become an increasingly popular method of food production in recent years. Many farmers are turning to fish farming as a sustainable way to meet the growing demand for seafood.
lug_prompt: Okulunda amazzi kufuuse enkola emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okufulumya emmere mu myaka egiyise. Abalimi bangi baddukira mu kulunda ebyennyanja ng'engeri ey'obutebenkevu okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'ebyennyanja obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lee i pii odoko yoo ma oywek tutwal me yubu cam I mwaki ma okato ni. Lupur mapol tye ka cako gwoko rec macalo yoo me cobo miti me cam me nam matye kamede.

lgg_prompt: E'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eca curu'do geri 'bani nyaka ofuzuri eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi curu'do e'do e'bi ezo geri azi ecopi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea ra ni ru ecozu e'yo 'bani lezu e'bi eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: Many individuals and communities seek ways to improve their financial stability. One effective approach is to invest in income-generating projects.
lug_prompt: Abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu bingi banoonya engeri y'okutumbula embeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi. Engeri emu ennungi kwe kuteeka ssente mu pulojekiti ezivaamu ensimbi.

teo_prompt: Itunga luipu keda atutubena luipu emoete iwaitin lu itojokarere ejautene kec loka ikapun. Epone ediope lo iswamai ejok ngesi aipikakin ikapun toma opurojektin lu itolomete ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi azini ongulumu karakara eyi geri nda eyini ecozu eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi alu muke ndeni ri eri lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu otita robia ejipi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi hamwe n'ebyanga nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura entatsya yaabo. Omuringo gumwe murungi n'okuta esente omu purogyekiti ezirikureeta entaasya.

eng_prompt: As I reflect on the wisdom shared by those who have lived long lives, I can't help but wonder about their journeys. It’s fascinating to think about the experiences that shaped them into the elders they are today.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nfumiitiriza ku magezi agagabanyizibwako abo abawangaala, sisobola butalowooza ku lugendo lwabwe. Kinyuma nnyo okulowooza ku bye bayitamu ebyabaleetera okuba abantu abakulu be bali leero.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom ryeko pa jo ma gukwo pi kare malac, pe atwero weko tamo I kom wotgi. Tye me yom cwiny tutwal me tamo I kom jami ma gukato iye ma oweko gudoko ludito ma gitye I kare-ni.

lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu ondua 'ba aa'pi idriru sa'wa ezu 'diyini awale 'diyi ma dria, ma econi e'yo ega e'yo aci yini 'diyi ma dria ku. Eri ndrizaru e'yo egazu e'yo ndundu eyini esu 'diyi ma dria eyini ani ecazu 'ba 'wara eyini aa'zu andru 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ninteekateeka aha bwengye oburikugabwa abo ababaireho obwire buraingwa, tindikubaasa kureka kwebuuza aha ngyendo zaabo. Nikishemeza munonga kuteekateeka aha bintu ebibararabiremu ebyabahindwire abantu abakuru abu bari eriizooba.

eng_prompt: As we prepare for the upcoming community program, it's important to clarify the target demographic. Specifically, we need to determine the age range for the youths.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera pulogulaamu y'ekitundu ejja, kya mugaso okutangaaza ku bantu be tugenderera. Okusingira ddala, twetaaga okuzuula emyaka gy'abavubuka.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yubbe pi yub me kabedo matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me niang wel dano ma omyero wabed kwede. Omyero waniang mwaka pa bulu.

eng_prompt: Before starting any business venture in Uganda, it is essential to understand the legal requirements involved. Among these requirements, obtaining the necessary permits and licenses is crucial for compliance with local regulations.

lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, omulimu gw'emikutu gy'amawulire gweyongedde okuba omukulu mu kubumba endowooza y'abantu n'okubunyisa okumanya. nyn_prompt: Omu by'amahurire, okwetegyereza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'amahurire n'eky'omugasho munonga. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru ekirikukira kureebeka n'okutaana ahagati y'ebiteekateeko hamwe n'amakuru agatahikire.

eng_prompt: The management team has been reviewing our compliance protocols, and they decided it was time for a thorough evaluation. As a result, we have an internal audit this week.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abakulembeze ebadde yeekenneenya emitendera gyaffe egy'okugoberera, era baasazeewo nti kye kiseera okwekenneenya obulungi. N'ekyavaamu, tulina okubalirira okw'omunda wiiki eno.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma watye ka lubu kwede cik, dok gumoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ki kwed me ngiyo kor tic ki lim I dul enoni I cabit eni.
teo_prompt: Auta etimu lo eyait airereonor ainapeta wok, kosodete kesi aitemokin ebe erai kwana apak naka airereonor ejok. Kanuka ngun, ija oni keda aingic naka ikapun osabiti lo.
lgg_prompt: Amuti driceza niri ebi geri amani azi ngazu 'diyi ma ale andri dika eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca e'yo 'di ma ale andrizu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, ama vu e'yo ama vile robia otizaniri sabiti 'disi ci.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abebembezi etwire neeshwijuma engyenderwaho yaitu, kandi bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okushwijuma gye. N'ekyarugiremu, twine okubara ebitabo byaitu omunda esande egi.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with secrets and hidden agendas, the truth often lies buried beneath layers of deception. As inquiries unfold, they reveal the hidden actions and motives that have long been concealed from public view.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebyama n'ebigendererwa ebikusike, amazima gatera okuziikibwa wansi w'ebisenge by'obulimba. Okunoonyereza bwe kugenda mu maaso, kulaga ebikolwa ebyekusifu n'ebigendererwa ebimaze ebbanga nga bikwekeddwa abantu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki mung kacel ki miti ma pe nen, lok ada ipol kare nongo ki yiko woko I te lok goba mapol. Ka kwed tye kawot anyim, ginyutu tim ki miti ma obedo ka kanne pi kare malac ki bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda akiro nuka aiyeyea keda akiro nu engopitai, etapit duc abeit aipikakin toma akiro nuka aisab. Kwape elosi aingic, itodunitos kesi aswamisio nu engopitos keda apeleikinata nuejaasi keda apak naepol noi nuka aingop kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia e'yo ozizaru azini e'yo ozizaru 'diyi pie tre, e'yo ada 'diyi sa'wa driasi e'yo enzoru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo vuti ondaza ni muzu drile, eyi e'da e'yo 'bani 'ye sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma dria o'bi eyini ndrezu ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebihama hamwe n'ebigyendererwa ebisherekirwe, amazima nigakira kuziikwa ahansi y'ebishobobo. Okucondooza kurikugyenda omu maisho, nikushoboorora ebikorwa n'ebigyendererwa ebyabaire byesherekirwe abantu.

eng_prompt: In any situation involving accusations, it's essential to approach the claims with an open mind. The truth often lies hidden beneath layers of perception and bias.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna erimu okulumiriza, kya mugaso okusemberera ebyogerebwa n'ebirowoozo ebiggule. Amazima gatera okukwekebwa wansi w'endowooza n'obusosoze.
ach_prompt: I lok mo keken matye ki adot, pire tek tutwal me neno adot ne ki tam matye ayaba. Lok ada ipol kare kanne I ngee tam mapat-pat ma dano tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene ediokere loimoriarit aitoroneta, ejokuna aitodolikin aitoroneta ngun keda aomisio nuepukora. Etapit duc abeit aingop kotoma aomisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ci e'yo 'bani tozu 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'da eyi 'yezu omi ngmboru si. E'yo ada eyi sa'wa driasi eyi ozi e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera yoona erikutwariramu okwetomboitwa, nikikuru okukoresa ebiteekateeko birungi. Amazima buriijo nigeesherekwa ahansi y'ebiteekateeko n'okushoroora.

eng_prompt: In the pursuit of truth and accuracy, it is essential for journalists to maintain objectivity in their reporting. This principle ensures that the information presented is fair and unbiased, allowing the audience to form their own opinions.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya amazima n'obutuufu, kyetaagisa bannamawulire okukuuma obutuufu mu mawulire gaabwe. Omusingi guno gukakasa nti amawulire agalagibwa ga bwenkanya ate nga tegaliimu kyekubiira, okusobozesa abalabi okwekolera ebirowoozo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I yenyo lok ada ki lok ada, pire tek tutwal ki lucoo lok angea me bedo ki ada I lok gi. Cik man neno ni ngec ma kimiyo tye atir labongo apoka-poka, weko luwiny bedo ki tam gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo abeit ka abeit, ejokuna arotak iyemuto ajaut keda akiro nuka abeit kotoma aikam iyemuto kec. Itodunit ainapeta ngun ebe ejokuna akiro nu itodiaritai, ijaikini itunga aitolomun aomisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada ma vuti obiza ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba osisia ni 'diyi ni e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu geri kililiru si. E'yo 'di ni fe kililiru kini o'duko eceza 'diyi kililiru azini opendu kokoru, erini fezu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri egata yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda amazima n'obuhikire, ni kikuru abanyamahurire kuguma baine ekigyendererwa omu kukora amahurire gaabo. Omusingye ogu nigureebeka ngu amakuru agarikugambwaho gaine oburingaaniza, ekirikwikiriza abantu kukora ebiteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent allegations and growing public concern, it is imperative that law enforcement agencies uphold their integrity. Ensuring accountability within the ranks is essential for restoring trust in the system.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigambibwa gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, kyetaagisa nnyo ebitongole ebikuumaddembe okukuuma obwesimbu bwabyo. Okukakasa embalirira mu nnyiriri kya mugaso okuzzaawo obwesige mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki adot matye cokcok-ki ki lworo madit ma lwak tye kwede, pire tek tutwal ni dul ma gwoko cik myero ogwok ber bedo gi. Neno ni lutic ma rwom gi malo gimiyo kor tic gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dwoko gen i kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aitoroneta nuka pac keda aiyalongong naka itunga, ejokuna noi aiboisio nu ikisila aidar aiyuunikec. Aitijenar eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ainyakun amunokina mama ejaasi apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini asi otiza o'bi eyini tupi 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma mba eyi ma adriza kililiru ri ma ta mbazu. Eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo ecezu ꞌba ambo ꞌdiyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru asi ꞌbazu geri ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha bigambibwa ebyahwireho hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abantu okweyongyeire, niky'omugasho ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro kurinda oburingaaniza bwabyo. Okureeba ngu hariho embaririra n'eky'omugasho omukugaruraho obwesigye omu nkora y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: It's important to handle financial transactions with care and integrity. Mismanaging funds can lead to serious consequences.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okukola ku nsonga z'ensimbi n'obwegendereza n'obwesimbu. Okukozesa obubi ensimbi kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me timo biacara me lim I yoo maber. Tic ki lim I yoo marac twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar iboro lu ikapun koipone kalo ejok. Amamus aitwasam ikapun ejok epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezu geri kililiru si. Robia ayuza geri onzi si ri eco e'yo onzi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okukoresa gye esente n'obwegyendesereza. Okukoresa kubi esente nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Infrastructure development is a key priority for local governments. As a result, funding for transportation projects is essential to maintain and improve road conditions.
lug_prompt: Okukulaakulanya ebintu ebikozesebwa kya nkizo nnyo eri gavumenti z'ebitundu. N'ekyavaamu, okuvujjirira pulojekiti z'ebyentambula kya mugaso mu kulabirira n'okutumbula embeera y'enguudo.
ach_prompt: Dongo jami ma mite pi gamente me tedero obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, miyo cente pi yub me wot pire tek tutwal me gwoko ki yubu rwom me gudu.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aiboisio erai ibore yenepol noi lo ebeit apugan naka atutubena aiyait. Kanuka ngun, ejai agangat na ikapun kanu ipurojektin lu elose kanu aidar ka aitojokar irotin.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezota eri e'yo okporu gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, robia feza otita acipa ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru geri nzila eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma tambazu azini otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura ebyombeko n'ekintu kikuru munonga omu gavumenti z'ebyanga. N'ekyarugiremu,okushashurira purogyekiti z'eby'engyenda n'eky'omugasho omukureeberera n'okutunguura omutindo gw'enguuto.

eng_prompt: As I was researching the financial oversight in Uganda, I came across various government positions that play crucial roles in ensuring accountability. One key figure in this process is the auditor general, who oversees the auditing of public accounts.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nnoonyereza ku ngeri y'okulabiriramu eby'ensimbi mu Uganda, nnasanga ebifo bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo ebikola omulimu omukulu mu kukakasa embalirira. Omuntu omu omukulu mu nkola eno ye mubalirizi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti, alabirira okubalirirwa kw'ebitabo bya gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka kwedo kit ma ki doro kwede lok kom lim I lobo Uganda, anongo kabedo mapat-pat pa gamente matye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng tye ki kor tic gi. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo auditor general, ma doro tic me ngiyo kor tic ki lim pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic ewai lo ikapun ko Uganda, abu eong adum aiboisio nuipu nuka apugan nu iswamaete nuepolok noi kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Idiopetunganan yenepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi auditor general, loeyait aanyanario naka ikapun luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo vuti ondazu e'yo robia ma pamvu onezu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma dria, ma esu pari karakara gamete ni 'diyi azi okporu 'yepi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi. Ba azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri auditor general ni e'yo 'bani robia o'bi eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu ri ma pamvu one ni.
nyn_prompt: Obu naabaire nincondooza ahaby'esente omu Uganda, nkashanga emirimo ya gavumenti etari emwe n'emwe erikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeba ngu habaho embaririra. Omwe aha bantu abakuru omu nkora egi n'omubazi w'ebitabo omukuru, orikureeberera okubara ebitabo bya gavumenti.

eng_prompt: To maintain public trust and ensure effective governance, it is essential for government units to uphold transparency and accountability. This commitment extends to actively addressing and combating corruption within their ranks.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu n'okulaba nti waliwo obukulembeze obulungi, kyetaagisa ebitongole bya gavumenti okukuuma obwerufu n'embalirira. Okwewaayo kuno kuzingiramu okukola ennyo n'okulwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi mu nnyiriri zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko gen pa lwak ki tela maber, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dul mapat-pat pa gamente me bedo ki ada ki tic ki kor tic gi. Cikke man kwako tic matek me lweny i kom camcana matye ikin luticgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar amunokina naka itunga ka aanyun ebe ejai epugae loajokan, ejokuna aiboisio nuka apugan aitogogong nuka aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Apodokinit ngin aitemokin ka aitiji amidicio naka apiyai kotoma orotin kec.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma asi'baza ma ta mbazu azini driceza kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru amuti gamete ni 'diyi ma ovu e'yo ada be azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Asi feza 'di ma azi nga e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma aza kozu azini a'di 'dizu eyi ma eselea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okukuuma obwesigye bw'abantu n'obwebembezi burungi, ni kikuru ebitongore bya gavumenti okugira amazima n'embaririra. Okwehayo oku nikutwariramu okukora n'amaani omu kurwanisa obushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: Ensuring fair compensation is essential for maintaining a motivated and productive workforce. Timely payment reinforces the value of employees' contributions to the organization.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okuliyirira okw'obwenkanya kya mugaso mu kukuuma abakozi abakubirizibwa era abakola obulungi. Okusasulwa mu budde kunyweza omuwendo gw'obuyambi bw'abakozi eri ekitongole.
ach_prompt: Neno ni kiculu lutic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me weko lutic bedo ki miti dok gitiyo maber. Culu mucara ikare ki kome medo rwom me jami ma lutic miyo bot dul ne.
teo_prompt: Ainanakin ikapun luedolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar eswamak lu iswamaete ejok. Etacio kotoma apak iyatakini ajokis naka agangat na eswamak nejai erionget.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani 'ba eyi ofezu kililiru ri eri orodriru azi'ba eyini aa'zu ava be azini azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma tambazu. Ofeta sa'wa dria ri ni orodri azi'ba eyini fe amuti 'da ni ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abakozi bashashurwa omu muringo oguhikire n'eky'omugasho omukureeba ngu abakozi bagumizamu n'emirimo yaabo. Okushashurwa omu bwire nikyongyera omugasho gw'ebintu ebi abakozi bahaireyo omu kitongore.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies play a crucial role in maintaining public trust and integrity within society. By investigating and addressing unethical practices, they contribute to a more transparent and accountable system.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obwesige n'obutebenkevu mu bantu. Nga banoonyereza n'okukola ku bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa, bongera ku bwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko gen ki ber bedo pa lwak. I yoo me kwedo ki tyeko tim ma pe ber, gikonyo me neno ni jami weng tye atir.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu ikisila iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aidar amunokina keda ailajara naka itunga kotoma atutubet. Kowai lo aingic ka aitemokin iboro lumam iswamao ejok, ingarakinete kesi aitodolikin eswamae lo ecai.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi okporu nga asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea. Geri 'bani e'yo vuti ondazu azini e'yo 'yeta onzi 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, eyi fe e'yo ada azini geri 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obwesigye n'oburingaaniza omu bantu. Kubarikucondooza n'okukora aha bikorwa ebitahikire, nibareetaho oburingaaniza n'embaririra.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, various institutions work together to ensure governance and representation. One key institution is the parliament, which plays a crucial part in shaping laws and policies.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikolera wamu okukakasa enfuga n'okukiikirirwa. Ekitongole ekimu ekikulu ye paalamenti, ekola omulimu omukulu mu kukola amateeka n'enkola.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, dul mapat-pat tiyo kacelo me neno ni tela ki luwang lwak tye maber. Gang tic acel ma pire tek en aye ot moko cik, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yubu cik ki cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naka itunga, iswamaete iriongeta luegelegela nepepe kanu awanyun ebe ejai apugan keda abwoikinitok. Atukot adiope naepol noi ngesi airabet, naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ikisila keda ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia niri ma alea, amuti ndundu eyi azi nga tualu nezu ra kini eyi ma driceza azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ci. Amuti azi okporu ni eri koloseni ni azi okporu ni ngapi azita eyi edezu azini azita eyi 'bazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, ebitongore ebitarikushushana nibikorera hamwe, okureeba ngu hariho obwebembezi n'abajwekyerwa. Ekitongore kimwe ekikuru n'eishengyero, ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora ebiragiro n'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: To ensure the successful completion of their projects, road contractors rely on a network of suppliers for essential resources. These materials are crucial for maintaining quality and meeting project deadlines.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti pulojekiti zaabwe ziwedde bulungi, abakola enguudo beesigama ku mikutu gy'abagaba ebintu ebyetaagisa. Ebintu bino bikulu nnyo mu kukuuma omutindo n'okutuukiriza ebisale bya pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub gi otum maber, joo ma yubu gudi gijenge I kom dul mapat-pat ma miyo jami ma mite pi tic gi. Jami magi pigi tego tutwal pi gwoko rwom ki nino me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorio angetakin ipurojektin kec ejok, itwasamaete adukok luka irotin iboro luipudasi kesi. Epolok noi iboro lu kanu aidar adoketait ka aitodolikin apak naepol noi naka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Otita eyivile 'diyi ma dezu kililiru, 'ba nzila si'ba 'diyi yi ati afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi esuzu 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi orodriru e'yo otita ni 'diyi ma wura ma ta mbazu azini o'du asizuri ma e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu purogyekiti zaabo zikozirwe kurungi, abarikukora enguuto nibegamira aha bantu abarikukoresa ebintu ebirikwetengwa. Ebintu ebi n'eby'omugasho munonga omukureeberera omutindo n'okuhikiiriza obwire bwa purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the ability to anticipate future needs and challenges can significantly impact success. By considering potential outcomes and preparing accordingly, individuals and organizations can navigate uncertainties more effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, obusobozi bw'okusuubira ebyetaago n'okusoomoozebwa mu biseera eby'omu maaso bisobola okukosa ennyo obuwanguzi. Mu kulowooza ku biyinza okuvaamu n'okwetegekera okusinziira ku ekyo, abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole bisobola okutambuza obulungi obutali bukakafu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki kero me neno jami ma mite ki peko matye anyim twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa dano. Ka dano ki dul mapat-pat tamo I kom adwogi ne ki yubbe malube ki ngo ma twero time, man weko gi loyo peko ma pe gi ngeyo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na esipidi noi, apedorit ajenun ipudesia keda atiokisio nu oingaren epedori aitodolikin akerianut. Kowai lo aomoom nuepedorete alomun kosodete aitemonokin, epedorete itunga keda iriongeta aitemokin atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia e'yo yi 'yepi mbeleru 'diyi ma alia, okpo 'bani egazu e'yo ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria ri eco drile suza ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma egata si azini otuta si, 'ba yi ma ngulupi azini amuti yi eco e'yo onzi 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani, okubaasa kumanya ebirikwetengwa omu biro by'omumaisho hamwe n'oburemeezi, nikibaasa kukora kihango aha businguzi. Abantu hamwe n'ebitongore nibibaasa kukora kurungi omu mbeera ezitarikwetegyerezibwa, barikureeba ebirikubaasa kurugamu n'okweteekateekyera.

eng_prompt: I heard there were some concerning findings regarding the community's overall well-being. Can you remind me what was in last month's health report?
lug_prompt: Nawulira nga waliwo ebizuuliddwa ebikwata ku mbeera y'abantu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni adwoki me kwed tye I kom kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong ebe ejaas akiro nuikamunitos ejautene loajokan loka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri e'yo 'bani esu angu 'da ma aa'ta muke ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire ngu hariho ebijumbwirwe ebirikwerarikiriza ebirikukwata ahamagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: When facing legal charges, individuals often seek to understand their options for securing temporary freedom. One common question that arises is related to the conditions under which a person may be granted release on bond.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekedde okuvunaanibwa mu mateeka, abantu batera okugezaako okutegeera engeri gyebayinza okufuna eddembe ery'akaseera obuseera. Ekibuuzo ekimu ekitera okubuuzibwa kikwatagana n'obukwakkulizo omuntu mw'ayinza okusonyiyibwa ku kakalu ka kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ka gitye I nyim kot, dano mapol giyenyo yoo me nongo bedo agonya pi tutunu. Lapeny acel ma dano mapol gipenyo obedo ngo ma omyero ngat moni otim me nongo twero me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Karai etereikina keda imusagon luka ikisila, ekotosi itunga amisiikin epone loepedoriata kesi adumun ailajara naka apak naedit. Aingiset adiope naetapit itunga aingitingit ngesi nuikamunitos nutupitono kanu alacakin itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo liza azita palaa 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azi 'diyi le geri eyini ecozu driwala esuzu 'diyi va. E'yo azi alu 'bani e'yo ozizaru tu ri e'yo azita 'bani 'ba azi ofuzu arujoarisi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikujunaanwa omu biragiro, nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunga obugabe obw'akanya kakye. Ekibuuzo kimwe ekirikukira kubaho, nikikwata aha bukwakurizo obu omuntu arikubaasa kurekurwa aha kakongi.

eng_prompt: To ensure transparency and accountability in public finances, it is essential to have a thorough review of government expenditures. This process is overseen by an independent authority responsible for evaluating financial practices.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira mu by'ensimbi bya gavumenti, kyetaagisa okwekenneenya ennyo ensaasaanya ya gavumenti. Enkola eno elondoolwa ekitongole ekyetongodde ekivunaanyizibwa ku kwekenneenya enkola z'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic ki lim pa gamente tye atir, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kor tic ki lim pa gamente. Dul ma pe jenge I kom gamente aye doro tic man.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun luka apugan, ejokuna noi airereonor ikapun lu itwasama apugan. Atukot na engarenikinit ainapeta ngun erai lo ikamunitos nuka aanyanar iponesio luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu e'yo ada be azini geri 'bani robia o'bi eyini ayuzuri ma dria, eri orodriru aa'zu geri gamete ni robia ayuzuri ma ale andrizu kililiru. Amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andripiri ni e'yo 'di ma pamvu one ni.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra omu by'empiiha ya gavumenti, n'eky'omugasho okushwijuma gye enshohoza ya gavumenti. Omurimo ogu nigureebererwa ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'empiiha.

eng_prompt: As the demand for healthcare professionals continues to rise, it is essential to ensure that aspiring nurses receive comprehensive education and training. These institutions play a crucial role in preparing individuals for the challenges of patient care and medical procedures.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'abakugu mu byobulamu bweyongera okulinnya, kya mugaso okulaba nti abanoonya abasawo bafuna ebyenjigiriza byonna n'okutendekebwa. Amatendekero gano gakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuteekateeka abantu okwanganga okusoomoozebwa kw'okulabirira abalwadde n'enkola z'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa lutic yoto kom tye kamede kwede, pire tek tutwal me neno ni lutic yoto kom ma gimito nongo pwony ki pwonye maber. Gangi tic magi gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal me yubu dano pi peko me gwoko lutwo ki yoo me tic i kom lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka eswamak luka angaleu, epolok noi awanyun ebe ekotosi anaasin adumun asioman keda aitutuoro naejok. Iswamaete iriongeta lu aswam naepol noi kanu aitemonokin itunga kanu atiokisio nuka aidar adekak keda iwaitin lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tutu risi, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba lepi nasi ru 'diyi onita azini imbata esu dria. Pari arojo ni 'diyi azi okporu nga 'ba eyi otuzu e'yo ewaru 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu azini geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'abakugu omu by'amagara bigumizemu kweyongyera, nikikuru kureeba ngu abarikwenda kuba abashaho batunga obwegyese n'okutendekwa. Amatendekyero aga nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutebeekanisa abantu okurwanisa oburemeezi bw'okureeberera abarwaire hamwe n'emitwarize y'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In the realm of science and research, rigorous testing and validation are essential. Only through careful examination can we establish that certain claims hold up under scrutiny.
lug_prompt: Mu bya ssaayansi n'okunoonyereza, okukebera n'okukakasa kwa mugaso. Okuyita mu kwekenneenya n'obwegendereza kwokka kwe tuyinza okuzuula nti ebyogerwa ebimu biyimiridde mu kwekenneenya.
ach_prompt: I tenge me cayanc ki kwed, pimo ki moko ni gin moni tye ada pire tek tutwal. Ka wakwedo matut ci wabinongo ni lok mukene tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naka esayanis keda aingic, ainwakio ka aingic ejok. Kowai lo aingic ejok ipedori oni ajenun ebe ejaasi akiro ace keda apedor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sayanisi ni azini e'yo vuti ondaza ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu kililiru ri eri orodriru. Geri ama ni ecozu e'yo 'bani 'yo 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya ya sayansi n'okucondooza, okukyebera n'okushwijuma n'eky'omugasho munonga. Okukyebera n'obwegyendesereza, nibwo turikubaasa kumanya ngu ebintu ebimwe nibibaho.

eng_prompt: As we wrapped up our final tasks, it became clear that we needed to review our financial records. Ensuring transparency and accuracy was crucial for the project's success.
lug_prompt: Nga tumaliriza emirimu gyaffe egyasembayo, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti twetaaga okwetegereza ebiwandiiko byaffe eby'ensimbi. Okukakasa obwerufu n'obutuufu byali bikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma watye ka tyeko ticwa me agiki, onen atyer kamaleng ni omyero wanen rekod me lim ma watye kwede. Neno ni jami weng tye atir obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio angetakin aswam wok nawasia, abu kotakanu ebe ibusakinit sio airereor aiwadikaetawok nuka ikapun. Aitogogong acobeu ka abeit arai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Amani azi amavile asizuri dezu 'boria, eca e'da kililiru kini le ama ma andri ama vile e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale ra. E'yo ada azini e'yo ada ma tambaza eri orodriru otita 'di ma drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Ku twaheza emirimo yaitu y'ahamuheru, kikarebeka butunu ngu twine kushwijuma ebihandiiko byaitu eby'esente. Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'oburingaaniza kikaba kiri eky'omugasho aha businguzi bwa purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: Each year, the government conducts a thorough review of its financial practices. As part of this process, the auditor general's report is made every financial year.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, gavumenti yeekenneenya enkola yaayo ey'ebyensimbi. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, alipoota y'omubalirizi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti ekolebwa buli mwaka gw'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, gamente ngiyo kit ma tic gi me lim tye kawot kwede. Macalo but yub man, adwogi tic pa auditor general ki yubu mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Kangol ekaru, inwaki apugan iponesioke luka ikapun. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, itolomio eripoota loka auditor general kangolikaru loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, gamete ni geri erini robia ayuzuri ma ale andri kililiru. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba auditor general ma o'duko siza ede eli alu alu vusi.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka,gavumenti neeshwijuma kurungi emirimo yaayo y'esente. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, ripoota y'omubazi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti neekorwa buri mwaka gw'eby'esente.

eng_prompt: In any government or large organization, financial oversight is crucial for maintaining transparency and accountability. Understanding the various positions involved in this process can help clarify how financial operations are managed.
lug_prompt: Mu gavumenti yonna oba ekitongole ekinene, okulondoola ebyensimbi kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma obwerufu n'embalirira. Okutegeera ebifo eby'enjawulo ebyenyigira mu nkola eno kisobola okuyamba okutangaaza engeri emirimu gy'ensimbi gye gitambuzibwamu.
ach_prompt: I gamente mo keken onyo dul mo madit, doro tic ki lim pire tek tutwal pi gwoko ada ki kor tic ki lim. Niang tic mapat-pat matye I yub man twero konyo me niang kit ma tic me lim tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan kere arai erionget loapolon, ewai lo ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Amisiikin aiboisio nuegelegela nu ejaas toma ainapeta nu ingarakini aingarakin ajenun epone lo idarere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Gamete dria kani amuti ambo 'diyi ma alia, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu ri eri orodriru e'yo ada azini geri 'bani robia ayuzuri ma dria. E'yo angu ndundu e'yo 'di ma alia 'diyi ma vata ni nga azakoma fe geri 'bani robia ayuzuri ocezuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu gavumenti yoona nainga ekitongore ekikuru, okureberera eby'empiiha n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amazima n'embaririra. Okwetegyereza emyanya etari emwe omu nkora egi nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya oku emirimo y'esente erikukorwa.

eng_prompt: The integrity of the judicial system relies on the honesty of all participants. Any attempt to deceive the court undermines justice and can lead to severe consequences.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'ekitongole ekiramuzi bwesigamye ku bwesimbu bw'abo bonna abakyenyigiramu. Okugezaako kwonna okulimba kkooti kutyoboola obwenkanya era kuyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Bedo ber pa dul ma ngolo kop jenge I kom bedo ki ada pa dano weng matye I dul enoni. Tem mo keken me bwolo kot balo ngolo kop matir dok twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajokis naka apugan ejai kotupitete abeitonut naka itunga kere luejaasi toma. Aswamisioit naka aisab ekooti emina aitodolikin etube loajokan ido epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada geri e'yo lizani 'diyiniri yi ati e'yo ada 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo ci 'bani lezu dwani obezu ri ni e'yo liza kililiru ri eza dika eri eco e'yo onzi eyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburingaaniza omu kitongore ekirikucwera emanja nikirugirira aha buringaaniza bw'abantu boona abakyejumbiremu. Okuteeraho kubeihabeiha kooti, nikishiisha oburingaaniza kandi nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: The project budget was significantly lower than anticipated, raising concerns among the team. As expenses continued to rise, it became clear that financial constraints would pose a serious challenge.
lug_prompt: Embalirira ya pulojekiti yali ntono nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kisuubirwa, ekyaleetawo okweraliikirira mu ttiimu. Ng'ensaasaanya yeeyongera okulinnya, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti obuzibu bw'ensimbi bujja kuleetawo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Byek me lim me yub ne obedo piny tutwal ma loyo kit ma onongo byek tye kwede, ma okelo lworo ikin lutic. I kare ma wel cente omedde ameda, nen atyer kamaleng ni peko me lim bikelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adit noi ebajet lo epurojekt adepar lo eomitai, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas etimu. Neyatakinor etiai loka ikapun aiyatakin, apotu kojenutu ebe epote atiokisio nuka ikapun ayangaun ainingosit naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Bajeti otita 'da niri ndra ele ndeni aga e'yo 'bani ega ri ra, e'yo 'da fe asi otiza amuti 'da eyi ma eselea. Aje ayuza ni mu drile turia, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo robia ni 'diyi nga e'yo ewaru eji.
nyn_prompt: Embaririra ya purogyekiti ekaba eri ahansi munonga, ekyaretsire okwerarikirira omu tiimu. Nk'oku enshohoza yaagumiizemu kweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu oburemeezi bw'esente bukaba nibwija kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial records, it became clear that there were discrepancies in the accounts. As a result, unaccounted money should be refunded.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, kyazuulibwa nti waaliwo obutakwatagana mu mbalirira. N'ekivuddemu, ssente ezitannaba kubalirirwa zirina okuddizibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim, onen atyer kamaleng ni wel lim ne pe orwatte. Macalo adwogi ne, omyero kidwok cen cente ma pe kitiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun, aponi kojenunai ebe ajai amamut acamanar kotoma akaunts. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit ainyakar ikapun lumam itwasamatai.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo yi ma esele cozu yi ma eselea yo. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma ogo robia 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ku 'diyi vile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho obutaikirizana omu bihandiiko. N'ekyarugiremu, esente ezitarikugambwaho, zishemereire kugarurwayo.

eng_prompt: Following a thorough examination of the financial records, the audit team discovered several inconsistencies. As a result, the auditor general's report has very many queries.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baazudde ebikyamu bingi. N'ekivuddemu, alipoota y'omubalirizi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti erimu ebibuuzo bingi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor tic ki rekod me lim, dul ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gunongo jami mapol ma pe tye kakare. Macalo adwogi ne, adwogi tic pa auditor general tye ki lapeny mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro nuka ikapun, abu etimu loka aanyanarak kodum iboro luipu lumam iswamaete ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi eripoota loka auditor general keda aingiseta nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri'baa 'diyi esu e'yo eyi ma esele cozu ku 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, o'duko siza auditor general niri ma alea zita eyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebihandiiko by'esente, tiimu y'ababalirizi b'ebitabo ekatunga ebitarikuhikaana. N'ekyarugiremu, ripoota y'omubazi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti eine ebibuuzo bingi.

eng_prompt: As communities face budget cuts and shifting priorities, many are questioning the value of traditional educational institutions. This raises a critical debate about the role of schools in society and what alternatives might be more beneficial.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu byolekaganye n'okukendeeza ku mbalirira n'okukyusa ebintu ebikulu, bangi babuusabuusa omugaso gw'amatendekero g'ennono. Kino kireetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku mulimu gw'amasomero mu kitundu n'ebirala ebiyinza okuba eby'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka nongo peko me ngolo byek me lim ki loko jami ma pigi tego, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ber pa gangi kwan macon. Man kelo laro lok madit tutwal I kom tic pa gangi kwan I kabedo wa ki jami mukene ma twero bedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina itunga keda aitidisiario naka ebajet keda aijulanakineta nuka iboro luepolok, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka isomeroi luka apugan. Eyangauni ngin epeget loepol noi loikamunit aswam naka isomeroi kotoma atutubet keda iponesio ice luepedorete aimedaun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo bajeti ma omgbo esizu azini e'yo eyini lezu aa'zu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma alea ri esuzu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega orodri sukulu a'di ni 'diyi ni ri ma dria ku. E'yo 'di ni agbatara eji e'yo sukulu eyini aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria azini geri eyini ecozu aa'zu orodriru ndeni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikutunga okukyendeezibwa omu mbariirira hamwe n'okuhindura eby'okwebembeza, baingi nibabangaanisa omugasho gw'amatendekyero g'enzarwa. Eki nikireetaho okuhanuura kw'amaani aha murimo gw'amashomero omu bantu hamwe n'ebindi ebirikubaasa kuba eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Large events often draw massive crowds, creating an electric atmosphere. As a result, stadiums host thousands of people.
lug_prompt: Emikolo eminene gitera okukungaanya abantu abangi, ekireetawo embeera y'amasannyalaze. N'ekivuddemu, ebisaawe bikyaza enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Yub madongo ipol kare kelo dano mapol tutwal ma weko dano bedo ki yomcwiny. Macalo adwogi ne, bar tuku tye ki dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Ingalaunete ipucito luapolok itunga luipu noi, ido einakini ngin itunga aiyalama. Kanuka ngun, ijaunitos isawen ilukumin luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Yeta ambo 'diyi tutuni o'bi eyi tra ongmbo angiri si, e'yo aci ni 'diyi ejizu. E'yo 'disi, pari avita eyini 'diyi ma alea 'ba eyi alifu alifu.
nyn_prompt: Emikoro mikuru neekira kureeta abantu baingi, ekirikureetaho amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu,ebishaayi nibitangirira enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu.

eng_prompt: In our democratic system, elected officials play a crucial part in representing the interests of their constituents. Can you explain the specific responsibilities that come with your position?
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yaffe eya demokulasiya, abakungu abalondebwa bakola omulimu omukulu mu kukiikirira ebyetaago by'abalonzi baabwe.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak wa, lutic ma kiyero gi gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal me cung pi miti pa lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan wok, eswamak lu eseunitai iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu abwoikin ipudesia luka itunga lu aseunete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile democratia ma alia, 'ba opetaa ma alia 'diyi azi okporu 'ye pa sozu e'yo 'ba yini opi nyazani 'diyi ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya yaitu, abakuru abaronzirwe nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kujwekyera ebyetengo by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: Understanding the motivations behind investment decisions is crucial for project success. Different investors may have varying goals, such as financial returns, social impact, or technological advancement.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebisikiriza okusalawo kw'okusiga ensimbi kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti. Bamusigansimbi abenjawulo bayinza okuba n'ebiruubirirwa eby'enjawulo, nga amagoba mu byenfuna, okukosa abantu, oba okukulaakulana mu tekinologiya.
ach_prompt: Niang tyen lok ma oweko kimoko tam me keto lim I biyacara obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa project. Lutim biacara mapat-pat twero bedo ki miti mapat-pat, calo nongo magoba me lim, kelo adwogi maber i kom lwak, onyo dongo pa tet manyen.
teo_prompt: Amisikin nu isinyikokinitos itunga aipikakin ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka ipurojektin. Epedorete agwelanarak luegelegela ajaut keda apeleikinata nuegelegela, kwape ameda naka ikapun, aitojokaar ejautene loka itunga, keda apol naka etatai loakwana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'duzu ri ma vata eri orodriru otita eyi ma drile suza ni. Ba lonyi vuti ale'ba ndundu 'diyi ma asisile eco ovu ndu ndu ekile orodri robia esuzu, e'yo 'yezu o'bi eyi ma eselea, kani e'yo tekenologia ni 'diyi ma zota le.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho okusharamu kukoresa esente n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi bwa purogyekiti. Abashubuzi abatarikushushana nibabaasa kugira ebigyendererwa ebitarikushushana, nk'okugaruka omu by'empiiha, okutunguura eby'obuhangwa, nainga entunguuka omu tekinorogye.

eng_prompt: No matter where you go, the comfort of a home is what truly matters. Whether nestled in the mountains or by the sea, the right place can make all the difference.
lug_prompt: Ka kibeere nti ogenda wa, obuweerero bw'awaka kye kintu ekikulu. Ka kibeere mu nsozi oba ku lubalama lw'ennyanja, ekifo ekituufu kisobola okuleetawo enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mo keken ma icito iye, ber bedo pa gangi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Kadi itye I kin godi onyo inget nam, kabedo maber twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilosi jo aiboisit adio, ajokis naka ere ngesi ibore yenepol noi. Arai ejai toma omoru arai ejai oicorin, epedori aiboisit naedolit aitolomun aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: Ka tro mu pari ciria, aku ni aa'zu muke ri eri e'yo okporu ni i. Ka tro ovu 'be ma alia kani yi tia, angu kililiru ri eco ojata eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ahu orikuza, obusingye bw'omuka nikyo kikuru munonga. Yaaba ori omu nshozi nainga aha rubaju rw'enyanja, omwanya oguhikire nigubaasa kureetaho entaaniso.

eng_prompt: Many businesses are increasingly recognizing the importance of their role in society. As a result, they are implementing initiatives that focus on social corporate responsibility.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi nnyingi zeeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'omulimu gwazo mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, bateeka mu nkola enteekateeka ezissa essira ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'ebitongole.
ach_prompt: Biacara mapol tye ka niang ber pa tic gi ikin lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye katic ki yub mapat-pat ma keto cwinygi I kom tic pa dul mapat-pat me konyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ibiasaran luipu ajenun ajokis naka aswam kec kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aitegear ainapeta nu isingarenitos aswamisinei nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Tujura karakara eyi curu'do orodri eyini aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma e'yo ega. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi nyingi nizeeyongyera kumanya omugasho gw'omurimo gwazo omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibateeka omu nkora enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera obujunanizibwa bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Physical activity is essential for children's development and well-being. Providing spaces for outdoor play can significantly enhance their social skills and overall health.
lug_prompt: Emirimu gy'omubiri gya mugaso mu kukula kw'abaana n'obulamu obulungi. Okuteekawo ebifo eby'okuzannyiramu wabweru kisobola okutumbula ennyo obukugu bwabwe obw'okukolagana n'abantu n'obulamu bwabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lee obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo pa lutino ki bedo maber. Miyo kabedo kama lutino twero tuko iye twero medo rwom me kwogi.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nu akwan ejok kanu apolo na idwe ka ajokis. Aijaikin aiboisio nu abolia kokinga epedori aitojokar aijen kec keda aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Yeta rua ni 'diyi orodriru anzi nyiri eyini zozu azini aa'zu muke beni. Angu eyini avizu amve 'diyi fezu ri eco eyini geri eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea 'diyi otu dika eyi ma rua ala ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukora emirimo y'omubiri n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kw'abaana n'okuba gye. Okuha abantu emyanya y'okuzaaniramu aheeru, nikibaasa kutunguura emyoga yaabo hamwe n'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In any field, the distinction between a novice and a seasoned professional often lies in the depth of knowledge and experience. This is particularly true for those who dedicate their careers to mastering specific skills or subjects.
lug_prompt: Mu mulimu gwonna, enjawulo wakati w'omutandisi n'omutendeke eri mu kumanya n'obumanyirivu. Kino kituufu nnyo eri abo abeewaayo mu mirimu gyabwe okukuguka mu bukugu oba amasomo agamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, apoka-poka matye ikin ngat matye ki ngec manyen ki ngat matye ki ngec matut tye I ngec matut ki ngec ma en tye kwede. Man obedo lok ada tutwalle pi joo ma cwalo tic gi me pwonyo diro onyo pwony mogo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam kere, atiaketait naejai kiding itunganan yenepedori aswam keda itunganan yenemisiarit ejaasi keda acoa naepol noi keda amisiarit. Erai na abeit noi kanejaas ngul lu itwasamaete aswamukec kanu aisisia aisisiaeta ace.
lgg_prompt: Angu ciria, esele coza 'ba e'dopi azini 'ba onita be angiri be 'diyi ma eselea ri tutuni e'yo onitani azini nita be angiri 'diyi ma alia. Diri e'yo adani tuni 'ba azi yini 'diyi 'bapi ondua azini e'yo azi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: When we come together and support one another, we unlock the potential for greatness. Collaboration and shared goals can lead us to remarkable accomplishments.
lug_prompt: Bwe tukolera awamu era ne tuwagiragana, tusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okukolera awamu n'ebiruubirirwa eby'awamu bisobola okututuusa ku buwanguzi obw'ekitalo.
ach_prompt: Ka waribbe kacel dok wacwako luwotwa, wanongo kero me timo jami mabeco. Ribe kacel ki yub ma watye kwede twero weko watimo jami mabeco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karai imorikikinos oni kosodete aigangakin yenice, itodolikini oni apedorosio nuka apol. Aimorikikina keda alosikineta nu aimorikikina epedorete ayangaun aitodolikinio naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: Amani emuzu tualu azini ama atizu ama ma eselea, ama nga e'yo okporu 'diyi esu ra. Ti ecita azini e'yo amani lele tualu 'diyi eco fe amani e'yo onyiru 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikukwatanisa kandi tukashagikana, nitubaasa kukora ebirikusingayo oburungi. Okukwatanisa hamwe n'ebigyendererwa ebirikugaitwa hamwe, nikibaasa kutureetera kukora ebintu by'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Many people hold misconceptions about different religions and their followers. Stereotypes can lead to harmful generalizations that overlook the diversity within communities.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balina endowooza enkyamu ku madiini ag'enjawulo n'abagoberezi baago. Endowooza ez'enjawulo zisobola okuviirako okugatta okw'obulabe okubuusa amaaso enjawulo mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki tam ma pe atir I kom dini mapat-pat ki lulub korgi. Bedo ki tam mapat-pat I kom dano weng twero kelo tam marac tutwal ma weko dano pe tamo I kom jami mapat-pat matye I kabedo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ejaas keda aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos idiinin luegelegela keda atupitokokec. Atiakatiak epedorete ayangaun aomisio nuarokok nu mam epalunit nuegelegela kotoma atutubena.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ma egata dini ndundu eyi ma dria azini eyi ma 'ba eyi pie 'diyi ma dria onzi. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi baine ebiteekateeko ebitahikire aha madiini gatari gamwe na gamwe hamwe n'abakuratsi baago. Emitwarize etarikushushana neebaasa kureetaho enshonga z'omutaano ezitarikureeba entaaniso omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In the corporate world, businesses often expand their operations to reach new markets and diversify their offerings. One common strategy for achieving this growth is through the establishment of subsidiaries.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebitongole, bizinensi zitera okugaziya emirimu gyazo okutuuka ku butale obupya n'okugaziya ebintu byazo. Enkola emu ey'awamu ey'okutuuka ku nkulaakulana eno kwe kussaawo amakampuni amatonotono.
ach_prompt: I tenge me biacara, biacara ipol kare gi tyelo kor tic gi me oo I cuk manyen ki bene cato jami gi I yoo mapat-pat. Yoo acel ma dano weng twero tic kwede me dongo lobo man obedo cako dul mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka ikampunin, iyatakitos duc ibiasaran aswamukec kanu adolokin isokonin luitetiak ka aisiarakin iborokec. Adiopet iwaitin lu itodolikinere apol na erai aitolomun ikampunin.
