lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru tujari ni 'diyi ma alea, tujari eyi tutuni azi eyivile 'diyi ma omgbo otu eyini ani ecozu cazu cuu o'diru 'diyi ma alea dika afa eyini ozi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi alu 'bani ecozu zota 'di esuzu ri geri amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyi e'dozu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'ebitongore, bizinesi nizikira kushanjuura emirimo yaazo, okuhika omu butare obusya, n'okuguza ebintu ebitarikushushana. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kureetaho entunguuka egi n'okutandikaho kampuni ezindi.

eng_prompt: After extensive environmental assessments and community consultations, the local government made a significant decision. They recognized the need to preserve natural habitats and promote biodiversity in the region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ennyo obutonde bw'ensi n'okwebuuza ku bantu, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaakola okusalawo okw'omugaso. Baazuula obwetaavu bw'okukuuma obutonde n'okutumbula obutonde obw'enjawulo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma cwec ma orumuwa tye kwede ki bene lok ki lwak, gamente me tedero omoko tam ma pire tek. Gu niang miti me gwoko kabedo pa cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa i twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene lo akwap keda aingitun itunga, apugan naka atutubet abu iswama aseunet naepol noi. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka aidar aiboisio nuka Edeke ka aitopolor iboro luegelegela kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma ale andrizu azini e'yo nzezu o'bi eyi be 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo azi okporu ni. Eyi esu e'yo lezu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini afa ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'di ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi n'okwebuuza aha bantu, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekakora encwamu y'amaani. Bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The careful management of natural resources is crucial for sustainable growth. When utilized responsibly, these assets can significantly boost a nation's economy.
lug_prompt: Okukozesa obulungi eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka kya mugaso nnyo mu kukulaakulana okw'olubeerera. Ebintu bino bwe bikozesebwa obulungi, bisobola okutumbula ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Tic maber ki lonyo ma lubanga aye ocweyo pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye kamede anyim. Ka kitiyo kwede maber, jami magi twero medo rwom me lim pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Aidar iboro lu isuban ejok ejok kanu apol na ejok. Karai itwasamao ejok, epedorete iboro lu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun loka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambaza kililiru ri eri orodriru zota ewu drile ri ni. Ba ka afa 'diyi ayu geri kililiru si, eyi eco kari ma lonyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa kurungi eby'obuhangwa n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka erikugumaho. Ebintu ebi kubirikukoresibwa kurungi, nibibaasa kutunguura eby'entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the government implements its budget and financial planning based on a specific timeline. Understanding the fiscal calendar is essential for businesses and individuals alike to align their financial activities accordingly.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, gavumenti eteeka mu nkola embalirira yaayo n'enteekateeka yaayo ey'ebyensimbi okusinziira ku kiseera ekigere. Okutegeera kalenda y'ebyensimbi kya mugaso nnyo eri bizinensi n'abantu ssekinnoomu okukwataganya emirimu gyabwe egy'ensimbi okusinziira ku kalenda eyo.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, gamente tiyo ki byek me lim ki yub me lim malubbe ki kare ma kiketo. Niang kalenda me lim pire tek tutwal pi biacara ki dano me doro tic gi me lim malube ki kalenda enoni.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, itodolikini apugan ebajet ke keda aitemonokineta nuka ikapun kotupitete apak. Amisiikin ainapeta nuka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ibiasaran keda itunga aitirian aswamisinei kec nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, gamete ni otita bajeti ni azini otita robia ni 'diyi 'ye sa'wa azi ma alea. Kalenda robia niri ma vata eri orodriru tujari eyini tualu 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie eyini ani ecozu e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda,gavumenti neeta omu nkora embaririra yaayo n'entebekanisa y'esente kurugirira aha bwire obuhikire. Okwetegyereza kalenda y'eby'empiiha n'eky'omugasho munonga omu bizinesi hamwe n'abantu, kugira ngu bakore emirimo yaabo y'esente kurugiirira ahariyo.

eng_prompt: The government's budget allocation for various programs and services continues to grow each fiscal year. As a result, significant financial resources are directed towards infrastructure, education, and healthcare initiatives.
lug_prompt: Embalirira ya gavumenti eri pulogulaamu n'obuweereza obw'enjawulo yeeyongera buli mwaka gw'ebyensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, ensimbi nnyingi ziteekebwa ku bintu ebikozesebwa, ebyenjigiriza n'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Byek me lim ma gamente miyo pi yub mapat-pat tye ka medde mwaka ki mwaka. Macalo adwogi ne, kitiyo ki lim madit tutwal I yub me gedo, pwony ki yot kom.
teo_prompt: Ainanakineta nuka ebajet mama ejaasi ainapeta nuegelegela nuka apugan iyatas kangolikaru loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, itosomao ikapun luipu kanu adukio, asioman keda amukian.
lgg_prompt: Bajeti gamete ni 'ba otita azini azakoma ndundu eyi ma dria ri ni zo eli alu alu vusi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba robia angiri 'diyi 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria, onita ma dria azini e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Embaririra ya Gavumenti aha puroguraamu ezitarikushushana neeyongyera buri mwaka gw'eby'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, esente nyingi nizikoresibwa omu by'okwombeka, eby'obwegyese hamwe n'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has become a prominent destination for refugees seeking safety and stability. Many local residents have opened their hearts and homes to those in need, fostering a spirit of hospitality and support.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abanoonyiboobubudamu abanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Abatuuze b'omu kitundu bangi bagguddewo emitima gyabwe n'amaka gaabwe eri abo abali mu bwetaavu, ekitumbula omwoyo gw'okusembeza abagenyi n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda odoko kabedo ma oywek tutwal pi luring ayela ma tye ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo. Lutedero mapol guyabo cwiny gi ki gangi gi pi joo matye i peko, ma oweko gubedo ki cwiny me jolo wele ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eraun Uganda aiboisit naejok noi naka ikerai lu ekotosi ayuwara keda ainapakina. Apotu itunga luipu luka atutubet kopukosi etau kec keda ireria kec mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi keda ipudesia.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri eca angu 'ba emunyaleru angu agei tema ni azini asianzu lepi 'diyini. Ba angu ma alia karakara 'diyi zi yi ma asi azini aku yi 'ba azakoma le'ba 'diyi dri, yini asi 'bazu 'ba a'izuri ma alia azini atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya murungi gw'empungi ezirikuronda obusingye n'obutebekana. Abatuuragye baingi bagwire emitima yaabo n'amaka gaabo ahari abo abatarikwebaasa, ekirikureetaho omwoyo gw'okutangirira n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: After careful assessment of the current facilities, the city council has decided to expand its administrative capabilities. Community feedback indicated a strong need for more accessible government services.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza ebintu ebiriwo, akakiiko k'ekibuga kasazeewo okugaziya obusobozi bwakyo obw'okuddukanya emirimu. Okuddibwamu kw'abantu kwalaga obwetaavu obw'amaanyi obw'obuweereza bwa gavumenti obwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede, dul me city council omoko tamgi me medo rwom me tic gi. Tam pa lwak onyuto miti matek tutwal me nongo kony pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok aiboisio nu ejaas, aseun ekansulo lo esite aitanyanyar apedorosioke nuka eyaitene. Apotu akiro nuka itunga itodutu ebe ejai eipuda lo aitodolikin ejanakine lo apugan.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru sawa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu aku ambu cityni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo o'duko ongulumu eyini fe 'diyi ece kini le 'ba ma esu azakoma gamete ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyombeko ebiriho hati,akakiiko k'orurembo kashaziremu kwongyera aha myoga y'obwebembezi. Ebyarugiremu kuruga omu bantu nibyoreka ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuheereza bwa gavumenti oburikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In the wake of rapid urbanization, several innovative urban centers have emerged across the region. Among these developments, Madi stands out as one of the newly created cities.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga okw'amangu, ebibuga ebipya ebiwerako bibaluseewo okwetooloola ekitundu. Mu nkulaakulana zino, Madi yeeyoleka ng'emu ku bibuga ebipya ebitondeddwawo.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo lobo ma tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal I boma mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat I kin dongo lobo magi weng, Madi obedo boma acel ma kiyubu manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu apol naka itaunin, apolor itaunin luitetiak noi kotoma aiboisit. Kotoma apol nu, itegelikina Madi kwape ediopet kotoma oibuga luitetiak luitolomunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani tawuni eyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ma e'yosi, angu tawuni eyini o'diru 'diyi efu kari 'di ma woko 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma eselea, Madi ni e'da ekile aku ambo 'bani e'do o'diru 'diyi ma azi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunguuka kw'endembo,endembo nyingi ez'omutaano zitandikireho omu kyanga kyona. Omu ntunguuka ezi, Madi neetengwa nk'emwe aha ndembo nsya ezitandikirweho.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with constant noise and distractions, effective communication often overshadows the importance of listening. Yet, embracing moments of silence can lead to deeper understanding and more thoughtful decision-making.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde amaloboozi n'ebiwugulaza buli kaseera, empuliziganya ennungi etera okubuutikira obukulu bw'okuwuliriza. Newankubadde, okwaniriza akaseera ak'okusirika kusobola okukuyamba okutegeera n'okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki woo ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano, lok maber pole balo ber pa winyo lok. Kadi bed kumeno, jolo kare me ling twero weko waniang matut dok bene weko imoko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda iporotoi keda iboro lu isimun, mam einer ejok epol ajokis na apupokin. Konye, aimorikikin apak naka aililing epedori ayangaun amisiikin naepol ka aitodolikin aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea o'duko azini afa e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie tre, e'yo nzeza kililiru ri ni tutuni orodri e'yo eriza niri ma dria. Te, sa'wa 'bani ovuzu ciri ma ta mbazuri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo vazu kililiru azini e'yo egazu kililiru 'diyi 'duzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire orwari rw'amaani n'ebirikuturemesa, okuhurizagana kurungi nikukira okuhurikiza. Kwonka, okukoresa obwire bw'okuhunama, nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyereza n'okucwamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed alarming levels of misconduct within various government agencies. As a result, many citizens have lost faith in their leaders, leading to the perception that civil servants are the most corrupt public officials.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo emize emibi mu bitongole bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi bangi tebakyalina bwesige mu bakulembeze baabwe, ekiviiriddeko endowooza nti abakozi ba gavumenti be bakungu ba gavumenti abasinga okulya enguzi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto rwom me tim maraco I dul mapat-pat pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali mapol orwenyo gen i kom lutela gi, ma oweko gitamo ni lutic pa gamente aye lucamucana loyo.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit adoketait naepol noi naka iponesio luarokok kotoma iriongeta lu apugan luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu emunokina engarenok kec, eyangauni aomisioit ebe eswamak luka apugan kes luemidicete apiyai noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da adriza onzi ma omgbo onzi amuti gameteni ndundu 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi karakara eyi avi asi'baza drice'ba eyivile 'diyi ma dria ra erini ani egazu kini azi'ba gameteni 'diyi azi'ba anyamgbolo ru ndeni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka emichwe mibi omu bitongore bya gavumenti bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi tibaine bwesigye omu beebembezi baabo, ekirikubareetera kuteekateeka ngu abakozi ba gavumenti nibo barikukirayo obushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown significant variations in corruption levels across different districts in Uganda. Among these, Ntoroko has consistently stood out for its transparency and integrity in governance.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu buli bw'enguzi mu disitulikiti ez'enjawulo mu Uganda. Mu bino byonna, Ntoroko ebadde yeeyoleka nnyo olw'obwerufu n'obwesimbu bwayo mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit I rwom me camcana I dicitrwik mapat-pat I lobo Uganda. I kin gamente magi, Ntoroko pol kare obedo pat ki lobe mukene pi bedo ki ada ki tela maber.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe egelegela noi adoketait naka amidicio naka apiyai ko disitriktan luegelegela ko Uganda. Kotoma ngul, etapit Ntoroko ajenun kwape akwap na ecai ka na abeit kotoma apuganike.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da wura anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma esele cozu distrikiti ndundu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Diyi ma eselea, Ntoroko e'bi pa so sawa driasi e'yo ada be azini e'yo ada be e'yo driceza ma alia 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'obushomankuzi omu disiturikiti ezitarikushushana omu Uganda. Omuri ebi, Ntoroko etwire neejwekyera oburingaaniza n'obwesigwa omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial discrepancies, it is crucial to ensure that every dollar spent is properly tracked and justified. Transparency in financial management is essential to maintain public trust and prevent misuse of resources.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ensimbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti buli ddoola esaasaanyizibwa elondoolebwa bulungi era eteekebwako ensonga. Obwerufu mu nzirukanya y'ensimbi kyetaagisa okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu n'okutangira okukozesa obubi eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dola weng ma kitiyo kwede ki lubu korgi maber dok bene tye ki tyen lok. Bedo ki ada I kom kit me tic ki lim pire tek tutwal me gwoko gen pa lwak ki gengo nywaro tic ki lim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, epolok noi awanyun ebe idolas lu itwasamao ewanyunitai ejok. Acoa na eyaitene loka ikapun nes ejok kanu aidar amuno naka itunga ka aitikitik aitolitol iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza robia ma alia o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dola dria 'bani ayu 'diyi ma pamvu andri kililiru azini 'ba ece e'yo yi ma dria ra. E'yo ada geri robia ayuzuri ma alia ri eri orodriru asi'baza o'bi yini ri ma tambazu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ayuta geri onzi si ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obwakyerereirwe, nikikuru kureeba ngu buri doora ekozesibwa erikukuratirwa kurungi kandi erikworeka oburingaaniza. Obusheru omu nkora y'esente n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye bw'abantu n'okuzibira okukoresa kubi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous invitations and requests from community leaders, the mayor's office remained silent on the matter. As tensions rose over local issues, many were left wondering about the mayor's commitment to engaging with constituents.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga abakulembeze b'ekitundu baayita era ne basaba emirundi mingi, ofiisi ya loodi meeya yasirika ku nsonga eyo. Obunkenke bweyongera ku nsonga z'ebitundu, bangi baalekebwa nga beebuuza ku bumalirivu bwa meeya okukwatagana n'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutela me tedero gubedo ka lwongogi tyen mapol, gang tic pa meya obedo ling I kom lokke. I kare ma telle omedde I kom lok me tedero, dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng I kom miti pa meya me lok ki lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai engarenok luka atutubet, abu eyapiesi loka emeya kilililing nuikamunitos akirot ngin. Neapolor atiokisio nuikamunitos akiro nuka atutubet, apotu itunga luipu kojalakisi aomoom nuikamunitos ainakina naka emeya aiswamanar keda itunga luka atutubetekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drice'ba ongulumu eyini omvezu 'diyi ma kalafe angiri 'diyi ma talasi, ofisi meya niri awi ciri e'yo nde ma dria. Erita ako ni tuzu e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi ku eyi osu e'yo meya ni owizu e'yo nzezu 'ba angu opi nyaza ni 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okwetwa n'okushaba kwingi kuruga omu beebembezi b'ekyanga, ofiisi ya meeya ekahunama aha nshonga egyo. Obu obunkenke bwabaire nibweyongyera aha nshonga z'ebyaro, baingi bakasigara nibeebuuza okwehayo kwa meeya kukorengana n'abantu be.

eng_prompt: The design and quality of school facilities play a crucial role in shaping students' educational experiences. Well-maintained classrooms, libraries, and recreational areas can significantly enhance student engagement and motivation.
lug_prompt: Enkola n'omutindo gw'ebizimbe by'essomero bikola kinene nnyo mu kubumba eby'enjigiriza by'abayizi. Ebibiina ebirabirirwa obulungi, amaterekero g'ebitabo n'ebifo eby'okwesanyusaamu bisobola okutumbula okwegatta kw'abayizi n'okukubiriza.
ach_prompt: Yub ki rwom me jami me gang kwan konyo tutwal I yubu kwan pa lutino. Ot kwan ma ki gwoko maber, ot gwoko bukke, ki kabedo me galo wang twero medo miti ki miti pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokineta keda adoketait na isomeroi iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aisisianakin idwe. Atukona nu idaritai ejok, aiboisio nu itaboi ka aiboisio nu iswamaere iboro epedorete aitojokar eswamae lo idwe ka aisinyikokinit kes aswam.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru sukulu'a 'diyi ma sita azini wura onyiru 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo sukulu anzi eyini onita onizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Kilasi eyi ma ta mbaza kililiru, pari buku eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi, azini angu eyini ayiko esuzu 'diyi sukulu anzi eyi ma ava otu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora n'omutindo gw'ebyombeko by'eishomero nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutendeka abeegi. Eishomero, eibikiro ry'ebitabo, hamwe n'emyanya y'okushemererwamu ebitebeekanisiibwe kurungi, nibibaasa kwongyera aha kwejumba kw'abeegi n'okubagaruramu amaani.

eng_prompt: For years, the school has struggled to provide adequate resources for its students. Despite numerous requests for improvements, the necessary funding has never been allocated.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka, essomero lifubye okuwa abayizi baayo ebyetaago ebimala. Wadde nga wabaddewo okusaba kungi okw'okutereeza ebintu, ensimbi ezeetaagisa tezifunibwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, gang kwan ne obedo ka yele me miyo jami ma oromo ki lutino. Kadi bed ni kilego pi aloka-loka mapol, pud pe kimiyo cente ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikar luipu, etiono noi esomero aijaikin esisiak iboro luedolitos. Karaida ipu iboro lu ekotoi kanu aitojokar, mam ikapun lu ekotoi ijaikitai.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara, sukulu 'da ebi dri ci afa ayuzaru sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi fezu. E'yo 'bani lezu angu 'da ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma kalafe ni tro ovuzu tre ra ti, 'ba awini robia 'bani lele 'diyi 'ba ku.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka mingi, eishomero ritwire niritahirira kuheereza abeegi baaryo eby'okukoresa ebirikumara. N'obu haraabe hariho okushaba kwingi okw'okutereeza ebyombeko, esente ezirikwetengwa tiziheirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of students and the lack of adequate facilities, the local community held a meeting to discuss potential solutions. After much deliberation, parents decided to take action by committing to a significant project.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abayizi ogweyongera n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa ebimala, abatuuze baatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, abazadde baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo nga beewaddeyo ku pulojekiti ey'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutino kwan ki bedo peke pa jami tic ma oromo, lwak me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Ingee tam matut, lunyodo gumoko tam gi me cako tic ki yub ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka esisiak keda amamus na iboro lu itwasamao, apotu itunga luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu auriak koseutu aswam kopone lo ainakina opurojekt loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako be, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, tipika eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu eyini eyi owizu otita azi orodriruni 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abeegi hamwe n'eibura ry'eby'okukoresa ebirikumara, abantu b'omubyaro bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, abazaire bakasharamu kukora ekirikwetengyesa obwo barikwehayo kukora purogyekiti y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As dark clouds gathered overhead, the school bell rang, signaling the end of recess. The children quickly looked for a place to stay dry, knowing the storm was about to hit.
lug_prompt: Ebire ebiddugavu bwe byajja waggulu, ekide ky'essomero kyavuga nga kiraga nti oluwummula luwedde. Abaana baanoonya mangu ekifo aw'okutuula nga kikalu, nga bakimanyi nti omuyaga gwali gugenda kubakuba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pol macol tye ka cungu iwi wigi, olang me gang kwan obedo ka goyo me nyutu ni yweyo me cukul dong otum. Lutino guyenyo kama gitwero bedo iye ma otwo oyot-oyot tutwal pien onongo gingeo ni kot tye ka cwer.
teo_prompt: Kwape apolor akwap nairionon, abu ekide lo esomero kinom, itodunit ebe enangi aiyengun. Apotu idwe kongicata atipet aiboisit na mam epedorete aiboi, naarai ajeni kesi ebe ebuni ekwam ainom.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo iniru 'diyi ni yi trazu dria 'boria, sukuluni ombele ru ece kini ava liza i de 'bo. Anzi nyiri 'da eyi nda angu aa'zu e'wi kokoru mbeleru eyini nizu ra kini ozoo 'di ni mu e'do e'do.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'omwirima ku bwabaire nibugyenda nibutandika, ekide ky'eishomero kikareetaho akabonero k'okuhendera kw'akahuumuro. Abaana bakahonaaho baronda omwanya gw'okuraaramu, ahabw'okumanya ngu omuyaga gukaba guri haihi kugwa.

eng_prompt: Many students spend a significant portion of their day in classrooms that are poorly maintained. When facilities are in disrepair, it can lead to a negative perception of the overall school environment.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bamala ekitundu ekinene eky'olunaku lwabwe mu bibiina ebirabirirwa obubi. Ebintu bwe biba nga tebiddabirizibwa, kisobola okuleetawo endowooza embi ku mbeera y'essomero okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol gicwalo cawa malac tutwal I ot kwan ma pe ki gwoko maber. Ka jami me gang kwan pe tye maber, man twero kelo tam marac i kom gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Itosomaete esisiak luipu apakikec naepol noi kotoma atukono nu mam idaritai ejok. Arai mam isomeroi itemonokino ejok, epedori ngin ayangaun aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos esomero.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi eyi o'du eyivile 'diyi ma alea sa'wa ezu ri eza kilasia 'bani eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru ku 'diyi ma alea. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ka ovu kililiru ku, eri eco fe e'yo onzi 'yezu angu sukulu niri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibamara obwire bwingi omu bibiina ebitarikureebererwa kurungi. Ebyombeko by'eishomero kubirikuba biri omu mbeera mbi, nikibaasa kureetaho enteekateeka etahikire aha by'obuhangwa bw'eishomero.

eng_prompt: As the population in rural communities continues to grow, the demand for quality education is becoming increasingly critical. Without immediate action, many children in these areas will be left without access to essential learning resources.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu byalo gweyongera okukula, obwetaavu bw'okusoma okw'omutindo bweyongera. Awatali kikolebwa mangu, abaana bangi mu bitundu bino bajja kusigala nga tebafuna bikozesebwa mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano tye ka medde I caro, miti me kwan ma rwom gi malo tye kamede. Labongo timo gin mo oyotoyot, lutino mapol I kabedo magi gibibedo labongo nongo jami ma mite pi kwangi.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kocaaloi, ejai eipuda lo asioman na abeit noi. Arai mam iswamao katipet, mam idwe luipu luka aiboisio nu epedorete adumun iboro lu isisiaete.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe o'bi angu caluru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ni mu drile tuzu, lezu onita muke ri ma e'yo ni eca curu'do okporu. Ba ka e'yo 'ye mbeleru ku, anzi nyiri karakara angu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi nga awi afa onita ni orodriru 'diyi esu kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu byaro nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'obwegyese burungi nikyeyongyera. Hatariho ekyokukora ahonaaho, abaana baingi omu myanya egi nibaija kusigaza batatungire eby'okukozesa omu kwega.

eng_prompt: At first, the students were restless and distracted during lessons. However, over time, they adapted to the new classroom rules.
lug_prompt: Mu kusooka, abayizi baabadde batabuddwatabuddwa era nga bawugulibwa mu biseera by'okusoma. Kyokka, ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, baamanya amateeka g'ekibiina amapya.
ach_prompt: I acakkine, lutino pe gubedo ki yweyo dok tamgi olokke ikare me pwonye. Kadi bed kumeno, ikare ma okato, guniang ki cik manyen me ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Kageunet, mam esisiak eyalamasi ido apotu isiyalamikisi kesi kapak naka aisisia. Konye, akaulo naka apak, apotu kesi kojenutu ikisila luitetiak luka atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'doria, sukulu anzi 'da eyi ndra ava koko azini eyi ma asini ri sa'wa embata nirisi ku. Kani si, sawa ma vutia, eyi e'do e'yo eyi 'ye azita kilasi ni o'diru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kubanza, abeegi bakaba bataine buhuumuro kandi barikubuzabuzibwa omu bwire bw'okwega. Kwonka bwanyima y'obwire, bakamanya ebiragiro ebitsya by'eishomero.

eng_prompt: As the dark clouds gathered ominously overhead, the teacher hurriedly tried to secure the windows. Suddenly, a fierce gust of wind swept through the school, causing chaos and panic among the students.
lug_prompt: Ebire ebiddugavu bwe byajja waggulu, omusomesa yayanguwa n'agezaako okunyweza amadirisa. Amangu ago, omuyaga ogw'amaanyi gwakuba essomero, ne guleetawo akavuyo n'okutya mu bayizi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pol macol tye ka mol iwi wiye, lapwony otemo matek me gwoko wang ot. Cutcut yamo okodo matek adada I gang kwan, ma okelo kuku kuku ki lworo ikin lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Neautar idokolen luiriokok aimorikikin, abu esisianakinan kotam atipet aidar adirisan. Apotu ekwam kibiroros kosomero, ido abu koyangau amumu keda akurianu kanejaas esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo iniru 'diyi ni yi trazu yi ma dria e'yo onzi 'yeria, embapi obi mbeleru dirisa yi ma ti ci. Sawa 'disi, oli okporu ni aci sukulua dria, e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ori fe sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'omwirima ku bwabaire nibugyenda nibugyenda omu maisho, omwegyesa akagyenda ahonaaho kwombeka amadirisa. Ahonaaho, omuyaga gw'amaani gukareetaho akaimukiriro n'okwerarikirira omu beegi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of educational institutions across the region, the government announced its funding initiative for the upcoming academic year. Excitement filled the air as we learned that our school had been selected for this prestigious program.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza okwetooloola ekitundu, gavumenti yalangirira enteekateeka yaayo ey'okusonda ssente mu mwaka gw'ebyensoma ogujja. Essanyu lyajjula empewo bwe twakitegedde nti essomero lyaffe lyalondeddwa mu pulogulaamu eno ey'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma gangi kwan tye kawot kwede I but lobo man, gamente onyuto yub me miyo lim pi mwaka me kwan matye kabino ni. Wabedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma waniang ni kiyero gangkwan wa me bedo tye I yub man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor aiboisio nu asioman kotoma aiboisit kangin, abu apugan kolimo epone loka aigang ikapun luka ekaru loka asioman lo ebunit. Apotu sio aiyalamikinos noi napupunia sio ebe aseunitai esomerokosi kanu ainapeta nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu onita ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, gamete azi e'yo erini robia fezu eli onita ni emupi ri ni ri ra. Ayiko fu oli si amani e'yo onizu kini 'ba pe sukulu amavileri otita 'di 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese omu kyanga, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka yaayo y'okushashurira omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ogurikwija. Okushemererwa kukaija omu myoyo obu twamanyire ngu eishomero ryaitu rikatooranwa kukora puroguraamu egi ey'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Investing in educational facilities is crucial for fostering a conducive learning environment. Research has shown that the physical conditions of schools can significantly impact student outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma. Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera y'essomero esobola okukosa ennyo enkola y'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo kabedo maber me kwan. Kwed onyuto ni kit ma gangi kwan tye kwede twero kelo adwogi maber i kom lutino.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma aiboisio nu asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria aiboisio nu isisiaere. Itodunit aingic ebe ejautene lo isomeroi epedori aitodolikin eswamae lo idwe.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza angu onita ni 'diyi ma alia ri eri orodriru angu onita ni muke ri ezozu. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo sukulu eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi eco sukulu anzi eyi ma agata oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho omu kureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okucondooza kworeka ngu embeera y'amashomero neebaasa kukora kihango ahamikorere y'abeegi.

eng_prompt: Parents often rave about the exceptional academic achievements and dedicated staff at this institution. Many families choose to relocate to the area specifically for its renowned educational reputation.
lug_prompt: Abazadde batera okwewaana olw'obuwanguzi obw'enjawulo mu by'ensoma n'abakozi abeewaayo mu ssetendekero lino. Amaka mangi gasalawo okusengukira mu kitundu olw'ettutumu lyakyo ery'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo ipol kare giloko I kom rwom me kwan pa lutino ki lutic ma gudyere I gang kwan man. Gangi mapol yero me kobo I kabedo eni tutwalle pi rwom me kwan ne.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc auriak aisiyalamikin nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan noi loka esisiak keda eswamak luka esomero kalo. Apotu ikalia luipu koseutu aibwot aiboisit kangin kanu ajenara noi kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Tipika eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo nze sukulu anzi eyi ma agata kililiru ri ma dria tualu azi'ba ava be sukulu 'di ma alea 'diyi pie. Familia karakara eyi pe muzu angu 'da ma alea eyini ani e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire nibakira kushemererwa ahabw'obuhanguzi bw'omutaano n'abakozi b'omutaano aha itendekyero eri. Amaka maingi nigacwamu kuza omu kyanga ekyo ahabw'okumanya gye eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In many developing countries, access to education remains a significant challenge. As a result, innovative solutions have emerged to accommodate students in remote locations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi ezikyakula, okufuna ebyenjigiriza kukyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, engeri ez'obuyiiya zivuddeyo okusenza abayizi mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol ma gudongo, nongo kwan pud obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo manyen mapat-pat okatti me konyo lutino kwan ma gitye I caro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuepolok, eringa adumunun asioman erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitolomunai iponesio luitetiak luka aidar esisiak luka aiboisio nuka ocaloi.
lgg_prompt: Kari zopi zopi zopi 'diyi ma alia, geri onita esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, geri o'diru 'diyi efu sukulu anzi angu caloru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi agarikutunguuka, okutunga eby'obwegyese kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera abeegi omu myanya y'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and anticipation, the community had come together to fund the construction of a new classroom. As the deadline approached, he eagerly awaited the arrival of the materials needed to begin the project.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okusuubira, ekitundu kyali kyegasse wamu okusonda ssente z'okuzimba ekibiina ekipya. Nsalesale bwe yasemberera, yalindirira n'obwagazi okutuuka kw'ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa okutandika pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki byek, lwak guribbe kacel me miyo cente me yubu ot kwan manyen. I kare ma nino me agiki ne tye cok, en obedo kakuru ki miti madit ni jami ma mite me cako tic ne gubino.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aomisio, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu adukio atukot naitetet. Neyapiete apaarasia nuka awasia, abu ngesi idarak kanu adumun iboro lu ekotoi kanu ageun epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu robia fezu kilasi o'diru ni sizu. O'du asizuri ni ecaria, eri te avasi afa ayuzaru 'bani le otita 'da e'dozu 'diyi ma ecazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateekyera, abantu b'omukyanga bakakorengana kutunga esente z'okwombeka ekibiina kisya. Eizooba ry'ahamuheru ku ryahikire, akarinda n'ekihika okuhika kw'ebintu ebirikwetengwa kutandika purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect, the community has finally received support from local leaders to improve essential facilities. One of the initiatives being undertaken is the construction of latrines for my former school.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga tebafiibwako, abatuuze bafunye obuyambi okuva mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo okulongoosa ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa kwe kuzimba kaabuyonjo z'essomero lye nnasomerako.
ach_prompt: Ingee cayo jami pi mwaki mapol, lwak dong gunongo kony ki bot lutela me tedero me yubu jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Yub acel ma kitye katimo en aye me yubu coron i gang kwan ma akwano iye con.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar lu apalunitere, adumutu kwana itunga agangat kama ejaasi engarenok luka atutubet kanu aitojokar aiboisio nuepolok. Adiopet koboro lu iswamao ngesi aiduk icolonin kosomeroka lomojong.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da esu asizu atita engazu drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi vu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma azi eri coroni eyi sizu sukulu andra mani aa'zu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura, abantu bakahendera batunga obuhwezi kuruga omu beebembezi b'ebyaro, okutunguura eby'okukoresa ebikuru. Kimwe ahabintu ebirikukorwa n'okwombeka ebihorooni aha eishomero ryangye eryabaireho.

eng_prompt: In our community, there has been an ongoing debate about the adequacy of resources in local schools. Many parents are concerned that students are not receiving the necessary tools for their education.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okugenda mu maaso ku ky'ebikozesebwa ebimala mu masomero g'omu kitundu. Abazadde bangi beeraliikirivu nti abayizi tebafuna bikozesebwa mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, laro lok tye ka time I kom jami ma mite I gangi kwan me tedero. Lunyodo mapol tye ki lworo ni lutino pe tye ka nongo jami ma mite pi kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ejai epeget lo elosi akonye kanu iboro lu edolitos kosomeroi. Iyalongongosi auriak luipu ebe mam idwe edumununete iboro lu ipudai kanu asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, agbatara ebi ovu muzu drile e'yo afa ayuzaru sukulu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ma dria. Tipika karakara eyi asi otiza be kini sukulu anzi eyi isuni afa lele onita eyini 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, hatwire hariho okuhanuura aha by'okukoresa ebirikumara omu mashomero. Abazaire baingi niberarikirira ngu abeegi tibarikutunga ebikwato ebirikwetengwa omu kwega kwabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address its ongoing energy crisis, the government of South Sudan is exploring various solutions to enhance its electricity supply. One of the key strategies involves seeking partnerships with neighboring countries to secure a reliable source of power.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola ekizibu ky'amasannyalaze ekigenda mu maaso, gavumenti ya South Sudan enoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okwongera ku masannyalaze gaayo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebiyinza okukolebwa kwe kukolagana n'amawanga agaliraanyeewo okusobola okufuna amasannyalaze ageesigika.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyeko peko me mac matye kawot anyim, gamente me South Sudan tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo mac. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo yenyo winye ki lobe ma orumuwa me nongo mac ma genne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka akim, euta apugan nako South Sudan aingic iwaitin lu itojokaret akim. Adiopet kotoma aitemonokineta ngun imoriarit aimo aimorikikina keda akwapin nu idunyare kanu adumun akim na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ewaru aci ni 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete kari sudani andraleruri niri ni geri ndundu eyi onda ecozu eri ma aci ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi okporu 'diyi ma azi lezu ti ecita esuzu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie geri aci esuzu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora aha buremeezi bw'amashanyarazi,gavumenti ya sudan y'amashuuma eriyo nekoresa oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe kutunguura amashanyarazi gaayo. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikubaasa kukorwa n'okuronda enkoragana n'amahanga agatuherereire, kugira ngu habeho oburugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent challenges faced by the community, local leaders have convened to discuss potential strategies. Their goal is to ensure that residents feel empowered and informed as they navigate important choices ahead.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebyalo batuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri z'okukikolamu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukakasa nti abatuuze bawulira nga baweereddwa amaanyi n'okutegezebwa nga bwe batambuza okusalawo okw'omugaso mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gubedo kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo mapat-pat matwero tic kwede. Miti gi tye me neno ni lutedero tye ki kero ki ngec ikare gi me moko tam ma pigi tego ikare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas itunga, apotu engarenok lu ocaalo iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin. Alosikinetekosi erai awanyun ebe epupete itunga lu atutubet ebe ejaasi keda apedor ka acoa kapak kana aitolot aseununeta nuepolok koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu eturisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu ra 'diyi ma dria. Asisile yiniri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aa okpo be dika eyi ma esu e'yo eyi ma dria eyini e'yo 'duzu e'yo okporu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu barikurabamu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka y'okuhanuura. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureeba ngu abatuuragye bahurira baine amaani kandi bamanyisibwe, nk'oku barikuza omu by'okucwamu ebikuru omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In the face of common challenges such as climate change and economic instability, it is crucial for neighboring nations to collaborate. Strengthening regional ties can lead to greater stability and prosperity for all involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kusoomoozebwa kw'awamu ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, kikulu nnyo amawanga agaliraanyeewo okukolera awamu. Okunyweza enkolagana y'ebitundu kisobola okuleetawo obutebenkevu n'okukulaakulana eri abo bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka neno peko macalo alokaloka pa piny ki peko me lim, pire tek tutwal ni lobe matye jirani omyero gutii kacelo. Jingo wat ikin lobe twero kelo kuc ki lonyo bot dano weng matye I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loka atiokisio kwape nat aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma ikapun, ejokuka akwapin nu idunyare aiswamanar. Aitogogong eidicane lo aiboisio epedori ayangaun ainapakina ka abar nejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tualu ekile angu mile ma ojata le azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ni ti ecizu tualu. Ti ecita angu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eco fe asianzu tualu lonyi be 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwa boona nk'empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'obutabanguko omu by'entaasya, ni kikuru amahanga agatuherereire kukwatanisa. Okwongyera amaani omu nkoragana z'ebyanga nikibaasa kureetaho obutebekana n'obusinguzi aha bantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges they faced, the team remained optimistic about their goals. As the deadline approached, they gathered for a final meeting to discuss their next steps.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa, ttiimu yasigala n'essuubi ku biruubirirwa byayo. Nga nsalesale asembera, baakuŋŋaana mu lukiiko olusembayo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiddako.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukato ki peko mapol, dul tuku ne gubedo ki gen I kom yubgi. Ikare ma nino me agiki ne cok, gucokke pi kacokke me agiki me nyamo ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda atiokisio nuipu, apotu etimu kojaasi keda aomisio nuejokuka nuikamunitos apeleikinata kec. Neyapiete apaarasia nuka awasia, apotu kesi kotukokinos kanu airiamun na awasia kanu aitemitem nu ebeit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yini esu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti 'da awi asi'baza be e'yo yini lele 'diyi ma dria. O'du asizuri ni ecazu ogogo 'boria, eyi tra eyi mitingi asizu ni ma alea agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini 'ye drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi obu batungire, tiimu ekaguma eine amatsiko aha bigyendererwa byayo. Eizooba ry'ahamuheru ku ryahikire, baketeerana omu rukiiko rw'ahamuheru kuhanuura aha kirikukurataho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has made significant investments in its energy infrastructure. As a result, the country has increased its electricity generation capacity, allowing it to share surplus power with neighboring nations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda etaddemu ssente nnyingi mu by'amasannyalaze. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga lyeyongedde amaanyi mu kukola amasannyalaze, ne kisobozesa okugabana amasannyalaze agasukkiridde n'amawanga agaliraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda oketo lim madit tutwal I yub me mac. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo ne omedo kero ne me yubu mac elektriciti, ma oweko en opoko mac ma odong ki lobe macok kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, abu Uganda ibwaik ikapun luipu noi toma aitwasam akim. Kanuka ngun, eyataki akwap apedorit ke naka aitolom akim naka epiei, ijaikit ngesi aimor keda akwapin nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alia, Ugandani lonyi vuti aleza angiri 'ye afa aci ni 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, kari 'di otu okpo erini aci edezuri ma omgbo ra, erini ani fezu erini aci acepi 'diyi awazu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda eteire sente nyingi omu by'amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu, eihanga ryongyeire amaani g'okukora amashanyarazi, ekirikwikiriza okugabana amashanyarazi agarikumara n'amahanga agatuherereire.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and infrastructure development, the energy project has finally reached its completion. Local officials announced that power has been provided for the West Nile region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukulaakulanya ebizimbe, pulojekiti y'amasannyalaze emalirizibwa. Abakungu b'ebyalo baalangiridde nti amasannyalaze gaweereddwa ekitundu kya West Nile.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki dongo gedo, yub me mac dong otum. Lutela me tedero guwaco ni kimiyo mac I but lobo me west nile.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin ka aitopol iboro, adaun aitodolikin epurojekt lo akim. Apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimo ebe ejaikitai akim aiboisit nako West Nile.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ezozu 'bori ma vutia, otita aci ni 'da de asizu 'bo. Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi kini 'ba fe aci angu westnile niri ni 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okutunguura ebyombeko, purogyekiti y'amashanyarazi eherize kuhwa. Abakungu b'ebyaro bakarangirira ngu amashanyarazi gatairweho omu kicweka kya West Nile.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing energy demands and the need for sustainable solutions, the company has announced its latest initiative. This project aims to harness renewable resources to support local communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'okufuna eby'okugonjoola ebizibu eby'olubeerera, kampuni erangiridde enteekateeka yaayo eyasembyeyo. Pulojekiti eno egenderera okukozesa ebintu ebizzibwa obuggya okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me mac ki miti me nongo yoo me tic matye anyim, dul ne otito yub meggi manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me tic ki jami ma ki roco gi me konyo lwak ma ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akim lo iyatakinete keda eipuda lo aitemokin atiokisio, elimorit ekampuni aswamukec naitetet. Ekoto epurojekt lo aitwasam iboro lu itwasamao kanu aigang itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu aci ma omgbo tuzu tualu geri ecozu e'yo 'yezu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi pie, amuti 'da azi e'yo erini 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma asisile afa 'bani eco ayu dika ra 'diyi ayuzu atita fezu ongulumu angu ma alia 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu ebyetengo by'amashanyarazi ebyeyongyeire hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okutunga oburyo burungi, kampuni erangirire ekigyendererwa kyayo ekisya. Purogyekiti egi negyenderera okukoresa eby'obugaiga ebirikubaasa kugarurwa busya, okuhwera abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: The team has completed all necessary maintenance checks and is ready for the final preparations. As a result, the power generation plant will be switched on at night.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu emalirizza okukebera okuddaabiriza kwonna okwetaagisa era yeetegefu okukola enteekateeka ezisembayo. N'ekivuddemu, ekkolero ly'amasannyalaze lijja kukwatibwa ekiro.
ach_prompt: Dul ne dong otyeko ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede dok tye atera pi yub me agiki. Macalo adwogi ne, kibi yabo mac I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Adau etimu angetakin ainwakio na iboro kere ido ekapakina aitemonokin nu awasia. Kanuka ngun, eponio aicak akim kware.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da de 'bo afa dria 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu dika eyi ngonde otita asizu 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga aci edepi 'da ma aci e'do inisi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu eherize kukyebera ebintu byona ebirikwetengwa kandi eyeteekateekire kukora enteekateeka z'ahamuheru. N'ekyarugiremu, ekyoma ky'okukora amashanyarazi nikiija kwombekwa nyekiro.

eng_prompt: The project timeline has been finalized, and all necessary preparations are in place. We are now ready to proceed with the next phase of the construction.
lug_prompt: Ebiseera bya pulojekiti biwedde era enteekateeka zonna ezeetaagisa zitegekeddwa. Kati tuli beetegefu okugenda mu maaso n'ekitundu ekiddako eky'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Gityeko yubu kare me yub eni dok yub weng matye tye. Kombedi watye atera me mede ki yub me gedo mukene.
teo_prompt: Aponi ongetakinai ainapeta nuka apak naka epurojekt, ido ejaas aitemonokineta kere. Ikapakina kwana sio ainyikokin keda atutubet naetupakini naka aduko.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani otita 'da 'yezu ri de 'bo, dika otuta dria lele 'diyi pari 'du 'bo. Ama sa'wa 'disi ngonde muzu e'yo afa sizu 'diyi ma drile ri be.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bwa purogyekiti bwahwaire, n'entebekanisa zoona ezirikwetengwa zitandikirwe. Hati tweteekateekire kugumizamu n'omurundi ogurikukurataho ogw'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and infrastructure development, the long-awaited energy project has finally come to fruition. Residents of the region can now look forward to a brighter future with reliable electricity access.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukulaakulanya ebintu ebikozesebwa, pulojekiti y'amasannyalaze ebadde erindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene emaze okutuukirira. Abatuuze b'ekitundu kati basobola okwesunga ebiseera by'omu maaso ebitangaavu n'amasannyalaze agesigika.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki dongo gedo, yub me mac ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac dong otum. Lutedero me twok piny eni dong gitye ki gen me bedo ki anyim maber ki mac ma pe rweny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin ka aitopol ipurojektin lu akim lu idaritere apak naepol, adaun aitodolikin. Epedorete kwana itunga luka atutubet ngin amunokina aijar naejok koingaren keda akim naejok.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ezozu 'bori ma vutia, otita aci ni 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri eca asizu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'di ma alea 'diyi eco curu'do asi 'ba ewu drialeri ma drilia aci esuzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okutunguura ebyombeko, purogyekiti y'amashanyarazi eretsirweho obwire buraingwa, eherize kuhikiirira. Abatuuragye b'omu kyanga, hati nibabaasa kwesiga ebiro by'omumaisho birungi, barikubaasa kutunga amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about regional development, local leaders emphasized the urgent need for improved infrastructure. As a result, border towns near Congo have also requested for power connection.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkulaakulana y'ebitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakikkaatirizza obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebikozesebwa okulongoosebwa. N'ekivuddemu, ebibuga ebiri ku nsalo okumpi ne Congo nabyo bisabye okuyungibwa ku masannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom dongo lobo, lutela me tedero gucuko cwinygi tutwal I kom miti me medo rwom me gedo. Macalo adwogi ne, boma matye I wang lobo matye cok ki Congo bene gulego pi kubu mac.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos apol naka aiboisio, apotu engarenok luka atutubena kitogogongoto eipud loka aitojokar adukena. Kanuka ngun, itaunin lu oikoru lu idunyasi keda Congo ilipitos arucokinio na akim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru angu ezoma ma dria 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba asi e'yo lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, tawuni boda mile Congo ma ageia 'diyi a'i vini aci eyi ma eceta ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha ntunguuka y'ebyanga, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakahamya ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, endembo eziri aha nsharo haihi na Congo nazo zishabire amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for energy in remote areas, local officials have been discussing potential infrastructure improvements. As a result, plans are in place to extend power to the border region.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera mu byalo, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde bateesa ku ngeri y'okutumbulaamu ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka zitegekeddwa okutuusa amasannyalaze mu bitundu by'oku nsalo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me mac I caro, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me yubu jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, yub tye me cwalo mac I but lobo mapat-pat manonge I wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akim kaiboisio nu ocaalo, eutasi eswamak lu ocaalo aitemitem nuka aitojokar iboro. Kanuka ngun, ejai aitemonokineta nuka aisiekikin akim aiboisio nu oikoruon.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako aci ni angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi agbatara gba e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otuta 'ye aci edrizu angu boda'a 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'amashanyarazi obweyongyeire omu byaro, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibagaaniira aha nshonga z'okutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho enteekateeka y'okuhisya amashanyarazi omu byanga ebiri aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling with limited resources, the village finally received the much-needed support from the government. This assistance has transformed their living conditions and revitalized the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga balwanagana n'ebikozesebwa ebitono, ekyalo kyamala ne kifuna obuyambi obwali bwetaagibwa ennyo okuva mu gavumenti. Obuyambi buno bukyusizza embeera z'obulamu bwabwe n'okuzza obuggya ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny ki jami ma nok, caro ne dong onongo kony ma mite ki bot gamente. Kony man okelo aloka-loka I kwo gi ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu ainingosit keda iboro lu ikidioko, abu ecalo ngol kodum agangat na ekotoi kanejai apugan. Ejulaki agangat ngin ejautene lo aijar kec ka aisiteteun itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo a'di 'dizu afa ayuzaru were 'diyisi, calo 'da esu asizu atita gamete ni lele saaru ri ra. Azakoma 'di oja geri yini aa'zu ri ra dika eri fe ongulumu eyini ava ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana n'eby'obugaiga bikye, ekyaro kikahendera kyabona obuhwezi kuruga omu Gavumenti. Obuhwezi obu, buhindwire emituurire yaabo kandi bwongyera amaani omu bantu.

eng_prompt: A reliable energy supply is crucial for economic development and attracting business. Without it, potential opportunities for growth and investment may be lost.
lug_prompt: Amasannyalaze agesigika ga mugaso nnyo mu kukulaakulanya eby'enfuna n'okusikiriza bizinensi. Awatali ekyo, emikisa gy'okukulaakulana n'okusiga ensimbi giyinza okubula.
ach_prompt: Mac ma pe rweny ikare weng pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki kelo biacara. Labongo ne, gum me dongo lobo ki keto lim I biyacara twero rweny woko.
teo_prompt: Akim na eyuara nes ejok kanu apol naka ikapun ka aisukunyun ebiasara. Arai emamei, epedorete arerengesio nuka apol keda agwelanar atwaniar.
lgg_prompt: Aci feza kililiru ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robianiri ni azini tujari eyi ma omgbo otuzu. Eri kokoru, drileba e'yo zota ni azini lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi eco avi ra.
nyn_prompt: Amashanyarazi agatarikurugaho n'ag'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi. Hatariho ekyo, emigisha y'okutunguuka hamwe n'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi neebaasa kuferwa.

eng_prompt: As the infrastructure development progresses, ensuring access to essential services becomes increasingly important. The successful completion of transportation routes lays the groundwork for further advancements in the region.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe egenda mu maaso, okukakasa nti abantu bafuna obuweereza obwetaagisa kyeyongera okuba eky'omugaso. Okumaliriza obulungi enguudo z'entambula kuteekawo omusingi gw'okukulaakulana mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ka dongo lobo tye kamedde anyim, nongo kony ma mite ikwo doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Tyeko tic ki yoo me wot maber oketo guti me dongo lobo i twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai apol naka aiboisio, epol ajokis noi aitodolikin ejanakine lo itwasamao. Aitodolikin irotin lu elose ejok itolomuni atutubet apol.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezota ni muzu drile, e'yo lezu 'ba ma esu afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi ma esuta ni eca curu'do orodriru. Geri acipa ni 'diyi ma deza kililiru ri ni e'yo angu ezoma ni angu 'di ma alea ri 'ba.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku entunguuka y'ebyombeko erikugyenda omu maisho, okureeba ngu abantu batunga obuheereza bw'omugasho, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Okumaririza kurungi enguuto z'eby'engyenda, nikitandikaho omusingye gw'entunguuka omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Access to consistent power is crucial for the development and well-being of communities in Northern Uganda. Without it, economic growth and quality of life are severely hindered.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amasannyalaze ag'olubeerera kya mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'obulungi bw'ebitundu mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda. Awatali ekyo, enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'omutindo gw'obulamu bikosebwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki mac ma pe lokke obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ber bedo pa lwak ma tung kumalo me Uganda. Labongo cente, dongo lobo ki rwom me kwo pe bedo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akim na etapit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda ajokis naka itunga luko Nyakoi nako Uganda. Arai emamei, emunarete apol naka ikapun keda adoketait na aijar.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma esuta kililiru ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni azini aa'ta muke ongulumu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea 'diyini. Eri kokoru, zota e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni eca ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikwaho amashanyarazi agatarikuhinduka n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'amagara marungi g'abantu b'omumatemba ga Uganda. Hatariho, entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu nibizibirwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by the community, the council has decided to take decisive action. To address these issues effectively, they have appointed a dedicated representative.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga gye buvuddeko, akakiiko kasazeewo okubaako kye kakolawo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, balonze omukiise eyeewaddeyo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, kancil omoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Me tyeko lok magi maber, gucimo lacungu pigi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubet, abu ekansulo koseu aswam kagogong. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, aseutu kesi abwoikiniton.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu eturisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, kanisulu 'du e'yo 'yezu okporu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eyi ope 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu batungire,akakiiko kashaziremu kukora eky'amaani. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, batoraine omujwekyerwa waabo.

eng_prompt: To ensure the stability and longevity of the electricity poles, careful planning is essential. One important consideration is the timing of the planting process.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obutebenkevu n'obuwangaazi bw'ebikondo by'amasannyalaze, okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza kya mugaso. Ekintu ekimu ekikulu eky'okulowoozaako kye kiseera eky'okusimba.
ach_prompt: Pi neno ni pol mac tye maber dok orii pi kare malac, yub maber pire tek tutwal. Gin acel ma pire tek aye obedo kare me pito kodi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ibusakinit ipirin luka akim aiboi ejok, ibusakinit aitemonokin ejok. Ibore yenibusakinit aomoom ngesi apak naka aira.
lgg_prompt: Aci pati eyi ma aa'ta kililiru azini aa'zu sa'wa ezu ri nezu, otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru. E'yo azi orodriru 'bani ega ri sa'wa 'bani ori sazu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebikondo by'amashanyarazi bigumire, n'eky'omugasho kukora enteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza. Ekikuru munonga n'obwire bw'okubyara.

eng_prompt: As concerns about childhood nutrition continue to rise, many parents are questioning the quality of meals provided in educational institutions. With increasing awareness of the impact of diet on learning and health, it's crucial to evaluate the food options available to students.
lug_prompt: Nga okweraliikirira ku ndya y'abaana kweyongera okulinnya, abazadde bangi babuusabuusa omutindo gw'emmere eweebwa mu masomero. N'okweyongera okumanyisa ku ngeri endya gy'ekosaamu okusoma n'obulamu, kya mugaso nnyo okwekenneenya eby'okulya ebiriwo eri abayizi.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom rwom me cam ma kimiyo igangi kwan. Ki mede pa ngec I kom adwoki pa cam I kom kwan ki yot kom, pire tek tutwal me niang kit cam ma lutino tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata aiyalongongo kanu enyamete idwe ejok, mam auriak luipu ejenete adoketait na inyamat lu ijaikitai osomeroi. Keda aijen naepol noi naikamunit epone loepedoriata ainyam aisisia keda angaleu, ejokuna noi airereor inyamat lu ejaas esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo anzi nyiri eyini nyaka nyaza kililiru ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, tipika karakara eyi e'yo ega nyaka 'bani fele sukulu eyi ma alea ri ma wura ma dria ku. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyini imbata fezu e'yo nyaka eyini nya 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo nyaka sukulu anzi eyini nya 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okwerarikirira ahaby'endya y'abaana nikweyongyera, abazaire baingi nibabangaanisa omutindo gw'eby'okurya omu mashomero. Ahabw'okugira ngu abantu beeyongyeire kumanya ebirikukwata aha by'okurya, n'eky'omugasho okushwijuma eby'okurya ebirikuba biriho aha beegi.

eng_prompt: In response to a series of poor harvests and increasing global demand, the agricultural market faced significant fluctuations. Analysts predicted that the upcoming year would see dramatic changes in commodity prices, particularly for sugar.
lug_prompt: Olw'amakungula amabi n'obwetaavu obweyongera mu nsi yonna, akatale k'ebyobulimi kaayolekaganye n'enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi. Abakugu mu by'enfuna baalagula nti omwaka ogujja gujja kubaamu enkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi y'ebintu naddala eya sukaali.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me kac mapol ma pe obedo ber ki mede pa miti pa jami apita I wilobo lung, cuk me pur obedo ki alokaloka madit tutwal. Lunywak ngec guwaco ni wel jami acata bi loke tutwalle cukari I mwaka manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin esakani loaronon keda eipuda lo iyatakinet kotoma akwap kere, abu esokoni loka akor kodum aijulanakineta nuipu. Apotu angicak kotemasi ebe ebuni ekaru lo ebunit aijulakin etiai loka iboro, kacut esukali.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nyaka okuzu muke kuri ma e'yosi azini lezu wudrikurusiri ma omgbo tuzu, cu agirikica niri esu ojata okporu 'diyi ra. Ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi ega kini eli emupi 'disi aje afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria, tutuni sukari ma dria 'diyi nga i oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'amakungula mabi hamwe n'okwetenga kw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa okweyongyeire, akatare k'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa kakashanga empindahinduka y'amaani. Abacencuzi bakateebereza ngu omwaka ogurikwija niguza kureetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu mihendo y'ebintu okukira munonga eya shukaari.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that nutrition plays a crucial role in cognitive function and academic performance. Starting the day with a nutritious meal can significantly impact a student's ability to focus and learn effectively.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti endya ekola kinene nnyo mu kumanya n'okukola obulungi mu by'ensoma. Okutandika olunaku n'emmere erimu ebiriisa kisobola okukyusa obusobozi bw'omuyizi okussaayo omwoyo n'okusoma obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni cam ma ber konyo tutwal I kom tic pa adam ki kit ma lutino timo kwede i gang kwan. Cako nino ki cam matye ki moc cam maber twero weko latin kwan keto cwinye dok pwonyo maber.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe epol ajokis naka aijul eode keda eswamae loajokan kotoma asioman. Ageunet naka apaaran keda ainyam naejok epedori aitojokar apedor naka esisiak apodokinit kosodete aisisia ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini nyaka nyaza ni azi okporu nga e'yo egaza ma alia azini agata onitaniri ma alia. O'du e'dozu nyaka rua fepi 'diyi pie ri ni sukulu anzi eyi ma okpo fe eyini asi 'bazu azini onita onizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu eby'okurya nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya n'okukora gye omu mashomero. Okutandika eizooba n'okurya eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa, nikibaasa kuhwera abeegi kuta omutima n'okwega kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many factors contribute to a child's ability to succeed academically, including their home environment and access to resources. One significant issue that often hinders educational achievement is economic hardship.
lug_prompt: Ebintu bingi ebireetawo obusobozi bw'omwana okuwangula mu kusoma, omuli embeera y'awaka n'okufuna ebyetaago. Ensonga emu enkulu eremesa abantu okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'enjigiriza bwe buzibu bw'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma weko latin timo maber I gang kwan, ma I kingi obedo kabedo ma en bedo iye ki nongo jami ma mite. Lok acel ma pire tek ma pol kare gengo dano me nongo kwan maber obedo peko me can lim.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro lu ijaikitos idwe akerianar kotoma asioman kec, aimoriarit aiboisio nu oreria kec keda adumun iboro. Adiopebore naepol noi naepedori aitikitik eswamae loajokan kotoma asioman ngesi atiokisio nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi fe anzi eyi ma drile suza sukulu'a ri ma omgbo ni tualu angu eyini aa'zu akua 'diyi pie tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta pie. E'yo azi okporu e'yo onitani 'diyi atripi ri eri e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho obushoboorozi bw'omwana okusingura omu mishomo, otwariiremu n'obuhangwa bw'omuka hamwe n'okutunga eby'okukoresa. Enshonga y'amaani erikukira kuremesa abantu okutunga eby'obwegyese, n'oburemeezi omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions about the cafeteria menu, no one has voiced their concerns. Many are unsure how to approach the topic without causing conflict.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi ku mmenyu y'emmere, tewali n'omu alaze kweraliikirira kwe. Bangi tebamanyi ngeri ya kukwatamu nsonga eno awatali kuleetawo butakkaanya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni nywako lok tye mapol I kom cam ma tye I ot cam, pe tye ngat mo ma onyuto lworo ne. Dano mapol pe tye ki ngec matut I kom kit me lok I kom lok eni labongo kelo kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ineresinei nuikamunitos inyamat luka eoteri, emamei idiotunganan yenelimunit aiyalongongokec. Mam itunga luipu ejenete epone loipedoria kesi aitodolikin akirot ngin komam eyangaunete ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza karakara eyi ma talasi e'yo 'bani 'ba nyaka nyazu 'diyi ma dria ra ti, 'ba azi e'da ni e'yo eyi ma dria ku. Ba karakara eyi nini geri eyini ecozu e'yo nde ma aza kozu ngiringiri eji kokoru ri ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okuhanuura kwingi aha by'okurya by'omu kafeture, tihaine orikworeka okwerarikirira kwe. Baingi tibarikwetegyereza oku bashemereire kukoresa enshonga egi batareesireho obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: Students will enjoy a variety of meal options during their stay. As part of the program, all meals are provided to enhance the overall experience.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bajja kunyumirwa eby'okulya eby'enjawulo mu kiseera ky'okubeera kwabwe. Ng'ekitundu ku pulogulaamu, emmere yonna eweebwa okwongera ku bumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan gubi nongo mit pa cam ma pat pat ikare gi me kwan. Macalo but yub eni, cam weng kimiyo wek dano gubed ki yomcwiny.
teo_prompt: Epote esisiak ailel inyamat luegelegela kapak kana aiboi kec. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, einanakinio inyamat kere kanu aitojokar aijar.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi eyi nga nyaka ndundu eyi nya sa'wa eyini aa'zu ri si ra. Otita 'da ma azi ru, 'ba nyaka dria eyi fe 'ba eyini eyini ani ayiko esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi nibaija kurya eby'okurya bitari bimwe na bimwe omu bwire bwabo. Nk'ekicweka kya puroguraamu, eby'okurya byona nibiherezibwa okwongyera aha muringo gw'okushemererwamu.

eng_prompt: Many families in the community struggle to find affordable grocery stores nearby. As a result, their options for healthy meals are severely restricted.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu galwana okufuna amaduuka g'emmere ag'ebbeeyi eya wansi okumpi awo. N'ekivuddemu, ebyokulya byabwe eby'obulamu bikugirwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol i kabedo eni nongo tek tutwal me nongo dukan me cato jami ma welgi yot cok kwedgi. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo gi me camo cam mabeco tye magoro tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu kotoma atutubet etionikinit adumun idukai luegwelete ikapun luikidioko. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi epedorete ainyam inyamat lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Familia ongulumu 'da ma alea karakara eyi dri ci dukani afa ozizaru aje kokoru 'diyi esuzu eyi ma agei. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma geri eyini ecozu nyaka muke 'diyi nyazu 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga nigarwana kuronda amaduuka g'eby'okurya ag'emihendo mirungi haihi. N'ekyarugiremu, tibarikubaasa kurya ebyokurya birungi.

eng_prompt: It's important for parents to monitor their child's health regularly. When a child shows signs of illness, it can disrupt their daily routine and education.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso abazadde okulondoola obulamu bw'abaana baabwe buli kaseera. Omwana bw'alaga obubonero bw'obulwadde, kisobola okutaataaganya emirimu gye egya bulijjo n'okusoma kwe.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me ngiyo kit ma lutino gi tye kwede. Ka latin onyuto lanyut me two, man twero balo ticgi me nino ducu ki kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi auriak aanyanar angaleu naka idwekec duc. Arai itodunia ikoku ijenuneta luka adeka, epedori aitolitol aswamukec naka nginiparan keda asiomanikec.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru tipika eyini eyi ma anzi eyi ma rua ala onezu sa'wa driasi. Mva azi ka eceta azo ni 'diyi e'da, eri eco e'yo erini 'ye o'du driasi azini onita ma alia 'diyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho abazaire kureebuuza amagara g'abaana baabo buri kaire. Omwana ku arikworeka obubonero bw'oburwaire, nikibaasa kurabanisamu emirimo ye eya buriizooba hamwe n'okwega kwe.

eng_prompt: In a market driven by consumer expectations, once prices increase, it often creates a perception of value that makes it difficult for them to decrease. This phenomenon is particularly evident in industries where brand loyalty and perceived quality play significant roles.
lug_prompt: Mu katale akavugibwa ebisuubirwa abaguzi, emiwendo bwe girinnya, kitondawo endowooza y'omuwendo ekikaluubiriza okukendeera. Kino kyeyolekera nnyo mu makolero omuli eby'amaguzi eby'ebbeeyi.
ach_prompt: I cuk matye ki miti pa luwil, ka wel omede, man pol kare kelo tam me wel ma weko bedo tek tutwal botgi me dwogo piny. Man nen tutwalle I tenge me yubo jami kama gen I kom jami ma kiyubu ki rwom me jami ma kiyubu pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osokoni loebeitor agwelak aswam iboro luekotosi kesi, arai iyatakin itiaisinei, einakini ngin itunga aomisioit ebe etionikinit kesi aitidisiar. Erai na ibore yenitodunit noi kotoma okampuni lueminasi itunga aitodun adoketait naejok.
lgg_prompt: Cu ma alia 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma egata si, aje ka tu 'bo, eri sawa driasi egata orodri ma dria 'diyi eji erini fezu yi dri ewaru esizu ra. E'yo 'di ni i e'da tuni okalamvu yi ma alia 'bani asi 'bazu 'ba yi ma rua azini 'bani ega kini yi ma wura onyiru 'diyi azi okporu ngazu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare akarikwebemberwa ebyetengo by'abaguzi, emihendo ku erikweyongyera, nikireetaho enteekateeka y'omuhendo erikubaremesa okukyendera. Ekikorwa eki nikyeyoreka munonga omu makorero ahu obwesigwa n'omutindo gurikureebeka nibikora omurimo gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: As the students gathered in the auditorium, a sense of unease filled the air, prompting the principal to address the pressing issues affecting their community. With rising costs and uncertainty looming, the administration felt it was crucial to provide clarity on the current economic situation.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bwe baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge, waabalukawo obunkenke ne kiviirako omukulu w'essomero okwogera ku nsonga ezikwata ku kitundu kyabwe. Olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'obutali butebenkevu obwali bujja, abaddukanya emirimu baalaba nga kya mugaso okuwa obutangaavu ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna eriwo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lutino gucokke I ot lega, lworo omako piny, ma oweko ladit gang kwan oloko I kom peko matye ka yelo kabedo gi. I kare ma wel lim tye ka medde ki bedo ki akala-kala, lutela guwinyo ni pire tek tutwal me tito lok ada I kom lok me lim matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Neautar esisiak atukonokin toma airiamunet, abu aiyalongong kilelebun kokwam, ido abu ijaik apolon esomero einer nuikamunitos atiokisio nuetapit atutubet kec. Keda aiyatakin na itiaisinei keda amamus ajenanut, abu eyaitene koany ebe ejokuna noi aitijenar ejautene loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi eyini eyi trazu pari onita ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru eyi 'ye angu 'da ma alea eyini ani dricere eyi ma aza kozu e'yo okporu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo aje ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie, driceza 'da ega kini eri orodriru e'yo ecezu e'yo robia ni sawa 'disi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi ku barikuteeranira omu kishengye ky'okushomeramu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire, ekyareteire mukuru w'eishomero kugamba aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa ekyanga kyabo. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'emihendo hamwe n'obutegyendesereza oburiho, abarikukurira eby'obushubuzi bakareeba ngu n'eky'omugasho kworeka gye embeera y'eby'entaasya eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: Concerns had been raised by parents about the recent incidents on campus. In light of these issues, the school management decided it was necessary to convene a meeting.
lug_prompt: Abazadde baali beeraliikirivu olw'ebintu ebibaddewo ku ssomero gye buvuddeko. Okusinziira ku nsonga zino, abakulembeze b'essomero baasalawo nti kyali kyetaagisa okuyita olukiiko.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo gubedo ki lworo I kom jami ma otimme I gang kwan. Ma lubbe ki lok magi, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tamgi me lwongo kacoke.
teo_prompt: Apotu auriak kinerata nuikamunitos akiro nuiswamasi pac kosomero. Katupitos akiro nu, abu eyaitene lo esomero kotema ebe ibusakinit anyaraun airiamunet.
lgg_prompt: Tipika eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo i 'yepi o'diru sukulu anzi eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma e'yo si, driceza sukulu niri 'du e'yo kini eri orodriru mitingi omvezu.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire bakaba boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'ebyabaireho ahaishomero. Ahabw'eshonga ezi, abeebembezi b'eishomero bakasharamu ngu kihikire kweta orukiiko.

eng_prompt: To ensure that all students have access to nutritious meals throughout the day, the administration has implemented a comprehensive food program. This initiative aims to support both their academic performance and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abayizi bonna bafuna emmere erimu ebiriisa olunaku lwonna, abaddukanya essomero bataddewo enteekateeka y'emmere enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuyamba ku nsoma yaabwe n'obulungi bwabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutino weng tye ka nongo cam matye ki moc cam maber nino ducu, ludito me gang kwan gukati ki yub me cam maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me konyo lutino me timo peny maber ki bene bedo ki kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe edumunenete esisiak inyamat lu enyamete ejok aparan kere, etolomu eyaitene ainapeta nuka ainyam. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar eswamae kec lo asioman keda aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini sukulu anzi dria eyi nyaka muke 'diyi esu o'du driasi, driceza sukulu niri 'ba otita nyaka fezu 'ba dria eyidri ri 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu atita fezu agata eyini sukulu'a ri ma dria tualu geri eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abeegi boona batunga eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa eizooba ryona, abarikukurira eishomero bateireho enteekateeka y'eby'okurya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okuhwera abeegi kukora gye omu mashomero hamwe n'okuba gye.

eng_prompt: Despite the school's strict policies against unauthorized transactions, rumors began to circulate among the students. Many were discreetly exchanging items, hoping to avoid drawing attention from the administration.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'essomero lirina amateeka amakakali agakugira okukola ebintu nga tolina lukusa, olugambo lwatandika okusaasaana mu bayizi. Bangi baali bawaanyisiganya ebintu mu nkukutu nga basuubira okwewala okusikiriza abakulembeze.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gang kwan tye ki cik matek i kom cato wil ma pe ki yee, lok angea ocako wot ikin lutino kwan. Dano mapol gubedo ka wilo jami mapat-pat I mung, ki gen me gwokke ki lok pa lutela.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi esomero keda ainapeta nuikamunitos agwelanar na mam ecamakitai, apotu akiro nuarokok kogeutu alosit kiding esisiak. Eutasi luipu aikopar iboro koipone kalo aiyeyea, aomit kesi ebe mam epedorete ayangaun aanyunet kama ejaasi eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ma azita okporu 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo onzi eyi e'do aci sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ri afa eyi awa ndindiru asi 'baza be eyini ani eyi ma mile esuzu engazu driceza 'da vu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro by'eishomero ebirikuzibira okukoresa ebintu ebitarikwikirizibwa, orugambo rukatandika kutambura omu beegi. Baingi bakaba nibahana ebintu omu bwijwire, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kwetantara okureetaho amahurire kuruga omu b'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: Many students come to school without having eaten, which can hinder their ability to focus and learn effectively. Ensuring that all children start their day with a nutritious meal can significantly improve their academic performance and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bajja ku ssomero nga tebalya, ekiyinza okubalemesa okussaayo omwoyo n'okusoma obulungi. Okukakasa nti abaana bonna batandika olunaku lwabwe n'emmere erimu ebiriisa kisobola okulongoosa ennyo enkola yaabwe mu kusoma n'obulungi bwabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol bino igangkwan labongo camo cam, ma man weko pe gi keto cwinygi dok pe gi pwonyo maber. Neno ni lutino weng gucako nino gi ki cam matye ki moc cam maber twero medo rwom me kwan gi ki kwo gi.

lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi emu sukulua nyaka kokoru eyini ani ecozu eyi ma asi 'bazu azini onita onizu kililiru ku. E'yo nezu ra kini anzi nyiri dria eyi ma o'du e'do nyaka rua nipi muke 'diyisi ri eco eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri otu ra dika eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibaija ahaishomero batariire, ekirikubalemesa kuta omutima n'okwega kurungi. Okureeba ngu abaana boona batandika eizooba ryabo n'eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa, nikibaasa kutunguura emikorere yaabo omu mashomero hamwe n'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: The school has a strong focus on providing education to underprivileged communities. As a result, many families rely on financial assistance to support their children's schooling.

lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da 'ba asi okporu onita fezu ongulumu afa koko 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara yi yi ati atita robianiri ma dria yi vile anzi 'diyi ma ta mbazu sukulu'a.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero riine ekigyendererwa ky'okushomesa abantu abatarikwebaasa. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigejunisibwa obuhwezi bw'esente okushomesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, several reporters were abruptly suspended from their positions without explanation. This action has sparked outrage within the media community.

lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba dro 'ba karakara e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi ma ti engazu pari yini 'diyi ma alia e'yo eceza kokoru. Yeta 'diri eji aokosi 'ba oyuyuani 'diyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: In celebration of Earth Day, the community gathered to participate in a meaningful event. Volunteers of all ages came together to contribute to the environment and create a lasting legacy.
lug_prompt: Mu kukuza olunaku lw'ensi, abantu baakuŋŋaanye okwetaba mu mukolo ogw'amakulu. Abakozi ab'obwannakyewa ab'emyaka egy'enjawulo beegatta wamu okuyamba ku butonde bw'ensi n'okutondawo omukululo ogw'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: I kwero nino me lobo, lwak gugure me bedo tye I yub ma pire tek. Lutic me nono ma mwakagi pat pat guribe kacel me konyo i kom cwec ma orumuwa ki yubu nying ma rii pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainumunum aparan naka akwap, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu ajaikin toma opucit loajokan noi. Apotu itunga luapolok luka ikar luegelegela kimorikikinos kanu aidar isuban luka alupok keda aiboisio nuka akwap.
