eng_prompt: As the election season heated up, tensions among the candidates reached a boiling point. In a shocking turn of events, law enforcement took action against one of the leading contenders.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kyagenda kyeyongera, obunkenke mu beesimbyewo bwatuuka ku ntikko. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, abakuumaddembe baakola ku omu ku bavuganya abakulu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yer tye ka wot anyim, telle I kin lucungu ne odoko lamal tutwal. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, joo ma gwoko cik gutimo gin mo I kom ngat acel I kin jo ma onongo gitye ka pyem I kingi.

lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria drizaru, asi otiza 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi 'du e'yo 'ba a'bala 'yepi okporu 'diyi ma azi ma rua.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikweyongyera, obunkenke ahagati y'abeesimbireho bwahika aha rurengo rw'amaani. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakahakanisa omwe ahari abo abaabaire nibahakanisa.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as the government faced mounting pressure over the controversial policy. In a desperate move to silence dissent, the minister ordered the arrest of the journalist who captured the story.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera nga gavumenti eyolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa okw'amaanyi olw'etteeka eririko enkaayana. Mu kaweefube w'okusirisa ab'oludda oluvuganya, minisita yalagira okukwata munnamawulire eyakwata emboozi.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare ma gamente obedo I lyeto pi cik ma kelo apoka-poka. I tute matek tutwal me gengo jemo, minista ociko ni kimak lacoo lok angea ma omako lok ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai abu apugan kodum aiyalongong naepol noi kanu ainapeta nuetioko. Kotoma aswamisioit naepol noi naka aitikitik engunget, abu eminista kicorak aikamanario naka arotan iyemuto loabu kodum akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ma omgbo tu gameteni e'yo okporu isuzu e'yo azita esele coza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo lezu 'ba ageti oti'baa 'diyi ma ti opizu, minisita 'da fe azita 'bani 'ba osisia ni e'yo 'da 'dupi 'diyi obizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okugira ngu gavumenti ekeyongyera kugyemeserezibwa ahabw'ebiragiro ebyabaire biine entongane. Omu kaweefube w'okuhunamisa abarikuhakanisa gavumenti, minisita akaragiira ngu omunyamahurire owakwatsire ekitebyo akwatibwe.

eng_prompt: In a recent press conference, the minister announced a controversial policy change that sparked widespread debate. As the news broke, many in the media began to voice their concerns regarding the implications of this decision.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko, minisita yalangiridde enkyukakyuka mu nkola eyaleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi. Amawulire bwe gaafuluma, bangi mu mawulire baatandika okulaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bikwata ku ebyo ebyandivudde mu kusalawo kuno.
ach_prompt: I kacokke pa luco lok angeya ma okato cokcok-ki, minista owaco aloka-loka I cik ma okelo laro lok I kin dano mapol. Ikare ma lok angea ne okato, lucoo lok angea mapol gucako tito lworo gi i kom adwogi me moko tam man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, abu eminista kolimo aijulanakineta nuka ainapeta nuepedorete ayangaun epeget loepol noi. Nealomunia akiro ngun, apotu itunga luka iyemuto kogeutu einer nuikamunitos aomisio nuka aseunet ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be o'diru ri ma alea, minisita 'da azi e'yo ojata e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria agbatara ejipi 'ba karakara eyi ma eselea ri ni. O'duko ni efuzu 'boria, 'ba karakara o'dukoti edripi 'diyi e'do e'yo yi ma asi otiza e'yo 'duza 'di ma dria 'diyi ece.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisita akarangirira empindahinduka y'ebiragiro eretsireho okuhanuura kw'amaani. Amahurire ku gaaherize kumanywa, abanyamakuru baingi bakatandika kworeka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine n'okusharamu oku.

eng_prompt: As public discourse increasingly shifts to digital platforms, many are questioning the role of media in shaping political narratives. This raises a critical concern about the influence of communication channels on governance and civic engagement.
lug_prompt: Ng'emboozi y'olukale yeeyongera okudda ku mikutu gya yintaneeti, bangi babuusabuusa omulimu gw'emikutu gy'amawulire mu kukola ennyiriri z'ebyobufuzi. Kino kireetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku ngeri emikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya gye gikwatamu enfuga n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok pa lwak tye ka lok I kom yub me intanet, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom tic pa odi poko ngec me yubu lok me cung iwibye. Man kelo lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma odi poko ngec tiyo kwede I kom tela ki tic pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor einer loka itunga toma olago, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka arotak iyemuto kotoma aitolomun akiro nuka epolitikis. Eyangauni ngin aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos epone loepedoriata iponesio luka elago aitodolikin apugan keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'bi eyini ri ni mu drile pari o'bi eyini e'yo nzezu 'diyi ma alea risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo zi azi 'ba e'yo oyuza ni 'diyi ni e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza okporu geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma okpo driceza ma dria azini o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugamba kw'abantu kweyongyeire kuhindukira aha mikutu ya digito, baingi nibabangaanisa omurimo gw'abanyamakuru omukukora eby'obutegyeki. Eki nikireetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha mikutu y'empurizagana aha bwebembezi hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the free flow of information is essential for informed citizenry. Limiting media coverage on political matters undermines the very foundation of public discourse.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kya demokulasiya, okutambula kw'amawulire okw'eddembe kwa mugaso eri bannansi abamanyi. Okukugira emikutu gy'amawulire okwogera ku nsonga z'ebyobufuzi kityoboola omusingi gw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu lujjudde.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo agonya pa lok angeya pire tek tutwal pi anywali matye ki ngec. Gengo odi poko ngec I kom lok me cungu iwi-bye balo guti me lok I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ibusakinit itunga kere aijen akiro nukajokak. Aitikitik akiro nuka iyemuto nuikamunitos akiro nuka epolitikis itidisiari ainapeta nuka einer kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, o'dukoti eyi ma aciza e'yo kokoru ri eri orodriru 'ba kari ni 'diyi ni. O'dukoti edrizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esizu ri ni e'yo nzeza o'bi eyi ma eselea ri eza.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki eby'obugabe, okutambura kw'amakuru n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'okumanyisa abantu. Okuzibira abanyamakuru okukwata enshonga z'eby'obutegyeki, nikishiisha omusingye gw'okugamba omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the head of the communications department, he oversees all messaging strategies. Ensuring clarity and accuracy in public statements is crucial for maintaining the organization's reputation.
lug_prompt: Ng'akulira ekitongole ky'ebyempuliziganya, alabirira enkola zonna ez'obubaka. Okukakasa obwerufu n'obutuufu mu sitatimenti z'olukale kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma erinnya ly'ekitongole.
ach_prompt: Macalo lawii dul ma doro lok angeya, en aye doro yub weng me cwalo lok angeya. Neno ni lok ma gimiyo bot lwak tye atir obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi gwoko nying dul ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape loapolon loka edipatiment loka einer, eyait ngesi iponesio luka aijukar akiro. Aitijenar aica ka abeit kotoma akiro nuka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ekiror loka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Ekile arakala e'yo oyuzaniri ma drile ru, eri geri dria e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma pamvu one. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌyo oꞌbi yi dri ꞌdiyi ma ale andrizu kililiru azini kililiru ꞌdiyi eri orodriru ꞌbani amuti ꞌdi ma ru ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'orikukurira ekitongore ky'empurizagana, naareeberera obutumwa bwona. Okureeba ngu ebiteiso by'ekitongore nibihamiibwe gye n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eiziina ry'ekitongore.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, transparency and accountability are essential for fostering trust between the government and its citizens. Therefore, it is crucial to establish policies that ensure equitable access to information for all individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwerufu n'embalirira bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige wakati wa gavumenti ne bannansi baayo. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo okuteekawo amateeka agasobozesa abantu bonna okufuna amawulire mu bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo ki ada ki tic ki kor tic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo gen ikin gamente ki anywali ne. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me keto cik ma weko dano weng nongo ngec marom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, iswamae lo ecai ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun amunokina kiding apugan keda itungake. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aitolomun ainapeta nuepedorete ayangaun akiro ejok mama ejaasi itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, e'yo ada azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi orodriru asi'baza ejizu gamete ma eselea kari anzi eyi pie. Ka'dini, eri orodriru azita 'bani ecozu o'duko eyi esuzu kililiru 'ba dria eyini 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, amazima n'embaririra n'eby'omugasho omu kureetaho obwesigye ahagati ya gavumenti n'abantu baayo. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kutaho ebiragiro ebirikworeka ngu abantu boona nibatunga amakuru omu buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's attempts to control the narrative, many media outlets felt compelled to report on the opposition leader's conference. This defiance sparked a heated debate about press freedom and the role of journalism in a democratic society.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko gavumenti okugezaako okufuga ebyogerwa, emikutu gy'amawulire mingi gyawulira nga giwaliriziddwa okuwandiika ku lukungaana lw'abakulembeze b'oludda oluvuganya. Okujeemera kuno kwaleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku ddembe lya bannamawulire n'omugaso gwa bannamawulire mu demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente oteme me gengo lok ne, odi poko ngec mapol guwinyo ni myero gucoo lok kom kacoke pa lutela ma jemo i kom gamente. Jemo man okelo laro lok matek tutwal I kom twero pa lucoo lok angea ki tic pa lucoo lok angea I tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamit apugan aitikitik akiro ngun, apotu itunga luka iyemuto kopuputu ebe ibusakinit kesi aiwadika nuikamunitos airiamunet naka engarenon loka etepegak. Abu aitepeg ngin koyangau epeget loepol noi loikamunit ailajara naka airot iyemuto keda aswam naka airot iyemuto kotoma apugan naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro o'bi e'yo 'da ma aza kozu ra ti, pari karakara o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ega kini eyi ma o'dukoti edri okuza drice'ba amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'di fe agbatara okporu e'yo driwala 'ba osisiani 'diyiniri ma dria azini azi 'ba osisiani 'diyiniri ma dria.

Okuhakanisa eki kikareetaho okuhanuura kw'amaani aha bugabe bw'amahurire n'omugasho gw'amahurire omubyobutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the freedom of the press is essential for transparency and accountability. Journalists play a crucial role in informing the public about political events and issues.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, eddembe ly'amawulire lya mugaso mu bwerufu n'embalirira. Bannamawulire bakola omulimu munene mu kutegeeza abantu ku bibaddewo mu byobufuzi n'ensonga.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo agonya pa luco lok angeya pire tek tutwal pi bedo ki ada ki kor tic. Lucoo lok angea gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal I miyo ngec bot lwak I kom jami matye katime I lok me cung iwibye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ailajara naka arotak iyemuto erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere akiro. Iswamaete arotak iyemuto aswam naepol noi kowai lo aitijenikin itunga akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuka epolitikis.

nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya,obugabe bw'abanyamakuru n'obw'omugasho ahabw'oburingaaniza n'embaririra. Abanyamakuru nibakora omurimo muhango omu kumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata ahaby'obutegyeki hamwe n'eshonga.

eng_prompt: The recent announcement regarding the new policy has sparked widespread discontent among the community. Many feel that the changes were made without proper consultation or consideration of their impact.
lug_prompt: Okulangirira okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku nkola empya kuleeseewo obutali bumativu mu bantu. Bangi bawulira nti enkyukakyuka zaakolebwa nga tebabuuzibwako oba okulowooza ku ngeri gye zijja okukwatamu abantu.

teo_prompt: Alimo na pac kanu ikisila luitetiak eyangaunit amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe iswamatai aijulanakineta ngun komam ipegeta arai aomisio nuka atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ece o'diru azita o'diru 'da ma dria ri fe o'bi eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku. Ba karakara eyi ega kini 'ba 'ye ojata 'da eyi ma dria e'yo nzeza kililiru koko dika eyi ma e'yo ega kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ebirangirwe ebikwatireine n'ebiragiro ebisya, bireesireho okwetomboita omu bantu. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu empindahinduka zikakorwa batabandize kwebuuza aha bantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance press freedom and promote responsible journalism, the Ugandan government has taken significant steps towards media reform. As part of this initiative, Uganda has launched an independent media council.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eddembe ly'amawulire n'okutumbula bannamawulire ab'obuvunaanyizibwa, gavumenti ya Uganda ekoze emitendera emikulu mu kukyusa eby'amawulire. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, Uganda etongozza olukiiko lw'amawulire olwetongodde.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo twero pa lucoo lok angeya ki medo rwom me coyo lok angeya maber, gamente me Uganda otimo jami mapol me kelo aloka loka i kom odi poko ngec. Macalo but yub man, Uganda oyabo dul pa luco lok angeya ma pe jenge I kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ailajara naka arotak iyemuto ka aitopolor airot iyemuto, abu apugan nako Uganda kiswama nuepolok noi kanu aijulakin ewai lo iyemuto. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, etolomu Uganda ekansulo loka arotak iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini lezu driwala 'ba osisiani 'diyiniri otuzu azini e'yo osisia ni kililiru 'diyi otuzu, gamete Uganda niri 'du e'yo okporu e'yo oyuyuani 'diyi ojazu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, Uganda e'do amuti e'yo oyuzani ngulupisi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obugabe bw'amahurire n'okutunguura eby'amahurire ebirikwesigwa,gavumenti ya Uganda ekozire enteekateeka y'okureetaho empinduka omu by'amahurire. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, Uganda etandikireho orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru orwetongoire.

eng_prompt: During the press conference, the leader highlighted the crucial role of information dissemination in a democratic society. He emphasized how the media's efforts have significantly contributed to informing the public about important issues.
lug_prompt: Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, omukulembeze yalaze obukulu bw'okubunyisa amawulire mu demokulasiya. Yakikkaatirizza engeri kaweefube w'emikutu gy'empuliziganya ayambye ennyo mu kutegeeza abantu ku nsonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ki luco lok angeya, latela ne owaco ni tic me poko ngec obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak. En oketo cwiny I kom kit ma tic pa odi poko ngec okonyo kwede I miyo ngec bot lwak I kom lok mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet keda arotak iyemuto abu engarenon kitetem ajokis naka aisiarakin akiro kotoma apugan naka itunga. Abu ngesi kitogogong epone loepedoriata arotak iyemuto aitijenikin itunga akiro nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, drice'ba 'da ece orodri e'yo nzeza niri ma ereta ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea ri ra. Eri 'ba asi geri okpo 'ba o'dukoti edripi 'diyini 'diyi fezu o'bi eyini e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, omwebembezi akashoboorora omugasho gw'amahurire omu bantu. Akashoboorora oku amahurire gakozire kihango okumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'eshonga nkuru.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of safeguarding children's rights in society. As a result, various organizations and advocates have turned to the media to amplify their message and reach a wider audience.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'okukuuma eddembe ly'abaana mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole eby'enjawulo n'abalwanirizi b'eddembe baddukidde ku mikutu gy'amawulire okutumbula obubaka bwabwe n'okutuuka ku bantu abangi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa gwoko twero pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat ki lucungu iwi-bye mapat-pat gulokke bot odi poko ngec me medo ngec gi ki oo bot lwak mapol.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka ayuarite apedorosio nuka idwe kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luipu kijulakinos nejaas arotak iyemuto kanu aisiarakin akirokec ka adolokin itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodriru drilemgbo anzi nyiri eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi oja eyi geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu eyi ma o'duko edrizu 'ba karakara eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okurinda obugabe bw'abaana omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebitarikushushana n'abarikurwanirira obugabe bw'abantu bahindukire aha mikutu y'eby'empurizagana, okushagika obutumwa bwabo, n'okuhika aha bantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In a world where ideas and emotions are shared, connections flourish and understanding deepens. However, if we were to lose the ability to communicate, the fabric of society would unravel.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ebirowoozo n'enneewulira gye bigabanyizibwamu, enkolagana ekula era n'okutegeeragana kweyongera. Naye singa tufiirwa obusobozi bw'okuwuliziganya, embeera y'abantu ejja kusereba.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano nywako tamgi ki kit ma giwinyo kwede, ribbe dongo dok niang bene dongo. Kadi bed kumeno, kace wa rwenyo kero wa me lok, dul pa lwak wa bi bale woko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na imorata aomisio keda aomisio, epoloete arucokina keda apuponoro. Konye, arai mam oni ipedori einer, eponi aibiror aiboisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia egata azini egata yi awazuri ma alia, e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi tu uru azini vata ma omgbo ni tu uru. Kani si, 'ba ka ama ma okpo e'yo nzezu ri avi ra, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi nga e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu ebiteekateeko n'ebiteekateeko birikugabana, okukwatanisa nikweyongyera kandi n'okwetegyerezana nikweyongyera. Kwonka, twafeerwa obushoborozi bw'okuhurizana, entwaza y'abantu neeza kushatuka.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered for their annual environmental meeting, the local leader emphasized the importance of sustainability. He shared statistics about the benefits of reforestation and the positive impact it could have on their neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu bakungaanidde mu lukiiko lwabwe olw'obutonde bw'ensi olutegekebwa buli mwaka, omukulembeze w'ekyalo yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi. Yawa ebibalo ku miganyulo egiva mu kusimba ebibira n'ebirungi ebiyinza okuvaamu mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure pi kacokke gi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa mwaka ki mwaka, latela me tedero oloko tutwal I kom ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. En opoko ngec matut I kom ber pa tongo yadi ki adwogi maber ma twero bedo I kom kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu airiamunet kec naka ekwam, abu engarenon loka atutubet kitogogong ajokis naka aidar ejautene lo akwap. Abu ngesi komor akiro nuikamunitos ajokis naka aiduk ikito keda ajokis na epedori ngin aitodolikin aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini eyi trazu mitingi eyivile eli vusi angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma alea risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo angu 'da ma tambazu ri ma dria. Eri ece e'yo orodri pati ogaza ni 'diyi ma dria azini orodri erini eco 'ye o'bi yi ma ageia 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikuteeranira omu rukiiko rwabo orw'obuhangwa bw'ensi buri mwaka, omwebembezi w'ekyaro akashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Akagamba ebirikukwata aha migasho y'okutema emiti hamwe n'omugasho ogurikubaasa kugira aha bantu b'omubyaro byabo.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the players gathered on the field, excited for a break from their rigorous training schedule. They had been looking forward to this opportunity to bond and showcase their skills against a familiar rival.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abazannyi baakuŋŋaanira mu kisaawe, nga beesunga okuwummulamu okuva mu kutendekebwa kwabwe okw'amaanyi. Babadde beesunga omukisa guno okukwatagana n'okulaga obukugu bwabwe nga bavuganya n'abavuganya abamanyiddwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, lutuku gucokke I bar, cwinygi obedo yom me nongo yweyo ki I kom yubgi me pwonye matek tutwal. Gubedo ka kuro kare man me ribbe ki nyutu diro gi I kom jo ma gubedo ka pyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu aboliak kotukokinos oisawe, iyalamasi noi kanu aiyengun kotoma aituutoonor kec. Autasi kesi asesen arerengu na naka aimorikikin keda itunga luemisiaritos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba avitani 'diyi tra yi pari avitaniri ma alia ayiko be ava be ava liza esuzu e'yo embata yini okporu 'diyi vurisi. Yi ri de asi drile drileba 'di ma alia ti ecita ejizu azini yi ma ondua e'dazu a'bala 'ba yini nile 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, abazaani baketeeranira hamwe omu kishayi, bashemereirwe okuhuumura aha kutendekwa kwabo okw'amaani. Bakaba bategyereize munonga omugisha gw'okukwatanisa n'okworeka emyoga yaabo barikuhatana n'abaabaire nibamanya.

eng_prompt: Excitement filled the air as the community gathered to watch the annual sports event. This year, the netball match is between the youth and children from the settlements.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'abantu bakungaanidde okulaba emizannyo egitegekebwa buli mwaka. Omwaka guno, omuzannyo gw'okubaka guli wakati w'abavubuka n'abaana okuva mu nkambi.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gucokke me neno pyem tuku ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. Imwaka ni, tuku odilo me netball tye ikin bulu ki lutino ma aa ki I kem.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos ne atukonokinata itunga asesen aboliasio nuka ekaru. Kokaru kalo, abolia naka emopira loka akan erai kiding atumunak keda idwe lu okabin.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea tualu ongulumu eyini trazu e'yo avita ni eli vusi 'diyi ndrezu. Eli 'disi, avita mupira o'bele netballniri 'ba ode eyi ma eselea anzi nyiri engapi kembe eyi ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okwerundaana okureeba emizaano y'omwaka. Omwaka ogu, omuzaano gw'okubaka guri ahagati y'eminyeeto n'abaana abarikuruga omu kampu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for sustainable infrastructure, the organization has launched an initiative focused on enhancing access to essential services. This effort aims to improve the quality of life for underserved communities globally.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebizimbe ebiwangaala, ekitongole kitongozza enteekateeka etunuulidde okutumbula okufuna obuweereza obwetaagisa. Kaweefube ono agenderera kutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bw'abantu abatalina buyambi mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwoki me miti ma tye kamede me yubu jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano, dul ne ocako yub me medo rwom me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Tic man tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak ma pe ki kony ma oromo I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aiboisio nuejokuka, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar adumunun iboro lu itwasamao. Ekoto aswam na aitojokar adoketait na aijar naka itunga lu mam ijanakino ejok kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do otita azi 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo azakoma lepi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo 'di ma asisile lezu geri 'ba aa'pi angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma edri otuzu wudrikuru ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okureetaho obuheereza bw'omugasho ahabw'ekyetengo ky'okwombeka ebyombeko ebirikubaasa kugumaho. Omurimo ogu nigugyenderera okutunguura omutindo gw'amagara g'abantu abatarikuhikwaho obuheereza omu nsi yoona.

eng_prompt: Our primary goal is to foster personal growth and development among participants. We believe that by focusing on skill enhancement, we can create a more enriching experience for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Ekiruubirirwa kyaffe ekikulu kwe kutumbula enkulaakulana y'omuntu ku bubwe n'enkulaakulana mu beetabye mu mpaka. Tulowooza nti okussa essira ku kutumbula obukugu, tusobola okutondawo obumanyirivu obugaggawaza eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Miti wa ma pire tek aye me tyelo kor dongo pa dano. Watye ki niyee ni ka waketo cwiny I kom dongo diro, ci watwero kelo jami mabeco pi dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Alosikinetekosi naepol ngesi aitopoloria apol naka itunga. Iyuunit sio ebe kopone loka aitopolor acoa, ipedori oni aitolomun akiro nuejokuka nejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amani okori zota ma omgbo otuzu 'ba amuti nde ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. Ama a'i ra kini asi 'bazu ondua otuza ma dria, ama eco e'yo orodriruni eji 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekigyendererwa kyaitu ekikuru n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu. Nitwikiriza ngu twata amaani omu kutunguura emyoga yaitu, nitubaasa kureetera buri omwe orikukwatwaho amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In its efforts to expand its market reach and enhance product offerings, the company has actively sought collaborations. Over the years, these alliances have played a crucial role in its growth strategy.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugaziya akatale n'okutumbula ebyamaguzi, kkampuni enoonya nnyo abakolagana nabo. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, emikago gino gikoze kinene nnyo mu nkulaakulana yaayo.
ach_prompt: I tute ne me medo rwom me cat meggi ki medo rwom me jami ma giyubu, dul ne tye ka yenyo lurem matek tutwal. Pi mwaki ma okato angec, dul mapat-pat egoni gutimo tic mapire tek tutwal I dongo lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu ke naka aitanyanyar esokoni ke ka aitojokar iboro lu itwasamao, euta ekampuni aimo itunga lu epedorete aiswamanar keda ngesi. Kokaru lu atuboros, apotu iriongeta lu iswamata ibore yenepol noi kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'bazu cuu ma ongmbo otuzu azini afa erini ozile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da nda 'ba eyi tualu. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti 'diyi nga azi okporu geri eyini zozu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube waayo gw'okushanjuura akatare n'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi, kampuni eshaziremu kuronda abantu b'okukwatanisa nabo. Kumara emyaka mingi, enkwatanisa egi ekozire omurimo gw'amaani omu ntunguuka yaayo.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the power of sports to unite, the organization launched a new initiative aimed at fostering connections among young people. By organizing regional football tournaments, they hope to create a platform for collaboration and friendship.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya amaanyi g'ebyemizannyo mu kugatta, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana mu bavubuka. Nga bategeka empaka z'omupiira mu bitundu, basuubira okutondawo omukutu gw'okukolagana n'omukwano.
ach_prompt: Ki niang teko pa tuku me ribo dano, dul ne ocako yub manyen ma tye ki miti me kelo kubbe ikin bulu. Ki yubu pyem tuku odilo I but lobo mapat-pat, gitye ki gen me yubu yoo me ribbe ki bedo lurem.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun apedor naka aboliasio aimorikikin, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak nu aimorikikin atumunak. Kowai lo aitemonokin abolobol naka emopira, emuno kesi aitolomun ewai lo aiswamanara keda epaperone.
lgg_prompt: Erini okpo avita yini ti ecita ejizu ri ma e'yo egazu risi, amuti 'da e'do otita azi o'diru 'bani lezu ti ecita 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. A'bala mupira tuza ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otuzu risi, eyi asi 'baza be geri azi ngazu tualu agyipika eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya amaani g'eby'emizaano, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okureetaho okukwatanisa omu minyeeto. Kubarikutebekanisa empaka z'omupiira gw'ebigyere omu byanga, baine amatsiko g'okureetaho omukoro gw'okukwatanisa n'omukago.

eng_prompt: In a world where many young refugees face significant challenges, innovative programs are emerging to support their integration and well-being. One such initiative focuses on harnessing the power of athletics to build confidence and community among these youth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi abanoonyiboobubudamu abato gye basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi, pulogulaamu ez'obuyiiya zivaayo okubayamba okwegatta n'okubeera obulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ng'ebyo kwe kukozesa amaanyi g'emizannyo okuzimba obwesige n'obumu mu bavubuka bano.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma luring ayela matino mapol gitye ka nongo peko madongo, yub mapat-pat matye kabino me konyo gi ki bedo maber. Yub acel ma kit meno tye me tic ki teko pa pyem ngwec me dongo tek cwiny ki ribbe ikin bulu magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaatar ikerai luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok, eutasi ainapeta nuitegelikina ageun kanu aingarakin kesi aimorikikin keda aijar kec. Adiopebon kwape kangin erai aitwasam agogong naka akerak kanu aitogogong amuno keda aimorikikina kanejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru emunyale oderu karakara yini dri fuzu e'yo ewaru 'diyi be 'diyi ma alia, otita o'diru 'diyi efu yini atita fezu yi ma eselea azini yi ma aa'ta muke ri ma dria. Otita alu 'dile 'diyi asi 'ba okpo ongu nzuzani 'diyi ma ayuza ma dria asi 'bazu asi azini ongulumu eyi sizu 'ba ode 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu eminyeeto mingi y'empungi erikurabana n'oburemeezi bw'amaani, enteekateeka z'obuhangwa ziriyo niziija kuhwera empungi kwegaita hamwe n'okutuura gye. Kimwe ahabikorwa nk'ebyo n'okukoresa amaani g'okwiruka kwombeka obwesigye n'okukwatanisa omu minyeeto egi.

eng_prompt: Many communities around the world face challenges such as poverty, violence, and lack of opportunities for young people. By harnessing the power of sports, we can create positive change and foster a sense of belonging and purpose among the youth.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna basanga okusoomoozebwa ng'obwavu, obutabanguko n'ebbula ly'emikisa eri abavubuka. Nga tukozesa amaanyi g'ebyemizannyo, tusobola okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi n'okutumbula enneewulira y'okubeera n'ekigendererwa mu bavubuka.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol I wilobo lung gitye ka nongo peko macalo can, tim gero ki bedo peke pa gum pi bulu. Ka watiyo ki teko pa tuku, watwero kelo aloka-loka maber dok weko bulu bedo ki cwiny me bedo dano acel ki bedo ki tyen lok ikwo gi.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu kotoma akwap kere ejaas keda atiokisio kwape ican, amumu keda amamus na arerengesio kanuka atumunak. Kowai lo aitwasam agogong naka aboliasio, ipedori oni aitolomun aijulanakineta kosodete aitopolor aomisio nuka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi e'yo ewaru ekile alio le, ngiringiri le azini drileba ako 'diyi esu 'ba ode yi dri. Geri okpo avita eyini 'diyi ayuzu risi, ama eco ojata kililiru eji dika ama eco 'ba ode eyi ma eselea aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi be azini aa'zu e'yo azi 'yezu 'diyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi okwetorora ensi yoona nibirwanagana n'oburemeezi nk'obworo, obutabanguko hamwe n'okuburwa emigisha y'eminyeeto. Twakoresa amaani g'eby'emizaano, nitubaasa kureetaho empindahinduka nungi n'okureetaho enshonga n'ekigyendererwa omu minyeeto.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the conflict, many young people found themselves grappling with trauma and loss. Engaging in sports provided them with a much-needed escape and a sense of community.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'obukuubagano, abavubuka bangi beesanga nga balwanagana n'obunkenke n'okufiirwa. Okwenyigira mu byemizannyo kyabawa okuwummulamu okwali kwetaagibwa ennyo n'okuwulira nga bali wamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny enoni, bulu mapol gunongo ni gitye ka lweny ki peko me kwo. Donyo I tuku oweko gubedo ki kare me winye I kin gi ki luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ingungeta, apotu atumunak luipu kodumutu kesi etereikina keda aimusungeta keda atwaniario. Ajainikin toma aboliasio abu ijaik kes aiyengun na ekotoi noi keda aimorikikina keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba ode karakara eyi esu eyi dri ci e'yo ewaru azini afa aviza ni 'diyisi. E'yo avita ni 'diyi 'yezu ri fe eyini geri eyini ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu dika eyi ma eselea aa'zu tualu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obutabanguko, eminyeeto emingi ekashanga erikurwanagana n'obusaasi n'okufeerwa. Okwejumba omu by'emizaano kikabahwera kurungi n'okwetegyereza gye abantu baabo.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, he finally landed a high-paying job. This newfound financial stability has allowed them to pursue their dreams and enjoy a more comfortable lifestyle.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication on the field, his talent finally caught the attention of college scouts. His impressive performance during the championship game sealed the deal for his future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu mu kisaawe, ekitone kye kyasembayo okukwatibwa abasikawutu mu ttendekero. Enkola ye ey'ekitalo mu muzannyo gwa bannantammegwa yassaako akabonero ku ddiiru y'ebiseera bye eby'omu maaso.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for accessible education, the organization has launched several initiatives aimed at enhancing educational resources. Their focus is on leveraging technology to improve learning outcomes for students across Uganda.

ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti me kwan ma tye kamede, dul ne okatti ki yub mapol ma tye ki miti me medo rwom me kwan. Gitye ka keto cwiny gi i kom tic ki tet manyen me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan I but lobo Uganda mapat-pat.

lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini lezu onita 'bani eco esu ra ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do e'yo ndundu eyini lezu afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Asi 'baza yiniri e'yo tekenologianiri ayuzu sukulu anzi eyini onita ma omgbo otuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea ndulu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for technology in education, the organization has decided to expand its outreach efforts. This initiative aims to bridge the digital divide and enhance learning opportunities for students in underserved areas.

lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'enjigiriza n'okutumbula enkola y'abayizi ey'okukozesa tekinologiya, ekitongole kikulembezza okusiga ensimbi mu tekinologiya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, basaasaanyizza ssente nnyingi nnyo mu kugula tabuleti.

eng_prompt: As technology continues to advance, educational institutions are increasingly adopting innovative methods to enhance learning experiences. One such method is the integration of digital platforms that provide flexible study options for students.
