eng_prompt: In addition to enhancing student engagement, the new curriculum is designed to foster professional growth among educators. By incorporating collaborative strategies, teachers are to also benefit from the learning.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi, ensoma empya ekoleddwa okutumbula okukula mu by'ekikugu mu basomesa. Nga bayingizaamu enkola z'okukwatagana, abasomesa nabo bajja kuganyulwa mu kuyiga.
ach_prompt: Medo i kom medo miti pa lutino kwan, yub manyen me pwonye kiyubu me dongo rwom me tic pa lupwonye. Ki keto yub me ribbe, lupwonye bene gubi nongo ber pa kwan.
teo_prompt: Kilema aitojokar aisisianakino naka esisiak, itemonokinitai aisisiaeta nuitetiak kanu aitopolor eswamae loajokan kanejaas isisianakinak. Kowai lo aimorikikin iwaitin lu aiswamanara, epote isisianakinak da aimedaun kotoma aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma azi dika, 'ba ede otita onita ni o'diru 'diyi imba'ba eyi ma zota e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi ngazu tualu 'diyisi, imba'ba eyi vini mu orodri esu onita vu.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera aha kwejumba kw'abeegi, engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa ensya etebekanisiibwe kutunguura eby'emikono omu beegyesa. Barikwejunisa enkora y'okukwatanisa, abegyesa nabo nibaza kugasirwa omu kwega.

eng_prompt: The new digital platform has been implemented in schools. With its user-friendly interface, it streamlines the process of gathering educational resources.
lug_prompt: Enkola empya eya digito eteekeddwa mu masomero. Olw'okuba kyangu okukozesa, kyanguya enkola y'okukung'aanya ebikozesebwa mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Ki kati ki yoo manyen me tic ki nyonyo me intanet I gangi kwan. Ki nyonyo ma tiyo kwede yot tutwal, man weko yub me coko jami me kwan bedo yot.
teo_prompt: Aponi ibwaikinai ewai loitetet loka elago osomeroi. Keda epatana aitwasam, epatana aituk iboro lu asioman.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do geri o'diru e'yo oyuzaniri sukulu yi ma alia 'bo. E'yo erini 'ba ayuzu ewakokoru risi, eri geri afa onita ni 'diyi trazu ri otu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora ensya eya digito eteirwe omu nkora omu mashomero. Ahabw'okugira ngu n'ekyorobi kukoresa, nikihwera omu kurundaana ebintu by'okwegyesa.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, children are increasingly exposed to a variety of information sources. As a result, they develop skills to discern and extract relevant data from books, websites, and other materials.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, abaana beeyongera okumanya ensibuko z'amawulire ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, bafuna obukugu mu kutegeera n'okuggyayo obubaka obukwatagana okuva mu bitabo, emikutu, n'ebirala.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kare-ni, lutino tye ka nongo ngec mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo diro me niang ki nongo ngec ma mite ki bukke, kabedo me intanet ki jami mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejenete idwe akiro nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, edumunete kesi acoa na ajenun ka alemun akiro nuikamunitos akiro kotoma oitabon, kaiboisio nuka elago keda iboro ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni ewu andruri ma alea, anzi nyiri eyi o'dukoti ndundu eyi esu drile. E'yo 'disi, eyi ondua esu eyini ani e'yo orodriru 'diyi esuzu engazu buku eyi ma alea, pari o'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea, azini afa azi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka ya digito ey'erizooba, abaana beyongyeire kumanya oburugo bw'amakuru butari bumwe na bumwe. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatunga emyoga y'okwetegyereza n'okwiha ebirikukwata ahabintu omu bitabo, aha mikutu, hamwe n'ebindi.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a concerning trend among students regarding their academic performance. Many educators are beginning to notice a correlation between the use of digital gadgets and declining exam results.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu bayizi ku bikwata ku nsoma yaabwe. Abasomesa bangi batandise okulaba akakwate akaliwo wakati w'okukozesa ebyuma bya digito n'okukendeera kw'ebyava mu bigezo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni lutino kwan tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma gikwano kwede. Lupwonye mapol dong gucako neno kubbe matye ikin tic ki nyonyo me intanet ki poto pa adwoki me peny.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit epone loiyalongongoi noi loka esisiak kanuikamunitos eswamae kec kotoma asioman. Isisianakinak luipu egeunos aanyun eidicane loejai kiding aitwasam iboro luka elago keda aibiror naka akiro nuka aingito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza ni sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea agata eyini sukulu'a ri ma dria. Imba'ba karakara eyi e'doki e'yo 'bani afa tekenologia ni 'diyi ayuzu azini agata obeta eyini 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ndre.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'abeegi erikwerarikiriza aha bikwatiraine n'okukora gye omu mashomero. Abeegyesa baingi batandikire kureeba akakwate ahagati y'okukoresa ebyoma bya digito n'okugwa kw'ebarugire omu bigyezo.

eng_prompt: In the trucking industry, strict regulations are in place to ensure safety on the roads. However, some individuals still attempt to operate commercial vehicles without the proper credentials.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole ky'ebimmotoka ebinene, amateeka amakakali gateekeddwawo okukakasa obukuumi ku nguudo. Newankubadde, abantu abamu bakyagezaako okuvuga emmotoka ez'ebbeeyi nga tebalina biwandiiko bituufu.
ach_prompt: I tenge me tic ki mutoka madongo, kiketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo I gudu. Kadi bed kumeno, dano mukene pwod temo dwoyo mutoka me biyacara labongo waraga ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni loka amotokan nuapolok, ejaas ikisila luegogong noi kanu awanyun ayuara korotin. Konye, eringa icetunga eutasi aitam airenge amotokan nuka agwelanar komamei apapula na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu lorri eyini ri ma alea, 'ba o'ba azita okporu eyi nezu ra kini nzila eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma aza ko ra. Kani si, 'ba azi 'diyi nga po'di o'bi mutukari tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma ti oji kokobi kililiru 'diyi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kya roore, hariho ebiragiro by'amaani, okureeba ngu hariho oburinzi aha nguuto. N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, abantu abamwe nibagyezaho kuvuga emotoka zitari za bushubuzi bateine bihandiiko ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a significant increase in smuggling activities along the border. To address this growing concern, it is essential to implement more stringent security measures.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti ebikolwa eby'okukukusa ebintu byeyongedde ku nsalo. Okukola ku kweraliikirira kuno okweyongera, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola z'ebyokwerinda enkakali.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni tim me donyo ki jami acata iwi ali tye ka medde tutwal I wang lobo. Me tyeko peko man matye kamede ameda, pire tek tutwal me keto cik matek me gwoko kuc itic.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe eyatakinos aswamisinei nu ekoko koikoru. Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong na, ejokuna aitegear ainapeta nuka ayuwara nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu kari 'di ma alea oguzaru ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru e'yo ageyitema ni okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'emirimo y'okukukusa ebintu aha nsharo. Okukora aha nshonga egi erikweyongyera, niky'omugasho okutaho enkora y'amaani omu by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Local law enforcement agencies are increasingly seeking innovative strategies to address the challenges posed by smuggling. One effective approach gaining traction is community policing, which fosters collaboration between police and residents.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe mu kitundu byeyongedde okunoonya engeri z'okugonjoolamu okusoomoozebwa okuva mu kukukusa ebintu. Enkola emu ennungi efuna okusikirizibwa kwe kukola poliisi mu kitundu, ekitumbula enkolagana wakati wa poliisi n'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik I tedero tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me lweny i kom peko me donyo ki jami acata iwi alii. Yoo acel maber tutwal matye ka nongo cwak en aye bedo ki abili I kin lwak, ma weko abili tiyo kacelo ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Eutasi atukona nuka ikisila luka atutubet aimo iwaitin luitetiak luka aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunete kanuka akoko. Epone ediope loajokan noi loepedoriata itunga aswam ngesi aingic ipolisin luka atutubet, kanu aisinyikokit aiswamanara kiding ipolisin keda itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi curu'do geri o'diru 'diyi nda e'yo ewaru e'yo 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu kari 'di ma alea oguzaru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri eri polisi ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri, dika eri fe ti ecita polisi eyi ma eselea 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro omu byaro, nibyeyongyera kuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza oburemeezi oburikureetwa okukukusa ebintu. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukora kurungi ogurikureetwaho n'okukuratira ebiragiro omu byaro, ekirikureetaho okukwatanisa ahagati ya pooriisi n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: The ongoing conflict in South Sudan has had far-reaching consequences, affecting neighboring countries and their citizens. As violence escalates, many Ugandans have found themselves caught in the crossfire or directly impacted by the turmoil.
lug_prompt: Olutalo olugenda mu maaso mu South Sudan lukosezza nnyo amawanga agaliraanyeewo ne bannansi baago. Ng'obutabanguko bweyongera, Bannayuganda bangi beesanze mu buzibu oba nga bakoseddwa obutereevu obuvuyo.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye kawot anyim I lobo South Sudan okelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom lobe matye jirani ki anywali gi. I kare ma tim gero tye ka medde, anywali me Uganda mapol gunongo ni peko tye I komgi onyo peko man tye ka yelo gi.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta lu elosi akonye ko South Sudan ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok noi, aitolitol akwapin nu idunyare keda itungakec. Kwape iyatakinor amumu, apotu itunga luipu luko Uganda kodumutu ebe ejaasi kesi toma akiro nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri mupi drile kari sudani andraleruri ma alea ri ma e'yo onzi eyi 'ye kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie tualu kari anzi eyivile 'diyi pie. E'yo ngiringiri ni tuzu uru risi, 'ba Ugandani karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo onzi eyi ma alea kani ku e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eyi 'ye eyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho omuri Sudan y'amashuuma zitwire nizikora kihango aha mahanga agatuherereire hamwe n'abatuuragye baago. Obwimukiriro ku burikweyongyera, abanya Uganda baingi beeshangire omu kabi nainga bateganisiibwe entaro.

eng_prompt: Smugglers often exploit weaknesses in national security to transport illegal goods. One significant factor contributing to this issue is the presence of porous borders.
lug_prompt: Abakukusa ebintu batera okweyambisa obunafu mu by'okwerinda by'eggwanga okutambuza ebyamaguzi ebimenya amateeka. Ensonga emu enkulu ereetawo ensonga eno kwe kubeerawo kw'ensalo ezitali nnungi.
ach_prompt: Lutim cato jami iwi alii ipol kare gitiyo ki goro matye I gwoko kuc me lobo me cato jami iwi alii. Tyen lok acel ma pire tek ma okelo peko man obedo bedo tye pa wang lobo matye ki bur.
teo_prompt: Itwasamaete duc agwelanarak iboro luitemerete kotoma ayuwara naka akwap kanu aitolot iboro lumam ekisil ecamakinit. Idiopebore yenepedori ayangaun ationis na ngesi ajaut naka ikoruo lumam iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa ozizaru 'diyi oji'ba 'diyi tutuni e'yo okpo ako kari ma alia 'diyi ayu afa ozizaru 'diyi ojizu geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi. E'yo azi okporu fepi e'yo 'di ni e'yo boda eyini aa'zu kililiru ku ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukukukusa ebintu, nibakoresa obunafu oburi omu by'okwerinda by'eihanga kutwara ebintu omu buryo butahikire. Enshonga nkuru erikureetaho enshonga egi, n'okugira ngu ensharo tizirikwetegyerezibwa gye.

eng_prompt: Effective enforcement of laws and regulations is crucial for maintaining national security and economic stability. One key component of this enforcement is the establishment of a dedicated border patrol department.
lug_prompt: Okussa mu nkola obulungi amateeka n'ebiragiro kya mugaso mu kukuuma eby'okwerinda by'eggwanga n'obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kukwasisa amateeka kwe kuteekawo ekitongole ekirabirira ensalosalo.
ach_prompt: Keto cik itic maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I lobo. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I keto cik itic en aye bedo ki dul ma gwoko wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Aitwasam ikisila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ayuwara naka akwap keda ainapakina naka ikapun. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitolomun ewai lo eyuarit ikoruo.
lgg_prompt: Azita eyi ma ta mbaza kililiru ri eri orodriru ageitema kari ni ri ma tambazu tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie. Afa azi okporu 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu ri e'dozu ri eri 'ba angu andripi boda'a 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa gye ebiragiro n'ebiragiro n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eby'okwerinda n'obutebekana omu by'entaasya y'eihanga. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru by'okukuratiriza engyenderwaho n'okutandikaho ekitongore ky'okurambura aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: Participants in the protest are encouraged to express their views peacefully and respectfully. It is essential to maintain order and uphold the law throughout the event.
lug_prompt: Abeenyigira mu kwekalakaasa bakubirizibwa okwogera endowooza zaabwe mu mirembe era mu kitiibwa. Kya mugaso okukuuma emirembe n'okukwasisa amateeka mu kiseera kyonna eky'omukolo.
ach_prompt: Kicuku cwiny joo matye ka jemo me waco tam gi I yoo me kuc ki woro. Pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki woro cik ikare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Isinyikokitai itunga luejaasi toma aidiya ngin alimun aomisiokec kopone kaloajokan ido koipone kaloajokan. Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar ainapakina ka aitup ikisila kotoma opucit kere.
lgg_prompt: Ba ai 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi e'yo yini 'diyi ecezu asianzuru azini inzita si. Eri orodriru azita eyi ma ta mbazu sa'wa dria omu 'da niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abejumbire omu kwesharinga, nibahigwa kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo omu busingye n'ekitiinisa. N'eky'omugasho okurinda obusingye n'okukuratira ebiragiro aha mukoro gwona.

eng_prompt: The rise in metal theft has become a significant issue in many communities, leading to increased crime rates and economic losses. To address this growing problem, it is essential to implement stricter oversight on scrap dealers.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obubbi bw'ebyuma kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi mu bitundu bingi, ekiviiriddeko okweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango n'okufiirwa mu byenfuna. Okusobola okugonjoola ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola ey'obwegendereza eri abasuubuzi b'ebyuma ebikadde.
ach_prompt: Medde pa kwo me nyonyo odoko peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapol, ma oweko rwom me timo bal omede ki rweny pa lim. Me tyeko peko man matye kamede ameda, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki wang mabit i kom joo ma cato nyonyo macon.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akoko na acuma erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubena nuipu, ido eyangauni abilibilio naka ikisila keda aibiror naka ikapun. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, ejokuna noi aanyanar agwelanarak iboro luitemerete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo cuma eyi ma ogu ni tuzu ri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo otuzu dika e'yo robia ni 'diyi avizu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru 'bani 'ba afa edeza 'diyi ozipi 'diyi ma pamvu andrizu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'obushuma bw'ebyoma, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani omu byanga bingi, ekirikureetaho okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi hamwe n'okufeerwa eby'entaasya. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu obweyongyeire, n'eky'omugasho okureeberera abarikuguza ebyoma ebikye.

eng_prompt: The growing demand for recycled materials has led to an increase in the number of scrap dealers operating in the area. However, without proper oversight, these businesses may engage in unethical practices that could harm the community.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebizzeemu okukozesebwa kiviiriddeko okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abasuubuzi b'ebyuma ebikadde mu kitundu. Newankubadde, awatali kulondoolwa kutuufu, bizinensi zino ziyinza okwenyigira mu bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa ebiyinza okukosa ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Medde pa miti pa jami ma ki nwoyo tic kwedgi oweko wel lucat scrap matye I kabedo eni omede tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, labongo neno maber, biacara magi twero donyo I tim ma pe ber ma twero balo kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor na eipuda lo iboro lu itwasamao irwan auni nes ayangau enaba lo agwelanarak iboro lu emunara kotoma aiboisit. Konye, arai mam ewanyunitai ejok, epedorete ibiasaran lu aswam iboro lumam iswamaete ejok lu emunarete itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa 'bani ayule 'diyi ma cu ni tuzu ri fe kalafe 'ba afa ayule 'diyi ozipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Kani si, driceza kililiru kokoru, tujari 'diyi eco fi e'yo onzi ecopi ongulumu eyini onzi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'ebyetengo by'ebintu ebikozirwe busya, kireesire omuhendo gw'abashubuzi b'ebyoma ebikye ogweyongyeire omu kyanga. Kwonka, bizinesi ezi zaaba zitareebirwe kurungi, nizibaasa kwejumba omu bikorwa ebitahikire ebirikubaasa kushiisha abantu.

eng_prompt: To ensure the integrity of our supply chain, we must implement strict measures against illegal goods. This includes thorough inspections at all entry points.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulungi bw'enkola yaffe ey'okutunda ebintu, tulina okuteekawo enkola enkakali ku bintu ebimenya amateeka. Kino kizingiramu okukebera mu bujjuvu ku bifo byonna eby'okuyingira.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami ma watye kwede tye maber, omyero waket yoo matek tutwal me lweny i kom jami ma kicato iwi alii. Man kwako ngiyo piny I kabedo weng ma dano donyo iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ewai lo ijanakino oni iboro, ekot oni aitegear ikisila lu itigogongoritai kanu aitikitik iboro lumam ekisil ecamakinit. Imoriaritos nu ainwakio na aiboisio kere nu elomunete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amani afa ozizaru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru, le ama ma 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi afa ozizaru azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma alia, 'ba mu angu dria 'bani fizu 'diyi andri kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obushubuzi byaitu bigumire, twine kutaho oburyo bw'okurwanisa ebintu ebitarikwikirizibwa omu mateeka. Eki nikitwariramu okukyebera kurungi aha myanya y'okutaaha.

eng_prompt: To effectively combat the growing issue of smuggling, it is crucial to address the role of key stakeholders in the transportation industry. One of the most significant groups in this effort is truck drivers, who often serve as the first line of defense against illicit activities.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi ekizibu ky'okukukusa ebintu ekyeyongera, kikulu nnyo okukola ku mulimu gw'abakwatibwako abakulu mu by'entambula. Ekimu ku bibiina ebisinga obukulu mu kaweefube ono be bavuzi ba biroole, abakola ng'abasooka okulwanyisa ebikolwa ebimenya amateeka.
ach_prompt: Me lweny maber i kom lok me donyo ki jami acata iwi alii, pire tek tutwal me neno tic pa dano mapigi tego I tenge me wot. Dul acel ma pire tek tutwal I tic man obedo ludwo mutoka madongo, ma ipol kare gitiyo macalo dul me acel me lweny i kom tim ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitiji ationis na ekoko, ejokuna noi aitemokin nuikamunitos aswam naka itunga lukapolok kotoma okampuni loka elose. Idiopet kotoma ogurupun lu epol ajokis kotoma aswamisioit kana eraasi iderepan luka amotokan nuapolok, lu iswamaete kwape lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitikitik aswamisinei numam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: Lezu a'di 'dizu e'yo 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri be kililiru, eri orodriru azi 'ba okporu okalamvu acipa niri ma alea 'diyiniri 'yezu. Ongulumu azi okporu ndeni okpo 'di ma alia 'diyi dereva lorri ni 'diyi, azi ngapi e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi 'yepi okori'i.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi obweyongyeire obw'okutambuza ebintu omu buryo butahikire, ni kikuru kukora aha mirimo y'abantu abakuru omu by'engyenda. Emwe aha guruupu ezirikukirayo kukora munonga omu nteekateeka egi n'abavugi b'ebimotoka ebihango, abarikukira kuba ab'okubanza kurwanisa ebikorwa ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: Corruption within law enforcement agencies has become a significant issue in recent years. As a result, some security officials connive with illegal traders to smuggle goods.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi mu bitongole ebikuumaddembe bufuuse ensonga enkulu mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, ab'eby'okwerinda abamu beekobaana n'abasuubuzi abakukusa ebyamaguzi.
ach_prompt: Tim camucana I dul ma gwoko cik odoko peko madit tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, lugwok kuc mukene gi winye ki lutim biacara ma turu cik me donyo ki jami acata iwi alii.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka ikapun kotoma atukona nu ikisila erai ationis naepol noi kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, icetunga luka ayuwara imorikikinos keda agwelanarak lumam ekisil ecamakinit aitobwot iboro.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo amuti azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma alea ri eca e'yo azi okporu ni eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba ageyitema ni 'diyi ma azi eyi ti eci 'ba tujari 'yepi azita palaa ku 'diyi pie afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu kari 'di ma alea oguzaru.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi omu bitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro, buhindukire enshonga y'amaani omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'eby'okwerinda abamwe nibekwatanisa n'abashubuzi abarikukukukusa ebintu.

eng_prompt: The lack of stringent border controls has led to an increase in smuggling activities. As a result, criminal networks have exploited these vulnerabilities for various illicit trades.
lug_prompt: Obutabeera na mateeka makakali ku nsalo kiviiriddeko okweyongerayongera mu bikolwa by'okukukusa ebintu. N'ekivuddemu, emikutu gy'abamenyi b'amateeka gikozesezza obunafu buno mu busuubuzi obutali mu mateeka obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Bedo peke pa cik matek I wang lobo oweko tim me donyo ki jami acata iwi alii omede. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa lutim bal gutiyo ki peko magi me timo biacara ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Amamus na ainapeta nu ikoruon eyangaunit aiyatakino na iboro lu ekokotai. Kanuka ngun, etosomaete itunga lukodwaratau aiboisio nu ican kanu agwelanar iboro lumam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo boda ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu okporu ri ma ako fe e'yo 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ejizu kari 'di ma alea oguzaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ayu e'yo ewaru 'diyi tujari azita palaa ku 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Eibura ry'ebiragiro by'amaani aha nsharo, kireesire okweyongyera kw'emirimo y'okukukusa ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu,ebibiina by'enkozi z'ebibi bikoresize oburemeezi obu kukora eby'obushuubuzi ebitarikwikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: Parents play a crucial role in shaping their children's behavior and values. By being attentive to their daily routines and activities, they can ensure a healthy and positive development.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bakola omulimu munene mu kubumba enneeyisa n'empisa z'abaana baabwe. Bwe bassaayo omwoyo ku mirimu gyabwe egya bulijjo, basobola okukulaakulana obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo timo tic mapire tek tutwal me yubu kit pa lutino gi. Ka gi keto cwiny gi i kom jami ma gitimo nino ki nino, gi twero neno ni gudongo maber dok ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete auriak aswam naepol noi kanu aitolomun iponesio ka iponesio luka idwekec. Kowai lo apodokinit aswamisio kec nuka nginiparan, epedorete kesi awanyun apol najokan.
lgg_prompt: Tipika eyi azi okporu ni nga anzi eyivile 'diyi ma adriza otuzu. Eyi ka asi 'ba e'yo eyini 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi ma dria, eyi eco zota muke azini muke ri ne ra.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire nibakora omurimo muhango omu kutendeka abaana baabo emicwe n'emitwarize. Kubarikufayo aha mirimo yaabo eya burizooba, nibabaasa kureeba ngu batunguuka gye kandi baine amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Many young girls face challenging circumstances that hinder their development and self-worth. As a result, they may turn to desperate measures to survive and find acceptance.
lug_prompt: Abawala abato bangi boolekagana n'embeera ezisomooza ezibalemesa okukula n'okwewa ekitiibwa. N'ekivuddemu, bayinza okuddukira mu makubo amazibu okusobola okuwangaala n'okusiimibwa.
ach_prompt: Anyira matino mapol nongo peko ma gengo dongo gi ki woro gi. Macalo adwogi ne, giromo tic ki yoo mapat-pat me kwo ki nongo cwak.
teo_prompt: Apesur nuipu ejaas keda atiokisio nu itikitikete apolo kec keda awate kec. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kesi aitwasam iponesio luetiono noi kanu aiku ka adumun acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Ezoanzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyini zozu azini eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri atripi 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, eyi eco mu e'yo eyi 'ye eyini ani aa'zu edriru azini eyini ani aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ku 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abaishiki bato abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi oburikuremesa entunguuka yaabo n'okwetunguura. N'ekyarugiremu, nibabaasa kukoresa oburyo butari bwa buriijo okubaasa kugumaho n'okwikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: In times of increasing division and unrest, it is crucial for community figures to foster unity and understanding. By promoting a culture of compassion and cooperation, they can help mitigate the tensions that often lead to conflict.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okweyawulayawula n'obutabanguko okweyongera, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakungu b'ekitundu okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana. Nga batumbula empisa y'okusaasira n'okukwatagana, basobola okukendeeza ku bunkenke obuvaako obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki lweny matye kamede, pire tek tutwal ki lwak me kelo ribe ki winye ikin gi. Ka gicuku cwiny dano me bedo ki cwiny me kica ki ribe, ci gi twero konyo me dwoko piny telle ma pol kare kelo lweny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu iyatasi atiakatiaka keda amumu, ejokuna noi itunga luka atutubet aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro. Kowai lo aitopolor einono loka asianut keda aimorikikina, epedorete kesi aitidisiar atiokisio nu eyangaununete ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza ni tuzu tualu ngiringiri be, eri orodriru 'ba ongulumu ni 'diyi ni ti ecita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo asi ndriza ni azini ti icita niri ma omgbo otuza si, eyi eco e'yo asi omiza fepi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, n'eky'omugasho munonga abantu b'omubyanga okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana. Kubarikutunguura emicwe y'embabazi n'okukwatanisa, nibabaasa kuhwera omu kukyendeeza obwimukiriro oburikureeta entaro.

eng_prompt: A harmonious society fosters collaboration and trust among its members. When individuals work together towards common goals, they create an environment conducive to growth and prosperity.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu ekirimu obumu kikulaakulanya enkolagana n'obwesige mu bantu baakyo. Abantu bwe bakolera awamu okutuuka ku biruubirirwa eby'awamu, batondawo embeera ebasobozesa okukulaakulana n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Lwak ma winye tye ikingi kelo ribe ki gen ikin gi. Ka dano gitiyo kacelo pi cobo miti gi, man kelo dongo lobo ki lonyo.
teo_prompt: Itunga lu imorikikina isinyikokitos aiswamanara keda amunokina kanejaas imeebanakec. Karai iswamaete itunga nepepe kanu aitodolikin apeleikinata, itolomunenete kesi aiboisit naejok kanu apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu aa'pi tualu ri ni ti ecita azini asi'baza ma omgbo otu 'ba eri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Ba alu alu ka azi nga tualu e'yo yini lele tualu 'diyi ma dria, eyi angu 'ba eyini zozu azini zozu kililiru ri ede.
nyn_prompt: Abantu abarikukwatanisa, nibareetaho okukwatanisa n'okwesiga omu bantu baabo. Abantu ku barikukorera hamwe, barikurabira omu bigyendererwa ebirikushushana, nibareetaho entunguuka n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Research has consistently shown that the early years of a child's life are critical for their development. In this formative period, the role of caregivers becomes increasingly important.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti emyaka gy'obulamu bw'omwana egyasooka gya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana ye. Mu kiseera kino eky'okutendekebwa, omulimu gw'abalabirira gufuuka gwa mugaso nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni kare ki kare mwaka me tino pa latin pire tek tutwal pi dongo ne. Ikare me pwony eni, tic pa joo ma gwoko lutino doko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itodunit duc aingic ebe ikaru lusodit luka aijar naka ikoku epolok noi kanuka apolokec. Kotoma apakio kanu nuka aitutuonoro, epolor noi aswam naka aidar idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece sawa driasi kini eli anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu oderu 'diyi orodriru eyini zozu. Sa'wa 'bani anzi eyi imbazu 'di ma alea, azi 'ba eyi ma tambapi 'diyini ri eca orodriru tu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kugumire nikworeka ngu emyaka y'obuto bw'omwana n'ey'omugasho aha ntunguuka ye. Omu bwire obu obw'okutendekwa, omurimo gw'abarikureeberera abaana nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Investing in quality education is essential for the growth and development of any society. By nurturing young minds, we lay the foundation for a prosperous future.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza eby'omutindo kya mugaso mu kukulaakulana n'enkulaakulana y'ekitundu kyonna. Bwe tukuza ebirowoozo by'abato, tuteekawo omusingi gw'ebiseera by'omu maaso ebirungi.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan ma rwom gi malo pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki dongo lobo pa lwak. Ka wapwonyo tam pa jo matino, ci wabiketo guti me kwo maber i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda apol naka atutubet. Kowai lo aitopoloun aomisio nuka atumunak, itolomuni oni atukot naka ingaren loejok.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita muke ri ma alea ri eri orodriru ongulumu ci ma zota ni. E'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma omi ezozasi, ama angu e'do ewu drialeri ni.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese eby'omutindo n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka y'ekicweka kyona. Okukuza ebiteekateeko by'eminyeeto, nikitandikaho omusingye gw'obusinguzi omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing economy, traditional job markets are becoming increasingly competitive and uncertain. To secure their futures, young people need to adopt a proactive approach by becoming entrepreneurs and innovators.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikyuka amangu, obutale bw'emirimu obw'edda bweyongera okuvuganya n'obutali butebenkevu. Okukuuma ebiseera byabwe eby'omumaaso, abavubuka beetaaga okutwala enkola ey'obwegendereza nga bafuuka abasuubuzi n'abayiiya.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me lim tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, cuk me tic macon tye ka doko tek dok pe tye ki gen. Pi gwoko anyim gi, bulu omyero gucak tic matek me doko lutim biacara ki luyubo jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ikapun, ejai abolobol naepol noi kotoma aswamisinei. Kanu ayuwar ingaren kec, ekot atumunak aitwasam iponesio luingarakinete kesi araun luitolosete ibiasaran keda luiswamaete iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, cuu azi ni oku 'diyi eca abala ru azini e'yo azi ni 'diyi ma dria ku. Ba ode eyi ma ewu drialeri ma ta mbazu, le eyi ma e'do e'yo eyi 'ye geri eyini ecazu 'ba tujari 'yepi azini 'ba e'yo o'diru 'yepi 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikuhinduka juba, obutare bw'emirimo obwa ira nibweyongyera kuba obw'akabi n'obutarikwetegyerezibwa. Okutunga ebiro byaabo eby'omumaisho, eminyeeto eshemereire kugira entekateeka nungi, barikuba abashubuzi n'abajumbuki.

eng_prompt: Access to clean water is essential for maintaining public health and hygiene. Unfortunately, many communities face significant challenges in securing adequate water supplies.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo kya nkizo mu kukuuma obulamu n'obuyonjo bw'abantu. Eky'ennaku, ebitundu bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna amazzi agamala.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom ki lengo pa lwak. Ki gum marac, kabedo mapol nongo peko me nongo pii ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ejok kanu aidar angaleu keda aila. Nukaiturur, ejaas itunga luipu keda ainingosia nuipu kanu adumun akipi nu edolitos.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala esuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu. Drile onziru, ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu geri eyini ecozu yi esuzu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'obwegyendesereza. Eky'obusaasi, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga amaizi agarikumara.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to clean and reliable water sources is a significant challenge. As a result, various methods are employed to secure water, with boreholes emerging as a vital solution.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo era agesigika kusoomooza kwa maanyi. N'ekivuddemu, enkola ez'enjawulo zikozesebwa okufuna amazzi, nga nayikondo zivaayo nga enkola enkulu.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, nongo pii maleng dok ma genne obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye katic ki yoo mapat-pat me nongo pii, ki tangi macalo yoo me tic mapire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, adumunun akipi nu elaete ido nu eyuara erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, itwasamao iponesio luegelegela kanu adumun akipi, ido apolor agilon kwape epone loka aitemokin ngun.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, geri yi ala azini asi'baza be 'diyi esuzu ri eri e'yo azi okporu ni i. E'yo 'disi, 'ba geri ndundu eyi ayu yi esuzu, bowaholu eyini efuzu e'yo azi okporu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okutunga oburugo bw'amaizi marungi n'oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo etari emwe n'emwe neekoresibwa okutunga amaizi, kandi za naikondo nizikora nk'omuringo gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges faced by many communities, it is essential to explore sustainable avenues for growth. One promising strategy is to harness the potential of local attractions and experiences to boost the economy.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna ebitundu bingi kwe bisanga gyebuvuddeko, kya mugaso okunoonyereza ku makubo agawangaala ag'okukulaakulana. Enkola emu esuubiza kwe kukozesa obusobozi bw'ebifo ebisikiriza n'ebyobulamu eby'omu kitundu okutumbula ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo me dongo lobo matye anyim. Yoo acel matye ki gen madit tutwal en aye me tic ki jami matye I kabedo mapatpat me ilo malo rwom me lim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda atutubena nuipu, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin lu itopoloere. Adiopet ewai lo iswama ejok ngesi aitwasam iboro lu ingalaunete itunga keda iboro lu iswamaete kesi kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu karakara eyini esu curu'do e'yo robia nirisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru geri eyini ecozu zozu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ondazu. Otita azi ecopi drile suzaru ri eri e'yo 'bani ecozu angu ndundu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ayuzu e'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obu abantu baingi barikurabamu, ni kikuru kuronda oburyo bw'okutunguuka. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureetaho amatsiko n'okukoresa obushoboorozi bw'ebintu ebirikureeta okushemererwa n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Local authorities have reported a disturbing increase in abduction cases over the past few months. As a result, residents are becoming increasingly anxious about their safety and the security of their loved ones.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo bategeezezza nti emisango gy'okuwamba abantu gyeyongedde mu myezi egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'obukuumi bwabwe n'obukuumi bw'abaagalwa baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guwaco ni lok me mako dano omede tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka mede ki bedo ki lworo I kom ber bedo gi ki ber bedo pa dano gi me amara.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio luka atutubet olimosi ebe iyata noi imusagon luka aikamanario naka itunga kolapio idis lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, iyalongongosi itunga aiyalongong kanu ayuwara kec keda lu iminan kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece kini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu ri ma omgbo tu ra mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi curu'do asi otiza be eyi ma tambaza ma dria tualu 'ba eyini leletu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bagambire ngu emishango y'okwiba abantu eyeyongyeire omu myezi mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye beyongyeire kwerarikirira ebyokwerinda kwabo hamwe n'ebyokwerinda by'abakundwa baabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in crime rates across various regions. Experts suggest that economic instability and rising unemployment may be contributing factors to this surge in criminal activities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu buzzi bw'emisango mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Abakugu bagamba nti obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna n'ebbula ly'emirimu eryeyongera biyinza okuba nga bye biviiriddeko okweyongerayongera kw'ebikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me timo bal omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Ludiro giwaco ni peko me can lim kacel ki can tic ma tye kamede tye ka kelo tim aranyi mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Ebakasi ipirioitin ebe amamus na ainapakina naka ikapun keda amamus na aswamisinei eyangaunitos aiyatakin naka aswamisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi 'yo kini e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia azini azi ako ma omgbo tupi tupi 'diyi e'yo e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otupi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ebihagaro byeyongyeire omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abakugu nibagira ngu obutabanguko omu by'entaasya hamwe n'eibura ry'emirimo, nibyo bireesireho okweyongyera kw'emishango.

eng_prompt: When traveling in unfamiliar areas, it's crucial to prioritize your safety. One effective way to do this is to ensure you're not alone in a taxi.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba otambula mu bifo by'otomanyi, kikulu okukulembeza obukuumi bwo. Engeri emu ey'okukola kino kwe kukakasa nti tobeera wekka mu takisi.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka wot I kabedo ma pe ingeyo, pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo megi obed gin ma pire tek. Yo acel maber me timo man aye me neno ni pe itye keni I taxi.
teo_prompt: Neautar jo alosit aiboisio nu mam ijo ijeni, ibusakinit jo aisingarenit ayuwara kon. Epone ediopebon loka aswam ngun ngesi awanyun ebe mam jo ijai bon toma atakisi.
lgg_prompt: Eka aci angu mini nile ku 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru mini e'yo mi agei tema niri 'duzu okori'i. Geri azi orodriruni ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri lezu nezu ra kini mi ovuni a'dule takisi ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootambura omu myanya etarikumanywa, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'okwerinda kwawe. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okureeba ngu otari wenka omu takisi.

eng_prompt: In many high-stakes criminal situations, the motives of abductors can vary significantly. Understanding their tactics is crucial for law enforcement and families alike.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera z'obuzzi bw'emisango nnyingi, ebigendererwa by'abawamba abantu biyinza okwawukana ennyo. Okutegeera obukodyo bwabwe kya mugaso nnyo eri abakuumaddembe n'ab'omu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol ma bal tye iye matek tutwal, miti pa joo ma kwalo dano twero bedo pat-pat tutwal. Niang diro gi pire tek tutwal pi lugwok cik ki gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka abilibilio naka ikisila, epedorete alosikineta nuka itunga luekokoete itunga atiakakin. Amisiikin acoasineikec erai ibore yenepol noi kama ejaasi ipolisin keda ikalia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza ni okporu 'diyi ma alia, asisile 'ba 'ba o'dupi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma esele co esele saaru. Otita yini 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba azita ma ta mba'baa 'diyi dri tualu familia yini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwimukiriro bw'ebihagaro obw'amaani, ebigyendererwa by'abarikwiba abantu nibibaasa kuba bitarikushushana. Okwetegyereza obukoryo bwabo n'eky'omugasho aha b'ebiragiro hamwe n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: To ensure your safety while parked, it's important to take a few precautionary measures. Before leaving your vehicle, make sure to secure all entry points and adjust your mirrors.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi bwo ng'osimbye emmotoka, kikulu okubaako ebintu ebitonotono by'okola. Nga tonnava mu mmotoka yo, kakasa nti ebifo byonna by'oyingiramu bikuumibwa era n'olongoosa endabirwamu zo.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko kwo ni I kare ma itye I motoka, pire tek tutwal me timo jami mogo me gwokke. Mapwod pe iweko mutoka ni, nen ni I gwoko kabedo weng ma idonyo iye ki yubu maraya mamegi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iyuwara jo neipikakinor jo emotoka, ejokuna aitwasam ikisila luikidioko. Erongo ijo anyoun kotoma omotoka kon, koany ebe itikitikitai aiboisio kere nu elomunete kosodi aitemokin alabirai kon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mini ecozu mi ma ta mbazu mini mutukari o'bazurisi, eri orodriru mini e'yo azi 'diyi 'yezu. De nga po'di mi ku mi vile mutukari ku, le mi ma 'ba angu dria mini fizu 'diyi ma ti ci azini mi ma oja mi vile angu e'dapi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya oburinzi bwawe waaba osimbire emotoka, n'eky'omugasho kukora ebintu bikye by'okwerinda. Otakarugiire omu motoka yaawe, rebeeka ngu ohamire emyanya yoona ei orikutaaha, kandi ohindure endabirwamu zaawe.

eng_prompt: In recent years, cities have increasingly turned to advanced technology to enhance public safety. One promising tool in this effort is street surveillance, which can play a crucial role in crime prevention and investigation.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ebibuga byeyongedde okukozesa tekinologiya ow'omulembe okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu. Ekimu ku bikozesebwa mu kaweefube ono kwe kulondoola enguudo, ekiyinza okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutangira n'okunoonyereza ku buzzi bw'emisango.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, citi omede ki tic ki diro manyen me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Gin acel matye ki gen I kom tic man obedo bedo ki wang mabit I kom gudu, ma twero konyo tutwal I gengo ki kwedo bal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apotu isitei kijulakinos aitwasam etatai loakwana kanu aitojokar ayuwara naka itunga. Adiopebon loejok noi kotoma aswamisioit kana ngesi aanyanar irotin, loepedori aingarakin aitikitik keda aingic abilibilio naka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, aku ambo eyi e'do curu'do e'yo tekenologia ni okporu 'diyi ayu o'bi eyi ma tambazu. Afa azi orodriru e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri 'bani angu andrizu nzila dria ri, ecopi azi okporu ngapi e'yo onzi atrizu azini e'yo eti ondazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, endembo zeyongyeire kukoresa tekinorogye y'omurembe, okureetaho oburinzi omu bantu. Ekintu kimwe ekirikubaasisa munonga omunkora egi n'okurondoora enguuto, ekirikubaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuzibira n'okucondooza ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: The psychological impact of abduction can be profound and long-lasting. Many individuals who experience such traumatic events find it difficult to reintegrate into their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu kuwambibwa biyinza okuba eby'amaanyi era eby'ekiseera ekiwanvu. Abantu bangi abafuna ebizibu ng'ebyo bakisanga nga kizibu okuddamu mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma dano nongo ikare ma ki mako gi tek tutwal dok rii pi kare malac. Dano mapol ma ginongo peko ma kit meno ginongo tek tutwal me dok I kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Akangasia nuikamunitos aikamanario eraas nuepolok noi ido eyangaikinete apak naepol noi. Itunga luipu lu itereikina keda ationis kwangun etionikinit abongokin toma aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba o'duzu okpo alia 'diyi ma e'yo 'ba ma omi ma dria ri eco ovu onzi azini ewu ezu. Ba karakara e'yo ewaru 'dile 'diyi esupi 'diyi eri esu mbazaru eyi ma edri eyini aa'zu o'du driasi ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'okubuzaho abantu nibubaasa kugumaho kumara obwire buraingwa. Abantu baingi abarikuhikwaho oburemeezi nk'obwo, nikibagumira kugaruka omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: It's important for everyone to stay vigilant and look out for one another. If you notice anything unusual, take action to ensure the safety of our neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso buli omu okubeera obulindaala n'okufaayo ku munne. Bw'olaba ekintu kyonna ekitali kya bulijjo, kolawo okukakasa obukuumi bw'ekitundu kyo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek pi dano weng me bedo ma wanggi twolo dok me gwoko luwotgi. Kace ineno gin mo ma pe time, tim gin mo me gwoko kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi nginitunganan asalakin epodokinit ka aidar luce. Arai iwanyuni ijo idiobore yenitegelikina, kiswama kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara aiboisit wok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'ba dria ni aa'zu mile be azini eyi ma ta mbazu eyi ma eselea. Eka afa azi 'bani nile ku ri ndre, le mi ma 'ye e'yo azi angu amavile 'diyi ma ageyi tezu.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho buri omwe kuguma ayeteekateekire n'okureeberera abandi. Ku orikureeba ekintu kyona ekitari kya buriijo, gira eki okozire okureeba ngu eby'okwerinda omu byaro byaitu bigumire.

eng_prompt: In complex cases involving multiple witnesses and pieces of evidence, law enforcement agencies often face significant challenges. As a result, thorough inquiries are essential to ensure accurate conclusions.
lug_prompt: Mu misango emizibu egirimu abajulizi abangi n'obujulizi, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu kwa mugaso okukakasa enkomerero entuufu.
ach_prompt: I lok matego matye ki caden mapol, dul ma gwoko cik ipol kare ginongo peko madongo. Macalo adwogi ne, kwed matut obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi moko tam matir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma imusagon luetioko luejaasi keda ajenak luipu keda aitogogongoret, ejaas iriongeta lu ikisila keda ainingosia nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, epolok noi aingic ejok kanu ajenun abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kongolokoru 'ba sadiniru azini afa ecetaru 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, e'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mishango egumire erimu abajurizi baingi hamwe n'obujurizi, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro nibitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, okubuuririza omu bwijwire n'eky'omugasho okureeba ngu habaho okuhendera okuhikire.

eng_prompt: As the effects of climate change become increasingly evident, the need for sustainable energy solutions has never been more urgent. Transitioning to sources like solar and wind power can significantly reduce our carbon footprint.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde byeyongera okweyoleka, obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze ag'olubeerera bubadde bwa mangu nnyo. Okukyuka ne tukozesa amasannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba n'amaanyi g'empewo kisobola okukendeeza ennyo ku butonde bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me alokaloka piny tye ka nen atyer kamaleng, miti me nongo yoo me tic I kom mac ma pe balo kabedo wa kombedi dong obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Loko mac calo mac ma aa ki iceng ki yamo twero dwoko piny rwom me mac ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape etiono noi aanyun atiokisio nuka ekuse keda ecae loka ikwamin, ejai eipud loka aitolom akim naejok noi. Aijulakin aiboisio kwape nat esola keda ekwam epedori aitidisiar akim naka ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo angu mile ma ojata ni 'diyi ni ecazu e'dazaru tutu, le 'ba ma esu geri aci ayuza kililiru 'diyi mbeleru. E'yo aci solar pile azini oli be 'diyi ojazu ri eco ama ma aci ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empindahinduka y'obwire kweyongyera kureebeka, ekyetengo ky'okukoresa amashanyarazi agatarikuhwaho kitwire kiriho. Okuhinduka tukakoresa amashanyarazi g'eizooba n'omuyaga, nikibaasa kutuhwera okukyendeeza amaani agu turikukoresa omu by'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: The environmental impact of charcoal production has become increasingly concerning, with deforestation and air pollution on the rise. To address these issues, it is essential to implement measures that ensure sustainable practices in the industry.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu kufulumya amanda byeyongedde okweraliikiriza abantu olw'okutema ebibira n'okwonoona empewo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola ezikakasa enkola eziwangaala mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma yubu maka obedo kwede i kom cwec ma orumuwa tye ka medde tutwal pien tongo bunga ki balo yamo tye ka mede. Me tyeko peko magi, pire tek tutwal me keto yoo me tic ma weko tic eni bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Amuna na atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka atutubet naka Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, ejokuna aitegear iwaitin lu itodolikinete aswamisio nu ejokuka kotoma okampuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma e'yo ni eca curu'do asi otiza ru, pati eyi ogazu tualu oli ezaza be tutu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, eri orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu okalamvu 'di ma alea sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okutema emiti n'okwonoona empewo kweyongyeire ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi oburikuruga omu kukora amakara. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, n'eky'omugasho okuta omu nkora emiringo erikureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence presented by scientists, many people remain unaware of the complexities surrounding climate change. This lack of understanding can hinder meaningful discussions and actions needed to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo obujulizi bungi okuva mu bannassaayansi, abantu bangi tebamanyi ku buzibu obuli mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde. Obutategeeragana buno busobola okulemesa okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'omugaso n'ebikolebwa ebyetaagisa okugonjoola ensonga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lucayan gumiyo caden mapol tutwal, dano mapol pud pe gingeyo peko matye ikare me alokaloka piny. Bedo peke pa niang man twero gengo nywako lok ki timo jami ma mite me tyeko lok eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi itunga luka sayanis keda ajenanut naepol noi, mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka ekuse ka etepe. Amamus na amisiikin epedori aitikitik ineresinei ka aswamisio nuibusakinit aswam kanu aitemokin ationis ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba sayansini 'diyi ni e'dazu ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi nini e'yo ewaru angu mile ma ojata ma dria 'diyi ku. E'yo vata ako 'diri eco e'yo nzeza kililiru azini e'yo 'yeta lepi e'yo nde ma aza kozu 'diyi atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhame bwingi oburikworekwa abanyasayansi, abantu baingi tibarikumanya oburemeezi oburikukwata aha mpindahinduka y'obwire. Obutetegyerezana obu niburemesa okuhanuura n'okukora ebirikwetengwa kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: As the effects of climate change become increasingly evident, it is crucial for communities to understand the urgency of the situation. Education and awareness are key components in fostering a collective response to this global challenge.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde byeyongera okweyoleka, kikulu nnyo eri ebitundu okutegeera obukulu bw'embeera. Okusoma n'okumanyisa bintu bikulu mu kutumbula enkola ey'awamu ku kusoomoozebwa kuno okw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me alokaloka piny tye ka nen atyer kamaleng, pire tek tutwal ki lwak me niang kit ma peko eni tye kwede. Kwan ki rweyo lwak obedo jami ma pigi tego ma weko dano weng twero lweny i kom peko man.
teo_prompt: Kwape ewanyununete atiokisio nuka ekuse ka etepe, epolok noi itunga amisiikin atiokisio nuka ejautene. Asioman keda aisisianakino eraas iboro lu epolok noi luepedorete aitodolikin ationis na na akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu mile ma ojata ni 'diyi ni ecazu e'dazaru tutu, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini e'yo 'di ma e'yo vazu mbeleru. Onita azini mile oziza eri e'yo okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo ewaru wudrikurusi 'di ma aza kozu tualuri'i.

eng_prompt: Counterfeit products can harm consumers and undermine legitimate businesses. It's important to stay vigilant and take action if you encounter such items.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebijingirire bisobola okukosa abaguzi n'okutyoboola bizinensi entuufu. Kya mugaso okubeera obulindaala n'okubaako ky'okola singa osanga ebintu ng'ebyo.
ach_prompt: Jami ma pe obedo ada twero balo kwo pa luwil ki bene balo biacara matye atir. Pire tek tutwal me bedo ma wanggi twolo dok me timo gin mo kace irwatte ki jami ma kit meno.
teo_prompt: Iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit epedorete aimusung agwelak ka aitolitol ibiasaran lu abeit. Erai ibore yenepol noi asalakin ekapakina kosodi aswam ibore yenepedori jo aswam arai idum ijo iboro kwape kangun.
lgg_prompt: Afa edeza enzoru 'diyi eco 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi eza ra azini tujari azita palaa 'diyi eza ra. Eri orodriru aa'zu mile be azini e'yo 'yezu eka afa 'dile 'diyi esu ria.
nyn_prompt: Ebintu ebitahikire, nibibaasa kushiisha abaguzi n'eby'obushubuzi ebihikire. N'eky'omugasho kuguma oyeteekateekire kandi okakora kyona ekirikubaasika waashanga ebintu nk'ebyo.

eng_prompt: As climate change continues to threaten ecosystems worldwide, finding effective solutions has become increasingly urgent. One promising approach to mitigate its effects is through reforestation efforts.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde yeeyongera okutabangula obutonde mu nsi yonna, okunoonya eby'okugonjoola ebigonjoola ebizibu kyeyongedde okuba eky'amangu. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okukendeeza ku buzibu bwayo kwe kusimba ebibira.
ach_prompt: Kit ma alokaloka me piny tye kamede ki kelo peko i kom cwec ma orumuwa I wilobo lung, nongo yoo me cobo peko eni omede ki bedo gin ma mitte tutwal. Yoo acel matye ki gen me dwoko piny adwogi ne obedo tic matek me gwoko bunga.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae aimusung aijar naka isuban kotoma akwap kere, ibusakinit noi adumun iwaitin lu iswamaere ngun. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aitidisiar atiokisio ngun ngesi aitwasam ikito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri ni mu drile e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu wudrikurusi dria, geri e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru 'diyi esuzu ri eca curu'do okporu. Geri azi 'bani ecozu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri geri pati eyi ogazu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku empindahinduka y'obwire erikugumizamu neeshiisha eby'obuhangwa omunsi yoona, okusherura oburyo burungi bw'okukora aha nshonga egi nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Omuringo gumwe ogurikworeka ngu nigubaasa kukyendeeza, n'okushara emiti.

eng_prompt: As the effects of climate change become increasingly evident, communities are seeking effective ways to contribute to environmental sustainability. One simple yet impactful action individuals can take is to enhance their surroundings by planting trees.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde byeyongera okweyoleka, abantu banoonya engeri ennungi ey'okuyambako mu kukuuma obutonde bw'ensi. Ekimu ku bintu ebyangu abantu bye bayinza okukola kwe kulongoosa ebibatwetoolodde nga basimba emiti.
ach_prompt: Kit ma adwogi me alokaloka piny tye ka nen kwede, lwak tye ka yenyo yoo maber me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Gin acel ma dano acel acel twero timone ma yot dok ma kelo adwogi maber en aye me yubu kabedo ma orumugi ki pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ewanyununete atiokisio nuka aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda ecae, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap. Adiopebore naedit konye naepol noi naepedori itunga aswam ngesi aitojokar aiboisio kec kowai lo aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ma ojata ni 'diyi ni ecazu e'dazaru tu, ongulumu eyi geri kililiru 'diyi nda angu ama agei ri ma tambazu. E'yo azi ewakokoru te orodriru 'ba alu alu eco 'ye ri eri angu yi ma ageia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu pati saza si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empinduka y'obwire kweyongyera kureebeka, abantu nibasherura oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera obuhangwa bw'ensi. Ekintu kimwe kyanguhi kandi eky'omugasho eki abantu barikubaasa kukora n'okutunguura ebyetorwaire barikubyara emiti.

eng_prompt: To promote environmental sustainability and enhance urban greenery, it is essential to encourage community involvement in tree planting initiatives. By providing residents with quality tree saplings, we can foster a healthier ecosystem in our neighborhoods.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi n'okutumbula obutonde bw'omuddo mu bibuga, kyetaagisa okukubiriza abantu okwenyigira mu kusimba emiti. Bwe tuwa abatuuze endokwa z'emiti ez'omutindo, tusobola okutumbula embeera y'obutonde ennungi mu bitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki dongo lobo i boma, pire tek tutwal me cuku cwiny lwak me bedo tye i yub me pito yadi. Ka wamiyo yadi mabeco bot lwak, watwero weko jami ma orumuwa bedo ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar ejautene lo akwap keda aiboisio nuka itaunin, ejok aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma aira ikito. Kowai lo aijanakin itunga ikito lu ejokuka, ipedori oni aitopolor aijar najokan kaiboisio wok.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu tualu angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu tualu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'ba ongulumu ru 'diyi ekazu e'yo pati saza ni 'diyi 'yezu indi. Geri 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri pati ori onyiru 'diyi fezu risi, ama eco angu amani aa'zu 'diyi ma rua ala otu angu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa omu ndembo, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuhiga abantu kwejumba omu mirimo y'okubyara emiti. Twaheereza abatuuragye emiti y'omutindo, nitubaasa kureetaho amagara marungi omu byaro byaitu.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed a series of questionable transactions involving timber sales. As a result, forestry officials have come under scrutiny for their alleged misconduct.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo ebintu bingi ebiteeberezebwa ebikwata ku kutunda embaawo. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu b'ebibira bali mu kwekenneenyezebwa olw'ebigambibwa nti beeyisa bubi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto jami mapat-pat ma pe tye kakare ma lubbe ki cato bao. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me bunga gubedo ka ngiyo korgi pi timgi maraco.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit aswamisinei nuipu nu mam ejokuka nu agwelanar abawoi. Kanuka ngun, engicitai eswamak lu amagoron kanu iponesio kec luarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo 'bani 'ba mbawu ozizu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo eti onda azi'ba jere ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma adriza onzi 'diyisi.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised regarding the transparency of the recent tree planting initiative. Community members are questioning how the allocated resources are being utilized.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bwerufu bw'enteekateeka y'okusimba emiti gye buvuddeko. Abantu b'omu kitundu babuusabuusa engeri eby'obugagga ebiweereddwayo gye bikozesebwamu.

teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aica naka aira ikito. Mam itunga lu atutubet ejenete epone lo itwasamaere iboro lu ijaikitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo 'bani pati eyi sazu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu e'yo ada be ri ma dria. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo zi geri 'bani afa 'bani fele 'diyi ayuzu ri ma dria.
