eng_prompt: The rapid expansion of agricultural land and urban development has put immense pressure on forest ecosystems. Without effective oversight and management, these vital resources are increasingly at risk.
lug_prompt: Okugaziwa okw'amangu okw'ettaka ly'ebyobulimi n'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga kutadde akazito ak'amaanyi ku butonde bw'ebisolo n'ebisolo mu bibira. Awatali kulondoola n'okuddukanya obulungi, ebintu bino ebikulu biri mu katyabaga.
ach_prompt: Yubu ngom me pur ki dongo lobo tye ka kelo peko madit tutwal I kom jami makwo I bunga. Labongo doro ki doro tic maber, lonyo magi mapigi tego tye I peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aisiarakinio naka alupok nuka akoru keda apol naka itaunin einakinit aijar naka amagoron ationis naepol noi. Arai emamei aanyanar keda eyaitene loajokan, epedorete iboro lu aimusung.
lgg_prompt: Angu ori ezoza ni azini tawuni eyi ma ezota ma omgbo ni tuzu mbeleru ri 'ba okpo okporu afa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. Azi pamvu azini driceza kililiru kokoru, lonyi orodriru 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'eitaka ry'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'entunguuka y'endembo, bireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha buhangwa bw'amahamba. Hatariho okurebereera n'okureeberera kurungi, eby'obugaiga ebi ebikuru biri omu kabi kahango.

eng_prompt: To ensure a healthy and thriving landscape, it's essential to establish a routine care regimen for newly planted saplings. Regular observation can help identify any issues early on, allowing for timely interventions.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa embeera y'obutonde ennungi n'okukulaakulana, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enteekateeka y'okulabirira ebimera ebipya. Okwetegereza buli kaseera kusobola okuyamba okuzuula ebizibu byonna nga bukyali, ne kisobozesa okuyingira mu nsonga mu budde.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni cwec ma ikabedo wa tye maber, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki yub me gwoko kodi ma ki pito manyen kare ki kare. Neno jami kare ki kare twero konyo me niang peko mo keken con, weko dano timo gin mo ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aiboisit naejok, ibusakinit aitolomun ainapeta nuka aidar iraan luitegelikina. Aanyanar duc ingarakini ajenun atiokisio sek, ido ingarakini aingarakin kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Angu ma ta mbazu kililiru azini zozu, eri orodriru e'dozu geri 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu o'diru 'diyi ma tambazu o'du driasi. E'yo eti ondaza sa'wa driasi ri eco fe e'yo azi 'diyi nizu drioru, fezu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obuhangwa birungi, n'eky'omugasho okureeberera emiti emisya. Okwegyendesereza buri kaire nikibaasa kuhwera omu kumanya oburemeezi butari bumwe na bumwe bukiri kare, ekirikwikiriza okukora omu bwire.

eng_prompt: Engaging students in environmental initiatives is crucial for fostering a sense of responsibility towards nature. One effective way to achieve this is by incorporating tree planting activities into school programs.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira kw'abayizi mu nteekateeka z'obutonde bw'ensi kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuza enneewulira y'obuvunaanyizibwa eri obutonde. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuyingiza emirimu gy'okusimba emiti mu nteekateeka z'amasomero.
ach_prompt: Kelo lutino kwan I yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal I dongo miti me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Yo acel maber tutwal me cobo man obedo bedo ki yub me pito yadi I gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Aitolomio na esisiak toma aswamisinei nuka alupok ejok kanu aisisianakin kes eipud loka aidar isuban luka Edeke. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aibwaikin aira ikito toma ainapeta nuka isomeroi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyini fizu e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma aza kozu angu ama agei ri ma dria. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri e'yo pati saza ni 'diyi 'bazu otita sukulu ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okweta abeegi omu mirimo y'obuhangwa bw'ensi, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obujunanizibwa aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okwongyera okubyara emiti omu nteekateeka z'amashomero.

eng_prompt: As environmental concerns continue to escalate, the impact of deforestation on local ecosystems and communities has become increasingly evident. Collaborative efforts are essential to address this pressing issue effectively.
lug_prompt: Nga okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi kweyongera okulinnya, ebikosa okutema ebibira ku butonde bw'ensi n'ebitundu byeyongedde okweyoleka. Kaweefube w'okukolera awamu wa mugaso okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno ey'amangu mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me cwec ma orumuwa tye kamede kwede, adwoki me tongo yadi I kom cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki kabedo wa tye ka nen. Ribe kacel pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko man matek tutwal-li maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiyalongongo na akwap aiyatakin, apolor noi atiokisio nuka atubutubio na ikito keda aiboisio nuka itunga. Aswam na aimorikikina ejok kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ni mu drile tu, e'yo pati ogaza ni angu ama agei 'diyi ma dria azini ongulumu eyi ma dria ri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi orodriru e'yo okporu 'di ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi nikweyongyera, n'oburemeezi bw'okutema emiti aha bihangirwe hamwe n'abantu omu byaro bweyongyeire kweyoreka. Enkora y'okukorera hamwe n'ey'omugasho omu kukora aha nshonga egi erikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: The increasing number of displaced families in conflict zones has raised concerns about the safety and well-being of vulnerable populations. In particular, children in refugee settlements are at heightened risk of exploitation and trafficking.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'amaka agasenguddwa mu bitundu ebirimu entalo gutaddewo okweraliikirira ku bukuumi n'obulungi bw'abantu abateesobola. Okusingira ddala, abaana mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu bali mu katyabaga k'okukozesebwa n'okukukusa.
ach_prompt: Wel lugangi ma gurwenyo gangi gi I kabedo ma lweny tye iye omedo lworo I kom ber bedo pa dano matye I peko. Tutwalle lutino ma gitye I kem pa luring ayela gitye I peko me can ki cato gi.
teo_prompt: Enaba lo iyatakina loka ikalia lu ikerai kotoma aiboisio nu ejie eyangauni aiyalongong kanu ayuwara keda aijar naka itunga lu ican. Kacut idwe luejaasi toma okabin lu ikerai ejaas ationis na aitwasam keda akoko.
lgg_prompt: Familia angu e'yo a'di ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri eji asi otiza e'yo ageitema ni azini aa'ta muke 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyiniri ma dria. Tutunisi, anzi nyiri aa'pi angu emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'bani eyi ayuzu azini eyi oguzu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'amaka agabingirwe omu myanya y'entaro, kireesireho okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda n'amagara marungi g'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Okukira munonga, abaana abari omu kampu z'empungi, bari omu kabi kahango k'okukoresa kubi abantu n'okubabuzaho.

eng_prompt: As consumers increasingly seek natural and sustainable products, the demand for honey has surged. This trend presents a unique opportunity for young entrepreneurs and workers to enter a thriving market.
lug_prompt: Ng'abaguzi beeyongera okunoonya ebintu eby'obutonde era ebiwangaala, obwetaavu bw'omubisi gw'enjuki bweyongedde. Omuze guno guteekawo omukisa ogw'enjawulo eri abavubuka abasuubuzi n'abakozi okuyingira akatale akakulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo luwil tye ka mede ki yenyo jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo, miti me moo kic bene omede tutwal. Man obedo kare maber tutwal pi lutim biacara ki lutic matino me donyo I cuk matye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi agwelak esike iboro lu iswamao ejok, apolor noi eipuda lo esike. Einakini epone ngol arereng na itegelikina nejaas atumunak luitolosete ibiasaran keda lu eswamak alomar toma osokoni lo ejokuna noi.
lgg_prompt: Ba anyu nya'ba 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu afa nyakuni azini ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ndazu risi, anyu ma cu ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di ni drileba fe 'ba ode tujari 'yepi 'diyini azini 'ba ode azi ngapi 'diyini fizu angu tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obu abaguzi barikweyongyera kusherura eby'obuhangwa n'eby'obuhangwa, obwetengo bw'obwoki bweyongyeire. Omuringo ogu nigureetaho omugisha gw'omutaano ahari abo abato abarikukora bizinesi n'abakozi okutaaha omu katare akarikukurakurana.

eng_prompt: The decline in bee populations has raised significant concerns about pollination and food production. To address this issue, it is crucial to support local beekeepers who play a vital role in maintaining healthy ecosystems.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'omuwendo gw'enjuki kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku kufukirira kw'enjuki n'okufulumya emmere. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, kikulu nnyo okuwagira abalunzi b'enjuki abakola omulimu omukulu mu kukuuma obutonde obulungi.
ach_prompt: Rwom me dwogo piny pa wel kic okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom nongo kwir ki cam. Me tyeko peko man, pire tek tutwal me miyo kony ki lugwok kic ma ikabedo wa ma gitiyo tic mapire tek me gwoko kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Adisiar na enaaba loka awo eyangauni aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos aitolomun ikur keda inyamat. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, erai ibore yenepol noi aigang itunga lu epitak awo lu iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Anyu ma kalafe ma omgbo esizuri eji asi otiza angiri e'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi ma ti ojizu azini nyaka ofuza ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru atita fezu 'ba anyu ta mbapi ogogo 'diyi dri azi okporu ngapi afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'omuhendo gw'enjoki, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha nshonga y'okujunda kw'enjoki hamwe n'eby'okurya. Okukora aha nshonga egi, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuhwera abariisa b'enjoki abarikukora omurimo gw'amaani omukureeberera eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, product presentation plays a crucial role in attracting consumers. Companies are increasingly recognizing the importance of appealing packaging to enhance their brand image and boost sales.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'ennaku zino akalimu okuvuganya, ennyanjula y'ekintu ekola omulimu munene mu kusikiriza abaguzi. Kkampuni zeeyongera okutegeera omugaso gw'okusiba ebintu ebisikiriza okutumbula ekifaananyi kyazo n'okutunda.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, nyutu jami itic pire tek tutwal I ywayo luwil. Dul mapat-pat tye ka niang ber pa bedo ki jami acata ma yomo cwiny dano me medo nying gi ki cato jami gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osokoni loka abolobol lolo, epone loka aitodiar iboro iswamai ejok noi kanu aisukunyun agwelak. Eutasi ikampunin ajenun ajokis naka ainapeta nuibusakinit aibwaikin kanu aitopolor ekirorikec ka aitopolor agwelanarikec.
lgg_prompt: Cuu andruri ma alia baka seza ma alia, e'da afa edeza ni 'diyi ma dria ri azi okporu nga 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dri esezu. Amuti eyi curu'do orodri afa edeza ndrizaru 'diyi ma dria ri esu eyini ani eyi ma wura otuzu azini afa oziza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, okworeka ebintu nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kushendashenda abaguzi. Kampuni ziriyo nizeeyongyera kumanya omugasho gw'okukoresa ebipaketi ebirikushemeza abantu, okutunguura eiziina ryazo n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: Despite the increasing demand for organic honey, many farmers struggle to make a sustainable income. This disparity highlights the challenges faced by producers in a market dominated by intermediaries.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo obwetaavu bw'omubisi gw'enjuki ogweyongedde, abalimi bangi bazibuwalirwa okufuna ssente. Enjawulo eno eraga okusoomoozebwa abafulumya ebintu kwe basanga mu katale akajjudde abantu abateesaganya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti me moo kic tye ka medde, lupur mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo cente. Apoka-poka man nyutu peko ma lupur nongo I cuk ma lucat aye loyo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata eipuda lo esike, etionikinit akoriok luipu adumun ikapun luipu. Itodunit atiaketait ngin atiokisio nuetereikina keda akoriok kosokoni loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: O'duko anyu nyakuni 'diyiniri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi dri ci robia esuzu. Esele coza 'diri e'da e'yo ewaru 'ba afa edepi 'diyi ni dri fuzu cu 'ba eselea 'diyi ni okpo fezu 'diyi be 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'obwoki, abahingi baingi nibarwana kutunga entaasya. Entaaniso egi neeyoreka oburemeezi obu abarikukora ebintu baine omu katare akarikwebemberwa abashuubuzi.

eng_prompt: As the demand for local honey and bee-related products continues to rise, many beekeepers are finding it challenging to keep up with the market trends. To thrive in this competitive landscape, they must adapt and enhance their business acumen.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'omubisi gw'enjuki n'ebintu ebikwatagana nabyo bweyongera okulinnya, abalunzi b'enjuki bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okugoberera entambula y'akatale. Okukulaakulana mu mbeera eno ey'okuvuganya, balina okukyusa n'okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe mu bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo miti me moo kic ki jami mukene ma aa ki I kom kic tye ka medde ameda, lugwok kic mapol tye kanongo tek tutwal me lubu jami matye katime I cuk. Me dongo I kabedo man ma pyem tye iye matek tutwal, omyero gubed ki diro me timo biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo esike keda iboro lu iswamao keda awo, etionikinitos itunga luipu lu epitak awo aimorikikin keda epone loejai kosokoni. Kanu aswam ejok kotoma abolobol kana, ekot kes aijulakin ka aitojokar ebiasarakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu anyu vile ogogo 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu tualurisi, 'ba anyu ta mbapi 'diyi esu ewaru e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Aa'zu drile suzaru e'yo baka seza ni 'di ma alea, le eyi ma otu eyi ma tujari eyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'obwoki n'ebintu ebirikuruga omu bwoki nibigumizamu nibyeyongyera, abahiingi b'enjoki nibabona oburemeezi bw'okugumizamu n'emigyenzo y'akatare. Okutunguuka omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, bashemereire kukora empindahinduka n'okwongyera amaani omu bizinesi zaabo.

eng_prompt: Effective financial management is crucial for any successful business. One of the key components of this management is maintaining accurate records of all financial transactions.
lug_prompt: Enkwata y'ensimbi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu bizinensi yonna ewangula. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nzirukanya y'emirimu eno kwe kukuuma ebiwandiiko ebituufu ku nkolagana y'ensimbi zonna.
ach_prompt: Tic ki lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi biacara mo keken ma cobo miti ne. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me doro tic enoni obedo gwoko rekod matir I kom tic me lim weng.
teo_prompt: Aidar ikapun ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka ebiasara loekerianara. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka eyaitene lo ngesi aidar aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru tujari drile suzaru 'diyi ni. Afa azi okporu e'yo driceza 'di ma alia 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo siza kililiru 'diyi ma tambazu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa kurungi esente n'eky'omugasho omu bizinesi yoona erikusingura. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu bwebembezi obu n'okurinda ebihandiiko ebihikire ebirikukwata ahaby'empiiha.

eng_prompt: Advancements in technology and techniques have led to significant changes in the apiculture industry. As beekeepers seek to enhance their products, exploring innovative processing methods becomes essential.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya n'obukodyo eviiriddeko enkyukakyuka mu by'enjuki. Ng'abalunzi b'enjuki banoonya okutumbula ebyamaguzi byabwe, okunoonyereza ku ngeri empya ez'okubikolamu kifuuse kikulu.
ach_prompt: Dongo pa diro me tet ki diro me gwoko kic okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I tenge me gwoko kic. Kit ma lugwok kic tye ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me jami gi, yenyo yoo manyen me yubu kic odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana nes ayangau aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma aipit awo. Kwape ekotosi akoriok awo aitojokar iboro kec, epolok noi aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aitemonokin awo.
lgg_prompt: Ojata tekenologia ni 'diyi eji ojata okporu okalamvu anyu tambazaniri ma alia ra. Ba anyu ta mbapi 'diyi leki afa yini edele 'diyi ma omgbo otu, geri o'diru 'bani eyi edezu 'diyi ma eti ondazu ri eca orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguuka omu tekinorogye n'obukodyo, kireesireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu by'enjoki. Abariisa b'enjoki ku barikugyezaho kutunguura eby'okurya byabo, okucondooza emiringo y'okutunguura n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: The methods used for harvesting and processing honey play a crucial role in determining its overall quality. Additionally, the conditions under which honey is stored can significantly affect its flavor and nutritional properties.
lug_prompt: Enkola ezikozesebwa mu kukungula n'okulongoosa omubisi gw'enjuki zikola kinene nnyo mu kumanya omutindo gwagwo okutwalira awamu. Okugatta ku ekyo, embeera omubikibwa omubisi gw'enjuki esobola okukosa obuwoomi bwagwo n'emmere yaago.
ach_prompt: Yoo ma kitiyo kwede me kwanyo ki yubu moo kic konyo totwal I niang rwom ne. Medo i kom meno, kit ma ki gwoko kwede moo kic twero kelo adwoki marac i kom kit ma mit kwede ki cam ma tye iye.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu itwasamao kanu aisak esike keda aitemonokin esike iswamaete ejok noi kotoma ajenun adoketait ke. Kilema, ejautene lo idarere esike epedori aitolitol ajon ke keda iboro lu enyamio.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani ayule anyu trazu azini otuzu 'diyi azi okporu nga anyu ma wura dria. Azi dika, geri 'bani anyu ma ta mbazu 'diyi eco e'yo erini avizu azini afa erini nya 'diyi 'ye onzi ra.
nyn_prompt: Enguuto ezirikukoresibwa omu kusharuura n'okutereeza obwoki, nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya omutindo gwabwo. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, embeera ei obwoki burikubiikirwamu, nibubaasa kurabanisamu oburungi bwabwo n'eby'okurya byabwo.

eng_prompt: Many people are discovering the joys of sustainable agriculture, and one of the most rewarding ventures is beekeeping. With the right knowledge and tools, anyone can start their own hive and enjoy the benefits it brings.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bazudde essanyu ly'okulima n'okulunda mu ngeri ey'obwegendereza, era emu ku mirimu egisinga okuganyula kwe kulunda enjuki. Ng'olina amagezi n'ebikozesebwa ebituufu, omuntu yenna asobola okutandikawo ekisulo kye n'anyumirwa emigaso egivaamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka nongo yomcwiny ma aa ki I pur matye kamede anyim, ki acel me kin jami ma kelo magoba madit loyo aye gwoko kic. Ki ngec ki jami tic matir, ngat mo keken twero cako odi yadi mege dok nongo mit pa jami ma kelo.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu ajenun aiyalama naka akoru na ejok, ido ediopet kotoma aswamisinei nuejokuka ngesi aipit awo. Keda acoa na abeit keda iboro lu itwasamao, epedori idio itunganan ageun aiboisit ke ka alelakin ajokisio nu eyangauni.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ayiko e'yo agirikica ni ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma dria ri esu, dika e'yo azi orodriru ndeni ri anyu tambaza ni. Ondua kililiru azini afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyisi, 'ba ci eco yi ma aku e'do azini ayiko isu orodri erini eji 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi bariyo nibajumbura okushemererwa kw'obuhingi n'oburiisa, kandi kimwe aha bintu ebirikukirayo okushemeza n'okuriisa enjoki. Omuntu weena yaaba aine obwengye n'ebikwato ebirikwetengwa, naabaasa kutandikaho enju ye n'okushemererwa n'emigasho ei erikureeta.

eng_prompt: Improving the production techniques and investing in better beekeeping practices are essential for enhancing the overall quality of honey. As a result, farmers will be able to meet international standards and access new markets.
lug_prompt: Okulongoosa enkola y'okufulumya omubisi gw'enjuki n'okusiga ensimbi mu kulunda obulungi enjuki bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula omutindo gw'omubisi gw'enjuki okutwalira awamu. N'ekinaavaamu, abalimi bajja kusobola okutuukiriza omutindo gw'ensi yonna n'okufuna obutale obupya.
ach_prompt: Dongo diro me yubu kic ki keto cente I kom gwoko kic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me medo rwom me moo kic. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur gubi bedo ki kero me cobo miti gi I rwom me wilobo ki nongo cuk manyen.
teo_prompt: Aitojokar iponesio luka aitolom esike keda aipikakin ikapun toma aipit awo ejok kanu aikeuna adoketait na esike. Kanuka ngun, epedorete akoriok aitodolikin adoketait naka akwapin nukokinga kosodete adumun isokonin luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Geri anyu edezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu geri anyu tambazu muke 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru anyu ma wura otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi nga mu aa'ta wura wudrikuru si 'diyi be dika eyi ma cu eyi esu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura omutindo gw'obwoki n'okuta esente omu by'obwoki n'eby'omugasho omu kutunguura omutindo gw'obwoki. Ekyarugiremu, abahingi nibaija kuba nibabaasa kuhikaana n'omutindo gw'ensi yoona n'okutunga obutare obusya.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, it's essential for beekeepers to not only focus on production but also on effective sales strategies. By enhancing their marketing skills, they can better reach consumers and increase their honey's visibility.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akavuganya, kya mugaso nnyo eri abalunzi b'enjuki obuteemalira ku kufulumya kwokka wabula n'engeri ennungi ez'okutunda. Nga batumbula obukugu bwabwe mu by'okutunda, basobola bulungi okutuuka ku bakasitoma n'okwongera okumanyika kw'omubisi gwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, pire tek tutwal ki lugwok kic pe me keto cwinygi I kom jami ma giyubu keken ento bene I kom yoo me cat maber. I medo diro me cat meggi, gitwero oo bot luwil ki medo rwom me cato moo kic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka lolo, ejokuka akoriok lu awo mam apodokinit aitolomunun bon konye kowai lo agwelanar. Kowai lo aitojokar acoasinei kec nuka agwelanar, epedorete kesi adolokin agwelak ejok kosodete aijen esike kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba anyu ta mbapi 'diyini asi 'bazu lu afa edeza ma dria ku te geri afa ozizu 'diyi ma dria indi. Geri eyini geri eyini anyu ozizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu risi, eyi eco ca 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi vu ra dika eyi ma anyu ma e'daza ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, n'eky'omugasho abahiingi b'enjoki kuta omutima aha kukora kwonka, beitu n'okukoresa oburyo burungi bw'okuguza. Barikweyongyera amaani omu by'obushubuzi, nibabaasa kuhika ahabaguzi n'okureebeka kw'obwoki bwabo.

eng_prompt: Many developing countries face significant challenges in improving their economic conditions. One effective strategy to address these issues is through the promotion of sustainable farming practices.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi ezikyakula zisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kutumbula embeera zaago ez'ebyenfuna. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okugonjoolamu ensonga zino kwe kutumbula enkola z'okulima eziyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Lobo mapol matye kadongo gitye ka nongo peko madit tutwal me ilo malo rwom me lim meggi. Yoo acel maber loyo me tyeko peko magi en aye me tyelo kor yub me pur matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Akwapin nuipu nuepolok ejaas keda ainingosia nuepolok noi kanu aitojokar ejautene kec loka ikapun. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu erai aitojokar iponesio luka akor luepedorete aidar akoru.
lgg_prompt: Kari zopi zopi zopi 'diyi ma karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi orodriru e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu ri geri ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga maingi agarikutunguuka, nigashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entaasya zaago. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora aha nshonga ezi, n'okutunguura emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho.

eng_prompt: In order to support their operations and ensure the sustainability of their businesses, beekeepers often face financial challenges. To address these issues, they could benefit from a collective approach to funding.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuyimirizaawo emirimu gyabwe n'okukakasa nti bizinensi zaabwe ziwangaala, abalunzi b'enjuki batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa mu by'ensimbi. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, bayinza okuganyulwa mu nkola ey'awamu ey'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Pi konyo tic gi ki neno ni biacara gi tye kawot maber, lugwok kic ipol kare ginongo peko me lim. Me tyeko peko magi, gitwero nongo ber pa yoo acel me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang aswam kec ka awanyun ebe ejarete ibiasaran kec, etapit duc akoriok awo adumun atiokisio nuka ikapun. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, epedorete kesi aimedaun kotoma aitolomunun ikapun nepepe.
lgg_prompt: O'bi anyu ta mbapi 'diyi tutuni e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma tujari eyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, eyi eco orodri esu geri tualu robia esuzu 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abariisa b'enjoki nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'empiiha, kugira ngu babaase kugumizamu n'emirimo yaabo n'okureeba ngu eby'obushuubuzi byabo bigumizamu. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, nibabaasa kugasirwa omu kukorera hamwe omu by'esente.

eng_prompt: Many children in orphanages rely on the support of the community for their basic needs. Without sufficient funding, these facilities struggle to provide adequate care and resources.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi mu bifo ewakuumirwa bamulekwa beesigama ku buyambi bw'ekitundu ku byetaago byabwe ebikulu. Awatali buyambi bumala, amalwaliro gano galwana okuwa obujjanjabi obumala n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutino mapol ma gitye I gangi pa lutino kic gijenge I kom kony pa lwak pi jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Labongo lim ma oromo, odi yadi magi nongo peko me miyo kony ki kony ma mite.
teo_prompt: Idwe luipu luejaas oreria lu idarere ikokiok ejarete keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga luka atutubet kanu ipudesia kec. Arai emamete ikapun lu edolitos, etiono aijanakin adekasinei keda iboro luedolitos.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri karakara aku emvuanzi ta mbazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi yi ati atita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. Robia capira ri kokoru, pari arojo ni 'diyi dri ci azakoma fezu kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abaana baingi abarikutuura omu maka g'efuuzi, nibaheebwa obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu. Hatariho sente ezirikumara, amarwariro aga nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera abarwaire kurungi hamwe n'ebintu ebirikumara.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the rise of educational inequality has led to a surge in demand for affordable learning materials. As a result, some individuals have turned to illegal means to acquire textbooks, fueling a thriving underground trade.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweyongerayongera kw'obutafaanagana mu by'enjigiriza kuleetedde okweyongerayongera kw'obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu kusoma eby'ebbeeyi. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abamu baddukidde mu makubo agatali mu mateeka okufuna ebitabo by'okusoma, ekiviiriddeko eby'obusuubuzi mu nkukutu okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, bedo tye pa apoka-poka ikit me kwan okelo mede pa miti me nongo jami kwan ma welgi yot. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mukene gucako tic ki yoo ma pe atir me nongo bukke, ma oweko biacara me mung tye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol naka amamus na eirianu kotoma asioman ayangau eipuda lo iboro lu isisiaere lu epol etiai. Kanuka ngun, apotu icetunga olototo toma iwaitin lumam ekisil ecamakinit adumun itaboi lu isisiaere, ido itopoloori agwelanar naka aiyeyea.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo esele coza onita ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ri fe afa onita ni aje kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi oja eyi geri azita palaa ku 'diyi ma alea buku eyi esuzu eyini ani tujari 'yezu nyaku alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okweyongyera kw'obutaingana omu by'obwegyese, kireesireho okweyongyera kw'eby'okukozesa omu kwega ebirikubaasika. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abamwe batandikire kukoresa emiringo etari mu mateeka okutunga ebitabo, ekirikureetaho eby'obushuubuzi ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The rising number of children in orphanages is a pressing social issue that needs to be addressed. One effective way to tackle this problem is by encouraging parents to plan their families thoughtfully.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abaana mu bifo ewakuumirwa bamulekwa ogweyongera gwe gumu ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu ezirina okukolebwako. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okugonjoolamu ekizibu kino kwe kukubiriza abazadde okuteekateeka obulungi amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Wel lutino matye I gangi pa lutino kic tye peko madit tutwal ma omyero ki tyek. Yo acel maber loyo me lweny i kom peko man en aye me cuku cwiny lunyodo me yube pi lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Enaba loepol noi loka idwe luidarere ikokiok erai ationis na ekot aitemokin. Epone ediopebon loka aitemokin ationis na ngesi aisinyikokit auriak aitemonokin aur kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe anzi nyiri aku emvuanzi eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma alea tupi tutu ri eri e'yo azi okporu lepi 'ba ma ko e'yo ra ni i. Geri azi orodriruni ecozu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu ri eri tipika eyini imbata fezu eyi ma familia eyi otuzu geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abaana abari omu maka g'efuuzi ogweyongyeire, n'eshonga y'amaani erikwetenga kukorwaho. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okumaraho oburemeezi n'okuhiga abazaire kuteekateekyera gye amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that access to quality educational resources significantly enhances learning outcomes. Therefore, providing students with essential scholastic materials can lead to improved academic performance.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti okufuna ebikozesebwa eby'omutindo mu by'enjigiriza kyongera nnyo ku biva mu kusoma. N'olw'ekyo, okuwa abayizi ebikozesebwa mu kusoma kisobola okutumbula ensoma yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni nongo jami me kwan ma rwom gi malo medo rwom me kwan. Pi meno, miyo jami ma mite pi lutino kwan twero weko lutino timo peny maber.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe adumunun iboro lu asioman lu ejokuka itojokari eswamae lo aisisia. Kanuka ngun, aijaikin idwe iboro lu itwasamao kosomero epedori aitojokar eswamae loka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini afa onita ni muke 'diyi ma esuta ni onita ma agata ma omgbo otu. Ka'dini, sukulu anzi eyini afa sukulu ni orodriru 'diyi fezu ri eco fe eyini agazu muke ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu okutunga ebintu by'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese, nikureetaho entunguuka omu by'obwegyese. N'ahabw'ekyo, okuheereza abeegi ebintu ebirikwetengwa omu mashomero, nikibaasa kubareetera kukora gye omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: Investing in quality education is essential for personal and societal growth. When students are equipped with knowledge and skills, they are better prepared to navigate the challenges of life.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza eby'omutindo kya mugaso mu kukulaakulana kw'omuntu n'ekitundu. Abayizi bwe baweebwa amagezi n'obukugu, baba beetegefu bulungi okwaŋŋanga okusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan ma rwom gi malo pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa dano ki kabedo gi. Ka lutino tye ki ngec ki diro, ci giyube me lweny i kom peko me kwo.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka itunganan keda atutubet. Arai ijaikitai esisiak acoa keda acoa, ekapakina kesi aitodolikin atiokisio nu aijar.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita muke ri ma alea ri eri orodriru zota 'ba alu alu ni azini ongulumu eyini ri ni. Sukulu anzi ka ovu ondua be azini ondua be, yi otu yi e'yo ewaru idri ma alia 'diyi ma ti ojizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu by'obwegyese ni kikuru aha ntunguuka y'omuntu weena hamwe n'ey'abantu boona. Abeegi ku barikutunga obwengye n'emyoga, nibeteekateekyera kurungi okurwanisa oburemeezi bw'amagara.

eng_prompt: The community has always valued the importance of supporting vulnerable children. As a result, local organizations have frequently collaborated to provide assistance to orphanages.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu bulijjo kibadde kitwala omugaso gw'okuyamba abaana abateesobola. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bikwataganye okuyamba amaka ga bamulekwa.
ach_prompt: Lwak ipol kare gi maro konyo lutino ma goro. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me tedero ipol kare gitiyo kacelo me miyo kony ki gangi pa lutino kic.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc itunga ajenun ajokis naka aigang idwe lu ican. Kanuka ngun, iriamunos duc iriongeta luka atutubet kanu aijaikin agangat nejaas ireria lu idarere ikokiok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi 'du e'yo orodriru atita fezu anzi e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyini ri sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu sa'wa driasi azakoma fezu aku emvuanzi eyi ma tambazu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibareeba omugasho gw'okuhwera abaana abatarikwebaasa. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'omubyaro bikira kukorera hamwe okuhereza obuhwezi omu maka g'efuuzi.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainties, the support and guidance of parents can be invaluable. Recognizing the sacrifices made for their well-being is essential for fostering appreciation and understanding.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, obuyambi n'obulagirizi bw'abazadde buyinza okuba obw'omuwendo ennyo. Okusiima okwefiiriza okukoleddwa ku lw'obulungi bwabwe kya mugaso mu kutumbula okusiima n'okutegeera.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki peko ki peko, kony ki tira pa lunyodo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pwoc pi jami ma gujalo pi ber bedo gi pire tek tutwal pi dongo pwoc ki niang.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio, agangat keda aicoreta nuka auriak epol ajokis. Aitijenar aswamisio nu iswamatai kanuka aijar kec ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aisiyalamikinet keda amisiikin.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie tre ri ma alea, atita azini imbata tipika eyini ri ma orodri adaru. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi owizu eyi ma edri ni ri ma e'yo egazu ri eri orodriru eyini ani awa'difo esuzu azini eyi ma vata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi, obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza bw'abazaire n'obw'omugasho munonga. Okusiima okwehayo okwakozirwe ahabw'oburungi bwabo n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okusiima n'okwetegyereza.
